title: (Namo) Devi Durga Janani
title2: (Namo) Devi Durga Janani Devi Amba Bhavani
lyrics:
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma
Jaya Karunamayi Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Ma [ Devi Durga ... ]
Deva Sambhuta Shakthi Swaroopini
Abhayankari Devi Narayani
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Sai Ma
Jaya Ma, Jaya Ma, Sai Ma
meaning: I pray to Mother Durga, the Divine Mother. She is Mother Ambe, born out of the flame that emanated from the bodies of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. She is full of compassion and gives us courage, protection and joy. I sing to You, O Divine Mother, and praise Your Supreme Power and Form in Mother Sai.

title: A crown of hair
title2: A crown of hair, an orange robe
lyrics:
Loving eyes, a heart of gold
He floats to us across the sand
Sacred ash pours from His hand
Millions call Him living Lord, a living Lord is He
Millions wave with tearful eyes, tearful eyes with joy inside
A million hearts in sweet devotion filled with the love of the Lord

title: A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
title2: A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
lyrics:
Your breath is my sound
 Your movement is my flow
 A hollow flute I am in Thy hands
 No ego, no envy, no pride
 The warmth of Your hands is my peace
 I delight in knowing my place is in Thy hands
 A hollow flute I am in Thy hands

title: A Temple In My Heart
title2: A Temple In My Heart, A Prayer In My Soul,
lyrics:
A Song On My Lips, And I Sing To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, 
    Baba Sai Baba, I Sing To You
Sathya Sai Baba, Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, I Call To You

A Light In My Heart, A Yearning In My Soul,
    A Name On My Lips, And I Call To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba ... 

Joy In My Heart, Peace In My Soul,
    A Smile On My Lips And I Sing To You
[Chorus:] Baba Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba ...

title: Aa Gyen Baba Ji
title2: Aa Gyen Baba Ji Tvadde Naam De Bhikhari
lyrics:
Naam De Bhikhari Tvadde Naam De Bhikhari [ Aa Gyen ... ]
Sabto Unchan Tera Naam Merey Vahey Guru Tera Naam
Sabto Unchan Tera Naam Merey Saiyaa Tera Naam
Mein Mangta Dar Terey Aiyaa Chod Ke Duniya Saari

Sat Naam Vahey Guru Sat Naam Vahey Guru
Vahey Guru Ji Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Ji Vahey Guru
meaning: Baba, Your devotees have come to You; O Lord Sai, You are the Supreme; Your devotees seek refuge at Your Feet leaving everything behind; Hail to You, O Sai!

title: Aa Subete no Inochi no
title2: Aa Subete no Inochi no Kami, Sai Watashi no Ai
lyrics:
Tada Hitasura ni Anata wo Omou
Anata wa Watashi no Subete (O Baba)
Anata wa Watashi no Ai (O Baba)
Anata to Hitotsu ni Naru, Sai Watashi no Ai
meaning: You are the God of everything in my life, You are my love. I think upon You devotedly. O Baba, You are my everything. O Baba, You are my love. Sai, I will become one with Your love.

title: Aao Aao Aao Aao
lyrics:
Aao Sundara Nanda Gopal
Navaneetha Chora Manasa Vihara
Darshana Do Nandalala (2)
Mujhey Darshana Do Nandalala
meaning: Welcome the charming Gopala, the son of Nanda who lovingly stole butter and who revels in the hearts of devotees. O Nandalala, grace us with your Darshan.

title: Aao Aao Antaryami
lyrics:
Adi Narayana Sai Narayana [ Aao Aao ... ]
Hrudaya Vihari Hey Giridhari
Hey Giridhari Hey Giridhari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
meaning: Welcome Lord Sai Narayana, the indweller of our hearts, the one who lifted the Govardhan hill. You are the one who assumed the form of Hari and Murari to remove the demonic characteristics in our minds.

title: Aao Aao Ganapathi Deva
lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Guru Deva [ Aao Aao ... ]
Eshwari Nandana Gajamukha Deva
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Sai Deva
Vamana Roopa Varana Deva
Vanchita Dayaka Sai Guru Deva (2)
meaning: Welcome Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi. You are none other than Lord Sathya Sai, the son of Eshwaramba. The short statured Lord, our Divine Teacher Sai, fulfills our desires.

title: Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sab Jeevan Ke Karo Kalyan [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Ho Parama Krupa Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandir Nata Naagara
Tum Ho Sathya Sanathana Swami
Ghat Ghat Vasi Antaryami
meaning: Welcome O Lord Sai. Bless and grant auspiciousness and peace. You are the ocean of compassion, the temple of virtues. You are the Truth and Eternal Bliss and the one who is omnipresent in every being.

title: Aao Aao Nandalala
lyrics:
Sundara Shyama Gopala [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Bansidhari Shyama
Ayodhya Pathi Sita Rama
Parthi Baba Karuna Nidhan
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Bala
alt_lyrics:
Aao Aao Nandalala
Sundara Shyama (Sai) Gopala [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Bansidhari Shyama
Ayodhya Pathi Sita Rama
Parthi Baba Karuna Sindho
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Bala [ Sundara Shyama ... ]
meaning: Welcome O Nandalala (Krishna), You are the beautiful, dark-hued one with the divine flute. You are Lord Rama of Ayodhya, the Lord of Sita. You are Lord Sai of Parthi, the compassionate one. You are also the butter-stealing son of Mother Yashoda.

title: Aao Aao Sai
lyrics:
Hrdaya Mandir Me Aao Sai [ Aao Aao ... ]
Darshan Dey Prabhu Paapa Vinashaka
Sharanagatha Ke Bhava Bhaya Mochaka
Prema Swaroopa Aao
Sathya Swaroopa Aao Sai
meaning: Sai, please come into the temple of our hearts and give us Your darshan. Destroy our sins and liberate us from this worldly existence. You are the personification of love and truth.

title: Aao Aao Sai Natha
lyrics:
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha [ Aao Aao ... ]
Darshan Ke Liye Taras Rahey Hain
Nayan Hamarey O Sai
Darsha Dikhao Daya Ke Sagar
Aao Shankara Hey Parameshwara
Aao Aao Sai Natha
Aao Aao Hey Jagannatha (2)
meaning: Welcome O Sai, Lord of the Universe, our eyes are eager to see Your Divine form. Kindly grant us Your Divine Darshan, O Ocean of Compassion Sai. Welcome, O Lord Shiva, Lord Krishna.

title: Aao Aao Sai Pyaarey
lyrics:
Keertan Karoon Main Sai Tumharey [ Aao Aao ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Taarey
Darshan Do Jeevan Ke Saharey
meaning: Welcome, O beloved Lord Sai, I sing Your glory. O Supreme Lord, You are the twinkling star of my eyes. O companion of my life, kindly grant us Your Divine Darshan.

title: Aao Aao Shyam Kishora
lyrics:
Aao Aao Nanda Kumara
Rhum Jhum Nachata Payal Bajavata
Aao Navanita Chora
Aao Aao Parthi Vihara [ Aao Aao Shyam ... ]
Man Mandir Me Sankeertan Me
Sankeertan Me Sai Bhajan Me
Aao Parthi Vihara
Aao Aao Hrdaya Vihara
meaning: Please come, Krishna, son of Nanda. Let us hear the sound of the anklets adorning your dancing feet. O Lord of Parthi, please come into the temple of our hearts through our songs.

title: Aao Aao Shyama Gopal
lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Sai Gopal Aao [ Aao Aao ... ]
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao Narayana Krishna Gopal (Aao)
meaning: Welcome O Shyam Gopala, the one who has a charming and a captivating form. You are the upholder of righteousness and very dear to the devotees who treads the right path. We welcome You as Narayana, Krishna and Gopala.

title: Aao Aao Swami
lyrics:
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Swami [ Aao Aao ... ]
Darshana Dey Prabhu Paapa Vinashaka
Sharanagatha Ke Bhava Bhaya Mochana
Sathya Swaroopa Aao
Prema Swaroopa Aao Swami
meaning: Welcome Lord Sai, please come and install Yourself in our hearts. Your Divine Darshan dispels all sins. Give me refuge and save me from the cycle of birth and death. Please come, Oh embodiment of Divine Love and Truth.

title: Aao Gopala Giridhari
lyrics:
Aao Aao Antaryami
Aao Aao Ananda Sai [ Aao Gopala ... ]
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi
Aao Aao (Pra) Shanthi Nivasi
meaning: Welcome Lord Gopala (Krishna), the one who lifted the Govardhana hill, the indweller of our hearts. Welcome, O blissful Lord Sai, Lord of Prasanthi, You are verily Lord Krishna.

title: Aao Gopala Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Mujhey Parthi Gopala [ Aao Gopala ]
Brindavan Ke Krishna Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopala
Aao Gopala Shyama ( Sai ) Gopala
meaning: Come and grant us Your divine darshan, Oh Gopala! The one with blue complexion who dwells in Brindavan and Parthi.

title: Aao Prabhu Aao Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Aao Prabhu ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Nirmala Jeevan Daata
Jagadodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Aao (Sai) Narayana Bhakthon Ke Pran
meaning: Welcome, O Lord Sathya Sai, You endow everyone with purity of life, truth, righteousness, bliss and love. O Lord Sai Narayana! You are the saviour of entire creation and the very life breath of Your devotees.

title: Aao Pyaarey Nayana Hamarey
title2: Aao Pyaarey Nayana Hamarey Sai Hamarey Aao
lyrics:
Tum Bin Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey (Baba)
Tum Bin Kaun Saharey Aao Sai Pyaarey
Sai Hamarey Aao (3)
meaning: Welcome, O Beloved Lord Sai, You are our protector. Without You, there is no one to protect and support us.

title: Aao Sai Gopal
lyrics:
Aao Gopal Aao Gopal Aao Sai Gopal [ Aao Sai ... ]
Aao Hey Prabhu Parama Dayal
Aao Natavara Lal
Aao Shankara Aao Abhayankara Aao Shiva Shankara Sai
meaning: Welcome O Sai Gopal, the most merciful Lord who is who is the form of Lord Shiva and the protector of the Universe.

title: Aao Sai Hrudaya Mandir Mey
lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai [ Aao Sai ... ]
Mata Pitha Guru Prana Sakha Sai
Sab Tiratha Merey Terey Charan Mey
meaning: Welcome, Lord Sai. Please kindle the flame of wisdom in the temple of my heart. You are my life breath, my father, mother, divine guide and kith and kin. Your divine Feet are my pilgrimages.

title: Aao Sai Narayana Darshan Deejo
lyrics:
Tum Ho Jagat Vidhata (2)
Tum Hi Ho Brahma Tum Hi Ho Vishnu
Tum Hi Ho Shankara Roopa (2)
alt_lyrics:
Aao Sai Narayana Darshan Deejo
Tum Ho Jagat Vidhata (2)
Tum Hi Ho Brahma Tum Hi Ho Vishnu
Tum Hi Ho Shankara Roopa (2)
Tum Hi Ho Rama Tum Hi Ho Krishna
Tum Ho Vishwa Vidhata (2)
meaning: Welcome Sai Narayana grant us Your Darshan. You are Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Rama, Krishna and You are the one who creates and organizes the universe.

title: Ab-woon d’ba-she-maya
lyrics:
Net-qa-dash she-mukh
 Tay-tay mal-ku-takh (x2)
 Ne-way tzev-ya-nach ay-kan-na
 d'ba-she-ma-ya af b'ar-ha
 Hav-lan lach-ma d'sun-qa-nan yao-ma-na
 Wash-boq-lan khau-beyn
 ay-kan-na daf kh-nan shwo-qan l'khay-ya-bayn
 Way-la tach-lan l'nes-yu-na, eh-la patzan
 min bi-sha
 Me-tul di-lakh-ee mal-ku-ta, wah-haila,
 wa-tesh-buch-ta
 L'ah-lam al-min, ah-meyn
meaning:
Father in Heaven, May Your Name be holy,
 May Your Kingdom come,
 May Your Will be done as it is in Heaven, so also on the Earth.
 Give us the bread that we need from day to day.
 Forgive us our wrongs, just as we have forgiven those who have wronged us.
 Do not let us enter into temptation, but separate us from error.
 For Yours is the Kingdom, the Power, and the Glory
 From age to age, Amen.

title: Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Parthi Pureeshwari Paapa Vimochani
Hrudaya Viharini Sai Janani (2)
meaning: Oh Mother, you are the one who bestows protection from fear, you are bliss personified having eyes resembling the lotus petal. Oh goddess, of Parthi you are the remover of sins and the one who revels in our hearts.

title: Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini
lyrics:
Sai Mata Sathya Sai Mata
Himagiri Nandini Bhava Bhaya Bhanjani
Jaya Jagat Janani Devi Bhavani
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Janani
meaning: Mother Sai is the embodiment of Truth, the one who bestows protection from fear and bliss personified. She is verily Mother Parvathi, the daughter of Daksha (Ice Mountain) and destroyer of worldly miseries. Victory to this Universal Mother Bhavani, the Goddess of Parthi.

title: Abhaya Pradayini Mata Mahalakshmi
lyrics:
Alankara Roopini Mata Mahalakshmi [ Abhaya Pradayini ... ]
Mata Mahalakshmi Sai Mahalakshmi
Ananda Dayini Mata Mahalakshmi
Amrutha Varshini Mata Mahalakshmi [ Mata Mahalakshmi ... ]
meaning: Mother Mahalakshmi (the Goddess of wealth) is the One who has decorated Herself grandly. She confers freedom from fear, Bliss and Grace in a torrent who is presently moving on Earth as Sai Mahalakshmi.

title: Abhayankara Sai Shiva
lyrics:
Avinashi Naga Bhooshana [ Abhayankara ... ]
Hara Hara Shambho Haalaahala Dhara
Pinaka Vaibhava Sai Shiva
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai who destroys the fear of birth and death. He is verily Lord Shiva who is eternal and indestructible, and swallowed the haalaa-hala poison to protect the world. He is adorned with the cobra and the Pinaka bow. Glory to Sai Shiva.

title: Abhinandan Hai Sai Hamara
lyrics:
Shubh Janam Din Aaj Tumhara
Dhanya Dhanya Hai Sadguru Deva
Sikha Rahey Jo Gnan Dhyan Seva
Krupa Karo Ab Sab Bhakto Par
As Liye Khade Hain Darbar [ Abhinandan Hai ... ]
Ram Naam Dhan Dedo Baba
Sab Ko Shanthi Dedo Baba
Krupa Karo Ab Sab Bhakto Par
meaning: We celebrate this day, Your birthday, Lord Sai, our eternal teacher. Please shower Your blessings and wisdom, and teach us to meditate on You, and serve You. Bestow mercy and peace on us devotees, who are in Your Holy presence.

title: Abide In The Word
lyrics:
As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself
Except it abide in the Vine
No more can ye unless you abide in Me
So that I might abide in You.
 
Every tree that exists simply consists
Of the Presence of God I Am
It shows as it grows that it’s part of the whole
As it glorifies its Father within..
 
(chorus)
All of us are leaves on the very same tree
We are One with all that is True
The Son is who we are..we have never been afar
From the Life and the Love that is ours..

title: Abre al mundo la flor
title2: Abre al mundo la flor de loto de mi corazon
lyrics:
Que en el calmado lago de mi corazon mi cuerpo flote
 Tu cara reflajada en las aguas (Sai)
 Y tu pelo acariciando mi ser
 Shanti shanti shanti Senor
meaning:
Open to the world the lotus flower of my heart, that in the calm lake of my
 heart, My body afloat, Your face reflected in the waters; Your hair caressing
 my being; Peace, peace Lord.

title: According to your faith
title2: According to your faith, my friend, it is done unto you
lyrics:
According to your faith you’ll find the things you hold are true
For it’s Faith that is the fuel that brings that thing into your life
So change your mind and use that faith to bring peace instead of strife
 
According to your faith, my friend, is how your life will be
You have the choice to make this life anyway you see
For life is not just happening but comes forth from belief
So know the Truth and live it now and put an end to a life of grief
 
For it is in putting faith in things not seen is how things come to be
For it is in placing trust in anything sends it forth and sets it free
So be wise and pure as the little ones who embrace God’s love alone
Then you will know the Truth of abundant life It’s within you you’ll find your Home
 
According to your faith, my friend, will be a heaven or a hell
At all times we’re planting seeds of which the fruit will surely tell
If we are sowing seeds of falsity or the Christ where all is well
The Truth of God can be your life..the Truth of God will be your life
The Truth of God it is your life..it’s in Him we forever dwell

title: Adbhuta Keshava Krishna
lyrics:
Hrudaya Kamala Nivasa
Chitha Chora Lavanya Krishna [ Adbhuta Keshava ...  ]
Mora Mukuta Hari Bansidhara
Navaneetha Chora Yashoda Lal
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the miraculous one who destroyed the demon Keshi. Glory to the enchanting Lord who resides in the lotus of our hearts. Wearing a peacock feather on His Hair, He mesmerizes us with His flute. He is the beloved son of Yashoda who steals butter and our hearts.

title: Adi Mudalvane Ganapathiye
lyrics:
Anaittu Vinaigalaiyum Tirppavane
Ettu Disaigalilum Undan Namame
Olittidum Podellam Paramanandame
Vezha Mugattone Gnana Porulone
Naada Brahma Shiva Balagane
Sharanam Sharanam Vinayagane
Sharanam Sai Vinayagane
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the primeval God, the destroyer of all ill-effects. Son of Lord Shiva, You are the symbol of knowledge. It brings us immense joy when Your name resonates in all eight directions. We surrender to You, Lord Sai, who is verily Lord Ganesha and the embodiment of eternal Aum.

title: Adi Nama Sathyanarayana
lyrics:
Bhajore Manasa Sadguru Charanam [ Adi Nama ... ]
Sai Natha Nagendra Shayana
Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
meaning: O mind, chant the primal name of Lord Sathya Narayana, and take refuge at the feet of our divine Preceptor Sai.. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Lord Vishnu who reclines on the serpent (Adi Sesha) and who has an effulgent face like the moon and eyes beautiful as the lotus.

title: Adi Narayana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Jaya Hari Narayana Jaya Jaya
Pandari Vasa Hari Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Sai Narayana
Varada Narayana Veda Narayana [ Jaya Hari ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana, the primordial one. O Lord, You are the resident of Pandari and the Lord of Parthi. Victory to Lord Narayana who confers boons and who is the source of the Vedas.

title: Adi Parashakthi Ma Ananda Roopini
title2: Adi Parashakthi Ma Ananda Roopini Ma
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasini Ma Jagadodharini Ma
Teri Mahima Jo Koi Gave
Janam Janam Ka Dukh Bisrave
Premamayi Sai Ma Sathya Swaroopini Ma [ Parthi Nivasini Ma ... ]
meaning: O Mother Sai, the resident of Parthi, You are the supreme power and the embodiment of Bliss who sustains the universe. Those who sing Your glory would be free from miseries accumulated from multiple lives. You are suffused with Love and is verily the supreme Truth.

title: Adi Poojita Gajanana
lyrics:
Mangala Kari Maha Ganadhipa [ Adi Poojita ... ]
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambho Kumara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
meaning: O the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, You are worshipped as the foremost deity. You are the bestower of auspiciousness and the leader of the Ganaas (group of demigods). Victory to Thee, the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi (also known as Bhavani and Ambika).

title: Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
lyrics:
Gowrivara Tanaya Shubhanana [ Adi Poojya ... ]
Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Jaya Jagavandana Tava Charanam
meaning: At the outset, worship Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Gowri who bestows good fortune. He destroys difficulties and grants success. The entire Universe worships His Feet.

title: Adi Shesha Anantha Shayana
lyrics:
Srinivasa Sri Venkatesha
Raghukula Tilaka Raghu Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Sri Ramachandra [ Adi Shesha ]
Yadu Kula Tilaka Yashoda Bala
Radha Pathey Gopala Krishna
Pannaga Bhooshana Gowri Manohara
Uma Pathey Shiva Shambho Shankara
meaning: Adore the Lord Srinivasa also known as Venkatesha, who reclines on the seven headed serpent. Sing the glory of Ramachandra, the supreme of Raghu dynasty who is worshipped by his consort Sita. Chant the name of Krishna, the son of mother Yashoda and the supreme of Yadu dynasty who fostered the cowherds and who is worshipped by His consort Radha. Worship Lord Shiva bestower of auspiciousness, one who wears a serpent as His ornament and who is adored by his consort Parvathi.

title: Aganita Guna Abharana Vibhushani
lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Devi Namo
Sakala Charachara Srishti Samrakshini
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmata Namo
meaning: O Supreme Goddess Shakthi (Parvathi), salutations to Thee, who has immeasurable good qualities as Your ornaments and who protects and sustains both animate and inanimate things of this creation. O Goddess of the universe, salutations to Thee.

title: Agarva Sarva Mangala
title2: Agarva Sarva Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Kishora Chandrashekara Om Namah Shivaya
Bhujanga Raja Shobhita Om Namah Shivaya
Mrudanga Tunga Mangala Om Namah Shivaya
Dharadharendra Vanditha Om Namah Shivaya
Prachanda Tandava Shiva Om Namah Shivaya

Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghantarava Om Namah Shivaya
Dama Dama Dama Damarudhara Om Namah Shivaya
Dhim Dhim Dhimi Natana Shiva Om Namah Shivaya

Om Namah Shivaya (4)
meaning: O Lord Shiva, salutations to Thee. You are the embodiment of primordial sound Om, the one who exhibits humility and bestows auspiciousness. You adorn the crescent moon and the mighty serpent, dancing to the rhythm of drums during creation. All Gods and eminent people worship You, O Lord Shiva. May the bells and drums resonate "Om Namah Shivaya" while You perform the Cosmic Dance.

title: Ageless One
lyrics:
Sacred Spirit,
We praise Your name
For all to hear it.
Free my soul,
Help me see,
Let Your love ...
wash over me.
(Sweet, sweet love, wash over me)
 
By Your love
All souls shall know,
Through Your grace All blessings flow,
As we serve
With heart and mind,
Thy will be done
On earth this time.
 
[ Ageless One ... wash over me ]

Thy will be done .. on earth this time. (4x)
(Sweet, sweet Lord)

title: Agra Poojya Deva Bala Ganesha
lyrics:
Parvathi Priya Sutha Vighna Vinasha
Jaya Jaya Vishwa Vidhayaka Jaya Hey
Mangala Dayiney Jaya Gananatha Hey
Jaya Gurudev Jaya Parthi Pureesha [ Parvathi Priya Sutha ... ]
meaning: Foremost prayers to the young Lord Ganesha, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi and the one removes all the obstacles. Victory to the Lord of the Ganas who sustains the Universe and bestows auspiciousness. Victory to the Divine Preceptor Sai, the Lord of Parthi who is verily Lord Ganesha.

title: Aha Raha Tava Aahvaana
lyrics:
Sunisitha Udaara Vaani
Hindu Bauddha Sikha, Jaina Paarasika, Musalmaana Kiristaani
Purab Pashchim Vaasi, Tava Simhaasana Paasi
Prema Vahini
meaning: Day and night Your voice goes out from land to land calling the Hindus, Buddhists, Sikhs, Jains, Parsees, Muslims and Christians round Thy throne. The East and the West join hands in their prayers to Thee, and the garland of Love is woven. Glory to Thee the eternal stream of Love.

title: Aho Madhura Aho Madhura Atmaka
title2: Aho Madhura Aho Madhura Atmaka Lingam
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shuddha Sphatika Jyothirmaya Mangala Lingam
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Atmaka Lingam
Tat Pranamami Sada Sayeeshwara Lingam
meaning: We bow to that immortal Linga (symbol of Lord Shiva) created from the Naval of Lord Sai during the festival of Shivarathri, which is the symbol of light and purity and the embodiment of truth, auspiciousness and beauty.

title: Ai no Guru Sai
lyrics:
Satori Motomeru Kokoro ni Hikari wo
Michibiku Ai no Kami
Sono Amasa Utsukushisa
Sono Kagayaki Subete
Warera wo Michibiku Tame Ni
Ataeru Guru Sai
meaning: Divine Preceptor Sai, God of Love, I wish for You to light our hearts and guide us with Your sweetness and beauty that shines brightly on all.

title: Ai no Hikari de Haato
title2: Ai no Hikari de Haato Mitasu, Kaliyuga Avatara
lyrics:
Subete no Michi wo, Terasu Kami yo
Utsukushiki Sai, Amai Hohoemi wa
Sayeesha Sharanam, Sayeesha Sharanam, Sayeesha Sharanam Ai he
Sayeesha Sharanam, Sayeesha Sharanam, Utsukushiki Kami yo
meaning: With the light of love, You fill our hearts to the brim, O Lord Sai, the Incarnation of this Kali age. You shine Your light upon every path and guide us. O beautiful Sai, Your smile is sweet. We surrender to You Lord Sai, let us journey towards love. We surrender to You Lord Sai, You are our beautiful Lord.

title: Ai no Hikari de Sekai
title2: Ai no Hikari de Sekai wo Terasu Kami
lyrics:
Anata wa Sai Bhagawan, Baba Warera no Sai Bhagawan
We Love You, We Love You, We Love You Sai Ram
Aishiau Yorokobi ga Sekai wo Mitasu
Itsuma demo, Itsuma demo, Kagayaku Hikari
meaning: O Lord Sai, You shine the light of love upon the entire world. You are our beloved Baba. We love You Sai Ram. The joy of loving one another gratifies us. You are always shining Your light brilliantly.

title: Ai no Kami Sai Baba,
title2: Ai no Kami Sai Baba, Haha Naru Sri Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Jiai no Sai Baba, Yasashii Sathya Sai [ Ai no Kami ... ]
Anata no Miashi Inorimasu
Minna ga Hitotsu ni Narimasu you ni
Jiai no Sai Baba, Yasashii Sathya Sai
meaning: Mother Sai, You are the God of Love. You exude kindness and affection. We pray at Your divine lotus feet, so that we may become one with You.

title: Ai no Kami Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Uchi Naru Kami Narayana
Subete wa Sai Narayana
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sathya Sai Narayana

Narayana Hari Narayana (4)
meaning: O Sai Narayana, God of Love, You live within me and make up everything in the universe.

title: Ai no Kami Sathya Sai
title2: Ai no Kami Sathya Sai Shirdi Sai Prem Sai
lyrics:
Ai no Kami Sathya Baba Shirdi Baba Prem Baba
Waga Inochi Buddha Sai
Waga Inochi Mahavira Sai
Yeshu (Allah) Sai, Subete no Kami yo
Ai no Kizuna de, Musubi Tamae
Waga Inochi Nanak Sai
Waga Inochi Sathya Sai
meaning: God of Love and God of All, Sathya Sai, Shirdi Sai, Prem Sai, Jesus, Allah, Guru Nanak, Mahavir; All names are connected by love, Sai, You are my life.

title: Ai no Kami yo
lyrics:
Sai Idai Naru Haha yo
O Michibiki tamae
Kie Suru Mono wo Mamorita mou
Shikou no Kami yo
Eien no Inochi he 
O Michibiki tamae
Puttaparthi ni Owasu
O Ai no Kami Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Ai no Kami yo
 Mayoeru Mono ni
 Ai no Te wo Noberu Tomo
 Nozomi Ushinai Aegu Hito womo
 Jiai no Umi no youni
 Okina Ai de Tsutsumu
 Anata wa Saiai no Tomo
 Puttaparthi ni Owasu Kami
 Ai no Te wo Noberu Tomo
meaning: Mother Sai, You are our magnificent and supremely blissful God of Love. You guide and protect us as we journey towards Your eternal life in Puttaparthi.

title: Ai no Kokoro de Kami
title2: Ai no Kokoro de Kami no Uta o
lyrics:
Kami no Mina wa Inochi no Izumi
Ai o Motte Kokoro o Zukushi
Uyamau Koto wa Kami e no Michi
Ai no Kokoro de Kami no Uta o
Inori o Motte Ikiteyu Kou
Kami no Misugata Kokoro ni Ukabe
Watashi no Kami yo Ai no Kami yo
Ai ni Yori Michibiki Tamae
Kami no Ai wa Sekai no Subete
meaning: Let us sing the song of the Lord with our hearts filled with love. The beautiful name of the Lord is the fountain of our lives. Always live with love in your heart. Respecting all things is the way of God. Always live in prayer and keep the Lord's beautiful form in mind. You are our Lord, the God of Love. Please guide us with Your love, for the love of the Lord is everything there is in this world.

title: Ai no Omoi wo Mune
title2: Ai no Omoi wo Mune ni
lyrics:
Ai no Kotoba wo Katari
Ai no Michi wo Tadorou
Sonshin Sathya Sai Baba he

Kami no Mina wo Tonae
Kami no Shukufuku wo Dakishimete
Kami no Michi wo Tadorou
Sonshin Sathya Sai Baba he
meaning: The thoughts of love fill my chest (heart). I speak only the words of love. Let us follow the path of love to our Reverent Sai Baba. Chant the beautiful name of God. Embrace the blessings of our Lord. Let us follow the path of God to our Reverent Sai Baba.

title: Ai no Uta wo Utaou
title2: Ai no Uta wo Utaou (Minna de)
lyrics:
Kami no Ai, Sai no Ai [ Ai no ... ]
Yasashiku Hohoemu Haha no Ai
Kibishiku Mitsumeru Chichi no Ai
Subete wo Michibiku Sai Baba no Ai
meaning: Everyone, sing the song of love for our beloved Sai. O Lord Sai, You embody the kind smile of a mother's love and the strict, disciplined gaze of a father's love. You guide everything with Your love.

title: Ai no Uta, Kami no
title2: Ai no Uta, Kami no Uta
lyrics:
Michi Afureru Kono Sora ni 
Anata no Ai ni Fureta Toki, Watashi no Omoi wa Hitotsu
Taemanaku, Tada Taemanaku, Inori no Naka ni Ikiru
Sathya Sai Baba, Anata no Kaze ni Nari
Sathya Sai Baba, Anata no Uta to Naru
meaning: The songs of God and Love, fill the entire sky to the brim. Your love touches all of time, You are the only object of my thoughts. Without pause, You dwell within our prayers. Sathya Sai Baba, I live within Your wind that blows everywhere. Sathya Sai Baba, I will become one with Your song.

title: Ai Suru Haha yo Kamisama
lyrics:
O Sai Baba [ Ai Suru Haha yo ]
Kono Yo ni Umarete Anata to Tomo ni, Ai no Hikari wo Subete no Hito ni
Rama, Rama, Jaya Sita Rama, Douka Kami yo Atae Tamae
Jai Jai Ram, Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram, Jai Jai Ram, Jai Jai Haha Naru Kami yo
Shinri Seigi wo Uchi Naru Heian wo
O Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai Rama, You bless me with Your motherly love. You are the truth, righteousness, and tranquility within us. We are born with You, with Your divine light within us.

title: Ai wa Kami, Kami wa
title2: Ai wa Kami, Kami wa Ai
lyrics:
Sai wa Ibuki, Kami wa Ai [ Ai wa ... ]
Namu Amida, Iesu Sai
Amaterasu, Kannon Sai
Ikanaru Mina wo Tonaete mo, Kami wa Ai
meaning: Love is God, God is Love. Sai, the God of Love, is our very breath. Hail to Lord Jesus. O Lord Sai, You are Amaterasu (Japanese Sun God) and Kannon (the Bodhisattva). At every moment, I recite Your beautiful name for You are the embodiment of Love.

title: Ai wo Motomeru Kokoro, Subete
title2: Ai wo Motomeru Kokoro, Subete Aru ga mamani
lyrics:
Sai no Miashi ni Sasage, Kami no Goishi no mamani
Utsukushii Mono wa, Ai wo Shiru Kokoro
Toutoki Mono wa Anata he no Inori
Jai Jai Ram, Jai Jai Ram, Jai Jai Ram Ram Sai, Ai no Hikari no Moto he
meaning: This heart seeks the love that is present wherever you go. Devote yourself to the divine feet of Lord Sai. God's divine will is present wherever you go. A heart that knows love is a beautiful thing. We present our noble actions in prayer to reach You. Victory to Lord Rama and Lord Sai, we journey towards You, to the origin of the light of love.

title: Ajanu Bahum Aravinda Netram
lyrics:
Atmabhi Ramam Manasa Smarami
Prabhu Sai Ramam Manasa Smarami
Bhooloka Vaikunta Parthi Nivasam
Prabhu Sai Ramam Manasa Smarami (2)
alt_lyrics:
Ajanu Bahum Aravinda Netram
Atmabhi Ramam Manasa Smarami (2)
Bhooloka Vaikunta Parthi Nivasam
Prabhu Sai Ramam Manasa Smarami (3)
meaning: Meditate on the form of Lord Rama, whose abode is the heart of devotees, whose arms extend upto His knees and whose eyes are like the blooming lotus. Meditate on Lord Sai Rama, the Dweller of Parthi, which is verily the Heaven on Earth.

title: Akhanda Jyothi Jalao Sai
title2: Akhanda Jyothi Jalao Sai Man Mandir Mey
lyrics:
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao
Koti Surya Sama Teja Swaroopa
Sai Tum Ho Divya Swaroopa
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao (2)
Divya Jyothi Gnana Jyothi Prema Jyothi Jalao
Akhanda Jyothi Jalao
meaning: O Lord Sai! Illumine the temple of my mind so that the flame of knowledge may glow continuously. O Sai, the one with the effulgence of ten million suns, kindle the infinite flame of divinity, wisdom and Divine Love in my mind.

title: Akhila Jagat Ke Daata Sai
lyrics:
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan
Darshan Do Bhagawan (Sai)
Kalimala Bhanjana Parama Dayaghana
Karuna Nidhey Shirdi Vasa (Parthi Vasa)
Deena Janavana Parthi Mahesha
Shirdi Nivasi Bhagawan [ Darshan Do ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, the dweller of Shirdi, grace us with Your divine presence. You are the supreme reserve of compassion and kindness. Annihilate our acquired impurities. O Lord of Parthi, You are the refuge of the forlorn.

title: Akhila Loka Nayaki Devi
title2: Akhila Loka Nayaki Devi Tripura Sundari
lyrics:
Ananda Dayini Devi Jagadeeshwari
Adi Mahakaali Lakshmi Mahadevi Roopini [ Ananda Dayini ... ]
meaning: Oh goddess, You are beauty personified, head of all the worlds and the universe. You are the bestower of bliss and adored as Kaali, Lakshmi and Parvathi.

title: Akhilanda Koti Brahmanda Sai
lyrics:
Anandadayi Sai Ram
Parameshwara Partheeshwara
Praneshwara Sayeeshwara
Karunakara Karunamaya
Prashanthi Sai Sundara
meaning: Lord Sai created the entire cosmos. He grants bliss to all. He is the supreme Lord of Puttaparthi. He is the Lord of our breath. He is the embodiment of compassion. This beautiful Lord resides in Prasanthi Nilayam.

title: Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Avatara Sai
lyrics:
Avatara Sai Antaranga Sai [ Akhilanda Koti ... ]
Aganita Guna Sheela Ananda Sai
Adi Shesha Sai Veda Saara Sai
Avatara Sai Paramatma Sai
Atma Linga Sai Antaranga Sai
meaning: O Sai, the supreme leader of all gods and the worlds; who descended on earth and who is the indweller of hearts; who is the reserve of immeasurable good qualities and bliss personified. You are the one who reclines on the Adi Sesha (multi-headed serpent), You are the essence of the Vedas and who has incarnated for the sake of His devotees.

title: Al mirarte a los ojos
title2: Al Mirarte A Los Ojos Sai Baba, Despertaste Todo Mi Amor
lyrics:
Amor, Amor, Amor, Sai, Que Estaba Dentro En Mi Ser
Al Mirarte A Los Ojos Sai Baba, Despertaste Todo Mi Amor
Amor, Amor, Amor, Amor, Sai, Es Lo Que Ahora Soy Por Ti
meaning: When I looked into Your eyes, Sai Baba, all the love within me blossomed. That love is now what I am because of You.

title: Alakh Niranjan Sai Sundara
lyrics:
Madhava Giridhari Mohana [ Alakh Niranjan ... ]
Sripathi Sri Hari Dayamaya Hari
Sri Ranganath Hari Keshava
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are beauty personified having captivating look, unstained from the world and attribute-less. You are verily Lord Narayana with Mother Lakshmi as consort who resides in Your heart. You are verily Lord Krishna who lifted the Govardhana mountain on Your finger tip. You are the most compassionate one who removes the miseries of Your devotees. You are the resident of Srirangam and the destroyer of demon Keshi.

title: Alakh Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
title2: Alakh Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Narayan Narayan
lyrics: Narayan Narayan Narayan Sriman Narayan (2)
meaning: O Lord Narayana, the one who is free of all blemishes and the remover of fear and ignorance in this world, we chant Your Holy Name.

title: Alakh Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
title2: Alakh Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Nithya Niranjana Bhola
lyrics:
Bholarey Bhola Bholarey Bhola Jai Shiva Shankara Bhola [ Alakh Niranjana ... ]
Bholey Baba Bhola Bandari
Parthi Baba Bhola Bandari
Bhola Bandari Bhola Bandari Bhola Bandari Bhola [ Bholarey Bhola ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva, the imperceptible and flawless one who destroys our attachment to worldly things, breaking the root cause of sorrows. Victory to the one who is easily pleased, Lord Shiva, the auspicious one who is eternally peaceful. Chant the name of the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai Baba, the most profound and yet the simplest of Beings and who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Alakha Niranjana Narayana
lyrics:
Sab Dukha Bhanjana Narayana
Meera Ke Prabhu Narayana
Radha Vallabha Narayana (2)
Patitha Pavana Narayana [ Sab Dukha ... ]
Narayana Hari Narayana (3)
meaning: Lord Narayana is pure and without attachments. Lord Sai Narayana who is Meera's Lord and Radha's favorite, removes all sorrows, saves the pure and the destitute.

title: All I ask of You
title2: All I ask of You is forever to remember Me--as loving You
lyrics: Ishk Allah Mahbud Illah (2)

title: All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds
title2: All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds
lyrics:
Swami Sathya Sai, our Lord
You protect devotees who cling to You
Show Your mercy to us who sing to You
Knowing You are God in human form
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

With captivating grace and loveliness
You do everything to bring us happiness
You're aware of all through infinite consciousness
You are master of every living thing
For devotees You're wish-fulfilling
Helping us when we are in distress
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

Mother, Father, Teacher and Lord
You remind us there is only one, not two
Swami, there is truly no one else but You
Master of creation, You are adored
People of all nations are striving toward
Realization of our true reward
Our unity with You, Lord of the Worlds

You are the Word of God, pure and bright
The embodiment of all true and right
Sathya Sai, fill our hearts with pure delight
Do accept our prayer and heed us
From darkness we can't bear please lead us
With Your might You make our burdens light
All praise to You, Lord of the Worlds

Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
All praise to our Teacher Divine

title: All that I am
title2: All that I am, I’m only through Your grace
lyrics:
All that I am, I’m only through Your love
You showed me Your grace in so many ways
You showed me Your love through all of my days
You softened my heart that I now clearly see
My love, my beloved
You’re all for me

title: Allah Allah Karo Pukar
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Yesu Pitha Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Mahavir Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Zohrashtra Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Sarva Dharma Ki Jai Jai Kaar
alt_lyrics:
Allah Allah Karo Pukar
Sarva Dharma Ki Jai Jai Kaar [ Allah Allah ... ]
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Rama Krishna Ki Jai Jai Kaar [ Allah Allah ... ]
Yesu Pitha Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Mahavir Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Guru Nanak Ki Jai Jai Kaar
Zohrashtra Ki Jai Jai Kaar
meaning: Victory to Lord Allah, Yesu, Mahavir, Zohrashtra and Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions.

title: Allah Allah my inner light
lyrics:
Allah Allah my inspiring Sight
 Allah O Akbar (3X)
 Allah Allah my inner Self
 Allah Allah my Goal in life
 Allah O Akbar (5X)

title: Allah Allah Sai Baba
lyrics:
Yesu Masiha Sai Baba [ Allah Allah ... ]
Nanak Sri Buddha Sai Baba
Zohrashtra Mahavir Sai Baba
meaning: Chant the divine name of Sai Baba who is also Allah, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahavir.

title: Allah Bhajo Maulah Bhajo
title2: Allah Bhajo Maulah Bhajo Hey Allah Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Ram Bhajo Hey Krishna Bhajo Hey Rama Krishna Bhagawan
Nanak Bhajo Gautam Bhajo Hey Buddha Sai Bhagawan
Yesu Bhajo Zohrashtra Bhajo Hey Mahavir Bhagawan
Sai Bhajo Shirdi Sai Bhajo Hey Shirdi Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Bhajo Sathya Sai Bhajo Hey Sathya Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord - Allah, Rama, Krishna, Guru Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

title: Allah Enbargal Silapergal
lyrics:
Yesu Enbargal Silapergal
Iraivan Enbargal Palapergal
Ellam Sai Baba
Parppadum Nalladaai Irukka Vendum
Ketpadum Nalladaai Ketka Vendum
Seivadum Nalladaai Seiyya Vendum
Solvadum Nalladaai (Sai Naamam) Solla Vendum
Baba Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai, some people call You Allah, others call You Jesus. Many call You God, all forms are Yours. Bless us O Lord, so we see only good, hear only good, do only good, speak only good and always chant Your holy name.

title: Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
lyrics:
Bhajarey Manuva Mohammad (Baba) Naam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]
Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Nanak Bolo Yeshu Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautama Buddha Mahavir Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
Bhajarey Manuva Mohammad (Baba) Naam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]

Yeshu Masiha Tera Sahara
Guru Nanak Ji Ki Bolo Jai Kar
Gautama Buddha Mahavir Naam [ Allah Eshwar ... ]

Allah Bolo Eshwar Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Nanak Bolo Yeshu Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Gautama Buddha Mahavir Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram
meaning: O mind, chant the names of Allah, Eshwar, Guru Nanak, Buddha, Jesus, Mahavira, and Sai. All are one and all are our saviors.

title: Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
lyrics:
Sab Mil Bolo Hari Ka Naam
Ram Rahim Yeshu Sai Naam
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Naam
Ek Omkar Bolo Jai Sathya Naam
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Nanak Naam
meaning: Let us all sing the name of the Lord who is our Preceptor, Sathya Sai, who has many names: Allah, Hari, Buddha, Zoroaster, Yeshu (Jesus), Mahavir, and Nanak.

title: Allah Eshwar Terey Naam
title2: Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Karuna Sindhu Sai Ram
lyrics:
Mahavir Tum Buddha Zohrashtra
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Nanak Shyam
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
meaning: Oh Sai, you are full of kindness and we adore you as Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Nanak and Shyam (Krishna).

title: Allah Eshwar Tu
lyrics:
Yesu Buddha Prabhu Tu
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tu
Sai Rama Tu Sai Krishna Tu
Sarva Dharma (Sathya Sai) Prabhu Tu
Sathya Sai Prabhu Tu
Treta Yug Mey Rama Prabhu Tu
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Prabhu Tu
Kali Yug Mey Sai Prabhu Tu [ Sarva Dhama ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Tum Ho
Yesu Buddha Prabhu Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Mahavir Tum Ho
Sai Rama Ho Sai Krishna Ho
Sarva Dharma Prabhu Tum Ho
Sri Sathya Sai Prabhu Tum Ho
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Rama, Krishna. In the Treta Age, You incarnated as Lord Rama; in the Dwapara Age as Lord Krishna and in the Kali Age as Lord Sathya Sai who fosters the unity of all religions.

title: Allah Hi Rehman Maulah Hi
title2: Allah Hi Rehman Maulah Hi Reham Hai
lyrics:
Bismillah Ya Allah Maulah Hi Reham Hai [ Allah Hi ... ]
Allah Hi Rehman Maulah Hi Reham Hai
(Ya) Allah Ya Bismillah Maulah Hi Reham Hai [ Bismillah Ya Allah ... ]
meaning: Allah is merciful and kind. We worship Allah by meditatively singing His name.

title: Allah Ho Akbar
title2: Allah Ho Akbar, Allah Ho Akbar, Allah Ho Akbar
lyrics:
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Allah Ho Akbar, Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Tum Ho
Guru Nanak Bhi Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Mahavir Tum Ho
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Tum Ho
Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho ( Sai )

(only in 2nd speed)
La Ilaha Il Allah, Mohammadur Rasool Allah
meaning: Allah is the Supreme. He is also Jesus Christ, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra and Mahavir. Chant their glorious names.

title: Allah Ho Akbar Sai Ram
title2: Allah Ho Akbar Sai Ram Maulah Ho Akbar Sai Ram
lyrics:
Rama Rama Jai Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam
Ram Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sundara Naam [ Allah Ho ... ]
Bolo Mahavir Naam Yesu Prabhu Ka Naam
Gurbani Ki Jai Jai Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the divine names Allah, Maulah, Rama, Mahavir and Yesu. Victory unto them and Gurubani (divine verses of Gurugranth scripture of the Sikhs).

title: Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho
title2: Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho Sai
lyrics:
Tum Ho Antaryami (Baba)
Tum Hi Saar Ho Geeta Quran
Tum Ho Sab Ka Jeevan Ka Aadhaar
Daya Karo Merey Baba
Tum Ho Antaryami (Baba)
alt_lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Tum Ho Sai
Tum Ho Antaryami (Baba)
Tum Hi Saar Ho Geeta Quran
Tum Ho Sab Ka Jeevan Sakha
Daya Karo Merey Baba
Tum Ho Antaryami (Baba)
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the most merciful and benevolent Allah, the supreme sovereign. O Baba, You are the indweller of our hearts. You are the quintessence of the Bhagawad Geeta and the Holy Quran. You are the saviour and sustainer of all life. O Lord, please have mercy and compassion for us.

title: Allah Ho Tum
title2: Allah Ho Tum Eshwar Bhi Tum Mahavir Nanak Ram
lyrics:
Partheesha Sai Shankara Tum Hi Ho Merey Pran [ Allah Ho ... ]
Zohrashtra Yesu Buddha Tum Ho Sab Ke Palanhaar
Satchidananda Sai Tera Brindavana Shubh Dham
meaning: O Sai who dwells in the sacred abode of Brindavan, You are Allah, Eshwar, Mahavira, Nanak, Ram. O Sai Shankara of Parthi, You are our very life, our protector and the embodiment of existence, knowledge and bliss.

title: Allah Jehovah Jesus Christ Our Lord
title2: Allah Jehovah Jesus Christ Our Lord
lyrics:
Lord Sai You Are Ever Beside Me
Lord Sai You Are Ever Within Me
All Names Are Yours My Lord, All Forms With You Begin
Formless Or Form We Adore Thee
God Is Love, We Are Love Ever Expanding (4)

title: Allah Kaho Chahey Eshwar Kaho
lyrics:
Buddha Nanak Mahavir Kaho
Yesu Pitha Zohrashtra Kaho
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Kaho
Jis Naam Se Shanthi Miley To
Wohi Naam Baar Baar Kaho
meaning: Chant repeatedly any of the names of Lord - Allah, Buddha, Nanak, Mahavir, Yesu, Zohrashtra, Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai - which confers peace.

title: Allah Mazda Jehovah
title2: Allah, Mazda, Jehovah, What Shall I Call Thee
lyrics:
There Is Just One God, He Is Omnipresent
I Know Truth To Be His Name, And Love Is His Body

title: Allah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
title2: Allah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Maulah Naam Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
lyrics:
Nanak Yesu Mahavir Naam Bhajo
Sri Buddha Deva Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo Shirdi Sai Baba Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
Sri Raghu Rama Bhajo Govinda Krishna Bhajo
Sri Sathya Sai Bhajo Bhajorey Bhajo
meaning: Chant the divine names Allah, Maulah, Nanak, Mahavir, Buddha, Shirdi Sai Baba, Rama, Govinda, Krishna and Sri Sathya Sai.

title: Allah Naam Tero Naam Sai
title2: Allah Naam Tero Naam Sai Naam Ek Hi Naam
lyrics:
Yeshu Nanak Baba Naam
Buddha Mahavira Sai Naam (2)
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Baba Naam
Sai Naam Ek Hi Naam
meaning: Glory to the names of the Almighty - Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavir. All names and forms of God are Lord Sai's who is the very embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Allah Sai Allah Maulah Sai
lyrics:
Maulah Sai Maulah [ Allah Sai ... ]
Tum Hi Ram Rahim O Sai Tum Hi Yesu Mahaan
Tum Hi Krishna Karim O Sai Tum Hi Mera Pran
Tum Hi Mera Pran (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Allah and Maulah. You are Lord Rama, the merciful Lord (Rahim) and the great Lord Jesus Christ. You are Lord Krishna and the benevolent Lord (Karim). O Lord Sai, You are our life force.

title: Allah Sai Bolo
title2: Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
lyrics:
Prem Se Bolo Jo Bhi Naam Bolo [ Allah Sai ... ]
Zohrashtra Mahavir Buddha Naam Bolo
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Roopa Sai Bolo
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai who is verily Allah. Chant with love the name of any God. Chant the name of Lord Zohrashtra, Mahavira and Buddha. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Allah Sai Maulah Sai
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Antaryami
Nanak Sai Prema Sai
Yesu Sai Karuna Sagara
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Allah, the all pervading Divine Teacher, You are Guru Nanak and Jesus, the loving and compassionate one. You are the one fostering all faiths.

title: Allah Tero Naam Sai
title2: Allah Tero Naam Sai Maulah Tero Naam
lyrics:
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim Sai
Parthi Vihara Sai Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai
Deena Dayalu Sai Parama Krupalu Sai
meaning: O compassionate and kind Lord Sai residing in Parthi, You incarnated for the sake of Your devotees, You are none other than Allah, Rama and Krishna.

title: Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
title2: Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
lyrics:
Tum Hi Ho Ram Rahim
Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim
Yesu Tum Ho Nanak Tum Ho
Zohrashtra Bhi Ho Mahavir Tum Ho
Gautama Buddha Karim [ Merey Ram ... ]

Merey Ram Merey Ram Ram Rahim (3)
meaning: Oh Lord! You are Allah, Eshwar, Rama, Rahim, Jesus, Guru Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavir, Gautama Buddha.

title: Allah Yeshu Sai Ram
lyrics:
Buddha Mahavir Sai Ram
Treta Mey Tum Sai Ram
Dwapar Mey Tum Sai Shyam
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Allah, Yeshu, Buddha and Mahavira. In Treta era, You incarnated as Lord Rama and in Dwapara as Lord Krishna. You are the patron of all religions and the Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Allah Yesu Buddha Deva Andaru Neevey
title2: Allah Yesu Buddha Deva Andaru Neevey
lyrics:
Maulah Sai Mahavira Nanak Neevey
Rama Krishna Shiva Roopa Dhariyu Neevey
Veda Geeta Granthamula Saramu Neevey
Mathamulanni Poojinchu Devuduvu Neevey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Saivu Neevey
Sai Ram Sai Ram 
Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Salutations to You, Lord Sai, You are Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Mahavir and Nanak. We also adore You as Rama, Krishna and Shiva. You are the essence of Veda, Geeta and other Scriptures. You are the One God worshipped by all religions. O Sai, You love and foster all faiths.

title: Allah Yesu Niyanro
lyrics:
Anaittume Sai Un Uruvamanro
Makka Madina Vazh Deivamanro
Nabigal Nayagam Niyallavo
Buddha Mahavir Zohrashtranumai
Yesuvai Avataram Seidavane
Ellaiyilla Karunai Kadalallavo
Nambinarkku Arulbavan Niyallavo
meaning: Lord Sai, You are Allah and Jesus. Everything visible is Your own form. You are the Lord of Mecca and Madina as well as Mohammad Nabi. Incarnated previously as Buddha, Mahavir, Zoroaster and Jesus, You are the boundless ocean of compassion and the Lord who blesses the faithful.

title: Allah, You are Lord
title2: Allah, You are Lord--Eshwara, You are Lord
lyrics:
You are the merciful Ram (2X)
 Jesus, You are Lord --Nanak, You are Lord
 Zoroaster, You are Lord-- Mahavir, You are Lord
 You are the giving Buddha (2X)
 You are Lord, You are Lord, Lord of Many Names (3X)

title: Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
lyrics:
Alleluia Alleluia
Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
Alleluia Alleluia
 
Alleluia 
Alleluia 
Alleluia 
Alleluia Alleluia 
 
Lord we are one, we are one, we are One
Sai we are one, we are all one
Lord we are one, we are one, we are One
Sai we are one, we are one with You
alt_lyrics:
Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
Alleluia Alleluia
Alleluia Allelu Alleluia
Alleluia Alleluia

Alleluia 
Alleluia 
Alleluia 
Alleluia Alleluia

O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba, O Bhagawan Sathya Sai
O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba, O Bhagawan Sathya Sai
Sai Baba, Sai Baba
O Bhagawan Sathya Sai

title: Almighty Father with thousands of names
title2: Almighty Father with thousands of names
lyrics:
Almighty Father with thousands of forms
 Why differ over names
 Why differ over forms
 We are all one and the same
 You are embodiments Love divine
 We are birds, God is wing
 We can fly when we are one
 We are all one and the same

title: Almighty God, Make Me Aware
title2: Almighty God, make me aware of You
lyrics:
In every moment of my life.
Let me know that I am You.
 
Almighty God, show me the light of You
In every moment of my life.
Let me know that I am light.
 
Almighty God, fill me with love of You
In every moment of my life.
Let me know that I am love.

title: Alokya Sri Bala Krishnam
lyrics:
Ananda Sundara Tandava Krishnam
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Krishnam
Nanda Sunandadi Vanditha Krishnam
meaning: Oh Bala Krishna! you are unworldly and while dancing on the Kalinga serpent, you look beautiful and blissful, presenting the cloud like complexion adored by Nanda and Sunanda.

title: Although I don’t see You, You are there
title2: Although I don't see You, You are there
lyrics:
Although I can't touch You, You are there
 Although I don't know You are Love
 Although I don't understand You,
 You are wisdom in my heart
 Thank You, Lord for letting me believe in You
 Thank You, Lord, I know wherever I am You are,
 wherever I am You are.

title: Always Be Happy
lyrics:
Life is a miracle in the human race
Joys and sorrows in life will come
Treat them like passing clouds and say the Lord’s name
Love all, serve all, Sai Baba says
Giving love and kindness is the way of life
Open up your heart, Sai Baba says
Rainbow and sunshine will come into your life (2x)

title: Amai, Amai, Kizuna wo Shiru
lyrics:
Shizuka Naru, Ai ni Heian wo Inoru
Hoho wo Tsutau Kaze ni mo Anata wo Kanjiru
Sai Baba, Sai Baba
Kami no Ai, Sai no Ai, Tada Hitotsu no Ai
meaning: How sweet and joyful it is to know our bond with our Lord. In silence and love, we pray for tranquility. O Lord Sai, we follow Your beautiful smile, feeling Your love inside of us. Your love spreads to everything making everything one.

title: Amaterasu Omikami Ai no Kami
lyrics:
Kono Yo wo Terasu Haha
Chiisana Inochi wo Mamori
Subete no Kodomo wo Tsutsumu
Sono Kiyoki Hikari no Kami Ai no Kami
meaning: O Goddess Amaterasu (Japanese Goddess of the Sun), You are the God of Love who shines light upon this world and on all of its children in order to protect us.

title: Amazing Grace
title2: Amazing Grace, how sweet the sound
lyrics:
That saved a wretch like me
 I once was lost, but now I am found
 Was blind, but now I see
 Through many trials, toils and snares
 I have already come
 His Grace has brought me safe so far
 And Grace will lead me on
 Twas Grace that taught my heart to fear
 And Grace my fears relieved
 How precious did that Grace appear
 The hour I first believed
 When we've been there ten thousand years
 Bright shining as the sun
 We've no less days to sing God's praise
 Than when we first begun.

title: Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (4)
lyrics:
Sri Chakra Vasini Ananda Dayini
Gnana Pradayini Jyothi Swaroopini
Omkara Roopini Sri Sai Roopini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani
meaning: O Universal Mother Bhavani (Parvathi), You are the Mother of the world, the resident of Sri Chakra (divine symbol), the bestower of bliss and knowledge and the most effulgent one. You are the embodiment of Omkara (primordial sound) who has taken the Form of Lord Sai.

title: Amba Bhavani Sayeeshwari
lyrics:
Durga Bhavani Jagadeeshwari [ Amba Bhavani ... ]
Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
Partheeshwari Amba Parameshwari
meaning: Chant the names of Mother Parvathi, Amba, Durga, Maheshwari and Lord Sai, who is Supreme Mother of Universe.

title: Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
lyrics:
Sri Gananatha Shanthakara
Purana Purusha Sathya Sai Natha
Pranava Swaroopa Partheesha
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, beloved son of Shiva and Mother Parvathi, You are the embodiment of peace. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the one adored in ancient Holy scriptures and You are the very form of the primordial sound Om.

title: Amba Bhavani Tribhuvana Mohini
lyrics:
Ananda Roopini Jagat Janani
Sadananda Roopini Sai Janani
Adi Parashakthi Abhaya Pradayini
Bhairavi Shankari Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Durga Chandi Duritha Nivarini
Mata Maheshwari Gowri Shivani
meaning: Sing the glory of Mother Parvathi, the most enchanting one in all three worlds. She is the Mother of the Universe, the very embodiment of eternal Bliss. She is the Supreme Power who bestows protection, grants freedom from the fear of birth and death and relieves us from all afflictions. The Supreme Mother who is known by many names such as Bhairavi, Shankari, Durga, Chandi, Gowri and Shivani is none other than Mother Sai.

title: Amba Manda Haasa Vadani
title2: Amba Manda Haasa Vadani Manohari Sai Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Mata Mata Mata Jagat Janani [ Amba Manda ... ]
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Sai Jaganmata
Sathya Sai Jaganmata
meaning: Worship the auspicious Mother of the Universe, Mother Sai who has an enchanting face with a charming smile.

title: Amba Parameshwari Akhilandeshwari
lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Palaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Ananda Roopini Palaya Maam
meaning: O Divine Mother of the Universe (Bhuvaneshwari, Raja Rajeshwari) and the Consort of Lord Shiva, the all-powerful one, You are bliss personified, we pray to You to protect us.

title: Amba Sahita Samba Sadashiva
lyrics:
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva Shambho
Parvathi Ramana Sadashiva [ Hara Hara ]
meaning: We Pray to Shiva, who is accompanied by Mother Parvathi. We chant the names of Mahadeva, the divine consort of Parvathi.

title: Amba Shankari Parameshwari Shashi Shekari
title2: Amba Shankari Parameshwari Shashi Shekari Amba
lyrics:
Sarveshwari Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Amba
Sundari Guna Manjari Shiva Shankari Amba
Kadambari Shwetambari Hari Sodari Amba
meaning: Glory to Mother Shankari (Parvathi), the consort of Shiva who is adorned with the beautiful Crescent Moon. O Mother, You are the Goddess who is the Protector of the Universe, the most beautiful one with abundant good qualities. You are the sibling of Lord Hari. We offer our salutations to You.

title: Amba Vandanam Eshwaramba Vandanam
lyrics:
Janani Vandanam Jagat Janani Vandanam (2)
Sai Vandanam Sai Mata Vandanam
Mata Vandanam Eshwaramba Nandanam
meaning: O Universal Mother Sai, we bow to You and we bow to Mother Eshwaramba who was blessed to be Your physical mother during Your advent on earth.

title: Ambe Bhavani Anand Ma
lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Sai Ma [ Ambe Bhavani ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Parthi Ma
Atmanandamayi Sai Ma
meaning: Mother Sai, the primal energy is our refuge. She is eternal bliss and the indeweller.

title: Ambe Bhavani Ma Jai Jai
title2: Ambe Bhavani Ma Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Ambe Bhavani [ Ambe Bhavani ... ]
Ambe Bhavani Teri Jyothi Jalavun
Jyothi Jalavun Teri Arathi Utarun
Ambe Bhavani Jai Jai (Jagadambe) Bhavani [ Raksha Karo ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Bhavani (Parvathi), please protect us from all miseries. We light the lamp and perform the Arathi. O Mother, illumine our hearts.

title: Ambe Gowri Ma
title2: Ambe Gowri Ma Jagadambe Gowri Ma
lyrics:
Ambe Jagadambe Jaya Ambe Gowri Ma
Mahalakshmi Mata Meri Ambe Gowri Ma
Daya Nidhey Dukha Harnevali Ambe Gowri Ma
Bholi Bhaali Mata Meri Ambe Gowri Ma [ Ambe Jagadambe ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother of the Universe. You are Mother Lakshmi, the compassionate one and the remover of worldly miseries and who is innocence personified.

title: Ambe Jagadambe Kali
lyrics:
Bhaava Priyey Raga Priyey
Gaana Priyey Bhaava Priyey
Gaana Priyey Bhaava Priyey Amba Bhavani [ Ambe Jagadambe ... ]
Mahalakshmi Ambe Gowri Mahalakshmi Ambe 
Mahishasura Mardini Bhavani Mahalakshmi Ambe
Jai Ambe Sri Ambe Amba Bhavani

Sheravali Ambe Maiya Jyotavali Ambe Maiya
meaning: Victory to the Mother of the universe, Mother Kali, who enjoys music that is rendered with deep yearning and devotion. She is Goddess Mahalakshmi and the destroyer of demon Mahishasura. She is the effulgent one riding on a lion.

title: Ambe Janani Abhirami
lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Shivakami [ Ambe Janani ]
Sambhavi Shankari Sarveshwari
Shantha Swaroopini Shivaranjani
Sathya Swaroopini Sai Mata
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Mata
meaning: Oh pleasing divine mother, the consort of Shiva known also as Abhirami Sambhavi, Shankari the one who grants fearlessness and is omnipresent. We chant your glorious names. You are Sai Mata the embodiment of truth and peace who grants us with eternal peace.

title: Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka
Tribhuvana Palaka Mangala Dayaka
Vidya Buddhi Siddhi Pradayaka
Paahi Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
alt_lyrics:
Ambika Tanaya Vinayaka
Gajavadana Gananatha Vinayaka
(Sathya) Sai Ganesha Vinayaka
Tribhuvana Palaka Mangala Dayaka
Vidya Buddhi Siddhi Pradayaka
(Sathya) Sai Ganesha Vinayaka
meaning: O loving son of Mother Parvathi, the elephant-headed Lord Ganesha, kindly protect us. You are the sustainer of the three worlds, the one who confers auspiciousness, knowledge, wisdom and success.

title: Amen Amen
lyrics:
Swami hear Your childrens' prayers once again 
We’ll be honest, we’ll be fair, Lord we'll love You anywhere
This is Your childrens’ prayer Amen

title: Amrutha Sai Naama Akhanda Sai
title2: Amrutha Sai Naama Akhanda Sai Prema
lyrics:
Aganita Guna Dhama Anantha Sai Prema
Sathya Sai Rama Sarva Samana Prema 
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu Ram Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: The name of Sri Sathya Sai is verily an infinite stream of love in the form of nectar. His glories are endless. His Love is universal. Praise be to Lord Sai Rama.

title: Amruthamaya Vichara
lyrics:
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara [ Amruthamaya ... ]
Sri Rama Charitha Katha Saara (2)
meaning: Oh Mind! Dwell on the nectarine experience of Story of Sri Rama.

title: Ana el na refa nala
lyrics:
Ana el na refa nala.
 From deep within the home of my soul
 Now let the healing, let the healing begin.
 Ana el na refa nala,
 Ana el na refa nala.
 Heal our bodies, open our hearts,
 Awaken our minds, (El) Schechina

title: Anai Mugane Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Adi Mudalvane Sri Ganesha
Arul Ni Purivai Sri Ganesha
Arivai Koduppai Sri Ganesha
Bhaktharai Kappai Sri Ganesha
Padam Panindom Sri Ganesha

Padam Panindom Sri Ganesha (3)
meaning: O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the source of all sources, bless us and enlighten our intellect. Protect us devotees; We surrender at Your feet.

title: Anand Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
title2: Anand Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai Prem Se Bolo Jai Baba Jai
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Jai Amba Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Mahalakshmi Ki Jai [ Ananda Se ... ]
Jai Jai Jai Shirdi Ki Jai
Jai Jai Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai
meaning: Chant "Victory to Lord Sai" blissfully and suffused in Love. Victory be to Mother Mahalakshmi, to Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

title: Ananda is the ocean
title2: Ananda is the ocean, Ananda is the ocean
lyrics:
Ananda, You are one with me
 Once a tiny stream but now a mighty sea
 O Bliss, I am one with Thee
 Shanthi is the ocean..O Peace, I am one with Thee
 Prema is the ocean..O Love, I am one with Thee
 Sathya is the ocean..O Truth, I am one with Thee
 Sai Baba is the ocean..O Baba, I am one with Thee

title: Ananda Mangala Arathi Gao
lyrics:
Veena Venu Mrudanga Bajao [ Ananda Mangala ... ]
Madhava Madhava Hari Narayana
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Jai Bolo
Madhura Madhura Sangeeta Sunao
meaning: Sing the blissful and auspicious Arathi of Lord Sathya Sai to the accompaniment of musical instruments such as Veena, Flute and Mrudunga set in tune to sweet melodious music. Victory to Lord Sai is verily Lord Madhava (Krishna) and Lord Narayana.

title: Ananda Nandana Hey Bhaktha Chandana
lyrics:
Hey Yadu Nandana Krishna Krishna
Devaki Nandana Gokula Balana
Natavara Mohana Krishna Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Krishna
meaning: Hey Krishna, Sai Krishna, You are bliss personified and the beloved of devotees, the star of Yadu dynasty, son of Devaki, the one who was brought up in Gokula and the elegant dancer who is captivating.

title: Ananda Ram Ananda Shyam
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Prema Swaroopa Brahmananda
Satchidananda Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Narayana Sai ... ]
meaning: O blissful Lord Ram and Shyam (Krishna), we chant Your name Narayana, Hari and Sai. O Lord, You are the embodiment of Divine Love, truth, awareness and bliss.

title: Ananda Rama Ayodhya Rama
lyrics:
Karunya Rama Kamaneeya Rama [ Ananda Rama ... ]
Sitabhi Rama Sundara Rama
Saketa Rama Sayeesha Rama
meaning: Lord Rama, You are bliss personified who resides in Ayodhya. You are compassionate and beloved of devotees. You are the adorable consort of Sita. You are the star of Ayodhya, who has taken the form of Lord Sai.

title: Ananda Roopini Sai Narayani
lyrics:
Himagiri Nandini Ma [ Ananda Roopini ... ]
Triloka Palini Mata Tri Dayini
Tri Jagata Vandini Parthi Nivasini
Sai Bhavani Ma
meaning: Glory to Mother Narayani (Parvathi), daughter of the king of Himalayas. She is the protector of the three worlds who is bliss personified and who bestows peace on the three states of existence - body, mind and soul. She is none other than Mother Sai of Parthi who is worshiped by the three worlds.

title: Ananda Sagara Muralidhara
lyrics:
Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam Venu Gopala [ Ananda Sagara ... ]
Nanda Yashoda Ananda Kishora
Jai Jai Gokula Bala Jai Venu (Sai) Gopala
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You are the ocean of bliss and the one who plays captivating music on the flute. You are the Lord of Meera and Radha. Glory to Thee, the blissful son of Nanda and Yashoda. Victory to the Divine child of Gokula who has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Ananda Sagari Dayakari
lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Krupakari
Hey Jagadeeshwari Partheeshwari
Hey Jagadeeshwari Sayeeshwari
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai, the Goddess of the Universe, the primal and supreme force, the one who is an ocean of bliss. She confers mercy and compassion.

title: Ananda Sri Sai Parthi Pureesha
lyrics:
Sadananda Madhava Prashanthi Vasa
Mandara Dhara Govinda Mukunda
Sundara Roopa Sri Satchidananda [ Sadananda Madhava ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, dweller of Prashanthi Nilayam of Parthi, You are eternally blissful, beauty personified. You are embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss. You are Govinda (Krishna), the one who carried the Mandara mountain, who bestows Mukti (liberation) to devotees.

title: Ananda Tandava Rudra Maheshwari
lyrics:
Aartha Samrakshaki Abhinava Sundari
Gnana Vishweshwari Ananda Bhairavi
Anandeshwari Sai Maheshwari
meaning: O Goddess Maheshwari (Parvathi), You are so blissful during the cosmic dance (creation), You are the protector of distressed devotees. You are the blissful and beautiful universal Goddess Bhairavi who bestows knowledge. You are verily Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Anandamaya Bhagawan
lyrics:
O Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan [ Anandamaya Bhagawan ... ]
Hey Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Sai Ram
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran
Lelo Prabhu Mujhey Sharan Lagalo
Mujhey Daya (Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
alt_lyrics:
Anandamaya Bhagawan Hey Premamaya Bhagawan
O Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan [ Anandamaya Bhagawan ... ]
Hey Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Sai Ram
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran
Aao Prabhu Mujhey Sharan Lagalo
Mujhey Daya (Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. Kindly accept us at Your Lotus Feet.

title: Anandamaya Sai
lyrics:
Dayamaya Krupamaya Premamaya [ Anandamaya Sai ... ]
Dinakara Koti Tejonmaya
Deena Vatsala Sai Karunamaya
Shantha Saguna Parabrahmamaya
Sarvamaya Niramaya
Sai Satchidanandamaya
meaning: Sai, You are verily the embodiment of Bliss, Compassion and Love. Your divine effulgence is equivalent to the splendour of crores of sun. You are pleasantly disposed towards the underprivileged, storehouse of eternal Peace, all pervasive divinity. You are Omnipotent, blemishless and the embodiment of Existence, Awareness and Bliss.

title: Anandamey Sai Bhajana
lyrics:
Brahmanandamey Sai Bhajana [ Anandamey ... ]
Chithravathi Teera Chidvilasuni Bhajana
Parthi Lo Velasina Sathya Sai Bhajana [ Anandamey ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Samrakshakuni Bhajana
Sakala Sampadalosagu Sathya Sai Bhajana﻿
meaning: Singing Sai Bhajans grants us supreme bliss. Let us sing the glory of the effulgent Lord Sai who resides at Puttaparthi on the banks of the Chitravati river. Let us sing the glory of the one who is the protector of Truth, Right Conduct, and Peace. Lord Sathya Sai is the protector of all.

title: Anandamey Sai Naamamey
lyrics:
Adbhutamey Sai Geetamey
Akhandamey Jyothirmayamey
Sundaramey Sai Roopamey (Ati)
meaning: Oh Lord Sai! Chanting Your divine name is true bliss and singing Your glory confers ecstasy. Your infinite effulgence is all pervading and Your form is beauty personified.

title: Anantha Premamrutha Sai
lyrics:
Shirdi Ke Sai Parthi Ke Sai Prashanthi Sundara Sai [ Anantha ... ]
Karunakara Jagadeeshwara Hrudayeshwara Sai Partheeshwara
Sharanagatha Thrana Deenavana
(Pari) Poornavatara Sayeeshwara
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is an infinite ocean of nectarine Love and who bestows bliss. He is the beautiful Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. He is the very embodiment of compassion. He is the Lord of the Universe, Lord of Parthi and our hearts. He is the Protector of the downtrodden and all those who surrender to Him. Glory to Lord Sai, the Supreme Lord who incarnated for the sake of His devotees.

title: Anata ga Korare, Subete no
title2: Anata ga Korare, Subete no Haato ga Mezamete Imasu, Kami Naru Ai ni
lyrics:
Haha Naru Ai de Sukui wo Atae
Chichi Naru Ai de Shinri ni Michibiku
Kami Naru Ai de Shifuku wo Sazukeru
Sai Baba yo, Watashi no Kami yo
Otsukai Kudasai, Kono Inochi
Subete no Hito no Sachi no tame
Yakudate Kudasai Sai Baba

[ Haha Naru ... Shifuku wo Sazukeru ]
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, You have come to us to awaken our hearts with Your divine love. With Your Motherly love, You grant us salvation. With Your Fatherly love, You guide us to the truth. With Your Godly love, You present us with supreme bliss. Sai Baba, You are my Lord. Please use my life for Your divine purposes. Your existence is for the purpose of bringing good fortune to all people. Please continue to help us this way, Lord Sai Baba.

title: Anata he Inotteru, Anata wo
title2: Anata he Inotteru, Anata wo Aishiteru
lyrics:
Anata wa Hikari Desu, Anata wa Ai Desu
Sai Baba Sai Baba Hohoemi wo, Sai Baba Sai Baba Arigatou [ Anata he Inotteru ... ]
Anata he Nagareteru, Anata wo Aishiteru
Sai Baba Sai Baba Shukufuku wo, Sai Baba Sai Baba Arigatou
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, we are praying to You, we love You. You are the light, You are love. O Lord Sai, thank You for Your smile. We are flowing towards You, we love You. O Lord Sai Baba, thank You for Your blessings.

title: Anata he no Omoi wo
title2: Anata he no Omoi wo Mune ni
lyrics:
Kami no Misugata wo Kokoro ni Daite
Hitome Aitakute
Watashi wa Koko ni Anata to Tomo ni
Utsukushii Kami Puttaparthi no Sai [ Hitome ... ]
meaning: Hold thoughts of Lord Sai's beautiful form in your heart. Lay your gaze upon His divinity. Beautiful Sai of Puttaparthi, I will stay together with You forever.

title: Anata kara Watashi ni Sosogareru
title2: Anata kara Watashi ni Sosogareru Ai wa
lyrics:
Nani yori mo Amaku, Tsuyoku, Yasashii
Watashi wa Anata no Moto he Aruite Imasu ka
Watashi wa Anata no Moto he Tsuzuite Imasu ka
Hitomi wo Sorasazu, Massugu ni, Massugu ni
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Anata heto Mukaimasu
meaning: Lord Sai, You bless us with Your divine love. You are more sweet, strong, and kind than anything in this world. I am walking towards You. I am continuing my journey towards You. Please keep watching over me, for I shall be with You soon. Sai Ram, I am moving towards You.

title: Anata ni Aeta Yorokobi Kotoba
title2: Anata ni Aeta Yorokobi Kotoba ni Dekinai
lyrics:
Namida ga Afure soshite Kami no Ko to Wakatta
Yashiki Hitomi Kami no Hitomi
Ome ni Kakareta Shiawase Kamishimete Imasu

Jaya Jaya Sai Baba (5)
meaning: When I met You, such joy overcame me that I was unable to speak. Tears welled up in my eyes as I understood that I am a child of God. Your kind eyes exude a happiness that we graciously accept.

title: Anata ni Au Tameni Umareta
lyrics:
Anata wo Shiru Tameni Umareta
Ikuzen Nen no Tsuki Hi wo Kazoe
Anata to Iu Ai wo Shitta
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Idai Naru Haha
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Eikou no Chichi
Baba Kono Mune ni Aru
Hikari Sore wa Anata
meaning: O Lord, I was born for the purpose of meeting You and knowing You. I count the days and nights until I can proclaim that I know You. You are our magnificent mother and our glorious father. You are the light within my chest.

title: Anata ni Michibikare Watashi wa
title2: Anata ni Michibikare Watashi wa Ayumu
lyrics:
Subete wa Kono Hikari Kaeru Ai no Shirube
Tataeyo Sai Gopala, Jaya Gopala, Sai Gopala
Kami no Ai Amaku, Amaku, Watashi wo Mitasu
meaning: O Lord Sai, I walk the path that leads to You. Everything returns to this light through the guidance of love. Sing praise to Sai Gopala., victory to Lord Gopala. God's love is the sweetest thing, and it gratifies me.

title: Anata no Ai ga Watashi
title2: Anata no Ai ga Watashi no Subete
lyrics:
Higoto ni Amaku Yasashiku
Anata no Ai ni Tsutsumareru
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love is my everything. Every day, I feel its sweetness and kindness as it wraps around me.

title: Anata no Ai no Fukasa
title2: Anata no Ai no Fukasa wa
lyrics:
Sai Towa ni Hatenaku
Inochi wo Tsutau Ai no Sai
Watashi Tachi no Ai no Ibuki
Anata no Ai ga Kono Mune ni

We Love You, Dearest Lord (Sai) We Love You

Anata Nashide wa Ikirarenu
Anata no Ai ni Ikite Yuku
Anata no Ai no Umi de
Anata no Hitomi ni Toke
Ai ni Michi Yuku
Kiyorakana Ai no Kizuna
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love is as boundless as Your eternal form. You are the root of the love that is in our hearts. We dedicate our lives to following Your love. Without You, we cannot continue living. Your love, as deep as the oceans, is what gives us our life. This pure love is what binds us together.

title: Anata no Ai wa Sekai
title2: Anata no Ai wa Sekai ni Hirogari
lyrics:
Itsushika Kono Yo wo Terashitsukusu deshou
Hito Toshite Umareta nara Ai (Kami) ni Naremasu youni
Itsu no Hi ka Anata he Mata Modorimasu
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love spreads across the entire world, shining without many even noticing. You were born as a human to spread love through this world and to help us become one with God. Every day we return back to You.

title: Anata no Ai wa Subete
title2: Anata no Ai wa Subete wo Tsutsumu, Kono Yo no Kanashimi Kurushimi Tsutsumu
lyrics:
Hito Mayoi wo Michibikita mo, Anata no Moto e Michibikita mo
Subete wo Atae Subute wo Yurusu, Anata no Yasashisa Kokoro ni Shimiru
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love surrounds everything, even the sadness and pain in this world. You guide us through illusion towards You. You bless us and forgive us at every moment. Your kindness pierces our hearts.

title: Anata no Miashi ni Watashi
title2: Anata no Miashi ni Watashi no Ai wo Sasagemasu
lyrics:
Sai Baba Sai Baba Anata wa Buddha, Kannon, Iesu
O Baba O Baba Anata wa Haha, Anata wa Chichi
Subete no Mono ni Yadoru, Subete no Kami wa Hitotsu (Oh)
meaning: We pray at Your divine feet dear Lord. You are Sai Baba, Buddha, Jesus, and the Kannon Bodhisattva. You are our mother and father. All names are one, and all forms are one as You dwell in everything.

title: Anata no Mina wo Yobu
title2: Anata no Mina wo Yobu Kokoro kara, Kokoro kara
lyrics:
Anata no Misugata ni, Utaimasu, Utaimasu
Ai wo Kono Mune ni, Ai wo Kono Uta ni.
Seinaru Inori no Hikari, Anata ni Toke Yuku
Sai Baba, Sai Baba
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai, I call out Your beautiful name from the bottom of my heart. I sing out to Your beautiful heart. Love fills my heart as it fills this song. The light of this sacred prayer draws me closer to You, Lord Sai Baba.

title: Anata no Sonzai ni Kizuita
title2: Anata no Sonzai ni Kizuita Toki
lyrics:
Mune no Ofukukaku kara Atatakaku Kanjita
Saiteta Chiisana Hana no Naka ni
Anata no Misugata wo Mite
Hiroi Sora no Moto Anata no
Nukumori ni Iyasarete
Swami Douka Anata to Tomo ni
Swami Douka Anata to Towa ni
meaning: O Lord Sai, I arose from Your existence. I felt a profoundly deep and warm feeling in my heart. I bloomed into a small flower and I saw Your beautiful form. The wide sky is Your domain. You healed our sorrow and pain with Your warmth. Swami, no matter how, I will be together with You. Swami, no matter what, You will always exist in eternity.

title: Anata to Hitotsu ni Naritakute
title2: Anata to Hitotsu ni Naritakute O Sai
lyrics:
Afureru Omoi wa Sai, Sai, Sai
Inori no Kotoba mo Yume Miru Sugata mo
Motomeru Mono wa Tada Hitotsu Sai, Sai, Sai

Harey Sai Rama, Harey Sai Krishna
Harey Sai Buddha, Sai Iesu, Sai, Sai, Sai
Sathya Sai, Sai, Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord, my only wish is to become one with You. You fill my every thought, prayer, and dream with Your beautiful form. Lord Sai Baba, You are Rama, Krishna, Buddha, Jesus.

title: Anata to Ikiru, Tomo ni
title2: Anata to Ikiru, Tomo ni Ikiru, Baba is my life.
lyrics:
Anata to Warai, Anata to Ayumu, Watashi no Jinsei
Heian ni Michi, Shifuku Afureru, Watashi no Mainichi
meaning: Divine Baba, I like with You for You are my life. I laugh with You, I walk with You because You are my very life. You fill me with tranquility and supreme bliss every single day.

title: Anata wa Ram Anata wa
title2: Anata wa Ram Anata wa Shyam Anata wa Watashi no Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
O Baba Anata Megumi wo Douka Watashi ni Kudasai [ Anata wa ... ]
Anata ni Sasageru Oinori wa Ai no Chikara de Mitasareru
Ai no Chikara de Anata no Moto he Michibiki Kudasai Sai Rama
meaning: You are Ram, You are Shyam (Krishna), You are our God, O Sai. Please bestow Your blessings upon us. We devote our prayers to You as You fill our hearts with the power of love. Please guide us through love Lord Sai Ram.

title: Anata wa Watashi no Guru
title2: Anata wa Watashi no Guru Baba, Guru Baba, O Ai no Kami
lyrics:
Bonga-ichi-nyo no Shinri wo Toku Guru Baba, O Ai no Kami
Miashi ni Kagayaku Eichi no Hana
Uchinaru Hikari ni Sakase Mashou
Watashi no Guru Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, O Ai no Kami
meaning: You are my Guru Baba, God of Love. You show us the truth of 'Aham Brahmasmi' (Thou Art That). The flower of Wisdom glows at Your feet. Let it bloom in the light within me.

title: Anata wo Omou Kono Mune
title2: Anata wo Omou Kono Mune no Naka, Hibiki Wataru Kami no Uta
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna, Krishna Krishna, Sathya Sai Krishna [ Anata wo ... ]
Ai de Ai de Sono Shinri no Ai de, Kokoro Mitasu Kami Ai no Keshin
(Sai) Om Sai Om Michibiki tamae Sai Om
meaning: Lord Sai, thoughts of You rest in my heart as Your beautiful song reverberates through the world. O Sai Krishna, You are the incarnation of love who fills our hearts with true love. O Sai, we pray to You to guide us always.

title: Anatha Bandho Sai Prabho
lyrics:
Aparadha Kshama Karo Sai Prabho
Jeeva Yatra Mey Saath Raho Tum
Prem Bhakthi Hum Ko Deejo
Hrudaya Mandir Se Math Jao
Charanamrutha Seva Deejo Prabhu
meaning: Oh Lord Sai! You are the protector and kin of the destitute. Kindly forgive our misdeeds and be with us in our journey of life. Bless us with Divine Love and devotion and be constantly in our thoughts and our hearts, grant us the opportunity to serve Your Lotus feet.

title: Anatha Rakshaki Sai Maheshwari
lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayini Ananda Roopini [ Anatha Rakshaki ... ]
Ambuja Lochani Akhilandeshwari
Abhayam Abhayam Dehi [ Anatha Rakshaki ... ]
Sajjana Vanditha Sankata Nashini
Sharanam Sharanam Sai
meaning: Mother Sai protects and gives refuge to the destitute. The lotus-eyed Goddess of the Universe frees us from fear, destroys grief and is worshipped by all living beings. Let us surrender to Sai.

title: Ancient Mother I hear you calling
title2: Ancient Mother I hear you calling
lyrics:
Ancient Mother I hear your song
Ancient Mother I feel your laughter
Ancient Mother I taste your tears
O La Mama Waha su ko la
O La Mama Waha suWa an
O La Mama KaWe Ha Ha Ha Ha
O La Mama Ta te KaYee

title: Aneela Kumara Hanumantha
lyrics:
Anjani Putra Sri Anjaneya [ Aneela Kumara ... ] 
Vanara Sevitha Vayu Kumara 
Aganita Guna Gana Ati Balavanta 
Sri Rama Dootha Sritha Jana Pala 
Sri Rama Bhaktha Abhaya Pradatha
meaning: Glory to Hanuman, the son of the wind God, Vayu and Anjani. He is the most powerful leader of the monkey army with innumerable qualities. He is the foremost devotee and messenger of Lord Rama who protects the pious and the holy people. Glory to the most powerful protector.

title: Angels We Have Heard On High
title2: Angels We Have Heard On High
lyrics:
Sweetly Singing O'er The Plains
And The Mountains In Reply
Echoing Their Joyous Strain
Gloria in excelsis Deo
Gloria in excelsis Deo
Come to Bethlehem and see
Him whose birth the angels sing
Come adore on bended knee
Christ the Lord the new born King
Gloria in excelsis Deo
Gloria in excelsis Deo
meaning: Gloria in excelsis Deo (Latin for "Glory to God in the highest")

title: Anjana Nanda Veeram
title2: Anjana Nanda Veeram Ashoka Vana Sancharam
lyrics:
Vande Lanka Bhayankaram
Sita Shoka Vinashakaram
meaning: Salutation to thee, O son of mother Anjana, the valorous and powerful. You wandered the Ashoka vana (forest) and instilled fear among the demons to redeem Mother Sita from distress.

title: Anjana Sutha Anjaneya
lyrics:
Vayu Putra Vathathmaja
Vanarotthama Bala Bheema
Rama Dootha Ranadheera
meaning: Oh Anjaneya, the son of Mother Anjana and Vayu, You are the supreme among the Vanaras (monkeys) and the strongest. You are a supreme warrior and the humble emissary of Rama.

title: Anjaneya Hanumantha Veera
lyrics:
Anjana Sutha Vayu Kumara
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namasthey
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namasthey (4)
meaning: O valorous Hanumantha, You are the son of Anjana and Vayu. Salutations to Thee, who is the ambassador of Sri Rama and the remover of Mother Sita's distress.

title: Anjaneya Paahi Maam
title2: Anjaneya Paahi Maam Hanumantha Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Vayu Nandana Paahi Maam Lanka Dahana Paahi Maam
Aprameya Paahi Maam Suprakasha Paahi Maam
Rama Dootha Paahi Maam Sathya Sai Paahi Maam
meaning: O Lord Anjaneya, son of Vayu (Wind God) protect us. O Lord Hanumantha who set Lanka on fire, protect us. Protect us, O Rama's messenger, the effulgent one endowed with immeasurable qualities. O Lord Sathya Sai, protect us.

title: Anjaneya Veera Hanumantha Shoora
lyrics:
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera [ Anjaneya ... ]
Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram Jai Radhey Shyam (4)
meaning: Victory to the brave and powerful Lord Anjaneya (Hanuman), the offspring of the Wind God, Vayu. Chant the names of Lord Rama, Mother Sita and Lord Krishna (Shyam).

title: Annapoorneshwari Palaya Maam
lyrics:
Adi Parashakthi Palaya
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Palaya Maam
Sri Jagadeeshwari Palaya
Parthi Pureeshwari Palaya Maam
Paahi Maheshwari Palaya
Sundara Roopey Palaya Maam
Chira Sukha Dayini Palaya
meaning: O Mother, You are the nourisher, sustainer and protector of the universe. O Mother Sai, You are beauty personified and the one who gives wealth and comforts.

title: Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
lyrics:
Brahma Sanathani Daya Karo
Daya Karo Hey Poorna Jyothirmayi
Shiva Shakthimayi Krupa Karo
Deena Dayamayi Patitha Pavani
Sai Jagat Janani Raksha (Krupa) Karo
meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You have neither beginning nor end. Kindly illumine our soul and shower your mercy. Oh Effulgent Mother of the Universe! You are the form of Shiva and Shakthi and merciful to the deprived. Kindly protect us.

title: Antaranga Sai Anatha Natha Sai
lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Sai Karuna Sindhu Sai [ Antaranga Sai ... ]
Rama Krishna Shiva Shakthi Prema Roopa Sai
Yuga Avatara Baba Sri Sathya Sai
