meaning: O Lord Sai, You are love and bliss personified, repository of compassion and kindness and hope of the downtrodden. You are verily Rama, Krishna and the incarnation of Supreme Love in the modern era.

title: Antaryami Aao Nandalala
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Premi Sai Gopala
Ghana Shyama Neela Karunya Sheela
Hey Madhava Govinda
Narayana Govinda
Radha Pathey Krishna Gopala (Priya) [ Sathya Dharma ... ]
meaning: Wecome O Lord Krishna, the indweller of our hearts, the compassionate son of Nanda and the Lord of Radha. You are worshipped by many names such as Madhava, Govinda, Narayana and Gopala. You are verily Lord Sai who loves Truth and Righteousness.

title: Antaryami Sai
lyrics:
Poorna Brahma Avatari
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari Krishna Kunja Vihari [ Antaryami ... ]
Gopala Leela Dhari
Hey Gopi Mana Sanchari
Madhusudhana Murari [ Hey Giridhari ... ]
meaning: Oh Indweller Sai, You have descended from the Supreme unmanifested state (Brahman). You are Krishna, the resident in the hearts of devotees, who wandered in the Brindavan, lifting the Govardhana mountain. You exhibited divine Leela (sports) with Gopi imprinting Yourself in their minds. You are the one who annihilated the demons Madhu and Mura.

title: Antaryami Sai Murari
lyrics:
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Tum Hitakari [ Antaryami Sai ... ]
Sai Naam Ke Mahima Bhaari
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Gao
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Murari! You are the Indweller of the heart and benefactor to those distressed. Mysterious is the power of the name "Sai" which helps us cross the ocean of life and death.

title: Antaryami Sri Raghurama
lyrics:
Akhilanda Koti Nayaka Rama [ Antaryami ... ]
Atmabhi Rama Pavana Naama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Palaka Rama
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Rama
Sarva Dharma Priya Sri Sai Rama
meaning: O Lord Rama, You the indweller of the heart, the supreme leader of the universe, the Atma (soul) in all and Your name is ever purifying. You foster truth, righteousness and peace in the world. You have incarnated in this Kali Age as Lord Sai who loves and fosters all faiths.

title: Antes del Om solo eras Tu
title2: Antes del Om solo eras Tu.
lyrics:
Tu lo quisiste y se hizo la Luz. 
Por tu Voluntad aparecieron
La Tierra, el Hombre, el Mar y el Cielo. 
Sin tu Amor yo no podria sobrevivir ni un solo dia. 
Tu mirada me inspira Amor 
tus palabras me dan valor. 
Senor ayudanos a comprender q debemos cumplir nuestro Deber.
meaning: O Lord, only You existed before the Primodial Sound "Om". With Your Divine Will You created the Earth, Man, the Sea and the Heaven. Without Your Love, my Lord, I cannot survive even a single day. Your divine sight inspires divine Love in me. Your divine Words give me courage. O Lord, help us understand that we must accomplish our higher Duty (Dharma).

title: Anupama Sundara Nanda Kishora
lyrics:
Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Murali Madhava Radhey Govinda
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
Brinda Vihari Mandara Giridhari
Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
Bhakthon Ke Prabhu Partheeshwara Sai
Natavara Sundara Shyam Sathya Sai Sundara Shyam
meaning: O Krishna, son of Nanda, You are unsurpassingly beautiful. You are dark as the clouds and is adored in Brindavan as Radhey Govinda, Madhusudhana and Giridhari. O lotus-eyed Lord Sathya Sai, You are beloved to Your devotees and adored as the same dancing Shyam (Krishna).

title: Any Time Of Day
title2: (At) Any Time of Day, Morning Noon or Night
lyrics:
I Always Sing Sai Ram
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama (3)
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama 
His Love Brings Us joy, Eternal Happiness Within, His Name is Bliss, Ananda
Ananda Ananda Ananda Ananda (3)
Ananda Ananda Ananda

Ananda Sai Rama Ananda Sai Rama (3)
Ananda Sai Rama Ananda

title: Apaara Karuna Sindho Krupa Sindho
title2: Apaara Karuna Sindho Krupa Sindho Daya Sindho
lyrics:
Aganita Gunagana Dhama Atma Rama Ananda Rama 
Bhaashpavaari Paripoorna Lochanam 
Maruthim Bhajey Ram Ram Ram Sita Ram Ram Ram Raja Ram Ram Ram
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram Parthi Sai Ram
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the boundless ocean of mercy. Lord Sai's attributes are beyond perception. Lord Sai's eyes are infinitely beautiful. As Hanuman worships the holy name of Rama, we too worship Lord Sai Rama. Lord Sathya Sai who resides at Puttaparthi is worshipped by all of His dear devotees.

title: Apaara Mahima Gunavanta Anjaneya Balavanta
lyrics:
Sri Rama Daasa Jaya Hanumantha
Sri Rama Dootha Jaya Hanumantha
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Hanumantha
Jai Jai Jai Jai Hanumantha
meaning: O Anjaneya, You are endowed with immeasurable virtuous qualities and incomparable strength. You are the divine devotee and messenger of Lord Rama. Victory to Thee, O Hanumantha.

title: Aradhana Suno Prabhu Giridhari
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihari [ Aradhana Suno ... ]
Bhaktha Janon Ke Prana Dhari
Daya Karo Mujhey Mohana Pyaarey
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
meaning: Worship Lord Krishna who held the Govardhana mountain up. He walked the garden (in Brindavan). He is the life sustainer of devotees. Lord Sai, of Parthi, please bestow mercy on us.

title: Araj Suno Giridhari Gopal
lyrics:
Sundara Shyama Murari Gopal [ Araj Suno ... ]
Mohana Murali Dhari Gopal
Brindavana Sanchari Gopal
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopal
Saath Raho Sathya Sai Gopal
meaning: O Krishna, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, kindly listen to my prayer. You are charming and captivating and sanctified Brindavan by Your presence. You are the indweller of Radha's heart. Always be our companion.

title: Araj Suno Merey Parama Krupalu
lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sai Deva [ Araj Suno ... ]
Sathya Sanathana Antaryami
Sakala Charachara Tum Ho Swami
Janam Maran Se Paar Karo
Bhava Bandhan Se Uddhar Karo (Baba)
meaning: O Supremely merciful Lord of Parthi! Kindly listen to my prayer and help me come out of the bondage of the cycle of birth and death. O Lord Sai! You are omnipresent, infinite and the indweller of our heart.

title: Araj Suno Prabhu Sai Natha
lyrics:
Darshana Do Ab Swami
Dwar Khada Hoon Aao Sai
Charana Sharana Do Swami
Hrudaya Nivasi Sai Baba Sai
Pran Sakha Tum Swami
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Natha, please listen to my appeal and appear before me now. I am standing at Your door step, bestow me the protection of Your feet, Oh the indweller Sai, You are my best friend.

title: Arathi Karoon Mein
title2: Arathi Karoon Mein Sri Sai Charanam (3)
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasa Sri Sai Rama
Shirdi Nivasa Sri Sai Rama
Ashraya Do Mujhey Hey Bhagawan
meaning: Please grant me refuge, Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, as I offer the lamp of love at Your holy feet.

title: Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Aravinda Lochana ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Dosha Nivarana
Parama Niranjana Hey Shubhanana
meaning: O lotus-eyed Lord Narayana, You are the protector of the deprived and distressed. O Lord Sai, the auspicious son of Mother Eshwaramba, the blemishless one, You are the redeemer of our defects.

title: Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana Parthi Pureeshwara
title2: Aravinda Lochana Aartha Janavana Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
lyrics:
Suguna Manohara Suruchira Roopa Sundara Nayanabhi Ram
Shyamala Komala Vaidehi Mohana Karuna Sagara Ram
Bandha Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Bhaava Priya Sai Ram
Sri Raghu Nandana Parama Niranjana Maruthi Sevita Ram
meaning: Lord Sai Ram, with eyes shaped like lotus petals, is the uplifter of the downtrodden in this world. His qualities, like His beautiful eyes, are bewitching to all. He is soft, dark-hued, the enchanter of Vaidehi (Sita), and is the ocean of compassion. Lord Sai Ram relieves us from all bondages to the world, removes fear and ignorance, and is the lover of His devotees. Glory to Lord Ram of the Raghu dynasty, the supremely pure one constantly worshipped by Maruthi (Hanuman).

title: Arigatou Swami, Arigatou Swami
lyrics:
Kokoro no Naka ni Owasu Kami
Watashi wo Michibiki Mamoru Kami

Arigatou Swami, Arigatou Swami
meaning: Thank you Swami, the one who dwells within my heart guiding and protecting me.

title: Arjuna noyō ni tachiagare, mezameyo
title2: Arjuna noyō ni tachiagare, mezameyo kami no michakara de
lyrics:
Uchū no kami yo Krishna, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
Uchi naru chikara yo shin no yūki wo atae kudasai, Kami Sama
Uchi naru chikara yo shin no yūki wo atae kudasai Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai, please stand up and awaken within me with Your beautiful, godly power like You did in Arjuna before. O Sai Baba, You are the Lord of the Universe, the embodiment of Krishna. Please bestow the true inner power of fearlessness upon me, O Lord Sai Baba.

title: Aroha mai te Atua iaku
lyrics:
I te au mea tāku e kite nei
Te anuanua kua iti mai ki roto iāku
Aroha mai te Atua iaku

My God loves me
And all Thy wonders I see
The rainbow shines through my window
My God loves me

title: Arul Tara Varuvai Guru Nada
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Sai Mahesha [ Arul Tara ... ]
Annaiyum Niye Tandaiyum Niye
Arulum Niye Anaittum Niye
Gathi Niye Ena Saranamadaindom
Parindemai Kappai Parthi Pureesha
Guru Nada Sai Guru Nada
meaning: Grace us with Your presence, our guru Lord Sai. You are full of mercy. You are our mother, father and our all; We surrender to You, our only refuge. Save us Guru Sai, O compassionate one.

title: Aruna Ramana Sri Guru Deva
lyrics:
Shesha Ramana Sadguru Deva [ Aruna Ramana ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sri Sai Deva
Sri Sai Deva Sri Sai Deva [ Bhava Bhaya ... ]
Guru Hai Sath Chith Ananda Deva
Ananda Deva Sri Sai Deva
meaning: O Lord Sai, the divine Preceptor, You are the one who protects us from fear and worldly miseries. You are the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss. You are verily Lord Arunachaleshwara (Shiva) who enlightened Saint Ramana and His Preceptor Saint Seshadri Swamigal.

title: Arunachala Shiva
lyrics:
Shiva Shankara Samba Shiva
Hara Shankara Sai Shiva [ Arunachala Shiva ]
Chandrachooda Madanaanthaka Hara Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva Shiva Shankara Sai
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva who resides in the Arunachala Hill, along with His consort, Mother Parvathi. The crescent moon adorns His locks of hair where He holds the Holy river Ganga. He is none other than our beloved Lord Sai, residing in Puttaparthi.

title: Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva
title2: Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Arunachala Shiva, Aruna Shiva
lyrics:
Akshaya Linga Atma Linga
Tejonmaya Vigraha Linga
Iha Para Sukha Dayaka, Esha (Sai), Iha Para Sukha Dayaka
Om Namah Shivaya, Shivaya Namah Om (3)
meaning: O Lord Shiva, You reside in the Arunachala hill in the form of imperishable Atma Linga, the effulgent symbol, which bestows peace and happiness in this and the higher world. O Lord, salutations to Thee, the embodiment of the Primordial sound "Om".

title: As the sun shines
title2: As the sun shines on the lotus of my heart, as it blossoms day by day
lyrics:
As Your radiant love shines upon me from above, each petal sings Your Name
Allah (Allah!), Buddha (Buddha!), Yesu, Ghana Shyam
Maula (Maula!), Nanak (Nanak!), Sathya Sai Ram [ As Your radiant love ... ]

title: Asa wo Tsugeru Tori ni
title2: Asa wo Tsugeru Tori ni, Kyou no Ichinichi wo Inori
lyrics:
Sora ni Kakaru Niji ni, Kami no Miwaza wo Miru
O Sai, Sathya Sai, Kaze yo Umi yo Hoshi yo
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Kyou mo Arigatou
meaning: Today, I pray to the birds that call out in the morning. Look at the rainbow that covers the sky. This is the divine work of God. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the wind, the ocean, and the stars. Sai Ram, I offer You my gratitude again today.

title: Asathoma Sath Gamaya
lyrics:
Thamasoma Jyothir Gamaya
Mruthyorma Amrutham Gamaya
Om Shanthi Shanthi Shanthihi



English version
From The Unreal, Lead Me To The Real
From Darkness, Lead Me To The Light
From Death, Lead Me To Immortality
Aum Peace, Peace, Peace

title: Ashi no Suzu no
title2: Ashi no Suzu no We wo Takarakani
lyrics:
Narashi Mai Odore
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo
 Mai Odore
 Utyu no Mai wo

title: Ashi no Suzu no Ne
title2: Ashi no Suzu no Ne wo, Takaraka ni Narashi Mai Odore (Om)
lyrics:
Mai Odore
Uchuu no Mai wo
Mai Odore
Uchuu no Mai wo [ Ashi no... ]
Taiko no Ne mo Naru, Shiva Shiva Shiva Om
Kodaiko mo Utau, Hara Hara Hara Om
Veena mo Kanaderu Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Mai Odore ... ]
meaning: Show us Your cosmic dance Lord Shiva! For the sound of Your divine feet ring out like beautiful bells. The sound of Your drums sing out as You play the Veena beautifully.

title: Ashraqat nafsi bi noorimin fuaadi
lyrics:
Hinama radattu ya rabala ibaadi
Wantashat ruhi wasara damu auyajari
Ya Ilahi, khuz bi Qalbi lirrashaadi
Ya'Adheeman, Ya Ilahi (2x)
Ya Raheeman, Ya Ilahi
Ya'Adheema, Ya Ilahi
meaning:
My soul is brightened by a light in my heart
When I praised God of mankind
And my soul is cheered up and the tears were flowing
Oh God! guide my heart to reason
In the tranquility of the night I pray during worshiping
While the black darkness is all around me
Oh Kind! Oh Most Merciful! Oh Most Forbearing!
Oh Kind! Your gifts are endless Oh All-Hearing! Oh Answerer! Oh Most Magnificent!
Oh Creator of the strong predatory animals! Guide me
Guide me to truth, God
I depend on your guidance today
Oh God of the universe! You are my aid
You are the refuge of man in the afterworld
Here I am God, asking your forgiveness
Forgive me and grant me my wish

1. Aum Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaya Namaha
Let us bow down to Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba (the true Divine Mother and Father of all)

2. Aum Sri Sai Sathya Swarupaya Namaha
Who is the Embodiment of Truth 

3. Aum Sri Sai Sathya Dharma Parayanaya Namaha
Who is solely devoted to (preaching) Truth and Righteousness 

4. Aum Sri Sai Varadaya Namaha
Who is the Giver of Boons

5. Aum Sri Sai Satpurushaya Namaha
The One Who is all pervading

6. Aum Sri Sai Sathya Gunatmane Namaha
Who is the Embodiment of the virtue, Truth

7. Aum Sri Sai Sadhu Vardhanaya Namaha
Who promotes the quality of piety, righteousness

8. Aum Sri Sai Sadhu Jana Poshanaya Namaha
Who sustains and shelters virtuous persons

9. Aum Sri Sai Sarva Jnaya Namaha
Who is omniscient

10. Aum Sri Sai Sarva Jana Priyaya Namaha
Who is dear to all

11. Aum Sri Sai Sarva Shakthi Murtaye Namaha
Who is the Embodiment of all powers

Who is the Lord of all

16. Aum Sri Sai Maheshwara Swarupaya Namaha
Who is the Embodiment of Shiva

17. Aum Sri Sai Parthi Gramodbhavaya Namaha

18. Aum Sri Sai Parthi Kshetra Nivasine Namaha
Who is the Resident of the region of (Putta)Parthi

19. Aum Sri Sai Yashakaya Shirdi Vasine Namaha

20. Aum Sri Sai Jodi Aadi Palli Somappaya Namaha

21. Aum Sri Sai Bhardwaja Rishi Gothraya Namaha
Who is descendant of Sage Bhaaradwaja

22. Aum Sri Sai Bhaktha Vatsalaya Namaha
Who is affectionate towards devotees like a parent to children

23. Aum Sri Sai Apantaratmane Namaha
Who is indweller (Atma) of all beings

24. Aum Sri Sai Avatara Murtaye Namaha
Who is embodiment of Incarnation

25. Aum Sri Sai Sarva Bhaya Nivarine Namaha
Who removes all fears

26. Aum Sri Sai Apastambha Sutraya Namaha

27. Aum Sri Sai Abhaya Pradaya Namaha
Who bestows freedom from fear and anxiety

28. Aum Sri Sai Ratnakara Vamshod Bhavaya Namaha
Who is born in the dynasty of Ratnakar (gems among men) 

29. Aum Sri Sai Shirdi Sai Abheda Shaktyavataraya Namaha

30. Aum Sri Sai Shankaraya Namaha

31. Aum Sri Sai Shirdi Sai Murtaye Namaha

32. Aum Sri Sai Dwarakamayi Vasine Namaha

33. Aum Sri Sai Chitravathi Tata Puttaparthi Viharine Namaha
Who sports (His Leelas) in Puttaparthi on the banks of the Chitravathi river 

34. Aum Sri Sai Shakthi Pradaya Namaha
Who bestows strength

35. Aum Sri Sai Sharanagatha Tranaya Namaha

36. Aum Sri Sai Anandaya Namaha
Who is Bliss personified

37. Aum Sri Sai Ananda Daya Namaha
Who grants Bliss

38. Aum Sri Sai Aartha Trana Parayanaya Namaha
Who is devoted to saving the afflicted (those in distress)

39. Aum Sri Sai Anatha Nathaya Namaha
Who is the Lord of the destitutes

40. Aum Sri Sai Asahaya Sahayaya Namaha
Who renders help to the helpless

41. Aum Sri Sai Loka Bhandhavaya Namaha

91. Aum Sri Sai Sarvaa Bhista Pradaya Namaha

Who destroys evil effect of bad actions

Who shines in the mind of pious people as brilliance knowledge

96. Aum Sri Sai Sadhu Manasa Parishodhakaya Namaha
Who purifies the mind of spiritual aspirants

97. Aum Sri Sai Sadhak Aanugraha Vata Vriksha Prathisthapakaya Namaha

98. Aum Sri Sai Sakala Samshaya Haraya Namaha

title: At this time of our devotion
title2: At this time of our devotion
lyrics:
Let there be no barriers
Cast them away, Lord Ganesha (2x)
Bless us with your loving grace
Oh Lord with the elephant face
May out hearts be filled with joy
Singing out in love for Sai
Bless us, bless us, Sai Ganesha (2x)

title: At Thy Lotus Feet My Lord
title2: At Thy Lotus Feet, My Lord, What Bliss It Is
lyrics:
At Thy Lotus Feet, My Lord, How Sweet It Is
All The Pain That Is In My Heart, All The Sorrows In My Soul
Vanish And Turn Into A Rainbow, At Thy Lotus Feet

title: At Your Feet Dear Lord We Pray
title2: At Your Feet Dear Lord We Pray
lyrics:
Grace Us With Your Love This Day
Sai Baba, Sai Baba, You Are Krishna, You Are Rama
Oh Baba, Oh Baba, You Are Mother, You Are Father
All Names, Every Form, All That Was And Will Be Born
(You Are) All Names Every Form All That Is Forever More

title: Atma Jyothi Namo
title2: Atma Jyothi Namo Paramatma Jyothi Namo
lyrics:
Akhanda Jyothi Namo Mama Jeevana Jyothi Namo
Antaryami Namo Sri Sadguru Sai Namo
alt_lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Namo Paramatma Jyothi Namo
Akhanda Jyothi Namo Mama Jeevana Jyothi Namo
Antaryami Namo Jaya Sadguru Sai Namo
meaning: Bow to the omnipresent light, the light of God within. Bow to the never-ending light, which is the very essence of life. Bow to the indwelling true Guru, Lord Sai.

title: Atma Linga Sai
title2: Atma Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Amrutha Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Jyothir Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
Netra Linga Sai Sai Sathya Sai
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You in the form of Atma Linga (created by You from within), in the form of Amrutha Linga (immortal symbol), Jyothir Linga (the effulgent one) and Netra Linga (the symbol with eyes).

title: Atma Lingam Bhajorey
title2: Atma Lingam Bhajorey Ati Adbhuta Lingam Bhajorey
lyrics:
Naga Lingam Navamani Lingam
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Eshwara Lingam Bhajorey Sayeeshwara (Partheeshwara) Lingam Bhajorey
meaning: Sing in praise of the Atma Lingam, the auspicious and astonishing divine form of Lord Shiva, the Naga Lingam studded with nine precious stones that has emerged out of the navel of Shiva. Sing in praise of the Eshwara Lingam and Sayeeshwara Lingam.

title: Atma Mey Bas Jao Baba
title2: Atma Mey Bas Jao Baba Atma Mey Bas Jao Baba
lyrics:
Tum Bina Sab Mandir Hai Sune [ Atma Mey ... ]
Paramatma Tum Sare Jagat Ke
Ram Rahim Tum Sare Jagat Ke
Sune Mana Mey Vas Karo Tum
Ghar Ghar Mey Bas Jao Baba (2)
meaning: Baba, please reside in our empty heart; the temple is empty without You. You are the Lord of the Universe, Rama and Rahim. Please stay in our home.

title: Atma Ram Ananda Dham
lyrics:
Achyutha Ram Ayodhya Ram
Sita Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Sundara Ram Sugunabhi Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram (3)
alt_lyrics:
Atma Ram Ananda Ram
Adbhuta Ram Ayodhya Ram
Sita Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Sundara Ram Sugunabhi Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram (3)
meaning: Worship the beautiful Form of Lord Rama, the resident of Ayodhya who is indweller of our heart and who confers bliss. Chant the name of Ram, the Lord of Sita and the virtuous one. Chant the name of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Atma Rama Ananda Naama
lyrics:
Ananda Mohana Sri Parandhama [ Atma Rama ... ]
Mayabhi Rama Manasa Prema
Sundara Naama Sugunabhi Rama
meaning: O Lord Rama, the indweller of hearts, Your form gives happiness, bliss and love. You are the embodiment of virtues who assumed an illusive form of a human being.

title: Atma Rama Ananda Ramana
lyrics:
Achyutha Keshava Hari Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
Adi Narayana Anantha Shayana
Satchidananda Sathya ( Sai ) Narayana
meaning: O Lord Rama! You are indweller of hearts and You are the embodiment of bliss. Chant the names of Keshava, Narayana and Sai, the remover of worldly fears. O Lotus eyed jewel of the Raghu dynasty, the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, we bow down to Your lotus feet.

title: Atma Rama, Uchinaru Hikari
lyrics:
Sai Rama, Makoto no Watashi
Atma Rama, Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, Sathya Sai Baba

Atma Rama, Subete ni Yadoru
Sai Rama, Uchuu wo Mitasu
Atma Rama, Sai Rama, Sai Baba, Shifuku no Izumi
meaning: Atma Rama (the Indweller), You are the light within me. Lord Sai Rama, You are the truth of my existence. You are Atma Rama, Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, and Sathya Sai Baba. Atma Rama, You dwell in everything. Lord Sai Rama, You fulfill everything in the universe. You are the fountain of supreme bliss.

title: Atma Vichara
lyrics:
(chorus)
Atma Vichara
Atma Vichara
Atma Vichara, liberation
 
Purify the mind
Purify the mind
Through seva, japa, meditation
 
(chorus)
 
Satsang with the sages
Conquers maya from the ages
Births, sorrow, and death
 
(chorus)
 
I lay myself at Your feet
Without You I’ll never meet
The heart of myself, oh my sweet Lord
 
(chorus)
Atma Vichara, liberation (3x)

title: Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
lyrics:
Sita Rama Sai Rama
Sundara Naama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radhey Shyama Sai Rama
meaning: Chant the sweet names of Lord Rama, Ghana Shyama, Radhey Shyama, Sai Rama, the indweller of our hearts and embodiment of bliss.

title: Avatar
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Avatar of the ages
We are Your children
The children of the world
 
You are our God
You are our life
You light up our lives
Every day and every night
 
Sri Sathya Sai Baba (3x)
Our Lord, our God

title: Avatarini Amba Bhaya Harini
lyrics:
Bhairavi Shankari Durga Bhavani [ Avatarini Amba ... ]
Bhaktha Jana Priya Tribhuvana Dharini
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani [ Bhairavi Shankari ... ]
meaning: O Mother of the Universe, You have descended in the form of Bhairavi, Shankari, Durga, Bhavani. You are the beloved of devotees and who supports the three worlds. We adore You as Bhagawathi, Bharati and the Brahma Sanathani (primordial goddess).

title: Ave Maria Kyrie Eleison
title2: I Am One With The Heart Of The Mother
lyrics:
I Am One With The Heart Of Love
I Am One With The Heart Of The Father
I Am One With God
Ave Maria Kyrie Eleison
meaning: Hail Mary, Christ Have Mercy On Us.

title: Awaken from the dream
title2: Awaken from the dream, awaken my child,
lyrics:
Listen to your heart, He's calling you
 Deep in the silence within your soul, listen to
 His voice, He's calling you
 Awaken to the bliss, awaken to the Love,
 Awaken to the light, He's calling you
 Come home, my child, come home to Me,
 Listen to His voice, He's calling you
 Awaken from the dream, awaken my child,
 Listen to your heart, He's calling you

title: Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram
title2: Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Jaya Radhey Shyam
Radha Madhava Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the names of Sita Ram, the Lord of Ayodhya and Radhey Shyam who resides in Brindavan. Victory to Lord Sairam of Parthi.

title: Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Rama
lyrics:
Saketa Ranjana Kaivalya Dhama [ Ayodhya Shiromani ... ]
Neeraja Lochana Sai Narayana
Bandha Vimochana Bhaktha Parayana
Prana Sakha Merey Prabhu Sai Rama [ Saketa Ranjana ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha and the crown jewel of Ayodhya. O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Rama. Free us from the bondage of life and death as You are our dearest companion and our ultimate abode.

title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram
title2: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ayodhya Vasi Ram
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Jaya Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
Aranya Vasi Ram Aranya Vasi Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Ahalya Uddhara Ram Ahalya Uddhara Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Ram Bhaktha Vatsala Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha, the resident of Ayodhya, the consort of Janaki (Sita), the redeemer of Ahalya and the beloved of all devotees.

title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Hai
title2: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Hai Dwaraka Mey Aayey
lyrics:
Dwaraka Vasi Shyam Hai Shirdi Mey Aayey
Shirdi Vasi Shyam Hai Parthi Sathya Sai
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sai Ram, who is the same Lord who incarnated in Ayodhya as Ram, in Dwaraka as Shyam, in Shirdi as Lord Shirdi Sai and in Puttaparthi as Sathya Sai.

title: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram
title2: Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ram Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Rama, the Lord of Ayodhya, the Son of Dasharatha and the consort of Sita and whose name purifies the deprived.

title: Ayodhya Vihari Sri Rama Rama
title2: Ayodhya Vihari Sri Rama Rama Rama
lyrics:
Dwaraka Vihari Sri Krishna Krishna Krishna
Saptagiri Vihari Govinda Govinda
Nija Bhaktha Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sai Natha Deva
meaning: Sing the glory of Rama who is the resident of Ayodhya, Krishna the resident of Dwaraka and Govinda the God of seven hills. O Lord Sai, You revel in the hearts of devotees.

title: Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa
lyrics:
Sabarinayaka Shanthi Dayaka, Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa Sharaname
Parthi Nayaka Prashanthi Dayaka, Ayyappa Sharaname Swami Ayyappa Sharaname
meaning: Take refuge in Ayyappa, the Lord of Sabari mountain and Puttaparthi, who bestows supreme peace.

title: Baar Baar Prabhu Janam Liya
lyrics:
Sri Madhusudhana Janam Liya [ Baar Baar ... ]
Kausalya Nandana Sri Raghu Ram
Devaki Nandana Hey Ghana Shyama
Eshwari Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Janam Liya Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Narahari Narayana Sai Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Narayana! You incarnated as Rama, the beloved son of Kausalya, as Krishna, the son of Devaki and as Sai, the son of Mother Eshwaramba. Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai.

title: Baar Baar Tum Aao Sai
lyrics:
Darshana Do Bhagawan (2)
Nithya Nirmala Nithyananda
Satchidananda Prabho
Darshana Do Bhagawan
meaning: Welcome O Lord Sai. Grant us the darshan of Your ever pure and blissful Form again and again.

title: Baba Aao Merey Keertan Mey
lyrics:
Antaryami Darsha Dikhao
Naiya Hamarey Paar Lagao [ Baba Aao ... ]
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Jeevan Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
meaning: O beloved Baba, grant Your Divine Darshan while we sing Your glory and help us cross the boat of life. Kindle the lamp of wisdom in our hearts just as You illuminate our lives.

title: Baba Dil Mey Basey Raho
lyrics:
Janam Janam Mey Saath Raho
Haath Na Chodo Anatha Natha
Saath Na Chodo Sai Prabho (Merey)
Terey Charan Mey Lelo Sai Prabho
meaning: Baba, please install thee in our hearts, be with us for all births. Oh supreme Lord Sai! Do not leave our hands and deprive us from your grace and always place us at your lotus feet.

title: Baba Merey Parthi Vihari
lyrics:
Hum Sab Aayey Hain Sharana Tumhari [ Baba Merey ... ]
Dukh Bhanjana Mera Saath Na Chodo
Dedo Darshana Asha Na Todo
Sunalo Vinati Hamari
meaning: Baba, Lord of Parthi, please listen to our prayers. We all have taken refuge in You. Please destroy our sorrows, do not leave us or take away our hopes to Your darshan.

title: Baba Sai Baba, Baba Sai
title2: Baba Sai Baba, Baba Sai Baba,
lyrics:
Ta voix réchauffe notre coeur,
Ton Amour nous fait danser dans la joie,
Chante, Oh Sai Baba, chante,
Danse, danse, danse, danse, danse dans nos coeurs, 
Chante, Oh Sai Baba Chante.
meaning: Oh Sai Baba, Your voice warms our hearts. Your love makes us dance in joy. Sing, Oh Sai Baba, sing. Dance, dance, dance, dance, dance in our hearts. Sing, Oh Sai Baba, sing.

title: Baba Sanbi no Uta ni Kitare
title2: Baba Sanbi no Uta ni Kitare
lyrics:
Subete ni Yadoru Kami yo Kitare
 Rinne no Umi wo Watashi tamae [ Baba Sanbi ... ]
 Uchi Naru Hikari wo Tomosu Sai
 Kokoro ni Hikaru Anata wa Sai
meaning: Beloved Baba, come to us as we sing to You the song of Your glory; O Lord who resides within everything, come to us; You have reincarnated to help us; You shine the divine light within us; You glow within our hearts, Lord Sai.

title: Baba will keep you in perfect peace
title2: Baba will keep you in perfect peace
lyrics:
If you keep your mind stayed on Him
 Baba will keep you in perfect peace
 If you keep your mind stayed on Him (hold)
 When confusion all around, it won't get you down
 You will have Baba's Peace to surround you
 God will keep you, in perfect peace
 If you only keep your mind stayed on Him

title: Baba's Message
lyrics:
I love you all every single one, for deep within I see,
beneath the ego layers, your own divinity.

No one of you is more special, or more lovable to Me,
For each of you possesses, your own divinity.

So don't compete with others, to seek security,
When My love you have already, from your own divinity.

Direct My love to others, who are blind and cannot see.
The love they seek so desparately, is their own divinity.

For as you seek in everyone, the counterpart of Me,
You'll start to open up your hearts, to the one divinity.

title: Baba, Baba, Om Sai Baba
lyrics:
Incarnation of God on Earth
Baba, Baba, Om Sai Baba
Divine Mother has taken birth
Tender hands that lift us up
Mother Sai so close to us
Dry our tears, dry our tears
Please keep us near, please keep us near

title: Baba, be my heart
title2: Baba, be my heart, Baba, be my goal,
lyrics:
Baba, be my life, Baba, fill my soul,
 Baba, grant me freedom, Baba grant me peace,
 Baba, through Your grace, You're my release

title: Baba, I love You
lyrics:
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Baba (2x)
A crown of hair, a robe of red, Your name means truth (2x)
Baba, I love You, Oh, Baba, I love You, Baba, I love You (2x)
Avatar, Avatar, sweet Avatar (2x)

title: Baba, I Love You... Love And Adore You
title2: Baba, I love You... love and adore You.
lyrics:
Waking or sleeping, sunshine or rain.
I'm holding Your hand, Lord, no longer lonely. 
Warm in Your grace, O... Baba, I love You.

Baba, my pathway isn't all roses. 
Sometimes I wonder, "Why all these tears?" 
Then, I remember, how much You love me. 
And living is easy... Baba... I love You.

Baba... tomorrow, when comes the dawning. 
There, in that moment... recalling Your grace. 
Deep in my heart, Lord, I will be with You. 
Warmed by devotion.. Baba... I love You.

Baba O Baba... Love is the answer.
Love is the reason... Love is the way. 
Here in Your steps Lord... I find direction. 
How can I falter?... Baba I love You...

title: Baba, my heart is singing
title2: Baba, my heart is singing to You, come and hear
lyrics:
You dwell within me, yet I would see You
 Remove my darkness, and I shall be You(Baba)
 You are my soul's light, You are the Spirit
 You are the Spirit(2X)
 You are my Soul's light, You are the Spirit
 My heart is singing, please come and hear it
 My heart is singing, I know you hear it

title: Bada Chitha Chora Brindavana Sanchara
lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Hey Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala
Gopi Manohara Radhey Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala (Krishna), who played in Brindavan, who lifted the Govardhana mountain and who captivated the hearts of Radha and the Gopis.

title: Bada Chitha Chora Mana Mohan
lyrics:
Mera Chitha Chora Jaganmohan
Ayodhya Ke Sita Ram
Brindavan Ke Radhey Shyam
Shirdi Ke Sai Baba
Parthi Ke Sathya Sai
meaning: Chant the names of the Sita Ram - the Lord of Ayodhya, Radhey Shyam - the Lord of Brindavan, Sai Baba of Shirdi and Puttaparthi, the darling of every heart.

title: Bahut Diya Tune Anand Baba
lyrics:
Dukh Ko Sukh Kiya Jeevan Me Mera [ Bahut Diya ... ]
Tumne Mujhko Prema Sikhaya
Sathya Dharma Ka Raaha Dikhaya
Man Mandir Me Deep Jalaya
Paavan Kiya Tune Jeevan Mera
meaning: Baba, You gave me immense happiness and changed my life of sorrow into bliss. You taught me how to be loving and showed me path of truth and right living. You lit the flame of knowledge in me and made my life holy.

title: Bala Gopal Jai Jai Sai Shyam
title2: Bala Gopal Jai Jai Sai Shyam
lyrics:
Prem Bharo Dil Mey Hamarey Sai Ram
Hamarey Sai Ram Badey Pyaarey Sai Ram [ Prem Bharo... ]
Hum Bhakthon Ke Tum Ek Sai Ram
Tumharey Jagat Mey Bada Pyaara Pyaara Naam
Sangh Raho Har Dum Hamarey Sai Ram
Sangh Raho Hamarey Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Sai Shyama, the Infant Gopala, our Beloved Lord. Saturate our hearts with Divine Love and be with us in every moment of our life. Your dear name and glory engulfs the entire world.

title: Bala Gopala Sai
lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Gopala [ Bala Gopala ... ]
Vasudeva Nandana Gopala
Yashoda Nandana Gopala
Nanda Gopala Ananda Gopala
Sai Gopala Sathya Sai Gopala
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Gopala (Krishna). Gopala is the dear son of Mother Devaki and Vasudeva and fostered by Mother Yashoda and Nanda. He is the one who confers bliss. He is verily Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Bando Sri Guru Sadguru Charanam
lyrics:
Sri Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam [ Bandho Sri ... ]
Sri Sai Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Sab Dukha Haranam Sadguru Charanam
meaning: Bow down at the feet of Sai, our true guru, who removes all sorrows and takes us across the ocean of worldly existence.

title: Bansi Bajao Man Mandir Mey
lyrics:
Bansidhara Ghana Shyama
Hey Murali Manohara Shyama
Sur Sangeet Sajaanewala 
Bansidhara Ghana Shyama
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Shyama
meaning: O Lord Krishna, play Your flute in the Temple of my mind. Your complexion is that of dark rainclouds. You give music its beauty. You are none other than Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Bansidhara Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Giridhari Gopa Bala Brindavana Vihara [ Bansidhara ... ]
Govinda Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Mukunda
Radhey ( Sai ) Govinda Radhey ( Sai ) Gopala Radhey ( Sai ) Govinda Radhey ( Sai )
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Mukunda, Sai Gopala, the one who plays the enchanting flute and who resides in Brindavan. He is verily Lord Sai.

title: Bansidhari Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Shourie
Patithodhari Paapa Viduri
Leela Nataka Sutradhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
meaning: Oh Krishna Murari, You are so enchanting with Your flute. You saved the devotees by lifting the entire Govardhana Mountain. You are the redeemer of the downtrodden and remover of their sins. You are the director of Your divine play and who resides in Parthi.

title: Be happy, I’m happy
lyrics:
That's what our Lord says, this is what He says
 Don't worry, don't hurry
 Have no fear, 'cause Sathya Sai is here
 Pray that the whole world prospers
 Let all mankind be happy
 This is our Lord's special message
 (so) Be happy, I'm happy
 That's what our Lord says, this is what He says
 Don't worry, don't hurry
 Have no fear, 'cause Sathya Sai is here
 Pray that the whole world prospers
 Let all mankind be happy
 This is our Lord's special message

title: Be The Heart Within My Heart
title2: Be the heart within my heart,
lyrics:
The love within my soul,
Let Your hand overlay my hand,
Let my words and thoughts be guided by Your love.

title: Beautiful God Hallelujah
lyrics:
O-o-o-o-om
Perfect Love, Hallelujah
Divine Mother, Hallelujah
Heavenly Father, Hallelujah
O-o-o-om
Sweet Jesus, Hallelujah
Lord Buddha, Hallelujah
Beloved Satsang, Hallelujah
O-o-o-om
Sathya Sai Baba, Hallelujah (3)
O-o-o-om
alt_lyrics:
Beautiful God, Hallelujah (3) Om
 Sathya Sai Baba, Hallelujah
 (Om) Narayana, Hallelujah
 (Sai) Keshava, Hallelujah
 (Lord) Jesus Christ, Hallelujah
 (Great) Jehovah, Hallelujah
 Heavenly Father, Hallelujah
 Divine Mother, Hallelujah
 Holy Ghost, Hallelujah
 Allah (el) Allah, Hallelujah
 Perfect Brahma, Hallelujah
 Beautiful Vishnu, Hallelujah
 Mighty Lord Shiva, Hallelujah
 Harey Rama, Hallelujah
 Harey Krishna, Hallelujah
 Sweet Lord Buddha, Hallelujah
 (Om) Beautiful God, Hallelujah

title: Beautiful Rama, beautiful Krishna
lyrics:
You've stolen this heart of mine
 Your will is the song of creation, Sai
 Teach us Your love song divine

title: Beda Paar Karo Merey Sai
lyrics:
Uddhar Karo Merey Baba [ Beda Paar ... ]
Allah Eshwar Sai Baba
Shirdi Baba Parthi Baba
Reham Nazar Karo Sai Baba
Daya Karo Sai Krupa Karo
meaning: O Lord Sai, uplift and help us cross the ocean of life and death. You are Allah, Eshwar and Shirdi Baba. Shower Your mercy, Compassion and Grace on us.

title: Bein’ A Channel For The Love Of God
title2: Bein’ A Channel For The Love Of God
lyrics:
I wanna live the song that I sing
I wanna bring Light to everything
I wanna hear The Sound of God wherever I go
I wanna hold out my hand to everyone
I wanna give as freely as the sun
I wanna be a channel for The Love of God
 
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
 
I wanna see The Truth in all of life
I wanna surrender ... let go of the strife
I wanna flow like a river on its way back home
I wanna fly like an eagle on the winds of time
I wanna swim like a fish in an ocean sublime
I wanna be a channel for The Love of God
 
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
 
Everything that gets in The Way
Has got to go ... that’s what they say
To be a partner with The Spirit of Love
Neither for nor against anything
God knows what’s best ... it’s Good He brings
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
 
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God
I’m BEIN’ a channel for The Love of God

title: Believe In Me
title2: Believe In Me I Will Never Leave You
lyrics:
Have Faith In Me I Am Always With You
Now Eternally
Love Is All That Is You
And You Are God, God Is You
You Are Me, And I Am You
Think Of Me, Think With Love
Love Is All That We Are Made Of
Focus On Me, Dont Let Your Mind Wander
Draw Strength From Me, I Am The Heart Within You
Now Eternally Love Is Flowing In You

title: Beloved Baba Help me
title2: Beloved Baba, Help me be, Your perfect devotee
lyrics:
Teach me to love all living things, and grant me sight to see,
 The Universe is one with You, all is Divinity
 There is no 'I', There is No 'You', There isn't even we
 There's only one, the holy one, of blessed Divinity
 Beloved Baba, Help me be, Your perfect devotee
 Be my food, Be my drink, Walk this life with me
 On the path to merge with You, Detachment is the Key
 When all of these, I have learned, forever will I be
 One with You, for all of time, the perfect devotee

title: Beloved Baba, Thou hast come
lyrics:
For the Celestial Light to shine
 In darkest corners of our hearts
 And fill us with Thy Love divine
 When ignorance, jealously, hate and pride
 Dissolve away into the air
 Then free at last we learn to see that
 God alone was ever there.
 So open now our sleeping eyes that
 Through these windows of the soul,
 Thy love may flow to show the way
 We all must go to reach the goal

title: Best Of All, Make Our Minds
title2: Best of all, make our minds focus on Guru Sai
lyrics:
Our Supreme Great Teacher, Sai Guru Divine [ Best of all ... ]
Nights and days, pray to be immersed in God's Love
Just so that we may be more divine each lifetime
O Lord Brahma and Lord Shiva returned as Sai
O Lord Brahma and Lord Shiva became Lord Sai [ Our Supreme ... ]

title: Bhaava Vinodini Ma Sai Jaya
title2: Bhaava Vinodini Ma Sai Jaya Jaya Ma Janani
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Janani
Prema Vilasini Ma Prana Nivasini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Janani (2)
meaning: Victory to our Divine Mother who rejoices in the devoted, heartfelt emotion of Her devotees. Glory to the Goddess who is the very basis of existence, the Cosmic Feminine Energy whose love is unconditional and ever-childlike.
raga: gowri manohari / patdeep, sumanesa ranjani / madhukauns

title: Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
You are is this Presence in my heart
 You are this Light so shining, You are this Peace so silent
 (Sai) You are the One Who sets us free
 Baba, You open up the heart
 Baba, You purify the mind
 Bhagavaan Sathya Sai Baba
 You are the reason for this life
 You are this Love so soothing, You are this Bliss so gentle
 (Sai) You are the one who sets us free

title: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai let me be your message
title2: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai let me be your message
lyrics:
The time has come, two into one, let me become Your beautiful Light
 Sathya Sai I give to You, I give to You my essence
 Now give to me, let me be free, let my eyes see Your beautiful light
 Let me become Your beautiful light
 Give to me the deepest sight
 Banish darkness with your Might
 Unify Duality
 Sathya Sai let me be free
 Let me become your beautiful light

title: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, my Lord Sathya Sai
title2: Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai, my Lord Sathya Sai
lyrics:
The light of my heart, Bhagavaan
 Creator and Preserver, blessed Mother, blessed Father
 The Light of heart, Sai Ram

title: Bhagawan Baba Lord And Protector
lyrics:
Grant Me Your Grace, Swami Show Me The Way [ Bhagawan ... ]
Mother And Father, You Are Everyting To Me [ Bhagawan ... ]
Grant That I Serve You In Everyone I See
May Your Holy Life Shine Forth Through Me (And)

title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sai Pran Sakha Bhagawan
Puttaparthipuri Bhagawan
Baba Bhakto Ke Bhagawan [ Bhagawan Bhagawan ... ]
Joota Jata Me Sab Jag Dhari
Nayan Vachan Me Premamrutha Dhari
Karacharano Me Kaivalya Dhari
Bhagawan Bhagawan
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is our friend for life. The Lord of His devotees, His speech and glance convey divine love and His hands bestow liberation.

title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhagawan [ Bhagawan Bhagawan ... ]
Aparadha Kshama Karo Sai Bhagawan
Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Ram
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala Bhakthoddhara Sai Bhagawan
meaning: We chant Your name Lord Sai, the most gracious and compassionate one who uplifts His devotees. Kindly listen to our earnest prayer and pardon us for our misdeeds.

title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Darshan Do Bhagawan
lyrics:
Allah Sai Buddha Zohrashtra
Nanak Sai Yeshu Mahavir
Sabka Malik Ek Hai Bhagawan
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai, please grant us Your Divine Vision. Bless us to realize that Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Mahavira, and Rama are all incarnations of You, O Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Bhagawan Bhagawan Patitha Pavana Ram
lyrics:
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan
Patitha Pavana Ram ( Sai )
Deena Dayalu Parama Krupalu
Raksha Karo Bhagawan
Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sai, chanting Your name purifies the downtrodden. O the ever merciful and compassionate Lord, please shower Your grace and protect us.

title: Bhagawan Bhagawan You’re The Moon
title2: Bhagawan Bhagawan You're The Moon And The Stars And The Sun (2)
lyrics:
And On The Earth In Heaven And Beyond, Shines The Kingdom Of ...
... Sri Bhagawan
Bhagawan Ram Ram Bhagawan Ram Ram, Bolo Sri Sathya ...
... Sai Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan You're The Light Within Every One
And We All Shine Bright As The Sun, In The Kingdom Of Sri Bhagawan

title: Bhagawan Krishna Namo
title2: Bhagawan Krishna Namo Bhagawan Krishna Namo
lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Patitha Palana
Ramachandra Namo [ Bhagawan Krishna ... ]
Kaalatheethaya Shirdi Roopaya Sathya Sai Namo
Antaryami Namo Sarvantaryami Namo
alt_lyrics:
Bhagawan Krishna Namo Bhagawan Krishna Namo
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Ramachandra Namo [ Bhagawan Krishna ... ]
Vishwadhara Jagat Pala Shiva Paramatma Namo
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Sathya Sai Namo
Antaryami Namo Sarvantaryami Namo
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna and to Lord Rama, who is the saviour and uplifter of the afflicted and miserable. Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai who is above and beyond time and is the very embodiment of all virtues and success. Salutations to Lord Shiva who sustains the entire creation. Salutations to the omniscient Lord.

title: Bhagawan Sai Baba Tero Naam
title2: Bhagawan Bhagawan Sai Baba Tero Naam
lyrics:
Koi Kahath Hai Allah Ho Akbar
Koi Kahath Hai Yesu Sai Shankara
Nanak Buddha Mahavir Digambara
Premavatara Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Baba Tero Naam
meaning: O Lord, O Lord, You are Sai Baba, some call you Allah, Yesu, Shankara, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavir, Digambara. The avatar of God filled with love has the name of Sai Baba.

title: Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba
title2: Bhagawan, Sri Sathya Sai Baba Bhagawan, Kali Yuga Avatar ...
lyrics:
... Bhagawan Divine Love Of My Heart, Come To Me
Hey Ghana Shyam Hey Sai Ram Chant The Names Of The Lord
Sai Hold Me In Love, Lift Me Above, Bring Me Home To Thee
Bhagawan, Sai Ram, Come To Me My Lord
Hey Sita Ram, Hey Radhey Shyam, Chant The Names Of The Lord
Swami Fill Me With Peace, Grant Me Release, Make Me One With Thee
Bhagawan, Sai Ram, Be With Me My Lord

title: Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai, Poorna Avatar
title2: Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai -- Poorna Avatar
lyrics:
Helping us awaken to the truth that we are
 God is all-surrounding, in every heart He dwells
 As Sathya Sai He comes to us, our darkness He dispels
 Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai -- Poorna Avatar
 I Am You and You are I -- I and You are one
 This truth is lived and spoken to us by our Bhagawan
 Sai Natha Gurudeva, Parameshwara (3x)

title: Bhagawan Take Our Love
title2: Bhagawan, Take Our Love, Let It Flow To Thee
lyrics:
Take Our Hands Let Them Do Thy Work Constantly
Take Our Souls Let Them Merge In Thy Holy Light
Take Our Minds, Make Them Pure Perfect In Thy Sight
May Our Thoughts, Born Of Thee, Guided From Above
Make Us All, Bhagawan, Instruments Of Love

title: Bhagawan, may we awaken to Thee
title2: Bhagawan, may we awaken to Thee, O Love Divine
lyrics:
The heart does not live for this world, it lives for Love
 So Bhagawan may we awaken to Thee, O Love Divine
 Bhagawan, what can we do on our own? Thy will alone is done
 So Bhagawan, if we surrender to Thee, then our awakening comes
 Our mind have wandered so long without peace
 And peace will only come when we rest in Sai
 Precious Love from Sathya Sai
 Let us grow in this Love Divine

title: Bhagawan, You love us so
lyrics:
Much more than we can ever really know
 Bhagawan, You're with us here and now
 To this wondrous Presence let us bow
 Sathya Sai is calling us today
 To live as God, and Love is the Way (2)

title: Bhairavi Ambe Bhavani
lyrics:
Jagadambe Ma Jagat Janani [ Amba Bhairavi ... ]
Narayani Patitha Pavani
Parthi Purandari Sai Janani
meaning: Glory be to Lord Sai of Puttaparthi, the Mother Goddess, who is the source, support and mother of the Universe. She is the savior of the fallen.

title: Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Gopalam
lyrics:
Paramanandam Shyama Bhajo
Nithyanandam Brahmanandam
Satchidanandam Shyama Bhajo
Prema Swaroopam Deena Dayalam
Poorna Avataram Sai Bhajo
meaning: Oh Eternally blissful Lord Shyam, we sing and dwell on Your divine names of Govinda and Gopala. You are the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. You are the embodiment of love and compassion. We adore You as the complete incarnation Sai.

title: Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam
lyrics:
Govindam Bhajarey Manasa
Patitha Pavana Naama Partheesha Rama
Satatam Bhaja Bhajarey Manasa
meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Govinda, Partheesha Rama incessantly, which redeems the down trodden.

title: Bhaja Mana Dasharatha Baalam
lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sita Manasa Lolam [ Bhaja Mana ... ]
Bhaja Mana Megha Shyamala Ramam
Bhaja Mana Pavana Taraka Naamam
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha. Chant the Holy name which delights the mind of Sita. Chant the name of Rama whose complexion is like the dark cloud and whose name when chanted protects us.

title: Bhaja Mana Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Gopala [ Bhaja Mana Govinda ... ]
Govinda Bolo Hari Gopala Bolo (2)
Govinda Gopala Gopala
meaning: O Mind, worship and chant the name of Govinda and Gopala (names of Lord Krishna).

title: Bhaja Mana Krishna Gopal
lyrics:
Bhaja Krishna Gopal Bhajo Manarey [ Bhaja Mana ... ]
Yadu Nanda Gopal Bhajorey
Mukunda Gopal Bhajorey
Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhaja Govindam Bhajarey (2)
meaning: O Mind, worship the name of Lord Krishna and Gopala. The son of Yadu dynasty bestows liberation to devotees. Chant the name Govinda.

title: Bhaja Mana Narayana Narayana Narayana
lyrics:
Shirdi Narayana Narayana Narayana
Parthi Narayana Narayana Narayana [ Bhaja Mana ... ]
Lakshmi Narayana Narayana Narayana
Badri Narayana Narayana Narayana
meaning: O mind, worship the Lord who is known by many names such as Narayana, Lakshmi Narayana, Badri Narayana. Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala
title2: Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
lyrics:
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala [ Bhaja Mana Panduranga ... ]
Bhaja Mana Panduranga Vittala Jai Vittala
Purandara Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala
meaning: Oh Mind! Worship Lord Panduranga Vittala, Lord Purandara Vittala. Victory to Vittala.

title: Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopala [ Bhaja Mana Radhey ... ]
Nanda Kishora Natavara Lala (2)
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
meaning: O mind, worship Lord Krishna, the beautiful one with His flute, son of Nanda. He resides in Parthi as Lord Sai Gopala.

title: Bhaja Mana Raghava Rama Hey
title2: Bhaja Mana Raghava Rama Hey Bhaja Mana Raghava Rama (Rama)
lyrics:
Hey Rama Hey Rama Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Bhaja Mana Madhava Krishna Hey Bhaja Mana Madhava Krishna (Krishna)
Hey Krishna Hey Krishna Bhaja Mana Sai Shyam
Bhaja Mana Sundara Baba Hey Bhaja Mana Sundara Baba (Baba)
Hey Baba Hey Baba Bhaja Mana Sai Naam
meaning: O mind, chant the names of Rama, Krishna, and our beautiful Lord, Sai Baba.

title: Bhaja Mana Ram
title2: Bhaja Mana Ram Bhaja Mana Ram
lyrics:
Panduranga Sri Ranga Bhaja Mana Ram
Bhaja Mana Madhava Bhaja Mana Keshava
Bhaja Mana Yadava Bhaja Mana Ram [ Panduranga Sri ... ]
Bhaja Mana Mukunda Bhaja Mana Govinda
Bhaja Mana Ananda Bhaja Mana Ram [ Panduranga Sri ... ]
meaning: Worship and chant the Holy names Ram, Panduranga, Madhava, Keshava, Mukunda, Govinda.

title: Bhaja Mana Ramam Sri Ramam
lyrics:
Shyamala Komala Nayanabhi Ramam [ Bhaja Mana ... ]
Bharata Lakshmana Pramudita Ramam
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ramam
Pankaja Lochana Prabhu Sita (Sai) Ramam
meaning: O Mind, chant the Holy name of Lord Rama, the one with soft, beautiful eyes, the one who was the source of joy for His brothers Bharata and Lakshmana and the one who was served by Hanuman. Glory to the lotus-eyed one, the consort of Mother Sita. Glory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Bhaja Mana Sai Gopalam
lyrics:
Bhaja Bhaja Goparipalam Varam [ Bhaja Mana Sai ... ]
Bhaja Mana Gopi Manasa Chandram
Bhaja Bhaja Brindavana Sancharam [ Bhaja Mana Sai ... ]
Bhaja Mana Gaana Kala Priya Devam
Bhaja Bhaja Partheeshwara Sayeesham
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Lord Gopala (Krishna) who fosters the cowherd, who grants boons and who delights the mind of the Gopis. Chant the name of the one who moves about in Brindavan and who loves art and music. He is none other than the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai.

title: Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
lyrics:
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari [ Bhaja Mana Shyama ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhara Naagara Giridhara Naagara [ Meera Ke ... ]
Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
meaning: O Mind, chant the name of Lord Krishna, the beautiful, dark-complexioned Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain with His little finger, who adorns a crown of peacock feathers and is draped in yellow silk. Glory to the one who plays the Divine Flute and to the Lord of Meera.

title: Bhaja Mana Shyama Sundara Giridhari
lyrics:
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Govardhana Dhara Shyama (Sai) Murari
meaning: O Mind, chant the name of Lord Krishna, the beautiful, dark-complexioned Lord who lifted the Govardhana mountain with His little finger, who adorns a crown of peacock feathers and is draped in yellow silk. So sweet and enchanting is Thy form and name. Glory to the one who plays the Divine Flute and who is the Lord of Meera.

title: Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Sri Raghu Rama Sai Ram [ Bhaja Mana Sita ... ]
Bhajarey Manasa Bhaja Sai Ram
Bhajo Bhajo Parthi Baba Naam (Bhajo)
meaning: O mind, meditate and sing the glory of Mother Sita and Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty. O mind, chant incessantly the name of Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Bhaja Mana Sita Rama Harey
lyrics:
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Harey [ Bhaja Mana Sita Rama ... ]
Bhaja Mana Sai Rama Harey
Bhaja Mana Sai Krishna Harey
meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the name of Sita Ram, Radhey Shyam, Sai Ram and Sai Krishna, which gives immense happiness.

title: Bhaja Manuva Bhaja Manuva Govinda
title2: Bhaja Manuva Bhaja Manuva Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
Ramaya Narayana
Krishnaya Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana
Sai Govinda (Gopala) Narayana
meaning: Oh mind! Chant the divine name of Gopala, Sai Govinda, Rama & Krishna - forms of Narayana.

title: Bhaja Moha Priya Sudha Parama
title2: Bhaja Moha Priya Sudha Parama Pavitra Parthi Pureesha
lyrics:
(Hey) Sada Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shiva Shiva Sayeesha [ Bhaja Moha ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Mahesha
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Digambaresha
(Hey) Shanthakara Saguna Prasanna Shiva Shiva Sayeesha
meaning: Let the praises flow passionately to Sai Shiva, the Lord of Puttaparthi, who is the supremely sacred one. Always without blemishes, Lord Sai Shiva is the remover of fear and ignorance in this world. He dances rhythmically to the beat of the drum. Lord Sai Shiva is the embodiment of peace, happiness, and all the good qualities in this world.

title: Bhaja Ramam Bhaja Ramam
lyrics:
Bhajorey Manasa Bhaja Ramam [ Bhaja Ramam ... ]
Kalyana Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Kodanda Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pattabhi Ramam Bhaja Ramam
Pavana (Taraka) Naamam Bhaja Ramam
meaning: O Mind, chant the name of Lord Rama, the one who bestows welfare, who wields the Kodanda bow and the one who was the coronated as the emperor. Chant the sacred name of Lord Rama that liberates us from the cycle of birth and death.

title: Bhaja Ranga Harey Vittala
lyrics:
Panduranga Harey Vittala
Sai Ranga Harey Panduranga Harey
Bhaja Rakumayi Ranga Vittala [ Panduranga Harey ... ]
meaning: Chant the Holy name of Lord Vittala. Glory to Lord Panduranga, the consort of Rakumayi. Sing the glory of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Vittala.

title: Bhaja Sai Natham Bhaja Sai
title2: Bhaja Sai Natham Bhaja Sai Natham Sai Natham Bhajarey Manasa
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesham Prashanthi Nilayam Parama Pavitram Paramatma Roopam
Shirdi Nivasam Shiva Sayeesham
Shantha Swabhavam Shankara Roopam [ Bhaja Sai Natham ... ]
Chinmayanandam Chithravathi Teeram Chitha Pariharam Chinni Sai Natham
Neela Mandaram Divya Swabhavam 
Dattatreyam Deiva Swaroopam [ Bhaja Sai Natham ... ]
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Charanam Samba Shivoham Sarthaka Naamam
Jyothi Swaroopam Preeti Swabhavam Parthi Nivasam Paapa Vinasham
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Lord Sai who is the sacred form of supreme Lord residing at Prashanthi Nilayam. He resides in Shirdi as Shiva Sai. He is the embodiment of peace, auspiciousness and bliss, dwelling at the shores of Chitravathi river sanctifying us. He is Lord Dattatreya. His form is Truth. He is the Divine Preceptor under whose lotus feet let us reside. His form is effulgent, lovable and which destroys sins.

title: Bhaja Sai Natham Devadi Devam
lyrics:
Devadi Devam Shritha Jana Palam [ Bhaja Sai ... ]
Parama Pavitram Pavana Roopam
Mangala Dayaka Murthy Swaroopam
Janana Marana Vimochaka Roopam
Sri Sai Sai Natham Ananda Roopam
Sathya Sai Natham Sadananda Roopam
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai who is the God of gods protecting His devotees. His form is highly sacred and divine which grants auspiciousness. His blissful form redeems one from the cycle of birth and death.

title: Bhaja Sri Krishnam
title2: Bhaja Sri Krishnam Bhaja Sri Krishnam
lyrics:
Sri Krishnam Bhaja Paramodharam
Vasudeva Sutham Devaki Vinutam
Naga Alankruta Yamuna Salilam
Gaana Vilolam Yadu Kula Balam
Govardhanadhara Tulasi Malam
meaning: Chant the name of Sai Krishna, the supreme redeemer, the son of Devaki and Vasudeva. He danced on the head of Kalinga serpent at Yamuna river playing the enchanting flute. He is the star of Yadu dynasty who lifted the Govardhana mountain and who is adorned with the garland of Tulasi.

title: Bhajagovindham Bhajagovindham
lyrics:
Bhaja Govindam Hare Hare
Bhaja Govindam Bala Mukundam
Paramanandam Hare Hare
Sri Ram Ram Jaya Raghu Rama
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Rama
Hari Narayana Bhaja Narayana
Sai Narayana Hare Hare
Sathya Narayana Hare Hare
meaning: Chant incessantly the names of Govinda, Hari, Mukunda, Rama, Narayana and Sai which will give us supreme bliss.

title: Bhajan Karo Manuva Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Govinda Murari Gopala Murari [ Bhajan Karo ... ]
Mathura Natha Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Hey Giridhari (2)
meaning: O mind, worship Lord Krishna, known by many names - Govinda, Murari, Gopala, the Lord of Mathura, Giridhari, the Lord of Radha.

title: Bhajana Sagara Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Sharana Sharana Sai Naama 
Akhila Nivasa Sai Naama Madhura
Prema Mandira Sai Naama Keerthana
Paramananda Brahmananda 
Sharana Sharana Sai Naama (2)
meaning: The name of Lord Sathya Sai itself gives rise to an entire ocean of Bhajans. In the refuge of that Name, we surrender ourselves completely. O Lord Sai, Your name dwells in everything in this universe, bringing sweetness to all. In the temple of love, the music of Your name resounds, evoking supreme joy, bliss, and happiness. We surrender to the one with the Holy Name, Lord Sai.

title: Bhajarey Guru Natham Manasa Bhajorey
title2: Bhajarey Guru Natham Manasa Bhajorey Sai Natham
lyrics:
Bhajo Sayeesham Parthi Nivasam
Bhajo Brindavana Gokula Baalam
meaning: Oh Mind worship Guru Natham who is also Sai Natham the supreme Lord of Parthi. Chant the name of Gokulabala of Brindavan.

title: Bhajarey Rama Charan Satatam Bhajarey
title2: Bhajarey Rama Charan Satatam Bhajarey Rama Charan
lyrics:
Bhajarey Janaki Jeevana Ramam
Bhajarey Ramam Bhadrachala Ramam
Bhajarey Pavana Taraka Naamam
Bhajarey Sri Rama Ramethi Ramam
meaning: Constantly chant and pray to the Lotus feet of Lord Rama. Pray to the Lord of Janaki, Lord Rama, the resident of Bhadrachala. Chant the sacred and pious name of Lord Rama.

title: Bhajo Badri Narayanam
lyrics:
Bhajo Parthi Narayanam
Bhajo Shirdi Narayanam
Bhajo Sai Narayanam
Sathya Sai Narayanam
meaning: Chant the divine names of Badri Narayana, Parthi Narayana, Shirdi Narayana, Sai Narayana and Sathya Sai Narayana.

title: Bhajo Bhajo Ram Sathya Sai
title2: Bhajo Bhajo Ram Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Shyam Sai Ghana Shyam [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Kali Yug Ke Avatar
Jagadodhara Sai Bhagawan
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram ( Sai Ram )
meaning: Worship Lord Sai Bhagawan, who has incarnated in the Kali Age to uplift humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.

title: Bhajo Bhajo Sita Ram
lyrics:
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Tanaya Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram [ Sita Ram ... ]
meaning: Worship Lord Sita Ram, Lord Rama the son of Dasharatha, Lord Rama who killed the ten headed Ravana, uplifted humanity and lead the fallen to deliverance.

title: Bhajo Bhajo Vittala Panduranga Vittala
lyrics:
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajo Mana Vittala [ Bhajo Bhajo ... ]
Partheeshwara Sai Natha Vittala
Parameshwara Sathya Sai Vittala
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Sai Vittala
meaning: Worship Lord Vittala of Pandharpur, Sai Vittala of Parthi who is the supreme Lord of the Universe and Lord of Rakumayi.

title: Bhajo Gananayaka Gajavadana
lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Shubha Charana [ Bhajo Gananayaka ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Shiva Nandana
Ananda Dayaka Chitha Chandana
Buddhi Pradayaka Jaga Vandana
meaning: Worship the elephant-faced Lord Ganesh, son of Lord Shiva. He confers auspiciousness, liberation, bliss and intelligence.

title: Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Sita Ram
title2: Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Bhajo Radhey Radhey Shyam Bhajo
Murali Manohara Sai Ghana Shyam
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Brahma Vishnu Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sathya Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Worship Lord Krishna, Lord Sai, Lord Ram, the Lord of Sita. O Lord Sai, O the enchanting Flutist, You are father, mother, preceptor, Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva (Lord of Lords).

title: Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo Murali
title2: Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo Murali Gopala Bhajo
lyrics:
Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo (Radhey) (2)
Giridhara Gopala Mathura Natha
Kamala Nayana Hey Kaivalya Dhama [ Nanda Ke ... ]
meaning: Worship the dark-hued Lord Krishna, the enchanting Divine Flute Player, the son of Nanda. Worship the lotus-eyed Lord who lifted the mountain and who is the Lord of Mathura.

title: Bhajo Ghana Shyama Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Nayanabhi Ram Natavara Shyam [ Bhajo Ghana ]
Mukunda Madhava Murahara Shyam
Govinda Gopala Giridhara Shyam
Kunja Vihari Sundara Shyam
Sai Murari Sundara Shyam
meaning: Worship Ghana Shyam, Radhey Shyam, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Giridhara, Sai Murari.

title: Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam Nirantara
title2: Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam Nirantara Bhajo Madhura Hari Naam
lyrics:
Sarala Bhaav Se Sai Bhajo
Madhura Bhaav Se Baba Bhajo
Hari Hi Sukh Hai Hari Hi Shanthi
Hari Prashanthi Nivasi Ram
meaning: Worship and recite forever the enchanting and sweet name of Lord Hari. There is no happiness and peace without chanting the sweet name of the Lord Sai, the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, the abode of everlasting peace.

title: Bhajo Man Bhajo Rama Ram
lyrics:
Sri Ram Sri Rama Ram 
Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram [ Bhajo Man Bhajo ... ]
Bhajo Bhajo Man Baba Naam
Bhajo Bhajo Man Sai Naam
Rama Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
meaning: O mind, chant the name of the Lord Rama and Lord Sai.

title: Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana
title2: Bhajo Mana Ram Bhajo Mana Ram
lyrics:
Bhajorey Sai Ram Ram Ram
Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
Mayi Sita Ram Ram Ram
meaning: O Mind! Chant the auspiciousness name of Lord Ram and Lord Sai Ram. Worship Lord Ram, the Lord of Mother Sita.

title: Bhajo Manuva Bhajo Manuva Govinda
title2: Bhajo Manuva Bhajo Manuva Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
Sai Gopala Narayana [ Bhajo Manuva ... ]
Ramaya Narayana
Krishnaya Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana [ Sai Gopala ... ]
meaning: O mind, chant the different names of lord Sai: Govinda, Narayana, Rama and Krishna.

title: Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo Shyama
title2: Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo Shyama Gopal
lyrics:
Shyama Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal [ Bhajo Radhey ... ]
Keshava Narahari Shyama Gopal
Madhava Murahara Murali Gopal
meaning: Worship by chanting the many names of the Lord Krishna - Govinda, Gopala, Murahara, Shyama, Keshava and Madhava.

title: Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Radhey Shyam
title2: Bhajo Sita Ram Bhajo Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram [ Bhajo Sita Ram ... ]
Keshava Madhava Radha Vallabha
Varada Narayana Nayanabhi Ram [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
meaning: Worship the Lord of Sita, Lord Rama. Worship the Lord of Radha, Lord Shyama. Chant the names of the Lord Govinda, Gopala, Sai, Keshava, Madhava and Narayana who confers boons.

title: Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sai Sab Ka Hai Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Bhai ... ]
Ram Hi Sai Krishna Hi Sai
Yuga Avatara Narayana Sai [ Sai Sab Ka ... ]
meaning: Let us chant the name Sai Ram who is the Lord of all. He is Lord Rama, Lord Krishna and Lord Narayana who has descended in the Kali Yuga.

title: Bhajorey Bhai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureesha Sai Ram [ Bhajorey Bhai ... ]
Dwarakamayi Sai Ram
Sada Sukha Dayi Sai Ram
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureesha Sai Ram
meaning: Worship Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi and Shirdi where He lived in Dwarakamayi. He is always granting happiness to all.

title: Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Durga Bhavani
lyrics:
Mangala Kaarini Sai Janani [ Bhajorey Bhajo ... ]
Mahishasura Mardhini Bhavani
Daya Sagari Hey Jagat Janani
meaning: Always worship the Mother of the Universe, Durga (Parvathi), the bestower of auspiciosness. She is the slayer of the demon Mahishasura. O Mother of the Universe, You are the ocean of mercy.

title: Bhajorey Bhajo Sai Harey Ram
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram
Madhava Mohana Sai Harey Ram (Hey) [ Bhajorey Bhajo ... ]
Sri Madhusudhana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Bharey Premanand Se Bolo Ram Harey Ram
Govinda Gopala Sai Harey Ram [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
meaning: Chant the holy name and sing the glory of Lord Sai, Govinda, Gopala, Madhava and Madhusudhana (names of Lord Krishna). O Lord, You remove the fear of birth and death. Chant the names of the Lord filled with love and bliss.

title: Bhajorey Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
lyrics:
Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Vighnesham Bhajorey
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Shiva Nandanam Bhajorey Gananatham Bhajorey
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesha, the son of Shiva who bestows intellect, destroys sins and removes obstacles, protects from fear and grants joy.

title: Bhajorey Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Sri Guru Charanam Pranamamyaham
Sadguru Charanam Pranamamyaham [ Bhajorey ... ]
Sri Guru Charanam Sada Smarami
Sadguru Charanam Sada Bhajami
Sai Guru Charanam Sada Namami [ Sri Guru ... ]
meaning: I worship and bow at the lotus feet of Sai Sadguru and always repeat His name mentally.

title: Bhajorey Manasa Gananatham
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayakam [ Bhajorey Manasa ... ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Nashaka Vinayakam
meaning: O mind! adore Ganapathi (elephant headed god) who is leaderless, who bestows intellect, destroys the fear of worldly miseries.

title: Bhajorey Manasa Guru Charanam
title2: Bhajorey Manasa Guru Charanam, Guru Charanam, Sadguru Charanam
lyrics:
Bhajo Bhajo Guru, Bhajo Bhajo Guru, Bhajo Bhajo Guru Charanam (Manasa)
Brahmananda Guru Charanam 
Premananda Guru Charanam
(Sathya) Sai Deva Guru Charanam [ Bhajo Bhajo Guru ... ]
meaning: O mind, sing the glories of the Lotus Feet of the Preceptor that bestow the supreme Bliss of Divine Love. Contemplate and sing the glories of the Lotus Feet of Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Bhajorey Manasa Sai Charanam
lyrics:
Pavana Taraka Sai Charanam
Nirmala Nishchala Nirupama Charanam
Adi Anantha Sai Charanam
Bhakthi Mukthi Pradayaka Charanam
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai and contemplate on Sai's Feet that save and protect the afflicted. The incomparable, pure, unchanging and the eternal Feet of Sai endow one with devotion and help attain liberation.

title: Bhajorey Manasa Sai Ram
lyrics:
Parthipuri Ke Sai Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Manasa ... ]
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam
Yesu Buddha Bhi Terey Naam
Shirdi (Parthi) Puri Ke Sai Bhagawan
meaning: O mind, worship and chant the name of Sai, the Lord of Parthi and Shirdi. Eshwar, Allah, Yesu, Buddha are all His names.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Baba Naam
lyrics:
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Prema Pradayaka Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Prema Pradayaka ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Bhagawan
meaning: O Mind! Worship and chant the name of Lord Sai Baba, the beloved Lord of devotees and the Lord of Parthi. He always showers love on all.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Bhajo Hari Naam
lyrics:
Bhajo Ghana Shyam Naam Bhajo Radhey Shyam [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Bolo Sai Raja Ram
Govinda Gopala Bolo Bhajo Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Hari, the dark-complexioned Lord Krishna (known by many names such as Govinda and Gopala), Lord Rama and Lord Sai.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Sadguru Deva
lyrics:
Parama Krupalu Sai Mahadeva [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Nis Din Dhyan Karoon Mein Tera
Janam Janam Ka Mitey Andhera
Parabrahma Parameshwara Roopa (Deva) [ Parama Krupalu ... ]
meaning: O Mind, chant and worship Lord Sai who is the supreme God and preceptor. O Lord, from the day I started meditating on You, the ignorance accumulated from several births is vanished. You are the Supreme God.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Sai Gopala Radhey Nandalala [ Bhajorey ... ]
Akhileshwara Ko Abhinandana Hai
Sai Nath Morey Tan Man Dhan Hai
meaning: O mind, adore Lord Gopala (Krishna) who is dearest to Radha and the son of Nanda. O Lord Krishna, You are none other than Lord Sai, the Supreme Lord of the Universe. Salutation unto You. My body, mind and wealth is entirely Yours.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Naamam
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasam Pankaja Netram [ Bhajorey ... ]
Prema Swaroopam Sayeeshwaram
Hrudaya Nivasam Sayeeshwaram
Shirdi Pureesham Sayeeshwaram
Poornavataram Sayeeshwaram (Pari)
meaning: Oh mind! chant the divine name Sai having eyes like lotus residing in Parthi. He is Sayeeshwara, the embodiment of love reveling in our hearts and resident of Shirdi. He has descended in Parthi with full power of Godhead.

title: Bhajorey Manuva Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bhaktha Janon Ke Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
Paapa Vinashaka Sai Naam
Pavana Naam Sai Naam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Pavana Naam ... ]
Shirdi Parthi Shiva Naam Hari Naam
meaning: Oh mind! Chant the name Sai Ram the Supreme God dear to His devotees. The sacred name Sai Ram destroys sins of devotees and elevates them to divinity. Sai is verily Shiva and Hari of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Bhajorey Sada Bhajo Rama Krishna
title2: Bhajorey Sada Bhajo Rama Krishna Govinda
lyrics:
Bhajo Hari Deena Bandhu Krishna Rama Govinda
Bhajorey Anatha Natha Sai Rama Govinda [ Bhajo Hari ... ]
meaning: Always chant the name of Lord Rama, Krishna Govinda and Sai Ram. The Lord's name support and shelter the meek and is the friend of the weak.

title: Bhajorey Sada Sai Naamam
lyrics:
Pavana Naamam Partheeshwara Naamam
Ishta Pradayaka Naamam
Mruthyu Sanjeevana Naamam
Sathya Sayeeshwara Naamam (Bhajorey)
meaning: Chant incessantly the name of Sai, the Lord of Parthi who sanctifies us and whose name works as medicine to cross the cycle of birth the death. Chant the name Sathya Sayeeshwara.

title: Bhajorey Sadguru Sai Charanam
lyrics:
Pavana Charanam Padmadala Charanam [ Bhajorey Sadguru ... ]
Mukthi Dayaka Mohana Charanam
Paapa Vinashaka Partheesha Charanam
meaning: O Mind, worship the Lotus Feet of Divine Preceptor Sai, the sacred and beautiful Feet of Lord Sai, which takes you to liberation and destroys all sins.

title: Bhaktha Jana Lola Sharanam Ayyappa
lyrics:
Mohini Bala Sharanam Ayyappa [ Bhaktha Jana ]
Pampa Teera Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Parthi Puri Vasa Sharanam Ayyappa
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa
meaning: I surrender to you Ayyappa the beloved of devotees and son of Mohini dwelling at shores of Pampa river. You are also Sai Baba of Parthi. O lord, I bow to you.

title: Bhaktha Vatsala Tero Naam O
title2: Bhaktha Vatsala Tero Naam O Sai
lyrics:
Dukha Bhanjana Tero Naam O Sai
Tum Sangh Baandhi Prem Ki Dori
Sumiran Karoon Tero Naam O Sai
Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Partheeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: O Sai, the Lord of Parthi, we chant Your name, which is loved by Your devotees as it destroys their miseries. You bind everything in this universe by the cord of love. We chant Your name mentally all the time. You are uplifter of downtrodden and Your devotees sing Your praise.

title: Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara
lyrics:
Hum Ne Pukara Baba Sab Ne Pukara
Deejo Deejo Hum Ko Sahara
Aana Hi Padega Baba Aana Hi Padega
Shirdi Se Aao Chahey Parthi Se Aao
Mathura Se Aao Ya Ayodhya Se Aao
Mecca Se Aao Ya Madina Se Aao
O Merey Baba (Maulah) O Merey Sai Tum Kahin Se Bhi Aao [ Aana Hi Padega ... ]
meaning: O Lord Baba, I personally appeal and all devotees also appeal to You earnestly. Please grant us solace. You must come without fail from wherever You are - from Shirdi, Parthi, Mathura, Ayodhya, Mecca or Madina.

title: Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara Aana
title2: Bhakthon Ne Hai Aaj Pukara Aana Hoga Tumhey
lyrics:
Sai Baba Sai Baba Sai Darsha Dikhao Hamey
Mata Pitha Tum Sai Hamarey
Bandhu Sakha Tum Sai Hamarey
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo Jeevan Ke Rakhwale 
Jeevan Daata Jeevan Taaro Ab To Jeevan Haarey [ Sai Baba Sai Baba Sai ... ]
 
Sai Baba Darsha Dikhao (5)
meaning: O Lord Sai, the devotees have called out to You. You must come to us. O Lord, please show us Your beautiful form. You are our mother, father, and nearest friend. Take us across the ocean of life. You are the giver of life.

title: Bhasma Bhooshitanga Sai Chandrashekara
lyrics:
Phaala Netra Shooladhari Sai Shankara [ Bhasma Bhooshitanga ... ]
Saama Gaana Priyakara Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shambho Natana Shekara
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sathya Sai Shankara
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva who is besmeared with sacred ash, who is adorned with the moon on His head, who has a third eye on His forehead and who holds the Trident. O liker of music of the Sama Veda, O King among the dancers, we bow down to You, Sai Shankara, the resident of Parthi.

title: Bhasma Vibhushitha Bhavani Shankara
lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Bhola Shankara
Hara Hara Shankara Samba Shiva
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shiva
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
meaning: Worship Lord Shankara, the Lord of Bhavani(Parvathi), who has sacred ashes smeared all over the body. The easy-to-please Lord Shankara destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death. Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya'.

title: Bhasmabhisheka Maheshwara
lyrics:
Bhasma Vibhushitha Sundara
Hara Om Hara Om Haalaahala Dhara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Hey Shiva Shankara
Natavara Shashi Dhara Gowri Manohara
Chandrashekara Jatadhara
meaning: Worship the Lord Maheshwara who is bathed and smeared with sacred ashes all over the body looking beautiful. Oh Shiva Shankara you drank Haalaa-hala (poison) to save troubled world. You are the consort of Gowri who danced decorating with moon on head with huge flock of hair.

title: Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Paapa Nikhandana
lyrics:
Sai Tero Naam
Sai Pavana Naam
Puttaparthi Pavana Triveni
Sai Darsha Snan
Sai Pavana Naam
Bhajana Keertana Naama Smarana
Sai Pavana Naam
Pranava Swaroopa Sai Narayana
Sai Ko Pehchaan
Sai Pavana Naam
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your sacred name when chanted redeems one from fear of worldly miseries and destroys the sins. Your abode Puttaparthi is sacred. Your darshan, worship, bhajan everything is sacred. O Lord Sai Narayana, You are the embodiment of the primordial sound Om (Pranava). Let it be known that Sai is the Supreme Lord.

title: Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shesha Shayana
title2: Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Shesha Shayana Hari
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Narayana
Rajeeva Lochana Adi Sanathana
Bandha Vimochana Narayana
Padmanabha Prabhu Kamala Manohara
Vaikuntapathey Narayana (2) [ Pranava Swaroopa ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Hari (Narayana), the one reclining on the Celestial Serpent Sesha and the one who removes the fear of worldly sorrows. O Lord, You are the embodiment of the Primordial sound (Om), the one having eyes resembling a lotus, one who is eternal from the beginning, one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death. You are the captivating Lord from whose navel rose the Lotus of Creation and Your abode is Vaikunta.

title: Bhava Bhaya Harana Vanditha Charana
lyrics:
Jaya Radha Jaya Madhava (Shourie)
Mangala Charana Kalimala Dahana
Narayana Keshava (Sai) [ Jaya Radha ... ]
meaning: O Lord, we worship Your Holy Feet that frees us from the continuous cycle of birth and death. Glory to Radha, victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of the demon Madhu, and the sustainer of the Universe. Thy Holy Feet dispels the sins of the Kali age. Glory to Lord Narayana, the eternal guardian and to Keshava, the slayer of demon Kesi.

title: Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara
lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Prabho Hey Nataraj
Tandaveshwara Hey Nataraj
Nacho Hey Nataraj Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj (3)
meaning: Dance, dance Nataraja also Shankara the consort of Girija (Parvathi) who removes fear and frees one from cycle of birth and death. Also hey, Nataraja you are cosmic dancer during creation.

title: Bhava Nasha Puttaparthi Pureesha
lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankara Hey Jagadeesha [ Bhava Nasha ... ]
Mruthyunjaya Hima Shaila Girisha
Mohanakara Mana Moha Vinasha
Jyothi Prakasha Sathya Sayeesha
Jaya Shiva Shankara Hey Paramesha
meaning: Glory to Thee, Lord Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, You destroy the cycle of birth and death. Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of the Universe. You are the conqueror of Death and You reside on the snow-clad mountain. O enchanting one, You are the remover of the mind's attachment. O Sathya Sai, You are full of effulgence and luster.

title: Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
lyrics:
Sai Nath Bhagawan [ Bhava Sagar ... ]
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahavira
Sab Naamon Ki Ek Hai Mahima
Sarva Dharma Ke Palanhaarey [ Sai Nath Bhagawan ]
meaning: Oh Sainath Bhagawan! Help me to cross the ocean of continuous passage of life and death. You are Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavira - all these names have the same magnitude of power. You are the sustainer of all the different faiths.

title: Bhavani Amba Shiva Ranjani
lyrics:
Sai Maheshwari Vighna Vinashini [ Bhavani Amba ... ]
Lalita Madhavi Jai Sri Ranjani
Mangala Kaarini Lakshmi Narayani
Naada Swaroopini Veena Vadini
Devi Saraswathi Vidya Dayini
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai who is verily Mother Parvathi, the delight of Lord Shiva and the Mother of creation who removes all obstacles, Mother Lakshmi, the one who grants good fortune and Mother Saraswathi, the very embodiment of sound (music), the one who plays the Veena and the one who bestows knowledge.

title: Bhavani Nandana Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Sai
meaning: O young Lord Ganesh, the elephant-headed son of Mother Bhavani (Parvathi), please protect us, O Lord, the embodiment of the primordial sound Om (Pranava). You are verily Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Bhavatharini Partheeshwari
lyrics:
Sukha Dayini Sayeeshwari [ Bhavatharini ... ]
Bandha Mochani Prashanthi Eshwari
Janani Devi Leela Vinodini
Shiva Vama Bhage Sayeeshwari
Charanam Sharanam Samrajya Dayini
meaning: O Mother Sai, residing in Parthi, You help us cross the worldly existence. O Sai Mother, You grant us all the pleasures and comfort. O Mother, Goddess of Parthi, You free us from bondage and bestow joy upon us. O Eshwari, the consort of Lord Shiva and the one capable of bestowing kingdom, we surrender at Your feet.

title: Bhola Bhandari Baba
title2: Bhola Bhandari Baba Shiva Shiva Shiva Sai Baba
lyrics:
Anatha Rakshaka Deena Dayala Patitha Pavana Sai Baba [ Bhola Bhandari ... ]
Yogeshwara Sai Murari Yogeshwara Hey Tripurari
Nithyananda Brahmananda Premananda Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, You are the Lord who can be pleased easily, You are the treasure of mercy and prosperity, You are the supporter of the orphans, protector and the refuge to the destitute and You uplift them and make them sacred. O Lord of the Yogis, O Sai Murari, Tripurari, the destroyer of three worlds, You are the embodiment of eternal, supreme bliss and love.

title: Bhola Jai Bhola Jai
title2: Bhola Jai Bhola Jai Sathya Sai Ki Jai Bolo Sathya Sai Ki Jai
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Ki Jai Pavana Purusha Jai Bolo Narayana Ki Jai [ Bhola Jai ... ]
Sanathana Dharma Uddharaka Sai
Apad Bandhava Govinda Sai
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Sai
Sathya Sai Ki Jai Bolo Sathya Sai Ki Jai
meaning: Victory to Lord Sathya Sai who can be pleased easily. Victory to Rama, Krishna, Supreme Lord and Narayana. Victory to Lord Sai, the upholder of ancient Dharma (faith), the caretaker of the afflicted and the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba.

title: Bhola Nath Harey Jagadeesha
lyrics:
Shaileshwara Hara Uma Mahesha [ Bhola Nath Harey ... ]
