Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Tripurari
Shiva Gangadhara Sai Murari
Bhola Nath Bhola Nath
Sai Nath Sai Nath
meaning: Chant the name of the easy-to-please Lord of the Universe, Lord Shiva, who grants all that is asked for without any question, the Lord who resides on the mountain, the Lord of Mother Uma, the one who destroys the cycle of birth and death. The Lord of the three worlds who has the Holy river Ganga in His matted hair is verily Lord Sainath.

title: Bhola Nath Shambho Shankara
lyrics:
Sai Nath Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Bholey Shankara
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Natana Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shankara 
Bhola Maheshwara Sai Shankara
meaning: Chant the name of the easy to please Lord Shankara (Shiva), the conferrer of all prosperity. Lord Sai is the incarnate of Lord Shiva also known as Maheshwara (Greatest Lord), the destroyer of all that is transient. He is the enchanting dancer to the rhythmic beats of the Damaru (kettle-drum). He has won over death, He is the eternal one and the bestower of all auspiciousness and prosperity.

title: Bhola Shankara Bhola
lyrics:
Shaileshwara Hara Vishwambara Dhara [ Hara Bhola Shankara ... ]
Surya Chandra Pralayagni Netra Dhara
Shakthi Sahita Shiva Natana Manohara
meaning: O Lord Shankara (Shiva), the giver of prosperity, You are easily pleased. You are the one who resides on the snow-clad mountain, You pervade the entire universe. Your three eyes denote the Sun, the Moon and the Agni (the fire of deluge). You are the Enchanter who dances with His consort Shakthi (Parvathi).

title: Bhuvana Bandhava Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Tum Ho Bhagawan
Eshwar Bhi Tum Ho Allah Nanak Tum Ho
Prabhu Yesu Tum Ho Mahavir Tum Ho
Buddha Deva Tum Ho Merey Pran ( Sai ) Nath Tum Ho
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, the Lord of this Universe. O Sai, You are my mother, father, relative and friend. You are verily Lord Shiva, Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Mahavir and Buddha. You are my very life force.

title: Bhuvana Mohini Sri Varalakshmi
lyrics:
Mangala Dayini Mukthi Pradayini
Vishnu Mohini Shakthi Swaroopini
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Sai Narayani
Ananda Roopini Sowbhagya Dayini (Param)
meaning: Glory to the captivating Goddess of the Universe, Sri Varalakshmi (Goddess Lakshmi who grants boons) who bestows auspiciousness and liberation. O Mother, You are the embodiment of creative power and the consort of Vishnu. You are verily Mother Narayani dwelling on ocean of the milk who has incarnated as Mother Sai. You are the emobidment of bliss who grants goodness.

title: Bhuvana Pradeepa Tribhuvana Mohana
lyrics:
Sai Natha Bhagawan (2)
Bhaktha Janonke Tum Ho Daata
Yuga Avatar Bhagawan
Parthi Pureeshwara Prashanthi Nilaya
Dukha Bhanjana Bhagawan [ Sai Nath... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam in Puttaparthi, the one who illuminates the entire universe, the protector of the three worlds, You have incarnated in this Kali Age to eradicate the sorrows of the devotees and bestow Your Grace.

title: Bilva Stothram
lyrics:
Trinetran Cha Triyaa Yudham
Trijanma Paapa Samhaaram
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

2. Trishaakhair Bilva Patraishcha
Achidrai Komalai Shubhaih
Thava Pujaam Karishhyaami
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

3. Koti Kanyaa Mahaadaanam
Thila Parvatha Kotayaha
Kaanchanam Shailadaanena
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

4. Kashi Kshetra Nivaasam Cha
Kaala Bhairava Darshanam
Prayaage Maadhavam Drishtvaa
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

5. Induvaare Vratam Sthitvaa
Niraahaaro Maheshvaraha
Naktam Houshyaami Devesha
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

6. Raamalinga Pratishtaa Cha
Vaivaahika Krutham Thathaa
Tataakaa Nicha Sandhaanam
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

7. Akhanda Bilva Patram Cha
Aayutham Shivapoojanam
Krutham Naama Sahasrena
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

8. Umayaa Saha Devesha
Nandi Vaahana Meva Cha
Bhasmalepana Sarvaangam
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

9. Saalagrameshu Vipraanaam
Tataakam Dashakoopayo
Yagnakoti Sahasrashcha
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

10. Dantikoti Sahasreshu
Ashvamedha Shatakratau
Kotikanyaa Mahaa Dhaanam
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

11. Bilvaanaam Darshanam Punyam
Sparshanam Paapa Naashanam
Aghora Paapa Samhaaram
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

12. Sahasra Veda Paateshu
Brahmastaapanam Uchyate
Anekavrata Koteenaam
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

13. Annadaana Sahasreshu
Sahasropanayanam Tathaa
Aneka Janma Paapaani
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam

14. Bilva Stothram Idam Punyam
Yah Pateth Shiva Sannidhau
Shiva Loka Mavaapnoti
Eka Bilvam Shivaarpanam
meaning:
1. I offer one leaf of Bilva to Lord Shiva, Which has three leaves, Which is the cause of the three qualities, Which are like the three eyes of Shiva, Which is like the triad of weapons, And which destroys sins of three births.

2. I offer one leaf of Bilva to Lord Shiva, Which has three shoots, Which do not have holes, Which are good and pretty, And worship Lord Shiva.

3. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit of performing the marriage of a million maidens, a million mountains of sesame seeds.

4. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit of staying at the holy city of Kasi, and having the darshan of the Lord Kalabhairava, visiting Prayag and having darsan of Lord Madhava.

5. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit of fasting an entire night by the Devas fixed in the thought of the Almighty.

6. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit equivalent to the Ramalinga worshipped by Rama to destroy Ravana who wanted to marry (vaivahit) Sita

7. Offering a whole triad of the Bilva leaf in the worship of Shiva has the merit equal to the chanting of the 1008 names of the Lord

8. Offering a single Bilva leaf has the merit of having darshan of Shiva anointed with Sacred ash, with His wife Uma, with Nandi as his Vahana, accompanied by all the Devas

9. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit of offering a saligramam to a devotee of Lord Shiva, and is equivalent to attending a 1000 Yagnas (sacrificial rites)

10. Offering of a single Bilva leaf has the merit of equal to gifting of thousand elephants, attending 100 Ashwameda Yagnas, the merit of performing the marriage of a million maidens,

11. The sight of a single Bilva leaf provides merit Touching a Bilva leaf destroys sins The offering of a single Bilva leaf to Lord Shiva destroys immeasurable sins

12. Offering of a single Bilva leaf is equivalent to learning all the known Vedas, Staying fixed in the consciousness of the Brahman, And undertaking millions of fasts

13. Offering of a single Bilva leaf is equivalent to, Offering food to thousands of needy, Initiating thousands of children into the the knowledge of the Gayathri mantra, And destroys the sins of thousands of lifetimes

14. This sloka of Bilvashtakam carries merit on its recital in the presence of Lord Shiva. The reciter will reach the abode of Lord Shiva.

title: Bismillah Alhamdullila, La Illaha Illalah
lyrics:
Oh Seigneur, mon seul Ami ! Mon Amour, le plus fidele! (x 2)
 Tu es la, dans mon coeur, depuis toujours et pour toujours (x 2)
 Bismillah Alhamdullila, La Illaha Illalah (x 4)
meaning: [We start] In the name of God; All Glory to God and His Splendor; There is no God except God [No-one exists except him] Oh Lord, my only friend! My love, the most faithful You are there, in my heart, since always and forever [We start] In the name of God; All Glory to God and His Splendor; There is no God except God [No-one exists except him]

title: Bismillah, Bismillah
lyrics:
Erachman Erahim
Bismillah, Bismillah
Hu Allahu
We begin in the Name
Of the One who is Love
Who is Mercy, Mercy and Compassion
Mercy, Mercy, and Compassion
Shalom
De l’Amour, de la Paix, dans le Monde (4x)
meaning: Send Love and Peace to the world

title: Blessed Is The Man
title2: Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord
lyrics:
And whose trust the Lord is
Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord
And whose trust the Lord is
For he is as a tree planted by the waters
That spreads its roots by the sea
For he does not fear when heart comes near
He knows that his Lord is always here
 
Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord
And whose trust the Lord is
Blessed is the man who trusts in the Lord
And whose trust the Lord is
For his leaf shall always be green no matter the scene
And on days when there is a drought
He steps carefree forward always yielding fruit
He’s content and resting without doubt

title: Blessed Lord
title2: Blessed Lord of light beams soul I unite
lyrics:
Lay Your sacred hands upon my soul
 
Blessed Lord of light beams soul I unite
In a flash of joy we do unite
In a flash of love and joy you and I unite

title: Bodhisattva
lyrics:
Praise God, you’ve taken birth
Bodhisattva, you’ve come again
Selfless servant, you’re the Lord’s true friend.
 
Hands that heal and a heart so pure
A peace so real and a love so sure
A life of service to the One
Precious Soul you’re a shining sun. [ Bodhisattva on this earth ... ]
 
From the morning ‘till the night
Everywhere you spread your light
With each breath you live for Him
God’s own heart beats within.

Bodhisattva on this earth
Praise God, you’ve taken birth
Bodhisattva, you’ve come again
Selfless servant, you’re the Lord’s true friend (3x)

title: Bolo Baba Ki Jai Sai Baba Ki Jai
title2: Bolo Baba Ki Jai Sai Baba Ki Jai
lyrics:
O Shirdi Baba Ki Jai Parthi Baba Ki Jai [ Bolo Baba Ki ... ]
Treta Yug Mey Ram Roop Dwapar Mey Krishna Kanhaiyi
Kaliyug Mey Sai Shakthi Jad Chaitan Mey Hai Samayi
Har Avartaron Mey Roop Tera Sai Kan Kan Mey Tu Samaya
Prashanthi Vasi Sai Shankar Teri Adbhuth Maya
meaning: Victory to Thee, O Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who incarnated as Lord Rama in Treta age, Lord Krishna in Dwapara age. In this Kali age, You are the Cosmic Energy that encompasses both the animate and inanimate objects. O Lord, every incarnation is Your divine Form. You are the Creator of this wonderful Illusion and You pervade every atom. Prashanthi Nilayam is Your divine abode.

title: Bolo Bolo Jai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jai Bolo Bolo Sai Ram [ Bolo Bolo ]
Deena Bandhu Deena Dayala
Karuna Sindhu Sai Krupala
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name Jai Sai Ram who is support and compassionate to meek, embodiment of kindness and merci. You are Shyam Gopala the Lord of Meera. Also you are Sai Ram of Parthi Puri.

title: Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo
title2: Bolo Bolo Sab Mil Bolo Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya [ Bolo Bolo ... ]
Joota Jata Mey Gangadhari
Trishoola Dhari Damaru Bajaavey
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bajaa
Goonj Utao Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya (3)
meaning: Let us all chant together, "Om Namah Shivaya" and bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of all prosperity. He holds the Holy Ganges in His matted locks of hair. He holds the Trishoola (the trident) and plays on the Damaru (kettle-drum). Let us all play the Damaru in a rhythmic fashion. Let the chanting "Om Namah Shivaya" resonate.

title: Bolo Bolo Sai Ram Bolo
title2: Bolo Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Bolo Sai Ram Bolo Sai Ram Ji Ki Jai
lyrics:
Bolo Sai Ram Ji Ki Jai
Bolo Bolo Shirdi Sai Bolo Bolo Parthi Sai Bolo Sathya Sai Ki Jai
Bolo Sathya Sai Ki Jai [ Bolo Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: Let us all join in proclaiming the glory of our beloved Lord, Sai Ram. He resides in Shirdi and Puttaparthi. All praises to You, our dear Lord.

title: Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Bolo
title2: Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Bolo Jai Jai Kaar
lyrics:
Bolo Jai Jai Kaar Sai Baba Ki
Patitha Pavana Hey Ghana Shyama
Sai Gopala Hey Ghana Shyama
Prema Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Chant victory to Lord Sai Baba who is also Lord Ghana Shyama (Krishna), the saviour of afflicted and the Lord whose very form is Love.

title: Bolo Jai Sai Ram
title2: Bolo Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bolo Jai Sathya Sai Ram (2)
Mandir Mey Sai Ram
Masjid Mey Sai Ram
Gurudware Mey Sai Ram
Girjaghar Mey Sai Ram [ Bolo Jai Sathya ... ]

Bolo Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (5)
meaning: Chant victory to Lord Sai Rama whose form is Truth and who is the dweller of Temples (for Hindus), Masjids (for Muslims), Gurudwaras (for Sikhs) and Girjaghars (Churches for Christians or Synagogues for Jews).

title: Bolo Krishna Jai Bolo Krishna
title2: Bolo Krishna Jai Bolo Krishna Jai
lyrics:
Bolo Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Krishna Jai Jai
Mayi Meera Mana Vihari Krishna Jai Jai
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Jai (Bolo)
meaning: Chant the name of Krishna, Sai Krishna who is the foster of truth, righteousness, peace and love. The charmer of Meera's mind.

title: Bolo Narayana Jai Jai Vittala
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Ranga Ranga Vittala [ Bolo Narayana ... ]
Govinda Vittala Rakumayi Vittala
Gopala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
alt_lyrics:
Bolo Narayana Jai Jai Vittala
Sai Narayana Ranga Ranga Vittala [ Bolo Narayana ... ]
Govinda Krishnana Rakumayi Vittala
Gopala Krishnana Panduranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
meaning: Let us chant the many names of the Lord: Narayana, Vittala, Govinda, Gopala, Panduranga and Sai who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Bolo Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam [ Bolo Ram ... ]
Bolo Ram Sai Ram
Bolo Shyam Sai Shyam
Bolo Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Sairam, Chant the name of Sai Shyam Sai, The one who is mother and father. Shyam, The one with a dark blue complexion, Lord Krishna.

title: Bolo Ram, Sai Ram
title2: Bolo Ram, Sai Ram, Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sathya Naam, Sai Naam, Hari Ka Naam
Sri Hari Hari Bol, Hari Narayana
Bhajo Manuva Tu, Sathya Narayana
Merey Ram, Hey Ghana Shyam, Sathya Sai Ram [ Sathya Naam ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Sathya Sai Ram, The Lord's name is Sathya, the eternal, changeless truth. Chant the name of Lord Hari and Lord Narayana. O Mind, chant the names of Sathya Narayana, Rama, my Ghana Shyama and Sathya Sai Rama.

title: Bolo Rey Hari Naam
lyrics:
Bolo Rey Shiva Naam [ Bolo Rey ... ]
Bhaktha Janon Ke Baba Naam
Sai Naam Sai Baba Naam [ Bhaktha Janon ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Hari, Lord Vishnu and Chant the name of Lord Shiva, the bestower of prosperity. Chant the name of Sai Baba, who belongs to the devotees, the Lord Sairam, who resides in the abode of Parthi.

title: Bolo Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
title2: Bolo Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Prashanthi Vasa Sathya Sai Ram [ Bolo Sai Ram ... ]
Tan Man Lekey Man Mey Basaake
Sai Ram Bolo Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Let us chant the name Sai Ram whose form is truth and whose dwelling is in Prashanthi Nilayam. Install His form in the heart after surrendering physically and mentally.

title: Bow To The Light Within
title2: Bow To The Light Within To The Omnipresent Light Of God
lyrics:
Bow To The Endless Light The Light That Is Our Very Life
Bow To The Indwelling Lord Our True Guru Sri Sathya Sai

title: Brahma Guru Sai Narayana Guru
lyrics:
Brahma Guru Mahadeva
Sadguru Sai Dhyana Karey Nithya
Atma Linga Guru Deva (Sai)
Parama Guru Sathya Sai Guru
Nithyananda Guru Deva
Rama Guru Sri Krishna Guru Jaya [ Atma Linga ... ]
meaning: Always worship the Divine Preceptor Lord Sathya Sai, who is also Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Rama, Krishna.

title: Brahma Murari Sada Poojita Namah
title2: Brahma Murari Sada Poojita Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Bilvarchana Priya Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Bhasmoddhoolita Tejo Vigraha Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Maheshwara Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (Om)
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva who is worshipped by Brahma and Lord Vishnu. Lord Shiva is fond of being worshipped by Bilva leaves. He is the Lord of Lords and the conqueror of death. We bow to Lord Sathya Sai who manifests the Lingam and brings forth from within himself. We bow to the Supreme Lord, who is the conqueror of death. We bow to Lord Sai, the embodiment of Lord Shiva who has sacred ashes emanating from Him and whose Light illumines the Universe. We bow to the Lord who is fond of the 8 versed hymn, Lingashtakam. Chant the mantra, "Om Namah Shivaya". We bow to Thee, O Lord Shiva.

title: Brahma Parathpara Poorna Maheshwara
lyrics:
Adi ( Sai ) Natha Sri Kedareshwara
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Dhimi Dhimi Damaru Ninaada Kara (3)
meaning: Worship the supreme Brahman who has taken the form of Maheshwara with full divine qualities. He is the eternal Lord from beginning resident of Kedareshwara, who loves worship with Bilva leaves, adorn with moon on the head and who dances to the rhythm of Damaru.

title: Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
lyrics:
Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Sathya Sai Deva
Jyothi Swaroopa Divya Swaroopa
Bhajorey Bhajo Sada Sathya Sai Deva (2)
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the personification of creation, sound, truth, righteousness, illumination(knowledge), divinity, peace, and love. Chant His Holy Name incessantly.

title: Brahma Swaroopa Naada Swaroopa
lyrics:
Sathya Swaroopa Dharma Swaroopa [ Brahma Swaroopa ... ]
Jyothi Swaroopa Divya Swaroopa
Shanthi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Shirdi Swaroopa Parthi Swaroopa
Deva Deva Deva Sathya Sai Deva
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the Supreme Brahman (Universal God), the embodiment of the primordial sound Om. You are truth, righteousness, effulgence, peace and divine love. You are the resident of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Shankara
Parthi Baba Shankara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Namah Shivaya Namo Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya
Shirdi Sai Shankara
Parthi Baba Shankara
meaning: Pay homage to Brahma, Vishnu, Lord of Lords Shiva, Sai of Shirdi, and Baba of Parthi.

title: Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sayeeshwara (Hey)
lyrics:
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Parameshwara
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
Parama Dayala Paapa Vinasha
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sayeeshwara [ Daya Karo ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are verily the Trinity - Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva (Creator, Sustainer and Annihilator). You are the most compassionate one and the destroyer of sins. Please shower Your grace on us and protect us, O Lord.

title: Brahmananda Guru Premananda Guru
lyrics:
Sai Guru Deva Sharanam
Bhaja Shankara Hari Hara Sharanam
Vishwanath Deva Gowri Manohara
Sai Natha Baba Parameshwara
(Bhajo) Shiva Shambho Shiva Sharanam
meaning: Surrender to our Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of love and bliss. Chant the name of Lord Shiva, consort of Gowri and the lord of the universe, Sai Baba.

title: Brahmananda Roopa Sri Sai Deva
lyrics:
Brinda Vihara Ananda Chandha [ Brahmananda Roopa ... ]
Nithyananda Atmananda Keshava Govinda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda
Govinda Gopala Jaya Ananda Mukunda (4)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the very embodiment of Supreme Bliss. In the incarnation as Lord Krishna, he was the resident of Brindavan who bestowed bliss on all. Chant the names of Keshava and Govinda, who is ever blissful and immersed in the Self. Victory to Lord Govinda, Gopala and Mukunda.

title: Brahmanandam Swami Naamam
lyrics:
Netranandam Swami Roopam [ Brahmanandam ... ]
Nithyanandam Swami Geetam
Hrudayanandam Swami Roopam
Atmanandam Swami Dhyanam
Anandam Paramanandam
Swami (Sai) Sevanam Anandam
meaning: We derive Supreme Bliss by chanting the name of Lord Sai. His Form is delightful to the eyes. Singing His glory gives us everlasting peace. His Form is charming to our hearts. One gets Atmic bliss by meditating on Him and being in the service of Lord Sai gives us Supreme Bliss.

title: Brahmanda Nayaka Baba
title2: Brahmanda Nayaka Baba Parthi Pureeshwara Baba
lyrics:
Chand Aur Suraj Tum Ne Banayey
Nadiya Sagar Tum Ne Banayey (2) [ Brahmanda ... ]
Ayodhya Nagari Tum Ne Banayi Dwaraka Nagari Tum Ne Basayi
Shirdi Parthi Tum Ne Banayi
meaning: Oh Baba, Creator of the entire Universe! You reside in Parthi (Prashanthi Nilayam). You created the sun and the moon, You made the rivers and oceans, You made the city of Ayodhya and established the city of Dwaraka. You created the holy cities of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Breathe on me
title2: Breathe on me, O Breath of God
lyrics:
Fill me with life anew
That I may love as Thou dost love
And do what Thou wouldst do
 
Breathe on me, O Life Divine
Free me from all that’s untrue
That I may see the One Reality
That lives within me and You
 
Breathe on me, O Heart of Love
Empty my life of all but You
Make my soul Your Own
And Your Heart my home
That all that’s left is Truth
 
Breathe on me, O Blessed One
Show me Thy Face of Light
There’s nothing left for me excepting Thee
And knowing You aright
 
Breathe on me, O Breath of God
Fill me with life anew
That I may Love as Thou dost Love
And do as Thou wouldst do
 
That I may Love as Thou dost Love
And do as Thou wouldst do

title: Brindavan Ke Sundara Sai
lyrics:
Parthi Puri Ke Pavana Sai
Bhaktha Janon Ke Leela Sai
Madhava Sai Mathura Sai
Mangala Dayi Baba Sai
Baba Sai Leela Sai (2)
meaning: O beautiful Sai of Brindavan, who is all sacredness, with Parthi as Your abode, You are the saviour of the devotees. O Lord Madhava, the dweller of Mathura (You are verily the embodiment of sweetness). Glory to Lord Sai, the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Brindavan Mey Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Avadhpuri Mey Jai Siya Ram
Vindhya Himachala Mey Shiva Shankar
Parthipuri Mey Sai Ram
Rama Krishna Shiva Govinda Narahari
Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Lord Krishna of Brindavan, Lord Rama of Ayodhya, Lord Shiva residing in Himalaya mountains. You reside at Parthi as Sai Rama and You are verily Lord Narayana.

title: Brindavana Ghana Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Muralidhari [ Brindavana Ghana ... ]
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihari
Raasa Vilola Hey Giridhari
Rajeeva Lochana Parthi Vihari
meaning: Lord Krishna, slayer of the demon Mura, is Radha's Lord and moves about in the gardens of Brindavan. The lotus-eyed Lord who lifted the mountain Govardhan to protect His devotees is Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Bring love of God here
title2: Bring love of God here, and take with you divine Power
lyrics:
Bring what you have, your sorrows, grief worries and (your) fears
 And take from me joy
 And take from me peace
 And take from me courage and confidence

title: Brothers, Sisters, All God’s Children
title2: Brothers, sisters, all God's children, let us live in peace as One
lyrics:
Let us share the universal blessings of the Earth and Sun
Walk together, talk together, may love let us fill all day to come
Let Divine light shine within us, let us live in peace as One

title: Buddha Mahavir Yesu Sai
lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol Manuva
Allah Yesu Sadguru Sai
Geeta Veda Quran Ho Sai
Tan Mey Sai Man Mey Sai
Rom Rom Mey Sai Sai [ Vahey Guru ... ]
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Vahey Guru, Buddha, Mahavir, Jesus and the Divine Preceptor Sai, who are the essence of scriptures Bagawad Gita, Quran and Bible. O Sai, You are the indweller of the body and mind and every atom of body is filled by You.

title: Buddham Sharanam Gatchami
lyrics:
Sangam Sharanam Gatchami (2X)
 Dharmam Sharanam Gatchami
 Surrender to the Consiousness of Lord Buddha
 Surrender to the holy ones of the world
 Surrender to the dharma of righteousness
 You will find the Truth of the Universe
 Lord Buddha, You came to this world
 To show man the path
 The path of Truth, the path of Peace
 The path Eternal that man does seek

title: By devotion He knows me
title2: By devotion He knows me in Truth what and who I am
lyrics: And as He knows Me in Truth He enters into the happiness that I am

title: By the Grace of God
title2: By the Grace of God my life is lived
lyrics:
By the Grace of God I can freely give
The Grace of God is all that I need
I come to You Lord on bended knee
 
By the Grace of God my soul is free
By the Grace of God I can finally see
The Grace of God is all that I need
I come to You Lord on bended knee
 
By the Grace of God The Truth is known
By the Grace of God His Love is shown
The Grace of God is all that I need
I come to You Lord on bended knee
 
By the Grace of God Thy Will Is Done
By the Grace of God we are ONE
The Grace of God is all that I need
I come to You Lord on bended knee
 
The Grace of God is all that I need
I come to You Lord on bended knee

title: Cada vez que siento tu
title2: Cada vez que siento tu lumbre
lyrics:
Tú me ves cantando tu nombre 
Ya Allah Ya Allah Ya Allah Ho Akbar
Me muevo y bailo al ritmo del amor
Yo canto, alabo, me rindo al Señor
Ya Allah Ya Allah Ya Allah Ho Akbar
Noor-e-Khuda Noor-e-Maula Noor-e-Allah Ho Akbar
meaning: Every time I feel Your light, You see me singing Your name. Oh Allah, You are great! I move and dance to the rhythm of Love. I sing, praise, and surrender to You. Oh Allah, You are great! The Light of God is great!

title: Call On The Lord You Love Unceasingly
title2: Call On The Lord You Love Unceasingly
lyrics:
He Will Be Listening, Sri Sathya Sai
He Understands The Call Of Your Heart
Wanting Him, Needing Him, Sri Sathya Sai
There Is A Love That He Can't Resist
Constantly Calling Him, Sri Sathya Sai
Offer Your Love To The Lord Of The Universe
He Will Be Listening, He Always Is

title: Call Upon The Lord Of All
title2: Call Upon The Lord Of All, Call Upon Sai Baba
lyrics:
Call Upon Sai Baba Call Upon Sai Baba [ Call Upon The Lord ... ]
Sai Is The Avatar Of Kaliyuga
Come To Our Rescue, We Are Lost Without You
Time And Time Again We Sing Your Name Oh Sai Ram
You Are Our Refuge, Free Us From Bondage
Oh, The Love Of Baba (4)

title: Calling God by any name
lyrics:
Every prayer's heard just the same
All are equal in His eyes
Who are we to criticize
Unity must be our aim
Loving God by any name

God is here within us all
And we only have to call
We must listen carefully
He will give us what we need
Each of us He hears the same
Calling God by any name

Sai Baba, Jesus Christ, Sai Ram, Alleluia
He hears how ever called Brahma, Krishna, Buddha

title: Can’t get Enough of Your Love my Lord
title2: Can't get Enough of Your Love my Lord (2X)
lyrics:
I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Love (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Peace my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Peace (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Joy my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Joy (2X)
 Can't get Enough of Your Truth my Lord (2X)
 I want more and more and more and more
 And Can't get enough of Your Truth (2X)

title: Care For The Earth
title2: Now is the time to care for our Earth,
lyrics:
Whoever we may be.
To join our hands, our souls and our hearts,
And to work for unity.

Chorus: 
For the world to be a beautiful place,
Full of flowers, birds and trees.
The future lies with nobody else,
It depends on you and me.

The time has come to plant more trees,
Make the air pollution free. 
Respect all life, the animals too,
And to live in harmony.

Chorus: 
For the world to be a beautiful place,
Full of flowers, birds and trees.
The future lies with nobody else,
It depends on you and me.

title: Care for things around us
title2: For us to live together, in Peace and Harmony,
lyrics:
We must care for things around us even if they're free.
Let us be very gentle, treat everything with care,
No matter what the value is, it’s there for us to share.

title: Chanda Kirana Kula Mandana Ram
lyrics:
Srimad Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Kausalya Sukha Vardhana Ram
Vishwamitra Priya Dhana Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
meaning: O beloved Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama, You are the crown jewel of the Solar Dynasty, radiating bliss and happiness. You are the cause of Mother Kausalya's happiness and Sage Vishwamitra's beloved treasure. Victory to You, O King Rama, consort of Mother Sita.

title: Chandi Chamundi Jaya Vaishnavi Devi
title2: Chandi Chamundi Jaya Vaishnavi Devi Ma
lyrics:
Mahisha Samhaarini Mangala Roopini Jaya Maha Kaali Ma
Chandi Chamundi Jaya Mangala Gowri Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Pashupathi Mohini Jaya Jaya Lalitey Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Bhavadharini Jaya Jaya Devi Ma
Trishoola Dharini Trinetra Dharini Jaya Jaya Durge Ma
alt_lyrics:
Chandi Chamundi Jaya Vaishnavi Devi Ma
Mahisha Samhaarini Mangala Roopini Jaya Maha Kaali Ma
Chandi Chamundi Jaya Mangala Gowri Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Pashupathi Mohini Jaya Jaya Lalitey Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Bhavadharini Jaya Jaya Devi Ma
Trishoola Dharini Trinetra Dharini Jaya Jaya Kaali Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, Mother of the Universe who bestows auspiciousness and removes the fear of worldly existence. She is also Mother Kali who slew the demon Mahisha. She is the consort of Shiva and the one who fosters all beings. Victory to Mother Durga, the three-eyed one who holds the Trident.

title: Chandi Janani Ma
lyrics:
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma
(Chandi Rana Chandi Bhava) Chandi Janani Ma
Gnana Pradayini Duritha Nivarini
Ambe Bhavani Ma 
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma (2)
meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, the vanquisher of the demon Chanda. She bestows wisdom and destroys evil.

title: Chandra Chooda Mahadeva Shiva
title2: Chandra Chooda Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shambho Deva
lyrics:
Hara Hara Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sai Deva
Sathya Naam Sathya Sai Deva Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva
Om Namah Shivaya Hari Om Namah Shivaya
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of the Lords, Shiva, who wears the moon on His head and who has conquered death. Lord Sathya Sai is none other than Lord Shiva.

title: Chandra Vadana Kamala Nayana
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana
Anantha Shayana Deena Sharanya [ Narayana Sai ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana who has a face pleasing like the moon and whose eyes are like lotus. He is reclining eternally on the Celestial Serpent Sesha and is the refuge to the weak and meek.

title: Chandrakala Dhara Samba Sadashiva
lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva (Shiva) (3)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
meaning: Lord Shiva, who is eternal and unchanging, wears the crescent moon on His head as a decoration. The Lord of the Lords is the bestower of good. Let us chant the mantra "Om Namah Shivaya" which means, "I bow to Lord Shiva".

title: Chandrakala Dhara Shambho Deva
lyrics:
Partheesha Sai Jagadeesha [ Chandra Kaladhara ... ]
Akhilandeshwara Paramesha
Karunakara Sayeesha
Trinetra Dhari Shiva Shankara [ Partheesha Sai ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of the Universe adorning the crescent moon on His head, with the third eye in the forehead and who is the most compassionate one.

title: Chandramouleeshwari Shankari Shankari
lyrics:
Mangala Pradayini Madana Koti Sundari
Madhava Hari Sodari Sai Jaganmohini
meaning: Glory to Mother Parvathi, the consort of Shiva who is adorned with crescent moon on His matted hair. The goddess Shankari bestows auspiciousness. Her beauty is equivalent to crores of Madanas (God of Love). She is the sister of Madhava (Krishna) who is captivating to the whole world. She is none other than Sai of Parthi.

title: Chandramouli Shankara Chandrashekhara
lyrics:
Neelakanta Shooladhari Ambikeshwara
Hey Vibhuti Sundara Tribhuvaneshwara
Sai Natha Sai Natha Jai Maheshwara
Jai Mahesha Jai Umesha Jai Sureshwara
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, Lord of the Lords, and the Lord of Eternity. He is verily Lord Shiva, Lord of Uma and the blue-necked bearer of the trident. His body is decorated with holy ash and He wears the crescent moon on His forehead.

title: Chandrashekara Indushekara
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva (2)
Janana Marana Shoka Bhava Klesha Vidhura
Chandra Chooda Chandra Vadana Chandrashekara [ Hara Hara ... ]
meaning: Chant the name the Lord of the Lords Mahadeva (Shiva), the one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death, the one who adorns the moon on His head and whose face is serene like the moon rays. He is verily Lord Sai who fosters truth, righteousness, peace and love.

title: Chandrashekara Sai Sundara
lyrics:
Devadi Deva Maheshwara
Vyagrambaradhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Vibhuti Sundara Amaradeeshwara
Chidambaresha Sayeeshwara [ Devadi Deva ]
meaning: Glory be to the beautiful Sai Shiva, who adorns the moon on His head, who is the God of Gods, Maheshwara. You are Lord Shankara who is clothed in tiger skin and besmeared with sacred ash. You are Lord Sayeeshwara who resides in Amarnath and Chidambaram.

title: Chandrashekara Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Chandrakala Dhara Hrudayeshwara [ Chandrashekara ... ]
Prema Pradayaka Parameshwara
Parameshwara Sayeeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara [ Prema Pradayaka ... ]
Prashanthi Nilaya Hara Shankara
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva who wears the crescent moon on His head. He is also the Lord who resides in the Heart. He is Parameshwara, the greatest Lord who grants love to all. He is our Lord Sathya Sai whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Chandrashekaraya Namah Om
lyrics:
Gangadharaya Namah Om [ Chandrashekaraya ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva, who is decorated with the crescent-moon on His head, who makes the Holy Ganges flow through His matted hair. I bow to Lord Shiva, who destroys the illusion and all that is transient. Chant the mantra " Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om, Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om, Sayeeshwarya Namah Om."

title: Chant the name of God
title2: Chant the name of God, Sing the Glory of the Lord
lyrics:
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Krishna Sai Ram
Call Him Allah or Buddha Jesus Zohrashtra
Say Ram Rahim Mahaveer Sai Natha
He is All names and All forms choose anyone
He is All names and All forms Almighty One
alt_lyrics:
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Krishna Sai Ram
Chant the name of God, Sing the Glory of the Lord
Call Him Allah or Buddha Jesus Zohrashtra
Say Ram Rahim Mahaveer Sai Natha
He is All names and All forms choose anyone
He is All names and All forms Almighty One

title: Chant The Name Of Lord Ganesha
title2: Chant The Name Of Lord Ganesha, Sai Ganesh We Pray To Thee (2)
lyrics:
Give Us Wisdom, Give Us Grace
Remove The Obstacles We Face
We Bow To Thee, Lord Shivas Son
Please Bless These Songs Weve Just Begun

title: Chant the name of the Lord
title2: Chant The Name of the Lord
lyrics:
In every scripture that you read
One things stays the same
If you want your soul set free
Call upon the Name
Call upon the Name of God
To lead you across that sea
Chant the Name of the Lord
To set you free, to set you free

(chorus)
Why don't you chant the Name of the Lord
Chant the Name of the Lord
Chant the Name of the Lord
To set you free, to set you free
Won't you chant the Name of the Lord
To lead you across that sea
Chant the Name of the Lord
To set you free, to set you free

Yeshu, Yeshua, Yeshua (2)
Allah, Allah, Allah, Allah (2)
(chorus)

Harey Krishna, Krishna, Krishna (2)
Buddha, Buddha, Buddha, Buddha (2)
(chorus)

Sathya Sai Baba Om Sathya Sai (4)
(chorus)

title: Charana Kamala Bando
title2: Charana Kamala Bando Sai Nath Ke
lyrics:
Charana Kamala Bando Charana Kamala Bando
Akarshan Ke Kendra Sai Hai
Krupa Sarovar Charana Sai Hai
Shanthi Pradayaka Guru Sai Hai
Charana Kamala Bando
Mein Hoon Das Sai Karunamaya
Baar Baar Bando (2)
meaning: Hold on to the lotus feet of Lord Sai. Sai is the focus of our attraction. His feet are verily the ocean of blessing. He is the Divine Preceptor who grants peace. I am the servant of Sai, the essence of compassion. I pay homage to Lord Sai over and over again.

title: Charana Kamala Bando
title2: Charana Kamala Bando Sai Nath Ke Charana Kamala Bando (2)
lyrics: Jo Trishavanto Piyo Charanamrutha Jeevan Mey Paavey Anando [ Charana Kamala ... ]
meaning: Offer salutations at the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai. Whoever pines for His nectar-like Feet will be filled with bliss throughout his lifetime.

title: Charana Kamala Bhajorey Manasa
lyrics:
Sai Janani Nalina Mrudula Dala [ Charana Kamala ... ]
Tirtha Triveni Sangama Charanam
Tribhuvana Sai Mangala Charanam
Sanchitha Paapa Vinashaka Charanam
Sharanagatha Paripalita Charanam
meaning: The lotus Feet of Mother Sai, who sits on the soft petaled lotus flower, are as holy as the confluence of the three holy rivers (Ganga, Yamuna, Saraswathi) and bestow good fortune to all the three worlds. Total surrender at those Feet will protect us and destroy all of our sins.

title: Charana Kamala Deejo (Mujhe)
lyrics:
Aao Aao [ Charana Kamala ... ]
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
meaning: Welcome O Lord Hari Narayana. You are verily Lord Sai and Lord Sathya Narayana. Please come, O Lord, and grant us the divine vision of Your Lotus Feet.

title: Chaturmukha Bhaaryey Maam Paahi
lyrics:
Vaagdevi Vani Saraswathi
Amaley Kamalasana Sahitey
Adbhuta Charithey Saraswathi
Jaya Jaya Sai Dayalakari
Vidya Vijaya Saraswathi
Shruthi Laya Gaananaya Veena Pusthaka
Paani Geervani Saraswathi
meaning: O Mother Saraswathi, the consort of the four-headed Lord Brahma, protect us. You are the Goddess of speech and sound. You are seated in the posture of lotus and is the one with extraordinary character. You are the embodiment of the highest knowledge, holding a book as its symbol and the Veena on the other hand. You are the Goddess of music and rhythm and Your arrow is speech (Geervani).

title: Chitha Chora Eshwaramba Bala
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Shyama Gopala [ Chitha Chora ... ]
Jagadodhara Sai Gopala
Brahmananda Swaroopa Gopala
meaning: Oh Beloved Son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai, you are the stealer of our Chitta, the spiritual Heart.

title: Chitha Chora Muraliwala
lyrics:
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Brindavana Shyama Gopala
Mathura Vraja Gokula Bala
Mana Mohana Madana Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
Nandalala Nanda Gopala
Nandalala Nandalala
meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna, the stealer of hearts, the seat of consciousness, the enchanting Flutist, the dark-blue complexioned Lord Gopala moving about in Brindavan.

title: Chitha Chora Nandalala
lyrics:
Nanda Gopala Govinda Lala
Devaki Nandana Gopala
Murali Manohara Nandalala
Madhusudhana Yashoda Bala
Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopal
meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna, the captivator of the hearts and mind, the charming cowherd boy who plays the flute and the one who destroyed the demon Madhu. He is the child of Devaki fostered by Nanda and Yashoda. He is the ever sweet and enchanting dark-complexioned Gopal.

title: Chitha Chora Yashoda Ke Bal
title2: Chitha Chora Yashoda Ke Bal Navaneetha Chora Gopal
lyrics:
Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gopal Gopal Govardhanadhara Gopal
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the beloved Prince of Mother Yashoda, You are the captivator/stealer of the hearts of devotees, their Chitta, the spiritual Heart which is the seat of consciousness. You are the stealer of butter, i. e. hearts of the Gopis (devotees). Chant the name of Gopala, the one who protects the cows or tends the cows as a cowherd. Chant the name of the Govardhanadhara Gopal, who held aloft the mountain Govardhana to protect the villagers against the torrential rain.
songtags: golden voice, multi-lingual, instrumental, sheet-music, tutorial

title: Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
lyrics:
Brindavana Ghana Mangala Charana
Savari Surath Prema Bharana [ Chitha Raja ... ]
Roopa Manohara Murali Madhuvana
Parthi Pureeshwara Chitha Raja Chitha Raja
meaning: O Sai, Lord of Parthi, You are the king of my mind (Chitha - the spiritual Heart). Your auspicious feet (when You incarnated as Lord Krishna) rambled the thick forests of Brindavan and made them auspicious. Your beautiful complexion captivates us and fills us with Love. O Lord of Parthi and King of my mind, You have a charming beautiful loving Lotus face. O holder of the Flute, You are the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Chithravathi Thata Vishala Sundara
lyrics:
Avadhootha Chinthana Guru Deva Sathya Sai 
Merey Baba Sai, Merey Baba Sai [ Chithravathi Thata ... ]
Shirdi Baba Sai Parthi Baba Sai
Yamuna Teera Sri Krishna Kanhaiya Sai [ Avadhootha Chintana ... ]
meaning: Glory be to the Divine Preceptor, Lord Sathya Sai, the beautiful one who resides on the banks of river Chithravathi, the one who is contemplated on by the Saints of highest order. He is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi and is verily Lord Krishna who resides on the banks of river Yamuna.

title: Come Here My Dear Krishna
title2: Come Here My Dear Krishna Kanhayi
lyrics:
Maine Terey Liye Hrudya Andhar Building Banayi [ Come Here ... ]
For You My Dear Khana Banaya
Butter Mishty Dhood Malai Khoob Maangaya
So Much Delay So Much Delay Tumne Lagayi [ Maine Terey ... ]
[ Come Here ... ]

Remembering You Every Day Mein Aasun Bahavun
Come To House My Dear Arathi Utarun
Why Far Why Far Rahey Kanhayi [ Maine Terey ... ]
meaning: Come dear Lord Krishna, I have made a building for You inside my heart. I have made food for You, dear Lord. You asked for butter, sweets and millk but why do You delay? I shed tears of yearning remembering You everyday. Please come to my house and I will wave You the Arathi. Why are You staying far away from me, O Lord, please come to my heart where I have made a building for You.

title: Come hold my hand
title2: Come hold my hand, Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Walk beside me along life's way
In Your presence warm and sweet, Your love will guide my feet
To the doorstep of eternity
Where my heart can then merge with Thee [ Come hold my hand ... ]
Take my love, take my life, take my all
'Tis while seated at Your feet, I know my life's complete
'Cause it's there that I long to be
'Til there's no longer me, only Thee

title: Come let us chant
title2: Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
You are my Mother, You are my Father
 You are my Teacher, You are my Protector
 Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
 You are my Rama, You are my Krishna
 You are my Allah, You are my Jesus
 Come let us chant the name of Sathya Sai Baba
 We call on You dear Baba to give us Your darshan
 You take away our troubles and give us compassion

title: Come Let's All Together
title2: Come Let's All together, Light The Lamps Of Our Hearts
lyrics:
Light The Truth Sathya Sai Has Ignited
Let Our Souls Merge With The Light

Aao Hum Sab Milkar Deep Se Deep Jalayey
Sathya Deep Sai Ne Jalaya
Hum Man Ka Deep Jalayey

title: Come One And All
lyrics:
See in Me yourself
For I see Myself in you
You are My life
You are My breath
You are My form
My very soul
When I love you
I love Myself
When you love yourself
You love Me.

title: Come Sai Lord Incarnate
title2: Come Sai Lord Incarnate Give Us Your Darshan
lyrics:
You Are The Lord Of Creation (2)
You Are That Rama You Are That Krishna
You Are Our Lord And Provider (2)
You Are Creator You Are Protector
You Are Destroyer Of Darkness (2)

title: Come surrender and you’ll see
lyrics:
come and lift your burdens free
 Can't you see brothers we are one
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you
 Come with me my brothers free
 Serving all in my reigns of love
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you
 Jesus helped us to be free
 Come and lift your burdens free
 Serving all in your reign of love
 Yes we're one, yes we're one with you

title: Daasharathey Ram Jaya Jaya Jaya
title2: Daasharathey Ram Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya (2)
lyrics:
Pavana Naama Megha Shyama
Manmata Shata Guna Dhama Rama
meaning: Victory unto You Oh Rama the son of Dasharatha. You liberate the sufferings of Your devotees and Your complexion is blue like the clouds. You are verily beautiful with a reserve of abundant virtues.

title: Daasharathey Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama [ Daasharathey ... ]
Sita Vallabha Sundara Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the Prince of King Dasharatha. Lord Rama is the Jewel of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Rama, the beloved of Mother Sita. Chant the name of Lord Rama, who is verily Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Daasharathey Rama Kalyana Guna Dhama
lyrics:
Rama Sri Rama Rameshwara Rama [ Daasharathey Rama ... ]
Bhadrachala Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Puttaparthi Sai Rama
meaning: O Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha, You are the abode of all virtues and auspiciousness, saviour and up-lifter of afflicted. You freed Ahalya from her curse. You reside in Rameshwaram, Bhadrachalam and in Puttaparthi as Lord Sai Rama.

title: Dakshina Murthim Sai Mahesham
lyrics:
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
Sundaram Sundaram
Chinmaya Mudram Chidananda Roopam
Sanakaadi Yogi Jana Vanditha Sri Gurum [ Sathyam ... Sundaram ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Dakshinamurthy (God of silence), the embodiment of truth, awareness, beauty. You are the Lord with blissful form sitting in the posture Chinmudra facing south. You are worshipped by yogis like Sanaka etc.

title: Dam Dam Dam Dam suena el tambor
title2: Dam Dam Dam Dam suena el tambor
lyrics:
En las manos del Shiva nuestra Senor
 Da me da me da me da me tu corazon
 Toma toma toma toma mi corazon
 Con tus manos Santas llename de amor

title: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru
title2: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
lyrics:
Nachey Shankara Nacherey [ Dama Dama ... ]
Tunga Himachala Shringa Nivasita
Nachey Pralayankara Nacheyrey
Srishti Shankara Laya Pralayankara
Nacherey Shiva (Sai) Nacherey
meaning: O Lord Shankara (Shiva), dance in rhythm with the Damaru (drum), You are the one who dwells at the peak of highest ice-laden mountain, Himachala, You perform the cosmic dance of creation, sustenance and destruction. Dance O Lord Sai Shiva.

title: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru
title2: Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bhajey
lyrics:
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bhajey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Shiva Sai Shankara Sada Bhajey
meaning: Worship and chant the divine name of Lord Shiva, Shankara, the embodiment of auspiciousness who dances to the rhythm of Damaru, the drum that sounds "dama dama" and Ghanta, the bell that sounds "ghana ghana". Lord Sai is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Dama Dama Damaru Bhajavey Shankara
lyrics:
Mahadeva Hey Bhola Shankara [ Dama Dama ... ]
Gowri Natha Sadashiva Shankara
Neelakanta Gangadhara Shankara
Vamadeva Pashupathi Shiva (Sai) Shankara
Sharanagatha Abhayankara Shankara
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
meaning: O Lord Shankara, beat the Damaru (drum) dama, dama. O Mahadeva, who is easy-to-please, You are the consort of Gowri (Parvathi), always granting auspiciousness, whose throat is blue (due to Haalaa-hala poison), the one who holds Ganga in His matted locked hair, the Lord of animals. Blessed devotees will free from fear who takes refuge in Him. Chant the mantra "Om Namah Shivaya".

title: Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Natha
title2: Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Natha Shiva
lyrics:
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhimi Bholey Natha Shiva [ Dama Dama ... ]
Natana Manohara Nataraja Shiva
Hara Hara Shankara Bholey Nath Shiva
Shambho Shankara Vishwanath Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Sai Nath Shiva
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva who loves the sound of the Drum "Dum Dum Dum", "Dhim Dhim Dhim"" and ""Bhum Bhum Bhum". Chant the name of Bholey Nath, the easy-to-please Lord Shiva, Lord Gowri Natha, the Lord of Goddess Parvathi, Lord Nataraja, the Lord of dance, Lord Shankara, the one who gives happiness, Lord Shambho, the bestower of good and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Danava Bhanjana Rama Sai Shyamala
title2: Danava Bhanjana Rama Sai Shyamala Komala Ram
lyrics:
Hey Rama Rama Jaya Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram [ Danava Bhanjana ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Sai Daya Sagara Ram
Deenon Ke Prabhu Rama Sai Rama Rama Ram
meaning: O charming and sweet Lord Rama, You annihilated the demons (Danavas). Victory to You, Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha. You are an ocean of compassion, the refuge to the destitute. O Rama, You are verily our Lord Sai Rama.

title: Dance Shiva Dance
title2: Dance Shiva Dance In Our Hearts (2)
lyrics:
Blow Out The Winds Of Desire ( Sai )
Purify Our Hearts Purify
Let Our Sins Die In Your Fire
Dance Shiva Dance In Our Hearts (3)
And Love Will Flow Like A River

title: Dancing Ganesh, Playful Ganesh
lyrics:
Dance with me, Play with me, be my Ganesh,
 Be my Ganesh, be my Ganesh,
 Teach me how to dance with my fears, Ganesh

title: Darkness Sometimes Sneaks
title2: Darkness sometimes sneaks into our minds, covering our spirits from divine Light
lyrics:
Then we will fight back, never give up ever, until victory is ours
Simply ask Lord Sai, please come inside our minds, so our thoughts are purified
Sai Lord of Light shines through till Darkness is gone, so our minds are bright again

title: Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan (Mujhe)
lyrics:
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
Tum Janat Sab Antaryami
Deejo Merey Prabhu Amrutha Vani
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Pooran Karo Merey Man Ki Kamna
alt_lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Bhagawan (Mujhe)
Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
Tum Janat Sab Antaryami
Deejo Merey Prabhu Amrutha Vani
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Puran Karo Merey Man Ki Kaam Baba
meaning: Show me Your Divine Form, O Lord Sai, You are omniscient, You are the in-dweller. Give me Your nectarine message, O my Lord. You are my Atma Ram (in-dweller). Please fulfill my heart's desire, O Lord.

title: Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Nandalala
lyrics:
Daya Karo Mujhey Krishna ( Sai ) Gopala [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
Devaki Nandana Deena Dayala
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Sai Narayana Sada Krupala [ Daya Karo ... ]
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the beloved son of Nanda, grant me Your Vision and shower Your compassion on me. O Lord, the loving son of Mother Devaki, You are the compassionate Lord of the meek and weak, the Lord of Mathura and the most beautiful one. O the ever-compassionate Lord Sai, You are none other than Lord Krishna and Narayana. Shower Your mercy and grace on me.

title: Darshan Deejo O Bhagawan
lyrics:
O Bhagawan, O Bhagawan [ Darshan Deejo ... ]
Bhakton Ke Tum Jeevan Pran
Deenan Ke Sakha O Bhagawan
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Bhagawan
Pooran Karo Merey Jeevan Gnan
meaning: Grant me Your Divine Darshan, O Lord. You are the very life breath of a devotee, You are the friend of the forlorn. Come into the temple of my heart, O God and fulfill the Wisdom of my life.

title: Darshan Do Deva Deva
lyrics:
Daasharathey Dayabhi Rama [ Darshan Do ... ]
Dharma Uddhara Daya Nidhey
Daasa Paripala Krupa Nidhey
meaning: O Lord Rama, bless us with Your Divine Vision. You are the son of Dasharatha. You are the compassionate one, upholder of righteousness and the reserve of kindness. You are protector and sustainer of Your devotees who take refuge in You.

title: Darshan Do Ghana Shyam Shyama
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala [ Darshan Do ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Parthi Puri Ghana Shyam Shyama
meaning: Oh the dark-hued Lord Krishna, bless us with Your vision, the Lord of Radha. You are the Lord of Mathura, the most compassionate one of the weak and meek. You are none other than the Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Darshan Do Prabhu Darshan Do
lyrics:
Darshan Do Mujhey Sai Bhagawan
Vinati Karoon Mein Baar Baar [ Darshan Do Prabhu ... ]
Hrdaya Mey Aao Sai Bhagawan
Bhajan Mey Aao Sai Bhagawan
Nayana Mey Aao Sai Bhagawan
Dhyan Mey Aao Sai Bhagawan
Sai Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
Parthipuri Ke Sai Bhagawan [ Darshan Do Mujhey ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi, grant us Your divine vision. Please come in our hearts, in our prayers, and in our meditation.

title: Darshan Do Prabhu Sai Natha
lyrics:
Darsha Dikhao Sai Natha [ Darshan Do ... ]
Araj Suno Merey Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala (2) [ Araj Suno ... ]
Brindavan Ke Nandalala
meaning: O Lord Sai, bless us with the vision of Your divine form. O Lord Gopal (Krishna), the beloved of Gopi and Gopas of Brindavan, please listen to our earnest prayer.

title: Darshan In Our Hearts
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Om Sri Sathya Sai
Your darshan of Love is in our hearts
Sri Sathya Sai Om Sri Sathya Sai
Stay with us (stay with us) 
Be our Love (be our Love)
Till the end of time
 
We need Your Grace to give us peace
We need Your Love to give us strength
 
Sri Sathya Sai Om Sri Sathya Sai
Hear our prayer (hear our prayer)
Hear our prayer (hear our prayer)
Love from now on

title: Darshana Deejo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Parama Dayalu Bhagawan [ Darshana Deejo ... ]
Adi Anantha Adbhuta Roopa
Ananda Daata Aashritha Vatsala
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha
Satchidananda Sri Sathya Sayeesha
meaning: Grant me the vision of Your Divine Form O Lord, the supremely merciful Sai, You are Infinite and Your beautiful Form is unsurpassed and indescribable. Thou art the grantor of joy and happiness to those who have come to Thee for refuge. Your Form is Love and You are the bestower of Peace. O most Supreme Lord Sri Sathya Sai, You are the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

title: Darshana Do Darshana Do
lyrics:
Darshana Do Sai Bhagawan [ Darshana Do ... ]
Tum Ho Baba Natavara Lala
Tum Ho Baba Deena Dayala
Tum Ho Baba Parama Krupala
Tum Ho Karuna Nidhan (Baba) [ Darshana Do Sai ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, grant me Darshan, the vision of Your holy form. You are the sustainer of the entire world, You have Shirdi as Your holy abode. O Lord, with Your Love and supreme compassion, You destroy the ill-effects of this Kali age. O Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, You are the treasure house of compassion. O Supreme Lord of Parthi, You are the refuge to the destitute. O Lord, who resides in Shirdi, please grant me Your vision.

title: Darshana Do Ghana Shyama Shyama
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Radhey Govinda [ Darshana Do ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Parthipuri Ghana Shyama Shyama
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is verily the dark-complexioned Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha. O Krishna, You are the Lord of Mathura and the most compassionate one. O Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi, please grant us Your divine vision.

title: Darshana Do Morey Shyam
lyrics:
Sundarawa Brija Mohana Radhey Shyam
Muralidhara Ghana Shyam
Chamara Kesha Sumadhura Bhaasha
Peeta Vasana Ghana Shyam [ Sundarawa Brija Mohana ... ]
Krishna Avatara Parthi Vihara
Bhajo Hruday Hari Guna Gaan
Bhajo Harey Krishna Naam Bhajorey Sai Ram
Har Pal Jeevan Dhyan [ Sundarawa Brija Mohana ... ]
meaning: Grant Your Divine Darshan, O the most beautiful Lord Krishna of Brija (Brindavan), the Lord of Radha. You are the dark complexioned one playing the Flute. You are the curly haired one draped in yellow silk whose words are nectarine. You have incarnated as Lord Sai at Parthi. Chant the name and sing the glory of the Lord, O Heart! Sing the name and meditate on Lord Krishna and Sai every moment of life.

title: Darshana Do Sai Mata
lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Mata [ Darshana Do ... ]
Tribhuvana Dharini Parthi Nivasini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Mata [ Aao Aao ... ]
meaning: O Mother Sai, please come and bless us with the vision of Your divine form. O sustainer of the three worlds, the resident of Parthi, the embodiment of Love, come bless us all.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
lyrics:
Dharani Pala Shiromani Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Deena Dayala Ravikula Rama
Daasharathey Sri Raghu Rama (2)
meaning: Glory be to the Son of Dasharatha, the compassionate Lord Rama, the supreme ruler and sustainer of the earth who is compassionate to weak and meek, the star of Surya clan, the prince of Dasharatha, Oh Raghu Rama.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Sri Raghu Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma [ Rama Rama ... ]
Danava Samhara Kodanda Rama
meaning: O King Rama, You are the son of Dasharatha. You are the consort and life of Mother Janaki (Sita). You are the star of the Sun clan, the annihilator of demons and the wielder of the Kodanda bow.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara
title2: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
lyrics:
Raghukula Tilaka Rama Sathya Sai Sri Parandhama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Rama Shaapa Vimochana Rama
Shirdi Pureesha Rama Puttaparthi Puri Parandhama
meaning: Glory to Thee, O Lord Rama, the darling son of King Dasharatha, You are an ocean of compassion and the Crown Jewel of the Raghu Dynasty. You are the saviour of Ahalya from the curse that had turned her into a stone. You are Lord Sathya Sai, the indweller of hearts, with Shirdi and Parthi as Your supreme abodes.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara
title2: Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
lyrics:
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Daithya Kulaantaka Rama [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
Lakshmana Sevitha Rama Lakshmi Manohara Rama
Sookshma Swaroopa Rama Sundara Vadana Rama
meaning: O merciful Lord Rama, beloved son of King Dasharatha, You are an ocean of mercy. You slayed the ten headed Ravana thereby putting an end to the clan of demons. You are worshipped and attended by brother Lakshmana and You are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi. O beautiful-faced Rama, You are the formless one.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Ramachandra Prabhu Janaki
title2: Dasharatha Nandana Ramachandra Prabhu Janaki Jeevana Jaya Jaya Ram
lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Deena Janavana
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
meaning: Oh Rama, You are the darling son of King Dasharatha, You are life to Janaki, Janaka's daughter (Goddess Sita), You are the crown jewel of the Raghu Clan and the saviour of the destitute. Oh Lord of Sita, You are the uplifter of the fallen (destitute) and the Lord of the Raghu clan.

title: Dasharatha Nandana Sri Ramachandra Dharma
title2: Dasharatha Nandana Sri Ramachandra Dharma Samrakshaka Ram
lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Muralidhara Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Eshwaramba Sutha Sri Sathya Sai Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Mangala Dayaka Naam
Dasharatha Nandana Ram
Ananda Dayaka Shyam
Premamrutha Bhagawan
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ram (Bolo)
meaning: Glory to the son of Dasharatha, Lord Rama, who has a blissful and serene face and who upholds righteousness. He is the same as the son of Devaki, Lord Krishna (Shyama), who, holding the enchanting flute bestows happiness. He is verily the son of Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai, who is the embodiment of love. Victory to Lord Sai, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi and the all powerful one whose name bestows auspiciousness. Chant victory to Sai Ram.

title: Dasharatha Ram Janaki Ram
lyrics:
Maruti Sevitha Manobhi Ram
Sita Ram Sri Raghu Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Janaki Ram
Ahalyodharaka Ananda Ram
meaning: O Lord Rama, Prince of King Dasharatha, O Lord of Sita, You are constantly worshipped by Maruti (Hanuman, a monkey devotee of Lord Rama). Chant the name of the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai Ram. Victory to Lord Rama, Lord of Janaki (Sita), blissful Rama, the saviour of Ahalya.

title: Dasharatha Rama Dayabhi Rama
lyrics:
Danava Bhanjana Karunabhi Rama [ Dasharatha Rama ... ]
Deenodharana Manobhi Rama
Taraka Naama Sugunabhi Rama (2)
meaning: O Rama, son of Dasharatha, You are merciful and compassionate, annihilator of demons, uplifter of the destitute, embodiment of noble virtues. Your name, when chanted, releases one from the miseries of the world.

title: Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya
title2: Datta Guru Datta Guru Dattatreya Guru
lyrics:
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Guru [ Datta Guru ... ]
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Dattatreya Guru
Dattatreya Guru
Sai Nath Guru
meaning: Chant the Holy names of the Noble Teacher Dattatreya and Lord Sai. Reciting the ever pure and spotless names of the Noble Teacher Lord Dattatreya and Lord Sainath, destroys the fear of the bondage of birth and death.

title: Dattatreya Sadguru Deva
lyrics:
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva
Tum Hi Brahma Sanathana Deva
Vishnu Narayana Sri Vasudeva
Pannaga Bhooshana Shiva Mahadeva
Dehi Dehi Tava Sri Paada Seva (2)
meaning: Oh God and Noble teacher Dattatreya, grant us to serve Your Feet. You are Brahma the eternal God, Vishnu, Narayana who is indweller in all. You are Shiva, Mahadeva adorned with the serpent.

title: Day By Day
title2: Day By Day, Day By Day Oh Lord, The Three Things I Pray
lyrics:
To See Thee More Clearly, Love Thee More Dearly
Follow Thee More Nearly, Day By Day

title: Daya Karo Bhagawan
title2: Daya Karo Bhagawan Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Terey Dwarey Jhol Philaye Krupa Karo Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... ]
Daya Karo Hey Sai Baba Gaan Tumhare Gaoon
Man Ki Asha Paoon
Jo Bhi Dhyaye Tujhe Ko Paayey
Parthipuri Bhagawan Sai Krupa Karo Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sai, please bestow mercy on those of us at Your doorstep, with outstretched arms, singing Your glory. Please appear in our meditation and prayers to fulfill our desire to see You, O Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Daya Karo Bhagawan Krupa Karo
title2: Daya Karo Bhagawan Krupa Karo Bhagawan (2)
lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan
Hey Sai Nath Bhagawan
Hey Krupa Nidhey Bhagawan
meaning: Oh Lord, bestow on us your compassion and mercy, Oh Lord Sai, who is the treasure house of compassion.

title: Daya Karo Bhagawan Shankara Daya
title2: Daya Karo Bhagawan Shankara Daya Karo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Parvathi Ramana Pannaga Bhooshana Neelakanta Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ]
Chandrashekara Chandrakala Dhara Vibhuti Sundara Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ... ]
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari Gangadhari Daya Karo
meaning: Show us Your compassion, O Lord Shankara, the blue-throated one who adorns the snake and who is the consort of Goddess Parvathi. You are beautiful with Vibhuthi (holy ash) besmeared all over Your body and the moon adorned on Your head. Be merciful towards us O Lord, who has the third eye, possesses the trident and holds the river Ganga in Your matted hair.

title: Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya
title2: Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Ma
lyrics:
Raksha Karo Raksha Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Hey Ma Hey Ma
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
meaning: O Universal Mother Sathya Sai, show us Your mercy and kindness.

title: Daya Karo Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Jaga Vandana [ Daya Karo ... ]
Bhavatheetha Bhagya Vidhata
Deena Natha Anatha Ke Natha
meaning: O Lord Hari Narayana, bestow on us Your mercy, You are worshipped by the whole world. You are the Lord of the destitute and the helpless; You are the saviour from worldly miseries and the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Daya Karo Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Mana Mohana [ Daya Karo ... ]
Deena Dayala Dashavathara (2)
Darshan Do Hey Sai Gopala
meaning: O Lord Hari Narayana, bestow on us Your mercy, You are the Lord of the destitute and the helpless who incarnated ten times for the sake of Your devotees. O Lord Gopala (Krishna), grant us Your Darshan.

title: Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey
title2: Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey Hey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Tan Man Dhan Sab Sharana Tumharey [ Daya Karo ... ]
Adi Anantha Hari Avinashi
Sada Nirantara Ghat Ghat Vasi
Deena Dayala Sada Krupala (2)
meaning: Oh Bhagawan, the treasure house of mercy, have mercy on us. This body, mind and money (all the material possessions) are all Yours. Oh infinite and the primal one, You are all pervading; Oh the saviour of destitute, You are ever compassionate.

title: Daya Karo Hey Jaya Jagat
title2: Daya Karo Hey Jaya Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Durga Bhavani [ Daya Karo ... ]
Pranava Swaroopini Hey Kalyani
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Sharanam Sharanam Sharanam Bhavani
meaning: Oh mother of the Universe Bhavani, show compassion and mercy on us. You are the personification of the primordial sound "OM", Oh mother Durga we surrender at your feet.

title: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Murthy
title2: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Murthy Krupa Karo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Tum Bin Koi Aur Na Dooja
Tum Ho Hamarey Pran [ Daya Karo ... ] 
Tum Ho Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara
Tum Bin Kaun Sahara Prabhuji
meaning: Show mercy on us Oh compassionate Lord, no one but You care for us, You are our life, You are the saviour of the downtrodden, Oh Lord who else other than You can help us.

title: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Nidhan
title2: Daya Karo Hey Karuna Nidhan Sai
lyrics:
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo
Tum Ho Sai Krupa Karo
Prabhu Tum Sai Antaryami
Parthi Puri Bhagawan (2)
Tum Ho Daata Daya Karo [ Tum Ho... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, the treasure house of Grace and compassion, kindly bless us with Your mercy. You are the ever-giver, please bestow on us Your mercy. Oh Lord Sai, You are the indweller of hearts. Oh resident of Parthi, bestow on us Your grace and mercy.

title: Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara
title2: Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
lyrics:
Janam Janam Tum Saath Rahorey
Sai Nath Mahadeva
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Shirdeeshwara Sai Deva Partheeshwara Sai Deva
meaning: O Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi be compassionate and merciful towards us and accompany us from birth to birth. You are the Lord of the Lords and the resident of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Daya Karo Sadguru Sai Daya
title2: Daya Karo Sadguru Sai Daya Karo
lyrics:
Shirdi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo
Parthi Nivasa Sai Daya Karo [ Daya Karo ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Tum Ho Brahma Eshwara
Radha Kantha Parvathi Ramana
Deena Bandhava Sai Daya Karo [ Parthi Nivasa ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, our divine Preceptor who dispells the darkness of ignorance, the resident of Shirdi and Parthi, please shower Your mercy. O Lord Krishna, the one who held aloft the mountain to save the devotees, You are the Lord of Meera. You are Brahma (creator) and Eshwara (destroyer - Lord Shiva). O Radha's beloved and the enchanter of Goddess Parvathi, You are the Saviour of the helpless and the destitute. O Lord Sai, the dweller of Parthi, shower Your compassion on us.

title: Daya Karo Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Pannaga Shayana
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Paapa Vinashaka Prashanthi Vasa
Parthipuri Sai Narayana
Paramananda Narayana
alt_lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Pannaga Shayana
Sri Vasudeva Narayana
Paapa Vinashaka Prashanthi Vasa
Parthipuri Sai Narayana
Paramananda Narayana
meaning: O Lord Narayana, show us Your mercy. You are the ocean of compassion, the lotus-eyed one reclining on the celestial serpent Adi Sesha. O Lord, You are the indweller of all the beings. You have incarnated in this Kali Yuga as Lord Sai who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam at Puttaparthi. You destroy our sins and You are the personification of Supreme Bliss.

title: Daya Karo Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Krupa Karo
Krupa Karo Baba Daya Karo [ Daya Karo Sai ... ]
Deena Ke Bandho Deena Sharana Sai Narayana
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Narayana (Sai)
meaning: O Lord Sai Narayana, please shower Your mercy on us. O Baba, please confer Your compassion on us. O Lord, the companion of the forlorn and the refuge to the destitute, O Sai Narayana, grant us mercy and compassion.

title: Daya Karo Shiva Gangadhari
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Shiva Hey Tripurari [ Daya Karo ... ]
Naama Madhura Shubha Mangala Kaari
Alakha Niranjana Trishoola Dhari
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhola Bhandari
meaning: O Lord Shiva, the one who holds the Holy Ganges in Your locks of hair, shower Your compassion on us. O Lord who destroyed the city of Tripura, shower Your mercy on us. Your sweet name bestows all auspiciousness. O the imperceptible and faultless one, the holder of the trident, O the easy-to-please Lord, shower Your mercy on us.

title: Daya Nidhey Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Krupa Nidhey Sai Narayana 
Hari Hari Om Madhava Hari Om 
Giridhara Bal Madana Gopal 
Sundara Shyam Sai Gopal [ Hari Hari Om ... ]
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the compassionate and sweet one who resounds with the primordial sound of Om. You are the charming one who lifted the mountain to save Your devotees. You are the most beautiful one who has incarnated as our Lord Sai.

title: Daya Sagara Karunakara
lyrics:
Jagadeeshwara Sayeeshwara [ Daya Sagara ]
Bhuvaneshwara Akhileshwara
Guna Gambhira Sayeeshwara (2)
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, you are the ocean of compassion and mercy. Oh Lord of the entire creation, Oh Sai eshwara You are the Lord of the entire world, You are the master of the entire world and the entire Universe Oh Lord Sai, You are the embodiment of all virtues qualities.

title: Daya Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya
title2: Daya Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe
lyrics:
Prema Sudha Barsao Mata Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe
Devi Niranjani Sai Bhavani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe (2)

Jaya Jaya Jaya Ambe (3)
meaning: Victory to Mother Ambe! Oh Ocean of mercy and love! Shower Your grace. Oh Purest One! (Mother Sai). You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death.

title: Dayabhi Rama Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Prabhu Sai Rama
Atma Rama Nayanabhi Rama
Kodanda Rama Pattabhi Rama
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama [ Madhura Manohara ... ]
meaning: O Lord Rama, who resides in the heart of devotees and holder of the Kodanda bow, You are merciful and beautiful to behold. Chant the name of the King Rama of the Raghu dynasty and the beautiful and enchanting Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
lyrics:
Krupamaya Hey Sadashiva
Dama Dama Damaru Maheshwara
Damaruka Natha Sadashiva
Hari Om Hari Om Sadashiva
meaning: Hey Maheshwara (Shiva) you are full of compassion. You are also Shiva the embodiment of auspiciousness show us your kindness who loves the sound of damaru (drum) dama, dama. . chant Hari Om.

title: Dayamaya Sri Rama Harey
lyrics:
Krupamaya Sri Sai Harey
Dharma Swaroopa Rama Harey
Prema Swaroopa Sai Harey
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Daata Sathya Sai Baba Harey
meaning: Chant the name of Rama, the compassionate one and Sai, who is highly merciful. Rama is the embodiment of righteousness. Sai is the embodiment of love and the one who bestows truth, righteousness and peace.

title: Dear Allah, dear Baba, dear Lord
title2: Dear Allah, dear Baba, dear Lord
lyrics:
There is one God in this world
 Truth's His Name, Sweet's His word, Loving's His act
 Guru Allah, Guru Baba, Guru Lord
 Your are justice, You are fairness, You are love
 You are my heart, You are my mind, You are all
 Sweet Allah, sweet Baba, sweet Lord
 You are everything that we are asking for

title: Dear Ganesh, Great Ganesh
title2: Dear Ganesh, Great Ganesh, clear the path, light the way
lyrics:
Remove all obstacles, awaken us from ego's dream,
 open us to the arms of our love
 Who patiently awaits our awakening
 Who lovingly awaits our awakening
 Dear Ganesha, Great Ganesha, clear the path, light the way
 Let nothing hinder our journey, open our hearts
 Hasten us to the arms of our love
 Who patiently awaits our awakening
 Who lovingly awaits our awakening
 Help us to surrender, restore our faith
 Guide us to the arms of our Sai
 Who patiently awaits our awakening

title: Dear Lord Ganesha
title2: Dear Lord Ganesha, protector of my soul
lyrics:
We bow before Thee here this day
Give us the strength to live God’s way
Oh Lord Ganesha, clear our path with love
 
My Saraswathi, Goddess of my heart
Cleansing me with Your Gayathri
You are the music in my heart
My Saraswathi, You are my friend
 
Dear Lord my Swami, lotus of my heart
My Lord Sai Baba, never shall we part
Your omnipresence, omnipresence
Dear Lord Sai Baba, lotus of my heart
My Swami, lotus of my heart

title: Dear Lord Sai
title2: Dear Lord Sai, so radiant You have come
lyrics:
Melting every heart into the one
 So gloriously You live the divine way
 Showing that the world is all God's Play
 Bhagavaan, You are the Light, endless rays of Love so bright
 You shine within the sun--You shine within us everyone
 Please let these lives reflect Thee, Bhagavaan
 Dissolve these hearts into Thee, Bhagavaan

title: Dear Lord, sweet Lord
title2: Dear Lord, sweet Lord, let us tell You how we feel
lyrics: You have filled us with Your riches---we love you so

title: Dear Sathya Sai Baba
title2: Dear Sathya Sai Baba how I do love Thee!

title: Dear Sathya Sai, grace us
title2: Dear Sathya Sai, grace us with Your love
lyrics:
Om Sai Baba, grace us with Your love [ Dear Sathya Sai ... ]
You are the infinite, You are the absolute
You are in each of us, guiding and blessing us
As we go through our lives, serving God in all we see

title: Dearest Jesus, You are my friend
title2: Dearest Jesus, You are my friend
lyrics:
Dearest Jesus, over and over again
 I look in my heart and what do I see?
 Dearest Jesus, smiling at me
 Dearest Jesus, always with me.

title: Deena Bandhava Baba Daya Sagara
lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Sai Karunakara [ Deena Bandhava ... ]
Sathya Sai Prema Sai Shanthi Dharma Sindhu Sai
Jeevan Ka Aadhaar Sai Janam Janam Bandhu Sai [ Patitha Pavana ... ]
meaning: O Baba, the ocean of compassion, You are the kinsman to destitute, uplifter of afflicted. You are Sathya Sai whose form is Truth and Righteousness, refuge of all lives, father, mother and perpetual companion from birth to birth.

title: Deena Bandhava Sri Sai Deva
lyrics:
Daya Sagara Devadi Deva [ Deena Bandhava ... ]
Paahi Prabho Sayeeshwara
Dehi Vibho Jagadeeshwara
Sharanam Prabho Sathya Sai Deva
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the kinsman of the destitute and the afflicted. Oh Lord of Lords, you are a ocean of compassion. Oh Lord Sayeeshwara, kindly protect me. O Lord of the universe, grant yourself to me Oh Sai deva, I surrender to thee.

title: Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Paahi
title2: Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Paahi Sai Shankara
lyrics:
Hey Trinetra Hey Pavitra Vimala Charitha Raksha Maam
Parama Purusha Parthi Nivasa Sathya Sai Shankara
meaning: O Supreme Lord Sai, You are the Lord and kinsman of the downtrodden, You are verily the three-eyed Lord Shankara (Shiva). Kindly protect me, the purest and spotless Lord of Parthi.

title: Deena Bandhu Vittala Jai
title2: Deena Bandhu Vittala Jai Karuna Sindho Vittala Jai
lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai
Pandari Natha Vittala Jai Panduranga Vittala Jai
Parthi Pureesha Vittala Jai Prashanthi Nilaya Vittala Jai [ Vittala Vittala ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur, who is the refuge of the downtrodden and the reservoir of compassion. He is none other than our Sai who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam in Puttaparthi.

title: Deena Dayala Hari Parama Dayala
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Madhura Manohara Krishna Gopala
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Brindavana Ghana Madana Gopala
meaning: Chant the many names of the supremely merciful, sweet and beautiful Lord Krishna - Hari, Govinda, Gopala. He is the one who liftted the Govardhana mountain and is the Lord of Meera.

title: Deena Dayala Parama Krupala
lyrics:
Darshana Deejo Sai Gopala [ Deena Dayala ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Nandalala
Bhaktha Paripala Sai Gopala
meaning: Please let us have the vision of Your divine form, O Lord Gopala (Krishna), son of Nanda. You are the Lord who is extremely compassionate towards the downtrodden and protects His devotees. You are verily Lord Sai.

title: Deena Dayala Sri Sai Rama
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Prashanthi Rama
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Rama
Ananda Rama Sadananda Rama [ Anatha Rakshaka ... ]
Atmabhi Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
meaning: O Lord Sri Rama, Sai Rama, You are merciful and kind towards the weak and the meek. O Lord of Prashanthi, You have come to uplift mankind. O Rama, the always blissful one, You are the protector of those who are orphaned. O Lord Sai Rama, You are the indweller of our hearts.

title: Deena Dayala Tribhuvana Pala Giridhara
title2: Deena Dayala Tribhuvana Pala Giridhara Bala Nandalala
lyrics:
Murali Manohara Maya Vilola
Natavara Sundara Shyama Gopala
Radha Madhava Sai Gopala
meaning: O Giridhara (Krishna), darling son of Nanda, You are the protector of three worlds, compassionate towards weak and meek. You are captivating and enchanting with the flute in Your hands. You play tricks on devotees with Your illusion (Maya). You danced on the serpent Kalinga. You are the Lord of Radha. You are none other than Lord Sai.

title: Deena Dukha Bhanjana Alakh Niranjan
lyrics:
Karunamaya Sai Deva
Rajeeva Lochana Ayodhya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Ananda Dhama
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Ayodhya Jana Priya Rama [ Karunamaya ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the destroyer of miseries of weak and meek. You are pure and spotless with full of kindness. You are Rama, the consort of Janaki (Sita). You are the resident of Ayodhya and the darling son of Dasharatha. You are the abode of the supreme bliss, the Emperor of Raghu clan who bestows joy and happiness to devotees and You are loved by the people of Ayodhya.

title: Deena Dukhiyon Ke Taarana Kaarana
lyrics:
Tum Ho Eesa Masiha O Sai Baba [ Deena Dukhiyon ... ]
Dharma Uddharana Bhaktha Parayana
Adi Narayana Sai
Alakh Niranjan Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Parthi Narayana Sai (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, You are the destroyer of the miseries and pain of the destitute, You are the Supreme Lord descended for the revival or upliftment of righteousness and for guiding the devotees. O Lord Sai, You are the imperceptible and faultless and are the destroyer of the fear of the cycle of birth and death. O Sai, resident of Parthi, You are verily Lord Narayana.

title: Deena Dukhiyon Se Prem Karo
title2: Deena Dukhiyon Se Prem Karo Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
lyrics:
Sai Mera Main Tera Yeh Prem Ki Beheti Dhaara
Yeh Prem Ki Beheti Dhaara
Mera Sai Prasanna Hoga
meaning: My Lord Sai will be very happy, if you love and serve those afflicted with misery and pain. The flow of love binds us to Sai and binds Sai to us. This is the Stream of Love that flows amongst us.

title: Deena Janavana Deena Samrakshaka
lyrics:
Sanathana Sarathey Devadi Deva
Adi Sanathana Nithya Niranjana
Jagadodharana Sai Narayana
Jyothi Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa
Prashanthi Swaroopa Devadi Deva
meaning: O God of Gods, Sai Narayana, You are the protector and refuge of the destitute. You are the eternal charioteer. Your supreme state is eternal. You are spotless and unaffected by the world. You are the upholder and sustainer of the universe, the embodiment of effulgence, love and Supreme Peace.

title: Deena Janavani Vara Dayini
lyrics:
Gnana Swaroopini Narayani
Sayeeshwari Amba Jagadeeshwari
Veda (Swa)Roopini Vageshwari
Prema Pradayini Partheeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Mana Mohini [ Sayeeshwari Amba ... ]
meaning: O Mother Sai, the goddess of the universe, You are the refuge to the destitute. You bestow boons and You love divine music. You are the essence of the Vedas and the Goddess of speech who bestows love. You are Partheeshwari (Goddess of Parthi) and Maheshwari (the great Goddess). You are the one who delights the mind.

title: Deena Natha Sai Guru Natha
lyrics:
Prema Swaroopa Shanthi Pradatha [ Deena Natha ... ]
Jaya Jaya Guru Deva Satchidananda
Shashi Vadana Alankruta Kesha
Sundara Sai Ananda Dayi
Daya Sagara Karunakara Sai Guru Deva
meaning: O Divine Preceptor Sai, the Lord of the destitute, You are the embodiment of love. You grant peace to the devotees. Victory unto You, O Lord, the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss, who has a face like the moon, decorated with a crown of hair. O Sai, You are the ocean of compassion and kindness.

title: Deena Natha Shankara
lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shankara
Bhola Natha Kailasa Vasa
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Paramesha
Sayeeshwara Deva
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Shankara (Shiva), the bestower of happiness. You are the Lord of the destitute. You are none other than Lord Sai who resides in Parthi. O Lord, You are an ocean of compassion who is easy-to-please and whose abode is Mount Kailasa. O Lord of Parthi, You are the greatest Lord.

title: Deena Sharanya Deena Natha
lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Sai Baba
Karuna Sagara Sai
Sita Rama Radhey Shyama
Sai Sundara Rama
Maya Manusha Vesha Dharey Tum
Jaya Leeladhara Sai Baba
Jaya Leeladhara Sai
meaning: Oh radiant Lord Sai, You are the protector of needy and downtrodden, the ocean of compassion, You are Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Sita. You are also Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha. You have incarnated in these beautiful human form to be among Your devotees.

title: Deenodharana Rama Harey
lyrics:
Deena Dayala Krishna Harey
Raghukula Tilaka Rama Harey
Yadu Kula Nandana Krishna Harey
