meaning: Oh Rama, you are the saviour of the meek and week. You are also Krishna who is compassionate to the meek and week. You are the star of the Raghu clan and as Krishna, the darling of Nanda and the star of the Yadu clan.

title: Deenodharana Yadu Veera
lyrics:
Gopi Sanchitha Krutha Chora
Danava Samhara Ranadheera
Janaki Jeevana Aadhara
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You are the star and the courageous one of the Yadu clan, the upholder of the meek and week. You are the mischievous thief who stole butter from the Gopikas. You are the great warrior who annihilates demons. You are the same as Lord Rama, the refuge and life of Mother Janaki (Sita).

title: Dehi Sharanam Simha Vahini
lyrics:
Dehi Sharanam Asura Vinashini
Dehi Sharanam Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Dehi Sharanam Hari Narayani
Dehi Sharanam Brahma Sanathani
Dehi Sharanam Sai Narayani
meaning: Grant me protection, oh Goddess Durga, who rides the lion. Oh Sai Narayani, the destroyer of demons and of fear of the cycle of birth and death, the consort of Lord Narayana, the eternal infinite one, grant me protection.

title: Destroyer Of All Worldly Ties
title2: Destroyer Of All Worldly Ties, I Drink Bliss From Your Lotus Eyes
lyrics:
You Wear The Ganga As Your Crown
Burn Lust And Greed Right To The Ground

title: Deva Deva Daya Karo
lyrics:
Daya Karo Sai Deva
Krupa Karo Sai Deva
Antaryami Sai Natha
Parthipurisha Hey Paramesha
Deena Dayala Sai Natha
Prema Swaroopa Paramananda
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sadguru Deva
Karuna Sagara Sathya Sai Deva
meaning: O Lord Sai, the indweller of heart, have mercy and shower Thy grace. O Embodiment of Love and Bliss who resides at Parthi, Thou art extremely kind to the miserable, afflicted and dejected.

title: Deva Deva Giri Deva Dalarchita
lyrics:
Deva Sura Paripalaya Mamkita
Chandrachooda Shiva Tejovilarchita
Rundamala Dhara Trishoola Shobhita
meaning: O Lord Shiva, the God of Gods, the God of mountains who is worshipped with the petals of flowers and leaves, You are the protector of the Gods. We adore You, O Lord, the effulgent one who holds the Trident, adorned with the crescent moon on the head and a garland of skulls of evil-doers.

title: Deva Deva Mahadeva Sai Shankara
lyrics:
Sai Shankara Shirdeeshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Partheeshwara
Swarna Varna Tejonmaya Jagadeeshwara
Sarva Mantra Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
Vamadeva Virupaksha Vishweshwara
meaning: God of gods O Mahadeva, You are Sai Shankara, the resident of Shirdi. You are Partheeshwara, who creates the sacred and divine ash. You are the effulgent God of the universe. You are Sayeeshwara, Vama Deva, Virupaksha and Vishveshwara who are the embodiment of all mantras.

title: Deva Deva Vasudeva Kumara
lyrics:
Mohana Mohana Hari Nandalala 
Megha Megha Shyama (Ghana) Ghana Megha Megha Shyama Gopala [ Mohana Mohana ... ]
Nanda Nanda Yadu Nanda Kishora 
Ranga Ranga Hey Chitta Chora
Radha Radha Raasa Vilola [ Mohana Mohana ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, who is the son of Vasudeva and Nanda. He is beautiful and dark-complexioned like rainclouds. He is the stealer of hearts who performed the Divine dance 'Raasa Leela' with Radha and the Gopikas.

title: Deva Devothama Deena Samrakshaka
lyrics:
Devadi Deva Dayamaya
Sri Sai Deva Krupamaya [ Deva Devothama ... ]
Patithodhara Paapa Vidhura
Parthi Vihara Parameshwara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhava Bhaya Nashana [ Sri Sai Deva ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sri Sai, You are Supreme among Gods, the protector of the afflicted. Oh Lord of all Lords, You are the embodiment of compassion, You are the embodiment of mercy, the uplifter of the fallen and the destitute, O the Supreme Lord who moves about in Parthi, the Creator of Bhasma, the sacred ash and the remover of the fear of the bondage of cycle of birth and death, glory be to Thee.

title: Deva Senapathey Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi
title2: Deva Senapathey Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Paahi Parameshwara Skanda Subrahmanya Paahi Maam
Subrahmanya Shanmukha Natha
Sai Natha Karuna Sindho [ Paahi Parameshwara ... ]
meaning: O Lord Subrahmanya (son of Shiva), the chief of the battalion of Gods (Devas), protect us. O Skanda, the Supreme God, protect us. Protect us, O Lord with six faces, You have incarnated as Lord Sai, the embodiment of kindness.

title: Devadi Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sri Sai Deva Sathya Sai Deva
Sai Krupala Deena Dayala [ Devadi Deva ... ]
Raksha Karo Sathya Sai Gopala
Karuna Sindhu Deena Ke Bandhu
Sai Gopala Hey Nandalala
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of the Lords Sathya Sai, the most compassionate one. Protect us, O Sai Gopala, You are the ocean of compassion and the kin of the downtrodden. You are verily Lord Krishna.

title: Devadi Deva Vinayaka
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Suramuni Vanditha [ Devadi Deva ... ]
Mangala Charana Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shubha Dayaka Vighna Vinashaka
Sri Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam (2)
meaning: God of Gods Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, You are the embodiment of Pranava, the primordial sound, You are the one who is worshipped by Gods and saints. We surrender at Your auspicious Feet, protect us, O Lord. We pray to You to bestow goodness and frees us from the miseries of the world.

title: Devaki Nandana Gopala (Vasu)
lyrics:
Shyama Mukunda Gopala [ Devaki Nandana ... ]
Radha Madhava Raasa Vilola
Leela Manusha Natavara Lala
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, the beloved son of Mother Devaki Chant the name of Lord Gopala, who is also known as Shyama, the one who is beautiful because of the color black and the conferrer of Liberation. Chant the name of the one who is as sweet as honey and who delights in participating in folk dances with Radha. Chant the name of the Lord, who is a supreme dancer.

title: Devaki Nandana Krishna (Vasu)
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Krishna Krishna [ Devaki Nandana ... ]
Madhava Govinda Krishna
Neela Megha Krishna
Jaya Sri Krishna Sai Krishna Govinda Gopala Krishna
Hari Govinda Gopala Krishna
meaning: Chant the different names (Madhava, Govinda, Gopala) of blue-complexioned Lord Krishna, son of Devaki.

title: Devaki Tanaya Daya Nidhey
lyrics:
Daya Nidhey Krupa Nidhey [ Devaki Tanaya ... ]
Darshan Deejo Deva (Sai) Deva
Deena Natha Sai Natha
meaning: Worship the merciful and compassionate Son of Mother Devaki, Lord Krishna. O Lord, You are the treasure house of compassion and mercy. O Lord of Lords, Sai, the up-lifter of the forlorn, please grant us Your Darshan, the view of Your Divine Form.

title: Devasena Pathey Subrahmanya
lyrics:
Subrahmanya Shanmukha Natha [ (Valli) Devasena Pathey ... ]
Hara Haro Hara Gowri Nandana
Paahi Maam Paahi Maam Pazhani (Parthi) Pureesha

Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Shanmukha Hara Haro Hara
meaning: Lord Subrahmanya is the consort of Valli and Devasena, and the son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi). O Lord of Pazhani and Puttaparthi, please protect me. Destroy all our troubles and afflictions, O Lord Muruga.

title: Devi Bhavani Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Manda Haasini Ananda Dayini [ Devi Bhavani ... ]
Mangala Kaarini Karunya Roopini
Narayani Devi Narayani
Mahishasura Mardhini Ambe Bhavani
meaning: Glory to Goddess Bhavani, the Mother of Universe and the destroyer of cycle of birth and death. She has a bewitching smile and she confers bliss. She confers auspiciousness and is the embodiment of mercy. Worship Goddess Narayani. She is the annihilator of the demon Mahisha. She is worshipped as Goddess Amba.

title: Devi Bhavani Ma Jaya Sai
title2: Devi Bhavani Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Daya Karo Sai Ma Krupa Karo Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Devi Bhavani Ma
Jaya Parthi Nivasini Ma Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. O Mother Sai, bestow on us Your mercy and compassion. O Mother, the resident of Parthi, victory to Thee.

title: Devi Durga Dasha Bhuja Dharini
lyrics:
Danava Daithya Dushta Samhaarini [ Devi Durga ... ]
Bhagawathi Bharati Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Kaarini
Raja Rajeshwari Girija Bhavani
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Bhavani
meaning: Chant the name of Goddess Durga, who has ten arms. She is the destroyer of evil people and demons. Mother Maheshwari, confers auspiciousness. Mother Bhavani, the daughter of Himavan, mountain king, is also Raja Rajeshwari - the queen of queens. She is verily Sai Bhavani, who protects the devotees.

title: Devi Durga Kalyani
lyrics:
Maha Shakthi Bhavani Shivani [ Devi Durga ]
Suguna Manohari Sai Bhavani
Devi Jagadambe Janani Dayamayi
Vande Bhagawathi Mata Bhavani
meaning: Oh goddess Durga, who confers auspiciousness. You are Bhavani with tremendous power, who is the consort of Shiva. You are the captivating Sai Bhavani with virtuous qualities. Oh divine mother of the universe, who is highly compassionate. Oh mother who is adored as Bhagawathi and Bhavani, we bow to you.

title: Devi Jagat Janani Sai Mata
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopini Praneshwari [ Devi Jagat ... ]
Gnana Pradayini Gnaneshwari
Tripura Sundari Daakshayini
Bhagawathi Bharati Narayani
Jagadeeshwari Jaganmohini
Karunamayi Sathya Sayeeshwari
meaning: O Mother Sai, You are the Mother to the entire world, You are the form of Pranava (Primordial Sound, Om) and You are the very life. O Embodiment of wisdom, You grant us the knowledge and wisdom. O Daughter of Dhaksha (Goddess Parvathi), You are the most beautiful one in all the three worlds. You are Bhagawathi, Bharati and Narayani. O Goddess of the entire world, You enchant the whole world. O Mother Sathya Sai, You are the embodiment of compassion.

title: Devi Janani Sai Janani Darshana
title2: Devi Janani Sai Janani Darshana Do Mata
lyrics:
Danava Mardhini Dharma Swaroopini Darshan Do Mata
Sathya Sanathani Shanthi Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Prema Pradayini Darshan Do Mata
Darshan Do Mata (4)
meaning: O Universal Mother Sai, bestow on us the vision of Your divine form. You are the destroyer of demons and the embodiment of righteousness. You are the eternal truth and the goddess of Parthi who bestows peace and love.

title: Devi Lakshmi Maam Paahi
lyrics:
Deena Dayakari Maam Paahi [ Devi Lakshmi ... ]
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Maam Paahi
Sarva Mangaley Maam Paahi
meaning: O Goddess Lakshmi, protect us. You are compassionate towards the meek and week. You are the consort of Narayana, reclining on the ocean of milk. Protect us, O Goddess of auspiciousness.

title: Devi Ma Jagadambe Ma
lyrics:
Chinmaya Roopini Sai Ma [ Devi Ma … ]
Gaana Manohari Sai Ma
Manjula Bhaashini Sai Ma
Bhakthoddharini Sai Ma
(Pra) Shanthi Dayini Sai Ma
meaning: Glory to the Mother of the world, Mother Sai, the embodiment of consciousness, the one who is pleased by music, whose words are nectarine and pleasing. Glory to the one who uplifts Her devotees and grants Supreme Peace.

title: Devi Sai Ma Devi Saraswathi
title2: Devi Sai Ma Devi Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Durga Bhavani Ma Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Sai Daya Karo Ma (Sathya)
meaning: Worship Mother Sai, Mother Saraswathi (Goddess of knowledge and wisdom), Mother Durga Bhavani (Destroyer of the cycle of birth and death) and Mother Kaali (Destroyer of demonic qualities and the One holding a skull as a symbol). O Uplifter of the entire universe, please be compassionate towards us.

title: Devi Saraswathi Ma Jaya Sai
title2: Devi Saraswathi Ma Jaya Sai Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
Dasha Bhujadharini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
meaning: Victory to the Mother, Devi, Saraswathi. Victory to the One who sustains the Universe, the One who with 10 hands.

title: Devotees have called on Baba
lyrics:
I have called You Baba everyone has called You
 Give us give us something to lean on
 You have to come Baba, You have to come You have to come
 Please come from Shirdi or come from Parthi
 Come from Mathura or come from Ayodhya
 You may come from Mecca or Medina
 O my Baba, O my Sai Ram, You really have to come
 You have to come Baba, You have to come You have to come

title: Dhanya Dhanya Mera Jeevan
lyrics:
Tera Darshan Paaya Maine
Teri Charanon Mey Aaya Prabhuji [ Dhanya Dhanya ... ]
Teri Leela Sabse Nyaari
Teri Mahima Jeevan Daatri
meaning: O Lord Sai, my life is blessed as I have received Your Divine Darshan and have offered myself at Thy Lotus Feet. O Lord, Your Divine Miracles are unique and life bestowing. Glory to Thee O Lord Sai.

title: Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba
lyrics:
Jag Ko Deejo Lal Baba
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Sakala Charachara Ke Bhagawan
Jagadodhara Sai Narayana
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba (2)
meaning: Glory to Thee, O auspicious Mother Eshwaramba, You have gifted Lord Sai to the world in the present Kali age. Lord Sai is verily Lord Narayana who is omnipresent and has come for the deliverance of mankind.

title: Dharani Nayaka Govinda
lyrics:
Dinakara Teja Govinda [ Dharani Nayaka ... ]
Venu Gaana Priya Govinda
Venkata Ramana Govinda
Geeta Dayaka Govinda
Shritha Paripalaka Govinda
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna (Govinda), the Lord of the Universe who has the effulgence of the Sun, who loves to play beautiful music on His flute, who gave us the Bhagawad Geeta and who protects and sustains His devotees.

title: Dharma no Keshin yo Rama
title2: Dharma no Keshin yo Rama Jiai no Uminaru Rama
lyrics:
Warera wo Michibiku Rama Sathya Sai ni Kagayaku Rama [ Dharma no ... ]
Haato ni Kagayaku Rama Seigi no Chikara yo Rama
Shinri ni Michibiku Rama Warera no Inochi no Rama
meaning: Lord Rama, You are the embodiment of righteousness with love as deep as the ocean. With Your power, You shine Your light on our hearts and guide us.

title: Dhim Dhim Dhimi Dhimi Natana
title2: Dhim Dhim Dhimi Dhimi Natana Shiva
lyrics:
Tandava Keli Vilasa Shiva
Leela Manusha Vesha Shiva
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shiva (Atma)
Sai Shiva Hara Bala Shiva
meaning: Lord Shiva's rhythmical dance is referred to here as 'Dhim Dhim Dhimi'. He performs the cosmic dance, Tandava and has taken the human form, which is like a sport (leela) for Him. Glory to Sathya Sai, our young Shiva, who brings out the Lingam from within, by His Divine Will.

title: Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhimitha Dhimitha
title2: Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Nachey Bhola Nath
lyrics:
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
Mrudanga Boley Shiva Shiva Shiva Om
Damaru Boley Hara Hara Hara Om
Veena Boley Sai Ram Sai Ram
Nachey Bhola Nath (4)
meaning: Lord Shiva dances in ecstacy with the tune, "Dhimita Dhimita Dhim". The Mrudanga (musical instrumental) chants the auspicious name of, "Shiva Shiva Shiva". Along with it, the drum vibrates with the sound, "Hara Hara Hara Om" and the Veena (musical instrument) chants "Sai Ram".

title: Dhin Dhin Thaka Thaka
title2: Dhin Dhin Thaka Thaka Dhin Dhin Na Baajey Damaru
lyrics:
Shiva Ji Bajaayey Bajaayey Damaru [ Dhin Dhin ... ]
Narthana Kar Shiva Raja Darshan Do Shiva Raja
Taal Manjira Dholak Baajey Ghanana Ghanana Ghana Baajey
Shiva Ji Ke Mandir Mey Ghungroo Jhanana Jhanana Jhana Baajey
Bajaavey Re Bajaavey Re Bajaavey Damaru [ Shiva Ji Bajaayey ... ]
meaning: Behold as Lord Shiva dances gracefully to the beats of the Damaru (miniature drum), Manjira (cymbals), Dholak (folk drum). His temple resounds with the beautiful sound of the Ghungroo (anklet bells). Worship Lord Shiva as the King of all creation.

title: Dhina Dhinama Obe
title2: Dhina Dhinama Obe, Sama Thanema Lovee
lyrics:
Shubha Sarana Soya Ava
 Sathya Sai Thumani Shirdi Sai Thumani
 Obe Sarana Soya Ava
 Obe Pada Kamal Puda Suvandha Malin
 Bathi Gee Gayamin Namadhimu Samagin
 Yadhumata Api Ava Sai Ram, Pidhumata Apa Ava Sai Ram

title: Divine Mother Parvathi Blissful Mother
title2: Divine Mother Parvathi, Blissful Mother Sai
lyrics:
Lead Us From Harm, Lead Us From Fear, Grant Us Eternal Happiness
Mother Of The Universe, Charming And Holy
Overwhelming In Compassion, Blissful Mother Sai

title: Divine mother Sai
title2: Divine mother Sai, please come and be with me
lyrics:
Divine mother Sai, be as a mother to me
Divine mother Sai, please come and be with me
I call You in weakness
That's when I long for Your sweetness
Your tender loving, care and giving, takes care of troubles for me (2x)
I cry to You in sickness
That's when I long for Your sweetness
Your tender loving, care and giving, (Sai) takes care of troubles for me (2x)

title: Divine Mother Soham
title2: Divine Mother Soham You And I Are One
lyrics:
Shirdi Baba Soham You And I Are One
Jesus Christ Soham You And I Are One
Divine Father Soham You And I Are One
Brahma Brahma Soham You And I Are One
Allah Allah Soham You And I Are One
Buddha Buddha Soham You And I Are One
Sathya Sai Soham You And I Are One

title: Don't Give Up
title2: Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Givin’
lyrics:
Don’t Give Up! Just Pour
Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Livin’
The Lord Will Show You More
 
Don’t Give Up! Just Practice Trustin’
Don’t Give Up! Just Be
Don’t Give Up! Stop All That Fussin’
Surrender You Will See
 
Life Is Lived One Day At A Time
Life Is All We Need
Life’s Fulfilled Once We See All Is Fine
So Give And You Will Receive
 
Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Livin’
Don’t Give Up! Just Share
Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Givin’
Your Good Is In His Care
 
Don’t Give Up! Just Be Happy
Don’t Give Up! Live Now
Don’t Give Up! Follow What’s Lasting
You’ll See Exactly How
 
The Universe Is A Perfect Place
It Knows Just What To Do
Our Small Part Is So Very Simple
To Know What Is The Truth
 
So Don’t Give Up! Be Always Grateful
You’re Blessed So Be Assured
To Simply Give What You’ve Been Given
A Heart That Is So Pure
 
Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Lovin’
Don’t Give Up! Be Still
Don’t Give Up! Just Keep On Givin’
You’ll Find His Perfect Will...
His Perfect Will

title: Dont Worry Be Happy
title2: Dont Worry, Be Happy For Baba Loves Us So
lyrics:
Illusions Are Many But Underneath Them All
There Is One Reality That You And I Are One
That God Is Love And Love Is God And God And Man Are One

title: Door Of My Heart
title2: Door Of My Heart Open Wide I Keep For Thee
lyrics:
Wilt Thou Come (2), Precious Baba, Come To Me [ Door Of ... ]
Will My Days Fly Away Without Seeing Thee My Lord
Night And Day, Night And Day, I Look For Thee Night And Day
alt_lyrics:
Door Of My Heart Open Wide I Keep For Thee
Wilt Thou Come (2), Just for Once, Come To Me [ Door Of ... ]
Will My Days Fly Away Without Seeing Thee My Lord
Night And Day, Night And Day, I Look For Thee Night And Day

title: Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru
title2: Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru Bajey
lyrics:
Bhola Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Hara Sai Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bajey
Gowri Nath Shiva Shambho Bhajey [ Hara Sai Nath ... ]
meaning: In ecstacy, the drum (Damaru) beats "Dum Dum Dum". It plays in the worship of Lord Sai and Lord Shiva, the easy-to-be-pleased Lord and the destroyer of ignorance. The gong rings out the sounds "Ghan Ghan Ghan". Worship the Lord of Goddess Parvathi (the consort of Lord Shiva).

title: Dum Dum Dum Dum Genki
title2: Dum Dum Dum Dum Genki Yoku
lyrics:
Kami eno Ai wo Uchinarasou
Youki ni Akaruku Takaraka ni
Kami eno Sanbi wo Utaou
Kami eno Kokoro wo Utaou 
Kami eno Ai wo Uchinarasou
Youki ni Akaruku Takaraka ni
meaning: Listen to the skillful drums of our Lord. Let us become one with God's love and sing out with joy from the bottom of our hearts.

title: Dum Dum Dum Dum Toca Tu Tambor
title2: Dum Dum Dum Dum toca tu tambor
lyrics:
Porque ha nacido en Puttaparthi el señor
Sathya Sai Baba se llama el avatar
Y ha venido al mundo a enseñarnos a amar
Y ha venido al mundo a traernos la paz
meaning: "Dum Dum Dum Dum" play your drum, because the Lord has been born in Puttaparthi. The Avatar is called Sathya Sai Baba, and He has come to the world to teach us to love and to bring us peace.

title: Dum Dum, Dum Dum, listen to the beat
title2: Dum Dum, Dum Dum, listen to the beat of the drum
lyrics:
Dum Dum, Dum Dum, every heart beating as one 
With each beat of the drum, as we all sing His name
In the rhythm of love, one and all are the same 
Every breath, every word, every name sung and heard
Every being, every soul, every heart in this world
Beating Dum Dum, Dum Dum, listen to the beat of the drum

title: Durga Amba Bhavani Jai Jai
title2: Durga Amba Bhavani Jai Jai Durga Amba Bhavani
lyrics:
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini
Pranava Swaroopini Mata Jai Jai
Durga Amba Bhavani
meaning: Victory to goddess Durga, glorified by the names Amba and Bhavani, the annihilator of miseries, bestower of auspiciousness and the embodiment of the primordial sound Om.

title: Durga Bhavani Ma Jaya Jaya
title2: Durga Bhavani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
lyrics:
Kaali Kapalini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma [ Durga Bhavani ... ]
Parama Shivani Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who is verily Mother Durga (Parvathi). Victory to the Divine Mother hailed as Bhavani, Kaali. Victory to Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of Supreme Power and who has come to save and deliver mankind.

title: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Hey Sai
title2: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
lyrics:
Sai Jaganmata Mata Sai Jaganmata [ Durga Lakshmi ... ]
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Hey Sai Jaganmata
Durga Lakshmi Amba Bhavani Sai Jaganmata [ Sai Jaganmata ]
meaning: Hey Sai, the universal mother. You are goddess Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi who plays the divine Veena.

title: Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Dukha Nivarini Jagat Janani
Janani Janani Janani [ Durga Lakshmi ... ]
Janma Vimochani Jagadambe
Paapa Vinashini Parama Shivey
Para Sukha Dayini Sai Shivey
Parthi Nivasini Sada Shivey [ Janani Janani ... ]
meaning: Adore the universal Mother, who is worshipped as Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. You are the remover of sorrows and the one who frees us from the cycle of birth and death by washing away our sins. You are the Supreme Goddess of Parthi who is compassionate and who bestows bliss to all.

title: Durgati Nashini Durge Jaya Jaya
lyrics:
Kaala Vinashini Kaali Jaya Jaya [ Durgati Nashini ... ]
Uma Rama Brahmani Jaya Jaya (2)
Sita Radha Rukmini Jaya Jaya
meaning: Victory to Goddess Durga, who destroys misfortunes and distress. Victory to Goddess Kali, who is the destroyer of demonic qualities. Victory to Goddess Uma, Sita, Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Sai, who is affectionate, tender and loving towards us.

title: Durge Durge Devi Durgati Nashini
lyrics:
Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini [ Durge Durge ... ]
Bhagawathi Bharati Devi Saraswathi
Ambe Bhavani Lakshmi Narayani
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
meaning: Chant the name of Durga, the goddess who removes poverty. Chant the name of Kaali, the goddess who adorns the garland of skulls (of evil doers). O Mother Sai, You are also adored as Bhagawathi, Bharati, Saraswathi, Bhavani and Lakshmi.

title: Durge Durge Durge Jai Jai
title2: Durge Durge Durge Jai Jai Ma (2)
lyrics:
Karuna Sagari Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma
(Amba) Durge Jai Jai (Sai) Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, the ocean of compassion. Glory to Mother Kaali, who is adorned with a garland of human skulls (represents the destruction of our ego) and who uplifts the whole world. Victory to Mother Durga who is none other than our dear Mother Sai.

title: Durgeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari (Amba)
lyrics:
Paramesha Jagadeesha Partheeshwari [ Durgeshwari ... ]
Karunya Lavanya Kamaleshwari
Sathya Sai Jaganmata Parameshwari
meaning: O Universal Mother Durga, You are none other than Mother Sathya Sai, the Supreme Lord who resides at Parthi. You are also adored as Kamaleshwari, with elegant beauty and compassion.

title: Dwaraka Natha Madhusudhana Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Devaki Nandana
Sai Sundara Shyama [ Dwaraka Natha ... ]
Mandara Giridhara Venu Vilolana
Kamala Vadana Ghana Shyam
Parthi Vihari Krishna Murari
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Shyama
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Madhu, You are the dark-hued Lord of Dwaraka, the darling of Gokula and Nanda. You enchant us with Your divine flute playing in the woods of Mandara mountain. Your face is like the lotus flower. You are none other than our beautiful Lord Sai.

title: Dwell In Our Hearts
lyrics:
From our hearts there’s a cry Sathya Sai
We are yearning only for You
For they say You are our only saviour
Who will lead us to our destiny
 
Come and dwell in our hearts Sathya Sai
Never leave us alone Sathya Sai
For we know You are our Mother/Father
Without You there’s no one else for us

title: E te Ariki
lyrics:
Whakarongo mai ra kia maatou
E te Ariki
Titiro mai ra kia maatou
Anei maatou a tamariki, Te whaapono anei maatou kia koe (2)
Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue
Te Maatua, te Tamaiti
Wairua Tapu e
meaning: Listen to the cry of Your children, Oh Lord! Look down upon us with Your Sweet Love. Here we are all together and we worship and say that we love You. Our Father, Our Father. The Father, the Son, and the comfort of the Holy Ghost.

title: E te Atua, aroha mai
lyrics:
E te Atua, aroha mai
E te Atua, aroha mai
Ake, ake, tonu e
Ake, ake, tonu e
E te Atua, manaaki mai
E te Atua, manaaki mai
E te Atua, manaaki mai
Ake, ake, tonu e
Ake, ake, tonu e
E te Atua, awhina mai
E te Atua, awhina mai
E te Atua, awhina mai
Ake, ake, tonu e
Ake, ake, tonu e
meaning: Oh God, shower us with love forever and ever. Oh God, bless us forever and ever. Oh God, help us forever and ever.

title: Ehara I Te Mea
lyrics:
Nō nāianei te aroha 
Nō ngā tupuna 
I tuku iho, i tuku iho
meaning: Love is handed down from our ancestors.

title: Ek Baar Kshama Karo Sai
title2: Ek Baar Kshama Karo Sai Merey Baba Sri Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Kshama Murthy Sai Baba Prema Murthy Sathya Sai [ Ek Baar ... ]
Shirdi Ke Sai Teri Dwarakamayi
Parthi Ke Sai Teri Yaad Mujhey Aayi [ Kshama Murthy ... ]
meaning: O dear Lord Sathya Sai Baba, the Merciful One, please forgive me. You are full of forgiveness and love. O Shirdi Sai, residing in Dwarakamayi, You remind me that You are none other than Sathya Sai, the dweller of Parthi.

title: Eka Dantha Sri Gananatha
lyrics:
Eshwara Priya Sutha Vinayaka
Pranava Swaroopa Gananatha [ Eka Dantha Sri ... ]
Adi Poojya Sri Gananatha
Parvathi Tanaya Vinayaka
Paahi Paahi Hey Gananatha
Lambodhara Ganadhipa
Vighna Harana Sai Vinayaka
meaning: Pray to Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganaas (Shiva's hordes), the elephant-faced one with a single tusk. Pray to Him who removes obstacles, the beloved son of Shiva. Pray to Him who is the embodiment of the life-giving force, Pranava. Pray to Him, with whom all Holy rituals begin. Pray to the pot-bellied one, the son of Parvathi and the one who removes obstacles.

title: Eka Dantham Sai Gajananam
lyrics:
Ganapathim Vara Siddhi Vinayakam [ Eka Dantham ... ]
Gananatham Shiva Gowri Sutham
Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (2)

Gajamukham Sai Gajananam (3)
Gajananam Sai Gajananam (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the single tusked, elephant-faced lord, the leader of Ganaas (demigods), bestower of boons, the one who as none above, the beloved son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi) and Lord Shiva.

title: Ekolu mea nui (Three Important Things)
title2: Ekolu mea nui ma ka ho—nua
lyrics:
(There are three important things in this world)
O ka mano’o ‘i o ka mana’o la—na
(There is Faith, There is Hope)
A me ke aloha ke aloha ka’i o’i a’e
(And there is Love … and the greatest of these is Love)
Po-mai-ka-i na mea a-pau
(With Love, everything is blessed)
Po-mai-ka-i na mea a-pau
(With Love, everything is blessed)

title: El Señor es mi pastor
title2: El Señor es mi pastor, y nada me faltará.
lyrics:
El Señor, aquí llegó a darnos libertad
Loemos a nuestro Señor, cantando con mucho fervor.
Loemos a nuestro Señor, cantando con mucho amor.
Jai Rama, Jai Rama, Jai Rama Jai (2x)
Jai Krishna, Jai Krishna, Jai Krishna Jai (2x)
Jai Buddha, Jai Buddha, Jai Buddha Jai (2x)
Jai Cristo, Jai Cristo, Jai Cristo Jai (2x)
¿Por qué temer si estoy aquí?
Solo llamar y yo estoy ahí
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(accompaniment stops)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(Accompaniment reenters, speed increases)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai (2x)
(speed increases)
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba Jai
Jai Sai Baba, Jai Sai Baba, Jai (pause)
(sing slowly)
Sai Baba Jai

title: Emmai Alum Eraivanava
lyrics:
Andamellam Niraivanava Va Va 
Sindai Muzhudhum Pugundhanava Va Va 
Niththiya Nadamittudalai Atkolla Va Va Va [ Emmai Alum ... ]  

Uyirin Ulle Kalandhanava Va Va 
Unarvil Uyarvai Milirndhanava Va Va 
Om Enruyir Moochanava Va Va 
Thimmakudi Natarajare Va Va  
Anbunarvanava Va Va, Natamadi Va Va Va, Nardhanamadi Va Va Va, Natanamadi Va Va Va [ Emmai Alum ... ]
meaning: Come, O Lord who rules us, who permeates the whole Universe and who occupies my mind. Come, O Lord, to rule our bodies by Your eternal Cosmic dance. Come, O Lord and become one with the soul and shine high in consciousness. Come, O Lord who is verily Om, the source of life. Come, O Lord Nataraja of Thimmakudi. O the embodiment of Love, please come beautifully dancing.

title: En la tierra estas
lyrics:
Caminando En Paz
Mia Es Tu Verdad
Hombre Avatar
Pues Mi Corazon
Te Robaste Ya
Om Baba Baba Om, Om Baba Om
En Tu Nilayam
Quema Mi Temor
Swami Sathya Sai
Mi Amo Y Senor Madre, Padre, Y Dios
Om Baba Om
Om Baba Baba Om, Om Baba Om
meaning: Your are an Avatar on earth, walking in peace; Your truth is mine because You stole my heart. Burn my fear in your Nilayam; Swami Sathya Sai; my Lord; Mother, Father, and God.

title: Engrossed is the bee of my mind
title2: Engrossed is the bee of my mind
lyrics:
On the Blue Lotus Feet of my Divine Mother
 Divine Mother, my Divine Mother (2X)

title: Eres la luna que florece
title2: Eres la luna que florece de luz
lyrics:
Supremo Señor de la Verdad
Eres el nombre que nos salvará
Señor de Parthi me inclino ante ti
Mi bienamado me rindo a tus pies
(Sai) Tu luz eterna enciende mi ser
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the moon whose light shines brightly, You are the supreme being of truth, Your name is the one who will save us. I bow down before You, O Lord of Parthi. I surrender at Your feet, my beloved. Your light burns eternally within me.

title: Eres mi Madre y Padre
title2: Eres mi Madre y Padre, eres mi Dios Sai Baba
lyrics:
Eres mi Divina Madre, Cristo, Ala, Buda y Rama
Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna, Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama, Harey Rama, Rama Rama Harey Harey
meaning: You are my Mother, Father and God, Sai Baba. You are my Divine Mother, Christ, Allah, Buddha, and Rama.

title: Es el que invade el corazon
title2: Es el que invade el corazon
lyrics:
Es el que nos llena de Amor 
Residente de Parthi, fuente de Amor
Residente de Parthi te canto a Vos. 
Maestro de la Cancion. 
Baname de Paz con tu voz
Baname de Paz con el Om
meaning: Glory to the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, the one who conquers our hearts, the one who fills us with Love and who is the very source of Love. O Master of the divine song, I sing to You. Shower Peace on me with your Divine Voice. Shower Peace on me with Om.

title: Eshwar Allah Ek Tum Hi
title2: Eshwar Allah Ek Tum Hi Ho
lyrics:
Karuna Sindho Ram
Deena (Bhaktha) Janon Ke Jeevan Saharey
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Karuna Sagara Dayabhi Rama
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Eshwara (refers to God in Hinduism) and Allah (God in Islam) are both one and the same. The name refers to the same Almighty. O Lord Rama, You are the most compassionate one, You are the refuge to the destitute and the saviour of the devotees. Chant victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama and Allah.

title: Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sai
title2: Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sai Terey Naam
lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
Allah Sai Maulah Sai
Yesu Buddha Sai Hey Mahavir Sai
Govinda Sai Gopala Sai Nanak Sai [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, Eshwara is your name, so is the name Allah (the names Eshwar and Allah, both reach You, O Lord Sai). O Sathya Sai Rama, You are fond of all the faiths, You are Allah and You are Maulah. O Sai, You are Jesus Christ, Buddha, Mahavir. You are Govinda, Gopala, Guru Nanak. You are fond of all the faiths (all the Faiths lead to You).

title: Eshwara Allah Terey Naam Eshwari
title2: Eshwara Allah Terey Naam Eshwari Nandana Sai Ram
lyrics:
Krishna Christhu Terey Naam Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Rama Raghava Terey Naam Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Ram
Krishna Keshava Terey Naam Karuna Sagara Sai Shyam
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are adored as Lord Shiva and Allah. You are Sai Ram, the son of mother Eshwaramba. You are none other than Lord Krishna, Jesus Christ, Lord Rama and Lord Sai of Shirdi. You are also known by Keshava and Shyama (names of Lord Krishna) and You are an ocean of compassion.

title: Eshwaramba Nandana Jagat Vidhata
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva Daya Karo Guru Deva (Hey)
Kamala Nayana Hey Hrudaya Vihari
Ananda Dayaka Hey Giridhari
Charan Sharan Mey Lelo Hum Ko
Yuga Avatara Krishna (Sai) Murari [ Parthi Nivasa ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, son of Eshwaramba, creator of the universe, dweller of Puttaparthi, noble Lord and Teacher, O lotus-eyed one, indweller of devotees' hearts, O Sai Krishna, incarnation of this age, bestow Thy Grace on us, make us merge in You.

title: Eshwaramba Nandana Niranjana Namo Namo
lyrics:
Sarva Devatha Athitha Swaroopa Namo Namo [ Eshwaramba ]
Bhaktha Hrudaya Vasa Bhaktha Chintana Namo Namo
Sarva Loka Nayaka Sanathana Namo Namo
Sayeeshwara Namo Namo Sarveshwara Namo Namo (3)
meaning: Salutation to thee Oh Sayeeshwara, the son of mother Eshwaramba, who is pure and spotless. You are the embodiment of all forms of Gods, the indweller of the heart, brooding always the welfare of devotees. O supreme Lord of all worlds, we bow unto you.

title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai
lyrics:
Shirdi Parthi Prema Sai
Vishwa Kalyana Karana Sai
Shashwata Ananda Dayi Sai
meaning: Oh Sai, you are the darling of Eshwaramba. You are the beloved of the people of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the cause of universal welfare and goodness. You are the bestower of perpetual bliss.

title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Janardhana
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Guru Deva
Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
Mangala Dayaka Sai Guru Deva
Munijana Mohana Madhava Sai
Prashanthi Nilaya Deva [ Parthi Pureeshwara ... ]
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Sai, residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, Oh son of Eshwaramba, you bestow auspiciousness and you are worshipped by sages.

title: Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Rama
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sardhaka Rama
Prema Swaroopa Ananda Swaroopa
Jai Jai Sathya Sai Jai Divya Swaroopa
meaning:
Oh Lord the son of Eshwaramba, Sai Ram, The Lord of Prasanthi Nilayam, 
You are the very embodiment of all the supreme virtues that enable man to become God. You are the Embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.
You are the form of Love, You are the form of Bliss. Victory to the Lord Sathya Sai, Victory to the Lord of Divine Form.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana
lyrics:
Sai Jaya Jaga Vandana (2) [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Rajeeva Nayana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (3) (Narayana Sai Narayana)
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba. You are worshipped by the whole world. You are the jewel of the Ratnakara clan. You have beautiful eyes. O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Hari, Narayana.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana
lyrics:
Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
Akhila Loka Nayaka
Parama Poojya Pavana
Apastamba Sutrana
Antaranga Rangana
Bharadwajasa Gotrana
Bhavya Naama Keerthana
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai, the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba. Glory to the crown jewel of the Ratnakara clan, the Master of the whole world, the supremely sacred Lord worthy of worship, the one born in the lineage of sages Bharadwaja and Apastamba. Glory to the omniscient one, the indweller of all beings. We offer our salutations and reverentially sing Your Holy Name.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana Hey Sai
title2: Eshwaramba Priya Nandana Hey Sai Rama
lyrics:
Ikshvaku Vamsha Deepa Hey Sai Rama
Devagiri Sutha Sai Shirdi Sai Rama
Godavari Thata Vasi Hey Sai Rama
Prema Sai Natha Avatara Sai Rama
Sarvatma Swaroopa Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the darling son of Mother Eshwaramba who incarnated as Lord Rama, the radiant lamp of the Ishvaku lineage, who is verily Lord Sai of Shirdi, the son of Devagiri amma. Glory to the one who resides on the banks of river Godavari, who is the very incarnation of Love, who is the embodiment of every soul, Lord Sathya Sai Rama.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
title2: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Sri Sathya Sai (2)
lyrics:
Ni Divya Charithamu Chadivina Vinina (2)
Vinina Chadivina Anandamu
Dayamaya Sai Karunamaya (2)
Karunamaya Karunincha Vayya
Satatamu Ni Nama Smaranamu Make (2)
meaning: The darling Son of mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sri Sathya Sai. Your Divine Story, the one who reads or listens. the one who listens or reads is blissful. He is full of compassion and merciful. Oh Lord with Compassion, show the mercy. We need the chanting of your name always.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
lyrics:
Esha Mahesha Sri Sayeesha
Yuga Avatara Sayeesha
Poornavatara (Premavatara) Sayeesha
meaning: Glory to the loving son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sai, the embodiment of Lord Shiva. Sai is the incarnation of the Kali Age in His complete glory. He is the very incarnation of Love.

title: Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Kali Yug Mey Avatar Liye
Kan Kan Mey Tera Naam (O Sai) (2)
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba, to whom You are Sai Narayana. You have incarnated in this present Kali Age as our Lord Sathya Narayana. You are all pervading and Your name is present in every atom.

title: Eshwaramba Tanaya Sai Dayachupumu
title2: Eshwaramba Tanaya Sai Dayachupumu Nive Sai
lyrics:
Karunakara Sindho Sai Mamora Vinuma Sai [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Prema Swaroopamu Nivu Sathya Dharma Sandeshamu Nivu
Jagat Rakshaka Sathya Sai Talliyu Tandriyu Nive [ Eshwaramba ... ]
Sarvantaryami Sai Ma Sarvamu Nive Sai
Kanakambaradhara Sai Kaliyuga Daivamu Nive
meaning:
The son of Eshwaramba Sai, Show Mercy Sai.
One with ocean of compassion, listen to our outcry Sai.
You are the Form of Love and message of Truth and Righteousness.
Protector of the Universe Sathya Sai, you are the mother and father.
Omnipresent Sai, Oh Mother, You are everything Sai.
Oh Lord Sai with Orange Robe, Lord of Kali Age

title: Eshwari Nandana Parthi Gajanana
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Prabho
Omkareshwara Uma Maheshwara
Parthi Pureeshwara Palaya Maam
meaning: O Lord Sai, son of Mother Eshwaramba, You are verily Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, the son of Mother Eshwari (Parvathi). O Lord, the embodiment of primordial sound 'Om', please protect us. You are adored as Lord Maheshwara (Shiva), the consort of Mother Uma. O Lord of Parthi, please protect and sustain us.

title: Eshwari Nandana Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Sri (Sai) Madhusudhana Krishna Krishna [ Eshwari Nandana ... ]
Jagadodhara Parthi Vihara
Prema Swaroopa Premavatara
Dwarakamayi Sri Sathya Sai
Hey (Sai) Jaganmohana Krishna Krishna
meaning: Glory to the son of Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai, who is verily Lord Krishna, the destroyer of the demon Madhu. O Lord who resides in Parthi, You have come to uplift the whole world. You are the very embodiment of Love and the incarnation of Love. You are none other than Lord Sai of Shirdi whose abode was the Dwarakamayi. O Lord Sai, You enchant the entire world.

title: Eshwari Nandana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Sathya Narayana
Kaliyug Mey Avatar Liye
Kan Kan Mey Tera Naam (3)
meaning: O Lord Sai Narayana, the son of Eshwaramba, You are the embodiment of Truth and the one who pervades this Universe. O Lord Sai, You are the Supreme One, who has donned a Human Frame in this age of Kali for all of us. O Lord Sai, every little particle of this creation reverberates with Your Divine Name.

title: Eshwari Tanaya Esha Mahesha
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Sadashiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Sharanam Sharanam Partheeshwara
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara (2)
meaning: O Lord Mahesha (Shiva), You have incarnated as Sai, the son of mother Eshwaramba. O Lord, You are the embodiment of bliss and auspiciousness. You are the supreme Lord of Parthi. We surrender unto Your lotus feet, O Lord Sai.

title: Eternal Flame of Light
title2: Eternal Flame of Light is God's Love
lyrics:
Sai makes that glowing in my heart
Eternal Flame of Light is shining (2)
As the Sun's brilliant Light sustains living earth
Sai loves mankind God's Light shines for all
Eternal Flame of Light is shining (2)
Let Divine Light shine with God's Truth
Love and Joy for all mankind
Eternal Flame of Light is shining (2)

title: Every Day And Every Night
lyrics:
Illumine Us With Perfect Light
From The Altar Of Our Heart Let Our True Perfection Start
Help Us Lord In Conquering This Monkey Mind
Help Us Stay Detached From All The Things That Bind

title: Every day is a blissful journey
title2: Every day is a blissful journey when Sai is by your side
lyrics:
Every day our prayers are answered when in Sai we confide
 Every day the heart grows with devotionwhen
 the love of God expands within
 Every day can be pure and sweet when the thought of Sai is all
 Every day He guides our footsteps when we answer to His call

title: Every man is Your son divine
title2: Every man is Your son divine,
lyrics:
every woman is Your daughter divine
 We are one with you, kiche maney tu (2x)
 Kuwatey Leno Leno Mahotey
 Hiyano Hiyano Hiyano
 We are at One, with the infinite Sun, forever forever forever

title: Every Minute, Every Day, Every Night
title2: Every minute, every day, every night
lyrics:
I wanna be the Divine Inner Light
Every breath, every word, every thought
I wanna know truly that I am God

I am Jesus, I am Allah
I am Buddha and Zohrashtra
I am Krishna, Shiva, Rama
Bhagawan Sri Sai Baba

title: Every Moment Of My Life
title2: Every Moment Of My Life Please Be With Me
lyrics:
In Every Single Act Of Mine Be Thou My Guide
Baba Sai Baba
When I Slip When I Fall Lend Me A Hand
When I Stray Far Away Lead Me Back Again
Baba Sai Baba
From The Darkness Into Light Lead Me, Father
From The Unreal To The Real
Baba Sai Baba (2)

title: Every step I take
title2: Every step I take along the way
lyrics:
You are there to guide me
 Every step I take along the way
 You are there beside me.
 O Lord please take my hand
 Sweet Sai please smile at me
 O Lord fill my thoughts with Thee
 Clouds above are very quickly passing
 Only You are everlasting
 Clouds above are very quickly passing
 You are Lord and everlasting
 O Sai please hear this prayer
 Dear Lord please speak to me
 Sweet Lord please sing to me.
 May I hear Your guiding words within me
 Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema
 May I hear Your gentle voice within me
 Holy words of sweetest love.

title: Everybody Loves Sai Sai Loves
title2: Everybody Loves Sai Sai Loves Everybody Sai Ram (6) Sai
lyrics:
Be Good, See Good, Do Good Says Sai
This Is The Way To God So Says Sai (3) [ Everybody Loves ... ]
I Am Yours And You Are Mine
So Says Baba Words Divine (3)

title: Everyday As Always
title2: Everyday as always Sri Sathya Sai Baba,
lyrics:
... Our Lord is our best and closest friend (2)
Just trust in Sai's Love, sweet nectar divine,
... That's the way to live a blissful life always

title: Everyone Is My Brother
title2: Everyone Is My Brother When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
No More Difference Between Us When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Baba Help Me Always Say Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Everyday Please Help Me Say Sai Ram
Only Light Is Around Me When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
No More Darkness Around Me When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Baba Help Me Always Say Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Everyday Please Help Me Say Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Everyone Is My Brother When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram

No Hay Mas Diferencia Cuando Digo Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
No More Difference Between Us When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram

Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Baba Help Me Always Say Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Everyday Please Help Me Say Sai Ram 

Mit Jaye Andhera Jab Mai Gaaun Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram
No More Darkness Around Me When I Say Sai Ram, Sai Ram Sai Ram

Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Naamame Ma Gamyamu Sai Ram

I can of my own self do nothing..do nothing
For it is The Father within..It is The Father within
It is The Father within that doeth the works
 
Trust in The Lord with all thine heart
And lean not unto thine own understanding
Trust in The Lord with all thine heart
And lean not unto thine own understanding

I rely upon Thee and Thee alone
Trust in Me He tells me
For I Am your own

There is Only One
There is Only One
There is Only One

lyrics:
Prospero Año y Felicidad
I wanna wish you a Merry Christmas
I wanna wish you a Merry Christmas

From the bottom of my heart

title: Fill me Fill me Fill me
title2: Fill me Fill me Fill me
lyrics:
With your love Swami
 Bless me Bless me Bless me
 With your Grace Swami
 Show me Show me Show me
 The path of Truth
 Swami Swami Swami
 You are my Lord, Swami

title: Flame Song
lyrics:
Oh Lord, make the whole of my life,
As pure as the flame before me.
Let it consume itself in the fire,
Scattering light and the warmth of love to all around me.
At the end of it all let there be nothing left, (2x)
To keep me from merging in You.

title: Flyin’ Free
lyrics:
Bein’ satisfied to just BE
Open up your mind just believe and you’ll find
That life can be lived flyin’ free
 
The beauty of life is all around
Made up of colors and sound
The best things are free and they belong to you and me
So climb on my merry-go-round
 
Leavin’ the past far behind
The future is just a state of mind
The only place to live is in the NOW that’s all there is
If you’ll just believe then you’ll find
 
That you can go through this life feelin’ free
Being satisfied to just BE
Take yourself a ride on the positive side of life
And you’ll be flyin’ free
 
Life is for livin’ FLYIN’ FREE ... life is for livin’ FLYIN’ FREE …

title: Follow your Spirit only
lyrics:
Never follow the one that brings the doubt

Your Spirit is The Love of God
So let It shine..seek It and you will find
Let go..let The Love of God flow through you
 
Follow your Spirit only
Never follow the one that brings the doubt
 
The Spirit of The Lord is the Truth of the Self
The Spirit of The Lord is the Truth of the Self
So let It shine..seek It and you will find
Let go..let the Truth of the Self flow through you
 
Follow your Spirit only
Never follow the one that brings the doubt
 
The Light of God is who we are
The Light of God is who we are
So let It shine..seek It and you will find
Let go..let The Light of God flow through you
 
Follow your Spirit only
Never follow the one that brings the doubt

title: Follow, Follow, Follow The Lord
lyrics:
Open, Open, Open The Door
Open The Door To Truth And Love
Let In The Light And Follow The Lord
Love Is The Key, So Open The Door
Truth Is The Key, So Open The Door
Baba Is The Key, So Open The Door
Shiva Is The Key, So Open The Door

title: Food Prayer - Bramharpanam Bramhavir
title2: Food Prayers are chanted to offer the food to God consecrate it before partaking.
lyrics:
Prayer
			Meaning
			
	
	
		
			
				Oh Lord, Thou art the food,
				Thou art the enjoyer of the food,
				Thou art the giver and preparer of the food.
				Along with the inward and outward breaths
				You are the digestive fire that digests all types of food.
				We offer to You, all that we consume.
			
			
				
				
			
		
                
			
				Brahmarpanam Brahmahavir
				Brahmagnou Brahmanahutam
				Brahmaivatena Gantavyam
				Brahmakarma Samadhina
			
			
				
					The act of offering is God. The offering is God.
					By God it is offered into the Fire of God.
					 God is That which is to be attained by him
					who performs action pertaining to God.
					– Bhagavad Geeta, Chapter 4, Verse 24
				
				
					
						
					
				
			
		
		
			
				Aham Vaishvanaro Bhutva
				Praninam Dehamashritaha
				Pranapana Samayuktaha
				Pachamyannam Chaturvidham
			
			
				I reside as Vaishvanaro, the digestive power, in every living being.
				I keep in balance the Prana (life breath) and Apana (downward moving air).
				I digest and assimilate the four types of food partaken by every living being.
				–  Bhagavad Geeta, Chapter 15, Verse 14
				For a description of the five vital airs in the body, please read Sutra Vahini, Chapter 8, or, Summer Showers 1991 - Upanishads, Discourse 7.

title: For protection of the righteous
title2: For protection of the righteous, destruction of evil-
lyrics:
I will come, says the Lord
 Protection of the righteous, destruction of evil is My mission, says the Lord
 Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaar
 Buddha has said that there will come a Teacher of gods and men
 In the Bible it is said that He will come to guard and guide, Amen.
 Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaara, Sai Avathaar

title: For The Beauty Of The Earth
title2: For The Beauty Of The Earth, For The Beauty Of The Skies
lyrics:
For The Love Which From Our Birth
Ever And Around Us Lies
Lord Of All To Thee We Rise
This Our Hymn Of Grateful Praise
For The Joys Of Human Love, Brother, Sister, Parents, Child
Friends On Earth And Friends Above
And All Mercies Tender, Mild
For Gods Omnipresent Love, Freely Givn To You And Me
Forming Links Throughout All Worries
Reaching Out Oer Land And Sea

title: Free Me to Worship You
lyrics:
Open my eyes to You
Let me remember You
Lord, draw me near to You
Om Sai Ram, Jai Om Sai Ram (4x)

title: From my heart there's a cry
title2: From my heart there's a cry Sathya Sai
lyrics:
We are yearning only for You
For they say You are our only Savior
Who will lead us to our destiny

Come and dwell in my heart, Sathya Sai
Never leave me alone, Sathya Sai
For I know You are my Mother, Father
Without You, there's no one else for me

title: From the heavens He came
title2: From the heavens He came to meet us
lyrics:
With a charm, fiery eyes and sweet smile
 For they say He is born of Divine Birth
 To enlighten our lives all the while
 And His name is Sathya Sai Baba
 He is Mother, He is Father, He is our Friend
 He is Rama, He is Krishna, He is Allah
 He is all that we have to the end
 Sai Ram, Sai Krishna, Sai Baba
 Make us pure like the lotus You adore
 May we love, live in truth and share Your Bliss
 And in troubles, give us courage to endure
 Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
 Hear our prayers, heed our cries and our plea
 Only You can lift us up to heaven
 Only You can take us home to Thee

title: Gaana Lola Gopala
lyrics:
Sai Manohara Gopala [ Gaana Lola ... ]
Jagadoddhara Parthi Vihara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala

Gopala Sai Gopala (5)
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the beautiful one who enjoys music, the liberator of the universe, the child who lifted the Govardhana hill and the Lord of Meera. Glory to Lord Sai residing at Parthi who is verily Lord Gopala.

title: Gaana Priyey Sai Karunamayi
lyrics:
Kadambari Amba Katyayani [ Gaana Priyey ... ]
Hari Vallabhey Sukha Dayini
Omkara Roopini Narayani
Bhuvaneshwari (Amba) Jaganmohini
Sri Chakra Vasini Sayeeshwari
meaning: The Merciful Mother Sai is delighted by Music. Chant the names of the Deities Kadambari, Amba and Katyayani (different names of Goddess Parvathi). O Goddess Lakshmi, the beloved of Lord Hari (Vishnu), You are the bestower of happiness and all comforts. O Goddess Narayani, You are the embodiment of the Primodial Sound Om. You are the Goddess of the entire world and the one who beautifies the world. O Sayeeshwari, You reside in the Sri Chakra.

title: Gajamukha Deva Gajanana
lyrics:
Gananatha Gajanana
Karna Chamara Bhooshita Natha
Naga Yagnopadhara Lambodhara
Vamana Roopa Varana Deva
Vighna Harana Deva Gajanana
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, of short stature, leader of the Ganaas, with fan-like ears wearing a serpent for a sacred thread, who protects His devotees and removes obstacles.

title: Gajamukha Gajamukha Gajanana
lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana [ Gajamukha ... ]
Girija Nandana Gajanana
Girisha Nandana Gajanana
meaning: Sing the glory of Gajamukha (elephant headed) god, the son of Gowri, the beloved of Girija and Shiva who is the Lord of the mountains.

title: Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha
lyrics:
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela [ Gajamukha ... ]
Suramuni Vanditha Guna Sheela
Gajamukha Gajamukha Gananatha [ Suramuni ... ]
meaning: We chant the glory of Gajamukha, the elephant faced Lord Ganesha, who is the leader of Ganaas (demigods), who is worshipped by the sages and noble people and who is the embodiment of virtues.

title: Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Hey
title2: Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Hey Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka
lyrics:
Gowri Putra Modaka Hasta Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka
Shanthakara Vighna Vinasha Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ganesha Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka

Gajamukha Natha Vinayaka (4)
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Vinayaka (Ganesha) who is the master, the son of Mother Gowri and the one who has Modaka (a ball shaped sweet produced out of coconut, jaggery and rice) in His hand, the one who has a serene appearance and who destroys hurdles. He is verily Sai, the Supreme Lord residing at Puttaparthi.

title: Gajamukha Sundara Gananatha
lyrics:
Eka Danta Shubha Gananatha 
Hey Modaka Priya Gananatha 
Parvathi Nandana Gananatha 
Buddhi Pradayaka Gananatha 
Siddhi Vinayaka Gananatha
Prathama Tum Hi Ho Gananatha
Sarva Guni Ho Gananatha
meaning: Glory to the beautiful elephant-faced Lord Ganesha. The lover of the sweet Modak and bearer of the single tusk, His presence is auspicious. Lord Ganesha is the son of Goddess Parvathi and bestows intellect and ability to His devotees. We worship Lord Ganesha first among all deities so that He can remove our obstacles, as He is verily the embodiment of all divine qualities.

title: Gajanana Gajanana
lyrics:
Prathama Poojana Ganaraya [ Gajanana ... ]
Prathama Prarthana Sri Ganaraya
Lambodhara Ganaraya
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, You are the one whom all worship and pray. You are the one to whom the first prostrations should be offered. O Ganaraya, the controller of all the Ganaas (the Demigods), we offer You our first obeisance. O mighty one, You are the King of the Divine Forces.

title: Gajanana Gajanana
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana [ Gajanana ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Varada Gajanana
Parama Dayakara Sai Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, elephant-faced one, You are verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi. O Son of Mother Parvathi, You are the conferrer of boons and are supremely compassionate.

title: Gajanana Gajanana
lyrics:
Kagayaku Eichi no Gajanana [ Gajanana ... ]
Subete wo Ai eto Michibiki tamae
Uchinaru Hikari yo Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Gajanana (Ganesha), Your love and wisdom shine upon everything to guide us. You are the light within us.

title: Gajanana Hey Gajanana
lyrics:
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana [ Gajanana Hey ... ]
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga Vandana
Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Parthi Pureeshwara Gajanana
meaning: Glory to Lord Gajanana (Ganesha), beloved son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi). O Son of Shiva, You are revered by the whole world, You are the one who bestows knowledge and intelligence, You are the supreme one who has the mouse as Your vehicle. You are Lord Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
lyrics:
Gowri Manohara Priya Nandana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Shubhanana (Hey)
meaning: O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, You are the loving son of Mother Gowri and the beloved son of Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of all creatures. You are the Supreme Lord, pure and free of all blemishes and the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
lyrics:
Parama Niranjana Gajavadana
Vakratunda Dhara Vighna Vinasha
Pranava Swaroopa Parthi Pureesha
Siddhi Vinayaka Paahi Gajanana [ Parama Niranjana ... ]
meaning: Oh elephant-faced Lord Gajanana, You confer auspiciousness, You are supremely pure, Oh the one with a curved trunk, the destroyer of all the obstacles, grant us victory. Oh Lord, Your form is that of the primordial Om (Pranava) and You are none other than the Lord of Parthi. Oh the all powerful one, protect us Your devotees.

title: Gajanana Om Gajanana, Gajanana Om
title2: Gajanana Om Gajanana, Gajanana Om Gajanana
lyrics:
Warera wo Michibiku, Seinaru Chikara yo [ Gajanana Om... ]
Kami to Deai, Kami to Katari, Kami ni Kaeru
Warera wo Mimamoru, Ai no Hitomi yo
meaning: Lord Ganesha, guide us with Your sacred power and watch over us with Your eyes of love. Return us to God.

title: Gajanana Sai Gajanana Sai
lyrics:
Warera ni Seigi wo Atae Tamou
Shinri no Hikari wo Atae Tamou
Gajanana Sai Itoshiki Kami
meaning: Beloved Lord Gajanana (Ganesha), You bestow us with righteousness and the light of truth.

title: Gajananam Girija Tanayam
lyrics:
Gangadhara Shiva Kumaram Devam [ Gajananam ... ]
Suramuni Sevitha Charanam Sharanam
Sada Smarami Sai Sharanam
meaning: We adore Lord Gajanana (elephant headed god), the loving son of Girija (Parvathi) and Shiva (who adorns the Ganges). We bow to Your feet, which is worshipped by Gods and saints. We dwell on Your divine form always.

title: Gajavadana Gajanana
lyrics:
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana [ Gajavadana ... ]
Jai Jai Jai Jai Gajanana (3)
Devadi Deva Gajanana [ Gowri Tanaya ... ]
meaning: Victory to the Lords of Lords, Lord Gajanana, the elephant-faced Lord, the beloved son of Mother Gowri. Chant the different names of Lord Ganesha.

title: Gajavadana Gananatha
lyrics:
Gowri Tanaya Dayamaya [ Gajavadana ... ]
Bhuvanaadhara Pranava Swaroopa
Palaya Palaya Parthi Pureesha
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced Lord, the son of Mother Parvathi, You are extremely compassionate. You are the one whose is the very form of the Pranava (Om) and who is the basis of the entire creation. Protect us, O Sai, the Lord of Parthi, You are verily Lord Ganesha.

title: Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana
Gajavadana Hey Gajanana
Mukthi Pradatha Shakthi Pradatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana (2)
meaning: I take refuge in Lord Ganesha the elephant-faced son of Lord Shiva who bestows strength and liberation.

title: Gajavadana Gananatha Gajavadana Vinayaka
lyrics:
Siddhi Vidhata Shiva Tanaya
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Jaya Sri Ganesha
meaning: Worship the elephant-faced Ganesha, the Lord of the demigods, the son of Lord Shiva who can bestow powers and intellectual prowess. O Son of Mother Parvathi, You remove the fear of the cycle of birth and death and help cross it. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is worshipped in all ages (yugas).

title: Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
lyrics:
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya [ Gajavadana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
meaning: O Ganesha, the elephant-faced Lord, You are the Lord of the Divine Forces. O beloved son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi), You are full of virtues. O bestower of knowledge, intelligence, wisdom and power, You are the conferrer of all auspiciousness.

title: Gajavadana Gananatha Natha
lyrics:
Gowri Vara Tanaya Gunaalaya [ Gajavadana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Shubha Dayaka
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the demigods and the beloved son of Mother Gowri. O Lord, Thou art extremely merciful. You bestow Knowledge and Wisdom. You grant auspiciousness and gifts.

title: Gajavadana Ganeshwara
lyrics:
Suramuni Sevitha Vighna Vinasha [ Gajavadana … ]
Shwethambhara Dhara Pranava Swaroopa
Mangala Dayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Partheeshwaraya Sai Ganesha
meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Ganas, Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, the destroyer of obstacles and who is worshipped by the sages and noble people. Glory to one clad in white, the very embodiment of Om, who bestows auspiciousness and destroys our sins. Salutations to the Lord of Parthi who is verily Lord Ganesha.

title: Gajavadana He Gajanana
lyrics:
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana
Gangadhara Shiva Nandana
Girija Priya Nandana
meaning: Lord Ganesha is the beloved elephant-faced son of Mother Goddess Gowri (Parvathi, Girija) and Lord Shiva.

title: Gajavadana Hey Gananatha
lyrics:
Shiva Nandana Vighna Vinasha [ Gajavadana Hey ... ]
Karunakara Prashanthi Nilaya
Lambodhara Mooshika  Vahana
Girija Sutha Sankata Harana
Hey Siddhi Vinayaka Daata
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the Ganaas, the son of Lord Shiva. He is none other than Sai, the resident of Parthi, who is compassionate. The pot bellied son of Mother Girija, removes obstacles and grief, confers boons and uses a mouse as a conveyance.

title: Gajavadana Hey Gananatha
lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Ashta Vinayaka Sumukha Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana
Parthi Pureeshwara Palaya Maam (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Ganas, Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi. We revere You, O pleasant-faced one who bestows auspiciousness. You are none other than Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi. Protect us, O Lord.

title: Gajavadana Jaya Namosthuthey
lyrics:
Nagaja Nandana Namosthuthey
Vijaya Pradayaka Vighna Nasha
Gajavadana Jaya Namosthuthey
(Shubha) Mangala Dayaka Namosthuthey
meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, the son of Mother Parvathi. Victory to Thee, O Lord, You are the one who bestows victory, destroys obstacles and blesses all with auspiciousness.

title: Gajavadana Sai Gajanana
lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana [ Gajavadana ... ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Moksha Pradayaka Gajanana
Mangala Dayaka Shubhanana
Gajanana Shubhanana [ Gajanana Hey ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha, You bestow auspiciousness, intellect and liberation. Please fulfill our wishes.

title: Gana Natha Gana Natha
lyrics:
Mooshika  Vahana Jaya Gana Natha
Mangala Dayaka Gana Natha (Shubha) [ Gana Natha ... ]
Parvathi Putra Sri Gana Natha
Jagadodhara Jaya Gana Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Gana Natha
meaning: Surrender to Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganaas, the one who rides the Mooshika (mouse) and who gives us all types of auspiciousness. He is the son of goddess Parvathi and He uplifts the whole world.

title: Gana Natha Omkara Roopa
lyrics:
Sri Gananatha Gnana Roopa [ Gana Natha ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Heramba
Sri Gananatha Gnana Roopa
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the lord of the Ganaas, the one who has the form of Om. He is the bestower of accomplishments. He is the five-headed form of Ganesha and the embodiment of wisdom.

title: Ganadhi Pathayey Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Girija Tava Sutha Raksha Maam (2)
(Shubha) Mangala Moorata Palaya Maam
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the Leader of Ganas, son of Mother Girija (Parvathi), You are the very embodiment of auspiciousness. Please protect us, O Lord.

title: Gananatha Gananatha
lyrics:
Mooshika Vahana Jaya Gananatha
Sharanam Sharanam Gananatha [ Gananatha ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Gananatha
Buddhi Pradayaka Gananatha
Jagadodhara Jaya Gananatha [ Sharanam ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord of the Lords, Ganesha, victory to Thee whose vehicle is a mouse. You are the bestower of all powers, success and intellectual prowess. Oh Lord, the sustainer of the entire creation, we surrender at Your Lotus Feet.

title: Gananatha Sai Gajanana
lyrics:
Partheeshwara Dukha Bhanjana [ Gananatha ... ]
Kailasa Pathey Shiva Nandana Deena Natha Harey Hey Niranjana
Siddhi Pradatha Shubhanana Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
Jagadeeshwara Shanthi Niketana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the Lord of all Ganaas (Demigods), O Lord of Parthi, You relieve us of all anxieties and sadness. O the Son of Shiva (the Lord of Kailasa), who is the embodiment of purity and the Lord of the destitute, O bestower of all the siddhis and prowess, the one whose face radiates goodness, O sustainer of the whole world and the abode of all peace, glory be to Thee.

title: Gananatha Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
lyrics:
Gananatha Gananatha
Bhaktha Pala Vara Dayaka
Karunakara Shubha Dayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Chandana Tilaka
Sharanam Sharanam Bhaktha Rakshaka
meaning: Oh Gananatha, You are the destroyer of all obstacles, protector and sustainer of Your devotees and the bestower of boons. Oh compassionate one, You are the bestower of auspiciousness. You are the almighty with supreme powers adorned with a symbol made of sandal paste. We bow to You, O protector of devotees.

title: Gananayakam Ganeshwaram (Sai)
lyrics:
Gowri Tanayam Gajananam [ Gananayakam ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatham
Paashankusha Dhara Bala Gajananam
Ananda Tandava Narthana Ganapathim
Vinayakam Vimalacharam Vighneshwaram
alt_lyrics:
Gananayakam Ganeshwaram (Sai)
Gowri Tanayam Gajananam [ Gananayakam ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatham
Paashankusha Dhara Bala Gajananam
Ananda Tandava Narthana Ganapathim
Vinayakam Vighna Nashakam Vighneshwaram
meaning: O Lord Ganesh, You are the leader of the demigods, beloved son of Gowri (Mother Parvathi) and the one who rides the mouse. You hold the noose and hook in Your hands and is the delightful cosmic dancer having a spotless form. You are the Supreme Lord who removes all our obstacles.

title: Gananayakam Sai Gananayakam
lyrics:
Sadananda Sundara Gananayakam
Vara Dayakam Sai Shubha Dayakam
Parthi Pureeshwara Gananayakam
meaning: Salutations to You, O Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the Ganaas (Demigods), You are eternally blissful and most beautiful. You bestow various boons and confer all auspiciousness. O Lord of Lords, You reside at Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Ganapathey Paahi Maha Mathey
lyrics:
Gnana Swaroopa Namostuthey
Pankaja Charana Daya Nidhey
Mangala Kara Hey Krupa Nidhey
Sapta Swarapathi Vidya Pathey
Sayeeshwara Twam Suguna Nidhey
meaning: O Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha), the highly intellectual one, protect us. Salutations to Thee, the embodiment of knowledge. You are the treasure house of compassion with a lotus feet. You are the master of all forms of knowledge and music. O Lord Sai, who is verily Lord Ganesha, You are the reserve of divine qualities.

title: Ganapathi Deva Hey Gananayaka
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Hey Shubha Dayaka
Parvathi Nandana Hey Dukha Bhanjana
Lambodhara Hey Mooshika Vahana (2)
Prathama Poojana Hey Sai Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the Ganas, You are the embodiment of the Primodial Sound Om. O son of Goddess Parvathi and the one who rides on Mooshika, You bestow auspiciousness and destroy wordly afflications. Our foremost obeisance to You who is none other than Sai.

title: Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om
lyrics:
Gajamukha Varada Ganapathi Om [ Ganapathi Om ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Parama Niranjana Gajanana
Paada Namasthey Gajanana
meaning: Glory to Thee, O Ganesha, the elephant faced one, the bestower of boons, the one who has the mouse as His vehicle, the one who has Modaka (a sweet preparation) in His hand, the one who is supremely pure. O Lord, I offer obeisance at Your Lotus feet.

title: Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om
title2: Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om Ganapathi Om Sai Ram
lyrics:
Ganapathi Om Jaya Ganapathi Om Ganapathi Om Sai Ram
Parthi ni Owasu Ai no Kami
Sai Natha Bhagawan
Tataeyou Bhagawan
Jai Jai Jai Sai, Jai Jai Jai Baba, Shinri no Hikari
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the Ganas (Shiva's army). Let us praise our Lord Sai who resides in Parthi and shines the light of truth upon us. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Ganapathi.

title: Ganapathi, Ganapathi Eichi no Hikari
lyrics:
Ganapathi, Ganapathi Mezashite Susume
Ganapathi, Ganapathi Chiisaki Mono wo
Ganapathi, Ganapathi Mamotte Kureru
Seinaru Hikari wo Mezashite Susume
Sai no Hikari wo Mezashite Susume
meaning: O Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha), You are the light of wisdom. We journey towards You. We are small compared to You. Please protect us. We journey towards Your sacred light. O Lord Sai, we journey towards Your light.

title: Ganesha Agameyo Inori no Kokoro
title2: Ganesha Agameyo Inori no Kokoro wo Sathya Sai eto Todoke Tamou
lyrics:
Eichi to Yuuki no Chikara no Kami yo Hikari no Michi wo Terasu Kami
Subete no Inochi no Jiai no Kami yo Shinri to Seigi no Gajanana
Ai no Chikara de Michibiki tamae Sathya Sai eto Tsuzuku Michi
meaning: Worship our Lord Ganesha and pray with all your heart. O Lord, with Your wisdom and courage, You shine bright revealing our path. You are the Lord of truth, justice, and the love within everything. With the power of love, we advance forward on the path You have shown us.

title: Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja
title2: Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja Mana Ganesha Bhaja Manarey
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Pashupathi Ranjana
Deva Ganesha Bhaja Manarey (2)
meaning: O mind, pray to the name of Lord Ganesha. He is the son of Goddess Parvathi and the one who pleases Lord Shiva, the lord of all beings.

title: Ganesha Charanam Parama Pavanam
title2: Ganesha Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
lyrics:
Nithya Smaranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Sadguru Charanam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
Bhava Bhaya Haranam Parama Pavanam Sathya Sainam Gajananam
meaning: Let us bow in reverence to Lord Ganesha, let us bow in absolute purity to the name of Sai, to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha. Constantly remember the purifying name of Sai and Lord Ganesha. The sacred feet of Sadguru are purifying, so is the name of Sai and Ganesha which removes the fear of the cycle of birth and death.

title: Ganesha Charanam Sharanam Ganesha
lyrics: Sayeesha Charanam Sharanam Sayeesha (4)
meaning: Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Ganesh. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai.

title: Ganesha Ganesha guide me
title2: Ganesha Ganesha guide me all the way
lyrics:
Ganesha Ganesha protect me all the day
 Ganesha Ganesha teach me how to pray

title: Ganesha Ganesha sweet Lord Ganesha
lyrics:
Please bless our prayers we offer to You
 Please bless our prayers, may they please You
 Ganesha Ganesha (3x)

title: Ganesha Sharanam Ganesha Sharanam
lyrics:
You Are Always Protecting Me
You Are Always Guiding Me ... Om

Saiesha Sharanam, Saiesha Sharanam (2)
You Are Always Protecting Me
You Are Always Guiding Me ... Om

title: Ganesha Shiva’s Son
title2: Ganesha Shiva's Son Humbly I Implore Thee
lyrics:
Ganesha You're The One To Clear The Path Before Me
Ganesha Shiva's Son Humbly I Implore Thee
Ganesha You're The One To Clear The Path Before Me
Lord Sai Within My Heart Humbly I Adore Thee
Lord Sai I Pray Thou Art Kept In Mind Before Me
Lord Sai Within My Heart Humbly I Adore Thee
Lord Sai I Pray Thou Art Kept In Mind Before Me

title: Ganesha Son Of Shiva
lyrics:
Ganesha Charanam Sharanam
Warrior Of Our Hearts
Ganesha Son Of Shiva
Remove All Fear And Trepidation
Warrior Of Our Hearts
Remove All Fear And Trepidation
Lead Us Out Of The Darkness

title: Ganesha Stotram
lyrics:
Lambōdaraṃ viśālākṣaṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Mauñjikṛṣṇājinadharaṃ nāgayajñopavītinaṃ  |
Bālendu vilasanmauliṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Ambikāhṛdayānandaṃ mātṛbhiḥ paripālitaṃ |
Bhaktapriyaṃ  madōnmattam vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Citraratnavicitrāṅgaṃ citramālāvibhūṣitaṃ |
Citrarūpadharaṃdevaṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Gajavaktraṃ suraśreṣṭhaṃ karṇacāmara bhūṣitaṃ |
Pāśāṅkuśadharaṃ devaṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Mūṣikōttamamāruhya dēvāsura mahāhavē |
Yōddhukāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Yakṣa kinnara gandharva siddha vidyadharai sadā |
Stūyamānaṃ mahātmānaṃ vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Sarvavighnaharaṃ dēvaṃ sarvavighnavivarjitaṃ |
Sarva siddhi pradātāraṃ  vandē'haṃ gaṇanāyakam | |

Gaṇāṣṭakaṃ idaṃ puṇyaṃ bhaktyā yaḥ paṭhennaraḥ
Vimuktasarvapāpebhyo śivalokaṃ sa gacchati | |

--------- Ganesha Stotram / Ganashtakam ---------
meaning:
1. I salute the Lord of Ganas, who is one-tusked, having a huge body resplendent like molten gold, who has a huge belly, and big beautiful eyes.
 
2. I salute the Lord of Ganas who is seated on the three-striped antelope’s skin, wearing a snake as His sacred thread and having a face glowing like the moon.
 
3. I salute the Lord of Ganas, who delights the heart of the Divine Mother Ambika, is protected by the Divine parents and is intoxicated by the love of His devotees.
 
4. I salute the Lord of Ganas, whose body is decorated with colourful jewels, has a beautiful garland around His neck and who can manifest in any form.
 
5. I salute the Lord of Ganas, the best among Gods, who has the face of an elephant, is adorned with fan-like ears, and who holds a noose and a goad.
 
6. I salute the Lord of Ganas, who having mounted the best mouse, displayed immense valour in the great battle between the Gods and the demons.
 
7. I salute the Lord of Ganas, who is always revered by the Yakshas (nature spirits), Kinnaras (attendants of Kubera), Gandharvas (celestial singers), Siddhas (magical beings) and scholars as the Greatest One.
 
8. I salute the Lord of Ganas, the remover of all obstacles, who is untouched by obstacles and bestows success.
 
9. Whoever chants this meritorious "Ganashtakam" (eight verses glorifying Lord Ganesha) with devotion, will be redeemed of all sins and will attain the abode of Lord Shiva.

title: Ganesha tú eres la fuerza del universo
title2: Ganesha tú eres la fuerza del universo,
lyrics:
Eres ternura, eres amor, 
Siempre te llevo en el corazón 
Y te rogamos que nos conduzcas por el sendero, 
con paso firme en la devoción 
hasta llegar a la salvación
meaning: Ganesha, You are the strength of the universe; You are tenderness, You are love. I always carry You in my heart. We beg you to lead us on the path with a firm step in devotion until we arrive at salvation.

title: Ganesha We Ask You
title2: Ganesha we ask You for Your selfless service, helping us to reach our Sai Baba
lyrics:
You gently remind us to remember Sri Sathya Sai Lord, our Guru God
You lead us to Supreme Guru, the true sacred Sathya Sai Lord, our dearest God
Much of our fears disappear, whenever God is here - Sathya Sai Lord, our dearest God

title: Ganesha, Ganesha Yami wo Furi
title2: Ganesha, Ganesha Yami wo Furi Harau
lyrics:
Ganesha, Ganesha Seigi no Kami
Ooinaru Umi wo Wataru Fune to Naru
Yuuki wo Atae Chikara wo Sazuketa mo
Katari Tsugou, Ima Utaou
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, You clear away the darkness. You are righteous and just. You are the ship that allows us to cross the vast ocean. You grant us courage and power. We sing to You.

title: Ganeshwara Gaja Mukeshwara
lyrics:
Karunya Lavanya Vighneshwara (2) [ Ganeshwara Gaja ... ]
Sankata Harana Gajanana
Shankari Putra Shubhanana (Shiva) (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Ganaas (attendants of lord Shiva), the elephant-faced Ganesha, the one who is full of compassion, beautiful and who is the remover of obstacles. He is the son of Lord Shiva and Shankari (Parvathi) and the one with an auspicious face.

title: Ganeshwara Ganadhipa
lyrics:
Vighneshwara Vinayaka [ Ganeshwara ... ]
Nirvikalpa Niramaya
Gunaatheetha Niranjana
Bhava Bhanjana Manoranjana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha (elephant-headed God), You are the Supreme Lord and the chief of the Ganaas (demigods), You are the remover of obstacles. You exist in the thoughtless and pure mind. You are attributeless and spotless who delights the mind and destroys the worldly miseries.

title: Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Mahesha
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Shaila Girisha [ Ganga Jatadhara Gowri ... ]
Parvathi Ramana Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Mahesha Hey Paramesha
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Mahesha (Sarvesha)
meaning: The one who is holding goddess Ganga in his matted locks, please protect us. Lord Mahesha, who is the lord of goddess Gowri, please protect us. The one residing in the Shaila mountain, having goddess Ganga in his matted hair, lord Shiva, who is the beloved of goddess Parvathi please protect us. O supreme lord Eshwara, who lives in Puttaparthi, please protect us. Lord residing in Puttaparthi is lord Sai, who is everywhere.

title: Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara Girija
title2: Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara Girija Mano Ramana
lyrics:
Jaya Mruthyunjaya Mahadeva Maheshwara Mangala Shubha Charana
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana
Nirupama Guna Sadana
Natana Manohara Neelakanta Sai
Neeraja Dala Nayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Shankara, who bears the Holy Ganges in His hair and whose consort is Goddess Girija, born of the mountains. Glory to the One, who is the Lord of Lords and who has conquered death and whose Feet confer auspiciousness. Glory to the One who rides the bull, Nandi. Glory to the One who has a cobra around His neck. Glory to the One who is the embodiment of unparalleled virtues. Hail the enchanting dancer, the blue-throated Shiva who is none other than Sai and whose eyes are like the petals of the lotus.

title: Ganga Mayi Parameshwari Gangey
lyrics:
Alakanandey Jahnavi Gangey [ Ganga Mayi ... ]
Bhagawathi Ambe Pavani Gangey
Bhaktha Parayani Ma Devi Gangey
Patithoddharini Tribhuvani Gangey
Prema Pravahini Sai Gangey
meaning: Let us immerse ourselves in the Holy River, Mother Ganga. She flows from the Alakananda tributary, providing sustenance to all. She is the Divine Mother, purifying us all. She protects all of Her devotees and uplifts the downtrodden. Her waters traverse across the three planes of existence. Mother Ganga is none other than the torrential flow of love from our dear Mother Sai.

title: Gangadhara Girija Ramana
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva [ Gangadhara ... ]
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sai Shankara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shirdi Pureeshwara
meaning: Chant the holy name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in his matted flock of hair, who is the beloved of Girija. Chant the holy names Shambho, Shankara, Samba Sadashiva (one who bestows auspiciousness and happiness) who is also the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Gangadhara Gowri Mahesha
lyrics:
Tripurantaka Jyothi Prakasha
Haalaahala Dhara Paramesha
Chandrashekara Sai Mahesha
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva, the consort of Gowri and the one who bears the Ganges and the moon on His head. He illuminates us by destroying the demon "Tripura" who symbolizes the darkness within us. He is the ultimate Lord who drank the deadly poison of "Haalaa-hala" for the welfare of the world during the churning of the ocean. He is verily our Lord Sai Mahesha.

title: Gangadhara Hara Gangadhara Hara Kailasa
title2: Gangadhara Hara Gangadhara Hara Kailasa Natha Prabhu Shankara
lyrics:
Bhava Nasha Bhava Bandha Vimochana
Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara
meaning: We praise the Lord Sathya Sai Shiva Shankara-The One who is Auspicious, Captivating - The One who bears the Ganges on his head, One who is the Lord of the mountain 'Kailasa' and the One who liberates us from the bondage of the world and prevents us from taking birth again and again.

title: Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Brahma Vishnu Parameshwara Roopa
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Krupala
Samba Shiva Sai Shiva (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord Sathya Sai, who is the very form and embodiment of the Trinity - Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. He is verily Lord Shiva who bears the Ganges on His head and the consort of Mother Parvathi. Lord Sai is the most compassionate one who confers happiness and prosperity and is very dear to all His devotees.

title: Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Jaya Parameshwara [ Gangadhara Hara ... ]
Shirdi Nivasa Sayeeshwara
Parthi Pureesha Sayeeshwara
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara [ Shambho Shankara ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Jaya Partheeshwara Jaya Parameshwara [ Gangadhara Hara ... ]
Shirdi Nivasa Sayeeshwara
Parthi Pureesha Sayeeshwara
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara [ Shambho Shankara ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the one who has the river Ganges on His head and the consort of Gowri. Glory to Lord Sai Shiva, the auspicious one who confers happiness and prosperity. Glory to Thee, the Lord of the world, the greatest Lord who resided as Sai in Shirdi and is now residing in Parthi. Glory to Lord Sai who liberates the world.

title: Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva
