lyrics:
Sai Naam Sukha Dayi Naam
Aao Aao Hey Bhagawan
Prakat Huvey The Tum Shirdi Mey
Prakat Huvey Ho Ab Parthi Mey
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Ram [ Aao Aao ... ]
meaning: Welcome O Lord Sai, whose Holy name bestows happiness on all. You are the Eternal Lord Shiva who holds the river Ganges on His matted locks. O Lord, You appeared in Shirdi and now You have appeared in Parthi. O divinely beautiful Lord Sai, please come and grant us the bliss of Your presence.

title: Gangadhara Hara Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shambho
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Shambho
Haalaahala Dhara Shiva Sai Shambho
meaning: This is a prayer to Lord Shiva who Has the river Ganges on His head; Who has Vibhuti all over His body; Who swallowed the deadly poison (Haalaa-hala) ; Who is also our Lord Sai.

title: Gangadhara Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Sai Natha Guru Satchidananda Guru [ Gangadhara Paahi ... ]
Neelakanta Shiva Gangadhara
Neelakanta Shiva Neelakanta Shiva Neelakanta Shiva Gangadhara Neelakanta Shiva Gangadhara
Bhasma Vibhushitha Gangadhara
meaning: Please protect me, O Lord Shiva who holds the river Ganges in Your matted locks, is besmeared with holy ash and is blue-throated (due to the consumption of the haalaa-hala poison). O divine Preceptor Sai, You are being, awareness and bliss. You are none other than Lord Shiva.

title: Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva
lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Samba Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shiva
Sugandha Kuntalamba Sametha Shiva
Matrubhuteshwara Mahadeva
Bhaktha Jana Priya Lingeshwara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sarveshwara
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (7)
alt_lyrics:
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva
Shambho Mahadeva Samba Shiva
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shiva
Sugandha Kuntalamba Sametha Shiva
Matrubhuteshwara Mahadeva
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Jeeveshwara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sayeeshwara
Gangotri Natha Ganga Shiva (3)
meaning: Chant the name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges, who is also the Lord of Gangotri and whose other names are Shambho, Mahadeva and Samba Shiva. O Lord, You are the consort of Gowri or Kuntalamba (one who has naturally fragrant hair). You are the Lord of mighty earth, protecting the devotees. You are Sayeeshwara who is the embodiment of Shiva and Parvathi.

title: Garuda Gamana Panduranga
lyrics:
Kamala Vadana Panduranga
Vittala Ranga Panduranga 
Vittala Ranga Jaya Sai Ranga [ Garuda Gamana ... ]
Maya Lola Panduranga (3) [ Vittala Ranga ... ]
Vittala Ranga Jaya Sai Ranga
meaning: Victory to the lotus-faced Lord Panduranga (Vittala), who rides on the Garuda, who likes to play illusive tricks. He is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Garuda Vahana Narayana
lyrics:
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana [ Garuda Vahana ... ]
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, who is the beloved of His consort, Goddess Lakshmi, whose vehicle is Garuda, who sleeps on the serpent (also known as "Adi Sesha"- who incarnated as Lakshmana - Lord Rama's brother) and who is also known as Hari.

title: Gayathri Mantra
lyrics:
Tat Savitur Varenyam
Bhargo Devasya Dheemahi
Dhiyo Yonah Prachodayaat
meaning: That which Permeates the three worlds – Body, Mind and Soul. We Meditate on this Most Venerable Self Effulgence. And Pray for the Enlightenment of our Intellect.

title: Geeta Dayaka Hey Giridhari
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Peetambara Dhara Parthi Vihari
Patithodhari Sai Murari
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the one who gave the knowledge of the Bhagavat Geeta to the world, the one who lifted mountain 'Govardhana', the one who is dressed in yellow silk robes, the one who helps the downtrodden and who is called by many names such as Govinda, Narayana and Murari. He is none other than Lord Sai who resides at Puttaparthi.

title: Gentle Lord We Crave The Bliss
title2: Gentle Lord We Crave The Bliss Of Your Darshan
lyrics:
Swami Come Let Your Radiance Surround Us Touching Everyone
You Are The Path And The Goal
Teach Us To Follow You Faithfully
You Give The Life To The Soul
May We Be Blessed With The Grace Of Sai Wholly Immersed In Him

title: Gently Smiling Sai
title2: Gently Smiling Sai Residing In The Temple Of My Heart
lyrics:
Sometimes Krishna Playing The Flute
Sometimes Shiva Dancing To The Tune [ Gently Smiling ... ]
Enlightening And Inspiring Me
When There Are Dark Clouds O'er Me
Full Of Joy Full Of Peace
I Adore You Swami With All My Heart

title: Getting Better
lyrics:
Getting better, everyday. 
Every day in every way, I'm getting better, this I pray.

title: Ghana Ghana Neela Bansi Adhariya
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Smitha Vadana Savariya [ Ghana Ghana Neela ... ]
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Gatiya
Jhumaka Jhumaka Jhuma Baja Ghungharia
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who has a beautiful form with a body of thick blue color, with the flute on His lips, gentle smile on His bluish face, adorning the peacock feather on His crown, wearing yellow silk and His anklets making pleasant sound.

title: Ghana Ghana Neela Om Shivaya
lyrics:
Om Shivaya Om Shivaya [ Ghana Ghana ... ]
Shivaya Namah Om Sai Shiva
Sai Shiva Sai Shiva [ Shivaya Namah ... ]
Sai Shiva Hara Sai Shiva

Shankaraya Shiva Shankaraya Shiva Shankaraya Shiva Namostuthey (3)
meaning: Chant the divine name of Lord Shiva, whose throat is dark blue in color (due to consumption of deadly poison). Salutations to Lord Shankara who is none other than our Sai.

title: Ghana Ghana Neela Vadana Ati
title2: Ghana Ghana Neela Vadana Ati Sundara
lyrics:
Megha Shyamala Madhava Murahara [ Ghana Ghana ... ]
Mandasmitha Mukha Radha Manohara
Govinda Gopala Natavara Giridhara [ Megha Shyamala ... ]
meaning: Lord Krishna is described as the one having a dark blue complexion like that of a rain cloud, one who is very sweet in nature and one who killed the demon Mura. He has a gentle smile on His face and is adored by Radha. He is the Supreme Cowherd looking after His cows (mankind), He is the Supreme Dancer and Actor, the one who lifted the mountain Govardhana for protecting the people of Gokula from the wrath of Indra.

title: Ghana Ghana Neela Yadu Nandana
lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Sundara Mana Mohana
Natavara Giridhara Gopalana
Murali Manohara Madhusudhana
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna of the Yadu dynasty, the beautiful dark blue colored one who enchants the mind, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, the supreme dancer who fosters cows, the one holding the flute and the one who slayed the demon Madhu.

title: Ghana Shyama Bhajo Giridhari
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Muralidhari Bhajo [ Ghana Shyama ... ]
Brinda Vihari Shyama Bhajo
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Bhajo
Hrudaya Nivasi Shyama Bhajo
(Sarva) Antaryami Sai Bhajo
meaning: Chant the name and sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the dark-complexioned one who lifted the Govardhana mountain to protect His devotees. Chant the name of the Divine Flutist who enchants our mind, who resides in Brindavana and who moves about the forest inhabited by the demon Madhu. Chant the name of Lord Shyama (Krishna), the indweller of the heart who is verily the omniscient Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Ghana Shyama Gopala Ghana Shyama
title2: Ghana Shyama Gopala Ghana Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Jaganmohana
Yadu Nandana Gopal
Gopala Gopala Shyama Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala, the dark complexioned one who captivates the mind and the whole Universe. He is the little child of the Yadava clan and is verily Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Ghana Shyama Sundara
lyrics:
Bansidhara Prabhu Krishna Kanhaiya
Tum Hi Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya [ Ghana Shyama ... ]
Devaki Tanaya Hey Nandalala
Deena Bandhava Dwaraka Natha
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
meaning: O beautiful Lord Krishna holding the flute and of blue color, You only are my mother, father and brother. O son of Devaki and the foster son of Nanda, O relative of the downtrodden and orphans and the Lord of Dwaraka, O Lord Krishna who dwells in the heart of Radha, O slayer of the demon Madhu, You are none other than Sathya Sayeeshwara, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Ghanana Ghanana Ghanta Baajey Payaliya
lyrics:
Dhimitha Dhimitha Dhim Dhim Nachey Sai Shiva [ Ghanana Ghanana ... ]
Mrudanga Veena Damaru Baajey 
Tandava Nachey Ghungaroo Baajey 
Nacherey Nacherey Nataraja 
Nacherey Nacherey Shiva Raja 
Nacherey Nacherey Nataraja 
Nacherey Nacherey Sai Bhola
meaning: The bells in the Temple and the anklets on Lord Shiva's feet resound as He dances. All musical instruments such as the Mridangam, Veena and Damaru resound in the glory of His name. O Lord of dance, dance the Tandava (cosmic dance). Lord Sai is verily Lord Shiva, the Lord of the innocent.

title: Giri Raja Tanaya Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Hey Durgati Nashini Ma [ Giri Raja ... ]
Maha Jyothirmayi Shiva Shakthimayi
Asura Vimardini Ma
Jaya Devi Durge Jaya Ma [ Hey Durgati ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Durga, the daughter of the King of mountains (Himalayas). O Mother, You are the destroyer of misfortune. You are the most effulgent one and the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi. You are the destroyer of demons (all evils). Victory to Thee.

title: Giridhara Bala Gopala (Harey)
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gopala [ Giridhara Bala ... ]
Gopi Lola Gopala
Govardhanodhari Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the cowherd boy who danced with the Gopis and the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain.

title: Giridhara Bala Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Devaki Nandana Shyama Gopala [ Giridhara ... ]
Keshava Madhava Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Shyama Gopala
Bansidhara Hey Sai Gopala
meaning: Lord Krishna is extolled with different names as the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, the son of Devaki, the Lord of Radha, the one who danced with the Gopikas, the one with the flute and He is none other than our Lord Sai.

title: Giridhara Bala Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Eshwari Tanaya Sai Gopala
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Govinda Madhava Goparipala (2)
meaning: We chant the name of Shyama Gopala who is little Krishna lifted the mountain in his fingertips. He is also Sai Gopala son of Eshwaramba the enchanting flute player who loves music. He is Govinda protector of cow herds (people) and in whose chest revels Mother Lakshmi.

title: Giridhara Gopala Gopala
lyrics:
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhara ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara (Parthi Pureeshwara) Sai Shankara
Sai Shankara Sai Shankara
meaning: Chant the divine name of Lord Krishna, Giridhara Gopala and of Lord Sai, the resident of Shirdi and Parthi, who is verily Lord Krishna. He is also Lord Shankara (Shiva) who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
title2: Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
lyrics:
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Surdas Ke Shyama Manohara
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Manohara
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, One who lifted the mountain The Lord of Meera and Surdas and the beautiful Lord Sathya Sai the beloved of his devotees.

title: Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Damodara
Giridhara Gopala Muralidhara Harey [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Krishna - Gopala, Giridhara. Glory to the One with the flute who is also called Damodara.

title: Giridhara Gopala Sai Giridhara Gopala
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala [ Giridhara Gopala ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Paahi Maam Ghana Shyam O Shyama (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai Gopala, the lifter of the Govardhana mountain, the Lord of Meera, You are verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi. O Lord, kindly protect me.

title: Giridhara Govinda Gopala Ghana Shyama
title2: Giridhara Govinda Gopala Ghana Shyama Nandalala
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Hey Madhava [ Giridhara Govinda ... ]
Damodara Janardhana Muralidhara Mana Mohana
Namo Sai Narayanaya Namo Sathya Narayanaya
Namo Sai Narayanaya
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna, the divine flutist and the beautiful son of Nanda. Lord Krishna with a dark complexion is the slayer of the demon Madhu. Salutations to the Lord Sai who is verily Narayana.

title: Giridhara Madhava Murahara
title2: Giridhara Madhava Murahara Natavara, Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Janardhana
Venu Vilolana Vedoddharana
Yashoda Nandana Bhaktha Samrakshana
Ratnakara Bhooshana Hrudaya (Parthi) Viharana  [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the one who lifted the Govardhana hill, the one who vanquished the demons Mura and Madhu. Victory to the protector of mankind, the one who plays blissful music from the flute, the one who fosters the Vedas. Victory to the son of Yashoda and the one who protects His devotees. Victory to Lord Sai, the crown jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty who resides at Parthi and in the hearts of devotees and who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Giridhara Merey Gopala
lyrics:
Radhey Gopala Radhey (Sai) Gopala [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Nanda Kishora Maakhan Chora
Yashoda Bala Gopala [ Radhey Gopala ... ]
meaning: Chant the name my Lord Gopala, the one who lifted the hill, the Lord of Radha, the beloved son of Nanda and Yashoda, and the one who steals butter.

title: Giridhara Merey Shyama Gopal
lyrics:
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopi Gopal
Govardhanodhari Gokula Gopal
Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal [ Giridhara Merey ... ]
Mukunda Murahara Mohana Gopal
Murali Manohara Madhava Gopal [ Shyama Gopal ]
meaning: Chant the various names of My Lord Gopal, the Giridhara, The one who lifted Govardhana mountain, the cowherd of Gokula The enchanting Lord Mukunda, Madhava, with the flute, the slayer of Mura, the Lord Sai Gopal.

title: Giridhara Muralidhara Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Gopi Lola [ Giridhara Muralidhara ... ]
Maakhan Chora Nanda Kishora
Madhusudhana Sai Mohana Krishna
Karunapaara Sai Avatara
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the little Krishna who lifted the mountain, the enchanting flute player, the beloved of Gopis and Lord of Radha. You are the stealer of butter, the beloved of Nanda and the destroyer of demon Madhu. You have descended in the form of Sai, the most compassionate one.

title: Giridhara Naagara Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari [ Giridhara Naagara ... ]
Shyamala Sundara Mayura Mukutadhara
Pankaja Lochana Madhava Mohana
Madhuvana Sanchari Parthi Vihari (2)
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Giridhara who roams in the garden and in the forest of Madhu. He is very beautiful with the peacock feather as His crown and lotus eyes. He is none other than our Sai who resides in Parthi.

title: Giridhari Giridhari Gopala
lyrics:
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhari ... ]
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Goparipala. ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Gopala, one who lifted the Govardhana mountain the protector of the cows. Chant the name of the Lord Govinda and our Sai Gopala.

title: Giridhari Giridhari Murali Shyam Murari
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Veda Bharana
Pavana Charana Karuna Bharana
meaning: We chant your name Giridhari the enchanting flute player having dark blue complexion, beloved of Radha, embodiment of Vedas and kindness having divine lotus feet.

title: Giridhari Giridhari Radhey Gopala Jaya
title2: Giridhari Giridhari Radhey Gopala Jaya Giridhari
lyrics:
(Aa)Shritha Jana Vihari Giridhari
Meera Ke Nath Prabho Giridhari (Mayi)
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, also known as Giridhari (who lifted the mountain), the Lord of Radha. You are the refuge to Your devotees. You are the Lord of  Meera.

title: Giridhari Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Yashoda Ke Bala Tribhuvana Pala
Jagata Uddhara Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala
meaning: Oh Giridhari, the son of Nanda and Yashoda The protector and sustainer of all the three worlds The liberator of the world and the boy of Gokula The player of flute and the protector of the Saints and Rishis Oh Lord Sai Gopala who wanders in Parthi.

title: Giridhari Jaya Giridhari
lyrics:
Sugandha Tulasi Dala Vanamali [ Giridhari ... ]
Munijana Sevitha Madhava Murahara
Murali (Gopa Gopi) Manohara Giridhari
meaning: Victory to Lord Giridhari (Krishna, who lifted the Govardhana mountain), the one who wears the garland of fragrant basil leaves and the garland made of jungle flowers. Chant the name of Lord Madhava who is worshipped by the sages and saints and the one who destroyed the demon 'Mura'. Glory to the the beautiful flute player and the beloved of the Gopas and Gopikas.

title: Giridhari Lal Shyama Gopal
lyrics:
Natavara Lal Madana Gopal
Mathura Natha Krishna Gopal
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Nanda Gopal
Eshwaramba Priya Sai Gopal
alt_lyrics:
Giridhara Bal Shyama Gopal
Natavara Lal Madana Gopal
Mathura Natha Krishna Gopal
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Nanda Gopal
Eshwaramba Priya Sai Gopal
meaning: Chant the name of the handsome boy Gopala (Krishna) who is the supreme dancer and actor, who is the Lord of Mathura and the slayer of demon Madhu. He is the player of flute, the beloved son of Yashoda and Nanda. He is verily Lord Sai whom Mother Eshwaramba is very fond of.

title: Giridhari Murari Govinda
lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Murari Gopala [ Giridhari ... ]
Radhey Krishna Murari Govinda
Sathya Sai Murari Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Giridhari Govinda who is the destroyer of the demon 'Mura' chant the name of Radha Krishna and Sathya Sai Gopala.

title: Giridhari Shyama Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari [ Giridhari Shyama ... ]
Mathuradhipathey Madhava Shourie
Sri Madhusudhana Mayura Mukutadhara
Madana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
Giridhari Shyam Giridhari Shyam
meaning: O Lord Giridhari (Lord Krishna who lifted the mountain) with dark blue complexion, the one who redeems us from miseries and gives liberation, You are the sweet enchanting flute player, the Lord of Mathura and valorous Madhava, the destroyer of demon Madhu and the one who is adorned with crown of peacock feather, the one who strolls the grooves and garden of Brindavan captivating everyone.

title: Girija Bhavani Shivaranjani
lyrics:
Mata Bhavani Jagat Karini [ Girija Bhavani ]
Shakthi Swaroopini Bhaya Harini
Sowbhagya Dayini Sukha Dayini
meaning: Chant the names of Girija and Bhavani who pleases and makes Shiva happy. Chant the name of Mother Bhavani who liberates the world. She is the embodiment of power and destroys all our fears. She gives happiness and good luck.

title: Girija Nandana (Hey)
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Girija ... ]
Gaana Vilolana Danava Mardhana
Palita Deenavana Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Gajanana (the elephant headed god), the beloved son of Mother Girija (Parvathi) and Lord Shiva, You are the one who protects us from fear and liberates one from the cycle of birth and death. You are the lover of music and destroyer of demons and protector of weak and meek.

title: Give a little bit of love every day
title2: Give a little bit of love every day,

title: Give thanks to the Lord
title2: Give thanks to the Lord for He is good and His love endures forever (2)
lyrics:
He is good, He is good, and His love will forever endure
We will bless His name as we all proclaim that His love endures forever
 
He made the moon and the stars at night and His love endures forever
With outstreached arm and by His mind and His love endures forever
Adonai, Adonai, aluch mazen Adonai
Adonai malach, Adonai malach, Adonai Yesu our saviour
 
Give thanks to the Lord for He is good and His love endures forever (2)
He is good, He is good, and His love will forever endure
We will bless His name as we all proclaim that His love endures forever
You are good, You are good, and your love will forever endure
We will bless His name as we all proclaim that His love endures forever
Your love endures forever (2)

title: Give Thanks with a grateful heart
title2: Give Thanks with a grateful heart
lyrics:
Give thanks to the Holy One
Give thanks because He's given Jesus Christ, His Son
And now let the weak say, "I am strong"
Let the poor say, "I am rich”
Because of what the Lord has done for us, Give Thanks!

title: Give us the power
title2: (Bring the power of Your life into our souls
lyrics:
Bring a vision of divinity our hearts can hold 
Give us hope in our despair
That through the darkness You'll be there 
To help us reach the promised land)

Give us the power, give us the light
 Let it shine, let it shine, give us the light
 You're the river, You're the sea, You're the power inside of me
 Let it shine, let it shine, let it shine (2X)
 Give us the power, give us the light, let it shine

title: Giving And Forgiving
lyrics:
Loving All The Living
Helping All The Helpless
Never With A Selfish Heart
Giving And Forgiving Giving Only Love
Loving All The Living Living Only Love
Giving And Forgiving Giving Only Love
Loving All The Living Living Only Love

title: Gloria a Ti, mi Señor
lyrics:
hacedor de toda la vida.
Como la luna tranquila, con Tu dulzura iluminas,
la luz de nuestro corazón. Gloria a Ti mi Señor.
Eres Padre y Madre de la alegría,
el Señor de toda armonía,
el Señor de toda armonía,
mi Dios, mi Maestro y mi Guía,
mi Dios, mi Maestro y mi Guía.
El néctar de la compasión.
Gloria a ti mi Señor.

Manantial de gracia y consuelo,
Eres el Padre Supremo,
eres el Padre Supremo,
que nos envuelve en su juego,
que nos envuelve en su juego.
Eres nuestro protector.
Gloria a Ti mi Señor.

Salvador de los afligidos,
ante Tus Pies nos rendimos,
ante Tus Pies nos rendimos,
y con amor Te pedimos,
y con amor Te pedimos,
que nos des Tu bendición,
Oh, mi Dulcísimo Señor.

Alabado seas Señor,
alabado seas mi Señor,
te entrego todas mis faltas,
te entrego todas mis dudas,
para que Tú las consumas
en el puro fuego de tu amor.

Om Paz, Paz, Paz

title: Glory Glory
lyrics:
Mine eyes have seen the glory of the coming of the Lord
He has taken on a form to teach the good and loving way
He’ll reunite His children on a bright new golden day
His truth is marching on
 
(chorus)
Glory, glory, hallelujah
Glory, glory, hallelujah
Glory, glory, hallelujah
Sai’s truth is marching on
 
My heart has felt the duty of His universal words
My thoughts and deeds and words shall always try to please the Lord
Sathya, dharma, shanthi, prema on His sound will be restored
His truth is marching on
(chorus)
 
We have come from distant countries for the darshan of Lord Sai
He has graced us with His love and bliss our lives to deify
He has cared to lead us back upon the fact that we have lost
His truth is marching on
(chorus)

title: Glory to Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Victory to Ganesha, Lord Ganesha
 Your Mother is the origin of all, Mother Sakthi
 And your Father is Shiva, Lord of all Lords
 Your Mother is Parvathi, Shiva's consort
 And your Father is the great Shankara
 Lord of all, the Destroyer of evil

title: Glory to the Lord
title2: Glory to the Lord, Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
All bow before our beloved Lord, Sathya Sai
 All bow before our beloved Lord Sai
 Very form of Omkar, Lord of God of Gods, Sai
 Grantor of wisdom, Lord of all the Universe
 All bow before our beloved Lord, Sathya Sai
 All bow before our beloved Lord Sai

title: Gnana Bhaskara Kumara Dayapara
lyrics:
Omkara Roopa Shiva Shakthi Bala
Shanmukha Natha Parama Dayaghana
meaning: O Lord Shanmukha (six-headed Lord Karthikeya), the son of Shiva and Parvathi, You are compassionate to the needy and the embodiment of the primordial sound (Om) and the treasure house of supreme kindness.

title: Go, tell it on the mountain
title2: Go, tell it on the mountain,
lyrics:
Over the hills and everywhere
Go, tell it on the mountain,
That Jesus Christ is born (2x)

While shepherds kept their watching
Over silent flocks by night
Behold throughout the heavens
There shone a Holy Light [ Go, Tell It ... ]

The shepherds feared and trembled,
When lo! above the earth,
Rang out the angels chorus
That hailed the Savior’s birth [ Go, Tell It ... ]

Down in a lowly manger
The humble Christ was born
And God sent us salvation
That blessed Christmas morn [ Go, Tell It ... ]

(One chord - raise to higher scale)
Go tell it on the mountain,
Over the hills and everywhere, (variation)
Go tell it on the mountain,
That Jesus Christ is born
That Jesus Christ is born
That Jesus Christ is born (Slow)

title: God here, God there
title2: God here, God there, God God everywhere
lyrics:
God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone
 Shiva here, Shiva there, Shiva, Shiva everywhere
 God is one God is one, God is one for everyone
 Allah here, Allah there, Allah Allah everywhere
 God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone
 Sai here, Sai there, Sai, Sai everywhere
 God is one, God is one, God is one for everyone.

title: God in human form
title2: God in human form, relieve us of our worldly ties
lyrics:
Come as beauty, come as peace, take away all sorrow,
 Your are my heart's desire, my Lord Sai Narayana.

title: God Is All There Is
title2: God Is All, God Is All, God Is All There Is
lyrics:
God Is All There Is
God Is All There Is (Jai) (2)
Sai Is All ...
Love Is All ...

title: God is dwelling in the beauty
title2: God is dwelling in the beauty in the temple of my heart
lyrics:
Of my heart, of my heart, of my heart, of my heart
Soham, Soham, You and I are one (2)

Te Matua kei roto Taku manawa, Kei roto Kei roto taku manawa
Soham, Soham, kia kotahi e (2)

Soham, Soham, You and I are one (2)
meaning: "Te Matua kei roto i toku manawa nui" - The Lord is in my beloved heart; "Kei roto-kei roto-kei roto taku manawa nui" - Within, within, within, my beloved heart; "Kia ko tahi e" - Yes, all is one.

title: God Is in me
lyrics:
I go to where God Is
God Is in me..God Is in me
I go to where God Is
God Is in me..God Is in me
 
I go to where God gives
God gives through me..God gives through me
I go to where God gives
God gives through me..God gives through me
 
I go to where God lives
God lives as me..God lives as me
I go to where God lives
God lives as me..God lives as me
 
I let go and there God Is
God Is Me..God Is Me
I let go and there God Is
God Is Me..God Is Me
 
God Is in me..God Is in Me
God Is in me..God Is Me

Remember Me, remember Me, I am with you always (2x)
Remember My name, call Me anytime anywhere (2x)

title: God is in the sanctuary
lyrics:
God is in the valley low
God is on the mountain top
God is everywhere I go
I said “Yeah...yeah, yeah...yeah, yeah...God is!”

title: God is my Guru
title2: God is my Guru, Sathya Sai is my Lord
lyrics:
Omnipresent master in my heart shall reside
 Inspiration of my life, Lord of my soul
 May I receive the gift of His Grace (1X)
 May I behold the love in His Face (1X)
 To the will of the Lord may I surrender

title: God is my strength
title2: God is my strength and God is my protection
lyrics:
God opens a path for me and God is my protection
 God is my strength and God is my protection
 God opens a path for me and God is my protection
 Daily He teaches me, Sai is my Father
 Nurtures and cares for me, Sai is my Mother
 Teaches us all we must serve one another
 Love friend and enemy, Sai is my Brother

title: God Is Our Best Friend
title2: God is our best friend, God is our best kin
lyrics:
Singing God's names, follow one of our choice
Allah Sai Yesu Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Buddha are our God's names [ God is ... ]
All names are sacred and inspire our living
As a way to blissful peace, we just have to pray
So chant one God's name to keep the mind tame
Precious love divine, as we sing God's name

title: God of Israel
lyrics:
To my right, Michael, to my left, Gabriel
And before me, Uriel, behind me Raphael
And above my head, above my head, Divine Mother
And in my heart, and in my soul, Sai Baba lives
alt_lyrics:
Adonai, Adonai, God of Israel
To my right, Michael, to my left, Gabriel
And before me, Uriel, behind me Raphael
And above my head, above my head, the Holy Schechina
And in my heart, and in my heart, Sai Baba

title: God Of Love
title2: God Of Love, God Of Love, Fill My Heart With Your Treasure
lyrics:
Let Me Share, Let Me Care, Let Me Love Without Measure
Father Of Love, Let Me Be Like You, Kind And True Forever
God Of Love, God Of Love, Love Me Now And Forever
God Of Light, God Of Light, Hold My Life In Your Keeping
Let Me Find Peace Of Mind, Guard Me In Waking Or Sleeping
Father Of Light, Guide Me Every Day, All The Way Forever
God Of Light, God Of Light, Lead Me Onward Forever

title: God Will Make A Way
lyrics:
There are times when you feel you can’t go on
The sky turns black and the road is just too long
Lost and lonely, no help in sight
You do your best but you just can’t get it right.
 
Down so long and blinded by the pain
The well runs dry and there’s just no sign of rain
Bent and broken and wounded by your loss
Call out His Name and He will bear your cross. …..
(Don’t ya know) God will make a way (…in the darkest night)
God will make a way (…when you’ve lost your sight)
God will make a way (…so stand and fight)
God will make a way……
 
Mind held hostage by doubt and fear
The past still haunts you and the future is unclear
Break those chains that bind you to this earth
Trust the One who will free you through rebirth …..(Don’t ya know)
 
God will make a way (Oh yes he wil)
God will make a way (Don’t ya know that he will)
God will make a way (Oh yes He will)
 
If your heart is pure and true,
He’ll be there beside you
If your faith and love are strong,
you’ll sing that victory song
If you hold out till the end,
He’ll be your faithful Friend
If you take His mighty hand,
you’ll reach that Promised Land. ….
(Don’t ya know) God will make a way (…Oh, yes He will)
God will make a way (…When you’re all alone)
God will make a way (…He will lead you home)
God will make a way
 
Feel the peace (feel the peace) that is on the other side
Feel the truth, the truth you just can’t hide
Love alone will take you to that shore
The Lord Himself will open every door. …..
 
(Don’t ya know) God will make a way (…In the wind and rain)
God will make a way (...He will bear your pain)
God will make a way (...So praise His name)
God will make a way……
 
Make a way, yeah................God will make a way
Make a way, yeah................God will make a way
Make a way, God will make a way .......................
Make a way, God will make a way
Make a way, make a way...God will make a way
Make a way, make a way...God will make a way
Make a way......... Make a way.........
When you’re all alone, He will bring you home
When no one cares, He will hear you prayers
(Yes, He will), (2x)
Every tear you cry, He will be right there to dry your eyes
(Yes, He will) In your darkest hour....... in your darkest hour......
He will be your Power
(Yes, He will) (8x)
 
(Don’t ya know) God will make a way (When you can’t go on…)
God will make a way (He will make you strong…)
God will make a way (So hold on…)
God will make a…
God will make a…
God will make a……… way.

title: Goddess of Love, Goddess of mercy
title2: Goddess of Love, Goddess of mercy, I pray to You, come to me
lyrics:
Goddess of Love, Goddess of mercy, I pray to You, set me free

Free from the ups and downs of life, free from the sorrow and pain
Free from bondage of my soul that causes birth and pain [ Goddess of Love ... set me free ] 

Make my heart an ocean of love, that makes me one with all
Let mercy be the flower of love that blooms in one and all [ Goddess of Love ... set me free ]
alt_lyrics:
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy I pray to You come to me
Swami of Love, Swami of Mercy I pray to You set me free
Free from the ups and downs of life, free from sorrow and pain
Free from the bondage of my soul that causes birth and pain [ Swami of Love ... set me free ]

Make my heart an ocean of Love that makes me one with all
Let mercy be the flower of Love that blooms in one and all [ Swami of Love ... set me free ]

title: Goddess of Mercy, O Bodhisattva
title2: Goddess of Mercy, O Bodhisattva, we bow at Thy Lotus Feet
lyrics:
Goddess of Mercy, Divine Mother, we pray for Thy Grace each day
 So sweet, so kind and gentle, overflowing with Compassion
 Bringing relief to the suffering mass, showering Joy and Wonder

title: God’s Love Has the Power to Heal
title2: God’s love has the power to heal
lyrics:
Nothing else feels quite so real
Just got to sing about the way it feels …
I said God’s love has the power to heal.
God’s love has the power to cure
Flowing steady through a heart so pure
Whatever ails ya, He can fix for sure
God’s love has the power to cure…
 
I said the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power, a power so real,
I said God’s love has the power to heal…

I said the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power, you can feel…
I said God’s love has the power to heal.
 
Leave your mind behind, let your Spirit soar
Love is the key that will open the door
Put your faith and trust in the Lord above
And feel the power of His healing love.
 
I said the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power, a power so real,
I said God’s love has the power to heal.
 
God’s love has the power to change
Every detail He can rearrange
His works and wonders are a little strange
but that’s because God’s love has the power to change.
 
God’s love has the power to mend
What was broken can be healed again
He’s there beside you as your closest Friend
God’s love has the power to mend.
 
I said the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power, a power so real,
I said God’s love has the power to heal… (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking, talking ‘bout the power, yeah, a power so real,
God’s love has the power to heal.
 
Put your pride aside, leave your doubt at the door
Have you asked yourself what are you living for
When the Holy Spirit touches you inside
Your heart can’t help but open wide…
 
To the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power (talking ‘bout the power)
Talking ‘bout the power, a power so real…
I said God’s love has the power to heal… (Talking ‘bout the power),
Talking ‘bout the power (Talking ‘bout the power),
Talking ‘bout the power, you can feel…
I said God’s love has the power to heal… (Talking ‘bout the power),
Yeah, talking ‘bout the power (Talking ‘bout the power),
Talking ‘bout the power, a power so real…
God’s love has the power to heal.

title: God’s Love Is So Wonderful
title2: God's Love Is So Wonderful, So Wonderful, So Wonderful
lyrics:
God's Love Is So Wonderful, God's Wonderful Love
Its So High You Cant Climb Over It
Its So Low You Cant Get Under It
Its So Wide You Cant Get Around It, God's Wonderful Love

title: Gokula Bala Gopala Krishna
lyrics:
Govardhanodhara Govinda Krishna
Meera Ke Prabhu Mohana Krishna
Parthipureeshwara Sri Sai Krishna
meaning: In Gokula, you were Gopala Krishna. For Mira, you were Lord Mohana Krishna, the captivating Lord playing your flute. You lifted the Govardhana mountain. In Puttaparthi, you are Lord Sai Krishna.

title: Gokula Nandana Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Maakhan Chora Gopala Sai
Mathura Natha Madana Murari
Shyama Sundara Sai Gokula Bala
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Natavara Shyama Gopala Sai [ Maakhan Chora ... ]
meaning: O Lord Shyama (Krishna), the dark complexioned one who plays the flute, You are the beloved of Gokula who is the stealer of butter. You are the Lord of Mathura, the most beautiful one, the Lord of Surdas. You are the one who held the mountain to protect Your devotees. You are the delightful dancer who has incarnated as Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Golden Light, Golden Light
title2: Golden Light, golden light, fill me with Your golden light
lyrics:
Gentle eyes, gentle eyes, Sathya Sai such gentle eyes
Holy Feet, Holy Feet, how I long to touch Your feet
Love so sweet, love so sweet, divine love within us deep
Be with me, be with me, Lord of Lords please be with me
All my life, all my life, Sathya Sai You be my life

title: Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
title2: Gonna fly on the wings of my heart
lyrics:
Gonna carry me across the sea
 Gonna fly on the wings of my love
 And sit at Sai Baba's feet.
 (repeat first 4 lines)

 Well I love my Baba, yes I love Him so
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 And I know He's with me wherever I go
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 He loves all the creatures both great and small
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 He says I love everybody, one and all
 Wings of my love gonna set me free [ Gonna fly ... Sai Baba's feet. ]
 He's bringin' righteousness to the earth
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 That's why He's taken this human birth
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 He's bringin' liberation for you and me
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 My Baba is here to set us free
 Wings of my love gonna set me free [ Gonna fly ... Sai Baba's feet. ]
 He helps the helpless, and He feeds the poor
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 Compassion, service what life is for
 Wings of my love gonna set me free
 Well, I'm goin' to Prashanthi, and I haven't a care
 Wings of my heart gonna carry me
 'Cause I know Baba is everywhere
 Wings of my love gonna set me free [ Gonna fly ... Sai Baba's feet. ]

title: Gonna Give My Life to the Lord
title2: I’m gonna give my life to the Lord, to the Lord again
lyrics:
I’m gonna give my life to the Lord, to the Lord again
I’m gonna jump, I’m gonna shout, I’m gonna dance and sing
I’m gonna tell my sweet Lord everything
I’m gonna give my life to the Lord, to the Lord again.
 
I’m gonna live my life for the Lord, for the Lord again
I’m gonna live my life for the Lord, for the Lord again
He picked me and turned me round,
Put my feet on solid ground
I’m gonna live my life for the Lord, for the Lord again.
 
In times of trouble
When the sky turns black
Call His Name on the double
He’ll provide what you lack
Hold on to His hand
As tight as you can…
And it won’t be long if your faith is strong
You’ll soon be singing His victory song
When you give your life to the Lord, to the Lord again.
 
[ I’m gonna ... Lord everything ]
I’m gonna give my life to the Lord, sweet Lord
I’m gonna live my life for the Lord, my Lord
I’m gonna give my life to the Lord, to the Lord again.

title: Gopal Gopal Brindavana Gopal
lyrics:
Hey Nanda Ananda Mukunda Gopal [ Gopal Gopal ... ]
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Gopi Janodhara Niranjana [ Hey Nanda ]
meaning: Chant Gopala, Gopala the unstained God of Brindavan, one who delighted Nanda and liberated the devotees. Uplifted the Govardhana mountain to save the people, you are protector of cows and Gopis.

title: Gopala Baba Sai
lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Go Samrakshaka [ Gopala Baba ... ]
Govardhanodharana Baba
Gopika Ramana Baba (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai, you are Lord Gopala. In the town of Gokula, you gave protection to the cows and their calves. O Lord, you saved the mountain Govardhana, as per your promise and the devotees from the anger of Lord Indra. Lord Sai, as Gopala, was also the beloved of the Gopikas.

title: Gopala Brindavana Pala
lyrics:
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Suramuni Vanditha Gopala Bala
meaning: Sing the glory of Gopala of Brindavan beloved of Gopis (cow herd women) you are little Krishna of Gokula the enchanting flute player. Worshipped by saints and gods and you are the protector of them.

title: Gopala Darshan Dey Nandalala
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Neela Bala Govinda
Muralidhara Hari Nanda Mukunda [ Gopala ... ]
Radha Madhava Shyama (Sai) Gopala
Darshan Dey Dey Madana Gopala
meaning: O Lord Gopala, the son of Nanda, grant us Your Darshan. You are the blue-hued boy who destroyed the demon Madhu. You are the one who plays divine music with the flute. You are verily Lord Hari (Vishnu) and the one who grants us liberation. You are the dark-hued Gopala who is adored by Radha. Please give us Your Darshan, O extraordinarily handsome Gopala.

title: Gopala Daya Nidhey
lyrics:
Sri Parthi Krupa Nidhey Sai Rama [ Gopala Daya ... ]
Nanda Mukunda Govinda Nithyananda
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Gopala (Krishna), the treasure house of compassion who is none other than Lord Sai Rama, the most compassionate one residing at Parthi. Glory to the son of Nanda, Lord Govinda (Krishna), who is ever blissful and who grants liberation.

title: Gopala Giridhara Bala
lyrics:
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala [ Gopala ... ]
Goparipala Narayana (2)
Narayana Narayana [ Goparipala ... ]
Govinda Govinda Narayana (Sai)
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who lifted the Govardhana mountain, who is the boy of Gokula and who gave happiness to the Gopis. Chant the name of Lord Narayana, Govinda - the protector of cows.

title: Gopala Gokula Bala
lyrics:
Nandalala Goparipala [ Gopala Gokula ... ]
Shyama Govinda Krishna Gopala
Raasa Vilola Venu Gopala
Nanda Nanda Ke Mukunda Bala
Kamala Vadana Sai Krishna Gopala
alt_lyrics:
Gopala Gokula Bala
Nandalala Goparipala [ Gopala Gokula ... ]
Shyama Mukunda Krishna Gopala
Raasa Vilola Venu Gopala
Nanda Nanda Ke Murali Gopala
Kamala Nayana Sai Krishna Gopala
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Gopala (Krishna), the beloved son of Nanda of Gokula. He is the dark-hued Govinda, the protector of the cows and the one who performed the Raasa Leela. He plays Divine Music with His Flute and is the Liberator of all. He is none other than the lotus-faced Lord Sai.

title: Gopala Gopala
lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Gopala [ Gopala ... ]
Murali Lola Gopala
Murahara Sai Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala - one who lifted the mountain, the player of the flute, the slayer of the demon Mura and who is our Sai Gopala.

title: Gopala Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Yashoda Bala Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who is the darling of Gokul and Nanda. The One who stole butter, son of Yashoda and star of Yadu clan.

title: Gopala Gopala Hrdaya Vihara
title2: Gopala Gopala Hrdaya Vihara Giridhara Gopala
lyrics:
Shyama Mukunda Gopala
Krishna Mukunda Sai Gopala
Nanda Kishora Natavara Lala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala Gopala Gopala Gopala Gopala (2)
meaning: Lord Sai is a protector of cows (Gopala), the one who lives in the hearts of devotees, the dark hued one (Shyama), the attractive one (Krishna), the expert dancer ( Natavara ).

title: Gopala Gopala Nacho Gopala
lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nacho Gopala
Nacho Nacho Sai Nandalala
meaning: Please dance and give us the enjoyment of seeing you dance - Gopala and son of Nanda. While you dance, let us hear the sound of your anklets "Rhuma Jhuma".

title: Gopala Gopala Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
Madhava Hey Yadava Pandari Natha Vittala
Hey Deena Natha Vittala
Hey Sai Natha Vittala
Radhey Shyam Sri Ranga Sai Gopala
meaning: Oh Gopala, the beloved of Radha, also you are Shyama and Sai Gopala the resident of Srirangam. You are the star of Yadu dynasty and you are the Lord Vittala of Pandari, who gives refuge to meek and weak devotees. Also you are Sai Natha Vittala.

title: Gopala Gopala Radhey Nandalala
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Radhey Nandalala [ Gopala ... ]
Brindavana Sanchara Radhey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Radhey Nandalala
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the one who is the beloved of Radha and the darling son of Nanda, the one who resides in Brindavan, the one with an enchanting form and who holds the flute.

title: Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Radha Hrudaya Vihara Bala [ Gopala Gopala ... ]
Nanda Kishora Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Kaliya Mardhana Gopala
Govardhana Dhara Gopala
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala also Sai Gopala who resides in the heart of Radha, the son of Nanda, stealer of butter and the one who subdued the Kaliya serpent dancing over its head and the one who also lifted the Govardhana mountain.

title: Gopala Govinda Govinda Harey Murarey
lyrics:
Mayura Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Brindavana Sanchari [ Gopala Govinda ... ]
Shankha Chakra Gadha Padmadhari
Krishna Mukunda Murari ( Sai )
meaning: Oh Lord Gopala, You are extolled by various names such as Govinda, Hari and Murari; You are the one who wears the peacock crown and the yellow cloth; You are the one who wanders in Brindavan; You are the one who bears the Conch, Disc, Mace and Lotus in Your hands. You are verily Sai.

title: Gopala Govinda Narayana Hari
lyrics:
Nandalala Mukunda Narayana Hari [ Gopala Govinda ... ]
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
Narayana Hari Veda Parayana Hari
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (2)
meaning: Chant the divine names of Lord Narayana and Lord Krishna such as Gopala and Govinda, the beloved of Nanda and the one who bestows liberation to the devotees. O Lord, Your glory has been extolled in the Vedas. Victory to You, O Lord Narayana.

title: Gopala Krishna Madhava Krishna
lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Krishna [ Gopala Madhava ... ]
Madhava Murali Gopala Krishna
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna
meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Krishna, Gopala, Madhava, Murali and Govinda.

title: Gopala Radha Lola
lyrics:
Murali Lola Nandalala [ Gopala ... ]
Keshava Madhava Janardhana
Vanamala Brindavana Bala [ Murali Lola ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, who gives joy to Radha, who is the son of Nanda. He is the one who played the flute, who is also known as Keshava, Madhava and Janardhana. He is the sweet child of Brindavan who wears the garland made of jungle flowers.

title: Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
title2: Gopala Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda Gopal
lyrics:
Gopal Gopal Gopal [ Gopala Radhey ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopala Sai Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopal
meaning: Chant the different names of Lord Krishna - Gopala, Radha Krishna and Govinda. Lord Krishna is verily Lord Sai.

title: Gopala Radhey Krishna Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Gopala Radhey Krishna Mana Mohana 
Gopala Radhey Krishna Sai Madhava
Radhey Radhey Radhey Madhusudhana
Radhey Radhey Radhey Mana Mohana
Radhey Radhey Radhey Sai Keshava
Gopala Radhey Krishna Sai Madhava
meaning: Lord Krishna is the protector of cows, the beloved of Radha and the destroyer of all evil entities. He enchants the minds of all. Glory be to Lord Krishna who is verily our Lord Sathya Sai who dons beautiful hair and is beloved by all.

title: Gopala Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala Sai Gopala [ Gopala Sai ... ]
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nacho Gopala [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai is a protector of cows (Gopala), the Lord who lives in Puttaparthi, O protector of cows, Lord Govinda, please dance to the tune of rhuma jhuma like little Lord Gopala.

title: Gopala Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Govinda Sai Govinda
Krishna Krishna Murali Krishna
Kokoro wo Mitasu Ai no Kami
Itoshii Manazashi Gopala 
Krishna Krishna Murali Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sathya Sai Krishna
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Gopala and Govinda (names of Lord Krishna). O Lord Krishna, You fill our hearts to the brim with Your love. You watch over us with Your loving gaze. O Divine Flutist, You are none other than Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Gopala, Hijo De Nanda
lyrics:
Dulce Es Tu Flauta Hazla Cantar
 Keshava, Libranos De La Maldad
 Santo Eres Senor De Brindavan
 Toca Tu Flauta, Hazme Sonar
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), son of Nanda, so sweet is Your flute, I pray that You make it sing. O Keshava, free us from evil. O Holy Lord of Brindavan, play Your flute and fill my dreams.

title: Gopi Govinda Ghana Shyam Sai Ram
title2: Gopi Govinda Ghana Shyam Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara He Nandalala
Shirdipureeshwara He Sai Bala
Karuna Sindhu He Sai Krupala
Deena Bandhu He Deena Dayala
Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
meaning: The Lord has many forms like Govinda, to the Gopi ladies of Brindavan who is also Shyam, the one who is dark complexioned God, Sri Sai Ram to the devotees of Nanda's son (Lord Krishna). He is the Sai Baba who resides in Shirdi. Sai is the friend to all those in trouble Sai is all merciful, He is full of compassion.

title: Gopi Ramana Gokula Nandana
lyrics:
Shritha Jana Palana Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Aganita Guna Gana
Sai Narayana Namo Namo
Sathya (Parthi) Narayana Namo Namo
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the beloved of Gopis and the boy from Gokula. O Lord, You are Narayana, the protector of the Holy and the pious people, You are the consort of Lakshmi, and is the immeasurable treasure house of virtuous qualities. Salutations to Lord Sai residing in Puttaparthi who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Gopi Ramana Gopala
lyrics:
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Goparipala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala the beloved of the Gopikas Chant the name of Sai Gopala who is the protector of cows. Chant the name of Govinda.

title: Govardhana Giridhara Gopika Manohara
lyrics:
Mohana Muralidhara Sathya Sai Natavara [ Govardhana Giridhara ... ]
Vasudeva Giridhara Brindavana Sanchara
Keshava Damodara Sathya Sai Natavara
meaning: Glory to Thee, O Lord Krishna, You lifted the mountain to save people of Gokula, You are the beloved of Gopikas, You are the enchanting flute player and a delightful dancer. You are the one wandering in Brindavan. You are also known as Keshava (destroyer of demon Keshi) and Damodara. Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi is none other than You.

title: Govardhana Giridhari Murari
lyrics:
Hey Vraja Bala Hey Vanamali
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
meaning: Oh Govardhana Giridhari Murari (the little mischievous Krishna who lifted the mountain to save the people of Gokula). You are the one who is from Mathura and you are the one who is wearing a garland made of jungle flowers. You are the one from Gokula and wanderer of Brindavan forest. You are the Lord of Meera also presently you are Sai rambling in Parthi.

title: Govinda Bhajo Sri Hari Gopala
title2: Govinda Bhajo Sri Hari Gopala Bhajo
lyrics:
Gopi Gopala Bhajo Shyama Bhajo
Govinda Giridhari Gopala Bhajo
Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Sri Sai Parabrahma Ananda Bhajo (Hey)
meaning: Chant and worship the various names of Krishna, Govinda, Hari, Gopala, Shyama, Giridhari. Chant the names of Rakumayi Panduranga Vittala (the beloved of Rakumayi and the Lord of Pandharpur) who is also presently Sai of Parthi, who is ever supreme and blissful.

title: Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo
lyrics:
Ram Ram Bolo Hari Naam Bolo
Allah Sai Yesu Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Buddha Naam Bolo [ Govinda Bolo ... ]
Yeh Naam Saarey Hai Jeevan Saharey
Paramananda Ke Yeh Kholtey Hai Dwarey
Jo Naam Chaho Woh Naam Bolo
Prem Se Bolo Bhaav Se Bolo
meaning: Sing the glorious names of Govinda, Gopala, Rama, Hari, Allah, Sai, Yesu, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavira and Buddha. When these names are chanted with love and devotion, they sustain the devotee through the journey of life.

title: Govinda Bolo Guru Sai Bolo
lyrics:
Gopala Bolo Guru Sai Bolo [ Govinda Bolo ... ]
Shirdi Sai Bolo Shiva Guru Naam Bolo
Sathya Sai Bolo Sadguru Naam Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Prema Sai Bolo Parabrahma Bolo
Parthi Baba Bolo Paramatma Bolo
Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Sai, the Divine Preceptor, Lord Govinda, Gopala (names of Lord Krishna). Chant the names of  Lord Sai of Shirdi, Parthi and Prema Sai who are all the embodiments of Love and the very incarnation of the Lord Supreme.

title: Govinda Gopal Jaya Narayana
lyrics:
Madhava Gopal Madhusudhana Gopal
Keshava Gopal Mukunda Gopal
meaning: Victory to You, Oh Narayana, Gopal and Govinda, You are the slayer of demon Madhu and the one who gives liberation to the deserved.

title: Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Madhava Gopala
Mukunda Murali Gopala
Madhusudhana Gopala
Yashoda Nanda Gopala
Yadu Nandana Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Gopala [ Madhusudhana Gopala ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, also known as Govinda and Gopala, the one who fosters cowherds and people. Victory to the enchanting flute player who bestows liberation to devotees, the destroyer of demon Madhu and beloved of Yashoda, Nanda and the Yadu clan.

title: Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Bolo Radhey Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam (2) [ Bolo Radhey ... ]
meaning: Chant the glorious names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Ghana Shyam and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Govinda Gopala Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Radhey Gopala Gopi Gopala
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Murali Gopala
Govardhanodhara Gopala Bala [ Radhey Gopala ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna also known as Govinda, Gopala, and the one who is the son of Nanda. Glory to the Lord of Radha, Meera and the Gopis. Glory to the one who plays the flute and the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain.

title: Govinda Gopala Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Narayana [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (2)
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (4)
alt_lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Jaya Hari Govinda Madhava Narayana [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (2)
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (4)
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda (Vishnu) who is known by many names - Gopala, the protector of the cows, Narayana, the infinite, auspicious one, Madhava, the one whose is as sweet as Madhu or honey and Hari. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Govinda Gopala Narayana (Bhaja Mana)
lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Narayana [ Bhaja Mana Govinda ... ]
Govinda Madhava Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (7)
meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava and Narayana.

title: Govinda Gopala Narayana Hari
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari (2) [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Jagadodhara Narayana Hari
Bhaktha Uddhara Narayana Hari
Parthi Pureesha Narayana Hari [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Narayana Hari Jai Jai Narayana Hari (2)
(Jai Jai) Narayana Hari (2)
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Gopala and Lord Narayana, the sustainer of the universe, the one who is the redeemer of devotees' sufferings. Glory to You O Lord of Parthi, You are verily Lord Narayana.

title: Govinda Gopala Prabhu Giridhari
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Hrudaya Vihari [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Parthi (Hrudaya) Vihara Bada Chitha Chora
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, who is the protector of cows, the one who lifted the Govardhana hill and the one who is the indweller of our hearts. The one who is the son of Nanda and the one who stole butter in Gokula, is verily Sai, the Lord of Parthi who steals our hearts.

title: Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
Govinda Govinda Gopala Radha Ramana
meaning: Chant the name Govinda Gopala the beloved of Radha.

title: Govinda Govinda
lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Govinda
Gopala Sai Gopala [ Mukunda Madhava ... ]
Jai Jai Govinda Jai Jai Gopala (4)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, Govinda (foster of cow herd) who gives liberation to devotees. Victory to Govinda who is also Sai Gopala.

title: Govinda Govinda Bhaja Mana Radhey
title2: Govinda Govinda Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Krishna Keshava Harey Madhava Govinda Jaya Govinda
Harey Murarey Sai Murarey Govinda Jaya Govinda
Govinda Jaya Govinda Govinda Jaya Govinda (2)
meaning: Let us chant the divine name of Lord Govinda (Krishna) reverberating in the mind of Radha, whose beloved is Lord Krishna who is engrossed in the divine sports with the Gopikas. O Lord, You are the destroyer of demon Keshi. Victory to You O Sai who is none other than Govinda.

title: Govinda Govinda Gayiyere Bhajo Radhey
title2: Govinda Govinda Gayiyere Bhajo Radhey Gopala Krishna Gayiye
lyrics:
Murali Manohara Gayiyere Bhajo Nanda Ke Lal Prabhu Gayiye
Giridhari Giridhari Gayiyere Maayi Meera Ke Nath Prabhu Gayiye (2)
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Gopala and worship the Lord of Radha. Sing the name of the handsome flute player and worship the Lord, the son of Nanda. Sing the name of the Lord of Mother Meera.

title: Govinda Govinda Gokula Brinda
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Satchidananda [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Sri Ranga Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Ranga
Govinda Govinda (4)
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda (Krishna) of Brindavan and Gokula, who is the existence, awareness and bliss. He is also the Lord residing in Srirangam who resides in our hearts and who showers His Love on His devotees.

title: Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Venu Gopala Bolo [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Parthasarathi Keshava Bolo
Sanathana Sarathi Partheesha Bolo
meaning: Sing the name of Govinda, the handsome bluish boy Gopala with the flute. Sing the name of Keshava, the charioteer of Partha (Arjuna). Sing the name of the eternal charioteer, the Lord of Parthi - Sai - who guides us all in the right path towards liberation.

title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Gopala Govinda Narayana [ Govinda ... ]
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari Gopala Narayana [ Gopala Govinda ... ]
meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana and Gopala, which remove our miseries.

title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Gopala Gopala Narayana [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Sundara Mukha Sayeeshwara Narayana
Jaya Parthi Jaya Shirdi Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana and Gopala having beautiful face. You are also Sayeeshwara residing in Shirdi and Parthi and who is extolled in Vedas. Victory to you. .

title: Govinda Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Govinda Narayana Hari Hari
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana [ Govinda Narayana Hari Hari ... ]
meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Narayana, Madhava, Keshava, Gopala and Hari who protects us from all troubles and miseries.

title: Govinda Govinda Radhey Gopal
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Murali Gopal [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
Shyam Shyam Shyam Shyam Radhey Gopal
Govinda Govinda Murali Gopal
Shyam Shyam Shyam Shyam Radhey Gopal [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
meaning: O Lord, (Govinda) the finder of the cows (Vedas), (Radhe), the supremely charming, beautiful . O mind! sing the glorious names of Lord Murali, the one who is holding the flute, Lord Shyam the one who has a dark blue complexion, Radhey Gopala, the beloved of goddess Radhe.

title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
lyrics:
Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama Harey [ Govinda ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara (3)
Giridhara Naagara
Charana Kamala Balihaari Rey
meaning: Chant the name of Govinda, who is of dark blue complexion, holding the enchanting flute in his hand. Oh Lord of Meera who is adored as Giridhara Naagara, we salute at your divine lotus feet.

title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gopala [ Govinda ... ]
Govardhanodhari Gopala
Gopala Gopala [ Govardhana ]
Gopi Manohara Gopala
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey (3)
meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda, Gopala, who lifted Govardhana mountain on his finger tips to save Gopis and Gopas of Gokula. He is the captivating Lord of them.

title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey
lyrics:
Govinda Harey Avatar Harey [ Govinda ... ]
Treta Mey Sita Rama Baney
Dwapara Mey Radhey Shyama Baney
Kali Yug Mey Sai Naam Liye
Sai Naam Liye Sarva Naam Liye
meaning: Glory to Govinda, Gopala, the one who plays the flute and the one is dark complexioned. The One who was Rama in Treta yuga, and the one who was Lord Shyama the consort of Radha. In the Kali Yuga, We chant the name of Sai and Surrender to His Lotus Feet.

title: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey
title2: Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Gopi Gopa Bala
lyrics:
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Murali Gaana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Radha Ramana Lola
Govinda Harey Gopala Harey Hey Nanda Gopa Bala
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda and Gopala (names of Krishna), the one who enchants with His flute, the one who is the Lord of Radha and the one who is the son of Nanda.

title: Govinda Hari Gopala Hari Radha
title2: Govinda Hari Gopala Hari Radha Ramana Hari Govinda (3)
lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Govinda Navaneetha Chora Govinda 
Nithyananda Govinda Nigamoddhara Govinda

Govinda Jaya Govinda (4)
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna, the protector of the cows and the beloved of Radha. He is the son of Nanda and the stealer of butter (devotees' hearts). He is the very embodiment of infinite bliss who liberated the Vedas. Victory to Lord Govinda.

title: Govinda Hey Nandalal Bhajo
lyrics:
Shyam Brindavana Bal Bhajo [ Govinda Hey ... ]
Shyama Gopala Radhey ( Sai ) Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal (Jai Jai Sai Gopal)
meaning: Chant and glorify the beloved of Nanda, who is the little Shyam of Brindavan and the beloved of Radha. Victory to the Lord of Radha who is none other than our beloved Lord Sai.

title: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai
title2: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (3)
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai (2)
meaning: Victory and salutations to Govinda Gopala who is the Lord of Radha.

title: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai
title2: Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Mukunda Jai Jai Murari Jai Jai
Madhusudhana Murali Krishna Jai Jai
Keshava Jai Jai Madhava Jai Jai
Narayana Hari Sri Krishna Jai Jai (Sriman)
meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda (Krishna), the beloved of Radha. He is the one who gives liberation and is the annihilator of the demon Mura. Chant His divine names Krishna, Keshava and Narayana.

title: Govinda Jaya Govinda
lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Govinda
Ghana Ghana Neela Govinda
Bala Mukunda Govinda
Hey Ghana Shyama Govinda [ Gokula Nandana ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda (Krishna), the beloved child of Gokula, whose complexion is dark like the cloud. Glory to the child Mukunda, the one who grants liberation.

title: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna
title2: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Gopala Pala Bala Radha Krishna Jai
lyrics:
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai [ Govinda ... ]
Gopika Mala Haari Pyaari Maayi Meera Mana Vihari Madana Mohana Muralidhari Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Rama Krishna Jai Radha Krishna Jai Bala Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
alt_lyrics:
Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Gopala Bala Bala Radha Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai [ Govinda ... ]
Gopika Mala Haari Pyaari Maayi Meera Mana Vihari Madana Mohana Muralidhari Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Rama Krishna Jai Radha Krishna Jai Bala Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Jai Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jai
meaning: Victory be to Krishna, the Lord of Radha; Victory be to the beloved Lord who wears the garland of the Gopis; Victory be to the one who dwells in the heart of Meera; Victory be to the Lord of Love who enchants our hearts and who plays flute.

title: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna
title2: Govinda Krishna Jai Gopala Krishna Jai Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala Jai
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Krishna [ Govinda ... ]
Keshava Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Govinda Narayana
Nandalala Vraja Bala Hey Sai Narayana Krishna Krishna
meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna, Madhava, Keshava, Narayana. Victory to the son of Nanda and the darling child of Vraja.

title: Govinda Krishna Vittala Venu Gopala
title2: Govinda Krishna Vittala Venu Gopala Krishna Vittala
lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jaya Pandari Natha Vittala
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga (4)
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Lord Krishna who plays the flute, Lord Vittala and Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.

title: Govinda Krishna Vittaley
title2: Govinda Krishna Vittaley Gopala Krishna Vittaley (2)
meaning: Chant the Holy names of Govinda, Gopala, Krishna and Vittala.

title: Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala
title2: Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley
lyrics:
Ranga Ranga Vittaley Sri Panduranga Vittaley
Govinda Krishna Vittaley Venu Gopala Krishna Vittaley [ Ranga Ranga ... ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Govinda, Krishna, Vittala. Sing the Glory of Venugopala, the one who plays the flute. O Krishna, You are Panduranga who is the Lord of Pandari.

title: Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
lyrics:
Jaya Nanda Mukunda Nanda Govinda Radhey Gopala [ Govinda Madhava ... ]
Giridhari Giridhari Jaya Radhey Gopala
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Jaya Jaya Radhey (Sai) Gopala [ Jaya Nanda ... ]
meaning: Chant the divine names of Govinda and Madhava (names of Lord Krishna) who protects cowherds and who slayed the demon Keshi. Victory to the beloved of Nanda and the one who confers liberation to the devotees. O Lord You are adored as the beloved of Radha, as Giridhari, (the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain), the dark-hued one who has now incarnated as Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Krishna Krishna Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopi Ramana
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava
meaning: Glory to Thee O Lord Krishna who is known by many names - Govinda, Madhava, Gopala and Keshava. You are the adorable child of Gokula and the Lord of Gopis. You are the one who enchants and attracts, the slayer of demon Madhu. Victory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Govinda Murahari Madhava
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Keshava [ Govinda Murahari ... ]
Janardhana Sai Parthi Vihari
Govardhanodhari Madhava
Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana who is known by many names - Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava, Janardhana and Hari. Glory to the one who slayed demon Mura and who lifted the Govardhana mountain. Glory to Lord Sai who resides at Parthi and who is none other than Lord Narayana.

title: Govinda Muralidhara Murahara
lyrics:
Govinda Ghana Shyama Harey
Govinda Govinda
Govinda Govardhana Giridhara
Govinda Ghana Shyama (Parandhama) Harey
Govinda Sai Shyama Harey
meaning: Chant the divine names of the Lord Krishna - Govinda, Muralidhara, Murahara, Ghana Shyama and Giridhari. Chant the name of Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Govinda Murari Gopala Murari
lyrics:
Vittala Sri Hari Panduranga
Hrdaya Vihari Hey Giridhari
Murahara Shourie Panduranga
meaning: Glory be to Lord Govinda, the protector of cows (Veda, senses), who slayed the demon Mura. Glory to Lord Vittala who stands on a brick (or the idol of knowledge) in the city of Pandharpur and to Lord Giridhari, who lifted the mountain and who resides in our hearts.

title: Govinda Narayana Gopala Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Govinda Govinda Narayana
Govinda Gopala Narayana
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Govinda, Gopala and Lord Narayana.

title: Govinda Radhey Govinda Radhey
title2: Govinda Radhey, Govinda Radhey, Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey
lyrics:
Venu Vilola, Vijaya Gopala, Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey [ Govinda Radhey ... ]
Bhaktha Vatsala, Bhaagavatha Priya, Govinda Govinda Gopala Radhey
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Govinda and Gopala, the beloved Radha. Glory to the enthralling Flutist. O victorious Lord Gopala, glory to Thee who is dear to Your devotees and who showers motherly love.

title: Govinda Radhey Krishna Govinda Govinda
lyrics:
Gopala Sai Krishna Govinda Govinda
Mohana Bala Krishna Govinda Govinda
Parthi Nivasa Krishna Govinda Govinda
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Govinda and Gopala, the handsome boy Krishna who is same as Sai, the resident of Parthi.

title: Govinda Rama Gopala Rama
lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Sai Rama
Janaki Jeevana Sita Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Rama the consort of Sita. Chant the Holy names of Lord Krishna - Gopala, Keshava, Madhava and Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Govinda Rama Jai Jai Gopala
title2: Govinda Rama Jai Jai Gopala Rama
lyrics:
Madhava Rama Jai Jai Keshava Rama [ Govinda Rama ... ]
Durlabha Rama Jai Jai Sulabha Rama
Ek Tu Rama Jai Jai Anek Tu Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who is difficult to attain when sought externally but easily attained when sought within. He is the same Lord who incarnated as Krishna (Gopala, Madhava and Keshava). Victory to Lord Rama, You are the one Lord who has manifested in many forms.

title: Govinda Sadguru Krishna Govinda (3)
lyrics:
Vahey Guru Sathya Naam Sai Govinda
Sai Govinda (2) [ Vahey Guru ... ]
Krishna Krishna Harey Harey Radhey Govinda (4)
meaning: Glory to the Divine Preceptor Sai, You are verily Lord Krishna, the protector of the cows (Govinda). You are Vahey Guru and verily the Truth. Sing the names of Krishna, Hari and Govinda.

title: Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala (3)
lyrics:
Sri Sai Vittala Shirdi Sai Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Sri Ranga Shirdi Ranga Parthi Ranga Vittala (2)
meaning: Chant the glorious names, of Govinda, Vittala, Gopala (names of Lord Vishnu) who protects cowherds and all beings. He is the Lord of Shirdi, Parthi and Pandharpur.

title: Govinda Yadu Kula Madhava Ananda
title2: Govinda Yadu Kula Madhava Ananda Paahi Keshava
lyrics:
Navarasa Yugadhara Muralidhara Nava Mohanaanga Hey Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Sridhara Damodara
Gaana Lola Nija Bhaktha Paripala
Brindavana Sayeeshwara
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna of Yadu dynasty - Govinda, Madhava and Keshava. O Lord, You exhibit the nine modes of melodies and postures while you play Your enchanting flute. Your other names are Sridhara and Damodara. You are none other than Lord Sai of Brindavan, who is the lover of music and the protector of His devotees.

title: Govindam Bhaja Mooda Mathey (Bhaja)
lyrics:
Samprapte Sannihite Kaale
Nahi Nahi Rakshati Dukrin Karane [ Govindam Bhaja ... ]
Punarapi Jananam Punarapi Maranam
Punarapi Janani Jathare Shayanam
meaning: O mind pray to Govinda (Krishna), the protector of cows. O mind, when the time comes, the grammar and recitation of grammar will not help. Again and again we have to take births in the mother's womb, and die, so please remember the name of the Lord Govinda.

title: Govindam Sai Geeta Madhuram
lyrics:
Tum Jagadeesham Karuna Apaaram [ Govindam Sai ... ]
Bhaktha Janardhana Sri Hari Roopam 
Prashanthi Palaka Sadguru Natham 
Hari Narayana Om, Sai Narayana Om
Anandam Hrude Bhajo Govindam
meaning: Lord Sai is my Lord Govinda (Narayana). Singing His name is sweet as nectar. O Lord, You are the Lord of the Universe and have an abundance of compassion for us. You are the very embodiment of Lord Hari who protects the devotees. You are the Lord and the sustainer of Prashanthi Nilayam. With all the joy in my heart I sing for You, O Lord Narayana Sai.

title: Govindethi Sada Snanam
lyrics:
Govindethi Sada Japam
Govindethi Sada Dhyanam
Sada Govinda Keertanam
meaning: Always immerse (wash sins away) yourself in the name of Lord Govinda. Always chant, meditate and sing on the name of Govinda.

title: Gowri Ganesh Uma Ganesh
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Sri Ganesh
Sharanam Ganesh Sharanam Ganesh
Shiva Nandana Ganapathi Ganesh
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesh, the beloved son of Mother Gowri. I surrender to Thee, O Lord of all Demigods, beloved child of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi.

title: Gowri Ganesha Vinayaka
lyrics:
Shuklambara Dhara Natha Gajanana
Sri Ganaraya Vinayaka
Gajavadana Jaya Ganapathi Vandana
Mangala Murthy Gajanana (2)
meaning: Victory to the son of Gowri, Lord Ganesha, who is adorned with white garment and who bestows auspiciousness. Victory to Thee, O Lord of the demigods, we offers our obeisance to You.

title: Gowri Manohara Hey Nataraja
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Hey Shiva Raja
Pavana Charitha Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Mahesha Hey Jagadeesha
Karunamaya Prabho Hey Jagadeesha
meaning: Glory to Thee, Lord Nataraja (dancing Shiva), the beloved of Gowri, You are the supreme God who grants us auspiciousness. Those who extol You merge in divinity. Protect us, oh Lord Mahesha, the compassionate Lord of the universe.

title: Gowri Nandana Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Gajavadana Gananatha Gajanana [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Maha Ganapathey Paahi Gajanana
Gajanana Sai Gajanana
meaning: Victory to the son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi), the little Lord Ganesha, who has the face of an elephant and who is the Master of Shiva's army. Protect us O Lord, You are none other than Lord Sai.

title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana
lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Shambho Nandana
Parama Sumangala Mooshika Vahana
Gaana Vilolana Gajanana
alt_lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Gajanana
Gangadhara Hara Shambho Nandana
Parama Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Gaana Vilolana Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one, You are the beloved son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi) and Lord Shiva, who adorns the Ganges on His head blissfully. You are the supremely auspicious Lord who rides the mouse (Mooshika) and who loves music.

title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana
lyrics:
Hey Dukha Bhanjana Gajanana [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
Shankara Putra Gajanana (Shiva) (2)
meaning: O the son of Gowri, elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, You are the Lord who removes all sadness, the giver of accomplishments and the son of the Lord Shankara (Shiva).

title: Gowri Nandana Gajanana (Hey)
lyrics:
Girija Nandana Niranjana [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
meaning: Oh Lord Ganesh, son of Mother Gowri, You are blemishless and Your countenance is most auspicious. O Lord, protect us.

title: Gowri Nandana Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Ganesha [ Gowri Nandana ... ]
Adi Poojita Vijaya Ganesha
Pashankusha Dhara Varada Ganesha
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Ganesha
meaning: Oh Lord Ganesha (lord of demigods), You are the beloved son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi) and is verily Sai, the resident of Parthi. Victory unto You who is always invoked first, the one who holds the noose and hook, bestower of boons and who is worshipped from age to age. Protect us, Oh Lord.

title: Gowri Nandana Vishwanatha Sutha
lyrics:
Skandagraja Sri Gananatha 
Mooshika Sevitha Vakratunda 
Lambodara Sri Vighna Nashaka 
Prashanthi Nilaya Dwara Palaka
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, son of Parvathi and Shiva and elder brother of Skanda (Karthikeya), You have a curved tusk and a large stomach and You are worshipped by the mouse (Mooshika). You are the gatekeeper at the entrance of Lord Sathya Sai's ashram, Prasanthi Nilayam.

title: Gowri Nathaya Vishwanathaya
lyrics:
Sai Nathaya Namah Shivaya
Gunatheethaya Gunadharaya [ Sai Nathaya ... ]
Kaala Kaalaya Kaalatheethaya
Kaala Roopaya Namah Shivaya
Prema Roopaya Parthi Vasaya [ Sai Nathaya ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Shivaya (4)
meaning: Obeisance to Lord Shiva, who is the consort of Gowri and the Lord of the universe. You are Sai Natha who embodies all attributes yet attributeless. You are the embodiment of time, beyond time and the Lord of time. You are the resident of Parthi whose form is Love.

title: Gowri Shankara Parvathi Shankara
lyrics:
Chandrakaladhara Haalaahala Dhara [ Gowri Shankara ... ]
Trinetra Dhari Ganga Jatadhara
Hara Hara Shankara Sai Shankara
meaning: O Lord Shankara, the Lord of Gowri (Parvathi), glory to Thee, the one who wears the crescent moon in His head, the one who drank the deadly haalaa-hala poison, the one having three eyes, the one having river Ganga in His head. O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Shiva.

title: Gowri Shankara Uma Vara
lyrics:
Girija Shankara Prabho Hara [ Gowri Shankara ... ]
Parvathi Shankara Uma Vara
Neelakanta Manohara
meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, you are the consort of Shakthi called by many names like Gowri, Uma, Girija and Parvathi. You are Loving and having a captivating form with a blue throat (due to consumption of poison to save the world).

title: Gowri Suthaya Om Namah Om
lyrics:
Lambodharaya Om Namah Om [ Gowri Suthaya ... ]
Vighneshwaraya Om Namah Om
Bhava Dukha Bhanjana Om Namah Om
meaning: We bow to Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Gowri, remover of obstacles and destroyer of sorrows.

title: Gowri Vara Gangadhara
lyrics:
Shambho Shiva Bimbadhara [ Gowri Vara ... ]
Vyagrambaradhara Jyothi Prakasha
Pavana Naama Harey Paramesha
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
meaning: Salutation to Shiva, the embodiment of Aum, who is the consort of Gowri. You are adorned with the Ganges on the head and the crescent moon, wearing the tiger skin as your attire. You are the supreme God of effulgence and the saviour of all.

title: Greater is He
title2: Greater is He than in the whole wide world
lyrics:
HE is greater than he
 
HE that is within me is greater than he that is in the world
HE that is within me is greater than he that is in the world
Greater is He than in the world
Greater is He than in the world
Greater is He than in the whole wide world
HE is greater than he
HE is greater than he

title: Guna Gambhira Partheeshwara
lyrics:
Prema Hrudaya Sanchara Sayeesha [ Guna Gambhira ... ]
Gaana Vilola Ananda Roopa 
Mangala Kara Hey Prashanti Nivasa [ Prema Hrudaya ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi, is the salient embodiment of all good qualities. Lord Sathya Sai resides in hearts filled with Love. He is the beloved of devotional singing. He is the personification of bliss. He is the giver of auspiciousness. He resides in Prasanthi Nilayam.

title: Guru Baba Guru Baba
lyrics:
Charana Namostuthey Guru Baba
Vidya Dayaka Guru Baba
(Pra)Shantha Swaroopa Guru Baba
Guruvara Guruvara Guru Baba
alt_lyrics:
Guru Baba Guru Baba
Charana Namostuthey Guru Baba
Vidya Dayaka Guru Baba
(Pra)Shantha Swaroopa Guru Baba
Guruvara Guruvara Guru Baba
Sai Baba Bala Baba
Sathya Baba Prema Baba
Guruvara Guruvara Guru Baba
meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge.

title: Guru Baba Guru Baba
lyrics:
Anata no Miashi ni Chikaimasu
Sai Baba Waga Kami yo
Sathya Baba Ai no Kami [ Anata no ... ]
Sunaona Kokoro de Inorimasu
Anata no Ai wo Tsutaetai
Watashi no Kokoro ni Ari Tamou
meaning: Divine Preceptor Baba, I devote myself to Your divine feet, O God of Love. I obediently pray to You from the bottom of my heart.

title: Guru Baba Guru Baba tienes
title2: Guru Baba, Guru Baba Tienes La Forma Del Amor,
lyrics:
Con Tu Vida Nos Ensenas Que Camino Es El Major.
Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Te Cantamos Con Devocion
Y Nosostros Aprendemos, A Vivir Siempre En El Amor.
La Misma Melodia:
Harey Rama, Harey Rama, Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna, Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
meaning: Our teacher Baba comes in the form of love. With your life, You teach us the best path. Sai Baba we sing to You with devotion and learn to live always in love.

title: Guru Baba, Guru Baba, Sathya
title2: Guru Baba, Guru Baba, Sathya Sai Haha no Ai
lyrics:
Anata no Ai heto Michibiki Tamae [ Guru Baba ... ]
Watashi wa Anata no Ai ni Ikiru
Sathya Sai ni Ikiru
meaning: Guru Baba, Mother Sai, please lead me to the place with Your love so that I may live with Your love.

title: Guru Bhagawan Ai no Kami
lyrics:
Anata no Miashi ni Inorimasu
Kokoro o Tsukushite Anata o Aisuru
Guru Bhagawan Ai no Kami 
Subete no Inochi wa Michibikare
Anata no Ai ni Furerutoki
Tada Kami no Mi ga Ikirumichi
Subete ga Ai ni
meaning: O Divine Preceptor, Lord of Love, we pray at Your beautiful feet, we devote our hearts to loving You. Please guide every moment of our lives. Touch us with Your love. The path to one's divinity is simply to love all.

title: Guru Bhagawan Sai
title2: Guru Bhagawan Sai, sweet Lord of Love
lyrics:
Dancing in our hearts, O Playful Sai
 Brightening our lives with Your Blissful Smile
 Awakening our minds with Your radiant Light
 Sweet Guru Sai, You are dearest of all
 Guru Sai Baba, Guru Sai Baba
 Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, Sai Baba
 Guru Sai Baba, take this heart and fill it with Your Love

title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Guru Bhagawan
lyrics:
