Prashanthi Vasa Sai Bhagawan [ Guru Bhagawan ... ]
Dharma Uddharaka Sai Bhagawan
Mama Guru Natha Sai Bhagawan (2)
meaning: Lord Sai living in Prasanthi Nilayam is our guru who upholds all religions.

title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru
title2: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru Natha Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Dayamaya Deena Dayala
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Prema Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Dharma Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Teen Loka Sri Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Lord Sai, the Supreme Guru, is extremely compassionate and merciful to the downtrodden. He is the personification of Truth, and the Lord of the three Worlds.

title: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru
title2: Guru Bhagawan Sai Ram Sadguru Natha Sri Bhagawan
lyrics:
Dayamaya Deena Dayalu
Chinmaya Roopa Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Nithya Lola Sri Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Worship and pay obeisance at the lotus feet of the most supreme, noble teacher, Lord Sai Baba. He is the embodiment of truth, love and peace. He grants spiritual knowledge.

title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru
title2: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
lyrics:
Guru Sai Guru Baba
Guru Sai Maheshwara [ Guru Brahma ... ]
Guru Padukaa Sai Charanam
Sai Charanam Maheshwara
meaning: Worship the Divine Preceptor Sai, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (sustainer) and Maheshwara (destroyer). Adore His lotus feet, which redeems all from miseries.

title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru
title2: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
lyrics:
Jaya Deva Priya Deva Sri Sathya Sayeeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Karunakara
Jai Jai Jai Akhileshwara
Jai Jai Jai Shirdeeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Partheeshwara
meaning: O Lord Sai, the Divine Preceptor who is the verily the Trinity - Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva, victory to Thee, the merciful one, the Lord of the Universe. Victory to the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo
title2: Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Devo Maheshwara
lyrics:
Guru Sakshath Parabrahma 
Tasmai Sri Guruvey Namah [ Guru Brahma ... ]
Dharma Kshetra Sthapaka 
Taraka Mantra Bodhaka 
Shantha (Prashantha) Swaroopa Nayaka 
Sharanam Sharanam Guru (Sai) Deva
meaning: Surrender to the Supreme Lord, Divine Preceptor Sai, who is Brahma (creator), Vishnu (preserver) and Shiva (destroyer) incarnate. He is the very embodiment of Peace who leads us into the path of righteousness and enlightenment.

title: Guru Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Mama Sharanam [ Guru Charanam ... ]
Nithya Nirmala Guru Charanam
Bhaktha Janashraya Guru Charanam
Bhakthi Mukthi Pradayaka Charanam
Bhaktha Sannuta Sathya Sai Charanam
meaning: Surrender and take refuge at the ever pure feet of Lord Sai, the Supreme Guru. His holy feet provide devotion, protection and liberation to all devotees.

title: Guru Charanam Vanditha Sharanam
lyrics:
Sai Charanam Vanditha Sharanam [ Guru Charanam ... ]
Bhakthi Pradatham Gnana Pradatham
Prema Pradatham Moksha Pradatham
Trilokeshwara Sai Veda Purusham
Namami Divyam Sai Charanam
meaning: Let us worship and surrender at the Lotus feet of our Guru Sai. Lord Sai grants us Devotion, Knowledge, Love and Liberation. O Lord Sai, You are the Lord of the Universe. Our prostrations at Thy lotus feet.

title: Guru Deva Anata wa
lyrics:
Tada Hitasura Machi Tsuzukeru [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sore wa Watashi no Chisana Makoto
Shiva no Kaoshita Itoshiki Haha yo
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are our Guru. We single-mindedly continue our journey towards You. This is our one truth. Dear Mother, You are the face of Lord Shiva.

title: Guru Deva Guru Deva
lyrics:
Guruvayur Pura Hari Deva
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva
meaning: Victory to the Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Narayana (Hari), the Lord of Guruvayur (a place in Kerala). We surrender to You, O Lord Sai.

title: Guru Deva Guru Govinda
lyrics:
Mandara Giridhara Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Shiva [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana (2)
alt_lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Govinda
Mandara Giridhara Shirdi Maheshwara
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Krupala [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. Glory to Lord Vishnu, the benevolent teacher whose beautiful form enchanted Vaidehi (Goddess Lakshmi).

title: Guru Deva Jaya Deva
lyrics:
Charanam Sharanam Sai Deva Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Gnana Pradayaka Sadguru Deva [ Charanam ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Guru Deva Jaya Deva
Charanam Sharanam Sai Deva (Sadguru) Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Devadi Deva
Gnana Pradayaka Jagat Guru (Sathya Sai) Deva [ Charanam ... ]
meaning: Victory to our Divine Preceptor and God of Gods, Lord Sai. We surrender to Thee, O Lord, who is the embodiment of Om, the Lord of the Universe and the bestower of wisdom.

title: Guru Deva Priya Deva Sai
title2: Guru Deva Priya Deva Sai Deva Dayamaya
lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Shashankha Shekara
Sai Shankara Daya Karo (2) [ Guru Deva ... ]
Gokula Nandana Sai Gopala
Raghukula Bhooshana Sai Rama
Hey Madanaantaka Daya Karo (2)
meaning: Lord Sai is the merciful and enchanting Guru who is verily Lord Shiva, adorned with Vibhuti and crescent moon on the head. O Sai, You are Shankara, who is merciful, You are Gopala who delights people of Gokula, You are Rama the jewel of Raghu dynasty.

title: Guru Deva Sai Guru Namah
lyrics:
Sadguru Brahma Sanatana
Janardhana Jagat Palana
Deena Nath Parama Niranjana
Guru Deva Sai Guru Namah
alt_lyrics:
Guru Deva Sai Guru Namah (3)
Sadguru Brahma Sanatana
Jagat Karana Paripoorana
Deena Nath Parama Niranjana
Guru Deva Sai Guru Namah
meaning: I bow to the supreme Guru Sai, the Guru of Gurus, the most real one; He is the caretaker of the universe; He is the lord of the helpless. I bow to that supreme Guru Sai.

title: Guru Deva Sharanam Deva
lyrics:
Paahi Prabho Sharanam Deva [ Guru Deva ... ]
Sundara Roopa Sri Sai Deva
Sharanam Sharanam Sadguru Deva
meaning: We surrender to our Guru and God, Lord Sai. Protect us O Lord, Your form is beauty itself. We surrender to You, our true guru.

title: Guru Devaya Guru Devaya Guru
title2: Guru Devaya Guru Devaya Guru Devaya
lyrics:
Mama Guru Deva Sai Deva 
Sada Sakha Tum Sai Guru Deva 
Sathya Prakasha Sai Guru Deva 
Door Na Jaana Paas Hi Rehna Sai Guru Deva
meaning: Praise be to the Guru who is the Supreme Lord. Lord Sai is my own Guru. O Lord, always be my constant companion. You are the light of eternal Truth. Please never go away from me, and always be by my side.

title: Guru Devaya Namo Namo
lyrics:
Hey Parameshwara Namo Namo [ Guru Devaya ... ]
Omkaraya Namo Namo
Parthi Pureeshwara Namo Namo
Jagadeeshwaraya Namo Namo
Prashanthi Eshwara Namo Namo
meaning: Salutations to the Supreme Noble Teacher, Lord Sai, the Supreme Lord, the Lord whose form is Om, the Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam at Puttaparthi and the Lord of the Universe.

title: Guru Guru Deva
title2: Guru Guru Deva, Guru Guru Deva,
lyrics:
Guru Guru Deva, Guru Guru Deva
 Teacher of all Gods and man
 Master of the ancient Dharma
 Paving the way for one and all, to the Godward path
 Kali Yuga Avathaar, Sathya Sai Baba
 Kali Yuga Avathaar, Guru Deva
 We Clap our hands in ecstacy
 Singing in Joy and harmony
 In presence of our Lord, Sathya Sai Baba

title: Guru Hamarey Man Mandir Mey
title2: Guru Hamarey Man Mandir Mey Guru Hamarey Pran
lyrics:
Sathya Prem Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Gnana Bhakthi Ke Tum Ho Daata Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jai Jai Sai Nath Bhagawan
Jaya Guru Deva Sri Guru Deva Sai Nath Bhagawan [ Jai Jai Sai Nath ]
meaning: Salutations to my Guru who is the remover of ignorance who stays in my heart, who is the giver of truth and love. Victory to Lord Sai who gives peace and devotion. Victory to you Oh Guru Deva who is none other than our Sainath.

title: Guru Hara Guru Hari Guru
title2: Guru Hara Guru Hari Guru Brahma
lyrics:
Guravey Sakshath Parabrahma
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Guru
Jagadidam Akhilam Tava Roopam
Jaya (4) Hara (4) Shiva (4) Jagat Guru
Jagat Guru Hey (Sathya) Sai Guru
meaning: Glory to the Divine Preceptor Sathya Sai who removes ignorance and is Lord Shiva (Hara), Lord Vishnu (Hari) and Lord Brahma. He is verily the Parabrahma, the Supreme Lord who is formless. Victory to the Guru of whole world whose beauty is supreme and who is auspicious.

title: Guru Maharaj Guru Sathya Sai
title2: Guru Maharaj Guru Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru (3)
meaning: Chant the name of Sathya Sainath, who is our great guru (preceptor), who blesses all.

title: Guru Mahima Gao
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Anantha Guru
Brahmananda Ananda Guru
Sarva Dharma Sathya Sai Guru
Sai Guru Sathya Sai Guru [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
Guru Ke Vani Gao
meaning: Sing about the greatness of the eternal, universal and ever-blissful teacher, Sathya Sai who loves all the religions. He is the truth, knowledge and bliss.

title: Guru Mahima Guru Mahima
title2: Guru Mahima Guru Mahima Apaara Mahima Guru Mahima
lyrics:
Kim Vachaniyam Guru Mahima Kima Vachaniyam Guru Mahima [ Guru Mahima ... ]
Satchidanadam Guru Mahima Patitha Pavanam Guru Mahima [ Guru Mahima ... ]

title: Guru Nanak Ji Ki Jai
title2: Guru Nanak Ji Ki Jai Jai Kaar
lyrics:
Jo Boley So Hoyey Nihaal
Allah (Maulah) Sai Lelo Salaam
Salaam Salaam Lakhon (Mera) Salaam
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Naam [ Salaam Salaam ... ]
meaning: Glory to Guru Nanak; whoever sings thus, that person becomes liberated. Accept my salutations, O Lord Sai, You are Allah; Accept these ten million salutations of mine; O Sai, You are Father Jesus, our Lord and You are Buddha, Zohrashtra and Mahavira.

title: Guru no Miashi ni Sasagemasu
lyrics:
Subete wo Anata ni Sasagemasu
Sathya Sai Kono Inori wo
Prema Sai Kanae Tamae
Nan Do mo Inorimasu
Itsudemo Inorimasu
Aisuru Guru Baba Sai Ram
Buddha, Iesu, Sri Sai Ram [ Nan Do mo ... ]
Subete wo Sasagemasu
meaning: We devote ourselves and sacrifice everything at Your lotus feet my Lord. O Lord Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, please grant our prayers. No matter what, we always pray to our Loving Guru who is Baba, Buddha, Jesus, and Sri Sai Rama. We offer everything to You.

title: Guru no Miashi wo Agamemasho
lyrics:
Eichi no Hikari ni Terasarete
Toutoki Guru Sai Baba
Ooi Naru Kami, Ooi Naru Kami, Ooi Naru Kami, Sai Baba
Kagiri Naki Ai no, Kagiri Naki Ai no, Kagiri Naki Ai no, Sai Baba
Michibiki Tamae, Michibiki Tamae, Michibiki Tamae, Sai Baba
meaning: Let us worship the lotus feet of our Guru (Preceptor). Please illuminate our minds. Sai Baba, You are our Precious Guru. You are awe-inspiring. Your love is without limits. Please guide us.

title: Guru Pada Ranjana Rama Jaya
title2: Guru Pada Ranjana Rama Jaya Jaya
lyrics:
Bandha Vimochana Rajeeva Lochana
Abhaya Karambhuja Rama Jaya Jaya
Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram (4)
meaning: Victory to pleasing Noble Teacher - Lotus-Eyed Lord Rama, who unties the knots and tangles of life - thereby leading to liberation. Victory to charming Supreme Guide - Lord Rama, worship of whose Lotus Feet removes fear. Victory to Lord of Sita - Lord Rama and Lord Sai Ram.

title: Guru Pada Vandana Guru Vandana
lyrics:
Guru Natha Sai Natha Jaga Vandana [ Guru Pada ... ]
Shiva Rama Krishna Roopa Jagannatha Sai Deva
Shirdi Prashanthi Vasi Sukha Shanthi Daata
meaning: Worship and bow to the lotus feet of Guru Sainath whom the people from all over the world worship. He is Shiva, Rama, Krishna and the Lord of the world. He is the resident of Shirdi and Parthi who bestows happiness and peace.

title: Guru Sai Hikari no Naka
title2: Guru Sai Hikari no Naka ni, Tamashii no Naka ni Ai wo Toku
lyrics:
Guru Sai Mina no Kagayaki Kono Oozora ni Hanatsu
Watashi wa Dare Nanoka? Minamoto e Michibiku Sai
Watashi wa Watashi Desu, Atma Paramatma ni Kiyuu Suru
Sai Ram Tonaeyou Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Guru Sai, You show us the loving light within our soul. Guru Sai, Your beautiful name radiates across the vast sky. "Who am I"? Sai, You lead me to the source. "I am I". Atma merges with the Paramatma. Chant the name Sai Ram.

title: Guru Sai Maheshwara
lyrics:
Karunakara Karunamaya
Prashanthi Sai Sundara
Parabrahma Roopa Parathpara
Trivikrama Narayana
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
meaning: Worship Lord Sai, the Divine Preceptor who is the embodiment of kindness and mercy, having a delightful form and who is the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam in Puttaparthi. He is the embodiment of the Supreme Lord and is verily Lord Narayana, treading the three worlds (in the Vamana avatar). He is the Creator (Brahma), Sustainer (Vishnu) and the Destroyer (Shiva) of the Universe.

title: Gurudev Gurudev
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Natha Sadguru Dev
Sharanam Sharanam Guru Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Brahma Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
meaning: We chant and worship the divine preceptor Sathya Sai, who is Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara. We bow to Thy lotus feet and our obeisance to Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of primordial sound.

title: Gurudev Gurudev Sathya Sai Gurudev
title2: Gurudev Gurudev Sathya Sai Gurudev Gurudev Jai
lyrics:
Gurudev Gurudev Bhagawan, You are the light in everyone
Take my Hands and take my Love, lead me and guide me from above
Twirl me around in Your dance of light, destroy the darkness of the night
Gurudev Gurudev Jai Gurudev Gurudev Jai
Gurudev Gurudev Bhagawan, You are the light in everyone

title: Guruvara Guruvara Sai Namo
lyrics:
Sadguru Satchidananda Namo [ Guruvara ... ]
Veda Gamanutha Sai Namo
Naada Priya Shiva Baba Namo
meaning: Salutations to Sai, our guru (preceptor) who grants us boons. He is the embodiment of existence, awareness and bliss, the essence of Vedas, lover of divine music and the primordial sound Om.

title: Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
lyrics:
Sadguru Naam Guru Nanak Naam
Guruvara Naam Pavana Naam
Sadguru Sai Baba Naam
Jai Guru Sadguru Nanak Naam Jai Bolo Sai Baba Naam
meaning: Sing the names of the Guru - Guru Nanak and Sai Baba; these names purify one's heart.

title: Guruvayurappa Sri Hari Guruvayurappa
lyrics:
Kunchita Pada Kuvalaya Nayana Guruvayurappa
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Guruvayurappa
Rama Krishna Govinda Hari Guruvayurappa
Achyutha Keshava Hari Narayana Guruvayurappa
Madhava Mohana Murali Manohara Guruvayurappa
Pankaja Netra Parama Pavitra Guruvayurappa
Parthi Pureesha Parama Dayala Guruvayurappa
meaning: Sing the names of the Lord of Guruvayur (Krishna): Govinda, Achyutha, Keshava, Madhava. Chant the name of Lord Rama and Hari. He is the one with lotus shaped eyes and dainty feet who enchants us with His flute. He is verily the supremely sacred and most compassionate Lord Sai of Puttaparthi.

title: Guruvayurpura Sri Hari Krishna Narayana
title2: Guruvayurpura Sri Hari Krishna Narayana Gopal
lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Muralidhari Narayana Gopal
Narayana Gopal Sai Narayana Gopal (2)
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Narayana Gopal [ Mukunda Madhava ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Guruvayur, Lord Hari, Krishna, Narayana, Gopal, Madhava, Muralidhara, Mukunda and Sai Narayana. Chant the name of Krishna who lifted the Govardhana mountain.

title: Haha Naru Anata wo Sagasu
title2: Haha Naru Anata wo Sagasu tame ni Umareta
lyrics:
Haha Naru Anata ni Au tame ni Umareta
Haha Naru Anata wo Motomeru tame ni Umareta
Haha Naru Anata wo Aisuru tame ni Umareta
Anata no Sono Mune ni Kono Mi ga Idakareru made
meaning: Mother Sai, I was born for the purpose of looking for You; I was born for the purpose of meeting You; I was born for the purpose of searching for You; I was born for the purpose of loving You. My life isn't complete until I embrace You, Mother Sai.

title: Haha noyou ni Ai wo
title2: Haha noyou ni Ai wo Hagukumi, Chichi noyou ni Ai de Michibiku
lyrics:
Uta noyou ni Kokoro wo Mitashi,  Tsuki noyou ni Shinji wo Terasu
Anata no Ai ga Watshi ni Yadoru
Subete no Mono ga Hikari wa Kimeru
Sai Ram Sai Ram Ai no Kami
Sai Ram Sai Ram O Swami
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love nurtures us like a mother. Your love guides us like a father. Your love gratifies our hearts like a beautiful song. You illuminate our minds like the moon's light. Your love dwells within me. Your light settles upon all things. Sai Ram, O Swami, You are the God of Love.

title: Hajime ni Agameyo Ganesha Agameyo
lyrics: Sai no Renge no Miashi wo Agameyo (4)
meaning: Start by worshipping Lord Ganesha. Then, revere the lotus feet of Lord Sai.

title: Hallelujah
lyrics:
I am here to dry your tears.
The pure in heart know My Name.
Age to age I return bringing love to all who yearn
For the day when all nations stand and sing in one voice.
[ Hallelujah ... ]

title: Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah, Hallelujah
lyrics:
Hallelujah Sai Baba, Hallelujah Sai Baba
 Hallelujah Sai Has Come, Hallelujah Sai Has Come
 Hallelujah Sai Has Come, Hallelujah Sai Is Here
 Sai Baba, How We Love You,
 Sai Baba How We Love You

title: Hamsa Vahini Devi Narayani
lyrics:
Jaya Jaganmohini Tribhuvana Palini [ Hamsa Vahini ... ]
Jaya Mrudu Bhaashini Mata Bhavani
Bhava Bhaya Harini (Tribhuvana Palini) Sai Janani
meaning: Oh Goddess Lakshmi (Narayani) who has the swan as vehicle, You are the sustainer of all the three worlds, who has a captivating form. Victory unto You, Oh Mata Bhavani, who speaks softly. You are none other than our mother Sai who redeems us from fear and worldly troubles.

title: Happy Birthday, My Baba
title2: May the morning shine bright on Your birthday, may the sky be a heavenly blue,
lyrics:
May Your smile be the smile that I wore on the day I fell in love with You,
Each day is a joyous new birthday, each day is another new start,
For each day when I rise and open my eyes, I light the candle of love in my heart.
And today as I work in my garden, won’t You walk by my side as I go,
‘Til the daylight is gone and my work is all done, and together we tend the last row.

I remember the day I first met You, and that day saw my purpose fulfilled,
When love had begun and two became one, I surrender to Your will.
May the moonlight fall soft on Your pillow tonight, may Your dreams be of peace and love,
‘Til the morning dawns bright at the end of the night, may You dance through the heavens above.

So, happy birthday, my/Sai Baba, may this day see Your purpose fulfilled,
May love’s new rebirth bring peace on the earth and surrender to Your will.
May the moonlight fall soft on Your pillow tonight, may Your dreams be of peace and love,
‘Til the morning dawns bright at the end of the night, may You dance through the heavens above.

title: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey
title2: Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey, Shambho Shankara Pashupathey
lyrics:
Kailasa Vasa Chidambaresha, Neelakanta Sadashiva
Bham Bham Hara Hara Bhola Maheshwara, Parvathi Ramana Sadhashiva
alt_lyrics:
Hara Bhola Natha Uma Pathey, Shambho Shankara Pashupathey
Nandi Vahana Naga Bhooshana, Chandrashekara Jatadhara
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara, Girija Kantha Sadashiva
meaning: Let us chant the divine names of Shiva or Shambho who is the consort of Uma, the blue-throated Lord who resides in mount Kailasa and Chidambaram, whose drum resounds Bham Bham, who is the consort of Parvathi.

title: Hara Gangey Jaya Ho Hara
title2: Hara Gangey Jaya Ho Hara Gangey Jaya Ho
lyrics:
Hara Jata Jootadhara Kalakoota Hara Gangey Jaya Ho
Jagadambe Jaya Ho Jagadambe Jaya Ho
Hara Gangey Jaya Ho Hara Gangey Jaya Ho
Hara Sathya Roopa Hara Sai Roopa Hara Gangey Jaya Ho
meaning: Praise be to Mother Ganga, the Holy river. Lord Shiva bears Mother Ganga in the locks of His hair. Mother Ganga transcends human perception of time and space. She is the form of truth, now incarnated as our beloved Mother Sai.

title: Hara Gowri Nath Shiva Shankara
lyrics:
Bhola Harey Shambo Bhola Harey
Hara Gowri Nath Shiva Shankara
Shambho Shiva Shambho Deva
Kailasa Vasa Mahadeva
Bhola Harey Shambho Bhola Harey
meaning: Chant and celebrate the many names of Lord Shiva. He is the consort of Gowri and the auspicious one. He is the Supreme Being who resides in Mount Kailasa and remains an abode of joy for all who seek him.

title: Hara Hara Gangey Hara Hara
title2: Hara Hara Gangey Hara Hara Gangey
lyrics:
Hey Nataraja Hey Shiva Raja Hara Hara Hara Hara Gangey [ Hara Hara ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Gangadhara
Hara (4) Gangey [ Hara Hara ... ]
Shankara Shiva Shankara Shiva Shankara Shankara Sai (2)
meaning: Let us chant the glorious name of Shiva who adorns the Ganges in His matted hair. Oh Shankara, You are the master of the divine dance and none other than Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi, who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Brahma Vishnu Surarchitaya Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya
Uma Ganesha Sharavana Sevitha Om Namo Namo Namah Shivaya [ Om Namo ... ]
meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Lords, Lord Shiva. Chant the auspicious name of "Shiva" who is worshipped by the other two Gods, Brahma and Vishnu. O Lord, You are served by Your consort, the Divine Mother Uma and by Your sons, Ganesha and Sharavana (Subrahmanya).

title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Namami
title2: Hara Hara Hara Hara Namami Shankara Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
meaning: Sing (chant) the name of Lord Shiva and the name of Sai Ram.

title: Hara Hara Hara Hara Samba
title2: Hara Hara Hara Hara Samba Shiva
lyrics:
Vibhuti Sundara Sai Shiva
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Shiva
Parthi Puri Paramesha Shiva [ Vibhuti Sundara ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Shiva the three-eyed destroyer of evil. He bears the Ganges and the trident; chant the name of Sai Shiva of Parthi Who is adorned with holy ash.

title: Hara Hara Hara Shambho Shambho
lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3) [ Hara Hara ... ]
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shiva
Paapa Vinashaka Parama Shiva
Maya Manusha Vesha Shiva
Parthipuri Paramesha Shiva [ Hara Hara ... ]
Pannaga Bhooshana Phaala Lochana
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Bhaktha Janavana Patitha Pavana
Kailasa Vasa Sai Shankara
Shambho Shambho Shambho Shambho
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the resident of Kailasa who holds the Holy Ganges in His matted locks, the consort of Mother Parvathi, the Supreme Lord who destroys our sins, who disguises in human form, who is adorned with the cobra, who has the third eye in His forehead, who has the divine bull Nandi as His vehicle, who protects His devotees and who is the saviour of the downtrodden. He is verily Lord Sai who resides at Parthi.

title: Hara Hara Mahadeva Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Namo Namami Shirdeeshwara [ Hara Hara ... ]
Vishweshwara Vishwambara
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (2)
meaning: Worship and chant the names of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) who bears the Holy Ganges, of Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Hara Hara Shambho
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Loka Pathey
Paripalaya Maam Parthi Pureeshwara
Sai Shiva Kailasa Pathey
meaning: Salutations to Lord Shiva, the ocean of compassion and the Lord of the world. O Sai, Lord of Parthi, please protect me. You are verily Lord Shiva, the Lord of Kailasa.

title: Hara Hara Shankara Namami Shankara
lyrics:
Uma Pathey Kailasa Shankara
Gangadhara Hara Chandrakaladhara
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Shankara
meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (Shiva) the consort of Uma, whose abode is Mount Kailasa. Lord Shiva has Mother Ganges and the crescent moon over His Head. He is the same Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Hara Hara Shankara Samba Sadashiva
title2: Hara Hara Shankara Samba Sadashiva Esha Mahesha
lyrics:
Tandava Priyakara Chandrakala Dhara Esha Mahesha
Amba Guha Lambodhara Vanditha Esha Mahesha
Vindhya Himachala Shringa Nivasita Esha Mahesha
meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Shiva - Shankara, Sadashiva and Mahesha. O Lord, You are fond of the Tandava Dance (cosmic dance). You are adorned with the moon on Your forehead. You are worshipped by the darling son of Mother Parvathi - Lord Ganesh, the pot-bellied one. You are the resident of the Himalayas. By chanting the above divine names, the Lord destroys evil and grants protection.

title: Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva
title2: Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara Bham Bham Bholey Nath
lyrics:
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Dama Dama Damaru Damaru Ka Natha Bham Bham Bholey Nath
Bham Bham Bholey Nath Sai Bham Bham Bholey Nath (2)
meaning: Chant the divine name of Shiva, who redeems us from all troubles, the Lord who is easy to please, whose damaru (drum) creates sounds like 'Bham Bham' and 'Dama Dama' during the cosmic dance.

title: Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Ambalavana
lyrics:
Ambalavana Ponnambalavana
Ananda Tandava Nataraja
Nataraja Nataraja
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivaraja Shivaraja
Shivakami Priya Shivaraja
Chidambaresha Nataraja
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the beloved of Parvathi and the Lord of dance. He is the one who delights in the beautiful cosmic dance. He resides in the temple of the heart and in Chidambaram (a temple in southern India).

title: Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath
title2: Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Phani Bhooshana Shiva Gowri Nath
Parama Sumangala Sai Nath
Girija Ramana Paramananda Samadhipriya Ganga Nath
alt_lyrics:
Hara Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Shirdi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Shiva Shiva Shankara Bholey Nath Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Nath
Ahi Bhooshana Shiva Gowri Nath
Parama Sumangala Sai Nath
Girija Ramana Paramananda Samadhipriya Ganga Nath
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi. The Lord of Gowri is adorned with a cobra, is always blissful and is the delight of Girija (Parvathi). He bears the river Ganges, bestows auspiciousness and rejoices in the bliss of meditation.

title: Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara
title2: Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo
lyrics:
Bhava Bhayankara Girija Shankara Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Thaka Narthana Kelo
Hara Shiva Shankara Shashankha Shekara Hara Bham Hara Bham Bham Bham Bolo [ Bhava Bhayankara ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, dancing to the rhythm of drums. Shankara, Lord of Girija, destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death.

title: Hara Trishoola Dhari Hey Tripurari
title2: Hara Trishoola Dhari Hey Tripurari Gangadhari Namah Shivaya (2)
lyrics:
Dama Dama Dama Dama Dam Dam Damaru Baajey 
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Ghanta Baajey 
Hara Trishoola Dhari Hey Tripurari Sai Murari Namah Shivaya
meaning: Praise be to Lord Shiva, who holds the trident, destroys all evil, rules over the three worlds and who holds the holy river Ganges in His matted locks. His drum resounds as the Temple bells ring in His glory. Salutations to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Hare Rama I am Om
title2: Hare Rama Ia Om - Hare Rama Ia Om - Sai Rama Ia Om
lyrics:
I am Love and Love is me - That is what I choose to be
 I am Truth and Truth is me - That is what I choose to be
 I am God and God is me - That is what I choose to be

title: Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna
title2: Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna and Lord Rama.

title: Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna
title2: Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Hari (Narayana), Lord Krishna, Lord Rama incessantly. Glory be to them.

title: Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai
title2: Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Gopal Govinda (Madhava Mukunda) Bolo Jai Sai Ram
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Daya Karo Hey Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram Bolo [ Jai Jai Ram ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Krishna, Rama, Gopala, Govinda, Madhava and Mukunda (names of Lord Krishna). Bless us O Sai, the Lord of Parthi. You are the Supreme Lord. Victory to Thee, O Sai Rama.

title: Harey Krishna Harey Rama
lyrics:
Sai Krishna Sai Rama
Harey Harey Sai Krishna
Harey Harey Sai Rama
Jai Guru Krishna Jai Guru Rama
Harey Krishna Harey Rama
meaning: Chant the name and sing the glory of Lord Krishna, Rama and Sai. Victory to the divine Preceptor Sai who is verily Lord Krishna and Rama.

title: Harey Krishna Harey Rama Harey Harey
title2: Harey Krishna Harey Rama Harey Harey Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Harey Harey Harey
Krishna Rama Rama Krishna Harey Harey (Jai)
Govinda Krishna Gopala Krishna (2)
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Harey Harey (Jai)
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama and Lord Krishna. Victory to Lord Rama and Radha's Lord, Krishna who is known by many names such as Govinda and Gopala.

title: Harey Krishna Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Guna Ranjana
Harey Krishna Yadu Nandana

title: Harey Krishna Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Sai Krishna [ Harey Krishna ... ]
Bhajo Krishna Sunaada Murali
Bhajo Murali Madhura Murali
Mana Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Yadu Nandana Krishna Gopi Chandana Krishna
meaning: Praise be to Thee, O Lord Krishna, also known as Mukunda and Murari. Glory be to the enchanting one, the slayer of demon Madhu. Glory to the one of Yadava lineage and the darling of Gopis who plays sweet divine music on the flute.

title: Harey Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
lyrics:
Sundara Krishna Mana Mohana Krishna
Dheera Krishna Damodara Krishna
Krishna Krishna Krupa Karo Krishna
meaning: Oh Mind! Worship and chant the name of the Lord Hari, Sai Ram, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala.

title: Harey Murali Manohara Shyama
lyrics:
Harey Gopi Manohara Shyama [ Harey Murali ... ]
Harey Devaki Nandana Shyama
Nandana Shyama Nandana Shyama [ Harey Devaki ... ]
Harey Vasuki Shayana Shyama
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who has an enchanting form with the flute in His hands, who is dear to the Gopis, who is the son of Devaki and the one who reclines on the serpent Vasuki.

title: Harey Murarey Madhukaitabhaarey
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Mukunda Shourie
Anantha Sridhara Govinda Keshava
Mukunda Madhava Narayana [ Harey Murarey ... ]
Devaki Tanaya Gopika Ramana
Bhaktha Uddharana Trivikrama
alt_lyrics:
Harey Murarey Madhukaitabhaarey
Govinda Gopala Mukunda Shourie
Achyutha Anantha Govinda Keshava
Mukunda Madhava Narayana [ Harey Murarey ... ]
Devaki Tanaya Gopika Ramana
Bhaktha Uddharana Trivikrama
meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord Krishna by chanting His names - Govinda, Gopala, Sridhara, Keshava, Mukunda, Madhava. Glory to the son of Devaki, the one who is dear to the Gopikas and the one who annihilated the demons Madhu and Kaitabha.

title: Harey Murarey Sai Ram Harey
title2: Harey Murarey Sai Ram Harey Murarey Ram
lyrics:
Parama Sumangala Sai Ram Parama Sumangala Ram
Eshwar Allah Terey Naam Sab Tum Ho Bhagawan [ Parama Sumangala ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Lord Sai Ram, the one who is supremely auspicious who is glorified by many names - Rama, Allah and Eshwara (Shiva).

title: Harey Murarey Shyam Bhaja Mana
title2: Harey Murarey Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Shyam Mukunda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda [ Harey Murarey ... ]
Sai Govinda Harey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Bhaja Mana Radhey Govinda
meaning: Oh Mind Sing in praise of Radhey Govinda of blue complexion whose other names are Murarey, Mukunda and also Sai.

title: Harey Murari Ranga Narayana Om
lyrics:
Peetambara Dhara Narayana Om
Mayura Mukutadhara Narayana Om [ Harey Murari ... ]
Lakshmi Kantha Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
meaning: Glory to Lord Lord Narayana, the one who is dressed in yellow attire, with the peacock feather on His head, the one who is dear to Mother Lakshmi, who is also known as Ranga of Pandharpur.

title: Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey
title2: Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Rama Krishna Harey Ram
lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Sri Sai Ram [ Harey Ram ... ]
Govinda Gopala Radha Ke Shyam
Giridhara Gopala Meera Ke Shyam
Bolo Ram Bolo Shyam Bolo Sai Ghana Shyam
meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord, Rama, Krishna, Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, the blue complexioned Gopala who is dear to Radha and Meera.

title: Harey Ram Harey Ram Krishna
title2: Harey Ram Harey Ram Krishna Krishna Ram
lyrics:
Radha Krishna Rama Krishna Sai Ghana Shyam
Giridhara Gopala Sai Ghana Shyam
Krishna Rama Govinda Sai Ghana Shyam
Sundara Roopa Sai Ghana Shyam [ Radha Krishna ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana, the charming Prince of Vasudeva, the Lord of Radha. Madhava, who is infinite bliss.

title: Harey Ram Japo Hari Naam
lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Japo Hari Naam [ Harey Ram Japo ... ]
Sita Ram Japo Hari Naam
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam
Sita Ram Japo Hari Naam
Merey Ram Merey Ram
Sai Ram Japo Sai Naam
meaning: Chant the names of Radha and Krishna, Sita and Rama. Krishna's complexion is that of dark rainclouds. O Sai, You are our Lord. We chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai incessantly.

title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
title2: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Satsangathwey Nithsangathwam Nithsangathwey Nirmohathwam
Nirmohatwey Nischala Thatwam Nischala Thatwey Jeevan Mukthi
alt_lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
meaning: Chant incessantly the holy names of Lord Hari, Lord Rama and Lord Krishna. Good company leads to blissful solitude, which further leads to freedom from infatuation, mental equanimity and finally to liberation even as one is alive. This is how an aspirant progresses by chanting the Lord's name with sincere devotion.

title: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama
title2: Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Harey Rama Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey Harey
Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Paahi Maam
Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Raksha Maam
meaning: Chant the names of Lord: Rama, Krishna, Madhava, Raghava. The Lord's name destroys the miseries of life and grants protection.

title: Harey Rama Rama Rama Harey
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Harey
Kami wo Tataete Utaou
Sai Rama Rama Sai Harey
Sai Ram Ram Ram, Sai Ram Ram Ram, Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
Kokoro ni Hibiku Kami no Mina
Kokoro ni Hibiku Sai Ram
meaning: Let us sing praise to Sai Rama and Krishna, for the divine name resounds within our hearts.

title: Harey Sai Gopala Radhey Krishna
lyrics:
Harey Sai Govinda Panduranga [ Harey Sai Gopala ... ]
Hey Prabhu Vandana Hey Yadu Nandana
Hey Nanda Nandana Dayamaya
Kunja Vihari Krishna Murari
Parthi Vihari Namo Namo
meaning: Salutations to You, O Lord Sai who dwells at Parthi, who is verily Gopala, Govinda, Panduranga. You are the compassionate one who had earlier incarnated as Krishna in the Yadu lineage and moved about in Brindavan as the son of Nanda.

title: Harey Sai Harey Sai Sai
title2: Harey Sai Harey Sai Sai Sai Harey Harey
lyrics:
Harey Baba Harey Baba Bala Baba Harey Harey [ Harey Sai ... ]
Achyutham Keshavam Rama Narayanam
Krishna Damodaram Vasudevam Bhajey
Sridharam Madhavam Gopika Vallabham
Sadguru Nayakam Sai Ramam Bhajey
meaning: Chant various names of the Lord Krishna - Achyutha, Keshava, Rama, Narayana, Damodara, Vasudeva, Sridhara and Madhava. Glory to the Lord of the Gopis who has incarnated as our sacred preceptor, Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Hari Anandamaya Jaya Narayana ( Sai )
lyrics:
Vasudeva Nandana Radha Jeevana
Paramananda Madhava
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana (3)
meaning: Praise be to Lord Narayana who is Supreme Bliss personified, who incarnated as Lord Krishna, the son of Vasudeva and who is the very life of Radha.

title: Hari Bhajana Bina Sukh Shanthi
title2: Hari Bhajana Bina Sukh Shanthi Nahin
lyrics:
Hari Naam Bina Ananda Nahin
Prema Bhakthi Bina Uddhar Nahin
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin [ Hari Bhajan ... ]
Japa Dhyana Bina Sam Yoga Nahin
Prabhu Darsha Bina Pragyana Nahin
Daya Dharma Bina Sath Karma Nahin
Bhagawan Bina Koi Apna Nahin
Hari Naam Bina Paramatma Nahin
meaning: O Mind, understand that there is no peace without chanting the glory of the Lord Hari, which itself is Bliss. There is no progress without loving devotion to the Lord and no liberation without service to the feet of the Guru. There is no equanimity of mind without remembering the Lord's name and meditation. There is no integrated awareness without the Lord's vision. No deed or action can be deemed good if performed bereft of righteousness and compassion. Only the Lord is one's own, and no one else. There is no realization of the Supreme Consciousness without chanting the Lord's name.
songtags: golden voice, multi-lingual, lead-music, sheet-music, tutorial

title: Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari
title2: Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Govinda Bol
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
meaning: Contemplate on the name and meditate on the Lotus Feet of Lord Hari. Worship the divine Flutist, Lord Madhava (Krishna). Sing the glory of Lord Keshava.

title: Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
lyrics:
Hari Bolo Harey Krishna Naam
Hari Bolo Sathya Sai Ram
Hari Bolo Harey Rama Naam
meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sathya Sai.

title: Hari Govinda Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Hari Gopala Gopala Narayana [ Hari Govinda ... ]
Satchidananda Ananda Narayana
Paramananda Ananda Narayana
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana (5)
meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Narayana - Govinda, Gopala and Hari. Lord Narayana is the personification of Truth, Awareness and Supreme Bliss. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Hari Govinda Madhava Krishna
lyrics:
Hey Panduranga Krishna
Harey Panduranga Harey Panduranga [ Hari Govinda ... ]
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana Krishna
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana Krishna [ Harey Panduranga ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, the incarnation of Lord Krishna who is glorified as Hari, Govinda, Madhava, Panduranga, and Narayana.

title: Hari Govinda Nanda Mukunda
lyrics:
Keshava Narayana
Madhava Narayana
Sridhara Narayana
Sri Hari Narayana
Parthi Narayana Hari Narayana
Govinda Narayana Paramananda Narayana
meaning: Chant the different names of Lord Narayana, Hari, Govinda, Madhava, Sridhara. Glory to the one who is supreme Bliss, the one who dwells in Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Hari Guna Gaana Karo Mana
title2: Hari Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
lyrics:
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Sai Guna Gaana Karo Mana Mero (2)
meaning: Oh Mind! Sing blissfully the divine attributes of Hari, Rama, Krishna and Sairam.

title: Hari Guna Gao Hari Naama
title2: Hari Guna Gao Hari Naama Gao
lyrics:
Nanda Ananda Hari Naama Re [ Hari Guna ... ]
Japana Manana Karo Hari Naama Re 
Shravana Smarana Karo Hari Naama Re
Sai Om Sai Om Bhajo Mana Re
meaning: Sing the glorious name of the Lord Hari. He grants bliss to all. Chant, contemplate, hear, and meditate on His name. O Mind, chant the name of Lord Sai.

title: Hari Guru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Sada Shiva Shankara
Amrutha Amrutha Daan Karey
Aap Haalaahala Ban Karey
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Taarana He
Jagadodhara Jaya Abhayankara [ Sri Sathya ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai, our guru, is the Hindu trinity of the creator (Brahma), protector (Vishnu) and destroyer (Shiva), and the basis of the universe. Sai, in His Shiva form swallowed the poison to save humanity. O Sai, kindly protect us, help us cross the ocean of life and bestow on us the nectar of eternal life.

title: Hari Guru Hari Dhyanam
lyrics:
Karuna Nadhi Snanam [ Hari Guru ... ]
Bhaja Guru Hari Naamam
Madhura Murali Naadam
Hari Guru Hari Paadam [ Karuna Nadhi ... ]
meaning: Meditate on the Divine Preceptor, Lord Hari. Worshiping Him is akin to bathing in a river of compassion. Chant Hari's name as He produces sweet music with His flute. Surrender to Lord Hari's feet.

title: Hari Guru Natha Prabhu Guru
title2: Hari Guru Natha Prabhu Guru Natha Partheesha Natha
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
Talli Tandriyu Neevey Kadaa Daari Chupe Guru Devudu Kadaa
Narayana Govinda Mukunda Maaku Prapanchamu Neevey Kadaa
Nanda Sunanda Nanda Mukunda Brindavana Chandha
Sri Sathya Sai Guru Natha
meaning: Let us worship Sri Sathya Sai as our preceptor, the one who is both Mother and Father, the Divine Master who guides on our path of Spiritual progress. There is no other world for us except You dear Lord Sai. You are verily Lord Krishna, the dear child of Nanda. You are none other than Narayana glorified by the names Govinda and Mukunda, the pleasing child of Brindavana.

title: Hari Hari Bhajo Mana Sai
title2: Hari Hari Bhajo Mana Sai Ram Bhajorey
lyrics:
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai Krishna Bhajorey [ Hari Hari ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Vittala Bhajorey
Govinda Govinda Madhava Bhajorey
meaning: O Mind, sing the glory of Lord Hari who incarnated as Lord Rama, Krishna, Vittala and Lord Sai.

title: Hari Hari Bol Hey Manuva
lyrics:
Hari Bol Hari Bol
Hari Charan Ke Dhyan Karo
Kamal Nayana Ke Smarana Karo [ Hari Bol ... ]
meaning: O Mind, chant the name of Lord Hari and meditate on the feet of Lord Hari while visualizing His Lotus eyes.

title: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari
title2: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Giridhara Bala Hari Hari Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Madhava Hari Keshava Hari
Yadava Hari Nandalala (Sai)
meaning: Worship Lord Hari in the form of Govinda, the dark-complexioned Krishna who lifted the Govardhana hill with His little finger, Madhava, Keshava, who incarnated in the Yadava lineage as the son of Nanda.

title: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari
title2: Hari Hari Govinda Hari Hari Om
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Parama Dayala Pannaga Sai
Paramananda Hari Hari
meaning: Glory to Lord Hari, Govinda (names of Lord Vishnu) and to Lord Sai, the most compassionate Lord of Parthi. Lord Sai is none other than Lord Panduranga of Pandharpur, the supremely blissful one.

title: Hari Hari Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Sri Hari Bol Jaya Hari Bol [ Hari Hari ... ]
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Prashanthi Raja Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bolo
meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord Hari who is also known by different names Govinda, Narayana, Rama, Krishna. Sing the praises of Sai Ram who is the Divine Master of Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari
title2: Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Bolo
lyrics:
Hari Hari Ke Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo
Govinda Ke Gun Gao
Sai Ram Bolo Sai Shyam Bolo
Sai Ram Gun Gao
Govinda Govinda Govinda Bolo [ Govinda Ke ... ]
meaning: Sing the Holy Name and divine attributes of Lord Hari, Govinda who has incarnated as Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai.

title: Hari Hari Hari Hari Smaran
title2: Hari Hari Hari Hari Smaran Karo
lyrics:
Hari Charana Kamal Dhyan Karo [ Hari Hari ... ]
Murali Madhava Seva Karo
Murahara Giridhari Bhajana Karo
meaning: Let the Mind dwell incessantly on the Lotus Feet of Hari, let the hands indulge in the service of Madhava who holds Flute in His Hands, Let the mouth sing the Glory of the One who vanquished the demon Mura and lifted the Mountain with a finger.

title: Hari Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Hari Govinda Narayana
Hari Gopala Narayana
Hari Hari Narayana
Hrishikesha Narayana
Partheesha Narayana
meaning: Worship Lord Narayana who is none other than Hari, Govinda, Gopala, the master of senses and who has incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Hari Hari Om Shiva Shankara
title2: Hari Hari Om Shiva Shankara Om
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Keshava Hey Shiva Madhava Hey
Narayana Hari Om (2)
Paramatma Antaryami
Narayana Hari Om (3)
meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound Om and chant the divine names of the Lord - Hari, Shiva, Shankara, Narayana, Keshava and Madhava. Lord Narayana is the indweller, the Supreme Consciousness.

title: Hari Hari Om Sri Hari
title2: Hari Hari Om Sri Hari Om
lyrics:
Govinda Giridhara Hari Hari Om
Mukunda Madhava Hari Hari Om
Natavara Naagara Sri Hari Om
Karuna Sagara Sri ( Sai ) Hari Om
meaning: Sing in praises of the Lord Hari, Govinda, Mukunda, Madhava, Giridhara, the Supreme actor, the Ocean of Compassion and the Originator of the Primordial sound Om.

title: Hari Hari Sri Narayana Jai
title2: Hari Hari Sri Narayana Jai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Rahim Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hallelujah Yesu Prabhu Jai Sai Ram
Sharanam Sharanam Buddha Jai Sai Ram
Zohrashtra Mahavir Jai Sai Ram
Satsri Akal Vahey Guru Jai Sai Ram
Sarva Devatha Athitha Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
meaning: Victory be to Sairam and praises be to Him who is the embodiment of all faiths Narayana, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavir, Zohrashtra and Guru Nanak.

title: Hari Hari Sumiran Hari Hari
title2: Hari Hari Sumiran Hari Hari Bhajo Man
lyrics:
Hari Hi Tero Tan Man Aur Dhan [ Hari Hari ... ]
Tulsidas Bhajey Ramam Ramam
Meera Daasi Bhaja Govindam
Hari Bin Jeevan Kaisa Jeevan
Hari Charanan Mey Arpan Kar Man
meaning: O Mind, meditate upon the name of Lord Hari, who is your body, mind and wealth. Lord Hari's devotees Tulasidas sang Rama's name and Meera sang Govinda's name (Krishna). This life without Hari is not worth it. O Mind, surrender at the feet of Hari.

title: Hari Mhana Tuhi Govinda Mhana Tuhi Gopala Mhana Tuhi Narayana
title2: Hari Mhana Tuhi Govinda Mhana Tuhi Gopala Mhana Tuhi Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Hari Narayana
Shyama Mhana Radha Shyama Mhana Radha Shyama Mhana Sai Shyama Mhana
Shyama Mhana Ghanashyama Mhana Megha Shyama Mhana Sai Shyama Mhana
Esha Mhana Sarvesha Mhana Partheesha Mhana Sayeesha Mhana
Govinda Gopala Hari Narayana (3)
meaning: O Lord Hari, You are mine and mine alone. You are Krishna, Narayana, Govinda, Gopala, Shyama. You are the Lord of the Lords, Sathya Sai of Puttaparthi. We sing Your various names in rapture.

title: Hari Naam Gaate Chalo Sai
title2: Hari Naam Gaate Chalo Sai Naam Gaate Chalo
lyrics:
Madhava Govinda Govinda Madhava Naam Gaate Chalo [ Hari Naam ... ]
Govinda Vittala Gopala Vittala
Jaya Parthi Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala (2) [ Madhava Govinda ... ]
meaning: Let every moment be spent in singing and contemplating on the Lord's name Hari, Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Vittala and Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Hari Naam Sumira Hari Naam
title2: Hari Naam Sumira Hari Naam Sumira Hari Naam Sumira Bhajorey
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Nayaka Sab Sukha Dayaka
Vinati Sahayaka Naam Japorey
alt_lyrics:
Hari Naam Sumira Hari Naam Sumira Hari Naam Sumira Bhajorey
Tribhuvana Palaka Sab Sukha Dayaka
Vinati Sahayaka Naam Japorey
Hari Naam Japorey
meaning: Chant and remember the name of Lord Hari (Narayana), the Lord of the Universe who bestows goodness and happiness. Chant the name of the Lord who helps the devotees who surrender to Him.

title: Hari Narayana Govinda
lyrics:
Hari Narayana Duritha Nivarana
Hari Narayana Govinda
Keshava Madhava Govinda
Govinda Govinda
Govinda Hari (Sai) Govinda
meaning: Contemplate on the sweet names of the Lord Narayana - Hari, Govinda, Keshava and Madhava. Chant the Holy name of Sai, who is verily Narayana, the one who dispels the negative consequences of our deeds.

title: Hari Narayana Govinda Jaya Narayana
title2: Hari Narayana Govinda Jaya Narayana Govinda
lyrics:
Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana
Jaya Govinda Govinda
meaning: Chant continuously the names of Narayana, Govinda and Hari. Let victory be to them.

title: Hari Narayana Govinda Sai Narayana
title2: Hari Narayana Govinda Sai Narayana Govinda
lyrics:
Murali Madhava Govinda
Govardhanadhara Govinda
meaning: Blissfully contemplate on the names of the Lord Narayana the indweller in Man, Govinda the cowherd boy, the master of senses, Murali the one who holds flute and the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain.

title: Hari Narayana Hari Hari
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Hari Hari
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana [ Sai Narayana ... ]
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava
Govinda Rama Hari Hari
Hey Keshava Hey Madhava [ Govinda Rama ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who is also known as Keshava, Govinda, Hari, Rama and Madhava.

title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Hari Narayana Sai Narayana
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
Jaya Hari (Sai) Narayana Narayana
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Narayana and Hari (names of Lord Vishnu). Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Nithya Niranjana Sai Narayana
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana
Rajeeva Lochana Sai Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the eternally pure one who incarnated as Lord Narasimha. Salutations to the lotus-eyed Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
title2: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om) (2)
lyrics:
Achyutha Keshava Madhava Govinda Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana (Om)
meaning: Praise be to Lord Narayana whose other names are Achyutha, Keshava, Madhava and Govinda. Glory to the originator of the primordial sound Om.

title: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari
title2: Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey (2)
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Madana Gopala
Satchidananda Sai Gopala
Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Gopi Gopalana Bhajorey
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajorey
Hari Narayana Bhajorey (4)
meaning: O Mind, sing the Glory of Lord Narayana also known as Hari, who has descended on Earth as the dark-complexioned and enchanting Gopala (Krishna). He is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss and the one who protects the cows and the Gopis.

title: Hari Narayana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Naam Bina Sukha Shanthi Nahin
Naman Karo Hari Naam Hari Naam
Smarana Karo Sai Naam Sai Naam
Narayana Hari Narayana
meaning: Understand Oh Mind! There is no peace and security bereft of the Lord's name Hari and Narayana. Bow down in reverence to the Name Hari. Keep chanting the name of Lord Sai.

title: Hari Narayana Srinivasa
lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Sri Venkatesha
Padma Lakshmi Hrudaya Nivasa [ Hari Narayana ... ]
Dharani Nayaka Paapa Vinasha
Mangala Dayaka Manusha Vesha
Maha Teertha Sri Tirumalai Vasa
Balaji Sai Parthi Nivasa
meaning: The bestower of Auspiciousness, the Lord of the Earth, destroyer of Sins has come down in human form as Lord Srinivasa at the Holy place Tirumala and who has Mother Lakshmi in His Heart. Lord Srinivasa is also known as Govinda, Venkatesha and Balaji has now incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Hari Om Ananda Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana [ Hari Om ... ]
Triloka Palana Narayana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, sustainer of the three worlds, embodiment of Bliss and the source of the Primordial sound 'Om'. He is none other than Lord Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Hari Om Hari Om Hari
title2: Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana (2)
lyrics:
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana Padmanabha Narayana
Lakshmi Ramana Kamala Nayana Sai Natha Narayana
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Narayana
meaning: Glory to the Lord Narayana, the one who is resting on the Celestial Serpent Adisesha and the one who is the personification of serenity. He is the lotus-eyed one who is the beloved of Goddess of wealth (Lakshmi). He is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Hari Om Hari Om Hari
title2: Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om Namah Shivaya
Dama Dama Damaru Mahadev Ka
Vandana Iski Kartey Hai Sab Devatha
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
meaning: Chant the divine mantra of Shiva " Namah Shivaya". All the Gods Pay their Obeisance to Lord Mahadev who holds the Damaru in his Hands.

title: Hari Om Hari Om Hari
title2: Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Sathya Narayana Jaya Hari Om [ Hari Om ... ]
Paramatma Shiva Sai Hari Om
Parabrahma Shiva Sai Hari Om
Sai Narayana Jaya Hari Om
Sathya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
meaning: Glory to Lord Vishnu (Hari), the embodiment of the primeval sound Om. Glory to Sai (Narayana) and Lord Shiva, the Supreme Soul and the ultimate Creator.

title: Hari Om Hari Om Namah
title2: Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Sai Om Sai Om Namah Shivaya [ Hari Om ... ]
Dama Dama Damaru Bola Shankara 
Dhimi Thaka Dhimi Thaka Nachey Shankara 
Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya
meaning: Praise be to Lord Shiva, the embodiment of the primordial sound Om. His drum resounds in all glory. He dances, destroying all the negativities in the world.

title: Hari Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics: Shiva Shiva Shankara Hara Parameshwara Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (2)
meaning: Chant the mantra "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Let us offer our obeisance to Lord Shiva who bestows auspiciousness and is the Lord of the Lords. He has presently incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
lyrics: Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
meaning: Chant "Hari Om Namah Shivaya". Lord Shiva is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the origin of the primordial sound Om.

title: Hari Om Namah Shivaya Sai Om
title2: Hari Om Namah Shivaya Sai Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara Hey Shiva Shankara Namah Shivaya
Trishoola Dhari Hey Tripurari Sai Murari Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Sai Om Namah Shivaya (Sathya)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shiva, the one who holds the Holy river Ganges in His matted locks and who pleases Mother Gowri (Parvathi). He wields the Trident and is the destroyer of the three demons of Tripura. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Hari Om Namo Shiva Shakthi
title2: Hari Om Namo Shiva Shakthi Namo
lyrics:
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
Hari Om Namo Sita Rama Namo
Jaya Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
Hari Om Namo Radhey Shyam Namo
Jaya Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Namo
meaning: Let us offer our salutations to our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai who is none other than the incarnation of Shiva and Energy Principle Shakthi, Sita Rama as well as Radhey Shyam.

title: Hari Om Narayana Sathya Narayana
lyrics: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
meaning: Let us Sing the Glory of Narayana the embodiment of Truth and chant the Mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' the origin of the Primordial sound Om.

title: Hari Om Tat Sat Hari
title2: Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om Tat Sat Hari Om
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Jaya Radha Krishna
Govinda Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda Gopala Gopala Bhajo Krishna Mukunda
Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om
meaning: Understand O Mind, the Primordial Sound Om is that Effulgent pure Consciousness. Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Govinda who are also embodiments of that Supreme Consciousness.

title: Hari Om Tat Sath Namah
title2: Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya [ Hari Om ... ]
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Shivaya
Hari Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
Sai Om Tat Sath Namah Shivaya
meaning: Understand O Mind, the Mantra 'Namah Shivaya' is the embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness. Lord Shiva Himself is the embodiment of that Supreme Effulgent Consciousness.

title: Hari Sri Ganapathi Om
lyrics:
Harey Ganapathi Om
Vishwadhara Vighna Vinashaka
Veera Ganapathi Om
Harey Ganapathi Om
Veera Ganapathi Om Om Om
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganaas (Lord Shiva's army), Lord Ganesha, the valiant one who is the very basis of the universe and who is the remover of obstacles.

title: Hari Sundara Nanda Mukunda Hari
title2: Hari Sundara Nanda Mukunda Hari Narayana Hari Om
lyrics:
Hari Keshava Hari Govinda Hari Narayana Hari Om
Vanamali Muralidhari Govardhana Girivaradhari
Nit Nit Kar Makhan Chori Gopi Mana Haari

Aaorey Gaorey Gokul Ke Pyaarey
Aaorey Kanharey Gokul Ke Pyaarey
Aaorey Nachorey Raas Rachaorey
Gaorey Nachorey Raas Rachaorey
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the beautiful son of Nanda, and who is hailed as Mukunda, the remover of sorrows. With His enchanting form, adorned with flowers and holding the flute, He captivated the hearts of Gopis and devotees alike. He playfully stole butter and the minds of the Gopis, embodying divine love and joy. He lifted the Govardhana mountain with His little finger to protect the people of Vraja. Victory be to Lord Narayana, Keshava, and Hari Om. Let us sing, dance, and celebrate the beloved dark-skinned Krishna, and offer our devotion in joy and love.

title: Haru no No no Utsukushisa
lyrics:
Hana wo Kiyoki Omoi ni Atsume Kite
Mihotoke ni Sasage Sonauru
Tanoshi Tanoshi Kyou no Hanamatsuri

Kagarinaki Mihotoke no
Atatakaki Ai ni Yasuragite
Amatsuchi ni Afure Kagayaku
Tanoshi Tanoshi Kyou no Hanamatsuri

Amakaze wo Shinobi Tsutsu
Hana wa Saku Fukaki Kansha no Hibi
Hinomoto wo Terasu Akebo no
Tanoshi Tanoshi Kyou no Hanamatsuri
meaning:
Thoughts of You gather in my mind like beautiful flowers collecting together in the spring. Lord Buddha, we bow down and devote ourselves to You for today is Your birthday.

Lord, You are without bounds and limits. Please surround us with Your warm, comforting love that shines down from the heavens. Lord Buddha, we devote ourselves to You for today is Your birthday.

You come to us concealed in wind and rain. You allow us to bloom like flowers, so we offer You our heartfelt gratitude every day. You shine down on this world like the beautiful daybreak. Lord Buddha, we devote ourselves to You for today is Your birthday.

title: Have faith, that’s all that matters
title2: Have faith, that's all that matters
lyrics:
Have faith, that's all you need
 With faith, illusion shatters
 Cultivate faith like a precious seed
 Where there is faith, then there is love
 Where there is love, there will be peace
 When there is peace, there will be truth
 When there is truth, there will be bliss
 When there is bliss, there will be God

title: Have Mercy
lyrics:
My Lord dear Lord send to You Your love I feel
My Lord sweet Lord You give me all the strength I need
Baba my Lord, Give Your darshan, make me whole
Do not test me more my Lord, have mercy on this soul
I have learned to serve, I have learned to love
I have learned to get all from You my Lord
I tried to reach Your goal, but I am human after all
Oh my Lord I plea Baba have mercy on this soul (2x)

title: He comes with the sun in the voice
title2: He comes with the sun in the voice, singing the light, singing the light
lyrics:
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba Jai
 In the heart of wind He comes, singing the love, singing the love
 He comes with the sun in the voice, singing the light, singing the light

title: He Is Lord
title2: I Got Something To Tell You
lyrics:
You Might Not Want To Know
But Jesus Christ Is Lord Of All
And This I'll Tell You So
He Is Lord (4x)

Got Something Else To Tell You
You Really Ought To Know
So Is Allah And Krishna Too
Sai Baba Is My Lord
He Is Lord (4x)

Choose Any Name And Any Form
He Answers To Them All
Cuz God Is Love And Love Is God
He Wants To Hear You Call
So Find The Peace And Love Inside
Indeed Its Who You Are
See The Good That's All Around
Its Really Not That Far

Got Another Thing To Tell You
Its Gonna Make You Glow
He Lives Right Down Inside Your Heart
... He's Never Gonna Go (2x)
He Is Lord (4x)

Choose Any Name And Any Form
He Answers To Them All
Cuz God Is Love And Love Is God
He Wants To Hear You Call
So Find The Peace And Love Inside
Indeed Its Who You Are
See The Good That's All Around
Its Really Not That Far
Cuz He Is Love (4x)

Got One More Thing To Tell You
You Might Not Think Its So
But He Lives Through Each One Of Us
We're Really One In All
He Is Lord (4x)

title: He Is Love
lyrics:
He is Peace
Look within your heart
Love is shining
I am One with Him
(repeat)

title: He Is Love, So Learn To Love
title2: He Is Love, So Learn To Love
lyrics:
He Is Truth, So Be True
He Is Peace, So Work For Peace
He Is Good, So Be Good
He Is Lord, His Name Is Sai
Sai Ram, Sai Ram (2)
Sai Ram Say Sai Ram

title: He is the Lord of the Universe
title2: He is the Lord of the Universe, He is the Lord of the Self
lyrics:
Open your eyes and realize the Lord is residing within you
 Dive deeper and deeper inside, fill your heart with His love's pure light
 Master your senses, give up pretenses
 Know that forever the Lord and you are one

title: He Ma Sai Ma Sai
title2: He Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashini Ma Mangala Karini Ma
Jagadodharini Ma Sai Ma
Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Sai Ma
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai of Parthi who removes obstacles, grants good fortune and protects the entire Universe.

title: He Nataraja Shivaraja
lyrics:
Nata Shiva Sundara Nataraja
Ambuja Lochana Nataraja
Ananda Tandava Shivaraja
Shakthi Mahesha Nataraja (Shiva)
Sai Manohara Shivaraja ( Sai )
meaning: Lord Shiva, the divine dancer with lotus-shaped eyes who blissfully dances the cosmic dance is Lord of Shakthi (Parvathi) and the captivating Lord Sai.

title: He Natavaralala Nandalala
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Hari Gopala [ He Natavaralala ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Goparipala Gopala Bala
meaning: Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha and the Lord of Meera is the Son of Nanda. He is the divine dancer who protects the cows (a cowheard)

title: He Parthipuri Bhagawan Bhagawan
lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Hey Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Hey Deena Janon Ke Pran Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... Sai Bhagawan ]
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... Sai Bhagawan ]
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi and Prasanthi Nilayam, is the Supreme Guru. He is the friend of the afflicted and forsaken ones. He is Lord who destroys our sins. Glory to the Supreme Guru.

title: He Performeth
title2: HE performeth the thing that is given me to do
lyrics:
HE performeth the thing that is given me to do
And HE perfects that which concerneth me
HE perfects that which concerneth me
 
I in the midst of me AM Mighty
I in the midst of me AM Peace
I in the midst of me AM Mighty
I in the midst of me AM GOD
 
I in the midst of me AM Mighty
I in the midst of me AM Love
I in the midst of me AM Holy
I in the midst of me AM GOD
I in the midst of me AM GOD..AM GOD..AM GOD
 
And HE perfects that which concerneth me
HE perfects that which concerneth me
HE performeth the thing that is given me to do
HE performeth the thing that is given me to do

title: He Who has sent Me will come again
title2: He Who has sent Me will come again
lyrics:
Sai Jesus Christ before He left the world stage, Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 Living always in unchangeable Bliss
 You graciously personify the ultimate Sage, Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 You have come to destroy all the evil and foster all the good
 O, we prayed, and we knew You would
 There may be some who doubt a time will come
 When Peace and Love and Righteousness will reign across the land
 But we believe Your promise to the world
 That to bring about this Age of Peace is truly what You've planned
 You are teaching us the sacred art
 Of lighting lamps of Love within the heart
 Illuminating all we see
 Every one of us can do our part
 We want to serve You in Your Task
 Of helping all to realize our godly heritage
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 Our sweet and loving divine Personage
 You are the Embodiment of Righteousness
 Our Conscience for the actions in which we engage
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth
 You're here to usher in the Golden Age
 Sai Baba, Beacon of Truth You're here to usher in the Golden Age

title: He's Got The Whole World
title2: He's Got The Whole World In His Hands (4)
lyrics:
He's Got You And Me Sister In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
He's Got You And Me Brother In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
He's Got Everybody In His Hands (3) [ He's Got The ... ]
His Name Is Sathya Sai Baba, He Is God (3) [ He's Got The ... ]

title: Hear Me Lord Ganesha
title2: Hear Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
lyrics:
See Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
Know Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection
Love Me, Lord Ganesha, Grant Me Your Protection

title: Hear My Wish
title2: Beloved Baba, hear my wish, which I address to Thee,
lyrics:
To fill me up so full of You, there's no room left for me.
Beloved Baba, take my life, and shape it as You will,
And then please give it to me, Your wishes to fulfill.
Beloved Baba, give me strength, and take away all fear,
As You have proved that You can do, throughout this blessed year.
Beloved Baba, take my heart, and make of it Your home,
And You will be installed in it, wherever I may roam.

title: Heart and soul of the infinite
title2: Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
lyrics:
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life,
He’s the only one who is, I – Am – He.
Men:
He is Love, He is ev’rything,
all energy and sound,
He is guide, inspiration,
the best friend around.
Women:
He is Truth, He is beauty,
the good in ev’ry heart,
When there’s joy, bliss, compassion,
Love never will part.
Chorus:
Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life,
He’s the only one who is, I – Am – He.
Men:
We take refuge and comfort
when we remember Him,
He’s our Mother, our Father,
our nearest of kin.
Women:
Omnipresent, omnipotent,
the master Guru,
He’s our laughter, our sustenance,
our silence…
Chorus:
Heart and soul of the infinite, fully alive,
He is far beyond the mind, close as we breathe.
The embodiment of Love, the light of life

title: Heart filled with Kindness
title2: You may be rich and wealthy.

title: Heian no Hikari Sadguru Sathya
title2: Heian no Hikari Sadguru Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Ai no Kami Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
Kokoro no Naka no Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
Minna wo Michibiku Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
Yasashii Haha Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
Dharma no Chichi Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
Kami no Mina Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, You are the light of tranquility. You are the God of Love. You are within our hearts. You are the one who guides us all. You are our kind mother. You are our righteous (dharmic) father. Sathya Sai is the beautiful name of our Lord.

title: Heramba Gananatha Natha
lyrics:
Hey Gananatha Anatha Natha
Bhuvanaadhara Pranava Swaroopa (3)
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Gananatha (Vara)
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the leader of Ganaas, the Lord of the forsaken ones who is the embodiment of the vital force and basis of the Universe. He fulfills ones wishes.

title: Here I Am Lord
lyrics:
I The Lord of sea and sky
I have heard My People cry
All who dwell in dark and sin
My Hand will save
 
I who made the stars of night
I will make their darkness bright
Who will bear My Light to them
Whom shall I send?
 
Here I Am Lord ... Is it I Lord?
I have heard You calling in the night
I will go Lord if You lead me
I will hold Your People in my heart
 
I The Lord of wind and flame
I will tend the poor and lame
I will set a feast for them
My Hand will save
 
Finest bread I will provide
’Til their hearts be satisfied
I will give My Life to them
Whom shall I send?
 
Here I Am Lord ... Is it I Lord?
I have heard You calling in the night
I will go Lord if You lead me
I will hold Your People in My Heart
I will hold Your People in My Heart

title: Hey Akhilandeshwari Ma
lyrics:
Anatha Rakshaki Ma
Chamundeshwari Karuna Sagari
Palaya Maam Dehi
Hey Tribhuvana Palini Ma
Hey Trishoola Dharini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma
Partheeshwari Sai Ma
meaning: Glory to Mother of the Universe, the ocean of mercy, and the savior of the unfortunate. She holds a trident and protects and preserves all the three worlds. Glory to Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Hey Anatha Nath Sai Tum
title2: Hey Anatha Nath Sai Tum Ho Antaryami
lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Sahara Do Mujhey
O Merey Sai Bhagawan
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai Merey
Deejo Krupa Vardaan [ Tum Ho ... ]
meaning: Oh Sai! You are verily my Lord, for You are the indweller and champion of distraught and helpless. Oh Lord! Take up my cause for You are the one who destroys the sorrows of the forlorn. Enter the temple of my heart and shower Your blessings.

title: Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Deena Natha Anatha Ke Natha [ Hey Bhagawan ... ]
Janana Marana Bhava Shoka Vidhura
Niraadhaar Ke Aadhaar
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala [ Daya Karo ... ]
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi, please have compassion on us and deliver us from the fear of life and death. O the all compassionate Lord who has come as a savior of the less privileged and deprived, I bow down to You.

title: Hey Bhagawan Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Janana Marana Bhaya Shoka Nivarana
Deena Janon Ke Pran
Patitha Pavana Paapa Nivarana
Sai Nath Bhagawan [ Daya Karo ... ]
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi, please have compassion on us and deliver us from the fear of life and death. O Lord Supreme, the compassionate one who has come as a savior of the less privileged and deprived, deliver us from our sins.

title: Hey Brahma Hey Vishnu
lyrics:
Dayamaya Hey Maheshwara
Sathya Sai Parameshwara [ Hey Brahma ... ]
Maha Shakthi Shiva Sai Shankara
Poorna Teja Sai Avatara
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who is the Creator, Sustainer and Destroyer and the Supreme Sovereign Lord who is full of compassion. Lord Sathya Sai is the Total Incarnation of the Supreme Energy.

title: Hey Brij Bal Yadu Nanda
title2: Hey Brij Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Mohana Gopal [ Hey Brij ... ]
Yashoda Ke Bal Yadu Nanda Gopal
Gopal Gopal Gokula Bal
meaning: Oh Lord Gopala, You are the son of Nanda and Yashoda and of the Yadava lineage. You are the one who moved about in the thick bushes of Brindavan, is of dark complexion and attractive to behold.

title: Hey Chinmayi Sai Janani
lyrics:
Mata Jaganmayi Sai Janani
Shabdha Brahmamayi Sai Janani
Parathparamayi Sai Janani
Shiva Shakthimayi Sai Janani
Nithyanandamayi Sai Janani
meaning: Oh Mother Sai! You are that Pure Consciousness, Mother of the entire universe and the originator of the Primordial sound 'Om' from which this Universe has come into being. Oh Mother! You are superior even to the best, the embodiment of Matter and Energy principle and the ever-blissful.

title: Hey Chitha Chora Parthi Nivasa
lyrics:
Indu Vadana Sri Sayeesha
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Nandana
Govardhanadhara Gopala ( Sai )
meaning: Our Salutations to Sayeesha, the stealer of our Hearts, who has the countenance of the cool Moon. He is the same Lord Gopala who had earlier incarnated at Gokula as the Lord of the Gopis and the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain.

title: Hey Deena Bandhu Anatha Natha
lyrics:
Hey Guru Natha Sai Natha
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramatma
Patitha Janavana Sai Natha
meaning: Our Lord Sai is that Supreme Consciousness, the uplifter of the downtrodden and refuge of the forlorn. Lord Sai is also our mentor and the source of succor to the orphaned.

title: Hey Deena Bandhu Deena Natha
title2: Hey Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Avatara
lyrics:
Prem Ke Sindho Karuna Sindhu Sai Avatara
Sarva Dharma Ke Ek Swaroopa Sai Avatara
Bhajorey Sai Avatara
meaning: Let us sing the Glory of Sai the Incarnation of the Modern Era who is the friend and Emancipator of the forlorn. Sai is the Single Godhead of all the different Faiths and the Ocean of Supreme Love and compassion.

title: Hey Deena Dayalu Ghana Sai
title2: Hey Deena Dayalu Ghana Sai Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Karo Kalyan
Tum Ho Baba Antaryami
Tum Ho Sab Ke Jeevan Swami
Prem Baras Deejo Sai Ghana Shyam [ Karuna Sindho ... ]
meaning: Shower Your love on us, O the dark-complexioned Lord of the forlorn. O Sai, You are the indweller, the ocean of compassion and the lifeline of everyone.

title: Hey Deena Dayalu Harey Harey
title2: Hey Deena Dayalu Harey Harey Sai Ram Harey Harey
lyrics:
Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Sai Ram
Hey Bandha Vimochana Rama Harey
Hey Paapa Samharaka Sai Harey
Sai Ram Harey Harey [ Sai Ram Ghana Shyam ]
meaning: Glory be to the Lord Sai Rama who has a soft corner to the deprived ones, the One who relieves us of Bondages of the World, the annihilator of Sins.

title: Hey Deena Dayalu Sai Rama
title2: Hey Deena Dayalu Sai Rama Ram
lyrics:
Parama Krupalu Sai Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Rama Ram
Bhaktha Vatsala Sai Rama Ram [ Sai Rama ... ]
meaning: Repeat the name of Sai Rama, the redeemer of the forlorn, the ever compassionate, the uplifter of the oppressed and the one who is ever endearing to His devotees.

title: Hey Eshwari
lyrics:
Sai Mata Eshwari
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sayeeshwari [ Hey Eshwari ... ]
Shankari Sambhavi Sada Shivey
Katyayani Kamalambikey
Pankaja Lochani Bhava Bhaya Nashini
Mohana Roopini Moksha Pradayini
meaning: O Mother, You are the consort of Eshwara (Shiva), You are the lotus-eyed one and is loved by all. You are also known as Shankari, Sambhavi, Katyayani and Kamalambikey and has a very pleasing form. You are the one who destroys the cycle of births and who bestows liberation.

title: Hey Gananatha Gajanana
lyrics:
Heramba Gajanana [ Hey Gananatha ... ]
Gowri Nandana Gajanana Gajanana Hey Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajanana
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganaas (Shiva's army) and the dear son of Mother Gowri. Lord Ganesha, also known as Heramba, bestows spiritual powers.

title: Hey Ghana Shyama Venu Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Nanda Gopa Bala [ Hey Ghana ... ]
Nayana Manohara Navamani Mala
Aao Sundara Shyama Gopala
Aao Sundara Sai Gopala
meaning: Lord Gopala, the dark hued, enchanting flute-player is the beloved child of Nanda. He is beautiful, adorned with a garland of nine precious gems. O beautiful Sai Gopal, please come.

title: Hey Giridhari Gopala
lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Gopala [ Hey Giridhari ... ]
Nanda Mukunda Gopala
Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Antaryami Gopala
Hrudaya Vihari Gopala
Aao Pyaarey Muraliwale Darshan Do Prabhu Gopala
meaning: Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) also known by names Giridhari, Keshava, Madhava, Mukunda, You are the indweller of our hearts. Oh loving Lord holding the Flute, give me Your vision, Oh Lord Gopala.

title: Hey Giridhari Hey Nandalal
lyrics:
Yashoda Tanaya Hey Nandalal [ Hey Giridhari ... ]
Radha Pyaarey Hey Nandalal
Nandalal Nandalal
meaning: Praises be to the son of Nanda and Yashoda, who is dear to Radha and the One who lifted the Mountain to save his tribesmen.

title: Hey Girija Pathi Bhavani Shankara
lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Shankara
Trishoola Dhari Trinetra Dhari
Hey Jaga Vanditha Bhuvaneshwara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sayeeshwara
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the consort of Mother Parvathi (Girija), who has three eyes and wields a trident. He is worshipped by the whole universe as Lord Sai who is the personification of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakti (Parvathi).

title: Hey Govinda Hey Ananda Nanda
title2: Hey Govinda Hey Ananda Nanda Gopala
lyrics:
Mohana Muralidhara Shyama Gopala [ Hey Govinda ... ]
Mandara Giridhari Harey Natavara Lala
Madhava Keshava Madana Gopala
meaning: Glory to the Lord Gopala (Krishna), son of Nanda. He is ever blissful, having an enchanting form. Glory be to the one who holds the Flute in His hands, absolute pretender, who lifted the Mandara mountain in order to save the Yadavas from the wrath of the Rain God.

title: Hey Govinda Hey Gopala
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Madana Mohana
Govardhana Giridhari
Shankha Chakra Gadadhari
Meera Prabhu Giridhari
Radhey Shyam Muralidhari
meaning: Sing the attributes of Lord Krishna (Gopala, Govinda), the one with dark complexion, having an enchanting form, who adorns the Conch, the Disc and the Mace. Praises be to the one who is dear to Meera and Radha and who holds the Flute in His hands.

title: Hey Govinda Hey Gopala Hey
title2: Hey Govinda Hey Gopala Hey Madhava Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Aao Aao Prabhu Aao Aao
Mujhey Aakar Darsha Dikhao [ Hey Govinda ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa
Aao Prabhu Aao Aao [ Mujhey Aakar ... ]
meaning: Come, O dear Lord Gopala (Krishna), the destroyer of the demon Madhu, please come and grace us with the vision of Your beautiful form. You are the very embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Hey Gowri Natha Shiva Shankara
lyrics:
Hara Bham Bham Hara Bham Bham Hey Digambara [ Hey Gowri ... ]
Dam Dama Dam Dam Dama Dam Damaru Dhara
Bhola Bhandari Parameshwara [ Hara Bham ... ]
meaning: Worship the auspicious and all-pervading Lord Shiva, the beloved of Parvathi. He is full of grace, dancing to the rhythms of the drum (the sound of Creation).

title: Hey Indushekara Raja Shiva Raja
title2: Hey Indushekara Raja Shiva Raja Shankara
lyrics:
Hey Indushekara Shambho Shiva Raja Shankara
Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Pinaka Vaibhava Raja Shankara
Shiva Raja Shankara
meaning: Sing the Glory of Sovereign Lord Shankara (Shiva) who adorns the crescent moon on His head. He is the most auspicious one who holds the Pinaka Bow in His hands.

title: Hey Kamala Vadana Sai Ranga
lyrics:
Kaivalya Panduranga (2)
Sai Gopala Ghana Ghana Neela
Kutila Kuntala Tribhuvana Pala
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa (2)
Maheshwara Roopa [ Brahma Vishnu ... ]
Maya Lola Brahma Swaroopa
meaning: Hail the lotus-faced Lord Ranga who is the Absolute reality. Sing in praise of Lord Gopala of the complexion of thick dark clouds, of curly hair and who is the sustainer of the three worlds. He is verily the Embodiment of the Trinity and who uses Illusion as His instrument to destroy the sinner.

title: Hey Krishna Hey Krishna
lyrics:
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Madana Gopala (2)
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga (3) [Vittala Jaya ...]
alt_lyrics:
Sri Krishna Sri Krishna
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopala Madana Gopala (2)
Vittala Jaya Panduranga Panduranga
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga (3) [Vittala Jaya ...]
meaning: Chant the names of Panduranga, Vittala, and of the dark complexioned, enchanting Gopala who is the son of Nanda.

title: Hey Krishna Madhava Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Mathura Natha Madana Gopala
Nanda Mukunda Shyama ( Sai ) Gopala
Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Hari Govinda Krishna Harey (2)
meaning: Chant the various names of Gopala, Govinda, Krishna, Madhava, the One who gives delight and the one who is the Lord of Mathura. Glory be to Him.

title: Hey Ma Durga Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Hey Ma Durgati Nashini Ma
Jagadodharini Jaya Sai Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Sai Ma Jaya Jaya Ma
Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Ma
meaning: Victory be to Mother Durga who removes the distress of Her devotees, who is the redeemer of the world, the consort of Lord Shiva. Mother Durga is verily Mother Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Hey Madhava Hey Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Damodara Hey Muralidhara [ Hey Madhava ... ]
Mana Mohana Hey Yadu Nandana
Deenavana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
meaning: Glory be to the Lord Madhava, who vanquished demon Madhu and who holds the Flute in His hands. Lord Damodara removes the fear of repetitive births, has an Enchanting Form and the source of succor to the underprivileged.

title: Hey Madhava Yadu Nandana
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Janardhana Radha Jeevana
Gopalana Gopi Ranjana
alt_lyrics:
Hey Madhava Hey Yadu Nandana
Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
Janardhana Radha Jeevana
Gopalana Gopi Ranjana
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the beloved son of the Yadhava clan, the one who vanquished the demon Madhu. He is the one who enchants the mind of His devotees, the one who is the very life of Radha. He is the protector of the cows and is the source of delight to the Gopis.
