title: Hey Nanda Kumara Gopala
lyrics:
Brindavana Sanchara Gopala
Mana Mohana Murali Gopala
Mana Mohana Radhey Gopala
meaning: Lord Gopala is a Mind charmer, who plays the Flute, consort of Radha, son of Nanda and the One who moved about Brindavana.

title: Hey Nanda Nanda Gopala Ananda
title2: Hey Nanda Nanda Gopala Ananda Nanda Gopala (2)
lyrics: Hey Nanda Nanda Ananda Nanda Yadu Nanda Nanda Gopala
meaning: Glory to the divine child Gopala (Krishna), the one who gives delight to Nanda, who belongs to the Yadava lineage and is ever blissful.

title: Hey Nandalala Gopala
lyrics:
(Ghana) Shyama Gopal Sai Gopal [ Hey Nandalala ... ]
Giridhara Gopala Sai Gopala [ Shyam Gopal ... ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Gopala (Krishna) who is of dark complexion, the dear son of Nanda and the one who protected everyone by holding the Govardhana mountain with His little finger.

title: Hey Nandalala Hey Vraja Bala
lyrics:
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Bala
Brindavan Ke Gokula Bala
Daya Karo Hey Sai Nandalala [ Maakhan Chora ... ]
meaning: O Lord Krishna, son of Nanda and of Yashoda, You are the one who stole butter from the houses of Gopis and who moved about the gardens of Brindavan. Please have mercy on us , O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Krishna.

title: Hey Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Gopala [ Hey Nandalala ... ]
Natavara Giridhara Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Hey Nandalala
meaning: Victory be to You Oh son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, the One with the flute in His hands, the Supreme actor, who lifted the entire mountain with a finger.

title: Hey Nandalala Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Murali Manohara Krishna Gopala
Krishna Gopala Karunakara
Hey Devaki Nandana Damodara
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
meaning: Victory to the One who is the dear child of Devaki, of Nanda, Compassionate, the One of dark complexion and attractive with the flute in His hands and a rope around His waist.

title: Hey Nataraja Hey Nataraja
lyrics:
Nata Shiva Shankara Nataraja
Ambuja Lochana Nataraja
Ananda Tandava Shiva Raja
Shakthi Mahesha Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
meaning: Hail the Lord of Dance, Lotus eyed, Lord of Mother Shakthi, who performs the celestial dance who has now come down as Lord Sai.

title: Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari
title2: Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari Prabhu Ram
lyrics:
Janam Janam Merey Saath Raho Tum Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Hey Nirakari ... ]
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan [ Janam Janam ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Hey Nirakari Allah Hey Avatari Prabhu Ram
Janam Janam Merey Saath Raho Tum Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Hey Nirakari ... ]
Tum Hi Hamarey Mata Pitha Sai
Tum Hi Hamarey Pran (Ram) [ Janam Janam ... ]
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan [ Janam Janam ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, be with us through many lives. You are the Formless Allah, Guru Nanak, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavir and every other form of Divine Personage.

title: Hey Parameshwara Deena Dayalu Daya
title2: Hey Parameshwara Deena Dayalu Daya Sindhu Sayeesha Krupalu (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Parameshwara (Shiva) who is the refuge of the downtrodden and the ocean of mercy who has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara
lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Shankara
Daya Karo Sai Shankara (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Lords, the ocean of compassion and the Lord of Parthi. O Lord Sai, the bestower of auspiciousness (Shankara), shower Your mercy on us.

title: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa
title2: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sadguru Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
Hey Anatha Natha Deena Bandhu Sadguru Sai Ram
Sadguru Sai Ram (Hey)
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Ram
Harey Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Lord Sai Ram is our sacred Preceptor who dwells in Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi and the refuge of forlorn. Repeat the name of Lord Rama who is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa
title2: Hey Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Sai Murari
lyrics:
Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari Sai Murari [ Hey Parthi Pureesha ... ]
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa Hrudaya Nivasa [ Sai Murari ... ]
meaning: The Lord of Parthi, Sai, the resident of Prashanthi Nilayam, is the indweller of every heart. He is Lord Sai who also dwells at Hrishikesh and is verily Lord Krishna who annihilated the demon Mura.

title: Hey Raghu Nandana Dasharatha Nandana
lyrics:
Sita Pathey Ramachandra Parthi Pathey Ramachandra
Parama Pavitra Varija Netra [ Sita Pathey ... ]
Bhakthoddhara Sabari Raghuraya
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana [ Sita Pathey ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty, the son of Dasharatha and the consort of Mother Sita. He is ever pure, has lotus-shaped eyes and protects His devotees. He is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Hey Ram Bhagawan
lyrics:
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Deena Bandhu Sai Ram
Bhaktha Premi O Karuna Karo
Daya (Mujhey Krupa) Karo Bhagawan
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram
Hey Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Hey Deena Bandhu ... ]
meaning: Let Your benedictions be on us devotees, O Lord Rama. You are the ocean of compassion and refuge of the forlorn. Please shower Your grace on us, O merciful one. You are the very life of Mother Janaki. You are none other than Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Hey Ram Hey Guna Dham
lyrics:
Raghava Sundara Ram
Janaki Jeevana Ram [ Hey Ram ... ]
Kausalya Tanaya Raghukula Ram
Ayodhya Shiromani Dasharatha Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the repository of virtues, the most beautiful one, the descendant of the Raghu dynasty and the very life of Mother Janaki (Sita). Lord Rama is the crest jewel of Ayodhya and the son of Mother Kausalya and King Dasharatha. Victory to Lord Rama and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Hey Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
lyrics:
Hey Ram Vaidehi Priya Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Sai Ram
Manimaya Bhooshana Ram
Kausalyatmaja Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ram
Pavana Putra Priya Ram (Hey) [ Patitha Pavana ... ]
meaning: Lord Rama, You are the loving prince of Mother Kausalya and beloved Sita. You look handsome adorned with precious gems and jewels. O Slayer of demon King Ravana, You are the redeemer of the downtrodden and worshipped by Hanuman.

title: Hey Rama Dootha Hey Rama
title2: Hey Rama Dootha Hey Rama Bhaktha Hey Rama Daasa Namo Namo
lyrics:
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha
Anatha Natha Namo Namo
Maruti Raya Mahanubhava
Ati Balavanta (Veera Anjaneya) Namo Namo
alt_lyrics:
Hey Anjaneya Hey Rama Bhaktha Hey Rama Doota Namo Namo
Sita Mata Shoka Vinasha 
Ati Balavanta Namo Namo
Maruti Roopa Mahanubhava 
Anjani Putra Namo Namo
meaning: Salutations to Hanuman, the messenger, devotee and the servant of Lord Rama. Salutations to the one who destroyed Mother Sita's agony. Salutations to Maruti, the guide to the orphaned, the Supreme being and the brave one who possesses magnificent strength.

title: Hey Rama Narayana
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Janardhana [ Hey Rama ... ]
Nithyananda Brahmananda
Krishna Madhusudhana [ Harey Krishna ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama and Krishna who are the incarnations of Lord Narayana. Lord Krishna is the motivator, personification of Supreme Bliss and the one who vanquished demon Madhu.

title: Hey Ranga Panduranga
lyrics:
Rakumayi Ranga Vittobha Ranga [ Hey Ranga ... ]
Kaveri Ranga Kasturi Ranga
Karunya Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Ranga of Pandharpur, consort of Mother Rakumayi, who stands on a brick, the one with utmost compassion and benevolence to all. Lord Ranga is very charming, dwells by the river Kaveri.

title: Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai
title2: Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Sai Natha Karuna Sindhu Jagannatha
Hey Sai Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
Hey Shirdi Jagannatha Hey Parthi Jagannatha Hey Sai Jagannatha
meaning: Repeat the sacred name of Sai, the Lord of the Universe, the refuge of the forlorn, the ocean of compassion and the one who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Hey Sai Ranga Hey Panduranga
lyrics:
Karunanta Ranga Hrudayanta Ranga [ Hey Sai ... ]
Sri Ranga Ranga Jaya Ranga Ranga
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga [ Karunanta Ranga ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai Ranga, You are infinitely merciful. Reciting Your name creates waves of sublime feelings and emotions in the heart. Glory to Lord Sai Ranga, who is all bliss and who is ever in bliss.

title: Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
lyrics:
Veda Bharana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Pavana Charana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana who reclines on the serpent Adi Sesha and the one who fosters Vedas. Repeat the Holy name of Narayana whose sacred feet dispels the fear of repetitive births.

title: Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva
title2: Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana Palaya Maam
lyrics:
Hey Girija Sutha Hey Girija Sutha
Hey Girija Sutha Raksha Maam
meaning: Protect me, O Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Girija (Parthi).

title: Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga
title2: Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Jaga Vandana
lyrics:
Jaya Gowri Sutha Paahi Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri, the entire Universe bows down to You in reverence. Save me, O the elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi, for You are the one with Supreme compassion.

title: Hey Shiva Nandana Nandana
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Sai Gajanana [ Hey Shiva ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
Chamara Karna Vilambita Sutra
Vamana Roopa Maheshwara Putra
Parthi Gajanana Paada Namostuthey
meaning: I bow down to the feet of the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the son of Shiva. He has a short stature and big ears with the sacred thread hanging on His body and has the mouse Mooshika as His vehicle.

songtags: golden voice, karaoke, multi-lingual, sheet-music, tutorial

title: Hey Shiva Shankara Natana Manohara
lyrics:
Tandava Roopa Hey Parameshwara [ Hey Shiva ... ]
Shakthi Swaroopa Hey Nandeeshwara
Gangadhara Triya Netra Maheshwara
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of all who dances the beautiful Tandava dance. He holds the river Ganges in His matted locks and has three eyes (the third eye is that of wisdom). He is the Lord of Nandi, the Bull and is the very personification of Supreme Power.

title: Hey Shiva Shankara Nataraja
lyrics:
Bhavani Shankara Shiva Raja [ Hey Shiva ... ]
Natana Manohara Hey Nataraja
Sai Manohara Shiva Raja
meaning: Lord Shiva confers Auspiciousness and is the Lord of enticing Dance and the beloved of Mother Bhavani.

title: Hey Shiva Shankara Shambho Hey
title2: Hey Shiva Shankara Shambho Hey Tripurari
lyrics:
Dayamaya Maheshwara Sai Shankara
Hara Hara Hara Hara Shambho Mahadeva Gangadhara Shankara
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Mahadeva Sayeeshwara Shankara
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Shiva, the bestower of auspiciousness and who burnt down three cities built by the demons. Shiva is the Lord of the Lords, one of Supreme compassion and the one holding Mother Ganges in His matted locks.

title: Hey Shyama Sundara Hey Sai
title2: Hey Shyama Sundara Hey Sai Sundara
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Sundara [ Hey Shyam ... ]
Neela Megha Sundara Neeraja Lochana
Brahmanda Nayaka Hey Sai Sundara
meaning: Glory to the Lord Sai who has charming looks and is the Lord of Parthi. He has the complexion of dark blue clouds, lotus eyed and the Lord of the Entire Universe.

title: Hey Vishwa Janani Sri Sai Janani
title2: Hey Vishwa Janani Sri Sai Janani
lyrics:
Bhavani Jagadambe Ma (2)
Tribhuvana Palini Hey Karunamayi
Uma Sharadamba (2)
Raksha Karo Sai Ma

Tribhuvana Palini Hey Karunamayi
Uma Sharadamba (2)
Raksha Karo Sai Ma
meaning: Protect us O Mother Sai, You are the creator of this Earth, the sustainer of the three worlds and the personification of compassion. O Mother, You are known by the names such as Bhavani, Uma and Sharada.

title: Hey Vishwa Pala Gopala
lyrics:
Hey Deena Pala Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala

meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Gopala who sustains the whole Universe and the protector of the downtrodden. He held aloft the Govardhana Mountain and is the Lord of Meera. He is verily Lord Sai.

title: Hrudaya Spandana Sai Vandana

Ananda Mangala Sai

Various sweet musical instruments such as Mrudang, Veena, the Flute and the Manjira resound in His glory. May we be engrossed in the auspicious bliss of chanting the Holy name of Lord Sai.

Apaara Prema Apaara Bhakthi

meaning: Please give us Your blessings my Baba, my Sai, night and day. We live under Your protection. Please teach us Your infinite knowledge, infinite love, we are infinitely devoted to You. Show us the way to Truth and Righteousness and enlighten our life.

title: Hum Ko Tum Se Pyaar
title2: Hum Ko Tum Se Pyaar Kitna
lyrics:
Aalap:
Sunlo Dil Ki Pukar
Sunlo Sunlo Sunlo

Hum Ko Tum Se Pyaar Kitna
Sai Tum Hi Jantey Hain
Dilon Ki Dhadkan Tum Ho Sai
Tum Hamarey Pran Ho

Neevu Leni Maa Jeevanam
Neeru Leni Chepa Vedanam
Nee Sannidhe Maaku Pennidhi
Needu Chupe Prana Samanam
Neeku Maaku Oke Bandhamu
Adhiye Prema Bandhamu [ Hum Ko Tum Se ... ]
meaning: How much we love You is something that You alone know, dear Lord Sai. You Sai, are the rhythm of our heart - our heartbeat itself. You are our life. We love You so much.  Our life without You, Is like the plight of a fish without water. Proximity to You is our greatest wealth. One glance from You is as dear as life itself. Only one bond exists between You and us, and that is the bond of love.

title: Hum Sab Boley Namah Shivaya

Sathya Sai Hai Naam Tumhara Jag Ke Tum Rakhwaley Ho [ Hara Hara ... ]
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (8)
meaning: Let us all chant the Holy mantra "Om Namah Shivaya", the name of the Supreme Lord Shiva. O Lord, let us lose ourselves meditating on You and sing Your praises ceaselessly. You are verily Lord Sathya Sai, the embodiment of compassion and the protector of the entire universe.

title: Hum Sab Milkar Mangal Gaayen

meaning: Let us all sing together the glory of Lord Sathya Sai, the one who confers happiness to all and removes misery from everyone's life, the one who is the embodiment of Truth, the indweller of our hearts and the resident of Parthi.

title: I Am

I AM THAT, I AM THAT, I AM THAT….THAT I AM

I Am the rocks, I Am the sands; I Am the temple not made with human hands

I AM THAT, I AM THAT, I AM THAT….THAT I AM

I AM THAT, I AM THAT, I AM THAT….THAT I AM
 
I AM the staff, I Am the rod; BE STILL AND KNOW I AM GOD

title: I sing a song of the saints of God
title2: I sing a song of the saints of God,
lyrics:
Patient and brave and true,
 who toiled and fought and lived and died for the Lord they loved and knew.
 And one was a doctor, and one was a queen, and one was a shepherdess on the
 green:
 They were all of them saints of God, and I mean,
 God helping, to be one too.
 They loved their Lord so dear, so dear, and His love made them strong
 and they followed the right, for Jesus's sake, the whole of their good lives long
 And one was a soldier, and one was a priest, and one was slain by a fierce will beast,
 and there's not any reason - no not in the least,
 why I shouldn't be one too!
 They lived not only in ages past, there are hundreds of thousands still
 the world is bright with the joyous saints who love to do Jesus's will.
 You can meet them in the school, or in lanes, or at sea, in church, or in
 trains, or in shops, or at tea,
 for the saints of God are just folk like me, and I mean to be one too.

title: I Would Crawl All The Way
title2: I would crawl all the way
lyrics:
A long time ago there was a man
Who laid down His Life on the line
He claimed He could make the lame walk again
And give back the sight to the blind
 
Now some people loved Him
And some people wanted to take Him and put Him away
Well I wasn’t there to see what He did
But if He were right here today

I would crawl all the way to the river
I would crawl all the way to the sea
Just to watch Him walk on the water
And lay His Lovin’ Hands on me
 
A carpenter by trade but the Kingdom that He made
Was built without hammer and nail
It stands like a rock through the ages of time
Was built with a Love that never fails
 
Well I read in the Good Book that someday He’s comin’
And some say it ain’t far away
But the day that He stands on the banks of the Jordan
This sinner will be on her way
 
I would crawl all the way to the river
I would crawl all the way to the sea
Just to watch Him walk on the water
And lay His Lovin’ Hands on me

lyrics:
People say why go over there?

There's nothing like looking at You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like touching You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like a word with You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like being with You [ People say ... never apart ]

But I'd give it all away
Just for one sweet, sweet day
Yes, I'd give it all away
Just for one sweet, sweet day
And I'd walk a thousand miles
Just for one of Your smiles
Yes, I'd walk a thousand miles
Just for one of Your smiles [ People say ... never apart ]

But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like a look from You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like a touch from You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like a word with You
But I'll tell you what
There's nothing like being with You [ People say ... never apart ]

But, there's nothing so high
As looking in Your sweet, sweet eyes
Yes, there's nothing so high
As looking in Your sweet, sweet eyes

And all eyes fill with tears
Every time You are near
And all hearts lose fear
Whenever You're here [ People say ... never apart ]

[ But I'd give it all away ... Your smiles ]

title: I, the Lord of sea and sky
title2: I, the Lord of sea and sky
lyrics:
I have heard My people cry
All who dwell in dark and sin
My hand will save
I who made the stars of night
I will make their darkness bright
Who will bear My light to them?
Whom shall I send?

(Chorus)
Here I am Lord, It is I, Lord
I have heard You calling in the night
I will go Lord, if You lead me
I will hold Your people in my heart

I, the Lord of snow and rain
I have borne my people's pain
I have wept for love of them
They turn away
I will break their hearts of stone
Give them hearts for love alone
I will speak My word to them
Whom shall I send?

(Chorus)
I, the Lord of wind and flame
I will tend the poor and lame
I will set a feast for them
My hand will save
Finest bread I will provide
Till their hearts be satisfied
I will give My life to them
Whom shall I send?

title: If at first you don't succeed
If they say our eyes are beautiful
title2: If they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord
lyrics:

 It's because, they are looking at You.

 So when they say our eyes are beautiful, Lord

Lord Sai has freed me, I am one.
I am all joy, all peace, all light, before the beginning, past the end,

 Feel His light enfolding you.
 Sense His joy, it's glowing everywhere
 Filling you through and through.
 Sense His love, it's shining in your heart
 And know that love is you.

title: In the garden of my heart
title2: In the garden of my heart there I plant the seeds of love
lyrics:
In the garden of my heart there I wait till You come
O my Lord sweet Lord come to me dear Lord
O my Lord hear my prayer sweet Lord come to me

title: In The Heart Of My Heart
title2: In The Heart Of My Heart Is A Lovely Melody
lyrics:
Deep In My Soul Is A Prayer Just For Thee
Heart Of My Heart, Deep In My Soul
My Lord, A Prayer For Thee
Deep In My Soul Is A Song Just For Thee
Come, O My Lord, O My Lord, Come To Me
Heart Of Heart, Deep In My Soul
My Lord, A Song For Thee
The Songs That I Sing Are For All And For Thee
But Deep In My Heart, A Divine Melody
A Song Just For You, My Lord, Just For You
A Song You Will Sing To Me
Baba You Will Sing To Me

title: In The Lap Of The Lord
title2: There I lay ... (there I lay) in the lap of the Lord
lyrics:
For some days ... (for some days) in the lap of the Lord
And I prayed ... (and I prayed) in the lap of the Lord
Just to stay ... (just to stay) in the lap of the Lord
 
He looked through me
Freeing something deep within
His eyes knew me
And of the changes about to begin.
 
What to say ... (what to say) in the lap of the Lord
Just obey ... (just obey) in the lap of the Lord
Never stray ... (never stray) from the lap of the Lord
Find your way... (find your way) in the lap of the Lord
 
His love drew me
Back into the heart of the flame
He showed to me
How my sweet life would never be the same.
 
[ There I lay ... ]

title: In the morning of my life
title2: In the morning of my life
lyrics:
I shall look to thee sunrise
 At a moment in my life When the day is new
 And the blessing I shall ask
 Is that God will grant me
 To be brave, and strong, and true
 And to fill the world with Love my whole life through
 And to fill the world with Love (2X)
 And to fill the world with Love my whole life through
 In the evening of my life
 I shall look to the sunset
 At a moment in my life
 When the night is due
 And the question I shall ask
 Only God can answer
 Was I brave, strong, and true?
 Did I fill the world with Love my whole life through?
 Did I fill the world with Love? (5X)
 Did I fill the world with Love my whole life through?

title: In the morning, I call your name
title2: In the morning, in the morning, I call your name, O my Lord
lyrics:
I pray, O dear Lord, please guard and guide me all through the day, O my Lord
 I will love my Mother, Father, Teacher and You, O my Lord
 For I know you'll guard and guide me, all through my life, O my Lord
 I tell the truth and do what's right, Lord with peace and love in my heart
 And I know if I love and serve all, I'll win a place in your heart

title: In the Name of the Lord we sing praises
title2: In the Name of the Lord we sing praises
lyrics:
Loving, almighty, and universal
 In the name of the Lord we sing praises (1X)
 Praising all creation and awe and wonder
 Feeling His presence everywhere
 He is truth and joy
 He is peace and love

title: In the ocean’s rolling waves
lyrics:
Hear Him calling to you
 In the golden leaves of fall
 See Him beckoning to you
 Hey Ram (Hey Ram)
 Bhagavaan (Bhagavaan)
 Sathya Sai Bhagavaan, Sai Krishna Bhagavaan
 Can't you hear Him calling to you (1X)
 Can't you see Him beckoning to you (2X)
 Don't you know that He is you (3X)
 When a cool breeze brushes your face
 Feel Him calling to You
 In the sweet smell of fresh rain
 Sense Him beckoning to you
 When tears are in your eyes
 Can't you hear Him crying for you
 When happiness enters your heart
 Can't you hear Him laughing for you

title: In the realm
title2: In the realm where hearts sing with joy,
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba, our guiding light, 
Your presence transcends, divine and pure,
Channeling psychic strengths so sure.

Across East African lands, Your love does spread,
Shielding us from fears, strange diseases dread.
In gratitude, we raise our voice, 
For gifts of gold and treasures choice.

Oh Baba, Your blessings endless flow, 
In every prayer, in every glow, 
Forever in our hearts, You stay, 
Leading us on the righteous way.

In whispers soft or chants profound, 
Your wisdom echoes all around.
With faith, we walk, with love we pray, 
Sathya Sai Baba, our guiding ray.

In moments dark, in times of need, 
Your grace uplifts us, indeed.
Oh Baba, eternally we sing,
Of the peace Your teachings bring.

Divine healer, guardian true, 
In our hearts, we honor You.
For in Your presence, we find solace
Sathya Sai Baba, forever we declare

title: In The Sound Of Silence
title2: In The Sound Of Silence Is The Voice Of God
lyrics:
In The Laugter Of Children Is The Voice Of God
In The Song Of Prayer Are The Sounds Of God
Listen Well And Hear The Sounds Of God
There Are Those Who See But Not The Signs Of God
See The Work Of Man, Not The Work Of God
Look Around And Recognize The Lord
The Beauty Of Nature Is The Work Of God
There Are Those Who Hear But Not The Voice Of God
Hear The Sounds Of Man, Not The Sounds Of God
Listen Well And Hear The Voice Of God
The Sounds Of Nature Are The Songs Of God

title: In the stillness of the morning
title2: In the stillness of the morning, I listen for Your call, Bhagawan
lyrics:
Your touch upon my shoulder, Your presence in my soul, Sai
But when I turn to greet you, no other do I see, Bhagawan
For all my endless searching, I am the one I seek, Bhagawan

title: In the sunrise
lyrics:
In the sunset (in the sunset)
The spirit is calling me, calling me
In the star light (in the star light)
In the moonshine (in the moonshine)
The spirit is calling me, ooohh

Beloved! (Beloved!), I love you! (I love you!)
Forever! (Forever!), Embrace me! (Embrace me!)
Beloved! (Beloved!), You love me! (You love me!)
Forever! (Forever!), Caring for me! (Caring for me!)

In the wind song (in the wind song)
In the ocean (in the ocean)
The spirit is calling me, calling me
In the mountains (in the mountains)
In the meadows (in the meadows)
The spirit is calling me, ooohh

Beloved! (Beloved!), I love you! (I love you!)
Forever! (Forever!), Embrace me! (Embrace me!)
Beloved! (Beloved!), You love me! (You love me!)
Forever! (Forever!), Caring for me! (Caring for me!)

In the cities (in the cities)
In the people (in the people)
The spirit is calling me, calling me
In their gestures (in their gestures)
In their faces (in their faces)
The spirit is calling me, ooohh

Beloved! (Beloved!), I love you! (I love you!)
Forever! (Forever!), Embrace me! (Embrace me!)
Beloved! (Beloved!), You love me! (You love me!)
Forever! (Forever!), Caring for me! (Caring for me!)

The spirit is calling me, calling me (x3)

title: In the sunshine
title2: In the sunshine, or the shadow,
lyrics:
In the bright morning light of your life
Even when you see only moonlight, 
Know that God is there by your side

(chorus)
God is there by your side
God is there by your side
In your life when you see only moonlight, 
Know that God is there by your side


You never know night without day
You never know joy without pain
So in your life when you see only moonlight, 
Know that God is there by your side.
(chorus)

title: In Times Like This
title2: In times like this, I remember you
lyrics:
And the way our music flowed
And the peace we shared together
And the seeds of love we sowed.
 
In times like this I remember you
And the way you called my name
Your love has touched me deep inside
I will never be the same.
 
In times like this I remember you
With the angels gathered round
As we sang our Lord's praises
And heard their heavenly sound.
 
In times like this I remember you
In times like this I know
That the love we shared and gave to God
In time will surely grow,
In time will surely grow,
In time will surely grow.

title: Indu Vadana Yadu Nandana
lyrics:
Eshwaramba Priya Nandana [ Indu Vadana Yadu ... ]
Mandara Giridhara Hey Madhava
Mangala Charitha Sayeeshwara
meaning: Chant the divine name of Lord Krishna, the one who has the face like that of the moon, the one who belongs to the Yadu Dynasty and the one who lifted the Mandara mountain. Chant the name of Lord Sai, the lovely son of Mother Eshwaramba and the one who has an impeccable history.

title: Induvadanadhara Indradri Priyakara
lyrics:
Chandrakaladhara Hey Shiva Shankara
Lalita Manohara Laya Pada Mrudukara
Hey Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
Shiva Sai Shankara Pranamamyaham
meaning: Shankara has the face that of the Moon, dear to Lord Indra, bears the crescent Moon on His Head. My prostrations are to that Sai Shankara whose feet are soft and has a charming disposition.

title: Indweller Of My Heart Oh Lord
title2: Indweller Of My Heart, Oh Lord, Sai Baba
lyrics:
Redeemer Of Fallen, Salvation Of Trodden [ Indweller Of ... ]
Hallowed Be Thy Name, Glorious Be Thy Fame
Take Me, Oh Lord, Through The Life Into Your Realm
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Lets All Rejoice, Sing Sai Ram

title: Inochi ni Ikiyou, Chichi Naru
title2: Inochi ni Ikiyou, Chichi Naru Kami no Naka
lyrics:
Eien no Ai to Hikari ni Mitasarete
Inochi ni Kaerou Omoi Dashite Goran
Uchi Naru Koe ni Kokoro Yasuragite
Uchuu wa Hitotsu Subete wa Kami nari
Inochi wa Hitotsu Subete wa Kami nari
Shinri wa Hitotsu Subete wa Kami nari
Kokoro wa Hitotsu Subete wa Kami nari
meaning: Let us live our lives within God. Fill your lives eternally with love and light. Let us live our lives with these thoughts. Let your heart be comforted by this voice inside of us. The universe is one, everything is God. All life is one, everything is God. Truth is one, everything is God. Heart is one, everything is God.

title: Inori ni Kotaete Anata wa
title2: Inori ni Kotaete Anata wa Korareta
lyrics:
Subete no Yami wo Hikari de Terashi
Michibiku tame ni
Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Iesu, Buddha
Ai no Kami
Shirdi Sathya Sai Prema Baba
Warera no Michi
meaning: Lord, You have answered my prayers and come to me. You illuminate all darkness and guide us. God of Love, You are Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Jesus, Buddha, Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai and Prema Sai Baba.

title: Into His Presence
title2: Into His Presence, would I enter now
lyrics:
For I am surrounded by the Love of God
 Let me be still, and listen to the Truth
 Let every voice but God's be stilled in me
 Let me remember, I am one with God
 Peace to my brother, Who is one with me
 Let me remember, what my purpose is
 Let all the world, be blessed with peace through me

title: Into Your hands I commit my spirit
title2: Into Your hands I commit my spirit
lyrics:
Into Your arms, I command my soul
 For you are my rock, Jehovah provider
 You are my rock, El-Shaddai, my hiding place.

title: Iraiva Iraiva Iraiva Nee Va
lyrics:
Bhagavaan Bhagavaan Bhagavaan Aa Ja (2X)
 Devuda Devuda Devuda Nadharira (2X)
 O My Lord O My Lord O My Lord Come to Me (2X)

title: Is there life on this earth, without You
title2: Is there life on this earth, without You, O my Lord?
lyrics:
Will man know the meaning of Love, without you, O my Lord?
 Will we walk hand in hand, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Will the stars shine in the sky, without You, O my Lord?
 Will the flowers bloom on earth, without You, O my Lord?
 Will the blazing sun be there, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Can we reach for the stars, without You, O my Lord?
 Can we realize our dreams, without You, O my Lord?
 Can we see the glory of Life, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.
 Will my life be so full, without You, O my Lord?
 Will I know what is bliss, without You, O my Lord?
 Will realize the Lord, without You, O my Lord?
 No, my Lord, without You, not without You.

title: Isha Manohari Gowri
lyrics:
Kailasadhipa Ranjani Gowri
Uma Maheshwari Mangala Gowri
Sai Janani Kedara Gowri
meaning: Mother Gowri enchants and delights Lord Shiva, Lord of Kailas. She is Mother Uma, and Mother Sai of Kedara mountain, who grants auspiciousness.

title: It Is You
title2: It is You who is in our lonely heart
lyrics:
Stay with us, oh Sai our only love
 
Without You our life would fall apart
Please guide us, oh Sai our only love
 
All our wrongs in life
And the ones in the past as well
Please forgive us Lord
In the dark we know more will dwell
You are alive in us
All our joys and sorrows too
You’re in our hearts please always love us [ It is You ... ]

Sai our only love
Sai our only love
alt_lyrics:
It is You who’ll save my lonely heart
Stay with me, Oh Sai, my only love
Without You my life will fall apart
Don’t leave me, Oh Sai, my only love

All my wrongs in life and the ones in the past as well
Please forgive, Oh Lord, in the dark I no more will dwell
You are light in me, all the joys and sorrows too
Keep me in Your heart and make me love You (2x)

title: It only takes a little love
title2: It only takes a little love to warm an aching heart
lyrics:
To lift a broken spirit, to take another's part
 It only takes a little trust, a stranger to be, friend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 It only takes a little love to smile a friendly smile,
 To touch a grieving shoulder, to walk a second mile.
 It only takes a little time, a kindness to extend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 He taught us all about it, so many years ago,
 For Love was always with Him wherever He would go.
 He calls us now to follow, to take the time to care
 Through all the gentle loving things we share.
 Because it only takes a little love to calm another's fear,
 To bear another's burden, to weep another's tear.
 It only takes a little word to cheer a lonely friend,
 But oh, it makes a difference in the end.
 O, yes, it makes a world of difference in the end.

title: Itoshii Guru Sai Baba
lyrics:
Anata ni Kokoro wo Yudane
Kagayaku Ai ni Tsutsumareru
Subete wo Michibiku Kamisama
Anata no Koe ga Kikoeru Toki, Watashi wa Shiawase ni Naru
Anata no Sugata ga Mieru Toki, Watashi wa Heian ni Naru
meaning: My beloved Guru Sai Baba, I entrust my heart to You for You fill it with Your glowing love and guide everything. When I can hear Your voice, I become happy. When I can see Your form, I am at peace.

title: Itoshiki Guru yo Ai no
title2: Itoshiki Guru yo Ai no Kamisama
lyrics:
Michibiki tamae Parthi no Kamisama
O Sai Baba, O Sai Baba, Anata he Inorimasu
Kami no Ai wo Watashi no Kokoro ni
Sazuke tamae Sathya Sai Baba
meaning: Beloved Lord Sathya Sai Baba, our Divine Preceptor at Parthi, we pray to You to guide our hearts with Your divine love.

title: Itoshiki Haha, Ai no Kamisama
lyrics:
Kurushimi Uke Tomeru Subete no Haha
Kagayaku Hikari no Naka, Watashi no Te wo Hiku
Kono Yo wo Idaki Ai de Sodateru Haha
meaning: Loving Mother of all, You take away our pain and shine Your light within us. You hold this world and guide it through love.

title: Its A Beautiful Day In Puttaparthi
title2: Its A Beautiful Day In Puttaparthi
lyrics:
Lovely Day Holy Day Darshan Day [ Its A ... ]
All Our Prayers Have Been Answered
All Our Fears Go Away
Baba's Love Is Flowing Around Us
Thank You Swami For This Day [ Its A ... ]
Every Heart Is Yearning For Darshan
Every Heart Is Full Of Praise
Baba's Love Is Flowing Around Us
He Is Serving Night And Day

title: Its A Gift To Be Simple
title2: Its A Gift To Be Simple,Tis A Gift To Be Free
lyrics:
Tis A Gift To Know Ones Own Divinity
And When Our Hearts Are Filled By The Bright Shining Sun
We Will See Gods Light Within Everyone

title: Its A Happy Day
title2: Its A Happy Happy Happy Day
lyrics:
Its A Holy Holy Holy Day
Its A Beautiful Beautiful Day
Happy Birthday Sai Baba Happy Birthday Sai Baba
Listen To The Angels Singing In The Sky
Listen To The Ocean Waves Dancing With Joy
Listen To The Birds Singing In The Trees (2)
All Of Them Singing Happy Birthday Dear Swami
Happy Birthday Dear Swami

title: Its The Most Wonderful Time Of The Year
title2: It's the most wonderful time of the year
lyrics:
With the kids jingle belling
And everyone telling you "Be of good cheer"
It's the most wonderful time of the year

It's the hap-happiest season of all
With those holiday greetings and gay happy meetings
When friends come to call.
It's the hap - happiest season of all (higher note)

There'll be parties for hosting
Marshmallows for toasting
And caroling out in the snow
There'll be scary ghost stories
And tales of the glories of Christmases long, long ago

It’s the most wonderful time of the year
There’ll be much mistletoeing 
And hearts will be glowing 
When loved ones are near
It’s the most wonderful time of the year (higher note)

There’ll be parties for hosting
Marshmallow for toasting
And caroling out in the snow
There’ll be scary ghost stories 
And tales of the glories of
Christmases long, long ago

It's the most wonderful time of the year
There'll be much mistletoeing 
And hearts will be glowing 
When loved ones are near

It's the most wonderful time
It's the most wonderful time
It's the most wonderful time ... of the year!

title: Its Your Maya Surrounding Me
lyrics:
Gurudeva Sai Deva [ Its Your Maya ... ]
Open My Eyes So I May See [ Its Your ... ]
Surrender My Lord, At Your Feet
My Every Single Thought Word And Deed
Lift Your Maya Surrounding Me (2)
Open My Eyes So I May See
My True Identity
Sai, I Am But One With Thee.

title: Itsuka Dokoka de Atta Omoi
title2: Itsuka Dokoka de Atta Omoi, Tooi Kanata no Natsukashii Omoi
lyrics:
Yasashii Omoi ni Tsutsumareta Toki, Ookina Ookina Anata no Ai wo Shiru
Kamisama, Kamisama, Kamisama, Kite Kudasai Kamisama
Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba, We Love You Sai Baba
meaning: I have these thoughts all the time no matter where I go, distant, beloved thoughts. These kind thoughts wrap around me all the time, these thoughts of Your divine love. O Lord, please come to us. Sai Baba, we love You.

title: Itsuka Dokokade Atta Omoi
lyrics:
Tooi Kanatano Natsukashii Omoi
 Yasashii Omoini Tsutsumaretatoki
 Ookina Ookina Anatano Aioshiru
 Kamisama Kamisama Kamisama Kitekudasai Kamisama

title: Itsukushimi Fukaki Sai
lyrics:
Osanago no Te wo Hiku youni
Warera wo Kami heto Michibiku
Anata no Ai ga Subete wo Hitotsu ni
Hikari he Kaeru
Aisuru Sai Toutoki Guru yo
meaning: Precious Lord Sai, whose love and affection is ever deep, You hold our young (infant-like) hands and guide us to Your light.

title: Itsumo Kokoro ni Ukaberu Anata
title2: Itsumo Kokoro ni Ukaberu Anata no Mizugata
lyrics:
Watashi wo Heian e Michibiku Anata no Namae
Sai Baba Sai Baba Anata e no Omoi
Sai Baba Sai Baba Anata e no Uta
Sai Baba Sai Baba Anata e no Inori
Anata ni Sasageru Inori
Ai to Hikari wo Motte Ikite yo
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are always dwelling in my heart with Your beautiful form. You peacefully guide us with Your beautiful name. Sai Baba, I love You. Sai Baba, I sing to You. Sai Baba, I pray to You. I devote myself to You in prayer. I will live with love and light.

title: It’s in every one of us to be wise
title2: It's in every one of us to be wise
lyrics:
Find your heart, open up both your eyes
 We can all know everything without ever asking why
 It's in every one of us by and by
 When your heart is full of love, it's a simple thing to do
 Seek another heart and make it happy too
 Joy we share with others is joy that's multiplied
 It would be a perfect life if no one is left outside
 Love is in every one of us to share with all
 Cut ego out, stand up strong and tall
 We all have so much to give without needing reasons why
 Love's in every one of us, let's all try.

title: It’s who you really are
lyrics:
Something’s watching you, something’s loving you
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
It was there at your birth, it was there as you grew
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
It was there when you laughed, it was there when you cried
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
Something’s giving you joy, something’s giving peace
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
It’s more solid than steel and it’s lighter than air
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
Something gives life to all, something is everything
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
It’s smaller than the smallest, it’s beyond everywhere
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
Something contains the earth, something holds the universe
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
Something’s breathing your breath, something beats your heart
It’s not far, it’s who you really are
He’s not far, He’s the Sai Avatar
He’s not far, He’s who you really are

title: Ivdu Hashem B'Simcha
lyrics:
Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai
Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai (2)
Come and Serve the Holy one with joy (3)
Come serve the Holy one with joy
Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai
Yai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai Dai (2)

title: I’ve Got The Joy Of Sai
title2: I've Got The Joy Of Sai, Joy Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
lyrics:
... Down In My Heart, Down In My Heart
I've Got The Joy Of Sai, Joy Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart To Stay
I've Got The Love Of Sai, Love Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart, Down In My Heart
I've Got The Love Of Sai, Love Of Sai, Down In My Heart, ...
... Down In My Heart To Stay
And I'm So Happy, So Very Happy
...I've Got The Love Of Baba In My Heart

title: Jagad Dhrata Vishwa Vidhata
lyrics:
Hey Sukha Shanthi Niketana Hey
Prem Ke Sindho Din Ke Bandho
Dukha Daridra Vinashana Hey (2) [ Jagad Dhrata Vishwa ... ]
Nithya Akhanda Anantha Anadi
Poorana Brahma Sanathana Hey
Prana Sakha (3)
Prana Sakha Tribhuvana Paripalaka
Jeevan Ke Avalambana Hey (2)
meaning: O Lord, You are the support of all living beings and of the entire Universe. You are the abode of peace and comfort. You are an ocean of love and the care-taker of the unfortunate ones. You destroy poverty and sadness. You are eternal and the embodiment of Creation itself.

title: Jagadambe Amba Bhavani
lyrics:
Jaganmata Mangala Dayini
Jagadeeshwari Sai Janani [ Jagadambe Amba ... ]
Parameshwari Parthi Shivani
Narayani Mangala Karini
Sayeeshwari Sankata Harini
Sarveshwari Sai Janani
meaning: Bhavani, Parameshwari, Jagadeeshwari, Narayani, Jagadambe, Sarveshwari are the various names of the same Mother who confers auspiciousness, the one who removes misery who is verily Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Jagadambe Bhavani Lalita
lyrics:
Jaya Samba Sadashiva Dwaita [ Jagadambe Bhavani ... ]
Chaturanana Brahma Vanita
Jaya Vishwa Priya Sri Mata
Jaya Vishnu Priya Sai Mata
meaning: Glory to Mother Parvathi, the Mother of the Universe and the consort of Lord Shiva. She is verily Mother Sai who is adored by Brahma, Vishnu, and the entire Universe.

title: Jagadambe Bhavani Ma
title2: Jagadambe Bhavani Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma
lyrics:
Hey Tribhuvana Palini Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma
Hey Karuna Sagari Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma
Hey Kali Kapalini Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma
Hey Karuna Sagari Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma
meaning: Victory to the Divine Mother Bhavani, the Goddess and protector of the three worlds. Glory to the most compassionate Mother also known as Mother Kali.

title: Jagadambe Devi Bhavani
lyrics:
Jaganmatey Shakthi Durge (2) [ Jagadambe ... ]
Kumara Gananathamba Kalyani Shyamalamba
Janani Durge Varadey Mata
(Amba) Uma Maheshwari Kalavathi [ Jaganmatey ... ]
meaning: Bhavani or Durga is the Goddess and Mother of the entire Universe. Chant the various names of Mother Goddess, Janani, Uma Maheshwari, Sharada, Kalyani, Shyamala, Durga and Kalavathi who confer boons to the devotees.

title: Jagadambige Jaya Jagadeeshwari
lyrics:
Taye Parashakthi Parameshwari [ Jagadambige Jaya ... ]
Maye Maha Sai Maheshwari
Niye Vinai Tirkkum Vishweshwari
Unaye Sharanadainden Karunakari
Arulvaye Ananda Lahari Gowri
meaning: Glory be to the Mother of the Universe, Mother of Lord Ganesh and Subrahmanya; Glory to the Mother worshipped as Uma, Durga, Shakti and the consort of Lord Shiva. O Lord Sai, the Mother of all, grant us as our wishes.

title: Jagadashraya Sri Raghu Rama
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Sita Rama [ Jagadashraya Sri ... ]
Parama Pavana Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Shata Koti Pranama
Sai Rama Koti Pranama
Sharanam Sharanam Atma Rama
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, the sustainer of the entire Universe, whose consort is Mother Sita and who has come to uplift the entire world. Reciting the Lord's name helps cross the vicious cycle of birth and death. We surrender ourselves at Your Lotus feet with countless prostrations, O Lord Sai Rama, the indweller of our Heart.

title: Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Ho
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Jaya Jaya Ho [ Jagadeesha Harey ... ]
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Antaryami Buddha Mahavir
Zohrashtra Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Shanthi Nivasa Sathya Sai Deva (Pra)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho (2)
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai, the Lord and Redeemer of the Universe. Lord Sathya Sai is the very embodiment of Allah, Jesus Christ, Nanak, Buddha, Mahavira and Zohrashtra. Sai is the indweller and embodies Supreme Peace.

title: Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Shiva Shambho Hara Shambho [ Jagadeesha Harey ... ]
Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
Jaya Shirdeesha Shankara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Shiva Sai Shambho [ Shiva Shambho ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Sovereign Lord of the Universe who bestows auspiciousness. Victory to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Jagadeesha Harey Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Samba Shiva Hara Sai Shiva
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya Haari
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Shambho [ Samba Shiva ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of the Universe whose consort is Amba. He removes the fear of the cycle of Birth and Death. Lord Shiva is the one who destroyed the three cities created by the demons. He has incarnated on this earth as Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Jagadeeshwara Paahi Parameshwara Shiva Gangadhari
lyrics:
Neelakanta Shiva Shambho Murari
Chandramouli Charmambaradhari
Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
Shambho Shankara Parthi Vihari
meaning: Protect us O Lord Shiva, the Sovereign Lord of the Universe. You hold the river Ganges in Your matted locks and are blue-throated. You wear the Crescent moon on Your head and the skin of the tiger round your body (which indicates the sublimation of animal qualities). You are verily Lord Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jagadeeshwari Daya Karo Ma
lyrics:
Shiva Shankari Krupa Karo Ma
Sayeeshwari Raksha Karo Ma
Partheeshwari Bhalaa Karo Ma [ Shiva Shankari ... ]
meaning: Mercy on us, O Mother Goddess of the Universe, may Your benedictions be upon us, O Shankari, consort of Lord Shiva, shower Your blessings and protect us O Sayeeshwari, the Goddess of Parthi.

title: Jagadeeshwari Jaya Mata Bhavani
lyrics:
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwari [ Jagadeeshwari Jaya ... ]
Hey Shiva Shankari Triloka Palini
Sharanagatha Paripalini Mata
meaning: Mother Bhavani is the Goddess of the entire universe. She sustains the three worlds, compassionate and beautiful. She is the consort of Lord Shiva and takes complete care of all who surrender to Her.

title: Jagadeeshwari Parameshwari
lyrics:
Annapoorneshwari Sai Lokeshwari
Bhakthoddharini Sayeeshwari [ Jagadeeshwari Parameshwari ... ]
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Ma
Lalita Gayathri Kamakshi Ma
Annapoorneshwari Sai Lokeshwari
Bhakthoddharini Sayeeshwari
meaning: Sing the glory to Mother Sai who is the Supreme Mother residing at Puttaparthi. She is none other than Mother Annapoorna and the Mother of the Universe who uplifts Her devotees. She is verily Mothers Parvathi, Lakshmi, Saraswathi, Lalita, Gayathri and Kamakshi (Parvathi).

title: Jagadodhara Gangadhara
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Sayeeshwara
Baraso Hum Par Prem Ki Dhaara
Sakala Jagat Mey Naam Tumhara
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Sahara
meaning: O Lord Sai, the uplifter of the entire world, shower us with Your unceasing flow of love. O Lord Sai, You are known all over the world, You are the support and strength of all devotees.

title: Jagadodhara Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Murali Lola Hrudaya Vihara [ Jagadodhara ... ]
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Madana Gopala (2) [ Jaya Brindavana ... ]
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Lord Krishna), the Lord of the universe and the indweller of hearts. Victory to the one who is dark in complexion and who entices everyone with His Flute playing. Glory to Lord Gopala who moves about in Brindavan - who is verily Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

title: Jagadodharaka Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Paramodhara Pattabhi Rama
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Rajeeva Nayana Ranjana Rama
Raja Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravana Mardhana Rakshaka Rama
Moksha Pradayaka Mohana Rama
Maruti Poojita Manobhi Rama
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the Supreme uplifter of the world, consort of Mother Janaki and the crowned King of Ayodhya. Lord Rama is served by His younger brother Lakshmana. Glory to the handsome and lotus eyed Lord Rama. He is the crown jewel of the Solar dynasty who vanquished the evil Ravana. Lord Rama who has a pleasing personality, is worshipped by Maruti. Glory to the Lord who is the guardian of His devotees and who grants Liberation.

title: Jagadodharini Ma
lyrics:
Vishwa Vilasini Ma
Sthira Sukha Dayini Ma
Durgati Nashini Ma [ Jagadodharini Ma, Vishwa ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwari Parvathi Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bhairavi Ma
Sambhavi Ma Gowri Ma
Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Jaya Partheeshwari Parvathi Ma
meaning: O Divine Mother, You are the nourisher and charmer of the Universe. You are the provider of lasting happiness and the destroyer of misfortune. You are known by several names, Parvathi, Bhairavi, Sambhavi, Gowri, Parameshwari and Bhuvaneshwari and presently You have incarnated as Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Jagadodharini Mata Durga Jagadodharini Ma
lyrics:
Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Jago Jago Ma Janani
Hey Gowri Devi Rana Chandi Devi
Hey Shiva Ramana Jago Ma (2)
Jago Jagadodharini Ma
meaning: Oh Universal Mother Durga! Awaken us from the slumber of ignorance. You are Mother Gowri and the valiant Chandi devi. Awaken us to the inherent Atmic reality, the charmer of Lord Shiva.

title: Jagadodharini Mata Narayani Durga
lyrics:
Durgati Nashini Dukha Vinashini Durga
Jaya Mahishasura Durga
Abhaya Pradayini Shanthi Pradayini Durga
Jaya Durga Devi Durga Mata Durga
meaning: Salutations to Mother Durga, remover of misfortunes and sorrow, destroyer of the demon Mahishasura. She protects and bestows peace.

title: Jagamey Sarvam Vishnu Mayam
lyrics:
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Mayam (2) [ Jagamey ... ]
Omkara Naada Mayam
Om Shiva Shakthi Mayam
Prema Mayam Sai Naama Mayam
Pranavakaara Brahma Mayam
meaning: Lord Vishnu, whose incarnation is our sacred preceptor Sathya Sai, is the Supreme Principle from whom the Primordial sound Om originates and pervades the entire Universe. The Universe is the manifestation of Matter and Energy, of Supreme Love and the name of Sai.

title: Jaganmata Jaganmata
lyrics:
Devi Bhavani Hey Sai Mata [ Jaganmata Jaganmata ]
Mata Maheshwari Girija Mata
Parthi Pureeshwari Parama Dayakari
Devi Bhavani Jai Sai Mata
meaning: The Universal Mother is known by several names as Devi Bhavani, Maheshwari and Girija. She is the extremely compassionate Mother Sai who dwells at Parthi.

title: Jaganmatey Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Amba Shiva Shankari 
Sri Chakra Vasini Shiva Shakthi Roopini
Kamakshi Karuna Katakshi
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwari
Jagadeeshwari Amba Shiva (Sai) Shankari
meaning: Victory to the Divine Mother Shankari (Parvathi), the consort of Shiva, who protects the entire Universe. The manifestation of Shakthi (cosmic energy), she is the resident of the Sri Chakra (divine symbol). With Her beautiful lotus-shaped eyes, Her glance itself showers compassion on Her devotees.

title: Jaganmatey Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Devi Bhavani
Devi Saraswathi Durga Lakshmi
Mahishasura Samhaarini Mata
meaning: Victory to the Divine Mother who nourishes the entire Universe. You are verily Mother Saraswathi, Durga and Lakshmi and the one who removed demon Mahishasura from the face of the Earth.

title: Jagat Guru Sadguru Sai Guru
title2: Jagat Guru Sadguru Sai Guru Deva
lyrics:
Sarva Janashraya Mama Guru Deva [ Jagat Guru ... ]
Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha Deva
Pranamamyaham Koti Pranamamyaham (2)
meaning: Our Sacred and Universal Preceptor Sai is adored by everyone. Countless prostrations to Lord Sayeesha the Eternal charioteer.

title: Jagat Janani Jagadamba Jagadamba Jagadamba
title2: Jagat Janani Jagadamba Jagadamba Jagadamba Bhavani
lyrics:
Mahishasura Mardhini Kalyani
Shumbha Nishumbha Prana Haarini [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Sharada Sangeeta Vadini
Nava Durge Nava Roopa Dharini
Amba Bhavani Jagadamba Bhavani (2)
meaning: Mother Bhavani is the Universal Mother who vanquished the demon Mahishasura as well as demons Shumbha and Nishumbha to promote the welfare of the world. Mother Sharada plays sublime notes on Her Veena and Mother Durga assumes nine different forms. Glory to the Divine Mother.

title: Jagat Janani Jagadambe Bhavani
lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Sai Narayani [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Tribhuvana Dharini Shakthi Svarupini
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Narayani
meaning: Glory to the supreme Mother Sai, the Mother of Creation who bestows protection, is the embodiment of the Ultimate energy, and the ruler of three words.

title: Jagat Janani Ma Ambe Bhavani
lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Harini Brahma Swaroopini [ Jagat Janani ... ]
Jagadambe Ananda Bhairavi
Sai Mata Dukha Nivarini
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai, Mother of the Universe who destroys the endless fears and sorrows of worldly existence and who is the embodiment of creation.

title: Jagat Janani Shiva Sai Shankari
lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Gaana Vinodini
Mata Bhavani Ma (Jaya Ma)
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Kaali Kapalini Ma (Jaya Ma)
meaning: Glory be to the Mother of the Universe Shankari, Parvathi, Bhavani, the one who confers freedom from fear, one who is delighted by music and the one wearing a garland of skulls.

title: Jagat Palana Jaganmohana
lyrics:
Sundara Sai Gopalana
Munijana Sevitha Madhusudhana [ Jagat Palana ... ]
Keshava Govinda Janardhana
Sridhara Madhava Damodara
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Sri Sai Krishna Narayana (2) [ Munijana Sevitha ... ]
meaning: Sing the various names of the Lord Krishna, Gopala, Keshava, Govinda, Janardhana, Sridhara, Madhava, Damodara, Achyutha, Anantha, Narayana, and Madhusudhana. He is the nourisher and captivator of the Universe, the one who is handsome and served by saints, who has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Jagata Uddharana Parthi Viharana
lyrics:
Tum Ho Mangala Dham (Prabhu)
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Paapa Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram [ (Baba) Tum Ho ... ]
Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the benefactor of the entire Universe, repository of all virtues. Victory be to Thee, the one with beautiful eyes, destroyer of sins and the vicious cycle of birth and death and the one who dwells at Parthi.

title: Jagatpathey Hari Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Mathuradhipathey Krishna Gopala
Madhura Madhura Hey Gaana Vilola
Jagadodhara Sai Nandalala
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the Lord and sustainer of the Universe. Victory to Lord Krishna, the King of Mathura, the patron of sweet music and the son of Nanda. Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Jago Jago Giridhari Gopala
lyrics:
Jago Jago Hey Gokula Bala
Darshan Deejo Deena Dayala
Prabhu Paramatma Tribhuvana Pala
Sai Narayana Natavara Lala
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), grant us with the vision of Your Form. O Lord, awaken us from the slumber of Ignorance. You are the one who held the Govardhana mountain high, the one who is the Lord of the three worlds, the one who is an absolute pretender who moved about in Gokula and the one who is the refuge of the hapless.

title: Jago Jago Jago Shankara
lyrics:
Jago Jago Jago Sayeeshwara [ Jago Jago ... ]
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Paramesha
Hey Tripurari Jaya Partheesha
Gangadhara Shankara
Gowri Vara Shankara
Bala Gangadhara Shankara
Sayeeshwara Shankara (Sathya)
meaning: Awake us to the inner reality, O bestower of auspiciousness, the supreme Lord who has held the vicious poison in His throat. Lord Shankara (Shiva), the one who holds the sacred Ganges in His matted locks, the consort of Mother Gowri, is the same as Lord Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jago Jago Ma Shankari Ma
lyrics:
Shankari Ma Abhayankari Ma [ Jago Jago ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Parvathi Ma
Devi Daya Karo Shiva Ramana
Janani Triloka Palini
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma
meaning: Oh Mother Shankari, wake us up to the reality of the soul, the one who assures total protection. Victory be to you Maheshwari, Bhavani, Janani, the delight of Lord Shiva and sustainer of the three worlds.

title: Jai Bolo Bhagawan
title2: Jai bolo Bhagawan, Bhagawan, Jai bolo Bhagawan.
lyrics:
You called and I have come, I have come, You called and I have come.
Age to age I incarnate, when righteousness is gone.
I've come to lead you back to God, and make your love grow strong.
Jai bolo Bhagawan, Bhagawan, Jai bolo Bhagawan.

title: Jai Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Sai Jaganmata
title2: Jai Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Sai Jaganmata
lyrics: Sai Jaganmata Maam Paahi Jaganmata (2)
meaning: Glory to Goddesses Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and Mother Sai, the Divine Mother of the Universe, O Mother Sai, please protect me.

title: Jai Durge Durgati Pariharini
lyrics:
Jai Jai Durge Jaya Bhava Bhaya Harini
Jaya Durge Janani Jaya Sai Janani
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Roopini
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
meaning: Hail Mother Durga for She absolves the misfortunes of Her devotees, releases one from the birth and death cycle. Victory be to Mother Sai who is the very manifestation of the Cardinal Values of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya
lyrics:
Jai Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya Mangala Murthy Moriya
Siddhi Vinayaka Mangala Daata
Ashta Vinayaka Mangala Dayaka Mangala Murthy Moriya
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana
Sindhura Vadana Pankaja Charana Ganapathi Bappa Moriya
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the leader of Shiva's army (Ganas), who confers and is also the personification of auspiciousness. Salutations at Thy lotus feet, O elephant-faced Lord.

title: Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai
title2: Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Deva
lyrics:
Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha Deva [ Jai Ganesh … ]
Bhakthoddharana Bhaktha Jana Poshana
Paapa Vinashana Bhaktha Samrakshana
Omkaara Pranava Sri Roopa
Parvathi Nandana Jaya Jagavandana
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the lord of Ganas who is ever auspicious, always engaged in uplifting, nourishing, redeeming and protecting devotees. He is the source of the primordial sound, Pranava. He is the darling son of Mother Parvathi and is worshipped by the whole world.

title: Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
lyrics:
Tu Hi Sab Ka Bhagya Vidhata
Tu Hi Riddhi Siddhi Daata
Tera Poojan Prathama Hamesha
Jai Ganesha Jai Ganesha
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, who confers prosperity to all and who bestows intelligence. Victory to Lord Ganesha, who is always worshipped first.

title: Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam Sri
title2: Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam Sri Ganesha Raksha Maam
lyrics:
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam
Lambodhara Gowri Sutha Jai Ganesha Paahi Maam
Mangala Kara Sankata Hara Jai Ganesha Raksha Maam [ Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh ...]
meaning: Save me Lord Ganesh, the one with a big belly and the son of Mother Gowri. Protect me O Lord Ganesh, for You destroy the plighted condition of Your devotees and confer prosperity and auspiciousness.

title: Jai Ganesha Vighna Vinashaka
lyrics:
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka
Hey Adi Poojya Gajanana
Gajanana Shubhanana
Lambodhara Paapa Nikhandana
Vighneshwara Bhava Dukha Nashana
Dukha Bhanjana Shubha Dayaka (2)
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the one who removes obstacles, destroyer of sorrows and the one who grants prosperity. The elephant-faced Lord who is offered the first prayers, has a big belly and He roots out our sins.

title: Jai Ganesha, Jai Ganesha, Jai Ganesha
title2: Jai Ganesha, Jai Ganesha, Jai Ganesha Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bless us with Your grace, lead us Sai Ganesh [ Jai Ganesha ... ]
We start the day with Your Name O Lord Ganesha
You show us the Divine Light O Lord Ganesha
Protect us forever more, loving God we adore

Protect us forever more, loving God we adore (3)

title: Jai Giridhari He Nandalal
lyrics:
Yashoda Nanda He Nandalal
Radha Pyaara He Nandalal
Nandalal Nandalal
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, Radha's love and the darling son of Nanda and Yasoda.

title: Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita
title2: Jai Hari Bol Jai Sita Ram Gopi Gopala Bhajo Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Harey Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam
Sri Raghu Nandana Sri Rama Daasharathey Jaya Raghu Rama
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Govinda Lala [ Harey Ram Ram ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Hari, Lord Rama, chant the name of Lord Gopala. Lord Rama belongs to the Raghu dynasty and is the dear son of King Dasharatha. Lord Krishna is the dear son of Nanda. He is the one who stole butter from houses of Gopis and moved about amongst the thick bushes of Brindavan.

title: Jai Hari Krishna Jai Hari
title2: Jai Hari Krishna Jai Hari Krishna Govardhana Giridhari
lyrics:
Radha Jeevana Radha Mohana
Manjula Kunja Vihari
meaning: Praise be to the Lord Krishna who raised the Govardhana Hill on His little finger, the one who is the consort and the very life of Radha, the one who moved about in the beautiful thickly grown bushes of Brindavan.

title: Jai Hari Vittala Sai Sri
title2: Jai Hari Vittala Sai Sri Hari Vittala
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Radhey Jai Hari Vittala
Baba Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala [ Govinda Gopala ]
Savari Vittala Sathya Sai Vittala [ Govinda Gopala ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Hari, Govinda, Radhey, Gopala who is none else than our dear Sathya Sai Vittala.

title: Jai Jai Bhavani Durga Mangala
title2: Jai Jai Bhavani Durga Mangala Pradayini
lyrics:
Bhakthi Mukthi Dayini Phanindra Mani Bhooshani [ Jai Jai ... ]
Kaali Mahakaali Jai Jai Shiva Shakthi Jai (2)
meaning: Glory be to Mother Bhavani, bestower of Auspiciousness, Devotion and Liberation, adorned with precious Gems. Victory to the One who is personification of Shiva and Shakthi and Mahakaali.

title: Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambe
title2: Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambe Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Ambe Bhavani Ma Sai Bhavani Ma [ Jai Jai Bhavani ... ]
Shirdi Nivasi Ma Parthi Nivasi Ma
Hrudaya Nivasi Ma Ambe (Sai) Bhavani Ma
alt_lyrics:
Jai Jai Bhavani Ma Ambe Bhavani Ma
Ambe Bhavani Ma Sai Bhavani Ma [ Jai Jai Bhavani ... ]
Shirdi Bhavani Ma Parthi Nivasi Ma
Hrudaya Nivasi Ma Ambe (Sai) Bhavani Ma
meaning: Victory to Divine Mother Parvathi who is hailed as Ambe and Bhavani and who is the indweller of the heart. She is none other than Lord Sai who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Jai Jai Durge Jai Bhavani
lyrics:
Sambhavi Shankari Jai Bhavani
Jaya Jagadambe Jaya Mangalyey [ Sambhavi ... ]
Jaya Jagat Janani Maha Kaalikey [ Sambhavi ... ]
meaning: Praise be to Mother Durga, Bhavani, the origin of auspiciousness, consort of Shankara (Shiva) and the one who is also adored as Maha Kaali.

title: Jai Jai Gopala
lyrics:
Sai Gopala Shyama Gopala [ Jai Jai ... ]
Hey Nandalala Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Brindavana Sanchara [ Sai Gopala ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala (Krishna) whose consort is Radha. Victory to the son of Nanda, to the one who is endearing to the Gopis and who moved about in Brindavan.

title: Jai Jai Guru Deva Sri
title2: Jai Jai Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva (3)
lyrics:
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Sai Mahadeva
Mata Pitha Guru Deva Sri Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Glory to the revered preceptor Mahadeva, who is the embodiment of Mother, Father, Preceptor and the Trinity Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara.

title: Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman
lyrics:
Maruti Raya Jaya Hanuman
Mahanubhava Jaya Hanuman
Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Vanara Veera Jaya Hanuman
Anjana Putra Jaya Hanuman
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanuman
Sri Rama Dootha (Bhaktha) Jaya Hanuman
meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the son of Maruti and Anjana devi. He is the one who has the authority and wisdom, one of extraordinary strength, a warrior, messenger an ardent devotee of Lord Rama.

title: Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
lyrics:
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini [ Jai Jai ... ]
Gnana Shakthi Vignanamayi
Premamayi Kalyanamayi
Shubha Dey Mata Devi Jagadamba
meaning: Glory be to Universal Mother, destroyer of sorrows and promoter of the well being of her devotees. Confer your grace upon us Oh Mother the personification of Integrated awareness, Supreme wisdom, Supreme Love and Auspiciousness.

title: Jai Jai Jai Devi Jagadamba
lyrics:
Simha Vahini Sayeeshwari Amba [ Jai Jai ... ]
Sheetalambike Devi Parashakthi
Srikari Shankari Tripura Sundari Amba Jai
Kanchi Kamakshi Madurai Meenakshi Kashi Visalakshi Karuna Katakshi
Parthi Pureeshwari Parama Dayakari Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi (3)
Sharanam Sharanam Sharanam Jagadamba
meaning: Sing the Glory of the Universal Mother riding the Lion, the Energy Principle, causing Auspiciousness, the consort of Shankara and the most beautiful of all the three worlds. Oh Mother, You dwell at Kanchi as Kamakshi, as Meenakshi in Madurai and as Vishalakshi in Kashi. Your Eyes are full of compassion. We offer ourselves at Your feet for You are verily Saraswathi (Knowledge), Wealth (Lakshmi) and Supreme Energy (Durga).

title: Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai
title2: Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka Jai Jai Vighna Vinashaka
lyrics:
Jaya Shubha Mangala Dayaka Vidya Buddhi Pradayaka
Gajavadana Gowri Nandana (2)
Gangadhara Shiva Shambho Nandana
meaning: Let us sing the glory of Lord Ganesha, the leader of Ganaas (Shiva's army) and the destroyer of all obstacles in the path of spiritual practices. Sing the glory of the bestower of all that is auspicious, intelligence and knowledge. The elephant-headed Lord is the son of Gowri and Shiva who is also known as Gangadhara.

title: Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka, Yukute
title2: Jai Jai Jai Gananayaka, Yukute wo Terasu Kami yo
lyrics:
Tataeyo Eichi no Ganesha wo Shinri e Michibiku Kamiyo
Misakaeare Kami (Sai) no Hikari ni
Eichi to Chikara no Shiva no Mikoyo
meaning: Victory to Thee O Lord Ganesha, please illuminate the path before me. Praise the all-knowing Ganesha who will us guide us to truth. Under the light of God, we will prosper. Bow to the Wisdom and Power of the Son of Shiva.

title: Jai Jai Jai Ganesha
title2: Jai Jai Jai Ganesha Ganapathi Deva
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Ganesha Vinayaka
Abreme El Camino Ganesha Para Así Llegar
A Los Pies Divinos Ganesha De Sai Avatar [ Jai Jai … ]
Llenanos De Fuerza Ganesha Para Así Lograr
La Liberacion Oh Ganesha En La Era Sai

title: Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi
title2: Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva (3)
lyrics:
Mata Parvathi Pitha Mahadeva (2) [ Jai Jai ... ]
Gajanana Gajanana
Gajanana Hey Ganapathi Deva
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord of Ganaas (Shiva's tribe) whose Mother is Parvathi and Father Mahadeva (Lord Shiva).

title: Jai Jai Jai Jai Vinayaka
lyrics:
Vinayaka Vinayaka [ Jai Jai ... ] 
Sindhura Vadana Jagat Paripala
Sankata Harana Vinayaka 
Vinayaka (Sai) Vinayaka (2)

Jai Jai Jai Jai Vinayaka (3)
Vinayaka Sai Vinayaka
meaning: Victory to the vermillion-hued Lord Ganesha who sustains the universe. Lord Ganesha removes obstacles and difficulties. Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Ganesha.

title: Jai Jai Jai Jaya Ma
title2: Jai Jai Jai Jaya Ma Sathya Sai Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Sai Maheswari Ma [ Jai Jai ... ]
Trishoola Dharini Ma Triloka Palini Ma
Sai Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Sathya Sai, the Goddess of Puttaparthi, who destroys fears of birth and death. She holds Trident and is the sustainer of the three worlds.

title: Jai Jai Jai Mana Mohana
title2: Jai Jai Jai Mana Mohana Jai Jai Jai Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Madhava Keshava
Keshava Madhava
Gopala Gopalana
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna who is known by many names: Gopala, Madhava and Keshava. He is the divine charmer who destroyed the demon Madhu.

title: Jai Jai Jai Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana [ Jai Jai ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Narayana
Sri Krishna Govinda Narayana
Narayana (Sathya) Sai Narayana
meaning: Lord Narayana has incarnated as Krishna and is known by various names such as Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, Madhava and Sai.

title: Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Partheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Shiva Shaktheeshwara
Jai Jai Jai Vaidheeshwara
Jaya Jaya Haalaahala Dhara
Jai Jai Jai Vijayee Bhava (3)
Vijayee Bhava
meaning: Victory to Lord Sathya Sai, the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi. Victory to the One who holds poison in His throat (symbol of sacrifice) and who is also known as Vaidheeswara.

title: Jai Jai Jai Yadu Vamsha Dulari
title2: Jai Jai Jai Yadu Vamsha Dulari
lyrics:
Leela Lalita Manohara Pyaari [ Jai Jai ... ]
Bhuvana Mohana Prabhu Sant Sahayaka
Gaavata Veda Purana Pukari
Nanda Ke Lal Yashoda Ke Bal
Gopi Gopal Bala Jaya Vraja Lal
meaning: Sing in praise of the dear one of Yadu lineage, Lord Krishna, whose acrobats are lovely and enticing. Saints and Sages have sung in adoration of the Lord, who is the dear child of Nanda and Yashoda and the one whose name is chanted by the pundits who chant the Vedas and scriptures.

title: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
title2: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Ambe Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Simha Vahini Trishoola Dharini Ambe Bhavani Ma
Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Sai Bhavani ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Bhavani who has the lion as Her vehicle, who holds the Trident in Her hands, who is the same as Mother Sathya Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani
title2: Jai Jai Janani Sai Janani Parthi Nivasini
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Sundari Alakh Niranjani
Jai Jai Janani Jai Shiva Ranjani
Sundari Guna Manjari Karunakari Gowri
meaning: Glory be to the Mother who is most beautiful in all the three worlds, the one who is blemishless and who is a cause of delight to Shiva. Mother Gowri is ever compassionate and the storehouse of sacred attributes.

title: Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma
title2: Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Jaya Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma
lyrics:
Vishwadharini Sai Ma Vishwa Kaarini Sai Ma [ Jai Jai Ma ... ]
Adi Shakthi Shiva Sai Ma Parashakthi Shiva Sai Ma 
Jai Jai Ma Jaya Sai Ma 
Parthi Pureeshwari Sai Ma
meaning: Sing the glory of the Divine Mother, the Supreme Goddess who embodies creation, sustenance, and destruction of the Universe. She is the primordial energy, the source of divine power. Victory to the Divine Mother, who is none other than Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara
title2: Jai Jai Prabhu Giridhari Natavara Nandalala
lyrics:
Natavara Nandalala Hey Giridhara Gopala (Hey)
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
meaning: Sing in praise of Lord Gopala (Krishna), the playful son of Nanda and the one who lifted the mountain Govardhana, to save His tribesmen.

title: Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey
lyrics:
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey
Jai Jai Ram Sai Harey [ Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram ... ]

Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey (3)
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Harey
alt_lyrics:
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
Jai Jai Ram Sai Hari [ Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram ... ]

Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari (3)
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Krishna Hari
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari (Vishnu) and Lord Sai.

title: Jai Jai Ram Sita Ram
lyrics:
Karunya Roopa Raja Ram
Ananda Ram Atmabhi Ram
Premavatara Sai Ram
Poornavatara Sai Ram

Sita Ram Jai Jai Ram, Sita Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram, Sita Ram Jai Jai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. Victory to the one who is the very embodiment of compassion, who is full of Atmic Bliss and the indweller of hearts. Victory to Lord Sai, the incarnation of Love who embodies all divine qualities.

title: Jai Jai Rama Krishna Hari
title2: Jai Jai Rama Krishna Hari (7 Times)
meaning: Chant the divine names of Rama, Krishna and Hari incessantly.

title: Jai Jai Sai Ma Jaya
title2: Jai Jai Sai Ma Jaya Sai Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Veena Vadini Ma Vidya Daayini Ma [ Jai Jai ... ]
Mukthi Pradayini Ma Shakthi Pradayini Ma [ Veena Vadini ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who is Mother Saraswathi Herself, the One who bestows Knowledge and the One who plays on the Veena (stringed instrument). Mother Saraswathi gives strength and grants Liberation.

title: Jai Jai Shiva Shambho
title2: Jai Jai Shiva Shambho Jai Jai Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Shambho
Bholey Nath Shambho Sai Nath Shambho [ Jai Jai ... ]
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shambho Hara Hara Shiva Shambho [ Bholey Nath ... ]

Jai Jai Shiva Shambho Jai Jai Shiva Shambho
Jai Jai Shiva Shambho (3)
meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva, the embodiment of auspiciousness. He is the Lord of the Lords and the Lord of the innocent. Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva.

title: Jai Jai Sri Ram Sai
title2: Jai Jai Sri Ram Sai Harey Ram
lyrics:
Jai Jai Sri Ram Neela Gagana Shyam [ Jai Jai ... ]
Raghu Nandana Bhava Bhanjana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jai Jai Sri Ram
Raghuveera Ranadheera Jai Jai Sri Ram
Parthi Puri Raghava Jai Jai Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who has Lotus eyes, the one who has the complexion of thick blue clouds, the one who belongs to the Raghu clan and destroys the miseries of devotees. Lord Rama is valiant warrior on the battlefield, is verily Sai Ram residing at Parthi.

title: Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi
title2: Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma Jai Jai Vaishnavi Devi Ma
lyrics:
Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma Sai Ma [ Jai Jai Vaishnavi ... ]
Sheravali Ma Jyotavali Ma
Pahadavali Ma, Jai Jaga Janani Sai Ma [Jai Ma ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, Mother of the Universe. She is none other than Mother Vaishnavi the effulgent one who rides the lion and dwells in the mountains.

title: Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala
lyrics:
Pundarika Varada Panduranga Vittala
Jai Jai Vittala Panduranga Vittala [ Pundarika ... ]
meaning: Sing the praises of Lord Vittala, standing on a brick. Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittala who blessed His devotee Pundarika.

title: Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai
title2: Jai Ma Jai Ma Jai Ma Sai Ma [ Jai Jai Ma ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Mother Vaishnov Devi and Victory be to Her, the One of dazzling Light, who has Lion as Her Vehicle. Victory to Her who dwells among the mountain ranges and who is the Mother of the Entire Universe.

title: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai
title2: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jai Sai Ram Jai Jai Ram (Bolo) (2)
Anatha Rakshaka Sai Ram
Apad Bandhava Sai Ram
Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
Premavatara Sai Ram
Poornavatara Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai who protects the destitute and who is the real friend in times of trouble. Lord Sai is the very personification and the incarnation of Supreme Love.

title: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai
title2: Jai Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
lyrics:
Premavatara Sai Avatara [ Jai Sai Ram ... ]
Ramavatara Sai Raghu Ram
Krishnavatara Sai Ghana Shyam
Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagawan
Sarvavatara Sathya Sai Ram
Poornavatara Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Sathya Sai, the incarnation of Supreme Love and the complete manifestation of everything. He is the incarnation of this Kali Age who had earlier incarnated as Lord Rama, descendant of Raghu dynasty and as the dark complexioned Lord Krishna.

title: Jai Santoshi Ma Jai Jai
title2: Jai Santoshi Ma Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
lyrics:
Mangala Karini Ma Sai Sankata Harini Ma
Triloka Palini Ma Sai Trishoola Dharini Ma
meaning: Glory be to Mother Santoshi, who removes misfortune of Her devotees and promotes their welfare. She holds the mighty Trident in Her hand and sustains the three worlds.

title: Janaki Jeevana Raghava
lyrics:
Radhika Jeevana Keshava
Treta Yugadhi Sita Apaharanadhi
Ravana Mardhana Raghava
Dwaparadhi Hari Dharmapaksha Prati
Kaurava Nashana Keshava O Leela Madhava Keshava
meaning: Lord Raghava is the life force of Mother Janaki (Sita). He vanquished Ravana who abducted Mother Sita during the Treta Era. Lord Keshava is the life force of Radha. He rooted out the Kaurava race and installed Righteousness during the Dwapara Era.

title: Janaki Jeevana Rama Raghuvara
lyrics:
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara [ Janaki Jeevana ... ]
Ravikula Mandana Asura Nikhandana
Alakh Niranjana Rama [ Jaya Bhuvaneshwara ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Rama Raghuveera
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Raghava Sundara [ Janaki Jeevana ... ]
Ravikula Mandana Asura Nikhandana
Alakh Niranjana Rama [ Jaya Bhuvaneshwara ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama of the Raghu clan, who is the very life of Mother Janaki (Sita), the one who is the Lord of the Earth and beauty personified. Glory be to the one who is the descendant of the Solar dynasty and who rooted out the demonic forces to protect the devotees.

title: Janani Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Jaya Matangi Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Vani Veena Paani
Jaya Sayeeshwari Jagadeeshwari
meaning: The Mother of Lord who has the face as that of an Elephant, is the Mother of the Universe too. She is Vani who holds the Veena (stringed instrument) and Sayeeshwari.

title: Janani Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Harini Bharati Ma
Janani Jagat Janani
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani
meaning: Praises be to Mother of the Universe. Mother Sai sustains and nourishes the Universe, removes the fear of successive births.

title: Janani Janani Ma Shankari Durgati
title2: Janani Janani Ma Shankari Durgati Nashini Ma
lyrics:
Mata Uma Sai Ma
Janani Janani Ma
Dashabhujadharini Bhairavi Ma
Paapa Vinashini Parvathi Ma
Jaya Bhuvaneshwari Jaya Partheeshwari
Jagadodharini Ma
meaning: Extol the Glories of Mother Uma, the origin of Auspiciousness and destroyer of misfortune. She is known as Bhairavi, when she bears ten Hands, negates the effects of sin and the Mother of Humanity, who dwells in Parthi.

title: Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha
title2: Janani Janani Sathya Sai Shubha Janani
lyrics:
Jagat Karini Paripoorani Sayeeshwari Janani
Sathya Swaroopini Janani
Dharma Samvardhini Janani
Shantha Swaroopini Janani
Prema Pradayini Janani ( Sai )
meaning: Let us sing the glory of Mother Sathya Sai, the one who personifies auspiciousness, the originator of the Universe and who is complete perfection. She is the embodiment of Truth, righteousness and peace and bestows Love.

title: Janani Krupa Karo Ambe
lyrics:
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambe
Janani Janani Janani Janani [ Janani Krupa ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Mangala Karini Ambe
Mangala Karini Tripureshwari Jagadambe
Abhaya Dayini Amrutha Bhaashini Ambe
Sai Janani Jaya Jagadambe [ Janani Janani ... ]
meaning: Shower Your choicest blessings on us, O Mother Sai. You are the Sovereign Mother of the three worlds, who blesses all with good fortune. O Mother Sai, You are the one of nectarine words who grants freedom from fear.

title: Janani Ma Sai Janani Ma
lyrics:
Prema Vahini Ma Gnana Vahini Ma
Dharma Vahini Ma Dhyana Vahini Ma
Prashanthi Vahini Chira Sukha Dayini
Jaya Jaya Sai Ma
meaning: O Mother Sai, You are verily the free flowing rivers of Love, Wisdom, Righteousness, Meditation and Supreme Peace reaching out to the far corners of the world and conferring long lasting Happiness on Everyone. Glory to Thee, O Mother.

title: Janani Sai Devi Dayamayi
lyrics:
Janani Ma Krupalini Ma
Tum Ho Prema Swaroopini Ma
Daya Karo Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Prema Dayini Ma
meaning: Oh Mother Sathya Sai You are the One of compassion and personification of Love. Shower your Grace on us.

title: Janardhana Jagannatha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha
Sadguru Brahma Sanathana
Sadashiva Sai Narayana
meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe and loved by people. You are our sacred Preceptor who is Eternal. You are Shiva as well as Narayana.

title: Janardhana Nandalala Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna
Krishna Krishna Gopala
Sai Krishna Gopala
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Govinda, Gopala, Krishna and Sai. O Lord Krishna, You are the son of Nanda and the one who induces people to do good actions.

title: Jaya Ambe Jaya Ambe
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ma Jagadambe ( Jaya Ambe ... )
Adi Shakthi Ma Jagadambe
Sai Bhavani Jagadambe
Mata Pitha Guru Jagadambe ( Jaya Jaya ... )
meaning: Hail! Mother Goddess, the primal force who is Sai, mother, father, teacher and Mother of the Universe.

title: Jaya Anjaneya Jaya Rama Dootha
title2: Jaya Anjaneya Jaya Rama Dootha Sharanam Prabho Sharanam
lyrics:
Vanara Veera Vayu Kumara 
Ranadheera Sharanam
Rama Priyey Sharanam (Sai)
Sathya Sai Hanuman Sharanam

Ram Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (2)
Sai Ram Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (2)
meaning: Victory to Anjaneya, the messenger of Lord Rama and the courageous son of the Wind God. Salutations to the valorous one who is the favorite of Lord Rama. Salutations to Lord Rama and Lord Sathya Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Jaya Bajrang Jaya Balabheem Jaya
title2: Jaya Bajrang Jaya Balabheem Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
