lyrics: Jaya Bajrang Jai Jai Jaya Balabheem Jai Jai Jaya Hanuman Jaya Bolo (2)
meaning: Sing the Praises of Bajrang, Balabheem and Hanuman. Victory be to them.

title: Jaya Bhagavad Geete Matey
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Geete Jaya Vyasa Jaatey
Jaya Jaya Iha Para Kalyana Daatey
Tattvignane Shanthi Nidharey
Bhava Bhaya Harini Sarva Guna Gaane [ Jaya Bhagavad ... ]
Mukthi Dayini Shakthi Kaarini
Bhakthi Prachodini Janani Janani [ Jaya Bhagavad ... ]
Asha Maha Svartha Samhaarini
Dasha Keshava Nuta Hrdaya Viharini
meaning: Glory to Mother Bhagawad-Gita documented by sage Vyasa. Gita, whose true nature is peace and truth, bestows good luck and fortune in this, and the next life. She is full of good qualities, removes fears, grants strength and liberation, destroys desires of the senses and ego, and extols the Lord, the indweller.

title: Jaya Bolo Jaya Nandalala
lyrics:
Jaya Bolo Jaya Murali Gopala [ Jaya Bolo ... ]
Nanda Kishora Shyama Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Dwarakanatha Deena Dayala
meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, the one who plays the Flute, the one who is dark complexioned, the one who is the Lord of Dwaraka, the one who encourages saints and sages and source of succor to the helpless.

title: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jai
title2: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jai Jai Ganapathi Deva
lyrics:
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Siddhi Kara Deva ( Jaya Deva ... )
Girija Nandana Bala Gajanana
Jaya Lambodhara Mooshika  Vahana
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the leader of "Ganas"(volunteers of Lord Shiva), who gives knowledge, promotes intellect, and bestows success. Salutations to the young son of Mother Parvathi.

title: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jaya
title2: Jaya Deva Jaya Deva Jaya Guru Deva
lyrics:
Jaya Sai Deva
Satchidananda Sai Guru Deva
Parabrahma Paramananda
Guru Nanak Guru Govinda
Atma Swaroopa Sai Guru Deva
meaning: Victory to the Sacred Preceptor Sai, who is verily of Truth, Awareness and Bliss. Sing the praises of Guru Nanak and Guru Govinda. Glory to Lord Sai, the embodiment of the Supreme Self.

title: Jaya Devi Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma [ Jaya Devi ... ]
Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma Parameshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Sai Bhavani Ma Jaya Parthi Nivasini Ma (2)
meaning: Victory to Goddess Bhavani, the very existence. Victory to Divine Mother Sathya Sai, the eternal one who rules over the entire universe. Puttaparthi is Her divine abode.

title: Jaya Devi Deena Dayamayi
lyrics:
Jagat Janani Durga Bhavani [ Jaya Devi ... ]
Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta Vinodini
Janani (San)Geeta Vinodini [ Jai Jai Sai Sangeeta ]
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
meaning: Glory to Durga Bhavani who is the Mother of the Universe, compassionate towards the needy. Glory be to Mother Partheeshwari who is the Sovereign Mother who revels in soulful and classical Music.

title: Jaya Devi Durga Gowri Shankari
title2: Jaya Devi Durga Gowri Shankari Parvathi
lyrics:
Bhuvana Mohini Lalita Lakshmi Kalavathi [ Jaya Devi ... ]
Kamala Kamini Hari Narayani Bhagawathi
Veda Mata Vidya Dayini Bharati
Hamsa Vahini Veena Paani Saraswathi
meaning: Voctory to Mother Durga who is also known as Gowri, Shankari, Parvathi and Bhagawathi. She is also Lakshmi, the Goddess of wealth, known as Kamala and Narayani. She is also Mother Saraswathi, the Goddess of Knowledge and the Mother of Vedas. She holds the Veena, has the Swan as her vehicle, and is also known as Bharati.

title: Jaya Durga Devi Bhavani
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagat Janani [ Jaya Durga ... ] 
Tum Hi Durga Lakshmi Saraswati Aur Kaali
Adi Parashakthi Sai Jagat Janani
Trishoola Dharini Ma Jagat Janani Sai [ Jaya Ma ... ]

Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Sai Ma (3)
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagat Janani
meaning: Victory to You, the Universal Goddess! You take the forms of Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswati and Kaali. You are the Supreme power who bears the trident. You are none other than our Mother Sai.

title: Jaya Gajavadana Gananatha
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Gananatha
Pashupathi Nandana Gananatha [ Jaya Gajavadana ... ]
Vighneshwara Hey Gana Nayaka
Dukha Hara Hey Shubha Dayaka
Lambodhara Hey Phala Dayaka
Jaya Prashanthi Vasa Shubha Charana
meaning: Victory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, son of Lord Shiva and Goddess Parvathi. The pot bellied Lord removes obstacles and grief and grants one's wishes and gives bliss. Taking refuge at His holy feet confers good luck.

title: Jaya Gananayaka Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana [ Jaya Gananayaka ... ]
Prathama Poojya Sri Natha Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Hey Shubhanana
Yuga Yuga Vanditha Paahi Gajanana
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesh, the leader of the Shiva's army (Ganas). Protect us O Lord Gajanana, the son of Lord Shiva. Riding on the Mouse, You are the auspicious one who is worshipped first and who has been worshipped for eons.

title: Jaya Ganapathi Om Jai Ganapathi
lyrics:
Mooshika Vahana Ganapathi 
Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana 
Sharavana Sevitha Ganapathi
Tava Pada Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana 
Ganapathi Om Sai Om (2)
meaning: Victory to the Lord of Ganaas, Lord Ganesha, the son of Mother Parvathi. Victory to the one who rides on the mouse. Just as His brother, Lord Subrahmanya, worships Him, we too surrender at the feet of Lord Ganesha.

title: Jaya Ganapathi Siddhi Vinayaka
lyrics:
Jaya Ganapathi Mangala Dayaka 
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Girija Sutha Jai Sri Ganesh 
Modaka Hasta Sindhura Shobhita 
Prathama Poojana Gananayaka 
Chandrashekara Shambho Nandana 
Ganapathi Sri Shubha Dayaka [ Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh ... ]
meaning: Praise be to Lord Ganesha, the one who grants spiritual prowess. He is the son of Mother Parvathi. He relishes Modaks, and is adorned with vermillion. He is worshipped primordially. He is the son of Lord Shiva, who holds the crescent moon in His hair locks. Victory to Lord Ganesha, the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Jaya Ganesha Gajanana Daya Nidhey
lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Lambodhara Gajavadana Manohara
Parvathi Nandana Siddhi Vinayaka
meaning: Victory to the Elephant faced Lord, compassion personified, who grants auspiciousness and Occult powers. Lord Ganesha has an enormous belly, son of Parvathi and is also known as Vinayaka (the remover of obstacles).

title: Jaya Ganesha Jaya Mangala Daata
lyrics:
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata [ Jaya Ganesha ]
Mooshika Vahana Sri Gananatha
Vighna Vinashaka Bhagya Vidhata
Vande Saraswathi Sai Mata
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha who confers prosperity and welfare, the one who has a Mouse as His Vehicle, the one who is the leader of Shiva's army of Ganaas and destroys impediments. Salutations to Mother Saraswathi.

title: Jaya Gopala Jaya Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Radhey Govinda Gopala [ Jaya Gopala ... ]
Chinmayananda Hey Sai Gopala
Nithyananda Roopa Sai Gopala [ Jaya Radhey ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the consort of Radha. Victory to Lord Sai who is ever in the bliss of pure Consciousness and who is verily Lord Kirshna.

title: Jaya Govardhana Dhari Gopala
lyrics:
Radha Hrudaya Vihari Gopala [ Jaya Govardhana ... ]
Janam Maran Bhaya Haari Gopala
Meera Prabhu Giridhari Gopala
Parthi Vihari Sai Gopala
meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala (Krishna) who lifted the Govardhana Hill to protect His devotees. Victory to the Lord who resides in Radha's heart. Victory to the one who destroys the fear of birth and death, who is the Lord of Meera and who is verily Lord Sai residing at Puttaparthi.

title: Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
lyrics:
Radha Vallabha Raasa Vilola [ Jaya Govinda ... ]
Nanda Mukunda Goparipala
Munijana Vanditha Murali Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the consort of Radha, who is fond of the Raasa leela (divine folk dance with Gopis). He is the son of Nanda and the protector of cows, who is worshipped by sages and who plays the flute.

title: Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
lyrics:
Hey Parameshwara Harey Mukunda [ Jaya Govinda ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara Sayeeshwara
Parthi Nivasa Parameshwara
Parama Pavitra Sayeeshwara
Prema Swaroopa Sayeeshwara
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna who is also known as Govinda, Gopala and Mukunda. Glory to Lord Sai, the Supreme Lord of Shirdi and Parthi. He is the supremely sacred Lord and is the very embodiment of Love.

title: Jaya Gowri Vara Sugunalaya
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeeshwara Niramaya [ Jaya Gowri ... ]
Jaya Partheeshwara Premalaya (2)
Karunalaya Sathya Dharmalaya
Prashanthi Nilaya Dayamaya
meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe, Lord Shiva, the beloved of Mother Gowri, is a paragon of virtues and is blemishless. He is none of than Lord Sai, compassionate one, the embodiment of Truth and Righteousness who has Prashanthi Nilayam as His Abode.

title: Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai
title2: Jaya Guru Deva Prabhu Sai Deva
lyrics:
Devadi Deva Pranamamyaham
Shiva Shiva Shambho Kailasa Pathey
Parthi Pureeshwara Palaya Maam [ Devadi Deva ... ]
meaning: Our Salutations to the Preceptor and Lord of Lords Sathya Sai. Protect me O Shiva, the originator of Auspiciousness, Lord of Mount Kailasa who is verily Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi.

title: Jaya Guru Govinda Sadguru Govinda
lyrics:
Madhava Govinda Paahi Maam
Deena Dayala Baba Deena Natha
Parama Dayala Hari Prashanthi Vasa
meaning: Protect us O Sacred Preceptor Sai, You are verily Madhava and Govinda (names of Krishna). You are the refuge of the forlorn, the extremely merciful Lord who dwells at Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai
title2: Jaya Guru Jaya Guru Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jagat Guru Sathya Sai Ram [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai Ram
Parabrahma Roopa Sai Ram
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Ram [ Jagat Guru ... ]
meaning: Prostrations to Lord Sathya Sai Rama, the Divine Preceptor of the Universe. He is the Mother, Father, Preceptor as well as Creator (Brahma), Sustainer (Vishnu), Destroyer (Shiva) and is the very embodiment of the Supreme One.

title: Jaya Guru Natha Shiva Guru
title2: Jaya Guru Natha Shiva Guru Natha
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Harey Paramesha [ Jaya Guru Natha ... ]
Parama Dayala Paahi Mahesha
Jaya Jaya Sathya Sayeesha
meaning: Salutations to the venerable Preceptor Sathya Sai, who is the Sovereign Lord, the one who is extremely compassionate and the one who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Guru Omkara
lyrics:
Sadguru Omkara [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Allah Tum Ho Yeshu Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Baba Tum Ho
Parama Guru Sai Pavana Tum Ho
meaning: Victory to Sadguru Sai, the embodiment of the sacred sound Pranava. You are the verily the Lords Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra and Mahavir. You are the Master and the Supreme Preceptor of all of us.

title: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Guru
title2: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Guru Omkara
lyrics:
Sadguru Deva Sai Mahadeva [ Jaya Guru ]
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Mahadeva
Dharma Bodhaka Sai Guru Deva
Shantha Swaroopa Prema Swaroopa (Pra) [ Sadguru Deva ]
meaning: Prostrations to the venerable preceptor Sai Mahadeva, the very form of the Primordial sound Om. Sai Guru deva is the direct manifestation of Truth, Peace and Supreme Love and preacher of Righteousness.

title: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya
title2: Jaya Guru Omkara Jaya Jaya Sadguru Omkara Om
lyrics:
Brahma Vishnu Sadashiva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
meaning: Venerable salutations to our Preceptor Lord Sai, who is the form of the primordial sound Om, the creator Brahma, protector Vishnu and destroyer Shiva. Salutations to Sai who is the embodiment of Mahadeva and Sadashiva (names of Lord Shiva).

title: Jaya Guru Sadguru Sri Sai
title2: Jaya Guru Sadguru Sri Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sri Guru Govinda Sadguru Deva
Krupahi Kevalam Krupahi Kevalam
Guru Deva Sai Mahadeva
Mahadeva Sai Gurudeva
meaning: Salutations to the true Guru Sathya Sai. Please bestow us with your kindness and compassion.

title: Jaya Guru Shankara Girija Ramana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Mangala Divya Charana [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Jaya Muni Vanditha Nagabharana
Jaya Sarveshwara (Sayeeshwara) Saroja Nayana
meaning: Victory to the beloved of Mother Girija whose Divine feet confers all that is auspicious, who adorns snakes on His body and meditated upon by the Sages and who is none other than the lotus eyed Sayeeshwara.

title: Jaya Guru Sri Guru Sadguru
title2: Jaya Guru Sri Guru Sadguru Sai
lyrics:
Satchidananda Sada Sukha Dayi [ Jaya Guru ... ]
Prashanthi Nilaya Dwarakamayi
Jaya Guru Sri Guru Sadguru Sai (2)
meaning: Victory to the Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai of Prashanti Nilayam which is the same as Dwarakamayi at Shirdi. Glory to the one who always bestows happiness and who is truth, awareness, and bliss incarnate.

title: Jaya Hanuman Jaya Hanuman
meaning: Victory to Lord Hanuman.

title: Jaya Hanuman Sri Hanuman
title2: Jaya Hanuman Sri Hanuman Rama Daasa Hanuman
lyrics:
Jaya Hanuman Sri Hanuman Rama Bhakta Hanuman
Jaya Hanuman Sri Hanuman Rama Dootha Hanuman
Hey Rama Daasa Hanuman Rama Bhakta Hanuman
meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the premier servant, devotee and messsenger of Lord Rama.

title: Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Hari
title2: Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Hari Gopala
lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Giridhara Gopala [ Jaya Hari ... ]
Surdasa Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Sri Hari Jaya Hari Sai Giridhari
meaning: Chant the Glory of Govinda, Gopala, Madhava, Hari, the One who has the peacock feather on His Head, who lifted Govardhana Mountain on His finger and throne who is the dear Lord of Surdas.

title: Jaya Hari Govinda Jaya Narayana
lyrics:
Vasudeva Nandana Sri Madhusudhana ( Jaya Hari ... )
Karunanidhe Hey Madhava Mohana
Parama Niranjana Yashoda Nandana
Jaya Narayana Jaya Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda, Hari, Narayana (names of Lord Vishnu), and Krishna, the beloved son of Vasudeva and the one who slayed the demon Madhu. He is the treasure house of compassion, is supremely pure son of Yashoda and is ever pleasing to His devotees. Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Jaya Hari Govinda Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Muralidhara [ Jaya Hari ... ]
Brinda Vihari Krishna Murari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Radha Madhava Damodara
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna known by many names - Govinda, Gopala, Madhava and Damodara. Glory to the one playing lilting tunes on His Flute, who moved about in Brindavan and who is the dearest Lord of Radha and Meera.

title: Jaya Hey Shankara Jaya Hey
lyrics:
Pavana Para Shiva Jaya Hey [ Jaya Hey Shankara ... ]
Atmodharaka Ananda Dayaka
Adi Mahadeva Jaya Hey [ Pavana Para ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Shankara, victory be to You. You are Purity personified. You are the one who causes emancipation of souls and confers Bliss.

title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Anjaneya
lyrics:
Pavana Kumara Anjaneya [ Jaya Ho ... ]
Maruthiraya Anjaneya
Ati Balabheema Anjaneya
Sri Rama Dootha Anjaneya
Sai Rama Dootha Anjaneya
Sharanam (Sharanam) Sharanam Anjaneya

Jaya Ho Anjaneya (4)
meaning: Victory to Anjaneya, the son of Pavan, the God of Wind. Victory to the most valorous one. Salutations to the messenger of Lord Rama and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Gopalana
lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Narayana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Janardhana
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Niranjana
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna who fosters cowherds, victory to the one whom man is a part of, victory to the one who uplifts humanity and the one who is faultless and pure.

title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Lingeshwara
lyrics:
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Partheeshwara
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mruthyunjaya
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
meaning: Victory be to Sayeeshwara, who is in the Form of a Linga (denotes without beginning or end), the One who has conquered Death and the One who resides in Parthi

title: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mooshika
title2: Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Mooshika Vahana
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Prathama Vandana
Parvathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vighna Haranam [ Hey Shiva Nandana ]
meaning: Victory to the son of Shiva and Parvathi who moves on a mouse and the one who is offered the first prayers. Let us surrender to the one who removes obstacles and grants us spiritual powers.

title: Jaya Ho Nataraj
lyrics:
Gangadhara Shambho Hey Nataraj
Phaala Lochana Paahi Murari
Haalaahala Dhara Hey Tripurari
Jaya Ho Nataraj
meaning: Victory to the Lord of dance, Lord Shiva, who holds Mother Ganges in His matted locks, the one who has the third eye of wisdom. Protect me, O Lord, the one who destroyed the three cities created by the demons and the one who holds the poison in His throat.

title: Jaya Ho Sai Ram Jaya
title2: Jaya Ho Sai Ram Jaya Ho Sai Ram
lyrics:
Karuna Sindhu Ram Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Jaya Ho Sai Ram ... ]
Treta Yug Mey Ram Sai Dwapara Yug Mey Shyam
Ram Tum Hi Rehman Sai Sab Ka Hey Bhagawan
Kali Yug Ke Avatar Sai Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
meaning: Glory to Sai Ram who is an ocean of compassion and Lord of Parthi. He had incarnated as Lord Ram in the Treta age and Shyam in the Dwapara age, has come down as Sai in this Kali age. Oh Lord! You are worshipped by people of all faiths.

title: Jaya Jagadambe Gowri Mata
lyrics:
Gowri Mata Sai Mata [ Jaya Jagadambe ... ]
Kaala Vinashini Jagadodharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Mata
meaning: Hail Gowri the Universal Mother, who swallows time and resurrects the world is presently Sai Mata who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Govinda
title2: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Nithyananda Brahmananda Jaya Gopala Harey
Arunachala Shiva Om Trishoola Dhari Shivom
Hari Narayana Om Sai Narayana Om
Jaya Devi Bharati Vidya Dayini Annapoorna Mata Om
meaning: Glory to the Lord of the Universe, Govinda, Gopala who is the personification of Eternal Bliss. He is Lord Shiva who holds the Trident and has made the Mountains of Arunachala as His Abode. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Narayana, Mother Bharati who gives Knowledge and Mother Annapurna who provides food for everyone.

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Murare
lyrics:
Jaya Jagannatha Janardhana [ Jaya Jagadeesha ... ]
Jaya Vanamali Jaya Giridhari
Jaya Jaya Sri Hari Sai Murari
meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Universe, Lord Krishna, who is the inner motivator of all, who wears a garland of jungle flowers and who annihilated demon Mura.

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Prabhuvara
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shambho Jagadeka Vibho [ Jai Jagadeesha ... ]
Chandrashekara Kailasadhipathey
Bhaava Gochara Bhavani Shankara
meaning: Sing the glory of the Sovereign Lord of the Universe, Shiva, the benevolent one. Lord Shankara bears the crescent moon on His head, is the Lord of Mount Kailasa, imperceptible to the senses and the consort of Mother Bhavani (Parvathi).

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey
Keshava Roopa Sai Shareera Jaya Jagadeesha Harey
Jaya Jagadeesha Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey (2)
meaning: Victory to the Sovereign Lord and Lord of the Universe Esha (Shiva) who Himself is Keshava and Sai.

title: Jaya Jagadeesha Jaya Paramesha
lyrics:
Neelakanta Sadashiva
Om Hari Om
Hari Om Sai Om
Devadi Deva Deena Dayala
Chandrashekara Shambho (2) [ Neelakanta Sadashiva ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva who is the Supreme Lord. He is the origin of all that is auspicious and the one who is blue throated. He is the Lord of the Lords, the most compassionate one. Glory to the one who bears the crescent moon on His head.

title: Jaya Jagadeeshwara Paahi Maam Dehi
title2: Jaya Jagadeeshwara Paahi Maam Dehi Maam
lyrics:
Anga Vibhuti Harey Shiva Shankara
Amaradeeshwara Hara Hara Shankara
meaning: Protect me Oh Lord of the Universe, Shankara, who has smeared Vibhuti (Sacred ash) on His Body and who is the Lord of the immortals.

title: Jaya Jagadeeshwari Akhilandeshwari
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwari Palaya Maam
Jaya Bhuvaneshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Vara Dayini Amba Palaya Maam
meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe, Mother Sai, the resident of Puttaparthi and the bestower of wishes. O Mother Sai, kindly protect me.

title: Jaya Jagadeeshwari Jaya Parameshwari
lyrics:
Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Bhuvaneshwari
Jaya Shaktheeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Vijaya Sayeeshwari
meaning: Victory to the Mother of the Universe, Lord Sai, the resident of Puttaparthi who is supremely powerful.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadambe
lyrics:
Mata Bhavani Mata Ambe (2) [ Jaya Jagat ... ]
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Jagadambe
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Mata Ambe
Vaishnavi Mata Mata Ambe
Mata Ambe (3)
meaning: Salutations to the Mother of the Universe, Mother Bhavani, the divine consort of Lord Shiva, and to Mother Vaishnavi.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagadeeshwari
lyrics:
Parthipuri Parameshwari
Anantha Koti Brahmanda Nayaki
Dasha Maha Vidya Veda Vilasini
Mukthi Pradayini Bhava Bhaya Haarini
Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari
meaning: Hail the Universal Sovereign Mother Sathya Sai Bhuvaneshwari, who dwells in Parthi, the Goddess of innumerable Galaxies that exist, an Exponent of all Ten Texts (4 Vedas and the 6 Scriptures) who confers Liberation and negates the vicious cycle of Birth and Death.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Jagat palini
lyrics:
Sai Bhavani Ma (Sathya)
Paapa Vinashini Parthi Nivasini
Suramuni Vandini Ma (3) [ Sai Bhavani Ma ]
meaning: Salutations to the Mother Sai Bhavani, who is ever compassionate, the one who destroys sins, One who dwells in Parthi and worshipped by sages and Holy men.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Shiva Shankari Sai Parameshwari
Ambe Bhavani Ma (Jagad)
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the One who confers all that is Auspicious, Supreme, the one who is also known as Amba Bhavani.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Devi
title2: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Devi Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
lyrics:
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Ma Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Ma Sai Ma [ Shiva Shakthi ]
Moksha Pradayini Ma Janani Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma
Janani Ma ( Sai ) Janani Ma (2)
meaning: Glory to the Mother of Universe Sathya Sai, who is the Personification of Lord Shiva and Shakthi, who sustains the Three worlds and confers Liberation.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Jaya
title2: Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Ma Jaya Ma [ Jaya Jagat ... ]
Jagadodharini Ma Jaya Ma
Hey Shiva Shankari Hey Parameshwari
Sai Bhavani Ma Jaya Ma [ Jagadodharini Ma ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Sathya Sai the sustainer the Universe, who is the Supreme Goddess also known as Bhavani and Shankari, the consort of Lord Shiva.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Mata
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasini Trishoola Dharini [ Jaya Jagat ... ]
Shwetambarini Ambe Bhavani
Shakthi Roopa Durga Mata (2) [ Parthi Nivasini ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the Mother of the Universe, who holds the Trident and dwells in Parthi. She is dressed in white and is glorified as Amba, Bhavani and Durga. She is the very personification of Divine Energy.

title: Jaya Jagat Janani Sayeeshwari
lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Sarveshwari
Veena Pusthaka Dharini Janani
Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhani
Omkara Roopini Hreemkara Roopini
Sreemkara Roopini Janani
Omkara Roopini Janani
Janani Janani Janani
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, Goddess of the universe. She is verily Saraswathi, Goddess of learning, the one who holds the Veena and the Holy scriptures. Victory to the Goddess of wealth, Lakshmi, the consort of Lord Madhusudhana (Krishna). Mother Sai is the very embodiment of the Primordial sound 'Om' and the sounds 'Hreem' and 'Sreem'.

title: Jaya Janardhana Krishna Radhika
lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Krishna Rukmini Pathey
Garuda Vahana Krishna Gopika Pathey
Saranu Mohana Krishna Prabho Sadgate
Paahi Keshava Krishna Paahi Madhava
Paahi Mukunda Krishna Paahi Govinda
Paahi Suresha Krishna Paahi Mahesha
Paahi Sri Vishnu Krishna Paahi Vaikunta
Paahi Paresha Krishna Paahi Maam Prabho
Paahi Pavana Krishna Raksha Maam Vibho
Paahi Sridhara Krishna Paahi Maam Prabho
Guruvayur Pathey Krishna Paahi Maam Vibho
meaning: Victory be to the Krishna, who is the consort of Radhika. Krishna is also called Janardhana, son of Nanda, consort of Rukmini. As Lord Narayana, His vehicle is Garuda. Protect us oh Krishna who is also known by various names such as Keshava, Mukunda, Suresha, Mahesha, Sridhara, and Govinda. Master of Guruvayur, and Vaikunta, please protect us.

title: Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasini Palaya Maam
Jaya Jaya Hey Himadri Suthey
Palaya Maam Amba Rakshaya Maam
meaning: Protect me, O Mother Sai, the dweller at Parthi who confers Grace and Bliss in a downpour. Confer Your Grace O Amba, the daughter of Himalaya mountain.

title: Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
lyrics:
Raja Rajeshwari Rakshaya Maam
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani
Brahma Sanathani Palaya Maam
Parthi Nivasini Rakshaya Maam
meaning: Sing the Glory of the Divine Mother who sheds Love in the form of a downpour. Protect me the Queen of Goddesses. You are the incarnation of the three energy principles, the Eternal and is verily Mother Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Deva Jagadeesha Deva
lyrics:
Daya Sagara Sai Deva [ Jaya Jaya Deva ... ]
Neeraja Nayana Ksheerabdhi Shayana
Neela Megha Shyama
Saama Gaana Priya Sarva Dharma Priya Sathya Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the ocean of compassion. You are verily the lotus-eyed Narayana whose abode is that of the ocean of milk, and Krishna whose complexion is deep blue. Oh Sai Mahadeva, You are the lover of the music of Veda and the one who loves all religions equally.

title: Jaya Jaya Devi Ambe Bhavani
lyrics:
Durga Saraswathi Lakshmi Narayani [ Jaya Jaya Devi ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Tribhuvana Dharini
Parthi Nivasini Sai Janani
meaning: Victory to Mother Amba Bhavani the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi and Narayani. She is verily Mother Sai, who dwells in Parthi, confers freedom from fear and the one who bears the three worlds.

title: Jaya Jaya Devi Girija Mata
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Pranava Swaroopini
Ashtabhujankita Akhila Dharini
Jaya Yogeshwara Hrudaya Nivasini
meaning: Praises be to the Universal Mother Girija, the embodiment of the Primordial Sound Om. She is the one who has eight arms and the one who bears the universe. She is the one who resides in the heart of Lord Shiva.

title: Jaya Jaya Gajanana Gananatha
lyrics:
Gowri Nandana Hey Gananatha [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Buddhi Pradayaka Hey Gananatha
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Gananatha
Jaya Gananatha Sai Gananatha (4)
meaning: Sing the praises of the elephant-faced Lord, the Leader of the demigods (Ganas), son of Gowri, who confers intelligence and spiritual powers.

title: Jaya Jaya Gananatha Deva Shambho
title2: Jaya Jaya Gananatha Deva Shambho Kumara
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Partheesha Prabho Sai Ganesha
Jaya Jaya Hey Adi Deva Deena Sharanya
Jaya Jaya Hey Abhaya Daata Parthi Ganesha
meaning: Glory to the son of Shambho, leader of Shiva's troops and the Lord of Parthi. Glory to the refuge of the Forlorn, the First Lord, who grants protection from fear.

title: Jaya Jaya Gangadhara Shankara
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gowri Vara Shankara [ Jaya Jaya Gangadhara ... ]
Ardha Shareera Alankruta Girija
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Charitha
Palita Bhuvana Aashritha Phalada
meaning: Sing the Glory of the one who holds Mother Ganges on His head, Lord Shiva, the beloved of Mother Gowri. Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi is verily Lord Shiva whose half body is adorned by Mother Girija and who nourishes the world, grants welfare and has a sacred history.

title: Jaya Jaya Girija Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parvathi Nandana [ Jaya Jaya Girija ... ]
Vighna Vinashaka Vimala Gajanana
Sharavana Sevitha Sumukha Gajanana
Tava Pada Sharanam Sharanam Gajanana
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, son of Girija (Mother Parvathi) and Lord Shankara. We surrender at Your feet, O the elephant-faced Lord. You are the supremely pure one who removes obstacles in the spiritual path and are served by brother Lord Sharavana (Subrahmanya).

title: Jaya Jaya Govinda Jaya Nandalala
lyrics:
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola
Tribhuvana Paripala Deena Dayala [ Jaya Jaya Govinda ... ]
Surdas Prabhu Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan Gopala
meaning: Victory to Lord Govinda (Krishna), the son of Nanda, and who is dear to Radha. Victory to the one who did the celestial dance with the Gopis (Raasa Leela), who nurtures the three worlds and who is compassionate towards the helpless. Lord Gopala is a friend to His devotees and is the Lord of devotees Surdas and Meera.

title: Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Jaya Hari Govinda Narayana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Mathuradhipathey Mandara Giridhara
Murali Manohara Narayana
Narayana Namo (Sai) Narayana (3)
meaning: Prostrations to Lord Narayana, who incarnated as Govinda (Krishna), who is the Lord of Mathura and the one who lifted the Mandara mountain and played soulful music with His Flute.

title: Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha Mahesha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Hey Kailasa Vasa [ Jaya Jaya Hey Jagadeesha ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Shiva Sai Mahesha
Jaya Hey Shambho Sai Natha
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Anatha Natha
meaning: Victory to the Universal Lord Mahesha (Shiva), who dwells at Mountain Kailasa and who is the beloved Lord of Mother Gowri (Parvathi). He is the protector of the destitute and is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Narayani
lyrics:
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Dukha Vinashini Jagat Paripalini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
Jaya Jaya Jaya Devi Jagat Janani
meaning: Sing the glory of Mother Narayani, who removes the fear of birth and death, destroys sorrow and fosters the world. She is the Goddess of the Universe and confers welfare to all.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
lyrics:
Jaya Gananatha Sri Gananatha
Heramba Gananatha Natha
Hey Shiva Nandana Parvathi Nandana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha Natha
meaning: Victory to the Lord of the Ganas, Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana [ Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Adi Poojya Deva Gajanana
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the son of Mother Parvathi and Lord Shiva, and the one who is offered the foremost prayers.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Neelakanta Sutha Gajanana
Nithya Shubhanga Gajanana
meaning: Victory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the son of Parvathi and the blue-throated Shiva and the one who confers grace on His devotees continuously.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Jaya Brindavana Mana Mohana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Sundara Sai Shirdi (Parthi) Vihari
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Lord Krishna, the one who vanquished the demon Madhu. Glory to the charmer who moves about in Brindavan. Praise the one who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi as Lord Sai. Repeat the names of Radhey Shyam and Sairam.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sri
title2: Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sri Guru Natha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sadguru Natha
Sadguru Natha Sadguru (Sri Sai) Natha
Sathya Swaroopa Shiva Guru Natha
Antaryami Vishwa Vidhata
Mukthi Pradatha Sai Guru Natha
meaning: Let us sing in praise of our sacred Preceptor Sathya Sai, the embodiment of Truth. He is the indweller and the Creator of the Universe who grants Liberation.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sai
title2: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sai Natha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagannatha [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Shirdi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sathya Sayeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Jagadeeshwara
Jaya Jaya Jaya Ho Sayeeshwara
meaning: Glory to our Universal Lord Sayeeshwara who dwells in Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini
title2: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Paramesha Hrudvasini Ma [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Adi Shakthi Parabrahma Swaroopini
Jagat Janani Chathur Veda Vilasini
Samba Vinodini Mata Bhavani
Sambhavi Shankari Moksha Pradayini
alt_lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaga Vandini Ma
Jaya Paramesha Hrudvasini Ma [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Adi Shakthi Parabrahma Swaroopini
Jagat Janani Chathur Veda Vilasini
Samba Vinodini Mata Bhavani
Srikari Shankari Moksha Pradayini
meaning: Salutations to the Divine Mother who is adored by the entire Universe, the indweller and embodiment of Supreme Energy, the one whom the four Vedas describe and the consort of Lord Shiva. She confers liberation and is known by many names such as Bhavani, Srikari, Shankari and Sambhavi.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini [ (Ma) Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jagadodharini Sai Ma
Jagat Paripalini Parvathi Ma
Jagat Janani Shubha Karini
meaning: We offer our obeisance to our Universal Mother who confers all that is sublime and auspicious. The Uplifter, the Administrator and the Mother of the Universe that is Parvathi, is also Mother Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya
title2: Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma Jaya Sai Ma
lyrics:
Janana Marana Bhaya Harini Ma [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Sundara Vadani Suhaasini Ma
Mangala Karini Maheshwari Ma
Mahadeva Mana Mohini Ma
Maya Nashini Sri Sai Ma
meaning: Let us sing in Glory of Mother Sai, who negates the fear of the cycle of birth and death. The consort of Maheshwara, has a Beautiful smiling countenance, the One who charms Mahadeva and offsets the effects of Illusion.

title: Jaya Jaya Krishna Yadu Nandana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Brindavana Chandana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Krishna Mana Mohana
Jaya Jaya Sai Gopalana (2)
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna of  Yadu lineage, the shining star of Brindavan, the one who charms the mind. He is none other than our Sai Gopala.

title: Jaya Jaya Mangala Sai Namo
lyrics:
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Namo [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Shiva Shaktheeshwara Sai Namo
Sri Shaileshwara Sai Namo
meaning: Prostrations to Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi (Matter and Energy) who also dwells at Shaila Mountains.

title: Jaya Jaya Mohana Murali Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Giridhara Brindavana Bala [ Jaya Jaya Mohana ... ]
Jaya Hey Madhava Ghana Ghana Neela (2)
Jaya Meera Prabhu Radhey Gopala
meaning: Chant the names of the charming Gopala who plays on the Flute, the lad of Brindavan who surprised everyone by lifting the Mountain on His little finger. Sing in Praise of Madhava of the complexion of deep blue clouds and dear Lord of Meera.

title: Jaya Jaya Muruga
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shambho Gowri Tanaya
Ganapathi Anuja Karthikeya
Palaya Palaya Shanmukha Vela

Sharanam Sharanam Shanmukha Vela
Sharanam Sharanam Gowri Tanaya
Sharanam Sharanam Karthikeya
Sharanam Sharanam Sri Sai Natha
meaning:
Victory to Lord Muruga who is worshipped by many names - Kanda, Kumara and Karthikeya. Victory to the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri (Parvathi). Victory to the brother of Lord Ganesha. O the six-faced one who wields the Vel, please protect us. 

Salutations to Thee, O Lord Karthikeya who has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Pavana Kumara
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Hanumantha Veera
Sankata Mochana Vayu Kumara

Jai Jai Jai Jai Pavana Kumara
Jai Jai Jai Jai Hanumantha Veera
Sankata Mochana Vayu Kumara
meaning: Victory to the valorous Lord Hanuman, the son of Wind God. Victory to the one who liberates us from wordly afflictions.

title: Jaya Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya
title2: Jaya Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Janaki Jeevana
lyrics:
Sharanagatha Palana Jaya Jagadodharana [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Jaya Jagadanandana
Rajadhi Raja Ramachandra Sai Jaga Vandana
meaning: Extol the lotus-eyed son of Raghu clan, Lord Rama, the very life of Mother Janaki, the sustainer of Universe and protector of those who surrender to Him. He is the king of kings who is the source of delight to the Universe. He is verily Lord Sai who is worshipped by all.

title: Jaya Jaya Raghuvara Sri Rama
lyrics:
Hara Brahmarchitha Prarthitha Rama
Kaalaathmaka Parameshwara Rama
Janani Janaki Manobhi Rama (2)
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who belongs to the Raghu dynasty, who is adored by both Lord Shiva and Brahma (the God of Creation). Glory to the Supreme Lord Rama who is beyond Time and who is the beloved of Mother Janaki.

title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jagadabhi Ram
lyrics:
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey)
Jai Jai Ram Jaya Ram Sai Ram
Danava Bhanjana Dayamaya
Dayamaya Krupamaya
Alakha Niranjana Asura Nikhandana
Deena Bandhu Sai Ram (Hey) [ Jai Jai Ram ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Rama, the friend of the afflicted and the Lord of the World. Victory to Lord Rama who rooted out demonic forces from the face of the Earth, who is blemishless and extremely compassionate.

title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Megha
title2: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Megha Shyam
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bheema
Jagadabhi Ram Janaki Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sundara Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the one who is deep blue in complexion, the son of Dasharatha and the uprooter of the demonic clan. He is the consort of Mother Janaki, the Lord of the world and is worshipped by the sages.

title: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu
title2: Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Raghu Ram Ravikulabdhi Soma
lyrics:
Sita Ram Sri Raghu Ram Sathya Sai Bhagawan [ Jaya Jaya Ram ... ]
Sita Kantha Ram Jaya Janaki Jeevana Ram
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, Scion of the Solar race, who is the consort and the very life of Mother Sita, who has come presently in the form of Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Harey
title2: Jaya Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey (2)
lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Rama Harey Jaya Jaya Rama Harey 
Parthi Pureeshwara Rama Harey Jaya Jaya Sai Harey
Jai Jai Ram Jai Raghu Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram (2)
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama of Raghu lineage and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama, the protector of the downtrodden. Glory to Lord Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Sri Raghu Nandana Rama Rama
Kausalyatmaja Taraka Naama
Sada Smarami Rama
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Rama
Shritha Jana Palita Rama Rama
Ahalyodharaka Deena Dayaghana
Sada Smarami Rama
meaning: Always remember the name of the son of Kausalya, Lord Rama, who is the beloved of Mother Janaki and who belongs to the Raghu dynasty. Lord Rama's name liberates us from the cycle of birth and death. He fulfills the desires of devotees. He is all mercy for the hapless and got Ahalya liberated from the curse.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Raja Rama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
meaning: Praise be to Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Janaki (Sita) and the Crown Jewel of Raghu dynasty. Chant the Holy name of Rama that liberates one from the cycle of birth and death and which is a source of delight for the sages and saints. Glory to Lord Rama, the wielder of the Kodanda bow and the vanquisher of the demonic race.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu
title2: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama (3)
lyrics:
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Dayabhi Ram
Pankaja Lochana Nayanabhi Ram
Daya Sagara Karuna Sagara
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
Daya Sagara Sai Ram
Karuna Sagara Sai Ram
Prema Sagara Sai Ram
Deena Bandho Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Rama is the friend of the forlorn and takes care of His devotees. He is lotus eyed, the occean of compassion and is verily Lord Sathya Sai who is Ocean of Supreme Love.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu
title2: Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama
lyrics:
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Dayaka
Tribhuvana Mohana Sita Rama
Danava Bhanjana Deenodharana
Prema Sagara Sai Rama
meaning: Lord Rama was the descendant of the Raghu clan, the son of Dasharatha, who confers Bliss and fearlessness. Rama was the most handsome of all the three worlds, beloved of Mother Sita, annihilator of the Demon clan and emancipator of the downtrodden.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Krishna Hari
lyrics:
Sai Rama Krishna Hari [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Ayodhya Rama Krishna Hari
Dwaraka Krishna Rama Hari
Shirdi Rama Krishna Hari
Parthi Krishna Rama Hari
Sathya Sai Narayana Krishna (Vittala) Hari
meaning: Chant the names of Rama of Ayodhya, Krishna of Dwaraka, Hari, Vittala and Sai of Shirdi and Sathya Sai of Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Rama Sita Rama
lyrics:
Bandha Vimochana Jaya Raghu Rama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Ravikula Mandana Atma Rama
Asura Nikhandana Kodanda Rama
meaning: Victory to the consort of Sita, Lord Rama of Raghu clan, who releases all from bondage, who is the indweller, the jewel of Solar dynasty, the one wielding the Kodanda bow and the one who wiped out the demonic clan.

title: Jaya Jaya Sadguru Sai Sadashiva
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Shambho Mahadeva [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Neelakanta Sai Bhasma Vibhushitha [ Hara Hara ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Sadguru Sai Sadashiva
Hara Hara Shankara Shambho Mahadeva [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Neelakanta Sai Bhasma Vibhushitha [ Hara Hara ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Maheshwara [ Hara Hara ... ]
meaning: Let us bow down in reverence to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Sadashiva, the one who confers auspiciousness, Mahadeva, the blue-throated one, who has smeared Sacred Ash all over His Body and Maheshwara, who is none other than Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Sai Mahesha
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gowri Gangadhara
Jaya Jaya Samba Sadashiva
Jaya Jaya Parthi Lingeshwara
meaning: Victory to Sai Mahesha, Gangadhara consort of Mother Gowri, Sadashiva the consort of Mother Amba and the Lord of Linga whose abode is Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Sai Namo Jaya
title2: Jaya Jaya Sai Namo Jaya Shubha Dayi Namo
lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala Jaya Mahadeva Namo [ Jaya Jaya Sai ... ]
Abhaya Pradatha Vishwa Vidhata
Jagadodhara Namo
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha Namo
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai who confers all that is auspicious. Victory to Govinda, Gopala (names of Lord Krishna) and Mahadeva (Lord Shiva). Salutations to the one who grants freedom from fear and who is the Lord of the Universe. Prostrations to the Supreme consciousness who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara
title2: Jaya Jaya Shankara Hara Hara Shankara
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om Hara Om
Hara Om Hara Om Sadashiva
Adi Kaarana Ananda Lola
meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva who is known by the names Shankara, Mahadeva and Sadashiva. Chant the mantra 'Hara Om'. Glory to the one who is the Primary Source of everything and who relishes to be in Bliss.

title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
lyrics:
Parvathi Shankara Sri Sai Shankara
Srishti Sthithi Laya Karana Karana
Mruthyunjaya Gananayaka Nayaka
Uma Pathey Shiva Shankara Shankara
Gangadhara Jagadeeshwara Eshwara
meaning: Victory to Lord Shankara (Shiva), the consort of Parvathi and the one who protects us from fear. He is responsible for creation, sustenance and destruction of the Universe, the one who has won over death, the Lord of the Ganaas, the Lord of Uma, the one who holds Mother Ganges on His head and the Lord of the Universe. He is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Shankara Samba Shiva
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Dharaka Maheshwara [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Gangadhari Kailasa Vasi
Vibhuti Sundara Parthi Nivasi
meaning: Victory to Lord Shankara (Shiva), consort of Amba (Parvathi). Victory to the one who bears the three worlds, who holds the Holy Ganges on His head, who dwells in Kailasa and who has smeared Holy Ash all over His body. He is verily Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi.

title: Jaya Jaya Shankari Jaya Parameshwari
lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankari Ma
Jaya Vishweshwari Jaya Sarveshwari
Vibhuti Sundari Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Puttaparthi Pureeshwari Ma [ Vibhuti ... ]
meaning: Victory to Mother Shankari (Parvathi), Goddess of the Universe, who is besmeared with Vibhuti (Holy Ash). She has presently incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Jaya Vani Pranamamyaham
lyrics:
Manjula Bhaashini Veda Vilasini [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Bhava Bhaya Nashini Abhaya Pradayini
Parthi Nivasini Mukthi Pradayini
meaning: Prostrations to Goddess of Knowledge Vani, Mother of Vedas and of soft speech. She destroys fear of cycle of Births, bestows protection and Liberation, dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Kailasa Pathey Shiva Shankara
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Shambho
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho
Shaileshwara Karunamaya Shankara
Lingodhbhavakara Shiva Shambho
Trishoola Jatadhara Gangadhari
Haalaahala Dhara Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Shambho [ Partheeshwara Sai ... ]
Partheeshwara Sai Shiva Shambho (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Kailasa Mountains, Lord Shiva, who is Shiva and Shakthi (Parvathi). Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi who is the very embodiment of Lord Shiva. Salutations to the Lord of Shaila mountains, who is full of compassion, who has the Trident and who holds Mother Ganges in His matted locks. Salutations to Lord Sai who creates the Lingam (symbol of infinite proportions).

title: Jaya Kali Ma Kali
title2: Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
lyrics:
Thou art My Lord in Mother Form
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
 Loving Your aspect dissolves all fear
 And to Your children, You are so dear
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Mother, Mother
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 I'm so weary, Kali Ma
 My feet are worn, Kali Ma
 And I am longing, Kali Ma
 For reunion, Kali Ma
 With My blue Jewel Kali Ma
 So take me home, Kali Ma
 To My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Mother, Mother
 My blue Jewel, Kali Ma
 Jaya Kali Ma Kali Jaya Kali Ma, Kali Ma
 My blue Jewel (3X)

title: Jaya Kausalya Nandana Ram Paramananda
title2: Jaya Kausalya Nandana Ram Paramananda Ananda Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Shirdeesha Partheesha Ram Jaya Prashanthi Sayeesha Ram [ Jaya Kausalya ... ]
Mangala Pavana Naam Jaya Sundara Vaidehi Ram
Sundara Sayeesha Ram ( Jaya )
meaning: Glory to the son of Kausalya, One of Supreme Bliss, who dwells in Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi. The Name 'Ram' is supremely Auspicious and He is the beloved of Mother Vaidehi (Sita).

title: Jaya Krishna Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Jaya Radha Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari
Jaya Gopi Ke Hrudaya Vihari
Jaya Madhava Raasa Vihari
Jaya Sai Parthi Vihari
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the one who moves about through thick shrubs, on the banks of Yamuna river, the one who dwells in the hearts of Radha and the Gopis and with whom He performed the celestial dance. Victory to Lord Sai who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Krishna Madhusudhana Jaya Radha
title2: Jaya Krishna Madhusudhana Jaya Radha Mana Mohana
lyrics:
Brindavana Sanchari Govardhana Giridhari
Jaya Parthi Vihari Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the one who vanquished the demon Madhu and who charms Radha. He is Lord Narayana's incarnattion who moved about in Brindavan and held aloft the Govardhana mountain. That very Lord has incarnated as Lord Sai who now dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Krishna Mukunda Murarey
lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Brinda Vihari [ Jaya Krishna ... ]
Mana Mohana Madhava Shourie
Hara Meera Prabho Giridhari
meaning: Victory to Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Madhava, Murarey, the One who moves about in Brindavan and entices the Mind, the Valorous, is the Lord of Meera's Devotion.

title: Jaya Lambodhara Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Jagadamba Sutha Raksha Maam [ Jaya Lambodhara ... ]
Sharanagatha Raksha Maam
Hey Karuna Nidhey Paahi Maam
Sri Gananatha Samraksha Maam
Nija Bhakthi Mudam Dehi Maam
meaning: Protect me O Lord Ganesha, the one with a big belly and the son of Universal Mother Amba. Protect me, for I have surrendered to You. O the ocean of Mercy, give me true devotion to Thee, O Lord of Shiva's forces who looks after my welfare.

title: Jaya Ma Anandamayi Janani
lyrics:
Sab Ko Krupa Karo Janani
Bhaktha Janon Ke Mangala Karini
Mangala Karo Janani (Ma)
Tum Ho Prema Dayini (Ma) [ Sab Ko Krupa ... ]
meaning: Victory to Thee, O Mother Sai, You are Bliss personified. Bless us all dear Mother, You bestow auspiciousness and Supreme Love on Your devotees.

title: Jaya Ma Devi
lyrics:
Sharanam Dehi
Gaana Vinodini Gowri Manohari
Ananda Dayini Ma
Adi Parashakthi Ma

Jai Bhavani Jai Bhavani Jai Bhavani Gowri Ma 
Mata Rani Mata Rani Mata Rani Ambe Ma 
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma 
Ambe Ma Jai Jai Ma 
Gowri Ma Jai Jai Ma 
Jai Jai Ma Jai Jai Ma (4)
meaning: Glory to the Divine Mother! Surrender to the Divine Mother, who revels in the expression of music. She bestows bliss upon Her devotees, as she has supreme power.

title: Jaya Ma Jagan Ma Sathya
title2: Jaya Ma Jagan Ma Sathya Sai Ma
lyrics:
Jagadodharini Prem Sai Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Jaya Jagat ]
meaning: Bless everyone Oh Universal Mother and Redeemer of the Universe. You are Mother Santoshi who destroys sorrow and grant permanent Bliss.

title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Shirdi Shankari Ma
Jaya Parthi Eshwari Ma
Shiva Shakthi Sai Ma
Jagat Janani Jaya Jaya Ma
meaning: Hail Praises on Mother who is Shankari at Shirdi and Eshwari at Parthi. Victory to the Universal Mother who is Shiva and Shakthi in One.

title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Daya
title2: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Daya Karo Sai Ma
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Sai Ma (Sab Ko)
Mukthi Pradayini Prema Pradayini Shanthi Pradayini Ma
Janani Ma Janani Jagat Janani Sai Ma
Daya Karo Sai Ma Jaya Ma [ (Sab Ko) Krupa ]
meaning: Glory to Mother who confers Love and Peace and grants Liberation. Shower your mercy on us Oh Mother of the Universe.

title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari
title2: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma
lyrics:
Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma, Jagadeeshwari Sai Ma 
Jagadeeshwari Maheshwari Sayeeshwari Sai Ma (2)
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who is the Goddess of the Universe. She is the Supreme One and is known as Mother Sayeeshwari.

title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya
title2: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Jaya Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Prema Sai Ma Ananda Sai Ma
Krupa Sai Ma Tum Hi Daya Sai Ma
meaning: Praises be to Mother Sai who is the very personification of Supreme Love and Bliss, the One of Compassion and Mercy.

title: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya
title2: Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
lyrics:
Sunaada Vinodini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sathya Sai Saraswathi Ma
Sunaada Vinodini Ma [ Jaya Ma ... ]
Sadashiva Ranjani Ma
Sada Bhava Bhanjani Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma [ Sunaada Vinodini ... ]
meaning: O Mother Sathya Sai, You are verily Mother Saraswathi who rejoices in soulful music set to proper tune. You are ever a source of delight to Lord Shiva and the destroyer of the cycle of births.

title: Jaya Mana Mohana Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Jaya Brindavana Kalimala Haari [ Jaya Mana Mohana ... ]
Jaya Jaya Giridhara Parthi Vihari
Deena Bandhu Karunakar Sharan Tumhari
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Giridhari
meaning: Victory to the enchanter of our minds, Lord Krishna, the vanquisher of demon Mura. Victory to the one who removes the blemishes of Kali age and the one whose abode was Brindavana. Victory to the one who held aloft the Govardhana mountain to protect devotees from torrential rain. Victory to the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai. O Lord, I surrender to You. You are the most compassionate one who is kith and kin to the downtrodden. Victory to Thee, O Lord of Parthi, You are verily Lord Krishna.

title: Jaya Mana Mohana Muralidhar Mohana Murali
title2: Jaya Mana Mohana Muralidhar Mohana Murali Mohana Murali Mohana Madhusudhana Murali
lyrics:
Jaya Mana Mohana Megha Shyama 
Jaya Madhusudhana Muraliwala
Jaya Brindavana Giridhara Bala
Mohana Madhusudhana Murali (3)
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna who has bewitched our minds with the music of His flute. He destroys all evil and is the resident of Brindavan.

title: Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya
title2: Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Rama Dootha
lyrics:
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Vayu Putra
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mangala Daata
Jaya Maruti Jaya Maruti Jaya Mahanubhava
meaning: Victory to Maruti to the messenger of Rama, son of Wind God, Supreme Being and the One who confers Auspiciousness.

title: Jaya Meera Prabho Giridhari
lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Gopala Krishna Murari
Madhura Madhura Muralidhari
Ananda Ananda Sai Murari
meaning: Victory to the Lord of Meera, Lord Govinda, Gopala (names of Krishna), who held the Govardhana mountain high and the one who plays the Flute. He is verily sweetness and Bliss personified and is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Jaya Murali Madhava Shourie
lyrics:
Parama Pavana Pandari Natha
Paramatma Hey Purandara Vittala
Sri Ranga (Sai) Natha Hrudayanta Ranga
meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Krishna, Madhava the valorous one, Murali with the Flute in His Hand, Pandari Natha the Lord of Pandharpur. He is Vittala, the Supreme Consciousness and the highly sacred one and Lord of Purandara and Ranganatha, the indweller of the Heart.

title: Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
lyrics:
Mohana Moorat Sai Gopala [ Jaya Nandalala ... ]
Jaya Brindavana Madana Gopala
Jaya Partheeshwara Sai Nandalala [ Mohana Moorat ... ]
meaning: Praise be to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the son of Nanda and the most charming one who moves about in Brindavan. Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi has a captivating form and is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Jaya Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala
lyrics:
Raasa Vilola Radhey Gopala [ Jaya Nandalala ... ]
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Gopi Lola Gopala Bala
meaning: Chant the name of Gopala, the son of Nanda, who performed the Celestial dance with Radha and other Gopis, delights in playing lilting tunes with the Flute and motivator of Sages and Saints.

title: Jaya Nandalala Jaya Nandalala
lyrics:
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala [ Jaya Nandalala ... ]
Vishwa Vanditha Vijaya Gopala
Veda Vedantha Venu Gopala
Radha Vallabha Raasa Vilola
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the consort of Radha, who danced the celestial dance with the Gopis. Lord Gopala who holds the flute in His hand, is worshipped by the entire Universe and He is the origin of Vedas and Upanishads.

title: Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Sai Om [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Paramatma Jaya Hari Om
Parabrahma Sai Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om Jaya (Sai) Hari Om
meaning: Victory to Lord Narayana also hailed as Lord Hari. Chant the powerful mantra "Hari Om". Victory to Lord Sai, the Supreme Soul who is none other than Lord Hari.

title: Jaya Narayana Jaya Hari Om
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Jaya Hari Om [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Brahma Shivaarchita Jaya Hari Om
Paapa Vinashaka Jaya Hari Om
Jaya Hari Om (Om) Jaya Hari Om
meaning: Victory to Lord Narayana (Hari) who is worshipped by even the Lord of creation Brahma and the Lord of dissolution Shiva. Chant the holy names of Lord Narayana and Lord Sai that destroys sins.

title: Jaya Narayana Sadguru Deva
lyrics:
Gayana Narthana Priya Mahadeva (Sai Deva) [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Nirakara Saakara Tum Hi Ho
Poorna Brahma Avatara Tum Hi Ho
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Victory to the Divine Preceptor Sai who is none other than Lord Narayana and Lord Mahadeva. Glory to the one who delights in soulful music and dance. O Lord Sai, You are both the Form and Formless divinity and the Incarnation of God in its Totality. You are the Lord of Parthi.

title: Jaya Narayana Sathya Narayana
lyrics:
Keshava Madhava Hari Narayana [ Jaya Narayana ... ]
Sri Krishna Govinda Sai Narayana
Mukunda Madhava Sathya Narayana
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna also known as Keshava, Madhava, Govinda, Mukunda. Glory to Lord Krishna who is Lord Narayana. Lord Sathya Sai is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Jaya Narayani Durga Lakshmi
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Ambe Bhavani
Jaya Jaya Shirdi Sai Bhavani
Kamale Kamini Hari Narayani
Parthi Nivasini Sai Narayani
meaning: Victory to Mother Goddess Durga, mother of the Universe, and to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi; to the consort of Vishnu who loves lotus flowers.

title: Jaya Pandari Natha Panduranga
title2: Jaya Pandari Natha Panduranga Pundalika Varada
lyrics:
Jaya Parthi Pureesha Pavana Naama Prashanthi Sayeesha
Jaya Vittala Vittala Paahi Jaya Vithoba Rakhumayi
Sri Nikethana Srinivasa Shritha Jana Paripala
Paramanda Vigraha Ananda Lola Pandari Pura Vasa
Jaya Parthipuri Vasa [ Jaya Vittala ... ]
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga, the Lord of Pandari, the one who blessed Pundalika. Victory to the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai, whose very name is sacred and who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam. Protect us O Lord Vittala, the consort of Rakhumayi. O Lord, You are Lord Srinivasa (Vishnu) in whom Mother Lakshmi (Sri) resides. You are the protector of Your devotees. You are ever blissful in Your beautiful form at Pandari. Victory to Thee who is none other than Lord Sai whose abode is Parthi.

title: Jaya Panduranga Jaya Vittala
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Purandara Vittala Parama Dayala
meaning: Victory to Lord Vittala, the one standing on a brick, the redeemer of the Universe, Lord of Pandharpur, the Indweller and the one who is supremely compassionate.

title: Jaya Panduranga Prabho Vittala
lyrics:
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Sri Ramani Hrudayanta Ranga
Mangala Kara Karunanta Ranga
Aashritha Deena Janavana Ranga
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala [ Panduranga Vittala ... ]
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala (4)
alt_lyrics:
Ranga Vittala Pandu Ranga Vittala
Sri Ramani Hrudayanta Ranga
Mangala Kara Karunanta Ranga
Ashritha Deena Janavana Ranga
Jagadodhara Hari Vittala
[Ranga Vittala Panduranga Vittala]
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur, the liberator of the world. Lord Ranga dwells in the heart of His consort, Mother Lakshmi. He is auspiousness personified and is the most compassionate one. He bestows benevolence and compassion on the destitute. Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala.

title: Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
lyrics:
Jaya Gowreesha Jaya Gangadhara
Jatadhara Jaya Sai Shankara
Vijayee Bhava Tava Sharanam Dehi
Sharanam Dehi
meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva, Lord of Gowri, who bears Mother Ganges in His matted locks, who is the personification of Supreme Consciousness, who is Sai Shankara, the Lord of Parthi. O Lord, I sing Your praises and seek Your protection.

title: Jaya Partheesha Jaya Paramesha
lyrics:
Jaya Sayeesha Namo
Abhaya Pradatha Prema Pradatha
Jaya Sayeesha Namo
Karuna Sagara Hey Paramesha
Jaya Sayeesha Namo
meaning: Victory to the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sathya Sai, the Supreme Lord. Salutations to the one who gives protection and Divine Love. Salutations to the ocean of compassion, Lord Sai

title: Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Parameshwari Jaya
title2: Jaya Partheeshwari Jaya Parameshwari Jaya Sarveshwari Mata
lyrics:
Mangala Dayini Moksha Pradayini Parthi Pureeshwari Mata [ Jaya Partheeshwari ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Ananda Dayini Sai Ma
Akhilandeshwari Sai Ma
Ananda Roopini Mata
meaning: Glory to the Supreme Mother of all, Mother Sai, who confers benevolence and Liberation and who dwells in Parthi. Mother Sai frees us from fear and grants Bliss. She is the Mother of the Universe and the very personification of Bliss.

title: Jaya Radha Madhava Jaya
title2: Jaya Radha Madhava Jaya Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Jaya Gopijana Vallabha Jaya Girivara Dhari [ Jaya Radha ... ]
Yashoda Nandana Vraja Jana Ranjana (2)
Yamuna Teera Vihari

Hare Krishna Hare Krishna Krishna Krishna Hare Hare
Hare Rama Hare Rama Rama Rama Hare Hare
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna and Radha, who reside in the gardens of Brindavana. Victory to the one who is adored by the Gopis. Victory to the one who granted a boon to the Govardhana mountain and held it on His little finger. Glory to the son of Mother Yashoda and who is endearing to the people of Brindavana. Victory to the one who resides on the banks of the river Yamuna. Chant the names of Rama and Krishna.

title: Jaya Radha Manohara Nandalala
lyrics:
Jaya Geeta Vinodana Shubha Lola
Jaya Shyama Murari Goparipala (3)
Jaya Sai Murari Parthi Gopala
meaning: Victory to the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, the charmer of Radha, who delights in sacred music. Gopala the dark colored, slayer of demon Mura, takes care of Gopis and is verily Sai of Parthi.

title: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya
title2: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Jaya Rama
lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Janani Janaki Rama [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Nava Nava Komala Megha Shyama
Bhava Harana Bhadrachala Rama
meaning: Victory to Rama whose consort is Janaki, the Mother of Universe. Victory to the one who is ever new and fresh, the one who is of deep blue complexion, the Lord of Bhadrachala (pilgrim city in Andhra Pradesh) who destroys the cycle of Birth.

title: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Siya Ram
title2: Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Siya Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Janaki Vallabha Sita Ram
Bhaktha Uddharana Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Mayi Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam
Mandara Giridhari Hey Ghana Shyam
Mandasmitha Mukha Radhey Shyam
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Jaya Sita Ram
Jaya Jaya Ram Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Janaki Vallabha Sita Ram
Bhaktha Uddharana Sai Ram [ Jaya Raghu Nandana ... ]
Mayi Meera Prabhu Radhey Shyam
Mandara Giridhari Hey Ghana Shyam
Mandasmitha Mukha Radhey Shyam
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama who belongs to the Raghu clan and who is the consort of Mother Janaki and who redeems devotees. Lord Krishna (Shyam) always has a smiling countenance and is also the Lord of Meera and the one who held high Mountain Mandara to protect tribesmen from the wrath of torrential rain. He is our own Sai Rama of untainted reputation.

title: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna
title2: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Baba Harey Jaya Brindavana Ghana Shyam
Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Parthi Puri Sai Ram [ Jaya Sai Harey ]
meaning: Sing in Praise of Rama, Krishna the dark colored One who moves about in Brindavan, Sai Baba otherwise known as Sai Rama who dwells in Parthi.

title: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Rama
title2: Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Rama Harey Jaya Sita Rama Harey
lyrics:
Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Krishna Harey Jaya Radha Krishna Harey
Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Harey Jaya Sai Baba Harey
meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, Krishna whose consort is Radha and Sai who is also known as Sai Baba.

title: Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sri Raghu Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Jaya Rama Sita Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama of Raghu clan, whose consort is Janaki, also known as Sita. Lord Rama has incarnated in this age as Sai Rama.
raga: vakulabharanam / basant mukhari, sindhu bhairavi / bhairavi

title: Jaya Rama Mohana Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Rama Sri Raghu Ram
Jaya Rama Sai Ram [ Jaya Rama Mohana ... ]
Jaya Rama Sita Ram
Jaya Rama Janaki Ram
Jaya Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to the enchanting Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty whose consort is Sita (Janaki). Victory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Jaya Rama Raghu Rama
lyrics:
Ranadheera Sukumara [ Jaya Rama ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Rajeeva Lochana Rama Rama
meaning: Victory to the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the mighty and valorous yet so tender natured, the reputed one who is the crown jewel of the Raghu clan.

title: Jaya Rama Rama Rama Harey
lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Shyama Shyama Harey
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Ghana Shyama Sundara Sai Krishna Harey
Rama Harey Krishna Harey
meaning: Repeat the name of Rama, Lord of the Raghu dynasty and Shyama the Dark complexioned Lord who has compelling looks.

title: Jaya Ranga Panduranga
lyrics:
Sri Ranga Pandareesha 
Sai Ranga Pandareesha 
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha 
Pavana Purusha Jaya Sayeesha
meaning: Victory to Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur. Victory to Sai, the Supreme Divinity who is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram Jaya
title2: Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram Jaya Sai Mahadeva
lyrics:
Jaya Parthi Puri Ke Ram Jaya Shirdi Puri Ke Shyam
Lohitambara Dhara Parthi Pureeshwara
Jaya Sadguru Sai Ram
Jaya Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Victory to the Sacred preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva. Victory to Ram who has incarnated as the Lord of Parthi and Shyam who had incarnated as the Lord of Shirdi. Glory to the Sacred Preceptor Sai Ram and Sai Mahadeva who wears a red robe.

title: Jaya Sai Gopala Jaya Nandalala
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Krishna Jaya Mana Mohana
Shyamala Komala Jaya Parthi Krishna [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Hrudaya Vihara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Chitha Chora Hey Chitha Chora
Bhakthon Ke Pyaarey Krishna Pyaarey Bala Sai Krishna
meaning: This song extols the virtues of Lord Sai Krishna as the one who enchants and steals the hearts of devotees who love Him.

title: Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai
title2: Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
lyrics:
Guru Seva Bina Nirvana Nahin Jaya Sai Guru Deva [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Tum Hi Ho Mata Pitha Tum Hi Ho Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Raaha Dikhao Sai Guru Deva [ Guru Seva ... ]
meaning: There is no salvation without Your Service, O Preceptor Sai. Grace me with Your advice. You are the embodiment of Truth, my Mother, Father and Preceptor.

title: Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai
title2: Jaya Sai Guru Deva Sai Guru Deva
lyrics:
Kokoro wo Komete Otsukae Shimasu Sai Guru Deva [ Jaya Sai... ]
Anata wa Haha, Anata wa Chichi Sai Guru Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Omamori Kudasai Sai Guru Deva [ Kokoro... ]
meaning: Victory to divine Preceptor Sai. O Lord, we serve You intently from the bottom of our hearts. You are our mother, father and Guru. O Lord, the embodiment of Truth, please protect us.

title: Jaya Sai Maharaj Dayalu
lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara ( Jaya Sai ... )
Pranavakara Sundara Sundara
Natana Manohara Nata Shiva Shankara
Puttapartheeshwara Daya Krupalu
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the compassionate one of Puttaparthi; to Lord Sai Shiva, the beautiful dancer and creator of the life force.

title: Jaya Sai Mohana Shyam
lyrics:
Jaya Sai Mangala Dham
Sai Madhava Sai Keshava 
Sai Premamaya Bhagawan [ Jaya Sai Mohana ... ]
Jaya Sai Pavana Naam
Jaya Sai Shanthi Nidhan [ Sai Madhava ... ]
meaning: Glory to the enchanting, dark-skinned Sai Krishna! He is all auspiciousness, the Lord of creation and the remover of obstacles. Glory to the sacred name of Sai, who is the bastion of peace, and who is Love itself.

title: Jaya Sai Ram Sathya Sai
title2: Jaya Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Jaya Sai Shyam Sai Ghana Shyam [ Jaya Sai Ram ... ]
Ram Rahim Terey Hi Naam
Buddha Mahavir Nanak Naam
Sab Dharmon Mey Sai Ghana Shyam
Hrudaya (Parthi) Nivasi Sai Ghana Shyam
meaning: Victory to Lord Sathya Sai who is verily Lord Rama and Ghanashyam (Krishna). He embodies all names and forms of divinity. He is worshipped by all religions. He is the resident of Puttaparthi as well as our hearts.

title: Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu
title2: Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
lyrics:
Hey Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Raghu Rama [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Dukhiyon Ke Daata Sai Rama
Premavatara Sai Rama
Shantha Swaroopa Sai Rama [ Hey Jaya ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Sai and the scion of Raghu Clan, Lord Rama. Sai Rama is a champion of the downtrodden, the incarnation of Supreme Love and is the embodiment of Peace.

title: Jaya Sai Shankara Jaya Abhayankara
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey [ Jaya Sai ... ]
Jaya Gangadhara Jaya Bimbadhara
Vyagrambara Dhara Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey Shiva Hara Hey
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shankara (Shiva) who bestows freedom from fear, the one whose other half is 'Amba' (Parvathi). He is also known as Hara, He holds the river Ganga and crescent moon on His head and sits on tiger skin.

title: Jaya Sayeesha Jaya Sayeesha
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Jaya Partheesha [ Jaya Sayeesha ... ]
Hrudaya Sarathi Sai Kanhaiya
Radhey Govinda Prashanthi Nilaya
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai, who is verily Lord Krishna incarnated again on Earth, who is the charioteer of the Spiritual Heart and dwells at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.

title: Jaya Shankara Bhaava Gochara Shiva
title2: Jaya Shankara Bhaava Gochara Shiva Chidambara Omkara
lyrics:
Parthi Vihara Paapa Vidhura
Jagadodhara Brahmapara (3)
meaning: Glory to Shankara who is beyond senses, Lord of Chidambaram (Holy place in India), personified as Omkara, the Supreme Brahman, the Lord of Parthi who removes sin and uplifts the world.

title: Jaya Shiva Shankara Kailasa Vasi
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Ramachandra Ayodhya Vasi [ Jaya Shiva ... ]
Jaya Jaya Sri Krishna Dwaraka Vasi
Jaya Jaya Ram Krishna Dakshina Vasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Jaya Shirdi Nivasi
Jaya Jaya Jaya Puttaparthi Nivasi
meaning: Victory to Shiva Shankara who has His Abode at Kailasa, Ramachandra at Ayodhya, Sri Krishna at Dwaraka, Ramakrishna at Dakshineshwar and to the One who dwells at Shirdi and Puttaparthi.

title: Jaya Sri Ganesha Vighna Nasha
title2: Jaya Sri Ganesha Vighna Nasha Gajanana
lyrics:
Vidya Buddhi Sarva Siddhi Suranjana [ Jaya Sri ... ]
Jaya Heramba Sri Jagadamba Nandana
Eka Dantha Dayavantha Shubhanana
Mangala Dayaka Sri Vinayaka Vandana
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganaas, Ganesha, the destroyer of obstacles, who has the head of an elephant, who confers scholarship, intelligence and power. Glory to the son of Universal Mother (Parvathi). Glory to the one who is single tusked, compassionate and who bestows auspiciousness. I bow to Thee who is the highest.

title: Jaya Sri Madhava Jaya Radhe
title2: Jaya Sri Madhava Jaya Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Mukunda Murahara Murali Govinda
Aao Jaya Murali Govinda
Deena Bandhu Deena Nath Radhey Govinda
Prema Sindhu Prema Natha Sai Govinda
meaning: Salutations to Radha's Lord, Govinda(Krishna), the charming flute-player and slayer of demon Mura. He is an ocean of love and the kinsman and Lord of those who are less fortunate.

title: Jaya Sri Radhey Jaya Nanda Nandana
title2: Jaya Sri Radhey Jaya Nanda Nandana
lyrics:
Jaya Sri Radhey Jaya Yadu Nandana
Vittala Hari Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Hari Vittala Pandhari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Vittala Pandhari Natha Vittala
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha and the son of Nanda of the Yadu clan. Victory to the Lord Panduranga (Vittala) of Pandharpur.

title: Jaya Vallabha Gananayaka
lyrics:
Jaya Guha Sodara Shubha Daata
Jaya Hey Eshwari Nandana
Jaya Vara Dayaka Namostuthey
Jaya Partheeshwara Namostuthey
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Ganaas, Lord Ganesha, the brother of Guha (Lord Subrahmanya). Glory to the son of Eshwari (Parvathi) who bestows auspiciousness. Salutations to the one who confers boons, who is none other than Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Jaya Vijayee Bhava Jaya Vijayee
title2: Jaya Vijayee Bhava Jaya Vijayee Bhava
lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Hanumantha
Pavana Kumara Paavana Veera
Ati Balavantha Hanumantha
Anjani Putra Veeranjaneya
Niranjana Vijayee Bhava (Bolo) (2)
meaning: Victory to the Lord Hanuman, the one who removes the fear of repetitive Births. The son of Pavana and Anjana is blemishless and is of extraordinary strength.

title: Jaya Vijayee Bhava Parthi Pureeshwara
lyrics:
Jaya Bhakthashraya Krupa Maya
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sarva Jagat Rakshaka
Jaya Jaya Jaya Janardhana
Jaya Jaya Jaya Sayeeshwara
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai, who dwells at Parthi who has utmost compassion for His devotees. He is the Protector of the whole Universe and the motivator for His followers.

title: Jaya Vittala Vittala Vittala Jaya
title2: Jaya Vittala Vittala Vittala Jaya Vittala Panduranga
lyrics: Jaya Vittala Panduranga (3)
meaning: Chant incessantly the name of Vittala. Victory to Lord Panduranga, the one standing on a brick.

title: Jayatu Jayatu Rama
lyrics:
Janani Janaki Rama
Janana Marana Bhaya Klesha Vinashaka
Raghupathi Sita Rama Rama Ramethi Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, consort of Mother Janaki, the one who destroys the fear of birth and death, the Emperor of the Raghu dynasty.

title: Jayatu Shiva Natana Shiva
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadeesha Mahesha Shiva [ Jayatu Shiva ... ]
Bhasma Vibhushitha Phaala Shashidhara
Pingala Lochana Ganga Mohana
Pinaka Vaibhava Sai Shankara
meaning: Sing the glories of the Lord of Dance, Lord Shiva, the Universal and Sovereign Lord. Shiva has the Sacred Ash smeared all over His body, the Crescent Moon on His forehead, has brown-colored eyes, charms Mother Ganges and holds the Bow (Pinaka) in His hand. Lord Sai is none other than Lord Shiva.

title: Jayatu Shiva Shiva Janaki Rama
lyrics:
Jaya Raghu Nandana Radhey Shyama
Tyaga Karo Abhimaan
Dhyan Karo Hari Naam [ Jayatu Shiva ... ]
Taraka Naama Smaranam
Tapatraya Samharanam
meaning: Chant the Glory of Lord Shiva, Janaki Rama, Raghu Nandana, Radhey Shyam. Shed your Ego and Chant Hari's Name, which destroys our Sin and helps us to cross the cycle of Births.

title: Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala
lyrics:
Rakumayi Vittala Ranga Vittala [ Jayatu Vittala ... ]
Jayatu Vittala Jaya Vittala [ Rakumayi Vittala ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Vittala, Ranga Vittala and His consort Rakumayi continuously.

title: Jeevan Jyothi Jalao Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Jo Kuch Mera Sab Hai Tera [ Jeevan Jyothi ... ]
Daya Karo Mujhey Hey Sai Shyama
Sharan Lagalo Mujhey Krishna Kanhaiya
Hey Anatha Natha Sri Sai Natha
meaning: Light the Lamp of my Life, O Young Krishna, I owe everything to You. O Lord, accept me into Your fold and bless me with Your Grace. You are none other than Lord Sai, the refuge of the forlorn.

title: Jeevan Jyothi Tum Ho Sai
lyrics:
Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao Sai Prem Ki Jyothi Jalao
Jeevan Ke In Andhiyaron Mey Sai Deep Jalao
Sai Deep Jalao Sathya Sai Deep Jalao [ Prem Ki Jyothi ... ]
meaning: You are the Lamp of Life O Lord Sai, light in us the lamp of Love. Enlighten our life so we may cross the dark crevices of this turbulent world.

title: Jeevan Ki Naiya Mori Paar
title2: Jeevan Ki Naiya Mori Paar Karo Sai Nath
lyrics:
Sai Nath Sai Nath Parthi Puri Sai Nath
Prem Sudha Sagar Tum Sai Bhagawan
Deena Bandhu Deena Sakha Sai Bhagawan
Madath Karo Raksha Karo Sai Natha Hey [ Sai Nath ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, help me to reach the other end through the boat of Life, O the Lord of Parthi. O Sai Bhagawan, protect me, for You are verily the Ocean of Supreme Love, the refuge of the forlorn and the deserted.

title: Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ
title2: Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ, Jesus Christ, whoa Jesus Christ (4)
lyrics: Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, whoa Sathya Sai (4)

title: Jesus said
title2: Jesus said, “He who sent me will come again” (2x)
lyrics:
Sai, Sai, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (2x)

Jesus said, “The Lamb will sound His name” (2x)
Baba Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (2x)

Jesus said, “His name will mean the Truth” (2x)
Sathya, Sathya, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (2x)

Jesus said, “His robe will be blood red” (2x)
Sai, Sai, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (2x)

Jesus said, “His crown will be His hair” (2x)
Baba Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (2x)

Jesus said, “He who sent me will come again” (2x)
Sathya, Sathya, Sathya Sai Baba, Baba, Baba (4x)

title: Jesus, Jesus, Son of the Lord
title2: Jesus, Jesus, Son of the Lord
lyrics:
Jesus, Jesus, dear Son of God
 Let me call your Name, let man cry in shame
 That the love You taught, my Lord, is lost again
 Love was Your Life, love was Your call
 Love was the reason why You gave Your life, my Lord
 Love God and most of all, those who hate you, love them all
 Love your neighbor as yourself was Your Call

title: Jhulana Jhulaye Brij Bala
lyrics:
Jhule Nandalala Jhule Sai Bala [ Jhulana Jhulaye ... ]
Resham Ki Dori Sone Ka Palna
Arathi Utarey Sai Bala [ Jhule Nandala ... ]
meaning: Rock the swing gently, my dear Sai Krishna, the sweet child of Brij and the son of Nanda. O Sai Krishna, accept our salutations while You rock in the golden cardle, draped in silk.

title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Krishna Natavara Nandalala [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Govinda Giridhara Gokula Bala
Shyama Manohara Muraliwala
Shobhita Sundara Prem Hindola
meaning: Oh Gopala, rock in the swing of my heart, the mischievous son of Nanda. Govinda, the dark-complexioned boy of Gokul who held the Govardhana mountain high, has the Flute in His hand and a bewitching smile on His face.

title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule
lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule ( Sai ) Jhulana Jhule [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Jhulana Jhule
Sarva Dharma Aikya Roopa Jhulana Jhule [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
meaning: Ride the swing, O Lord Sai; You are truth, righteousness, peace, and love, and You personify the unity of all faiths.

title: Jhulana Jhule Sai Jhulana Jhule
lyrics:
Nandana Nandana Ananda Chandana
Madhava Mana Mohana Sai Narayana
meaning: Rock the Swing of My Heart Oh son of Nanda who is Bliss Supreme, Oh Madhava who draws everyone's Mind, Oh Sai Narayana.

title: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai
title2: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
lyrics:
Sai Nandalala Jai Jai Gopala [ Jhulana Mey ... ]
Murali Lola Gokula Bala
Radha Manohara Raasa Vilola
Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
Dheere Dheere Hauley Hauley
meaning: Rock the swing gently, my Sai who is verily Lord Krishna, the darling son of Nanda; You are the boy from Gokul, who plays the flute, likes to perform the folk dance, Raasa, and You enchant Radha's mind.

title: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
title2: Jhulana Mey Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
lyrics:
Jhulana Jhule Jhulana Jhule [ Jhulana Mey Jhule ... ] 
Ma Eshwaramma Jhulana Jhulave 
Godi Mey Bittake Kahani Sunaye 
Hari Katha Choti Sai Ram Ko Sunaye 
Apni Hi Katha Suno Sai Nandalala 
Jhulana Mey Jhule Sai Bala Gopala
meaning: O young, Lord Sai, swing my Lord. Mother Eshwaramma rocks Your cradle gently. She seats You on her lap and tells You Your own story. She tells You the stories of Lord Hari. Listen to Your own story, O Lord Sai while You rock gently on the cradle.

title: Jhule Merey Sai Jhule Mere Baba
title2: Jhule Merey Sai Jhule Merey Baba
lyrics:
Jhulana Jhulaye Merey Sai (Baba) (2)
Resham Ki Dori Sone Ka Palana [ Jhulana Jhulaye ... ]
Shirdi Ke Sai Parthi Ke Baba [ Jhulana Jhulaye ... ]
meaning: Rock gently in the golden swing draped in silk, O my Lord Sai, You are the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Jhule Mey Jhule Merey Sai
title2: Jhule Mey Jhule Merey Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Ram Merey Bhagawan [ Jhulana Jhule ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Jaya Jaya Ram
Man Mandir Mey Jhule Sai Ram [ Sathya Sai ... ]
meaning: Rock the swing of our heart to the tune of this song, O Lord Sathya Sai, the son of Eshwaramba. May Lord Sai be in our minds and in our hearts. Victory to Sai Ram.

title: Jingle Bells
lyrics:
In A One-horse Open Sleigh
O'er The Fields We Go
Laughing All The Way
Bells On Bobtail Ring
Making Spirits Bright
What Fun It Is To Ride And Sing
A Sleighing Song Tonight!

2. Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way.
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.
Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way;
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.

3. A Day Or Two Ago
I Thought I'd Take A Ride
And Soon, Miss Fanny Bright
Was Seated By My Side,
The Horse Was Lean And Lank
Misfortune Seemed His Lot
He Got Into A Drifted Bank
And Then We Got Upset.

4. Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way.
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh.
Jingle Bells, Jingle Bells,
Jingle All The Way;
Oh! What Fun It Is To Ride
In A One-horse Open Sleigh

title: Jo Bhi Hari Ka Bhajan
title2: Jo Bhi Hari Ka Bhajan Karey
lyrics:
Woh Hi Brahma Hari Pad Paavey
Sai Nath Jo Bhajana Karey
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Karey
meaning: Those who chant the name of Hari alone reach the position of Brahman (Lord of Universe). Those who chant the name of Sai is sure to cross the cycle of birth and death.

title: Joota Jatadhara Gangadhari
lyrics:
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
Shiva Shiva Om Hara Hara Om [ Shivaya Namah ]
Gangadhara Gowri Shiva
Shivaya Namah Shiva Om
meaning: Prostrations to Shiva who has Ganges on His matted Locks of Hair on His Head and consort of Gowri.

title: Joy To The World
title2: 1. Joy To The World, The Lord Has Come!
lyrics:
Let Earth Receive Her King;
Let Every Heart Prepare Him Room,
And Heaven And Nature Sing,
And Heaven And Nature Sing,
And Heaven, And Heaven, And Nature Sing.

2. Joy To The World, The Savior Reigns!
Let Men Their Songs Employ;
While Fields And Floods, Rocks, Hills And Plains
Repeat The Sounding Joy,
Repeat The Sounding Joy,
Repeat, Repeat, The Sounding Joy.

3. No More Let Sins And Sorrows Grow,
