Nor Thorns Infest The Ground;
He Comes To Make His Blessings Flow
Far As The Curse Is Found,
Far As The Curse Is Found,
Far As, Far As, The Curse Is Found.

4. He Rules The World With Truth And Grace,
And Makes The Nations Prove
The Glories Of His Righteousness,
And Wonders Of His Love,
And Wonders Of His Love,
And Wonders, Wonders, Of His Love

title: Joyful Joyful We Adore Thee
title2: Joyful, joyful we adore Thee, God of Glory, Lord of Love;
lyrics:
Hearts unfold like flowers before Thee, opening to the sun above.
 Melt the clouds of sin and sadness; drive the dark of doubt away;
 Giver of immortal gladness, fill us with the light of day.
 Thou art giving and forgiving, ever blessing, ever blest;
 Well-spring of the joy of living, ocean depth of happy rest.
 Thou our Father, Christ our brother, all who live in love are Thine
 Teach us how to love each other, lift us to the joy divine.

title: Joyful Praise To Ganesha
title2: Joyful praise to Ganesha, we yield to Your power
lyrics:
You remove our obstacles, smooth ways to Sai Baba [ Joyful praise … ]
We are thankful to You, Ganesha for Your kindness 
Selfless service such as this, clearing path to Lord Sathya 
Together we yield to You, bow to You Ganesha (Gajanana)

title: Just Baba
lyrics:
Oh Bhagawan, Oh Swami, Sai Baba (2x)
Any name you call it doesn’t matter at all
That He opens your heart, and there He is installed
Anywhere you pray it doesn’t matter at all
It must come from your heart or not at all
Anything you ask it doesn’t matter at all
He raised palms unto your palms, but your needs will be absolved
The laws of nature of cause, effect, the duality of white or black
You pray to Him to transcend these forms, how will you sacrifice to correct your thoughts
No matter where your life will lead you to He will always be with you, just He and you
Just Baba and you

title: Jyothi Prakasha Prema Pradatha Sai
title2: Jyothi Prakasha Prema Pradatha Sai Mahadeva Namo Sai Mahadeva Namo
lyrics:
Deena Dukha Bhanjana Bhaktha Niranjana Sai Mahadeva Namo Sai Mahadeva Namo 
Jagadoddharana Veda Narayana Sai Mahadeva Namo Sai Mahadeva Namo 
Pranavakaara Patithoddhara Sai Mahadeva Namo 
Sai Mahadeva Namo Sai Mahadeva Namo
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Lords, Sai, who is verily the effulgence of Divine Light and the bestower of Divine Love. Salutations to Lord Sai, the destroyer of miseries and the one who enthralls His devotees. Salutations to Lord Sai who uplifts the entire universe and from whom the Vedas originated. Salutations to Lord Sai, the source of the primordial sound Om and the liberator of the downtrodden.

title: Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Yogeshwaraya Namo
lyrics:
Jagat Vitaya Vishwa Roopaya
(Sathya) Sayeeshwaraya Namo
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
alt_lyrics:
Kaalatheethaya Siddhi Roopaya Yogeshwaraya Namo
Jagat Hithaya Vishwa Roopaya
(Sathya) Sayeeshwaraya Namo
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
meaning: We bow to the Lord of Yogis, Lord Sai who is beyond time and who is the embodiment of supreme power. We bow to Lord Sai, the provider of the world, the one who has the Universe as His form, who is verily Lord Shiva and the embodiment of Om.

title: Kaali Kaali Maha Kaali Kapalini
lyrics:
Durga Durga Devi Durga Bhavani
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Raja Rajeshwari Lakshmi ( Sai ) Narayani
meaning: Salutations to Mother Kaali, the dark complexioned, ferocious, wearing a garland of skulls. She is Durga Bhavani the destroyer of evil. She is the Lord of Emperors also known as Maheshwari, Gowri, Lakshmi and Narayani the bestower of Auspiciousness.

title: Kaali Kapalini Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Lakshmi Narayani Jagat Janani
Parthi Nivasini Jagat Janani
Triloka Palini Jagat Janani
Trinetra Dharini Jagat Janani
Brahma Sanathani Jagat Janani
Jayatu Sai Janani Janani
meaning: Glory to the Mother of the Universe, Mother Kaali, who wears a garland of Skulls. Glory to Goddess Lakshmi, the consort of Lord Narayana,. Glory to the Guardian of the Three worlds, the one who bears three eyes and is the eternal one. Glory to the Universal Mother Sai who has Her abode in Parthi.

title: Kab Logey Khabar Morey Ram
lyrics:
Mujhey Apna Banalo Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram [ Ghana Shyam ]
meaning: When will you take notice of me Oh Lord Ram? Let me merge in you Oh dark complexioned Shyam. Chant repeatedly the name of Lord Sai Ram, Ghana Shyam.

title: Kagari naki Ai to Hikari
title2: Kagari naki Ai to Hikari wo Warera ni Atae Tamou
lyrics:
Michibiki tamae Watashi no Sai Rama
Buddha Krishna Subete no Kamisama Warera wo Sukui Tamou
Tada Hitotsu no Ai no Chikara de
Sri Sathya Sai Ai no Hikari yo Towa ni Kagayaki Tamou
Yasashiki Haha yo Watashi no Sai Rama
meaning: O Sai, You are the Lord who gives us love and light without end. You guide us down the right path. Whether You are called Buddha or Krishna, You are the one being who always helps us with the power of love. Kind Mother Sai, Your light and love are endlessly brilliant.

title: Kagirinai Omoi wa Haruka Naru
title2: Kagirinai Omoi wa Haruka Naru Shirabe
lyrics:
Inori wo Sasagetsutsu Kiyoraka ni Mawaru
Warera wo Mamori Terasu Kono Yasashisa yo
Afure Kuru Takanari wa Anata no Moto e

Sai Ram O Swami (4)
meaning: O Lord Sai, for a long time I have been filled with these endless thoughts of You. They come straight from You. I offer You these pure prayers so that You may protect me and shine Your light of kindness on me.

title: Kahan Main Dhoondoon Hey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Darshan Do Darshan Do
Darsha Dikhao Merey Sai Bhagawan
Kahin Mandir Mey Kahin Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Hai Bhagawan
Kahin Teerath Mey Kahin Moorat Mey
Parthi Puri Ke Prabhu Sai Bhagawan
Darshan Do Darshan Do [ Darsha Dikhao ... ]
meaning: Where shall I search for You, Oh Sai Bhagawan? Grant us Your Divine Darshan. The Lord is not only found in the deities of temples, mosques or holy places but also within our hearts. Grant us Your Darshan Oh Sai Bhagawan.

title: Kailasa Nathaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Vaikunta Vasaya Namah Om
Parthi Pureeshaya Namah Om
Sri Sai Devaya Namah Om
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, who is verily Lord Shiva, the Lord of Kailasa and Lord Narayana, the resident of Vaikunta.

title: Kailasa Pathey Bhagawan Shankara
lyrics:
Ayodhya Pathi Sri Rama Raghuvara
Mathura Pathey Sri Krishna Natavara
Parthi Pathey Sai Ram Shankara
meaning: Shankara is the Lord of Kailasa. Sri Rama belongs to Raghu lineage and is the Lord of Ayodhya. Krishna the supreme actor is the Lord of Mathura and Sai Shankara is the Lord of Parthi.

title: Kailasa Pathey Karuna Nidhey
lyrics:
Karuna Nidhey Sharanam Prabho [ Kailasa Pathey ... ]
Ganga Jatadhara Girija Pathey
Shambho Shankara Sai Prabho
meaning: I surrender to the Lord of Kailasa (Lord Shiva) who is an Ocean of compassion. Glory to the one who holds the river Ganges on His matted locks and who is the consort of Mother Girija (Parvathi). Surrender to Lord Sai, who is verily Lord Shiva, the origin of all that is auspicious,

title: Kailasa Pathey Mahadeva Shambho
lyrics:
Hari Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Hey Shiva Shankara Sai Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Tripurari Bhava Bhaya Haari Om Namah Shivaya
Hey Pralayankara Hara Hara Shankara Om Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Sai Om Namah Shivaya (2)
Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya
meaning: Praise be to Lord Shiva, the Lord of Lords, the dweller of Mount Kailasa and the bestower of auspiciousness. Chant the mantra 'Om Nama Shivaya' repeatedly. Shankara who is also Lord Sai bestows welfare, the destroyer of Tripura and who negates the fear of rebirth, the one who causes the final delusion.

title: Kailasa Pathey Sai Karuna Nidhey
lyrics:
Parvathi Pathey Pashupathey [ Kailasa Pathey ... ]
Shambho Shankara Shirdi (Parthi) Pathey
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Paramesha Pathey (Sri)

Om Namah Sivaya Namah Shivaya (3)
alt_lyrics:
Kailasa Pathey Sai Karuna Nidhey
Parvathi Pathey Pashupathey [ Kailasa Pathey ... ]
Shambho Shankara Shirdi (Parthi) Pathey
Chandrakala Dhara Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Shiva Vishwa Pathey (Sri)

Om Namah Sivaya Namah Shivaya (3)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, the Lord of Kailasa who is the ocean of compassion. He is the consort of Mother Parvathi and is the Lord of Animals. Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi is verily Lord Shiva, the one who has Ganges on His head and is the consort of Gowri. Lord Sathya Sai is the Supreme Lord of the Universe.

title: Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
lyrics:
Ananda Tandava Sadashiva
Himagiri Vasa Samba Shiva [ Kailasa Vasa ... ]
Ganapathi Sevitha Hey Jagadeesha
Sharavana Sevitha Hey Paramesha
Shaila Girishwara Uma Maheshwara
Neela Lochana Natana Natesha [ Ananda Tandava ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva who holds the holy river Ganges and who dwells in Kailasa in the Himalayan ranges, whose consort is Amba (Parvathi) and who performs the celestial dance of Bliss. The Lord of Universe is served by His sons Ganapathi and Sharavana. The blue-eyed Lord Shiva is the consort of Uma, resides in the Shaila Mountains and is the Lord of dance.

title: Kailasa Vasa Shiva Shankara
lyrics:
Kanaka Sabesha Nateshwara
Akasha Lingam Digambara
Shivakami Sundara Chidambara
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Vishwambara
meaning: Lord Shiva, Lord of Chidambaram, the resident of Kailasa and of the golden (grandiose) assembly of the Universe, is the embodiment of Shiva-Shakti (energy). He represents the energy (lingam), with neither a beginning nor an end that pervades the entire universe.

title: Kala Roopini Kadambari
lyrics:
Naada Roopini Narayani
Sathya Dharma Roopini Sayeeshwari
Mangala Roopini Maheshwari (Sarva)
Kadambari Narayani (Amba)
Sayeeshwari Maheshwari (Sathya)
meaning: Kadambari is the personification of Fine arts, Narayani is the personification of Sound, Sayeeshwari is the embodiment of Truth and righteousness, Maheshwari is the embodiment of Auspiciousness.

title: Kalavathi Amba Saraswathi
lyrics:
Naada Brahmamayi Vedavathi
Ananda Roopini Vidyavathi
Veda Brahmamayi Sai Bhagawathi
Parthi Pureeshwari Amba Saraswathi [ Naada Brahma ]
meaning: Salutations to Mother Saraswathi the mother of all arts. She is also the Mother of Vedas, Brahman in the form of sound. Saraswathi is the mother of all knowledge and has bliss as her form, residing at Parthi.

title: Kalavathi Kali Kapalini
lyrics:
Devi Saraswathi Veda Narayani [ Kalavathi Kali ... ]
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Jagadodharini Durga Bhavani
meaning: Worship Mother Kali, who destroys evil and wears a garland of skulls; Worship Mother Saraswathi, Goddess of knowledge and wisdom, from whom the Vedas emanated; Worship the Supreme Mother Gowri, who confers auspiciousness and is the savior of the Universe.

title: Kali Yug Ke Avatar Ho
title2: Kali Yug Ke Avatar Ho Sai Baba
lyrics:
Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Dhanya Ho Eswaramma
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Dukhiyon Ke Dukh Door Karo Tum
Sai Hey Parameshwara
Bolo Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Dhanya Ho ... ]
meaning: Blessed be Mother Eswaramma, the mother of Lord Sai. O Lord of this Kali age, You are none other than Brahma, Vishnu and Parameshwara (Shiva).  O Lord, drive away the miseries of the downtrodden. Chant the name Sai Ram.

title: Kali Yug Ke Avatara Sai
title2: Kali Yug Ke Avatara Sai Baba
lyrics:
Araj Suno Parthi Baba [ Kali Yug Ke ... ]
Daya Ke Sagara Sai Baba
Karunamaya Sai Prema Pradatha
Deena Janon Ke Sai Baba
Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai Baba
Sathya Sanathana Sai Baba
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, You are the incarnation of this Kali age, please listen to my appeal. Oh Lord of Compassion, the bestower of Love, the kin of Your devotees, the needy and the downtrodden, You are Eternal.

title: Kali Yuga Avatara Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Krupa Nidhey Deenon Ke Pran [ Kali Yuga Avatara ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Bhagawan
Antaryami Sai Bhagawan
Karuna Sindhu Sai Bhagawan
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai, the Incarnation of the Kali Age, son of Mother Eshwaramba, the indweller of every being, the ocean of compassion, the very life of the underprivileged and the Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Kalimala Bhanjana Kodanda Rama
lyrics:
Karunanta Ranga Kaivalya Dhama [ Kalimala Bhanjana ... ]
Maya Manusha Munijana Prema
Madhura Manohara Mangala Naama
Parthi Pureesha Prabhu Paramatma
Patitha Pavana Pattabhi Rama
meaning: The bow wielding Rama who destroys the evil effects of the Kali age, is compassionate and grants liberation. Lord Rama who loves sages has an elusive form of a human being whose name is sweet, enchanting and confers Auspiciousness. The emancipator of the downtrodden, the cosmic consciousness is presently dwelling at Parthi.

title: Kaliyuga ni Korareta Sai Baba
lyrics:
Sekai no Minna no Sachi no tame
Sai Baba Anata wa Subete wo Michibiite Kureta
Itsudemo Watashi wa Anata to Hitotsu
Subete wo Anata ni Sasagemasu
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, You have come in the Kali age to bless everyone with good fortune. You guide us all so that we may become one with You. We devote everything to You my Lord.

title: Kaliyuga no Jidai ni Aranami
title2: Kaliyuga no Jidai ni Aranami Koete
lyrics:
Izaya Susumeyo Kami no Mina Tonaete
Om Sai Ram Kono Tamashii ni
Kono Amatsuchi ni Hibiki Watare Kami no Mina
Om Sai Ram (Sai Ram) Om Sai Ram
meaning: Cross through the raging waters of this Kali age. Chant the beautiful name of the Lord and advance forward. My soul resounds with the name Sai Ram and spreads from earth to heaven.

title: Kaliyuga no Jidai ni Korareta
title2: Kaliyuga no Jidai ni Korareta Kami no Keshin
lyrics:
Shinri no Gonge Shiawase no Kami Ai no Keshin
Kurushimi Nayami Kanashimi Nageku Subete no Mono no tame
Shinri to Dharma wo Toki Gokourin Nasareta
meaning: You are the reincarnation that has come to us in the Kali age. You are the reincarnation of truth, happiness, and love. You have come to wipe away all our pain, worries and grief. Your descent to Earth has given us truth and righteousness.

title: Kalyana Krishna Kamaneeya Krishna
lyrics:
Kalinga Narthana Sri Krishna
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Murari Gopi Mana Sanchari
Brindavan Ke Tulasi Mala
Peetambara Dhari Murari
meaning: We bow to the enchanting form of Krishna born to redeem the world of its negative afflictions, who subdued the poisonous serpent Kalinga by dancing on it. Krishna lifted the Govardhan mountains to protect the devotees from the wrath of Indra, has captured the hearts of Gopis, the slayer of demon Mura. Our Salutations to the One who adorns the Tulasi garland and the Yellow cloth.

title: Kalyana Rama Ananda Rama
lyrics:
Rama Sri Rama Jaya Rama [ Kalyana Rama ... ]
Avatara Sai Avatara Rama
Poorna Avatara Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Salutations to Lord Rama, who confers bliss and causes the welfare of the world. Salutations to Lord Rama the incarnation and Sathya Sai Rama who has come down with all the facets of an incarnation.

title: Kalyana Ranga Kamaneeya Ranga
lyrics:
Ananda Ranga Sadananda Ranga
Hrudayanta Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Rakumayi Ranga Sayeesha Ranga
Shirdeesha Ranga Partheesha Ranga [ Ananda Ranga ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Ranga (Panduranga/Narayana), the one who bestows welfare, one of Everlasting Bliss, of compassion, Lord of Rakumayi. He is verily Lord Sai, who dwells at Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Kamakshi Kalyani Kadambari
lyrics:
Katyayani Gowri Kanakambari
Vagesri Nithyeshwari Panchakshari
Vamesri Poorneshri Parameshwari [ Kamakshi Kalyani ... ]
Maadhasthi Matangi Maheshwari
Jagadamba Bhagawathi Rageshwari (Sayeeshwari)
meaning: This song extols Goddess Parvathi who is known by several names.

title: Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
lyrics:
Kaali Kapalini Kadambari [ Kamala Manohari ... ]
Jaya Katyayani Bhagawathi Bharati
Kanchi Nivasini Kamakshi Sundari
alt_lyrics:
Kamala Manohari Shiva Sai Shankari
Kaali Kapalini Kadambari [ Kamala Manohari ... ]
Jaya Katyayani Parama Krupakari
Kanchi Nivasini Kamakshi Sundari
Parthi Nivasini Parvathi (Sathya Sai) Sundari
meaning: Salutations to the enchanting form of Mother Parvathi, the consort of Lord Shankara, seated on the Lotus, Mother Kaali adorning the garland made of skulls and wild flowers. Victory to Mother Katyayani, Mother Saraswathi also known as Bharati and Mother Kamakshi, the presiding deity at Kanchi.

title: Kamala Nayana Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Hey Deena Janon Ke Pran
Hey Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram
Sri Sai Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram [ Hey Deena ... ]
meaning: Salutations to the lotus-eyed Lord Sathya Sai who dwells at Parthi, who is the refuge of the forlorn, emancipator of the downtrodden. He is the same as Lord Rama, the Lord of Mother Sita.

title: Kamala Nayana Narayana
lyrics:
Ksheerabdhi Shayana Narayana
Megha Varna Hari Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Prasanthi Vasa Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the lotus-eyed one who reclines on the Ocean of Milk, the one who is dark-hued like the rain cloud, the one who has Vaikunta as His abode. He is verily Lord Sai whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam at Puttaparthi.

title: Kamala Nayana Prabhu Kamala Pathey
lyrics:
Kamalasana Prabhu Kamala Kantha [ Kamala Nayana ... ]
Kamalanabha Prabhu Kamala Ramana
Kamaleshwara Prabhu Kamala Natha
meaning: Our salutations to the lotus-eyed Lord who is the consort of Kamala (Goddess Lakshmi). The Lord who is the enchanter of Kamala, seated on the lotus from whose navel arises the lotus of creation, is Lord Narayana, the Lord of Kamala (Goddess Kamala).

title: Kamala Nayana Ram Vimala Charana
title2: Kamala Nayana Ram Vimala Charana Ram
lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Vimala Charana Patitha Pavana Ram
Patitha Pavana Ram Janaki Jeevana Ram
Patitha Pavana Janaki Jeevana Paapa Vimochana Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Ananda Chandha Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Ananda Chandha Patitha Pavana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Patitha Pavana Ram
meaning: We offer our salutations to Lord Rama, the lotus-eyed one, whose feet are pure and blemishless. He is the uplifter of the underprivileged, the remover of sins and the very life of Mother Janaki. Lord Rama is the King of Ayodhya and confers Bliss, is the son of King Dasharatha and the one who vanquished the ten-headed Ravana.

title: Kamala Nayana Sai Ranga
lyrics:
Sab Sukh Daata Sai Bhagya Vidhata Sai
Radha Ramana Sai Ranga [ Kamala Nayana ... ]
Parama Pitha Hamey Sahara Do Prabhu
Kar Chintana (Vandana) Sai Ranga
meaning: O Lord Sai with lotus-petal shaped eyes, You are the bestower of happiness and auspiciousness for all. You are verily Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha. O Supreme Father, You are our only support. O Lord, may we incessantly contemplate on You and offer obeisance to You.

title: Kamala Nayana Sri Rama
lyrics:
Karuna Sindho Sita Rama [ Kamala Nayana ... ]
Kalimala Bhanjana Rama Rama
Rama Rama (2) [ Kalimala ]
Karunya Lavanya Kodanda Rama
meaning: Our salutations to Lord Rama the lotus eyed one, destroyer of the evil effects of Kali age, the compassionate who has a compelling form, who wields the bow.

title: Kamala Nayana Sri Sai Jaya
title2: Kamala Nayana Sri Sai Jaya Jaya
lyrics:
Karunakara Narayana Jaya Jaya
Sri Raghu Nandana Rama Jaya Jaya
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Shyama Jaya Jaya
Esha Manusha Vesha Jaya Jaya
Meera Ke Prabhu Natha Jaya Jaya
meaning: Victory to Sri Sai whose eyes resembles the lotus. Victory to compassionate Narayana, Rama the beloved of Raghu clan, Shyama (Krishna) the jewel of Yadu clan, the Supreme Lord who is in the human form and Lord of Meera.

title: Kamala Netra Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Kaivalya Teja Sureshwara [ Kamala Netra ... ]
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera
Shantha Brahmamaya Abhayakara
Megha Shyama Ghana Gagana Shareera [ Shantha Brahmamaya ]
meaning: Salutations to Sayeeshwara the Lotus eyed One who confers Liberation, whose complexion is that of thick clouds in the sky, guards against fear and embodiment of Peace.

title: Kami no Ai ga Sekai
title2: Kami no Ai ga Sekai ni Michite
lyrics:
Mienai Kizuna wo Tokiakasu Deshou
Subete ni Yadoru Onaji Hikari
A Utsukushiku Kagayaku Inochi
God is One, Subete wa Hitotsu
God is Love, Love is God
meaning: God's love fills the entire world and binds everything together. Swami, You dwell within everything with the same light that is within us. You shine beautifully in all life. God is one, everything is one.

title: Kami no Ai no Naka
title2: Kami no Ai no Naka de Ikiru Yorokobi
lyrics:
Osore mo Urei mo Naku Mikokoro no mamani
Miashi wo Agameyou
Subete wo Sasageyou
Kami no Mina wo Tataeyou
Sai no Mina wo (Sathya)

Oh Sai Baba
Jaya Sai Baba
Sathya Sai Baba
Harey Harey
meaning: Living with the joy of God's love in your heart eliminates fear and grief. So let us bow down at God's beautiful feet. Let us dedicate everything to Him. Let us praise Sathya Sai's beautiful name.

title: Kami no Ai wa Sai
title2: Kami no Ai wa Sai Haha no Ai
lyrics:
Kurushimu Kora wo Sukui Tamou Toutoki Ai
Kono Yo no Hito no Mayoi wo Nozoki Kami no Moto eto
A Michibiki Tamou Ai no Yasashisa Kokoro ni Shimiru
Subete no Mono ni Yadori Tamou Hahanaru Kami yo
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your love is like the love of a mother. You present Your precious love to us, suffering children. You eliminate the illusion from this world so that we may journey towards You. You give us guidance with Your kind love that spreads through our hearts. Mother Sai, You live within all things in the universe.

title: Kami no Mina Hibikase
lyrics:
Hikari to Narite
Hahanaru Daichi ni
Mau Yasuragi no Oto

Sai Ram (4)
meaning: Chant the Lord's beautiful name and become one with His light. Dance on Mother Earth and listen to the peaceful sounds.

title: Kami no Mina wa Kogane
title2: Kami no Mina wa Kogane no Fue
lyrics:
Kurushimu Warera no Kibou no Oto Iro
Minna de Shizukani Mimi wo Sumasou
Krishna Radha Radha Krishna
meaning: Lord, Your beautiful name is like the sounds from a flute of gold. You listen to our suffering and help us. Let us all listen for the beautiful sounds of our Lord Krishna.

title: Kami no Mina wo Tonaeyou
lyrics:
Kokoro wo Komete Tonaeyou
Harey Sai Krishna Harey Sai Rama
Baba Baba Sai Baba
Baba Baba Sathya Sai Baba
meaning: Chant the beautiful names of Lord Rama, Krishna and Sathya Sai Baba from the bottom of your heart.

title: Kaminaru Itoshii Sai no Ai
title2: Kaminaru Itoshii Sai no Ai ni Tsutsumare
lyrics:
Afureru Kanki ni Subete wa Ai ni Tokekomu [ Kaminaru Itoshii... ]
Yasashiku Watashi wo Tsutsumu Ai no Naka de
Ainaru Shinri wo Utaou yo Sai Krishna e
meaning: Surround yourself with the divine love of Sai. Everything melts away in this love and overflowing joy. I will surround myself with this gentle love. I sing out to Sai Krishna with this true love in my heart.

title: Kamisama Kamisama
title2: Kamisama Kamisama, Haato no Uchinaru Kamisama
lyrics: Kagirinai Ai no Hikari de, Miteshite Kudasaii Kamisama
meaning: Oh Lord within my heart, please watch over and guide us with the light of Your endless love.

title: Kamisama Sai Baba, Subete no
title2: Kamisama Sai Baba, Subete no Kamisama
lyrics:
Haato no Owasu Kamisama Douzo Negai wo
Okiki Kudasai Watashi no Kamisama
Kurushimu Hito no Tameni Watashi wo Otsukai Kudasai
Sore ga Watashi no Negai Sai Baba
meaning: Lord Sai Baba, You are the Lord of everything. My wish is for You to enter my heart. Please hear me, my dear Lord. Please use me as Your instrument my Lord, for I am suffering. This is my wish to You, Sai Baba.

title: Kanaka Sabesha Kailasa Shiva
lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara [ Kanaka Sabesha ... ]
Gnana Pradayaka Samba Shiva
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Paahi Prabho Maam Parthi Pureeshwara
meaning: The Lord of Kailasa mountains, One who holds the Ganges on His Head, delight of Mother Gowri. Protect me O Lord the One who confers Wisdom, whose dance is thrilling, is the Lord of Parthi.

title: Kanaka Wai Wai
lyrics:
Ma ke ala hele o Jesu
(In the travels of Jesus)
I halawai aku ai
(He met)
Me ke kanaka opio hanohano
(A prominent young man)
Kaulana e ka wai wai
(Known for his great wealth)
 
Pane mai e ka opio.
(Said the youth)
E ku’u haku mai ka’i
(My good Lord)
He aha ho’i ka’u e hana aku ai
(What must I do)
I loa’a e ke ola mau?
(To have life eternal?)
 
E ha’awi, e ha’awi lilo
(Give…give away)
I kou mau wai wai
(All your possessions)
Huli a hahai mai ia’u
(Turn and follow Me)
I loa’a e ke ola mau (ia oe)
(Then you will have eternal life)

title: Kanarazu Yukute wo
title2: Kanarazu Yukute wo Hagemashi Mimamoru Ganapathi
lyrics:
Miashi wo Agameyo (Minna Agameyo)
Chikara ni Michita Ganapathi
meaning: Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha), with Your infinite power, You watch over and guide us along the right path. Let us all worship His divine feet.

title: Kanashii Koto ga Attara Kokoro
title2: Kanashii Koto ga Attara Kokoro no Naka de Tonaeyou
lyrics:
Kokoro ni Ai no Hi Tomosu Kotoba Sore wa
Sugite Shimatta Koto wo Kuyokuyo Kangaeru nara
Ashita wa Egao de Aru youni Tonaeyou Sore wa

Sai Ram (8)
meaning: If something sad happens, chant His name from the bottom of your heart. The loving flame within our hearts burns and says these words. If you ever are worried about something, come with a smile and chant His name from the bottom of your heart.

title: Kanda Kumara Kadirvela
lyrics:
Karunakarane Shiva Bala
Varuvai Arulvai Azhaga Muruga
Mayon Maruga Mayil Vaganane

Muruga Muruga Muruga Muruga
Varuvai Muruga Muruga Muruga
Arulvai Muruga Muruga Muruga
Azhaga Muruga Muruga Muruga
meaning: O Lord Skanda, the compassionate Lord Subrahmanya, son of Lord Shiva and the nephew of Lord Vishnu, please come to bless us, riding on the divine peacock, O beautiful one.

title: Kanda Kumara Vadivela
lyrics:
Gowri Putra Vadivela [ Kanda Kumara ... ]
Karthikeya Karuna Sagara
Deena Sharanya Vadivela
Sri Sai Natha Vadivela
alt_lyrics:
Skanda Muruga Vadivela
Gowri Putra Vadivela
Karthikeya Karuna Sagara
Deena Sharanya Vadivela
Sri (Sathya) Sai Natha Vadivela
meaning: Chant the names Kanda, Kumara and Karthikeya which are the names of Lord Subrahmanya, the son of Shiva and Gowri. He is an Ocean of Compassion and friend of the forlorn who is verily Lord Sai.

title: Kanda Va Va Kadamba Va
title2: Kanda Va Va Kadamba Va Va
lyrics:
Muruga Va Va Vela Va Va
Shiva Shakthi Bala Singara Vela
Sooranai Vadham Seidha Subrahmanya Va Va [ Kanda Va Va ... ]
Thanigai Kumara Thiruchendur Vela
Parthi Vasa Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guhane Shanmuga Va Va
Katharulvai Ni Prashanthi Muruga
meaning: Please come to us, O Lord Kanda, Kadamba, Muruga, Vela (various names of Lord Subrahmanya), Welcome O beautiful son of Lord Siva and Sakthi (Parvathi), who vanquished the demon Soorapadman. Welcome O Lord Shanmukha residing in the Holy abode of Thanigai (Thirutthani) and Thiruchendur. You are none other than Lord Sai residing in Puttaparthi. You are the one who emerged as six beautiful children from the Holy spark of Lord Siva's third eye. O Lord of Prashanthi, please protect us.

title: Kanha Kanhaiya Bansi Adhariya Brindavana
title2: Kanha Kanhaiya Bansi Adhariya Brindavana Ghana Raasa Rachaiya
lyrics:
Gokula Nandana Hey Chitha Mohana
Radha Manohara Shyama
Manasa Chora Nanda Kishora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala Sai Gopala
meaning: Lord Krishna also known as Kanha and Kanhaiya performed the Raasa Leela dance in Brindavan. With the flute on His lips, He is the boy of Gokula who enchants everybody's mind, the son of Nanda and the delight of Radha. He is the one who stole butter and is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Kanhaiya Teri Bansi Bajey Merey
title2: Kanhaiya Teri Bansi Bajey Merey Lal
lyrics:
Nis Din Mein Bhajoon Tero Naam [ Kanhaiya Teri ... ]
Hey Nandalala Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Govinda Gopala
Sai Krishna Sai Ram
meaning: Play Your enchanting flute, dear Lord Krishna, while I chant Your name everyday. O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the beloved son of Nanda, You are Govinda, the protector of cows and verily Sai Krishna and Sai Rama.

title: Kari Mukha Varada Maam Paahi
lyrics:
Gajamukha Natha Maam Paahi
Gajanana Maam Paahi
Gananatha Maam Paahi
Lambodhara Maam Paahi (Jaya)
meaning: O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the bestower of boons who has many names - Gajamukha, Gananatha (God of Demigods) and Lambodhara. please protect me.

title: Karthikeya Karunakara
lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeeshwara [ Karthikeya ... ]
Gowri Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pashupathi Ranjana Parathpara
meaning: I surrender to You O Lord Karthikeya, the compassionate one, the son of Mother Gowri. You are the one who destroys the cycle of Birth and death and is a source of delight for Pashupathi (Lord Shiva).

title: Karuna Jalathey Daasharathey
lyrics:
Kamaneeyanana Krupa Nidhey
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Pathey
Shritha Jana Palana Suguna Nidhey
Daasharathey Daya Nidhey
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha and the scion of Raghu dynasty, has a pleasing form and is an ocean of compassion. He is the Lord of Mother Sita, the one who fulfills the desires of His devotees and is a paragon of virtues.

title: Karuna Karo Sai Dev
lyrics:
Kalyana Karo Sai Dev
Sri Guru Jaya Guru Sathya Sai Dev [ Karuna Karo ... ]
Tum Matrumayi Sai Dev
Tum Shakthimayi Sai Dev
Tum Premamayi Sai Dev
Tum Krupamayi Sai Dev [ Sri Guru... ]
meaning: Victory be to You O Lord Sathya Sai. Show mercy and let Your benedictions be upon us. You are verily our Mother and the embodiment of Energy, Love and Compassion.

title: Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Gopala Brindavana Sai Bhagawan
Mana Mohana Madhava Sai Bhagawan [ Karuna Nidhey ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Parama Dayala Sai Krupala
Parthi Puri Bhagawan [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Karuna Nidhey Bhagawan (3)
meaning: Glory to the enchanting Lord Gopala (Krishna), the Lord of Meera. He moves about in Brindavan and is extremely compassionate. Lord Sai who is verily Krishna, is an ocean of Mercy and His abode is at Puttaparthi.

title: Karuna Nidhey Kamala Manohara
lyrics:
Karivarada Sai Karunya Natha [ Kamala ... ]
Tejonmaya Divya Naama Roopa
Naama Roopa Naama Roopa [ Tejonmaya ]
Tribhuvana Vanditha Hari Hara Roopa
meaning: We adore you Hari the consort of Lakshmi. You are also Sai the compassionate bestower of boons. Your name and form are divine and effulgent. You are the Hari worshipped by all the three worlds.

title: Karuna Niketana Bhaktha Sakha Prabho
lyrics:
Sharan Mey Lo Bhagawan
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Tribhuvana Sanchari Jyothi Swaroopa
Nithya Niranjana Ram
Adi Ananth Hey Prema Swaroopa [ Dukha Bhanjana ... ]
meaning: O Lord Rama, the ever Compassionate one, the real friend of the devotee and destroyer of sorrow, I seek refuge in You. You move around the three worlds, ever pure, You are both the beginning and the end. You are the very embodiment of Love.

title: Karuna Sadani Ma Sai Karuna
title2: Karuna Sadani Ma Sai Karuna Sagari Ma
lyrics:
Kanchana Abharani Ma Sai Karunya Roopini Ma
Kamala Manohari Ma Sai Kalyana Dayini Ma
Kalusha Vidhurini Ma Sai Kali Avatarini Ma
Kali Avatarini Ma
meaning: Mother Sai is another name for absolute Compassion, is an enchanting Goddess of Wealth bedecked with Gold jewels. She confers benevolence, removes impurity and is an Incarnation of the present Kali age.

title: Karuna Sagara Hey Bhagawan Jagadeeshwara
title2: Karuna Sagara Hey Bhagawan Jagadeeshwara Jagannatha
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Parameshwara Hrudaya Vihari Gopala [ Karuna Sagara ... ]
Dwaraka Natha Sri Madhusudhana Meera Natha Gopala
Bhaktha Janashraya Deenodharana Sai Yuga Avatara
meaning: We adore You, Sai, the descent of Kali age who is refuge of devotees and uplifter of weak and meek. You are the Lord of universe and an ocean of compassion. You are Lord Gopala (Krishna) who revels in our hearts, the slayer of demon Madhu, the Lord of Meera, the resident of Dwaraka and as Sai, You are the resident of Parthi.

title: Karuna Sagara Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala [ Karuna Sagara ... ]
Giridhara Naagara Sai Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
alt_lyrics:
Karuna Sagara Hey Nandalala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala [ Karuna Sagara ... ]
Giridhara Naagara Sai Gopala
Sai Gopala Sai Gopala [ Giridhara Naagara ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama Gopala
meaning: Glory to the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna (Gopala), who is an ocean of mercy, plays lilting tunes with the Flute, dark-complexioned, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain and the Lord of Meera.

title: Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari Radhey
title2: Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Madhava Mohana Mangala Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala [ Karuna ]
Shankha Chakra Dhara Chinmaya Roopa Radhey Govinda Jaya Radhey Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Priya Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Govinda
Jaya Sai Govinda
meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Govinda who is also Krishna, Murari the ocean of compassion. Victory to Radhey Govinda who has an Auspicious and captivating form. He has a blissful form, who holds the conch and wheel in His Hands. You are the Beloved of devotees and you are Sai the resident of Parthi.

title: Karuna Sagara Prema Swaroopa
lyrics:
Paapa Vimochana Ram
Dukha Bhanjana Sri Ram
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam
Nanak Yesu Terey Naam
Parthi Pureeshwara Deena Dayaghana [ Dukha Bhanjana ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai is an embodiment of Love, the ocean of compassion who removes sin and destroys sorrow. Allah, Eshwar, Nanak and Jesus are all His names. He is highly compassionate towards the distressed and is the Lord of Parthi.

title: Karuna Samudra Sri Rama
lyrics:
Kausalya Tanaya Sri Rama
Sharanagatha Priya Sai Rama
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Rama
meaning: Oh Rama the son of Kausalya, you are verily the ocean of compassion. Oh Sai Rama, you love those who have surrendered to you and hence I thus surrender myself.

title: Karuna Sindho Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Kamala Nayana Sai Shiva Shambho
Kali Yuga Deva Deena Bandho
Kalimala Bhanjana Sai Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shambho (3)
meaning: The eternally Auspicious Shiva with Mother Amba (Parvathi), is the same as Lord Sai, the lotus eyed, embodiment of compassion and is verily the Lord of the Kali age who destroys its evil effects. Chant 'Shiva Shambho' repeatedly.

title: Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Parthi
title2: Karuna Sindhu Dasharatha Nandana Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
lyrics:
Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Niketana Maruti Sevitha Ram
Ahalyodharaka Rajeeva Lochana Raghukula Bhooshana Ram
meaning: Glory to the compassionate, lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha and the one who was served by Maruti (Hanuman). Lord Rama redeemed Ahalya of her curse. He is verily the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai, the embodiment of Love who resides at Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi
title2: Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama
lyrics:
Neeraja Netra Parama Pavitra Paramananda Rama [ Karuna Sindhu ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Daya Sagara Rama
Danava Mardhana Rama Daasa Samrakshaka Rama [ Karuna Sindhu ... ]
Karuna Sindhu Rama Kaivalya Shanthi Dhama (2)
meaning: Lord Rama bestows liberation and is the abode of peace and compassion. O Lord, Your lotus eyes are highly sacred and blissful. You are the slayer of demons, protector of devotees who surrender to You.

title: Karuna Swaroopini Raja Rajeshwari
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Palini Parthi Pureeshwari
Hrudaya Nivasini Akhilandeshwari
Tripura Sundari Veena Vadini
Dasha Bhuja Dharini Asura Vinashini [ Tribhuvana Palini ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Mother Sai residing in Parthi, who is the embodiment of compassion, the one who is ruler of the three worlds, the one residing in everyone's hearts, the one who is the most beautiful in all the three worlds and the one who annihilated demons.

title: Karunakara Narayana
lyrics:
Kamala Charana Sharanam Sharanam [ Karunakara ... ]
Kamala Netra Kamalasana
Kamala Vallabha Kamala Nabha
Narayana Narayana Narayana Narayana (2)
meaning: I surrender myself at the Lotus Feet of Lord Narayana, the compassionate one. He is lotus-eyed, seated on a Lotus, the consort of Kamala (Goddess Lakshmi) and from whose Navel arises a Lotus of Creation.

title: Karunalavala Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Ravela Ravela Rave Gopala
Brindavana Bala Hey Gopi Lola
Mana Mohana Hey Shyama Gopala
Madhusudhana Hey Sai Gopala [ Ravela Ravela ... ]
meaning: O Compassionate son of Nanda, Gopala (Krishna), residing in Brindavan, the enchanter of Gopis and the destroyer of demon Madhu, please come. O Lord Sai, please come, You are none other than Gopala.

title: Karunamaya Deva Krupamaya Deva
lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om
Hari Mera Jeevan Ka Sahara
Hari Mera Aadhaar
Krupamaya Deva
alt_lyrics:
Karunamaya Deva Krupa Karo Deva
Hari Om Hari Om
Hari Mera Jeevan Ka Sahara
Hari Mera Aadhaar
Krupa Karo Deva
meaning: We chant Your Glory, O compassionate Lord Hari. You are the most merciful one and the basis and support of my life.

title: Karunamaya Karthikeya
lyrics:
Kaivalya Daata Sri Sai Natha [ Karunamaya ... ]
Himagiri Nandini Priya Kumara
Iha Para Sukha Dayi Bhava Bhaya Hara
Sharanagatha Priya Shanmukha Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara
Sharanam Sharanam Shambhu Kumara (3)
meaning: Karthikeya is epitome of compassion and the One who grants Liberation. The dear son of Himavan's daughter, confers welfare here and hereafter, destroys the vicious cycle of Births. Oh son of Shambho, I surrender myself to thee.

title: Karunamaya Sai Tero Naam
lyrics:
Premamaya Sai Pavana Naam 
Sundara Roopa Sulabha Prasanna
Siddhi Pradatha Sri Sai Natha
Sharanam Sharanam Sadguru Deva
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your name is filled with compassion, love and purity. You are endowed with a beautiful form and You are easily pleased. You bestow spiritual success, O revered Lord Sai. We seek refuge in You, O true Guru.

title: Karunamayi Janani Ma
lyrics:
Hey Prema Swaroopini Ma [ Karunamayi Janani Ma]
Hrudaya Nivasini Sai Ma
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Gaana Vinodini Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
meaning: Oh Mother Sai, You are the most compassionate one, personification of Love, the one residing in our hearts. Oh Mother, You enjoy music and are the protector of this world.

title: Karunanta Ranga Kariraja Varada Kamalesha
title2: Karunanta Ranga Kariraja Varada Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
lyrics:
Omkara Rama Prashanthi Rama
Parabrahma Sathya Sai Rama
Kamalesha Sri Sai Rama
meaning: Glory to the lotus-eyed and compassionate Lord Sai Rama, the one who saved the elephant king Gajendra, as Lord Narayana. He is the embodiment of Om and the Supreme Lord whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam at Puttaparthi.

title: Karunya Roopa Sri Sai Deva
lyrics:
Jaya Deva Prabhu Deva
Nayana Manohara Sai Sundara
Devadi Deva Sri Sathya Sai Deva
Guru Deva Sai Deva
meaning: Oh Lord! You are Our Divine preceptor Shri Sathya Sai, the embodiment of love and compassion, the One with a captivating form. You are a treat to the eyes Oh Lord of Lords.

title: Kashaya Vesha Dharana
lyrics:
Kali Yuga Avatara Radha Ramana [ Kashaya Vesha ... ]
Kunja Vihari Sri Sathya Sai
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Chithravathi Teera Narayana Hari
meaning: Glory be to the incarnations of Kali Age, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai who has donned the ochre robe. Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha and who resides in the gardens has reincarnated as Sai. Dwarakamayi was Shirdi Sai's abode while Sathya Sai has chosen the banks of Chitravathi.

title: Kashi Pathey Varanasi Pathey
lyrics:
Ganga Jata Joota Gowri Pathey
Shirdi Pathey Puttaparthi Pathey
Chinni Sai Krishna Shreya Pathey (2)
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Kashi or Varanasi (Shiva) holding Ganges in the matted locked hair, the resident of Shirdi and presently Parthi as little Sai Krishna.

title: Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga Sri
title2: Kasturi Ranga Kaveri Ranga Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
lyrics:
Kalyana Ranga Karunanta Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
Garuda Gamana Ranga Shesha Shayana Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Ranga
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Ranga (Narayana) with the scented vermillion on His forehead who resides in Srirangam on the banks of river Kaveri. He is the most compassionate one who bestows welfare. He has Garuda as His chariot and reclines on the Celestial Serpent Adi Sesha.

title: Kasturi Tilakam Narayanam
lyrics:
Kamala Nayanam Narayanam [ Kasturi ... ]
Guruvayur Pura Narayanam
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayanam
Govinda Govinda Narayanam (2)
meaning: Glory to the lotus-eyed Lord Narayana adorning the scented vermillion who is the presiding deity at Guruvayur. He is also the cowherd boy Krishna who has incarnated in this Kali age as Lord Sai.

title: Katate ni Kin no Murari
lyrics:
Koyubi de Yama wo Sasagete
Kibishiki Ame yori Ware wo Mamoru
Ai no Kimi Sri Krishna
Eien no Ai no Keshin yo
meaning: O Lord Krishna, Your hands are like gold. With Your little finger alone, You lifted a mountain. You protect us from even the harshest rains. You are the eternal reincarnation of love, Krishna.

title: Katateni Kin no Murali
lyrics:
Koyubi de Yama wo Sasagete
 Kibishiki Ame yori Ware wo Mamoru
 Ai no Kimi Sri Krishna
 Eien no Ai no Keshin yo

title: Kausalya Nandana Vaidehi Mohana
lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Rama
Yuga Avatara Parameshwara Rama
Asura Nikhandana Kodanda Rama
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Parthi Pureeshwara Rama
alt_lyrics:
Kausalya Nandana Vaidehi Mohana
Rajeeva Lochana Rama
Yuga Avatara Parameshwara Rama
Asura Nikhandana Kodanda Rama
Bharatagraja Sri Rama Parthi Pureeshwara Rama
meaning: The lotus-eyed Lord Rama, son of Kausalya and enchanter of Vaidehi (Sita) is the incarnation of the Treta age. Salutations to the bow-wielding Rama who was worshipped by His brother Bharata. Lord Rama, the uprooter of the demon clan, now dwells at Parthi as Sai.

title: Kausalya Rama Karunya Dhama
lyrics:
Ravana Mardhana Rama Sri Rama [ Kausalya ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Rama Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama Sri Rama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama (3)
meaning: Oh Rama! the abode of compassion, You are the beloved of Kausalya, slayer of Ravana, redeemer of Ahalya from her curse. Victory to You Rama, who is served by Maruti (monkey God).

title: Kausalya Sutha Ram Rama Ram
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Danava Bhanjana Dasha Mukha Mardhana Ram [ Kausalya ... ]
Karuna Samudra Ram Rama Ram
Krupa Sagara Ram Rama Ram [ Dasharatha Nandana ... ]
meaning: We adore You, Lord Rama, the son of Kausalya and Dasharatha. You are the annihilator of demons and the ten-headed demon Ravana. You are the ocean of compassion and kindness.

title: Kausalyatmaja Rama Charan
lyrics:
Vaidehi Priya Rama Charan
Maruti Sevitha Rama Charan
Bharatarchita Sri Rama Charan
Ahalyodharaka Rama Charan
Prashanthi Niketana Rama Charan
Rama Charan Sada Bhajo
meaning: Worship the Holy Feet of Lord Rama, the son of Kausalya and the enchanter of Vaidehi (Sita). The Holy Feet of Lord Rama confers supreme peace, were worshipped by Maruti (Hanuman) and Bharata and liberated Ahalya from her curse. Sing the glory of the Holy Feet of Lord Sai Rama whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Keshava Madhava
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala
Hari Bol Hari Bol Hari Hari Bol
Keshava Madhava Govinda Bol
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Hari, Keshava, Madhava, Govinda and Gopala incessantly.

title: Keshava Madhava Jaya Deva Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Netra Kamala Dala Athiva Manohara
Antaryami Prabhu Parameshwara
Maya Manusha Vesha Leeladhara (2)
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna (Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana), the one who has beautiful eyes like a lotus petal, the indweller, the one who is supremely enchanting and who has taken the deluding human form as a sport.

title: Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Sridhara Sundara Narayana [ Keshava Madhava ... ]
Murali Manohara Janardhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana (3)
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai (4)
meaning: Chant the various names of the same Lord Narayana: Keshava, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Sridhara, Janardhana, Achyutha, Govinda and Gopala. Victory to the Lord who has the most beautiful form holding the flute.

title: Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
lyrics:
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
Keshava Narayana Govinda Murari
Madhava Madhusudhana Damodara Shourie
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Keshava, Narayana, Govinda, Murari, Madhava, Madhusudhana, Damodara and Shourie.

title: Khagapati Vahana Jagat Paripalana
lyrics:
Garuda Gamana Hari Narayana (2)
Nigamagama Nutha Nirupama Sannuta
Nirupama Guna Sathya Narayana (2)
meaning: Our Salutations to you Oh Lord Narayana, you are the ruler of this Universe riding on Garuda (The king of Birds), the one who is praised by Vedas, the one who is supreme in virtues, Oh Lord Sathya Narayana.

title: Kimi no Hoka ni Kami
title2: Kimi no Hoka ni Kami wa Nashi Kimi wa Waga Inochi
lyrics:
Kimi wa Waga Inochi Kimi wa Waga Inochi
Kokoro ni Tomoru Kibou no Hikari 
Kuraki Yamiyo wo Terasu Tsuki
Kono Mazushiki Ko no Sakebi wo
Ukeire tamae Sai Ram Ukeire tamae
meaning: O Lord Sai, without You, there is nothing. You are my very life. You light the flame within my heart to dispel darkness. Your hope shines bright like the moon all for the purpose of eliminating our troubled cries.

title: Kiyoraka de Yasashikute
lyrics:
Hasu no Hana noyou na Hitomi
Rama Krishna Sai Baba
A Utsukushii Kamisama yo
Warera no Kokoro Kiyome tamae [ Rama ... ]
meaning: Beautiful Lord, You are Rama, Krishna, and Sai Baba. With eyes like lotus flowers, You purify our hearts.

title: Kiyoraka Naru Kami no Umi
lyrics:
Toki wo Koe Yami wo Nukete
Kono Mune wo Mitashi Tamae
Warera no Sai Ganapathi
Ganapathi Jai Jai Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord, You sparkle as bright as the ocean. You cross over time itself to clear away the darkness. You do all of this to gratify our hearts. You are our Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha).

title: Know That The Lord Is Sweetness
title2: Know That The Lord Is Sweetness Itself
lyrics:
Everything Is A Sign Of His Grace
He is The Nearest, He is The Dearest, Born In The World Now ...
... As Sri Sathya Sai
Hold On To Him As Close As You Can
Knowing Him As An Intimate Friend

title: Kodanda Ram Kalyana Ram
lyrics:
Janaki Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Ananda Ram Ayodhya Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Victory to Rama wielder of Kodanda (bow), bestower of auspiciousness. You are the life of Janaki (Sita). You are the blissful Rama of Ayodhya and at present Parthi as Shri Sai.

title: Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Rama Saketa Rama
Kalimala Bhanjana Bhaktha Niranjana
Maruti Sevitha Mangala Naama
Ahalyodharaka Pavana Naama [ Sathya Sai ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Lord Sathya Sai who as Lord Rama destroys the challenges of this Kali Yuga (modern age) with His bow. He is served by Hanuman, and is the redeemer of Ahalya.

title: Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
lyrics:
Janaki Rama Jaya Rama
Karunya Rama Lavanya Rama
Palita Sundara Sri Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to the bow wielding Rama, one who fosters, compassionate and charming and consort of Janaki is full of sacred attributes.

title: Kodanda Rama Raghava
title2: Kodanda Rama Raghava Jaya Kalyana Krishna Keshava
lyrics:
Govinda Madhava Gopala Keshava
Narasimha Achyutha Narayana
Dasharatha Nandana Sita Manohara Danava Samhara Daya Nidhey
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, who was born in Raghu dynasty and who held the great Kodanda bow. He is the darling son of Dasharatha and the beloved of Mother Sita. Glory to Lord Krishna whose beauty is unparalleled. He is also known by different names Govinda, Madhava, Gopala, Keshava, Narasimha, Achuyta and Narayana.

title: Koham Soham, Koham Soham
lyrics:
Who am I, I am He
 I'm the Sun and the Moon and the Stars in the sky
 I'm the Earth and the Sea and the Fire and the Wind
 I am God
 Om .... Om ....
 Koham Soham, Koham Soham
 Who am I, I am He
 I'm not the stars 'n the earth 'n the sea
 But the Aathma wisphers inside of me
 Om .... Om ....

title: Koi Boley Hari Hari Koi
title2: Koi Boley Hari Hari Koi Boley Ram Ram
lyrics:
Koi Boley Durga Kaali Koi Boley Sai Ma
Koi Boley Narayana Allah Bismillah
Koi Boley Nanak Buddha Mahavira
Sadhu Sant Fakira Jaane Sab Hai Tero Naam
Bol Man Allah Malik Bol Man Sai Ram
meaning: Some may call God as Hari while some others may call Ram. Some may say Durga Kaali but some others Sai Ma. If Hindus call Him Narayana, Muslims call Allah Bismillah and yet some others Nanak, Buddha and Mahavir. Saints, Sages and Fakirs (Muslim Saints) know that the One God is known by different names.

title: Koi Kahey Tujhe Ram Koi
title2: Koi Kahey Tujhe Ram Koi Kahey Tujhe Shyam
lyrics:
Koi Kahey Tujhe Yeshu Bhagawan
Koi Kahey Allah Tero Naam
Sai Baba Sai Baba Parthipuri Sai Baba
meaning: People say You are Lord Rama, Shyam (Lord Krishna), Lord Jesus and some say Your name is Allah. O Lord Sai Baba, You are verily all the Gods and You reside in Puttaparthi.

title: Kokoro ni Ai to Yorokobi
title2: Kokoro ni Ai to Yorokobi Mitashi Kami to Hitotsu ni Narou
lyrics:
Sazanami Shizumete Kokoro wo Sumashi
Kami to Hitotsu ni Narou
Kami to Hitotsu ni Narou
Sai to Hitotsu ni Narou (Sathya)
meaning: Let us fill our hearts with love and joy so that we may become one with God. Clear your hearts and steady its rippling waters. Let us become one with our Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Kokoro no Naka ni Hi
title2: Kokoro no Naka ni Hi wo Tomosou
lyrics:
Taeru Koto Naki Ai no Hi wo
Kurushimi mo Kanashimi mo
Chikara ni Kaeru Ai no Hi wo
meaning: Let us light the formless flame of love within our hearts. All our pain and sadness vanishes before the power of this beautiful flame.

title: Kokoro no Naka ni Orareru
title2: Kokoro no Naka ni Orareru Sai Baba, Itsumo Watashi o Mamori Michibiku
lyrics:
Anata no Ai wa Subete o Tsutsumi Shinri no Toto Saoshie Michibiku
Kokoro no Naka ni Orareru Sai Baba, Itsumo Watashi o Mamori Michibiku
Anata no Ai wa Subete o Tsutsumi Shinri no Toto Saoshie Michibiku
meaning: Sai Baba, who is within my heart, always guides me and protects me. Your love surrounds everything and shows us the truth.

title: Kokoro no Naka no Ai
title2: Kokoro no Naka no Ai Kami
lyrics:
Sai Baba Sathya Sai Baba [ Kokoro ... ]
Watashi no Sai Narayana [ Kokoro ... ]
Uchinaru Hikari no Ai no Sai
Ai no Kami, Ai no Sai
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, Sai Narayana, You are the light of love and the love within my heart.

title: Kokoro Shizuka ni Sumasu Toki
title2: Kokoro Shizuka ni Sumasu Toki, Anata no Egao ga Ukabimasu
lyrics:
Itsumo Kokoro ni Heian wo Motarasu Ai no Manazashi
Baba Baba Sai Baba, Baba Baba Sai Baba
meaning: We clear our hearts with peace as it is suspended in Your smile. You always bring peace to our hearts with Your loving gaze Lord Sai Baba.

title: Kokoro Shizukani Sumasutoki
lyrics:
Anatano Egaoga Ukabimasu
 Itsumo Kokoroni Heiano Motarasu ai no Manazashi
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Yozorano Gingano Mathatakimo
 Kurayami Michibiku Hikaridesu
 Anatano Oshiewa Hikaritonatte
 Aino Sekaio Tsukurimasu
 Baba Baba Sai Baba
 Baba Baba Sai Baba

title: Kono Yo no Subete wa
title2: Kono Yo no Subete wa Swami no Ai ni
lyrics:
Tsutsumarete Iru Tsutsumarete Iru
Ima Ai wo Kanji Utai Odoru Sai Ram Sai Ram
Watashi tachi wa Hitotsu Natte Yuku
Sono tame ni Umareta no dakara
meaning: Everything in this world is of Swami's Love. Everything is enveloped in this love. We dance with this feeling of love. We are becoming one with You for that is why we were born.

title: Koti Pranam Shata Koti Pranam
lyrics:
Hey Deena Natha Sai Ram (3)
Tum Ho Bhakthon Ke Yuga Avatar
Tum Ho Ananda Nanda Ke Lal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal [ Hey Deena Natha ... ]
meaning: Many repeated salutations to You Lord Sai, the refuge of the forlorn. You were born as the son of Nanda and presently the incarnation of our age, Sai Gopala residing at Parthi.

title: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali
title2: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Govinda Bhajo
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala Bhajo [ Krishna Bhajo ... ]
Giridhari Shyama Bhajo Radhey Govinda Bhajo
Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Gopala Bhajo (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the one holding the flute, the consort of Radha, the dark-complexioned one who held aloft the Govardhan mountain and the one who moved about in the forest inhabited by demon Madhu.

title: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali
title2: Krishna Bhajo Krishna Bhajo Murali Gopal
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
Nandatmaja Nanda Navaneetha Chora
Ghana Shyama Radha Karuna Kataksha [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna who plays the enchanting flute, who fosters cows and people. He is Govinda with dark blue-complexion and the compassionate beloved of Radha. He is the son of Nanda and the stealer of butter.

title: Krishna Gopal Krishna Gopal
lyrics:
Darshan Do Merey Sai Nandalal
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bal
Radha Madhava Shyama Gopal
Parthi Puri Ke Sai Gopal [ Darshana Do ... ]
meaning: Grant me Your Vision, O Lord Krishna, the dark complexioned son of Nanda, the Lord of Meera and Radha. You are none other than Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Krishna Gopala Yadu Nandana
lyrics:
Venu Vilolana Mana Mohana [ Krishna Gopala ... ]
Mora Mukuta Gokula Ramana
Ghana Shyama Ananda Govinda
Krishna Murari Madhusudhana
meaning: Sing the Glory of God by chanting His various names. Krishna, Gopala, Yadu Nandana, Ghana Shyama, Govinda, Ananda and Murari. Krishna delights in playing the Flute, is enchanting in form with a peacock plumage on His head and the chieftain of Gokul.

title: Krishna Hari Keshava Narayana
lyrics:
Krishna Hari Madhava Narayana
Krishna Madhusudhana Narayana
Krishna Mana Mohana Narayana
Krishna Krishna Jai Jai Govinda Krishna Jai Jai (2)
meaning: Chant the glorious names of Lord Krishna - Hari, Keshava, Narayana, Madhava, Madhusudhana (slayer of demon Madhu). Victory to the one with a charming form.

title: Krishna in Mathura
title2: Krishna in Mathura, Krishna in Dvaraka
lyrics:
Sri Hari Krishna I call Your name
Far away in Mathura, Far away in Dvaraka
Sri Hari Krishna I call Your name
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
Why don’t You come to me, why don’t You answer me
Why don't You rescue me and ease my pain
Jai Jai Krishna, Jai Madhava
Here in my heart, Hridaya Krishna
Far away in Mathura, Far away in Dvaraka
Here in my heart, Hridaya Krishna

title: Krishna Kanhaiya Bansi Bajaiyya
lyrics:
Paar Karo Merey Jeevana Naiya
Nanda Ji Ke Bala Murali Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala [ Paar Karo ... ]
meaning: O Krishna, play the divine Flute, carry the boat of my life across to the other side. You are the son of Nanda, You are the one who played the Flute, lifted the Mountain and the Lord of Meera.

title: Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Natavara Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Brindavan Ke Bansi Adhariya
Radha Manohara Raasa Rachaiya
Giridhara Naagara Shyama Kanhaiya
Sri Madhusudhana Sai Kanhaiya
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who holds the flute, is the supreme actor, the beloved son of Nanda. He is the one who enacted the Raasa leela (Celestial dance) with Radha and Gopikas in Brindavan and the one who held the mountain high and slayed the demon Madhu. Lord Sai is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Krishna Kanhaiya Krishna Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Gopala Bhaiyya [ Krishna Kanhaiya ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Avatara Sai [ Krishna Kanhaiya ... ]
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Govardhanodhara Krishna Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Krishna and Gopala son of Nanda, who stole butter. He is the Incarnation of Narayana, beloved of Gopis and who lifted Govardhana mountain on the finger tips.

title: Krishna Krishna Bala Krishna Nanda
title2: Krishna Krishna Bala Krishna Nanda Nanda Gopi Krishna ...
lyrics:
... Govardhanodhari Gopalana
Navaneetha Chora Neela Megha Shyama
Karunakara Krishna Muralidhara
Madhusudhana Mohana Narayana Keshava
Natavaralal Giridhara Bal [ Karunakara Krishna ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the one who has the complexion of dark clouds, the one who stole butter and the merciful boy who lifted a mountain to protect His devotees. He likes to dance and play the flute. He is verily the beautiful Lord Narayana.

title: Krishna Krishna Gopala Krishna
lyrics:
Mukunda Madhava Gopala Krishna [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Nanda Ananda Gopala Krishna
Satchidananda Sri Sayeesha Krishna
meaning: Chant the glorious name Krishna whose other names are Govinda, Mukunda (one who liberates), Madhava (one who is having Lakshmi on the chest), beloved of Nanda of Gokula and embodiment of existence- awareness-bliss.

title: Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala
title2: Krishna Krishna Govinda Krishna Gopala Bala Krishna
lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Bhaktha Chandhana Gaana Lola Krishna
Sundara Vadana Saroja Nayana Radha Priya Krishna
Yadava Krishna Yashoda Krishna Sathya Sai Krishna
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the one who is dear to His devotees and delights in music. He is Lotus eyed, with a charming countenance and is dear to Radha. He belongs to the Yadava clan, and is the son of Yashoda who has presently incarnated as Sathya Sai Krishna.

title: Krishna Krishna Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
Sai Rama Govinda Sai Shyama Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Narayana (Harey)
meaning: Chant the Name of Krishna, Govinda, Narayana, Sai Rama, Sai Shyama and Sai Krishna to the delight of everyone.

title: Krishna Krishna Jaya Gopi Ramana
lyrics:
Bhaktha Vatsala Jeevana
Radha Madhava Mohana (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the Lord of the Gopis, the very life of His devotees and the one who is adored by Radha.

title: Krishna Krishna Kagayaku Hitomi
lyrics:
Amai Hohoemi Kokoro wo Mitasu
Krishna Krishna Fue no Ne Hibiku
Kokoro no Naka no Ai no Kami
Anata no Ai ni Mitasareru Toki
Subete wa Hikari Shifuku ni Kawaru
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
Subete wa Anata no Ai no Uchi ni
meaning: Lord Krishna, Your shining gaze and sweet smile fill my heart. The sounds of Your flute resound within my heart. You are the light that shines turning everything into supreme bliss.

title: Krishna Krishna Krishna Radhey Radhey
title2: Krishna Krishna Krishna Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Krishna
lyrics: Govinda Gopala Krishna Narayana ( Sai ) (3)
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna namely Radhey, Govinda, Gopala, Narayana and Sai.

title: Krishna Krishna Madhava Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Yadava Yadu Kula Yadu Nandana
Govardhanodhara Gopi Ramana
Bhaktha Janodhara Bhava Bhaya Harana
meaning: Sing the glories of Lord Krishna (Madhava), the slayer of demon Madhu and who is of Yadava lineage. Glory to Lord Krishna who held aloft the Govardhana Hill with His little finger in order to save Gopis and Gopas. He is the redeemer of His devotees and destroys the fear of rebirth.

title: Krishna Krishna Mana Mohana
lyrics:
Chitha Chora Radha Jeevana
Megha Shyama Madhusudhana
Radha Kantha Yadu Nandana
meaning: O Lord Krishna of the Yadu clan, You have an enchanting form, You are the very life of Radha. You are the dark-complexioned one who slayed the demon Madhu.

title: Krishna Krishna Mukunda Janardhana
lyrics:
Krishna Govinda Narayana Hari
Achyuthananda Govinda Madhava (2)
Satchidananda Narayana Hari
meaning: Chant the different names of the imperishable Lord Krishna - Mukunda, Janardhana, Govinda, Narayana and Hari who is verily Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

title: Krishna Krishna Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Gopi Gopi Jana Giridhari [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Muralidhari
Radha Mohana Shyama Murari [ Gopi Gopi Jana ]
meaning: Glory to Krishna, Mukunda and Murari, the One who lifted the Mountain for sake of Gopis. The Lord of Meera's devotion, one with the Flute, the dark colored charmer of Radha.

title: Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Venu Krishna
Mana Mohana Krishna Madhusudhana Krishna
Murari Krishna Mukunda Krishna
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the one with flute with His consort Radha, the Charmer who slayed the demons Madhu and Mura.

title: Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna Hey
title2: Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna Hey Gokula Bala
lyrics:
Hey Gopi Lola
Nanda Kumara Navanita Chora Hey Nandalala
Rama Rama Dasharatha Rama Hey Raja Rama
Hey Sai Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana Hey Sai Rama
meaning: Worship Lord Krishna, the beloved of the Gopis of Gokula, the son of Nanda, and the stealer of butter (our hearts). Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the jewel of the Raghu dynasty, and the son of King Dasharatha. He is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Krishna Krishna Radhey Krishna
lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey Radhey [ Krishna Krishna … ]
Baandhey Payaliya Radha Aayey
Nachey Sangh Sangh Krishna Kanhayi
Gopi Raasa Rachaye
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, to whom Radha came with other gopis, anklets tied to her feet, to perform the Raasa dance.

title: Krishna Krishna Yaduvara Krishna
lyrics:
Murahara Keshava Yadava Madhava [ Krishna Krishna ... ]
Murali Manohara Krishna Murari
Krishna Murari Shyama Murari [ Murahara Keshava ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, born of Yadava clan, the dark complexioned one, the slayer of demons Madhu and Mura. He has an enchanting form with the flute.

title: Krishna Madhava Madhava Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Madhava Sai Harey
Brindavana Sanchari Shyama Gopala
Jaya Madhusudhana Jaya Nandalala
Jhulana Jhule Merey Sai Nandalala
meaning: Oh Krishna, the dark complexioned son of Nanda, the one who moved about in Brindavan, the one who slayed the demon Madhu, please swing in our hearts. You are verily our Lord Sai.

title: Krishna Mukunda Govinda Giridhara
lyrics:
Murali Mohana Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana (2)
Madhava Sri Hari Mandara Giridhari
Govinda Murahara Narayana (Harey) [ Parthi Purandara ...) ]
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhara, Murali, Narayana, Madhava, Hari, Murahara. Lord Sai is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Haari
title2: Krishna Murari Bhava Bhaya Haari Hey Giridhari Gopal
lyrics:
Parthi Vihari Hrudaya Vihari Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan
Bhaktha Sakha Bhagawan ( Sai ) (2)
meaning: The slayer of demon Murari also destroys the fear of the cycle of birth and death, the resident of Parthi is the true friend of his devotees.

title: Krishna Murari Muralidhari
lyrics:
Gopi Vallabha Giridhari
Hrudaya Vihari Leeladhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
meaning: Lord Krishna who holds the flute in hand, held the mountain high, is dear to the Gopikas. Krishna who is ever playful, resides in the hearts of beings, is Sai Murari residing at Parthi.

title: Krishna Murari Muralidhari
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Giridhari
Kunja Vihari Raasa Vihari
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Sai Mukunda Parthi Vihari
Radha Madhava Giridhari
meaning: Muralidhara is the one who holds the flute in his hands who performs Raasa leela with Radha, who moves around Gokula is the same Lord who has come as Sai Mukunda at Parthi.

title: Krishna O Krishna Mujhey Darshan
title2: Krishna O Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Sai Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna [ Krishna O Krishna ... ]
Giridhari Murari Krishna Ghana Shyama Murari Krishna
Sri Krishna Krishna Krishna Ghana Shyama Murari Krishna
Ab Aajaavo Krishna Mujhey Darshan Do Krishna
meaning: Hey Krishna! Please grant Your Divine vision (darshan) to me. O blue-complexioned Lord Krishna, the Destroyer of the demon Mura, You lifted the mountain and enchanted everyone with Your Flute music. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are my beloved Lord Krishna, please listen to my heart’s yearnings. Come O Krishna, please come now and grant me Your darshan; I am longing for Your Divine Presence.

title: Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha
lyrics:
Nanda Gopa Bala Navaneetha Chora [ Krishna Radha ... ]
Krishna Radha Jaya Krishna Radha (3) [ Nanda Gopa ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Krishna who is dear to Radha, the son of Nanda and the one who stole butter (worldly desires of devotees).

title: Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandana
title2: Krishna Rama Govinda Gokula Nandana Gopala
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Jaya Brindavana Gopala
Sai Krishna Govinda Parthi Pureeshwara Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gokula Bala Sai Murari
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna, Rama and Govinda. Chant the name of Gopala, the charming child of Gokula and Brindavan. Gopala, the favourite of the Gopikas, and the one who slayed the demon Mura, is the same as our Sai.

title: Krishna Rama Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Madhava Keshava Hari Narayana [ Krishna Rama ... ]
Sri Venu Gopala Krishna
Madhava Madhusudhana Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the one who resides in the heart of Nara (man) who is also Rama and Krishna, the one bearing the flute in His Hands and the  slayer of demon Madhu.

title: Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Nanda Mukunda Govinda Navaneetha Chora Gopala
Govinda Gopala Gokula Nandana Gopala
Krishna Sri Hari Krishna
Krishna Sri Sai Krishna
meaning: Chant the Various names of the Lord, Krishna, Hari, Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, of the son of Nanda and the One who steals butter and Sai Krishna.

title: Krishna You Give Me
title2: Krishna You give me, You give me the vision of God
lyrics:
Visions of divinity, visions of light within me
 
Shiva You give me, You give me the fire of God
Fire of the mission, fire of purity within me, within me
 
Jesus You give me, You give me the Word of God
Words of wisdom, words of love within me, within me
 
Buddha You give me, You give me the teachings of God
Teaching of service, teaching of visions within me, within me
 
Sathya Sai Baba You give me, You give me the understanding of God
Understanding of love, understanding of Atma within me, within me

title: Krishna, Krishna, Dear Sai Krishna
lyrics:
My love for You, my tears for You
Krishna, Krishna, dear Sai Krishna
Just like Your child I’ll cling to You
 
Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna
Krishna, Krishna, Harey, Harey
Harey Rama, Harey Rama
Rama, Rama, Harey, Harey
 
Krishna, Krishna, dear Sai Krishna
Make me Your flute on which You play
Krishna, Krishna, dear Sai Krishna
Help me realize You are in me [ Harey Krishna ... ]

title: Krishna, my lord, I adore Thee
title2: Krishna, my lord, I adore Thee
lyrics:
Song of your flute flows so sweetly
 Blissfully dancing for me
 Until I surrender completely (2x)
 You're luring me away from every worldly joy
 With such an ecstasy divine
 With You I want to stay, enchanting, dark-skinned boy
 Now that I know that You are mine (2x)
 Krishna, my lord, come to me
 Dance through the forest of my heart
 Make me Your flute, breathe through me
 That we may never be apart (2x)
 Oh, make me straight and true along the path that You have shown
 In all I think and do and say
 Of hollowest bamboo, with no desires of my own
 For any tune you wish to play (2x)
 Krishna, my love, come to me [ Dance through ... never be apart ]

title: Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
lyrics:
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda and the consort of Radha and the one who stole butter. I bow to Lord Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the shining star of Raghu dynasty.

title: Krishnam Vande Nanda Kumaram
lyrics:
Radha Vallabha Navaneetha Choram
Ramam Vande Dasharatha Tanayam
Sita Vallabha Raghukula Tilakam
Muralidhara Sukumara Sharanam
Gopi Vallabha Nanda Kishoram
meaning: I bow to the little Krishna, the son of Nanda, consort of Radha, the one who stole butter, who plays the flute and had a tender body, was the beloved guardian of Gopikas. I bow to Rama, the son of Dasharatha, consort of Sita and the crown of the Raghu dynasty.

title: Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya
title2: Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo
lyrics:
Krishnaya Charanam Namo Namo (2)
Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo
Sayeesha Charanam Namo Namo (2)
meaning: Many prostrations at the Feet of Lord Krishna and Lord Sai.

title: Krupa Karo Hey Krupa Nidhey
lyrics:
Daya Karo Hey Daya Nidhey
Paapa Mitao Parthi Pathey
Raksha Karo Dharma Kshetra Pathey
meaning: Show mercy on us, Oh the ocean of compassion and the Lord of Parthi. Protect us by removing the sins committed by us, Oh the Lord of Dharmakshetra.

title: Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
lyrics:
Dukhiyan Hoon Main Darsha Bhikhari [ Krupa Karo ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Nayanon Ke Pyarey
Darshan Do Mujhey Prabhu Giridhari
Krupa Karo Mujhey Sai Murari
meaning: Show mercy on me O Lord Sai Murari, I feel depressed without Your vision. Grant me Your Vision, O Lord, You are the one who lifted the Govardhana Mountain. You are the Star of my Eyes.

title: Ksheerabdhi Shayana Narayana
lyrics:
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Natajana Paripala Narayana
meaning: Chant the Name Lord Narayana who reclines on the Ocean of Milk, consort of Sri Lakshmi and who Incarnated as Narasimha (half Man half Lion). Narayana who has Vaikunta as His Abode, is the charmer of Vaidehi, the One who takes complete care of those who have surrendered to Him.

title: Kumbaya My Lord Kumbaya (3)
lyrics:
O Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Singing, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Praying, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Sleeping, Lord, Kumbaya
Someoneis Happy, Lord, Kumbaya

title: Kuzhaludhi Geetai Pozhiyum Deva
lyrics:
Gopiyar Ullam Pugundha Deva
Parthiyil Padam Vaittha Sai Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna (2)
meaning: You are Lord Krishna, the flute-player who blessed us with the Gita, the one who entered the hearts of Gopis, and the Lord who graces Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Kya Karoon Mein Kya Karoon
lyrics:
Koi Nahin Mera Terey Bina
Shirdi Vasa Hey Prabho
Parthi Vasa Daya Karo
Mangala Arathi Kab Logey
Mangala Guna Gaoon Mein
meaning: What will I do, O Lord Sai of Shirdi, Lord of Parthi? Kindly have mercy on me. I have no one but You. While I sing Thy glory, please accept the auspicious waving of the flame.

title: La ilaha il-Allah
meaning: There is nothing but God.

title: Lagaley Man Sai Bhajan Se
title2: Lagaley Man Sai Bhajan Se Preet
lyrics:
Mata Pitha Sutha Bandhava Naari
Sab Do Din Ke Meet Samajh Man
Sai Bhajan Se Preet
Sai Prabho Nija Bandhu Tumharo
Sada Rahey Tero Meet Samajh Man
Bolo Ram Ghana Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram, who is the real friend and kin, who will always be with you. Hook your mind to the loving Sai Bhajans. All your kith and kin, like, mother, father, children and spouse are just friends for few moments only.

title: Lakshmi Saranga Dhara Sita Pathi
title2: Lakshmi Saranga Dhara Sita Pathi Raghuveera Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Rakumayi Panduranga
Sathya Sai Panduranga
meaning: The valiant one of Raghu dynasty, Lord Rama, who holds the bow, is the Lord of Sita, the incarnation of Goddess Lakshmi. Chant the names of Govinda, the Lord of Radha and Panduranga, the Lord of Rakumayi. Lord Sathya Sai is none other than Lord Panduranga.

title: Lambodhara Gananatha Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
Pranavakaara Shambho Nandana
Parthi Pureesha Paahi Gajanana
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
meaning: Protect me Lord Ganesha, the Lord of Ganaas, who has an elephant head and is the big bellied son of Mother Parvathi and Lord Shiva. You are the one who embodies the sacred Om and who is verily Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Lambodhara Hey Gowri Nandana
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Shubhanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Hey Dukha Bhanjana
Asura Vinashaka Shubhanana
Gowri Nandana Mooshika Vahana [ Vighna Vinashaka ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Vinayaka (Ganesha), the son of Gowri, the one who removes obstacles, destroys worry, grants spiritual powers, bestows auspiciousness and uproots the demon clan.

title: Lambodhara Hey Vighneshwara
lyrics:
Shambhu Kumara Siddeshwara [ Lambodhara ... ]
Ambika Tanaya Omkareshwara
Heramba Sai Shirdeeshwara (Partheeshwara)
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Ganesha who removes obstacles, the son of Shambho (Shiva) and Ambika (Parvathi) and who has a big stomach. He is the Lord of Yogis, the embodiment of Om, and is also known as Heramba. He is none other than Sai, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Lambodhara Hey Vinayaka
lyrics:
Vighna Harana Girija Nandana
Shambhu Kumara Kalusha Vidhura
Siddhi Sadana Hey Gananatha
Pranavakaara Pashupathi Tanaya [ Vighna Harana ... ]
meaning: Glory be to the Lord of the Ganas, Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles, son of Mother Parvathi and Lord Shiva, one who removes our impurities and bestows us with power and wisdom, the very embodiment of the Pranava (Om).

title: Lambodhara Jaya Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Parama Daya Ghana [ Lambodhara ... ]
Bandha Vimochana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pranava Swaroopa Hey Shiva Nandana
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Gajanana
meaning: Victory to the elephant-headed and the big-bellied Lord Ganesha, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi. O Lord, You are the most compassionate one who removes the bondage and fear of birth and death.  You are the very embodiment of the sacred Om. Please protect us, O Lord Ganesha.

title: Lambodhara Jaya Gowri Sutha
lyrics:
Ganadhipa Jaya Gajanana [ Lambodhara ... ]
Phaalachandra Dhara Gaja Karneshwara
Partheeshwara Maam (Sayeeshwara Maam) Paahi Prabho
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, the big-bellied one, the Lord of the Ganas (Shiva's army) and the son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi). Victory to the elephant-faced Lord who adorns the crescent moon on His forehead and who has big ears like that of an elephant. Protect me Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi. You are none other than Lord Ganesha.

title: Lambodhara Jaya Mooshika  Vahana
lyrics:
Pashupathi Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Lambodhara Jaya ... ]
Vighna Vinasha Vijaya Vijaya Gajanana
Hey Gananatha Gowri Nandana
Parama Niranjana Paahi Gajanana
Paahi Gajanana Parama Niranjana
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the pot-bellied son of Lord Shiva, who removes the fear of our worldly existence and life's obstacles, and bestows successes. The son of Mother Gowri, Lord Ganesha, is supremely pure and merciful.

title: Lambodhara Shiva Gowri Sutha
lyrics:
He Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Gajanana Shubanana [ Lambodhara Shiva ... ]
He Shiva Nandana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Shambhu Kumara Gajanana (2)
meaning: Chant the name of pot-bellied son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri, Lord Gajanana, who destroys the fears of worldly existence and bestows good fortune and auspiciousness.

title: Lamp of Wisdom
title2: There is something deep inside of me,

title: Lavanya Roopa Lambodhara
lyrics:
Shambho Kumara Shankari Bala [ Lavanya Roopa ... ]
Pranavakaara Prasanna Roopa
Palaya Maam Prabhu Partheeshwara
Eka Dantha Jai Jai Ganesha
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganaas (Shiva's army), who has a charming form, a pleasant face, a big belly and who is the son of Shiva and Shankari (Parvathi). Protect me O Lord with a single tusk, the source of the Primordial sound and who is verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Lead kindly light
title2: Lead kindly light, lead me on
lyrics:
Through the dark night, to a bright dawn
Lead kindly light, lead me on
Lead me from unreal into the real
Lead me from darkness to divine light
Lead me from death to life eternal (2)
Lead me, guide me, Oh love divine
Asathoma Sadgamaya
Tamaso Maa Jyotir Gamaya
Mruthyor Maa Amrutham Gamaya
Hari Om, Hari Om, Om Sai Ram (2)
(2nd time to "Asathoma...")

title: Lead kindly light Sathya Sai
title2: Lead kindly light Sathya Sai Baba (2)
lyrics:
You have come to fill our hearts, fill our hearts with love,
You have come to light the lamp, light the lamp of love

Guide me, O Lord, Sathya Sai Baba
Guard me, O Lord, Sathya Sai Baba
You have come to show the way, lead me by the hand
You will always watch for me, however far I am

Picture His form, Sathya Sai Baba
The universal light Sathya Sai Baba
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram, Sathya Sai Baba
Make the temple in your heart the place where He resides

title: Leela Manusha Vesha
lyrics:
Haalaahala Dhara Sai Shiva [ Leela Manusha ... ]
Tala Mrudanga Damaru Ka Natha
Phaala Lochana Parama Dayaghana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Maheshwara
meaning: Lord Sai is the Lord in human form. He is Lord Shiva who swallowed the poison (to protect the devotees), the compassionate one with the third eye on His forehead, who performs the cosmic dance to the rhythm of the musical instruments. Lord Sai residing at Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Shiva.

title: Let God’s Peace Heal The Earth
title2: Let God’s peace (Let God’s peace) heal the earth
lyrics:
Let it fulfill His sacred birth
For the pure in heart will surely see
The Golden Age of Divinity
Let God’s peace heal the earth.
 
Let the Lord’s peace (Let the Lord’s peace) - 3x heal the earth
By His will it shall be done
For the world must live as one
Let God’s peace, let God’s peace heal the earth.
 
Let God’s love (Let God’s love) heal the earth
Let it fulfill His sacred birth
Heaven and earth and the angels sing
Praises to our highest King
Let God’s love heal the earth.
 
Let the Lord’s love (Let the Lord’s love)
Let God’s love (Let God’s love)
Let the Lord’s love (Let the Lord’s love) heal the earth
By His will it shall be done
For the world must live as one
Let God’s love, let God’s love heal the earth.
 
Let God’s grace (Let God’s grace) heal the earth
Let it fulfill His sacred birth
For the Lord now walks in the form of man
Blessings pour from His sacred hands
Let God’s grace heal the earth.
 
Let the Lord’s grace (Let the Lord’s grace)
Let God’s grace (Let God’s grace)
Let the Lord’s grace (Let the Lord’s grace) heal the earth
By His will it shall be done
For the world must live as one
Let God’s grace, let God’s grace heal the earth.
 
By His will, ...
by His will, His mighty will…
(......., it shall be done,...... it shall be done...)
 
(Heaven and earth and the angels sing,
praises to our highest King,
The Lord now walks in the form of man,
blessings pour from His sacred hands)
 
Thy will be done.....
sweet Lord, ...
Thy will be done!
(repeat)
 
By His will it shall be done, for the world must live as one
Let God’s grace, let God’s grace heal the earth,
By His will it shall be done, for the world must live as one
Let God’s love, let God’s love heal the earth,
By His will it shall be done, for the world must live as one
Let God’s peace, let God’s peace heal the earth.

title: Let Me Be One With All Beings
title2: God, let me be one with all beings
lyrics:
God, let me see all that’s divine
God, You fill my life with light, joy to all the heavens
Make me gold and shining bright, joy to all the world
 
God, let me be one with all beings
God, let me see all that’s divine
God, You fill me with Your light, shine brightly upon me
Pour Your precious love on all, bring peace to the world
 
God, let me be one with all beings
God, let me see all that’s divine

title: Let me be one with the Infinite Son
title2: Let me be one with the Infinite Son, forever, forever, forever (3)
lyrics: Lu wate leno leno Ma Ote, Hi ya no, Hi ya no, Hi ya no (3)

title: Let me touch Your feet
title2: Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami (2X)
lyrics:
Padnamaskar Padnamaskar
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 You are everything, with your breath I sing
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 It's for you I long as I sing this song
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 Grant my highest goal, please receive my soul
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami
 Padnamaskar, from near or far
 My beloved Lord, My beloved Lord
 Let me touch Your feet, let me touch Your feet, Swami my Swami

title: Let My Life Be Your Message
title2: Let my life be Your Message
lyrics:
Let my every moment be
A constant reminder that You are living as me
Let every second that I breathe
Be a respite ... yes, a final reprieve
From a life that’s live not for You, but for me
 
Let my life be Your Message
Let every day I wake
Be an offering to You, O Lord
That You’re the Path I will take
 
For steppin’ steps without You there
