Is a big mistake ... it’s in total error
To live a life not for You but for me
 
I keep seemin’ to learn over and over
That bein’ the Doer makes the trip so much slower
That given’ it all up leaves room for You
Well, I’m livin’ much better now that I’ve been listenin’
To a Voice inside that’ been gently whisperin’
Be Stil l … so I can come through
 
Let my life be Your Message
As the Grace of God flows free
Let everything that stands in The Way
Be purified in me
Let this life be a life that’s lived
From the Center of Me that can only give
A life that’s lived by You and not by me
Let every thought that I think
Be a promise to You that I’ll bring
An empty space for You to fill with Love
With Peace and Light as my sufficiency
I turn to You ...You’re all I need
To Live a life not for me but for You
 
I keep seemin’ to learn over and over
That bein’ the Doer makes the trip so much slower
That given’ it all up leaves room for You
Well, I’m livin’ much better now that I’ve been listenin’
To a Voice inside that’s been gently whisperin’
Be Still … so I can come through

title: Let the sun shine
title2: Let the sun shine bright in the sky
lyrics:
Let the sun shine bright in your life
 Let the darkness in your life disappear with the Light
 Let the sun shine bright in your life
 Call the Name of the Lord every day
 Let the Light of God show the way
 When in darkness you do fall, remember the Lord
 Let the Light of God light your day

title: Let the Truth
title2: Let the Truth that we are one live in us and be revealed, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
lyrics:
Give the earth Dharmic Leaders and let Your love heal the world, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
Send Your peace, light and love to those suffering everywhere, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray
Hear this prayer to You Lord, from our hearts filled with hope, In Sri Sathya Sai we pray

title: Let There Be Peace On Earth
title2: Let There Be Peace On Earth, And Let It Begin With Me
lyrics:
Let There Be Peace On Earth, The Peace That Was Meant To Be
With God As Our Father, Brothers All Are We
Let Me Walk With My Brother In Perfect Harmony
Let Peace Begin With Me, Let This Be The Moment Now
With Every Step I Take, Let This Be My Solemn Vow
To Take Each Moment And Live Each Moment In Peace Eternally
Let There Be Peace On Earth, And Let It Begin With Me

title: Let us be brave
title2: Let us be brave and courageous,

title: Let your whole life be a song
title2: Let your whole life be a song
lyrics:
Believe that God is everywhere at all times
 And derive strength, comfort and joy
 Singing in your heart - and in His presence - the glory of God
 Let melody and harmony surge up from your hearts
 And let all take delight in the love
 That you express through that song

title: Light In Me A Flame
title2: Light In Me A Flame To Love You, My Lord
lyrics:
To Find You In Each Heart
Where Your Love Has Poured
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Know You, My Lord
To Hear Your Voice Within
To Know That We Are Akin
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Trust You, My Lord
To Give To You My Life
With All Of Its Strife
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Serve You, My Lord
To Give To Fellow Friends
The Kindness That You Send
Light In Me A Flame (2)
Light In Me A Flame To Worship You, My Lord
To Sing Your Wondrous Praise
Through All Of My Days
Light In Me A Flame (2)

title: Light the Flame Eternal
lyrics:
In the temple within my heart
Light the flame eternal
Sai, the flame eternal 
A thousand suns are but a spark of Your splendor 
Awaken me from the depths of my slumber
Light the flame eternal 
Sai, the flame eternal
Divine wisdom brightly shining dispel delusion forever 
Light the flame eternal
Sai, the flame eternal

title: Light the lamp of Love
title2: Light the lamp of Love, within my heart dear Sai
lyrics:
Feel it with Your Love, divine, O let it shine
Like the lamp of Love, within my soul, dear one 
Let it shine from me, dear Lord, pure bold and bright
I am in the light, the light resides within me
When I see You Lord, then I know, I am the light

title: Like the River
title2: Like the river to the sea
lyrics:
Like the river Sai and me
Sai and me
Sai and me
Like the river Sai and me
 
Like a sunray to the sun
I’m the sunray and we are one
We are one
We are one
I’m the sunray and we are one
 
Like a leaf upon a tree
I am that leaf and God’s in me
God’s in me
God’s in me
I am that leaf and God’s in me
 
Like a wavelet upon the shore
To the ocean goes once more
Goes once more
Goes once more
To the ocean goes once more
 
When this bubble on the seafloor
Just melts away then I’ve gone home
I’ve gone home
I’ve gone home
Just melts away then I’ve gone home
 
Like the river to the sea
Like the river Sai and me
Sai and me
Sai and me
Like the river Sai and me

title: Like The Sunlight
title2: Like The Sunlight, Like The Moon Bright, Always Always I Am With You
lyrics:
Like The Ocean, Like The River, Always I Am Flowing Towards You
Like The Sky Above, So Is Divine Love, Always Always Surrounding You
Like The Earth So Fair, Like The Birds Of The Air Always I Am Caring For You

title: Lingashtakam
lyrics:
Nirmala Bhaashitha Shobhitha Lingam
Janmaja Dhukha Vinaashaka Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

2. Devamuni Pravaraarchitha Lingam
Kaama Dahana Karunaakara Lingam
Raavana Darpa Vinaashaka Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

3. Sarva Sugandha Sulepitha Lingam
Buddhi Vivardhana Kaarana Lingam
Siddha Suraasura Vandhitha Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

4. Kanaka Mahaamani Bhooshitha Lingam
Phanipati Veshtitha Shobitha Lingam
Daksha Suyajna Vinaashaka Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

5. Kunkuma Chandhana Lepitha Lingam
Pankaja-Haara Sushobhitha Lingam
Sanchitha Paapa Vinaashaka Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

6. Deva Ganaarchita Sevitha Lingam
Bhavair Bhakhi Bhirevacha Lingam
Dinakara Koti Prabhaakara Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

7. Ashta Dalo Pari Veshtitha Lingam
Sarva Samud Bhava Kaarana Lingam
Ahshta Daridra Vinaashaka Lingam
Tatpranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam

8. Suraguru Suravara Poojitha Lingam
Suravana Pushpa Sadaarchitha Lingam
Parama Padam Paramaatmaka Lingam
Tat Pranamaami Sadaashiva Lingam (3x)

9. Lingashtakam Idam Punyam
Yah Pateth Shiva Sannidhau
Shivaloka Mavaapnoti
Shivena Saha Modatheh
meaning:
1. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is worshipped by Brahma, Vishnu and other Devas, Which is pure and resplendent. And which destroys sorrows of birth.

2. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is worshipped by great sages and devas, Which destroyed the god of love, Which showers mercy, And which destroyed the pride of Ravana.

3. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is anointed by perfumes, Which leads to growth of wisdom, And which is worshipped by sages, devas and asuras.

4. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is ornamented by gold and great jewels, Which shines with the snake being with it, And which destroyed the Yagna of Daksha.

5. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is adorned by sandal paste and saffron, Which wears the garland of lotus flowers, And which can destroy accumulated sins.

6. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is served by gods and other beings, Which is the doorway for devotion and good thought, And which shines like billions of Suns.

7. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is surrounded by eight petals, Which is the prime reason of all riches, And which destroys eight types of poverty.

8. I bow before that Lingam, which is the eternal Shiva, Which is worshipped by the teacher of gods, Which is worshipped by the best of gods, Which is always worshipped by the flowers, From the garden of Gods, Which is the eternal abode, And which is the ultimate truth.

9. Any one who chants the holy octet of the Lingam, In the holy presence of Lord Shiva, Would in the end reach the world of Shiva, And keep him company.

title: Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
lyrics:
Partheeshwara Maam Paahi Prabho
Paahi Prabho Maam Dehi Vibho
alt_lyrics:
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Maam Paahi Prabho
Sayeeshwara Maam Dehi Vibho
meaning: Protect us O Sai, the Lord of Parthi, You are Lingeshwara and the one who creates Lingam out of His own Self.

title: Lingodhbhavakara Sai Shivom (2)
lyrics:
Gangadharaya Sai Shivom [ Lingodhbhavakara Sai ... ]
Prema Swaroopaya Bhuvaneshwaraya
Pranavakaaraaya Sai Shivom
Parameshwaraya Parama Pavitraya [ Gangadharaya Sai ... ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva supporting the Ganges. Lord Sai is the source of the Lingam (creative power). He is the Lord of the Universe, the personification of Love and the form of the Primeval Sound Om. Glory to the Supremely Sacred Lord Sai.

title: Listen To My Heart Voice
title2: Listen To My Heart Voice Waiting For My Calling
lyrics:
Longing For My Hearing Loving And Endearing
Listen To My Heart Voice Never Ever Dying
Never Ever Judging Giving And Forgiving
Light In My Heart Light In My Soul
Love In My Heart Love In My Soul
I Am The Light I Am The Love
Listen To My Heart Voice Never Ever Worried
Never Ever Hurried Always Kind And Happy
Listen To My Heart Voice Let It Be My Sole Choice
Inner Light Enfolds Me Divinity's Within Me [ Light In My Heart ... I Am The Love ]

title: Listen To My Hearts Song
title2: Listen, Listen, Listen To My Hearts Song
lyrics:
I Will Never Forget You, I Will Never Forsake You
Hearken, Hearken, Hearken To Whisper Of My Soul [ I Will ... ]
Take Me, Take Me, Take Me, My Lord In Thy Love [ I Will ... ]

title: Listen, Listen
lyrics:
Listen to the beat of divinity
So Hum So Hum strumming as we breathe
The universal OM whistling through the trees
Listen, Listen
Krishna's flute playing on the breeze
Om Sai Ram crashing on the seas
Listen, Listen
Listen to the beat of divinity
Clap your hands let your hearts fly
Living in the rhythm of Sri Sathya Sai
Listen, Listen

title: Lord Almighty Sai
title2: Lord Almighty, Lord Almighty, Lord Almighty Sai
lyrics:
Lord Almighty Sai
 Won't You lift me, won't You lift me, won't You lift me high?
 Won't You lift me high?
 Take me home to Puttaparthi, let me see Your eyes
 Let me see Your eyes
 Let me see Your Light and let me feel Your Love inside
 Let me feel Your Love inside

title: Lord Dear God Pour Your Love
title2: Lord, Dear God, Pour Your Love Into My Heart
lyrics:
Pour Your Love From Today, Pour Your Love On The Way
From My Heart Let It Flow, Fill The World With Its Glow
Lord, Dear God, Pour Your Love Into My Heart (2)

title: Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
title2: Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
Remover of all obstacles that stand in our way
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
 Giver of prosperity, Easwaramma's son
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba
 Bless us Sai Baba, guide us through each day
 Lord God protector Sathya Sai Baba

title: Lord God Within My Heart
title2: Lord God Within My Heart, Lord God Within
lyrics:
Lord In The Form Of Man I Bow Within To Thee
Lord God Within My Heart, Lord God Within
Lord With Lotus Eyes, On The Sea Of Change Reclines
I Offer All To Thee, Lord God Within My Heart

title: Lord I Am Thine
title2: Lord I Am Thine I Am Thine I Am Thine
lyrics:
Lord I Am Thine I Am Thine

In Every Smile Lord I Feel Your Grace
I Am You And You Are Me, Forever

title: Lord Jesus, Son Of God
title2: Lord Jesus, son of God, son of God, You're the way and the light.
lyrics:
You're the way and the light, You're the love and the light,
When the world's in tears then the Lord appears,
You're the way and the light.

lyrics:
Draw us to Your Heart
 (Lord) Draw us to Your Heart

 As we breathe Your Light

 And receive Your Grace

title2: Lord of beauty, Lord of mercy, Lord of gentle might

Your sweet Name is my Foundation
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai

Your sweet Name is my Foundation
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai

title2: Lord of Heaven and Lord of Earth

lyrics:

Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai (2x)
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai

The golden hand, that blesses the world

Lord of Lords, King of Kings (4x)

Start the day with love, fill the day with love
End the day with love, that’s the way to God

Lord of Lords, King of Kings (2x)

Start the day with love, fill the day with love
End the day with love, that’s the way to God

That’s the way to God, That’s the way to God (3x)

title: Lord of Mercy Lord of the World
title2: Lord of Mercy Lord of the World
lyrics:
Infinite compassion loving all
 Showering grace everywhere
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Om Sai Baba
 Saying that which cannot be said
 Teaching that which cannot be taught
 Knowing that which cannot be known
 Sai Ram Sai Ram Om Sai Baba

title: Lord of the dance
lyrics:
You danced into Shirdi and we sat at Your feet
 You cured our ills with Vibhuthi
 You thrilled us with wonders and You showed us the way
 And said You would return one day.
 Dance dance where ever You may be
 Sai is the Lord of the Dance and He
 Bestows His grace so we may know the bliss
 Of sharing in this dance of His
 You dance into Parthi and You teach us to sing
 You give us all there's nothing we can bring
 You take our hearts and You fill our hands
 We clasp Your feet to learn Your dance

title: Lord Of The Universe
title2: Lord of the universe, Father divine
lyrics:
Mother of miracles, may Your love shine
We who adore You, worship Your name
Light of creation, heavenly flame.
 
Every soul who yearns to know You
Sings a song their very own
Every heart Your music flows through
Shall never be alone.
 
Lord of the Universe, radiant sun
God of compassion, merciful One
All forgiving, faithful friend
Guide our footsteps once again.
 
Like restless rivers searching
For the source where we have come
We long to feel Your ocean
Sweet Lord, carry us home.
 
Lord of the universe, Master of light
Long have we waited for Your precious sight
Prophets and sages let it be known
Every nation will kneel by Your throne.
 
Everywhere Your signs are written
On the earth and in the skies
Now we feel Your omnipresence
Your love before our eyes.
 
[ Lord of the universe ... heavenly flame ]

title: Lord Sathya Sai Bhagawan
title2: Lord Sathya Sai Bhagawan Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Bless Us, Protect us, Sri Sathya Sai
 Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Prema Sai Jai Jai
 Puttaparthi Sai Jai Jai Brindavan Sai Jai Jai
 Ram Sai Krishna Sai Yesu Sai Jai Jai

title: Lord Sweet Lord
title2: Lord Sweet Lord ... Lord Sweet Lord
lyrics:
To You I surrender I dedicate my life
Tied to Your Splendor
You’re That which gives me life
 
You Are The Ocean I dive in devotion
You Are the Mystery that fills my heart with Love
 
Lord Sweet Lord ... Lord Sweet Lord
To You I surrender I dedicate my life
Tied to Your Splendor
You’re That which gives me life

You Are The Ocean I dive in devotion
You Are the Mystery that fills my heart with Love
You Are The Ocean I dive in devotion
You Are the Mystery that fills my heart with Love
You Are the Mystery that fills my heart with Love

title: Lord who is Light
title2: Lord who is Light, the ocean of Light
lyrics:
Lord who is Love, the fountain of Love
 Compassionate Savior, Helper and Friend
 Who leads me out of this darkness I am in
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai Om
 Star of heaven, Lord of all
 Bhagavaan Sri Sathya Sai Om

title: Lord, Help Me To Be Willing
title2: Lord, help me to be willing ... willing to be changed by You (2x)
lyrics:
Only You can see my heart and You know that it wants You
Reveal Your Self to me, O One, that I might know The Truth
 
Lord, help me to be willing ... willing to be changed by You (2x)
 
Let me know Your Strength, O Lord, for I’m powerless alone
Give to me Your Grace, O God, for my way Home
And how willI know if I’m ready ... and how will I know unless I try ...
 
Lord, help me to be willing ... willing to be changed by You (2x)
Willing to be changed by YOU!

title: Lord, Teach Me To Love
title2: Lord, teach me to love my fellow man (4x)
lyrics:
Keep me from the jealousy, jealousy and envy (2x)
Grant us all we may need, let us love and cherish Thee (2x)
 
Lord, teach me to keep my spirit clean (4x)
Make us pure and always see, so that we may become free (2x)
Keep our thoughts in harmony, words and deeds in unity (2x)
Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, Ahimsa (2x)
Truth, Righteousness, Peace, Love, and Nonviolence
Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, Ahimsa
Truth, Righteousness, Peace, Love, and Nonviolence  (2x)

title: Lord, You Are Here Again
title2: Lord, You are here again - do I remember when?
lyrics:
Did my footsteps follow Yours, was my lamp held high?
Did You hear my cry of love? Krishna, Krishna, Krishna....

Hold my heart in Yours, as once You did,
Free my soul to soar, in the light of the Lord, beloved Sathya Sai Avatar.

Lord, You are here again - was I the Gopi then?
Did tears fall from my eyes, as I heard Your flute divine?
Did You hear my cry of love? Krishna, Krishna, Krishna....

Bending to Your glance, I weep in ecstacy,
My heart rings out, as I drink Your cup once more,

Beloved Sathya Sai Avatar (2x)

title: Lotus blooming in my heart
lyrics:
Flower of love, Baba's love
 Waters flowing through the heart
 Streams of love, Baba's love
 Father, thank you for the heart
 Made with love, Baba's love.

title: Love all serve all
title2: Love all serve all, listen to the call of the Lord
lyrics:
Love all serve all, this is the call of the Lord
 If you love the lord, then you must love all
 If you serve the lord, then you must serve all
 Love all, serve all, listen to the call of the Lord
 Love all, serve all, this is the call of the Lord
 See no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil, says the Lord
 Think no evil, do no evil, love all serve all, says the Lord

title: Love All Serve All
lyrics:
God loves everybody
Unconditionally
There’s no favorites here in His creation
 
He loves all His children
Loves us equally
And that love is my greatest inspiration
 
(chorus)
So I will love all, serve all
That is the way for me
Love all, serve all
That is the way to be
Deep in my heart of hearts
I hear a holy call
To love all, serve all
 
Sai is always giving
All throughout the day
Giving love to everyone He sees
 
I want to be living
In that divine way
So I’ll look for opportunities
(chorus)
 
No matter what religion
Or nation you come from
No matter what your personality
 
All are Sai’s children
So I’ll give everyone
All the love that is inside of me
[ Yes, I will love all, serve all ... ]

title: Love all Serve all
lyrics:
Listen to the Call of The Lord
Love all Serve all
Be willing to see The One in your fellowman
 
Every day we are asked to see
The Truth of life in all reality
To know right now that we are free
That’s The Way of The Lord
 
Love all Serve all
Listen to the Call of The Lord
Love all Serve all
Be willing to see The One in your fellowman
 
Every morn when we open our eyes
Life is filled with abundant surprise
Just waitin’ for us to recognize
That’s The Way of The Lord
 
Love all Serve all
Listen to the Call of The Lord
Love all Serve all
Be willing to see The One in your fellowman
 
You and I are here to bring
The Light of God into everything
To let Him be the song we sing
That’s The Way of The Lord
 
Love all Serve all
Listen to the Call of The Lord
Love all Serve all
Be willing to see The One in your fellowman

title: Love All, Fear None
title2: Love all, fear none, for we are one,
lyrics:
We are children of the light, yes we are, children of the light.
We're the family of man, yes we are, the family of man.
We are one with the light, we are one in His sight.
We are children of the light, yes we are, children of the light.

title: Love In My Heart
title2: Love in my heart, love in my home, love in my life, Sai is Love
lyrics:
Sai is my heart, Sai is my home, Sai is my life, Sai my own
Love, love, love is God, live, live, live in Love (2x)
Allelujah, Allelu Allelujah, Alleluia, Allelujah (2x)
Allelujah, Alleujah (2x)
 (next two lines sung in rounds)
Allelujah, Allelu Allelujah, Alleluia, Allelujah
Allelujah, Alleujah

title: Love Is All
lyrics:
The Lord am I, a part from Sai
I am at one with my Lord Sai
I say I do remember You
You gave me stars, the sun, and moon
 
We love You Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Love is all Sathya Sai Baba
 
You’ve come to say no longer wait
This is our time, this is our fate
Our fears removed, our strength renewed
Our lives our love and peace and truth
 
We love You Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Love is all Sathya Sai Baba
 
You gazed upon our souls, and knew who we always were
Long ago and now we’re always made from love
You drew us close to You, You took our hand in Yours
Gave us all we’ll need forever more

We love You Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Love is all Sathya Sai Baba (2x)
 
Christ still will call for all
The heart spring as the weakest part
Of our grace lifts us back to You
Swami make peace us brave and true

When our life ends and this dream is through
We’ll wear all our smiles for You (3x)
 
When life ends and this dream is through
We’ll wear all our smiles for You (2x)
For You my Lord, for You
 
You’ve come to say no longer wait
This is our time, this is our fate
Our fears removed, our strength renewed
Our lives our love and peace and truth
 
We love You Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Love is all Sathya Sai Baba (2x)
Love is all

title: Love is all I see
title2: Love is all I see - Love is all I do
lyrics:
Love is all that's Me - Love is all that's You
 Love is all I feel - Love is all I am
 Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram - Om
 Love is all I say - Love is all I know
 Love is all I hear - Love is all I show [ Love is all I feel ... Om ]
 Love is all My Heart - Love is all My Soul
 Love is all I sing - Love is all I bring [ Love is all I feel ... Om ]

lyrics:

 Bliss is flowing like a river...

title: Love is God
title2: Love, Love, Love, Love is God
lyrics:
Live, Live, Live, Live in Love
Expand your heart to encompass all
Live, Live, Live in Love
Your master is your heart
Your heart where God resides
God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
Men: Love, Love is God
Women: Love, Love is God
Men: Live, Live in Love
Women: Live, Live in Love
Women:
Love, Love is God
Live, Live in Love
Love, Love is God

Men:
Loooove, Loooove is Gooood,
Liiiiiiiive, Liiiiiiiive in Love
Loooove, Loooove is Gooood,
Liiiiiiiive, Liiiiiiiive in Love
(Until the END)

title: Love is God
title2: Love, Love, Love, Love is God
lyrics:

 Expand your heart to encompass all
 Live, Live in Love
 Your master is your heart
 Your heart where God resides
 God is in you, with you, above you around you and behind you
 Love, Love, Love is God, Live, Live, Live in Love

title: Love is God, God is Love
title2: Love is God, God is Love
lyrics:
Love all serve all says the Lord
 He is good, so be good
 Love all serve all says the Lord
 Live in love, Love all beings
 Love all serve all says the Lord

title: Love Is His Form
title2: Love Is His Form, Says Sai, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love
lyrics:

Love Is His Form, Says Sai, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zohrashtra Yeshu Nanak
Sing Any Name To Adore Him, Sai Baba Is Love, Divine Love

title: Love Is My Form
title2: Love Is My Form, Truth Is My Breath, Bliss Is My Food
lyrics:
My Life Is My Message Expansion Is My Life
No Reason For Love, No Season For Love, No Birth, No Death
Prema Sathya Ananda, Dharma Shanthi Ananda
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai Jai Jai
Shirdi Baba, Sathya Baba, Prema Baba Jai Jai

title: Love is my life
title2: Love is my life … Love is my life
lyrics:
Love is all that I hear … no longer worry, doubt or fear
Love is my life … it is my life
 
Love is my life … Love is my life
Love is all that I see … for I AM … so fin-al-ly
Love is my life … it is my life
 
Love is all that I voice … it’s through this awareness that I make the choice
Love is everything that I touch … for Love is the thing that I love so much
Love is the thing that I love so much
 
Love is my life … Love is my life
Love is all that I feel … not illusion but just what’s real
Love is my life … it is my life
 
Love is the all that exists … it is Love alone that persists
Love is what I AM here to share
For Love is God’s goodness embraced in His care
For Love is God’s goodness embraced in His care
 
Love is my life … Love is my life
Love is the song I’m here to sing … to bring Love’s Song into everything
Love is my life … it is my life
Love is my life … it is my life

title: Love is my song
title2: Love is my song for Love is what I AM
lyrics:
Love is my song for Love is what I AM
 
Love is ever giving..giving and giving
Love is ever pouring..pouring and pouring [ Love is my song ... ]
 
Love is ever serving..helping, forgiving
Love is ever sharing..caring, self-forgetting [ Love is my song ... ]

Love is ever free..joyful and trusting
Love is you and me..peaceful & humble  [ Love is my song ... ]

title: Love Is The Answer
lyrics:
Love is the key
Love is the healer
Love sets you free
 
The Lord, He is waiting
For you to decide
No more hesitating
Your heart is your guide
His voice is deep inside [ Love is the answer ... ]
 
You can trust in God’s mercy
And know that He cares
He’s there right beside you
And hears every prayer
The Lord is everywhere [ Love is the answer ... ]
 
Arise every nation
Rejoice side by side
The Lord of creation Is here to provide
No one will be denied 

[ Love is the answer ... ]
Set you free...
Set you free...
Love will set you free

title: Love Is The Way Love
title2: Love Is The Way Love Is The Only Way
lyrics:
Love Is The Road Love Is A Golden Road
Follow The Road Love Is A Golden Road
Step By Step We'll Walk Toward The Lord (2)
Step By Step We'll Reach The Light

title: Love is You, Love is Me
title2: Love is You - Love is Me
lyrics:
Love is We - together kindness and generosity
 Sincerity together
 Love Love Love - Love Love Love
 Love is Light - Light within
 Shining bright forever
 Cleansing, everlasting - Glowing forever
 Love is One - We are One
 Everyone - together
 Patience, inner happiness - Peacefulness together
 Love is God - God is Love
 We are Love - together
 Giving and forgiving
 Loving forever

title: Love is your real name
lyrics:
I look out, what do I see?
It looks like you, it looks like me

The world is full of many things
Big and small, short and tall

Beyond space, beyond time
It’s where we live, eternal, no time

CHORUS
Sathya Sai is here to say
Love will take us all the way

Look at you, you radiate
Love and peace, ain’t it great

There’s only heaven, there is no hell
Love everyone and all will go well

Help everyone that you can
it will take you to the promised land

(CHORUS)

It’s so simple when you think it out
we’re all the same, in and out

Love is our real name
When we know, we win the game

When you’re alone try to see
All that’s true is unity

(CHORUS)

Big and small, short and tall
Light and heavy, we are all

Yellow, black, white, red and brown
Only one heart can be found

Make this world a place of peace
Where only joy is what you’ll meet

(CHORUS)

Love is our real name
When we know, we win the game

(CHORUS)

Sathya Sai is here to say
Love will take us all the way, all the way, all the way

title: Love Lifted Me
lyrics:
I write myself a simple song
Tell the whole world to sing along
I’ll call it a Love song for you
And who knows I’m liable
To take a song from the Bible
And then when I’m through..I’ll just sing
 
Love lifted me ... Love lifted me
When nothing else would do
Ya’ know that Love lifted me
 
Everybody’s lookin’ for a way to say something nobody’s said
But that’s hard to do
They’re searchin’ their minds ... tryin’ to find the one-of-a-kind way
That they could say somethin’ new … well I’ll just say …
 
Love lifted me ... Love lifted me
When I was down and out
Ya’ know that Love lifted me
 
Love lifted me ... Love lifted me
When nothing else would do
Ya’ know that Love lifted me
 
Love lifted me ... Love lifted me
When nothing else would do
Ya’ know that Love lifted me

title: Love peace righteousness and truth
lyrics:
Holy spirit dwelling in us all
 Father in Heaven
 Give us Your love
 Father in Heaven
 Give us Your peace
 Love in every heart
 Peace in every mind
 Love here and now Sweet Jesus Christ, our Lord
 Love here and now Sri Sathya Sai Baba

title: Loving Kindness
title2: We shall give to all we meet Loving Kindness,

title: Ma Daya Nidhe Shiva Shankari
lyrics:
Karunakari Kadambari [ Ma Daya ... ]
Maatheshwari Yogeshwari Jagadeeshwari Amba
Sayeeshwari Sarveshwari Shwetambari Amba (2)
meaning: Glory to the merciful Mother Shankari (Parvathi) who drapes Herself in white. Glory to Amba, the Mother of the Universe. She is the Lord of all and is verily Mother Sai of Parthi.

title: Ma Hey Ma
lyrics:
Sai Mata Jagat Janani [ Ma Hey Ma ... ]
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Mata
Jagat Palini Lakshmi Mata
Ambe Bhavani Gowri Mata [ Sai Mata ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Ma Hey Ma (2)
Sai Mata Jagat Janani [ Ma Hey Ma ... ]
Veena Vadini Saraswathi Mata
Jagat Palini Gowri Mata
Ambe Bhavani Lakshmi Mata [ Sai Mata ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Mother Sai, Mother of the Universe. She is the embodiment of Mother Saraswathi who plays on the Veena (a stringed instrument), Mother Lakshmi who sustains the world and Mother Parvathi, the Universal Mother.

title: Ma Sai, My Precious Sai
lyrics:
Ma Sai, O Sathya Sai [ Ma Sai, my ... ]
May this thread of love never break
Let me always be with You, Sathya Sai
You will never ever leave my heart
We will always belong to You, dearest Sai

Ma Sai, Mana Bangaru Baba
Ma Sai, O Sathya Sai [ Ma Sai, Mana ... ]
Yeh Prem Ki Dori Toot Na Jaaye
Tera Sath Kabhi bhi Chod Na Jaaye
Door Dilse Kabhi Tum Ho Na Jaaye
Sada Rahenge Hum Terey Hi Sai

title: Ma Saraswathi Gnan Do
lyrics:
Vidya Buddhi Daan Do [ Ma Saraswathi ... ]
Prema Dayini Shanthi Dayini
Bhakthi Mukthi Pradayini
Sai Mata Taar Do
meaning: O Mother Sai, bless us with spiritual knowledge, education and intelligence. O Mother, You are the bestower of Love, Peace, Devotion and Liberation.

title: Maam Paahi Om Bhagawathi
lyrics:
Sharada Ma Saraswathi [ Maam Paahi ... ]
Naada Narayani Brahma Sanathani
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjani Sai Maheshwari (2)
meaning: O Divine Mother, please protect us. You are Mother Saraswathi, the mother of learning and art. You are the embodiment of sound. You are the eternally Supreme Mother Sai, the remover of all worldly fears.

title: Madhava Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Nandana Ghana Shyama Gopala [ Madhava ... ]
Shyama Sundara Brindavana Lola
Murali Manohara Giridhara Bala
Jaya Hari Govinda Radhe Gopala (3)
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the dark complexioned son of Nanda and dear consort of Radha. With His enchanting form with the Flute in hand, He played in Brindavan. He held aloft the Govardhana mountain to protect His devotees. Victory be to Lord Hari and Govinda.

title: Madhava Gopala
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hari Giridhara
Mukunda Madhava Parthi Vihara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara
Muralidhara Hari Sundara (2)
meaning: Glory be to Lord Krishna, known by many names - Madhava, Gopala, Madhusudhana, Hari, Giridhara, Mukunda, Muralidhara, Sundara who has incarnated again as Lord Sai in Parthi.

title: Madhava Gopala Mana Mohana Gopala
lyrics:
Sai Mohana Gopala
Yashoda Ke Bala Yadu Nandana Gopala
Bala Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Bala Gopala Giridhara Gopala
Sai Mohana Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the protector of cows who is hailed as Madhava. Glory to the enchanting son of Yashoda of the Yadu clan. Glory to the one who lifted the Govardana mountain to protect His devotees. The most beautiful Lord Sai is none other than Lord Gopala.

title: Madhava Harey Krishna Madhura Mohana
lyrics:
Gokula Balana Devaki Nandana
Venu Vilolana Paapa Vinashana [ Madhava Harey ... ]
Radhika Jeevana Rajeeva Nayana
Nanda Sunandana Gopi Ramana [ Venu Vilolana ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the son of Devaki and the dear child of Gokula, who plays the flute and destroys our sins. He is the lotus-eyed lord who is the very life of Radha and the ever joyful lord of Gopis.

title: Madhava Harey Madhusudhana Harey
lyrics:
Yadava Harey Yadu Nandana Harey
Keshava Harey Radha Krishna Harey
Janardhana Mana Mohana Harey
Sai Satchidananda Harey
meaning: Chant the different names of Lord Krishna, of Yadava lineage, Madhava, Madhusudhana, the charmer of the minds and hearts of devotees and the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

title: Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Govinda
title2: Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Govinda Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Sai Narayana
Gopala Sai Narayana [ Madhava Jaya ... ]
Kalimala Hari Sai Murari
Jaya Baba Jaya Narayana
Parthipurisha Pavana Purusha
meaning: Victory to Sai Narayana, the incarnation of Madhava and Gopala. Glory to Sai, the Lord of Parthi and the Supreme being, the destroyer of evil and of the demon Mura.

title: Madhava Keshava Narayana
lyrics:
Sri Ramana Veda Parayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Narayana
Tribhuvana Bharana Narayana (Hey)
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the one who reclines on the serpent Adi Sesha. Glory to the one who is also known as Madhava and Keshava. Glory to the remover of the fear of birth and death, the one who is wholly devoted to the promotion of Vedas and the Lord of the three worlds.

title: Madhava Keshava O Merey Atma
title2: Madhava Keshava O Merey Atma Ram
lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan Baba Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan
Sharanam Harey Sai Ram
Daya Karo Daya Karo Daya Karo Bhagawan
Daya Karo Krupa Karo Raksha Karo Bhagawan
meaning: Lord Sai, You are my Lord with many names: Vishnu, Krishna and Rama. I take refuge in You Lord, please show me mercy and afford me Your protection.

title: Madhava Madhava
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hari Madhava
Mathuradhipathey Keshava [ Madhava ... ]
Mohana Murali Mukunda Madhava
Pavana Parthi Pura Hari Madhava
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Jaya Hari Madhava
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Madhu. Victory to the Lord of Mathura who is attractive to behold and who plays the flute. Victory to Lord Sai, the resident of the sacred land of Parthi who is verily Lord Madhava (Krishna).

title: Madhava Madhusudhana (Hey)
lyrics:
Yadava Kula Bhooshana Harey Krishna [ (Hey) Madhava ... ]
Jagat Palana Jaganmohana Hey Nandana
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna, the annihilator of demon Madhu, the ornament of Yadava Clan, son of Nanda and the one who enchants and nourishes the Universe.

title: Madhava Mohana Harey Harey
lyrics:
Sai Krishna Harey Harey [ Madhava Mohana ... ] 
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Nachey Krishna 
Payal Baajey Gopi Krishna 
Bansi Bajaavey Radha Krishna 
Aao Aao Krishna Krishna
meaning: Praise be to the sweet, bewitching Lord Sai Krishna. He dances with the sounds of His anklets. His flute enchants all.

title: Madhava Mohana Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Mathuranatha Muralidhari [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu He Giridhari
He Giridhari Shyama Murari [ Meera Ke ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Murari
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the enchanting Krishna roaming in the gardens. He is the Lord of Mathura, the flute-player and the destroyer of demon Mura. Lord of Meera lifted the Govardhana mountain (to protect His devotees)

title: Madhava Mohana Muralidhara
lyrics:
Muralidhara Muralidhara [ Madhava Mohana ]
Yadava Sai Narayana
Nanda Mukunda Narayana
Navaneetha Chora Narayana [ Nanda Mukunda ]
meaning: Oh Lord Narayana you have taken birth in the Yadava clan as the son of Nanda, one who steals the butter (of worldly desires) from the hearts of your devotees, holds the flute and charms everyone around.

title: Madhava Mohana Murari
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
Govinda Ananda Dayaka
Gopala Giridhari Sri Hari
Sri Hari Sai Sri Hari
meaning: Glory to the sweet and enchanting Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Madhu and the one who holds the flute. He held the Govardhana mountain aloft and grants Supreme Bliss. Lord Hari (Vishnu) is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Madhava Mohana Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Muralidhara Mukunda Gopala
Dwapara Yug Mey Krishna Gopala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Shyama Manohara Hey Nandalala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
meaning: Lord Gopala who had taken birth in the Dwapara age, Lord of Meera, son of Nanda has come again as Sai Gopala at Parthi.

title: Madhava Mohana Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Radha Vallabha Hrudaya Vihari [ Madhava Mohana ... ]
Murali Vinodana Madhuvana Sanchari
Sai Murari Sai Murari
Sharan Mey Lelo Prabhu Charana Tumhari
meaning: Chant the names of Krishna who is the consort of Radha and who is the indweller of the heart, He delights in playing the Flute and moves about in the forests of Madhu. Oh Lord Sai, You are none other than Krishna. I bow at Your feet, please accept me into Your fold.

title: Madhava Murahara Madhura Manohara Giridhara
title2: Madhava Murahara Madhura Manohara Giridhara Gopala
lyrics:
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Sanchara
Bhakthoddhara Bala Gopala Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ... ]
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Radha Hrudaya Vihara
Navaneetha Chora Nanda Kumara Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Madhura Manohara Giridhara Gopala
Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala Hey Giridhara Gopala
Nanda Kumara Sundarakara Brindavana Sanchara
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ... ]
Kaustubha Haara Mouktika Haara Radha Hrudaya Vihara
Bhakthodhara Bala Gopala Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ... ]
Goparipala Gopilola Govardhanodhara
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Giridhara Gopala [ Hey Giridhara Gopala ... ]
meaning: Sing continuously the glories of Lord Krishna, the one who lifted the Govardhan Hill to protect His tribesmen from the wrath of Lord Indra in the form of downpour of rain. He is the son of Nanda, with a bewitching form, who moves about in Brindavan and who liberates His devotees. He loves playing the Flute and is the protector of sages. He is adorned with garlands of 'Kausthubha' jewel and pearls. He is the protector of cows and is dear to the Gopis. He resides in the heart of Radha. He is the one who stole butter (hearts) from the Gopis.

title: Madhava Murahara Murali Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Govinda Jaya Gopala
Parthi Purandara Parama Daya Ghana
Deena Janavana Sai Gopala [ Jaya Govinda ... ]
meaning: Victory to Govinda and Gopala (names of Lord Krishna), the one of unbounded compassion, dear to the forlorn and who is none other than Lord Sai, the life principle at Parthi.

title: Madhava Roopa Manusha Vesha
lyrics:
Sai Maharaj Sathya Sai Maharaj [ Madhava Roopa ... ]
Dattatreya Daiva Swaroopa
Devadi Deva Sai Maharaj
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna (Madhava) who has taken a Human Form as Lord Sathya Sai. He is verily Lord Dattatreya, the embodiment of Dvinity and the Lord of Lords.

title: Madhava Sodari Mangala Gowri
lyrics:
Sundara Vadani Meena Lochani [ Madhava Sodari ... ]
Pashupathi Ranjani Parvathi Gowri
Tribhuvana Palini Devi Bhavani
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Narayani
meaning: Glory to the auspicious, radiant faced Mother Gowri (Parvathi), Vishnu's sister. She is the consort of Lord Shiva and protects all three worlds. Lord Sai is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti.

title: Madhura Madhura Hey Muralidhari
lyrics:
Murahara Shourie Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Hrudaya Vihari
Hari Hari Sri Hari Sai Murari
meaning: Salutations to Lord Hari who incarnated as Lord Krishna, the sweet one with the flute who destroyed the demon Mura,, the one who gives bliss, the resident of every heart and who is verily Lord Sai, the resident of Parthi.

title: Madhura Madhura Murali Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Mathuradhipathey Radhey Shyama
Surdas Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Meera Ke Prabhu Hrudaya Vihari
meaning: Glory to the dark-complexioned Krishna, Lord of Mathura, the one who resides in everyone's heart and the Lord of Surdas and Meera.

title: Madhura Madhura Muralidhara Madhava Madhusudhana
title2: Madhura Madhura Muralidhara Madhava Madhusudhana Sri Krishna
lyrics:
Neela Bala Sri Krishna Vanamali Abharana Krishna
Vijaya Sarathi Krishna Venu Vilola Krishna
Geeta Bodhaka Krishna Parthasarathey Krishna
Sharanam Sharanam Sri Krishna Raksha Raksha Sai Krishna
meaning: We surrender to You Sri Krishna, the one who slayed the demon Madhu, the one who is sweetness personified and a delightful Flutist. Lord Krishna, who has adorned a flower garland, is of blue complexion. He is the Successful charioteer of Partha (Arjuna) and the One who has taught Geeta (Bhagawad Geeta). Protect us O Sai Krishna.

title: Madhura Madhura Sai Naama
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Sai Dhyana [ Madhura Madhura ... ]
Madhura Madhura Sai Geeta
Madhura Madhura Sai Bodha
Sundara Sundara Sai Roopa
Jayatu Jayatu Sai Krishna
meaning: Sing the glories of Lord Sai whose name, contemplation, song, teachings are all sweetness personified and His form is beauty personified. Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Madhura Madhuram Sri Rama Naamam
lyrics:
Marapurani Madhura Geetam [ Madhura Madhuram ... ]
Om Namo Shirdeeshwaraya
Om Namo Partheeshwaraya
Shirdeesha Naamam Partheesha Naamam
Sri Rama Naamam Madhurathi Madhuram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama which is sweetness personified. Songs on His glory are unforgettably sweet. Salutations to Lord Sai, Lord of Shirdi and Puttaparthi. The name of Sai and the name of Rama are the sweetest of all.

title: Madhura Manohara Madana Gopal
lyrics:
Madhura Sudha Rasa Murali Gopal
Murali Gopal Murali Gopal
Radha Manohara Radhey Gopal
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Gopal (Krishna) whose vision delights everyone, who is the essence of Sweetness, the one who delights Radha and the Lord with the Flute.

title: Madhura Mohana Ghana Shyama Sundara
title2: Madhura Mohana Ghana Shyama Sundara Sai
lyrics:
Ananda Pradayi Na Andala Rasivoyi (2)

Neeve Na Mata Pitha Bhrata Ve Sada
Sakhudavu Guru Daivamu Mari Antha Neeve Ga
Neede Tanuvu Neede Manasu Antha Neede Ga
Anuvanuvuna Kanakanamuna Nindi Unna Sadaya Hrudaya (2) [ Madhura Mohana… ]

Ninne Poojinchaleni Ee Karamulelano
Ninne Dhyaninchaleni Ee Dehamelano
Kanu Vinduga Ninu Choodani Kannulelano
Ninne Marichi Ninthalanchani Janmamelano
Ninu Piluvani Ninu Thalavani Jihvamela Jeevamela (2) [ Madhura Mohana… ]
meaning: Oh, sweet Lord Shyama (Krishna)! Oh, beautiful Lord Sai! You are the giver of bliss. You are the beautiful one. You are my Mother, Father, and Sibling. Forever You are my Friend, Guru, and God. This body is Yours, and so is this mind. You are present in every atom and every cell. What for are these hands when they are not worshipping You? What for is this body when it is not meditating upon You? What for are these eyes when they are not feasting on Your Divine form? What for is this birth when it forgets You and does not think of You? What for is this life and tongue when it is not chanting Your name daily?

title: Madhuram Madhuram Madhuram (Ati)
lyrics:
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Madhava Naamam Madhuram ( Sai ) [ Ati Madhuram ... ]
Shravanam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Sathyam Madhuram Sai Madhuram
Sarvam Madhuram Seva Madhuram [ ( Sai ) Madhava ... ]
meaning: The Lord is sweetness personified and hence everything about Him is sweet. His name, speech and thought. Service done to Him is sweet too.

title: Madhuram Sai Madhuram Madhuram
lyrics:
Madhuram Sai Sarvam Madhuram [ Madhuram ... ]
Geetam Madhuram Shravanam Madhuram
Naamam Madhuram Smaranam Madhuram
Paadam Madhuram Dhyanam Madhuram
Sai Madhuram Darshana Madhuram (2)
meaning: Sai is Sweetness personified. His songs, discourses, name, meditation, chanting, gift of vision, touching His feet are all sweet.

title: Madhusudhana Harey Madhava
lyrics:
Sri Vasudeva (Sai Deva) Janardhana
Hari Keshava Narayana
Sri Hari Govinda Mana Mohana
Janardhana Jagat Palana
Deenavana Dukha Bhanjana
Aravinda Lochana Ananda Naam [ Sri Vasudeva ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Madhusudhana, Madhava, Vasudeva, Janardhana, Hari, Keshava, Narayana and Govinda. Chant the names of the one who charms the Mind, the motivator of people, the sustainer of the Universe, the destroyer of sorrows, the one who is lotus-eyed and whose name itself is Bliss.

title: Madhusudhana Hey Muralidhara
lyrics:
Madhava Keshava Devadi Deva [ Madhusudhana Hey ... ]
Mana Mohana Hey Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Mana Mohana Hey ... ]
Bhuvana Bharana Vanditha Charana
meaning: Madhusudhana, Muralidhara, Madhava, Keshava, Mana Mohana are different names of the same Lord Krishna, the incarnation of Lord Narayana. Lord Sai is verily Lord Narayana and is the bestower of Auspiciousness, jewel of the Earth and whose Holy Feet are worthy of obeisance.

title: Madhusudhana Muralidhara
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Hey Giridhara Bala
Madhava Madhusudhana
Hrudayanta Ranga Sri Sai Ranga
Sri Ranga Ranga Puttaparthi Ranga [ Madhava ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Madhu and the one who holds the flute. The child who lifted the Govardhan hill who is the very embodiment of sweetness, lures the minds of everyone. He is also Lord Ranga residing in our hearts and is verily Lord Sai residing at Parthi.

title: Madhuvan Ke Mohana Murali Bajaiyya
lyrics:
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Ananda Dham Balaram Ji Ke Bhaiyya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
Gopi Manohara Raasa Rachaiya
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya (2)
Giridhari Nanda Kumara Kanhaiya
meaning: O adorable Lord Krishna, You are the son of Nanda, the brother of Balaram, the one who gives bliss and the enchanting one who dances with the Gopikas.

title: Madhuvan Mey Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Mathura Ke Krishna Gopala Harey
Shirdi (Parthi) Ke Sai Baba Harey [ Madhuvan Mey ... ]
Madhuram Charitham Sai Charitham
Madhuram Vachanam Sai Vachanam
Mathuradipathey Akhilam Madhuram
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna, the Lord of Mathura who moves about in the forest inhabited by demon Madhu. Glory to Lord Sai Baba of Shirdi and Parthi. Lord Sai's character and speech are nectarine. Glory to the one who is the very personification of sweetness.

title: Madhuvana Ke Muraliwala
lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Natha [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
meaning: Dance O Krishna, the son of Nanda; dance, the one who holds the flute, moving around the forest of demon Madhu. You are the beloved Gopala of Gopis. You are none other than lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Madhuvana Murali Guna Gao
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Hari Naam Japo [ Madhuvana Murali ... ]
Vraja Gopi Priya Radhey Shyam Naam
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Naam
Hrudaya Vihari Sri Sathya Sai Ram
Gowri Manohara Shankara Naam Bhajo
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the one with the Flute, who moves about in the forest and who is the slayer of demon Madhu. Chant the name of Shyam, the beloved Radha and the Gopis of Brindavan. Chant the name of Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty and Lord Shankara (Shiva) who charms Mother Gowri and the name of Lord Sathya Sai who resides in everyone's heart.

title: Madhuvana Murali Shyama Bhajo
lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Krishna Bhajo
Radha Madhava Shyama Bhajo
Brindavana Gopala Bhajo
meaning: Sing the sweet name of Lord Krishna of enchanting beauty, consort of Radha and the one who moves about in Brindavan.

title: Madhuvana Murali Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Savariya Morey Raasa Vihari
Gokula Nandana Hey Giridhari
Deenan Ke Tum Bhava Bhaya Haari (2)
meaning: O dear Lord Krishna who danced the Raasa leela (celestial dance), O dear child of Gokula who lifted the Govardhan mountain and the one who removes the fear of birth and death, salutations to Thee.

title: Madhuvana Sanchari Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Sri Madhusudhana Muralidhari [ Madhuvana Sanchari ... ]
Madhava Mohana Mayura Mukutadhara
Mathura Natha Prabhu (Sai) Giridhari
meaning: Glory to You, Lord Krishna. You are the slayer of demon Mura and the one who moved about in the forest of demon Madhu to slay him. You have worn the feather of the Peacock on Your head and is the Lord of Mathura who lifted the Govardhana mountain.

title: Madura Puri Nilayey Meenakshi
lyrics:
Kamakoti Nilayey Kamakshi [ Madura Puri ... ]
Kashi Puradheeshwari Vishweshwari
Parthi Puradheeshwari Sayeeshwari
meaning: Goddess Meenakshi has Her Abode in Madurai while Kamakshi has Her Abode in Kancheepuram, Vishweshwari has Her Abode in Kashi and Sayeeshwari has Her Abode in Parthi.

title: Mage Handa Ahenavado
title2: Mage Handa Ahenavado Oba Thrishula Deviyan Dho
lyrics:
Sai Oba Dakinavado, Mage Geethe Ahenavado
 Dina Dina Gevi Yai, Mage Jeevithaya Sai Ama Maniyan Mage
 Davasa Devi Yai Mage, Obe Name Sihi Kara Saminde
 Nithara Devele, Obe Nama Sihikara Vandimi Obe Siripade

title: Maha Ganapathey Gajanana
lyrics:
Uma Maheshwara Priya Nandana [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Gananayaka Vanditha Charana
Tava Charanam Bhava Bhaya Harana [ Uma Maheshwara ... ]
meaning: The dear son of Uma (Mother Parvathi) is the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the Lord of Ganaas (Shiva's army) whose feet are worshipped by everyone. Prostrations to You O Lord, the destroyer of cycle of birth and death.

title: Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
lyrics:
Matanga Mukha Namostuthey [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Himadrija Sutha Namostuthey
Omkareshwara Namostuthey ( Sai )
meaning: Salutations to the great Lord of Ganaas, Ganesha, the elephant headed son of Parvathi, born of Himalaya mountains and the very embodiment of sacred syllable Om.

title: Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
lyrics:
Matanga Vadana Namostuthey [ Maha Ganapathey ... ]
Adi Poojita Gananatha
Ananda Dayaka Gananatha
Prathama Vandana Pranavakara
Vighneshwara Vinayaka
meaning: Pranaams to the elephant-faced Lord of the Ganaas, who receives the first prayer, who is the giver of bliss, the embodiment of Pranava Om and destroyer of obstacles in the path of spiritual practices.

title: Mahadeva Maheshwara Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Natanagara Dukha Bhanjana Sai Narayana
Karunakara Akhileshwara Sai Narayana
Allah Ho Tum Mahavir Yesu Sai Narayana
Hrudayeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of all worlds, the epitome of compassion, the destroyer of sin, skillful dancer and the Lord of Lords. He is verily Lord Shiva, Narayana, Allah, Mahavir and Yesu. He is the indweller and the Lord of Parthi.

title: Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Shankara
lyrics:
Maheshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara [ Mahadeva ... ]
Mouleeshwara Shiva Shambho Shankara
Madanaantaka Shiva Shambho Shankara
Mruthyunjaya Shiva Shambho Shankara
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of Lords, Sovereign Lord, with braided Hair on His Head, the destroyer of Ego and the conqueror of Death and the one who confers all that is Auspicious.

title: Mahishasura Mardhini Mama Taapa Vimochani
lyrics:
Madhava Sodari Mangala Kaarini [ Mahishasura Mardhini ... ]
Puttapartheeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Sangeeta Roopini Saraswathi Manohari
meaning: Glory be to Goddess Parvathi, the slayer of Mahisha, the remover of sins, the sister of Lord Madhava, the bestower of auspiciousness and Saraswathi, the very embodiment of music. She is verily Lord Sathya Sai, the dweller at Parthi.

title: Make a home of Love
lyrics:
Make a home of Love
 Make the world a Happy Home of Love
 Man must have this goal
 Destroy the weeds of fear
 Destroy the weeds of fear
 Destroy the weeds of hatred and fear
 Man must have this goal
 You have to sow Love
 You have to sow Love
 You have to sow and grow Love
 Man must have this goal

title: Make me an instrument of peace
title2: Girls - Make me an instrument of peace (x2)
lyrics:
Boys - Instrument of peace (x2)
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace
All - Allelieu Allelieu Alleliua …
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace (x2)
Boys - Instrument of peace (x2)
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace (x2)
All - Allelieu Allelieu Alleliua …
Girls - Where there is Anger,
Boys - Let me sow Pardon,
Girls - Where there is Doubt,
Boys - Let me sow Faith,
Girls - Where there is Sadness,
Boys - Let me sow Joy,
Girls - Where there’s Despair,
All - Let me sow Ho……pe
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace (x2)
Boys - Instrument of peace (x2)
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace
All - Allelieu Allelieu Alleliua …
For it’s in giving that we receive,
and in forgiving that we are pardoned
Let me sow Love and seeds of Peace,
Let me sow Love and be with Thee …
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace (x2)
Boys - Instrument of peace (x2)
Girls - Make me an instrument of peace
All - Allelieu Allelieu Alleliua …
Slowly - Allelieu Allelieu Alleliua …

title: Make Me Your Messenger
lyrics:
Oh my Lord, make me Your messenger
Take my soul that longs for Thee
Oh my Lord, make me Your messenger
That walks the earth completely free.

Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
Sing through me Your sacred song 
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
For this heart’s where You belong.
 
With every breath I take
May I feel my spirit wake
In everything I do
Let me always think of You
With every word I say
May I find a gentle way
To myself always be true
So Your love comes shining through.
 
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
Hear my prayer when I call Your name
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
That spreads Your love like a mighty flame.
 
If I sometimes slip and fall,
Let me teach what I’ve learned to all
When I’m blinded by the night
Help me trust my second sight
Lift me up on the wings of love
Like a hawk soaring high above
Let me hear Your voice so clear
When You whisper in my ear.
 
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
From the dawn to the setting sun
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
For Your work is never done.
 
Through the changes that You made
I have healed in a thousand ways
Now my mind is calm and still
To reflect Your precious will
Fill my heart with perfect peace
As my fears they are released
For Your love has touched my soul
Now I stand before you whole.
 
Oh my Lord, (Oh my Lord) make me Your messenger
For my life is Your very own
May I love, (May I love) and serve as Your messenger
Till the day that You call me home
Till the day that You call me home
Till the day (Till the day) - 3x
that You call me home…
Call me home... (call me home) (6x)

title: Make no man a stranger
lyrics:
Make everyone your own
Take heed of your brother
For we don’t travel alone
 
Let the Love flow forth from within you
Embrace all that you see
Make no man a stranger
For there are no strangers in Me
 
Everywhere I look I see only God
Everything I see is created by God
Everyone I meet is imbued with God
Everywhere God is there
In everything my heart shall sing
For I know that I, too, Am truly God

title: Make your life a rose
title2: Make your life a rose that blooms silently
lyrics:
In the language of fragrance
 Each petal is a good deed you've done throughout the day
 When your heart is pure and your mind is silent
 The voice of God can be heard
 Then offer your roses to Him.

title: Makhan Chora Radha Lola
lyrics:
Veda Vedantha Radha Kantha [ Makhana Chora ... ]
Mohana Madhusudhana Jaya Radha Ke Pyaarey
(Radha Ke Pyaarey Radha Ke Pyaarey)
Sridhara Muralidhara Jaya Sai Murare
Bhajo Radhey Shyama Bhajo Sai Shyama
meaning: Chant the name of dark-hued Lord Krishna, who is Radha’s beloved. He steals the butter of our ignorance and is the origin of the Vedas and Upanishads. Destroyer of demons like Mura and Madhu, He is charming and plays His egoless devotees like a hollow flute, bestowing good fortune. Victory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
lyrics:
Hari Hari Bol Hari Bol [ Man Ek Baar ... ]
Hari Pitha Hari Mata
Hari Guru Gnana Daata
Chidananda Roopa Hari Patitha Pavana Man Ek Baar Hari Bol
meaning: O Mind, chant the name of Lord Hari at least once. He is the Mother, Father, Preceptor and the one who bestows wisdom and who is the very embodiment of Awareness and Bliss and who is the redeemer of the downtrodden.

title: Man Mandir Mey Aao Giridhari
lyrics:
Nis Din Barsat Nayan Hamarey [ Man Mandir ... ]
Surdas Ke Shyama Murari
Akhiyan Terey Darsha Ke Pyaasi (2)
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the one who lifted the Govardhana hill, please be seated in our minds, our eyes are shedding tears everyday because of separation from You. O Lord of Surdas, our eyes are pining to have Your Darshan.

title: Man Mandir Mey Aao Pyaarey
title2: Man Mandir Mey Aao Pyaarey Aao Sai Hamarey
lyrics:
Ek Tum Hi Ho Bandhu Sakharey
Aao Sai Hamarey
Man Ki Veena Tujhe Pukarey Aao Sai Hamarey
Bhava Sagar Mey Naiya Mori Paar Karo Rakhwarey
meaning: O dear Sai, please come into the temple of our hearts. You are our only kin and friend. Our heart pines for You, O Lord, please come. Take our boats safely across this ocean of life, O Protector.

title: Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai
lyrics:
Sai Bhagawan Darsha Dikhao [ Man Mandir ... ]
Sada Nirantara Bhajo Sai Ram
Giridhara Naagara Natavara Shyam [ Sai Bhagawan ... ]
meaning: Come and grant me Your Vision in the altar of my mind, O Sai Bhagawan. Chant the name of Sai continuously. He is the Supreme Actor, who was the Lord of Meera.

title: Man Mandir Mey Rajadhi Raja
lyrics:
Tum Ho Sai Maharaj
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Priya Shiva Raja [ Tum Ho Sai ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the king of kings enshrined in my heart, You are the Shiva Raja, the beloved of Mother Shivakami (Parvathi) and the master of dance.

title: Man Mandir Mey Sai Ram
lyrics:
Megha Shyam Radhey Shyam Sathya Sai Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Janam Janam Ka Tum Se Naata
Parthipuri Parameshwara Roopa
Deena Dayala Hey Jagannatha [ Parthipuri Parameshwara ... ]
Charan Mey Lelo Prabhu Sai Ram [ Megha Shyam ... ]
meaning: The dark complexioned Lord Krishna, Radha's consort is the same as Lord Sathya Sai Ram dwelling in everyone's heart. O Lord, accept me in Your fold, O the refuge of the forlorn. May we be bonded with You in all our lives.

title: Man Mey Merey Gopala Shyama
title2: Man Mey Merey Gopala Shyama Radhey Nandalala
lyrics:
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Nandalala Brindavan Ke Nandalala
Yashoda Tanaya Gopala
Yadu Kula Tilaka Gopala
Radha Lola Gopala
Raasa Vilola Gopala
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the dark-hued son of Nanda and Yashoda, You are enshrined in my heart. You are the star of Yadu clan, the beloved of Radha. You are the one who dances the Raasa Leela with the Gopikas in Brindavan.

title: Man Mey Smarana Karo Sai
title2: Man Mey Smarana Karo Sai Ram
lyrics:
Man Mey Japate Raho Sai Ram [ Man Mey ... ]
Ram Naam Mey Lele Raho Sab
Deena Dukhiyon Ke Ram Baba [ Man Mey ... ]
meaning: Constantly chant and remind yourself of the name of Lord Sai. Meditate on Lord Sai who is the Lord of the meek and fallen and who is Love itself.

title: Mana Bangaru Parthi Baba
lyrics:
Mana Shringara Vadana Sai [ Mana Bangaru ]
Antaryami Baba
Sarva Antaryami Sai (Mana)
meaning: Our dearest Baba of Parthi, the indweller of all beings, has a charming face and a golden heart.

title: Mana Me Ram Tana Me
title2: Mana Me Ram Tana Me Ram Aur Sapana Me Ram
lyrics:
Jai Me Ram Stal Me Ram Aur Gagan Me Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Ram
Jaya Jaya Sai Ram Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram (2)
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradayaka Jaya Jaya Sai Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Anand Mangala Dayaka Sai Jaya Jaya Sai Ram
Bolo Bolo Prem Se Bolo Jaya Jaya Sai Ram [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai Ram, who pervades the mind, the body, and the dreams, is present in earth, water, and sky (omnipresent). He grants virtues like truth, righteousness, peace, and love. He confers good fortune and bliss.

title: Mana Mohana Ghana Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Mathura Natha Venu Gopala [ Mana Mohana Ghana ... ]
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala (2) [ Mathura Natha ]
meaning: Oh the Lord of Mathura, Gopala you lure the minds of human beings, the son of Nanda, you steal the butter of devotion from everybody's heart, Oh Sai Gopala the one dwelling at Parthi.

title: Mana Mohana Giridhara Shyama Harey
lyrics:
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Krishna Mukunda Ananda Chanda
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Hari Govinda [ Brindavana Ghana ]
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
meaning: Chant the names of Giridhara, Shyama, Krishna, Mukunda, Hari, Govinda and Sai Baba. Krishna lures the mind, has the complexion that of dark blue clouds.

title: Mana Mohana Hey Giridhari Shyama
lyrics:
Mathura Natha Sundara Shyama
Natavara Naagara Megha Shyama
Nayana Manohara Sri Sai Rama
meaning: Krishna otherwise known as Shyama is the charmer of Minds, the one who held aloft the mountain, is the Lord of Mathura and ever Handsome. Krishna is an absolute pretender and has dubious ways, a treat to the eyes who is none other than Sri Sai Rama.

title: Mana Mohana Hey Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Mano Ramana Hey Nanda Nandana
Radha Ramana Hey Jaganmohana
Govinda Govinda Sai Jaga Vandana
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the cowherd boy who attracts and enchants the mind. He is the son of Nanda, the slayer of demon Madhu, is adored by Radha and is worshipped by the world.

title: Mana Mohana Krishna Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Ghana Shyama Sundara Hey Giridhari
Yadava Madhava Ranga Vittala Murari

Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You are the charmer of our hearts, You reside in a garden (Kunja means creepers and vine, and here, it is a reference to Brindavan), You held aloft the Govardhana hill and You destroyed the demon Mura. O Madhava, You were born in the Yadava clan, and is verily Lord Vittala and Ranga and the one who has the beautiful complexion of dark rain bearing clouds.

title: Mana Mohana Madhusudhana
lyrics:
Mangala Charana Narayana
Govardhanodhara Gopalana
Govinda Gopala Narayana (3) [ Mangala Charana ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who captures the minds of all, the slayer of demon Madhu. He is verily Lord Narayana, the origin of auspiciousness. He is the cowherd Gopala who lifted the mountain Govardhana to save the devotees.

title: Mana Mohana Murali Gopal
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Shyama Gopal
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari Krishna Murari Gopal
Krishna Murari Gopal Sai Murari Gopal
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the beloved flutist and the protector of cows who enraptures the mind of His devotees. His complexion is that of dark rainclouds. Lord Sai is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Mana Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya
title2: Mana Mohana Murali Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Pandari Natha Jaya Hari Vittala
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala
meaning: Gopala with the flute in His hands has a bewitching form, which lures the mind, one who lifted the Govardhan hill to save His devotees is also Lord Vittala of Pandharpur.

title: Mana Mohana Muralidhari
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna
Radhey Radhey
Madhusudhana Madhava Shyama Harey
Ghana Shyam Ghana Shyam Jaya Sai Harey (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the one who attracts the mind, who holds the Flute and who is adored by Radha. Lord Krishna's complexion is that of dark thick clouds and He is the one who slayed the demon Madhu. Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Mana Mohana Muralidhari Jaya Radhey
title2: Mana Mohana Muralidhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Jaya Yamuna Teera Vihari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Meera Prabhu Giridhari Jaya Radhey Govinda
Jaya Brindavana Sanchari Jaya Radhey Govinda [ Jaya Yamuna ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Lord Krishna (Govinda) who is a delight to the Mind, the player of Flute, who moves about on the banks of Yamuna river and Brindavan, and who is the Lord of Meera.

title: Mana Mohana Nandalal
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Madhusudhana Brindavana Nandalal [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Mana Mohana Nandalal
Brindavana Nandalal [ Mana Mohana Madhusudhana ... ]
meaning: O entrancing Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda, You are the slayer of the demon Madhu and the one who played in the bower of Brindavan. You steal our minds, O Lord, who spent His playful and precious childhood in Brindavan.

title: Mana Mohana Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Hrudaya Vihari
Brindavana Sanchari [ Mana Mohana ... ]
Gaana Vilola Murali Gopala
Sundara Shyama Gopala
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Hasita Vadana Sai Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who charms the Mind, who held aloft the mountain high, who is of dark complexion, the indweller of the Heart and who moves about the thick bushes of Brindavan. Lord Sai is verily Krishna who loves music, plays the Flute, delights in playing with the Gopis and has a smiling face.

title: Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Dusthara Bhava Sagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Natha Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba Omkaram Baba Om Namo Baba
alt_lyrics:
Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
Dusthara Bhava Sagara Taranam
Guru Maharaj Guru Jai Jai
Sai Natha Sadguru Jai Jai
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Arunachala Shiva Aruna Shivom
Omkaram Bhava Omkaram Bhava Omkaram Bhava Om Namo Baba
meaning: O mind, adhere to the feet of the Guru by singing His glory and take refuge under His feet, which enables us to cross the unconquerable ocean of life. Glory be to the venerable Guru Sainath. Chant repeatedly 'Om Nama Shivaya', 'Arunachala Shiva'. Prostrations to Baba who is the embodiment of Om.
songtags: golden voice, karaoke, multi-lingual, sheet-music, lead-music, instrumental, tutorial

title: Manasa Bhajorey Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Sai Charanam Pranamamyaham (Sathya) (2)
Nirmala Hrudaya Virajita Charanam
Sakala Charachara Vyapaka Charanam
Bhava Sagara Uddharaka Charanam [ (Sathya) Sai Charanam (2) ... ]
meaning: Oh Mind, sing the glory of Guru and adhere to the feet of Sathya Sai, the one seated in the pure heart, the one who is present in both animate and inanimate objects and helps us to cross the ocean of cycle of birth and death.

title: Mandara Giridhara Madana Manohara
lyrics:
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Giridhari Giridhari Govardhanadhara Giridhari (2)
Madhava Madhusudhana
Murali Gaana Vilola
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who lifted the Govardhana mountain, which was earlier known as Mandara mountains, to save the people from the wrath of Indra. Glory to the Lord of Meera and to the slayer of demon Madhu. Glory to the one who loves playing the flute.

title: Mandara Mala Dhara Jaya Gowri
title2: Mandara Mala Dhara Jaya Gowri Shankara
lyrics:
Hara Hara Paahi Trinetra
Gangadhara Bimbadhara Chandramouli Shankara [ Mandara Mala Dhara ... ]
Vamadeva Mahadeva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shankara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Shankara
meaning: Victory to Lord Shankara, the consort of Gowri, who adorns the garland of 'Mandara' flowers. Victory to the benevolent three-eyed one who wears the Ganga and the moon on His crown of hair. Victory to the God of Gods, Lord Shiva. He is none other than our Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Mandasmitha Mukha Madhura Bhashana Mahadeva
title2: Mandasmitha Mukha Madhura Bhashana Mahadeva Shambho
lyrics:
Mangalalaya Manmata Nashana Mahadeva Shambho
Linga Manohara Nandi Vahana Mahadeva Shambho
Mahadeva Shambho Hara Hara Mahadeva Shambho (2)
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva who has a happy and smiling face, who speaks sweet words and bestows good fortune. He uses the bull for a conveyance and is portrayed and worshipped in the form of a graceful Linga. He is the one who burnt Manmata (God of Love) to ashes (for disturbing Lord Shiva during His penance).

title: Mandir Mey Aao Madhava
lyrics:
Madhava Keshava [ Mandir Mey ... ]
Adi Narayana Anantha Sai
Aao Aao Hrudaya Nivasi
Radha Lola Rakumayi Vittala
Ranga Panduranga Vittala

Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
meaning: I invite You in the temple of my heart, O Madhava, Keshava (names of Lord Krishna), You are the primordial, infinite Sai, the indweller of my heart. You are the same as Lord Vitthala, the beloved of Radha and Rakumayi.

title: Mandir Mey Tum Ram Ho
title2: Mandir Mey Tum Ram Ho Sai
lyrics:
Masjid Mey Noor Mohammad (Allah Ho Akbar)
Gurudware Mey Tum Guru Nanak
Man Mandir Mey Sai Sai
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam
Sab Mil Bolo Sai Ram
Bolo Ram Ek Hi Naam [ Sab Mil ... ]
meaning: You are adored as Ram in the Temple, as the light of Mohammad in the mosque; You are Guru Nanak in the Gurudwara; In the temple of my mind, You are Sai. Chant the name of Ram, let us chant together 'Sai Ram'.

title: Mangala Charana Gajanana
lyrics:
Gajavadana Shubhanana [ Mangala Charana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Gowri Tanaya Gajanana
meaning: Salutations to the Lotus Feet of the benevolent and goodness bestowing elephant-faced Lord Ganesha. He is the provider of knowledge and intelligence, the son of Gowri (Parvathi).

title: Mangala Charana Paahi Gajanana Siddhi
title2: Mangala Charana Paahi Gajanana Siddhi Vinayaka Deva
lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Sindura Vadana Siddhi Vinayaka Deva
Mooshika Vahana Shambho Nandana
Bhava Bhaya Haari Sathya Sanathana [ Parvathi Tanaya ... ]
meaning: Praise be to Lord Ganesha, the granter of auspiciousness. His vehicle is the mouse. He removes the fears of the world. He is the son of Mother Parvathi. He grants spiritual prowess.

title: Mangala Dayaka Hey Gananatha
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Vighna Vinasha
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Dayala
Parthi Pureeshwara Jagat Paripala [ Pranava Swaroopa ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the bestower of auspiciousness, Lord of the Ganaas, the very embodiment of Pranava (Omkar) and destroyer of obstacles. O the merciful, loving son of Lord Shiva, You are none other than the Lord of Parthi, Sai, the protector of the Universe.

title: Mangala Dayaka Matanga Mukha
title2: Mangala Dayaka Matanga Mukha Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
lyrics:
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mooshika Vahana Mukthi Pradayaka Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Jaya Jaya Jaya Gananatha
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha who bestows auspiciousness, who is the beloved son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri. Victory to the Lord of Ganaas (Shiva's army), provider of liberation who rides on the mouse (represents the temperamental mind).

title: Mangala Kaari Ganapathi Deva
lyrics:
Sankata Haari Ganapathi Deva
Peetambara Dhari Ganapathi Deva
Sanatana Sukha Kaari Ganapathi Deva
Prathama Poojana Tum Ganapathi Deva
Naman Karey Hum Ganapathi Deva
meaning: Oh Lord Ganapathi, wearing yellow colored clothes, you are the one who is worshipped first, you bestow auspiciousness, you remove the obstacles in life and bestow eternal happiness, Oh Lord we offer our salutations.

title: Mangala Kaarini Jai Sai Ma
lyrics:
Jai Sai Ma Jai Sai Ma [ Mangala Kaarini ... ]
Bhagya Pradayini Sai Ma
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Jai Sai Ma
Mata Maheshwari Sai Ma
Jai Jai Jai Sai Ma (3)
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai who bestows auspiciousness and wealth, who is the destroyer of fear (worldly attachments) and who is the ruler of the three worlds.

title: Mangala Kara Hey Santoshi Ma
lyrics:
Santoshi Mata Darshana Dey [ Mangala Kara ... ]
Sundara Roopini Suguna Manohari
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (2)
alt_lyrics:
Mangala Kara Hey Santoshi Ma
Sai Mata Darshana Deejo [ Mangala Kara ... ]
Sundara Roopini Suguna Manohari
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (2)
meaning: Glory to Mother Santoshi, the bestower of auspiciousness. O Mother Sai who is verily Mother Santoshi, please give Your vision. O the most beautiful one full of virtues, You bestow peace on the entire Universe.

title: Mangala Karini Mahalakshmi (Shubha)
lyrics:
Sankata Nashini Sri Shiva Shankari [ Mangala Karini ... ]
Vidya Dayini Veena Paani
Sathya Swaroopini Parthi Nivasini
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Goddess Mahalakshmi who bestows auspiciousness to all. You are also Parvathi, who destroys the obstacles in life. You bestow knowledge to all. Holding Veena (a stringed instrument) in hand you are embodiment of truth who reside in Parthi.

title: Mangala Karini Sai Janani
lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Veda Kalamayi
Raga Priyakari Bageshwari Ma
Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma Jagat Janani Ma
Mata Pitha Guru Sai Janani
meaning: Oh Mother Sai, you bestow auspiciousness to one and all. You are the embodiment of Vedas, you are the lover of music and you are the Mother, Father and Preceptor to the entire humanity.

title: Mangala Karini Sai Janani
lyrics:
Bhuvanoddharini Bhava Bhaya Harini [ Mangala Karini ... ]
Gnana Dayini Karuna Roopini
Sai Janani Sri Sai Janani
meaning: Mother Sai blesses and removes all fears of worldly existence. She protects all of creation, bestows spiritual wisdom and is a picture of compassion.

title: Mangala Murthy Maruti Raya Raghava
title2: Mangala Murthy Maruti Raya Raghava Priya Jaya Hanuman
lyrics:
Anjani Putra Anjaneya Vayu Kumara Jaya Hanuman
Sita Shoka Vinasha Kaaraka Rama Dootha Jaya Hanuman
Sakala Mangala Moola Kaarana Sarva Mangala Jaya Hanuman
Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman Jai Jai Hanuman Jaya Hanuman (2)
meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the embodiment of auspiciousness who is also known as Maruti Raya (King of Monkeys), who adores Lord Rama and is the son of Anjani and Vayu (Wind god). He is the one who removed the sorrow of Sita, the messenger of Rama and the one who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Mangala Naama Bhajorey Manuva
lyrics:
Sankata Hara Sri Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Maruti Sevitha Manasa Ram
Mahima Avatara Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Oh Mind, Chant the auspicious name of the Lord Sai Ram, the Lord who was served by the mighty Hanuman and the Lord who was the glorious incarnation of this Age. Chant the name, which removes obstacles in life.

title: Mangala Nama Bhajo Mana Patitha
title2: Mangala Nama Bhajo Mana Patitha Pavana
lyrics:
Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey [ Mangala ... ]
Shantha Brahmamayi Parama Dayaghana
Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey Shiva Sai Harey
meaning: O Mind, chant the auspicious, purifying, and uplifting name of Lord Sathya Sai Baba who destroys sins and is the ultimate in mercy and peace.

title: Mangala Pradayini Sai Shankari
lyrics:
Shiva Shankari Sayeeshwari Shiva Shakthi Roopini [ Mangala Pradayini ... ]
Sri Chakra Dhari Nilayey Amba Moksha Dayini [ Shiva Shankari ... ]
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai who is verily Goddess Shankari (Parvathi) who bestows auspiciousness. Mother Sai is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti, the one who resides in the Sri Chakra and the one who bestows liberation.

title: Mangala Shubhakari Mata Maheshwari
lyrics:
Ambe Bhavani Akhilandeshwari [ Mangala Shubhakari ... ]
Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
Adi Parashakthi Sri Parameshwari
Ananda Roopini Hey (Sai) Shiva Shankari
meaning: I propitiate Mother Maheshwari (Parvathi), who bestows auspiciousness, Mother Bhavani, the mother of the universe, the lotus-eyed Raja Rajeshwari and Shiva Shankari who is the personification of the primordial energy and eternal bliss. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily the Divine Mother.

title: Mangalamaya Varadey Bhavani
lyrics:
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Ajara Amara Parabrahma Swaroopini
Nirakara Tum Hey Jagat Janani
Hey Jagat Janani (3) [ Nirakara Tum ]
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Mother Bhavani who bestows auspiciousness to all, you are the one who knows no birth or death, the embodiment of the Absolute Supreme Cosmic Spirit, you are formless one, Oh mother of the entire Universe.

title: Manovanchita Pradayini
lyrics:
Mangala Mangalya Shubhadayini [ Manovanchita ... ]
Kama Krodha Bhaya Nashini
Karunya Lavanya Gunashalini
Karunya Lavanya Parthi Nivasini
meaning: Desire-fulfilling Mother Goddess, resident of Parthi, bestows good luck and good fortune, destroys anger, lust and fear, and is full of charm and compassion.

title: Manuva Bolo Guru Charanam Manasa
title2: Manuva Bolo Guru Charanam Manasa Bhajarey Sai Charanam
lyrics:
Sri Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
Sai Charana Namo [ Manuva Bolo ... ]
Sri Guru Charanam Prabhu Paada Charanam
Sai Charana Namo
Sadguru Charanam Pavana Charanam [ Sai Charana Namo ... ]
meaning: Meditate upon the divine feet of the preceptor, Lord Sai, that liberates us from worldly existence.

title: Manuva Bolo Jai Sita Ram
title2: Manuva Bolo Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam
lyrics: Jai Sita Ram Bolo Jai Radhey Shyam (3)
meaning: Let us chant and meditate on Lord Rama whose consort is Mother Sita, and Lord Shyam (Krishna), the savior of Mother Radha. Victory to Lord Rama and Lord Krishna.
raga: gowri manohari / patdeep, sindhu bhairavi / bhairavi

title: Manuva Bolo Radhey Radhey Radhey
title2: Manuva Bolo Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Naam
lyrics:
Ram Ram Ram Bolo Ram Sita Ram Naam [ Manuva Bolo ... ]
Ranga Ranga Ranga Bolo Panduranga Baba Naam
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Panduranga Baba Naam
Tukaram Namdeva Bhaktha Sakha Baba Naam
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Baba Naam
meaning: Meditate on the various names of the Lord such as Shyam (Krishna), Ram and Panduranga, who is none other than our Sai, Lord of Parthi. The very same Lord was the friend of Saints like Tukaram and Namdev.

title: Maruti Raya Mangala Naama
lyrics:
Pavana Putra Paavana Charitha
Anjani Putra Anjaneya
Ati Balavanta Jaya Hanumantha
meaning: Chant the auspicious name of Lord Maruti (Hanuman), the Son of Wind God, the one with blemishless character. Salutations to the Son of Anjani, the mighty Hanumantha.

title: Maruti Raya Namo Namo
lyrics:
Vayu Kumara Namo Namo 
Balabheema Balabheema Balabheema Namo Namo 
Ravana Mardhana Namo Namo 
Raghava Sundara Namo Namo 
Balabheema Balabheema Balabheema Namo Namo 
Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Namo Namo
meaning: Salutations to Hanuman who is also known as Maruti Raya (King of the monkey clan), and is the mighty son of Vayu (God of wind). Victory to the valorous one who adores Lord Rama, and assisted the Lord in the annihilation of Ravana. Salutations to the most beautiful Lord Sai Rama.

title: Master of Light
lyrics:
You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Sai Baba
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Sweet Jesus
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Divine Mother
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Lord Buddha
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Mother Lakshmi
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Holy Spirit
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Shirdi Sai
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Amachi
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home
 Oh Lord Rama
 You burn brightly within me
 Illuminate my way Home

title: Master of Maya
title2: Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya, Universal Presence
lyrics:
Creator of the Dream
 Maya is His leela
 Maya is His sport
 (and) If you will surrender
 He'll safely transport
 Your boat across the ocean
 of worldliness and grief
 He'll grant you liberation
 Your soul He'll redeem
 'Cause He's the Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya,
 Universal Presence, Creator of the Dream
 Maya is a shadow
 That fades 'neath the sun
 When you walk Godward
 You merge in the One
 Then maya will not harm you
 It'll lie at your feet
 Where once there seemed many
 Only God will be seen
 Master of Maya, He's the Master of Maya, Universal Presence,
 Creator of the Dream

title: Mata Annapoorneshwari
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari [ Mata ... ]
Mata Saraswathi Mata Mahalakshmi
Mata Annapoorneshwari (Hey) (2)
Sri Shiva Shaktheeshwari [ Hey Mata ]
Sri Sathya Sayeeshwari
