meaning: Pray to Mother Annapoorneshwari, who is none other than Sathya Sayeeshwari, who is also Mother Saraswathi (who bestows knowledge) and Mother Lakshmi (who bestows wealth). Mother Sai is also the embodiment of Shiva Shakti.

title: Mata Bhavani Jagadambe Ma
lyrics:
O Ma O Ma O Ma [ Mata Bhavani ... ]
Shakthi Pradayini Ananda Roopini
Katyayani Karuna Sadani [ O Ma ... ]
meaning: Glory to the Mother of the Universe, Mother Katyayani (Parvathi), the bestower of Power, the embodiment of bliss and the very abode of compassion.

title: Mata Bhavani Maheshwari
title2: Mata Bhavani Maheshwari Sai Mata Bhavani Parameshwari
lyrics:
Mata Bhavani Sarveshwari
Mata Bhavani Krupa Sagari
Krupa Sagari Krupa Sagari Krupa Sagari [ Mata Bhavani ... ]
Kaarini Poorani Dharini Amba Mata Bhavani (2)
Durga Devi Duritha Nivarini Mata Bhavani (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Mother Bhavani, Maheshwari, who is none other than our Mother Sai. She is the goddess of all goddesses. She is the Ocean of Grace (Krupa Sagari), She is the Cause (Kaarini), She is the Fulfillment (Poorani), She is the one who sustains the Universe (Dharini), Mother Bhavani is the destroyer of evil.

title: Mata Durga Bhavani Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Jagat Vandini Mata [ Mata Durga ... ]
Mangala Gowri Sowbhagya Dayini
Pranava Swaroopini Mata
Shiva Shaktheeshwari Palaya Maam
Ambe Bhavani Rakshaya Maam (Jagad)
meaning: Glory to Mother Goddess Durga, the origin of creation, bestower of good luck and good fortune, and worshipped by one and all. The consort of Lord Shiva protects and guards all and is the personification of "Om".

title: Mata Jagadambe
lyrics:
Mein Arathi Teri Utarun [ Mata Jagadambe ]
Mata Bhavani Jai Jagadambe Durga Mata Jai Jai Ambe
Jai Jai Ambe Jai Jai Ambe Jai Jagadambe
Jai Jagadambe Jai Jagadambe Jai Jai Ambe 
Terey Charanon Mey Sheesh Namaoon
Maiya Arathi Teri Utarun

Jai Jai Mata Jagadambe (6)
Mein Arathi Teri Utarun (2)
Maiya Arathi Teri Utarun 
Mein Arathi Teri Utarun (2)
meaning: All praise to the Mother of the Universe. We offer to You the flame of love that burns within our hearts. We bow our heads at Your Lotus Feet.

title: Mata Maheshwari Tribhuvana Janani
lyrics:
Premamayi Sathya Sai Janani
Shiva Mana Mohini Paapa Vinashini
Veda Kalamayi Kalyana Dayini
Jagadodharini Parthi Narayani [ Premamayi ]
meaning: The mother of three worlds, Maheshwari (who is Parvathi the Consort of Shiva) who is none other than Lord Sathya Sai is the personification of Love, is the enchanter of Lord Shiva. She is the destroyer of sins, the embodiment of Vedas and the one who bestows auspiciousness. The goddess Narayani of Parthi is the uplifter of the Universe.

title: Mata Mata Sai Mata
lyrics:
Jagatha Mata Sai Vishwa Mata [ Mata Mata ... ]
Durga Bhavani Kaali Kapalini
Shanthi Dayini Sai Mata
meaning: Mother Sai is the mother of the Universe. She is known by names like Durga, Bhavani, and Kali. She is the bestower of peace.

title: Mata Niye Mangala Sai
lyrics:
Geetaiyum Niye Govinda Sai [ Mata Niye … ]
Tandaiyum Niye Brahma Sai
Pillaiyum Niye Prema Sai
Suttramum Niye Sundara Sai
Shakthi Roopa Shankara Sai
meaning: O Auspicious Lord Sai, You are our Mother, You are Lord Govinda (Krishna) and You are the Bhagwad Geeta. You are our Father, O Supreme Lord. You are also our child and kin, O loving and beautiful Lord Sai. You are the embodiment of Shakthi (Parvathi) and is verily Lord Shankara (Shiva).

title: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha
title2: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
lyrics:
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
Janaki Jeevana Sita Mohana
Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are my mother, father, preceptor, kith and kin. You are Lord Rama, the very life of Mother Janaki. You are the consort of Lakshmi and is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha
title2: Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Sakha Hari
lyrics:
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Allah Tum Ho Yesu Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai Bhagawan [ Narayana Sai ]
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Narayana you are the Mother, Father, Guru, Kith and Kin. You are none other than Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir and the Lord of the entire humanity.

title: Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
title2: Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
lyrics:
Mata Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Teri Jai Jai Kaar
Ma Sheravali Ma Jyotavali
Pahadavali Ma Lattavali
Prem Se Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Sare Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Sab Mil Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Baar Se Bolo (Jai Matadi)
Mata Rani Jai Jai Kaar Ambe Rani Jai Jai Kaar
meaning: Victory be to the divine mother, who rides majestically on a lion, who is effulgent, and who resides in mountainous terrain. Chant with love and jointly with everyone, victory be to the divine mother.

title: Mata Saraswathi
lyrics:
Vidya Dayini Veena Paani [ (Jagan) Mata ... ]
Shwethamayi Sangeethamayi
Chinmayi Chiraamayi
Veda Mata Gayathri
Premamayi Sathya Sai Mayi
meaning: O Mother Saraswathi, playing divine music with the Veena, You are the Mother of the whole world. Adorned in white, You are the embodiment of music, full of consciousness and is permanent. You are the Mother of the Vedas and the bestower of Knowledge. You are none other than Sathya Sai who is full of Love.

title: Matanga Vadana Ananda Sadana
lyrics:
Mahadeva Shiva Shambho Nandana [ Matanga Vadana ... ]
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika Vahana
Mata Maheshwari Bhavani Nandana
Maha Ganapathey Mangala Charana (2)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, the one with the face of elephant (Matanga), who is the abode of bliss (Ananda), the loving son of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) the remover of Maya (illusion, ignorance), who rides on the mouse (Mooshika), the beloved son of Goddess Maheshwari (Parvathi), we bow to the Lotus Feet of the Great Lord Ganapathi.

title: Matanga Vadana Gajavadana
lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Gajavadana [ Matanga Vadana ... ]
Vighna Vinashaka Parvathi Nandana
Mangala Kaari Gajavadana
Gajanana Hey Shubhanana
Partheesha (Sayeesha) Sharanam Gajavadana
meaning: We seek Your shelter oh the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, we surrender to You. You are the remover of obstacles. Oh the son of Parvathi, You bestow auspiciousness and well being. You are the Lord of Parthi, we surrender to You.

title: Matanga Vadana Gowri Nandana Mooshika
title2: Matanga Vadana Gowri Nandana Mooshika  Vahana Gajanana
lyrics:
Pashupathi Nandana Parama Niranjana
Paapa Vinashaka Gajanana
Lambodhara Jaya Vighna Vinashaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Gajanana
meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced son of Mother Gowri and Lord Shiva, whose vehicle is the mouse. Supremely pure son of Shiva fulfills all wishes and removes sins and obstacles. Lord Sai residing in Puttaparthi, is the embodiment of Lord Ganesha.

title: Matanga Vadana Maam Palaya
lyrics:
Mouleeshwara Shiva Gowri Nandana (2)
Mangala Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
meaning: O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, protect me. O beloved son of Lord Shiva and Gowri, You are the one who bestows auspiciousness and success in our endeavors.

title: Matey Jaganmatey
lyrics:
Sankata Harini Mangala Karini
Manasa Bhavani Matey [ Matey Jaganmatey ... ]
Shiva Mana Mohini Sumadhura Bhaashini
Jaya Jaya Ananda Amrutha Varshini
Parthi Nivasini Paapa Vinashini
Patithodharini Matey
meaning: Salutations to mother of the Universe, Mother Bhavani, who is the remover of distress and bestower of auspiciousness, enchanter of Lord Shiva, with beauty in speech. Victory to the one who showers bliss and nectar, to the one who resides in Parthi, the destroyer of sins, the liberator of the downtrodden.

title: Mathura Natha Gopala
lyrics:
Gokula Bala Gopala [ Mathura Natha ... ]
Goparipala Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Murali Manohara Shyama Gopala
meaning: This song extols the attributes of Lord Krishna who is also called Gopala (protector of cows). He is described as the Lord of Mathura, the one who is dark complexioned, fond of flute and cares for the cows. He is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Mathura Natha Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Hey Giridhari [ Mathura Natha ... ]
Gokula Brindavana Sanchari
Kunja Vihari Raasa Vihari
Sri Sai Natha Parthi Vihari
meaning: Chant the name of Lord of Mathura, Krishna, destroyer of Mura, resident of Gokul and Brindavan who roamed the woods and liked the "Raasa" dance. He is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Mathura Puri Vasa Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Gopi Manohara Gopala Krishna
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Sai Narayana
Krishna Mukunda Murari Gopala
Parthi Puri Sai Narayana
meaning: Salutations to Sai Narayana who in the form of Krishna, the beloved of Radha resides in Mathura. He is the son of Nanda and the stealer of butter. He is also called with several names like Mukunda, Murari, Gopala etc.

title: Mathuradhipathey Krishna Mukunda
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Ghana Shyama Mukunda
Venu Vilolana Parthi Ramana
Yadu Kula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Parthi Pureeshwara Jaya Mana Mohana [ Madhusudhana ... ]
meaning: Glory to the Lord of Mathura, Lord Krishna, also known as Mukunda and Madhusudhana (the slayer of demon Madhu). He has a dark complexion, plays enchanting music on the Flute, the crown jewel of the Yadava clan and is lotus-eyed. Victory to Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi, who fills our minds with bliss. He is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Mathuradhipathey Nanda Mukunda
lyrics:
Brindavana Jaya Paramananda
Radha Madhava Jaya Govinda (2)
Radha Madhava Hey Nanda Nanda
meaning: O Lord Krishna, Lord of Mathura, the son of Nanda, You are the beloved of Radha. Victory to You, O the blissful Lord of Brindavan.

title: May the blessings of God
title2: May the blessings of God rest upon you
lyrics:
May His Peace abide with you
 May His Presence illuminate your heart
 Now and forever more

title: May the Light of the ages
title2: May the Light of the ages shine down on me
lyrics:
And the Truth that I'm feelin' fill an eternity
 May the stars above, give me Thine Light
 And when I look at You, let me know it's alright
 May I swim in the ocean of Thy divine Love
 And remember Thy Grace from the heavens above
 May I fly with Thy Shaanthi on the wings of a dove
 And know the bliss of Thy glorious Love
 May the trees of the forest sing out Thy Name
 And the people around me hear it the same
 May I remember this life's divine Game
 And allow me to feel it, be I healthy or lame
 May I be grateful and thankful to Thee
 And know that one day we'll be immersed in the sea
 May I give to others, and allow them to be
 And be sure that one day we'll all meet in Thee

title: May the Light of Truth dawn
title2: May the Light of Truth dawn in the hearts of all beings
lyrics:
May the Love of God we know shine everywhere
May it be imparted unto our hearts
That WE ARE ONE not far apart
May the Light of Truth be known to you and me
 
May the Light of Truth dawn in the hearts of all beings
May the Truth we know that God Is everywhere
Be infused into our hearts
May we LIVE AS ONE not far apart
May the Light of Truth be known to you and me
 
May it be imparted unto our hearts
That WE ARE ONE not far apart
May the Light of Truth be known to you and me

title: May The Love We're Sharing
title2: May The Love We're Sharing Spread Its Wings
lyrics:
Fly Across The Earth And Bring 
New Joy To Every Soul That Is Alive
Samastha Loka Sukhino Bhavanthu
May All The Beings In All The Worlds Be Happy

May The Grace Of God Flow From Our Hearts
Revealing All That's True
And Bringing Peace To Every Soul That Is Alive
Samastha Loka Sukhino Bhavanthu
May All The Beings In All The Worlds Be Happy

title: May we all be flutes within Your hands
title2: May we all be flutes within Your hands
lyrics:
Let us be Your melody, we'll sing at Your command
 Krishna's flute we'll be, we will sing His melody
 When desire's gone, we will finally sing His song
 Song of Love, Song of Truth, let the melody flow through
 Song of Love, Song of Truth, may our lives be one with You

title: Mayilodu Varubavane
lyrics:
Arumugam Kondavane Vel Muruga
Vel Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shanmuga Natha
Vetri Vadivelava Vel Muruga
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shanmuga Natha 
Om Hara Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shiva Shanmuga Natha [ Vel Muruga ... ]
Aadi Va Vel Muruga 
Ni Odi Va Vadivela [ Vetri Vadivelava ... ]
meaning: O Lord Muruga, You rush to us on Your blessed peacock wielding the divine sacred spear 'Vel' (a symbol of knowledge), as we sing Your praises. What joy, what rapture, what glory to see the beautiful captivating Lord with the Vel in His hands. O Guha, born out of Sharavana pond, You grant victory with Your Vel. May we be ever engaged in Your worship chanting the divine names 'Hara' and 'Shiva'. Dear Lord, as we sing for You, please come dancing and running to us.

title: Me Entrego A Ti
title2: Me Entrego A Ti, Senor Ganesha
lyrics:
Soy Un Soldado En Tu Voluntad
 Solo Te Pido, Gananatha
 Que Nos Protejas Contra Todo Mal
meaning:
I offer myself to You, Lord Ganesha; I am a soldier of Your Divine will. I only ask of You, Gananatha,
 to protect us from all negativity.

title: Meera Nath Harey Giridhari
lyrics:
Radha Pyaarey Krishna Murari [ Meera Nath ... ]
Brindavana Ke Sai Murari
Bhakthoddhari Baba Murari
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You are the Lord of Meera, You are the beloved of Radha and the one who resides in Brindavan. You are verily Sai, who liberates all devotees.

title: Meherbaan Mera Allah Sai
lyrics:
Allah Sai Maulah Sai [ Meherbaan Mera ... ]
Tum Ho Yesu Buddha Sai
Zohrashtra Mahavir Nanak (Vahey Guru) Sai
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the most compassionate Allah. You are Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Vahey Guru and Guru Nanak. Glory to Thee.

title: Mera Jeevan Terey Hawaley Prabhu
title2: Mera Jeevan Terey Hawaley Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
lyrics:
Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaletey Ho Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley [ Mera Jeevan ... ]
Bhava Sagar Mey Jeevan Naiya Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Dol Rahi Hai O Rakhvaiyya
Isey Paar Tu Hi Utharey Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
Moh Maya Ke Bandhan Todo Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Hey Prabhu Apni Sharan Mey Lelo
Is Paapi Ko Apnalo Prabhu Isey Pag Pag Tu Hi Sambhaley
meaning: I submit my life in Your care, O Lord. Please take care of it every moment. The boat of my life is wobbling in this sea of worldliness, O dear Caretaker, only You should take it across. Liberate us from the bondage of illusion, take us in Your care and shelter. Please accept this sinner, O Lord.

title: Merey Nind Tute Sapno Mey
lyrics:
Adhi Rath Prabhu Aye
Roopa Jyothirmaya Parama Dayala
Anantha Sai Tum Ho Krupala [ Adhi Rath ... ]
meaning: In the middle of the night, Lord Sai was kind enough to interrupt my sleep by appearing in a dream in His beautiful, all-merciful and infinite form.

title: Miashi wo Agameyo
lyrics:
Subete wo Sasageyo
Michi wo Kiri Hiraku
Seigi wo Tsuki Susumu
Ganesha, Ganesha, Ganesha (Sai) (4)
meaning: Worship the Lord's beautiful feet. Devote everything to God. Lord Ganesha clears the path before us. We journey towards God who carries justice.

title: Michi ni Mayou Osanago wo
title2: Michi ni Mayou Osanago wo Sono Mune ni Taku tame ni
lyrics:
Kono Hoho ni Kobore Michita Namida Nuguu tame ni
Ai no Sugata Sono Mama ni Anata wa Koko ni Korareta
Sono Fukaki Kami no Ai Kagiri Naki Sai no Ai

Sai Ram (6)
meaning: When we lose our way, You are there to embrace us. You are there to make us laugh, You are there to wipe away our tears. Wherever love exists, You are there. O God of Love, Your profound love is without limits.

title: Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho
title2: Mitha Smitha Sundara Mukharavinda Nacho Nandalala
lyrics:
Nacho Nandalala Nandalala (3)
Meera Ke Prabhu Lala Nandalala (3)
Nacho Nandalala Nandalala
meaning: Dance on in ecstacy, O the gentle, smiling, beautiful lotus-faced Lord Krishna, the darling son of Nanda and the Lord of Meera.

title: Mitha Smitha Vadana Mrudu Vachana
lyrics:
Mangala Charana Madhusudhana
Ravi Shata Koti Prakashana
Sai Ramana Sanathana
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna who has a smiling face and a soft spoken tongue. We bow to His auspicious Feet. He is also called Madhusudhana (slayer of demon Madhu). He is effulgent as a million suns. He is the eternal Lord Sai.

title: Mitsu no youni Amai
title2: Mitsu noyou ni Amai Egao no Krishna, Uchuu no Odori wo Mai Odore
lyrics:
Krishna Uchuu no Mai Odore (3)
Kokoro no Butai de Mai Odore (3)
meaning: O Lord Krishna, whose smile is as sweet as honey, please perform Your cosmic dance on the stage that is my heart.

title: Mohana Mukunda Hari Giridhara Govinda
title2: Mohana Mukunda Hari Giridhara Govinda Hari
lyrics:
Narayan Sai Narayan (3)
Allah Narayan Eshwara Narayan
Nanak Narayan Yesu Narayan
Buddha Narayan Mahavira Narayan
Sai Narayan Sai Narayan [ Narayan Sai ]
meaning: Oh enchanting Lord Mukunda (Krishna) you are the one who lifted the mountain (Giridhara), you are Govinda Hari (Vishnu) you are none other than Narayana, Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahavir, all are but emanations of the same Narayana, who is our beloved Sai Narayana.

title: Mohana Murali Baajey
lyrics:
Bala Gopala Jhula Mey Rajey
Dhola Mrudangama Chandana Kumkuma 
Madhu Brindavana Saajey Saajey [ Mohana Murali ... ]
Chalo Puravasi Giridhara Darshan
Deena (Sai) Natha Prabhu Aayey Paritraney
Punya Laganey Hamey Hari Charan Poojey [ Mohana Murali ... ]
meaning: The melodious flute of Lord Gopala (Krishna) is playing while He is swinging in His decorated cradle. All the devotees are playing drums and other musical instruments while decorating Lord Krishna with sandal wood and fragrances. Let us all go to see that beautiful form of our Lord Giridhar who is none other than our Lord Sai. He came to rescue us, the devotees. Let us worship and surrender at His Lotus Feet.

title: Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
lyrics:
Jaya Brindavana Lola [ Mohana Murali ... ]
Yashoda Tanaya Nandalala
Gopi Vallabha Gopala
Gopala Gopala
Gopala Nanda Gopala
meaning: He who enchants with his songs on the flute, victory to the regaler of Brindavan, child of Yashoda and darling of Nanda, beloved of the Gopis, He is Gopala (Krishna).

title: Mohana Murali Govinda Jaya Radhey
title2: Mohana Murali Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Hey Giridhari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Krishna Murari Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
Hrudaya Vihari (Parthi Vihari) Govinda Jaya Radhey Govinda
meaning: Victory to the enchanter with the flute, Lord Govinda, who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees and who is the beloved of Radha. Victory to Krishna - slayer of demon Mura (Murari). He is the one who resides in Parthi (and in devotees' hearts), He is Govinda (Vishnu).

title: Mohana Murali Sunao Giridhari
lyrics:
Aao Hrudaya Mey Prabhu Giridhari [ Mohana Murali ... ]
Hey Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Sri Madhusudhana Hrudaya Vihari
Meera Ke Prabhu Radha Pyaari
meaning: Play for us the enchanting music of the flute, O Lord Krishna. Welcome to my heart O Lord Giridhari, You are the one who resides in Parthi as Lord Sai. Be the resident of my heart, O Madhusudhana (slayer of demon, Madhu), Lord of Meera and beloved of Radha.

title: Mohana Muralidhara Murari
lyrics:
Yadava Sai Shyama Murari [ Mohana Muralidhara ... ]
Mangala Naamam Madhuram Madhuram
Mrudu Vachanam Smaranam Madhuram
Mathuradhipathey Akhilam Madhuram
meaning: Salutations to the enchanting flute player from Yadava dynasty, Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura. Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna, the Lord of Mathura, has an auspicious and a sweet name. His soft spoken speech is ever sweet and He is the very personification of sweeetness.

title: Mohana Raghurama Ati Sundara Sri
lyrics:
Ati Sundara Sri Rama
Maruti Sevitha Rama
Sri Rama Rama Jaya Rama (2)
(Sri) Rama Rama Sai Rama
meaning: Chant the name of the enchanting Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, the ever beautiful Sri Rama, who is served by Maruti (Hanuman). Victory to Thee, O Rama.

title: Mohana Rama Hey Sai Rama
lyrics:
Pavana Naama Prashanthi Rama [ Mohana Rama ... ]
Karuna Nidhey Prabhu Karunya Rama
Bhaktha Jana Priya Palita Rama
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Rama (2)
meaning: The enchanting Rama is our Sai Rama. The blessed name of Prashanthi Rama, the Compassionate Lord who is full of mercy, is the beloved of the devotees.

title: Mohana Ranga Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Keshava Narayana [ Mohana Ranga ... ]
Narahari Narayana
Murahara Narayana
Sri Sathya Narayana
Sathya Sai Narayana

Sai Narayana (3)
meaning: O Lord Sai Narayana, enamored by your divine charms, we sing the praise of Your several names - Keshava, Narahari, Murahara.

title: Mohana Roopa Sri Rama
lyrics:
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Rama [ Mohana Roopa ... ]
Moha Vinashaka Rama (Sri Rama)
Madhura Madhura Hey Taraka Naama
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
meaning: Lord Rama with most enchanting looks, grants liberation, destroys delusion and attachment. Victory to Lord Rama whose sweet name itself liberates the humanity.

title: Mohana Sai Muralidhara
lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Madhusudhana [ Mohana Sai ... ]
Aravindaksha Alankruta Kesha
Ati Sukumara Namo
Abhaya Pradatha Jagat Paripala
Kali Yuga Varada Namo [ Krishna Mukunda ... ]
meaning: Salutations to You, O enchanting Lord Sai, with the flute in Your hands, You are none other than Lord Krishna also called Mukunda, Madhusudhana, the lotus-eyed one with the decorated hair. O extremely tender and gentle one, the destroyer of fear, the ruler of the Universe and the blessing of the Kaliyuga (age of Kali), our salutations to You.

title: Mohanam Madhusudanam Jaya Radha Govindam
lyrics:
Keshavam Narayanam Madhavam Mukundam [ Mohanam Madhusudanam ... ]
Muralidharam Mana Mohanam Nanda Nandanam
Achyutham Paramatmajam Hey Sai Sundaram
Hey Sai Sundaram (2)
meaning: Victory to the the Lord Krishna, the beautiful cowherd who is the beloved of Radha and the slayer of the demons Madhu and Keshi. He is known by various names, including Narayana, Madhava, and Mukunda. The son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, captivates the mind with His beautiful flute. He is imperishable as He is the Supreme Self, none other than our beautiful Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Siddhi Vinayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Jai Gananayaka
Sankata Harana Paapa Vinashaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha Dayaka

Jai Gananayaka Siddhi Vinayaka (3)
Mangala Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one who rides on Mooshika, the divine mouse. Hail the son of Parvathi and the one who bestows intelligence and Divine Power. Glory to the leader of the Ganas (Gananayaka), the destroyer of sins and the one who prevails over good things. Chant the name of Lord Sai who resides in Parthi, who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Mooshika Vahana Modaka Hasta
lyrics:
Maha Ganapathey Namostuthey
Pashankusha Dhara Parama Pavitra
Palaya Palaya Parthi Pureesha
meaning: Salutations to Thee, Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha) who rides the mouse and holds 'modakas' (favorite sweets of Lord Ganesha) in hand, destroyer of sins, the one who is extremely pure. Protect me, O Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi, who is verily Lord Ganesha.

title: More Love, More Power, More
title2: More Love, more Power, more of You in my life
lyrics:
I will worship You with all of my heart
I will worship You with all of my mind
For You are my Lord, for You are my Life

More Love, more Power, more of You in my life
I will sing Your praise with all of my heart
I will sing Your praise with all of my might
For You are my Lord, for You are my Life
alt_lyrics:
More Love, more service, more of You in my life (in my life)
And I will worship You with all of my heart
And I will worship You with all of my mind
And I will worship You with all of my strength
For You are my Lord, for You are my Lord

More Love, more service, more of You in my life (in my life)
And I will seek Your grace with all of my heart
And I will seek Your grace with all of my mind
And I will seek Your grace with all of my strength
For You are my Lord, for You are my Lord

title: Mother Father God
title2: Mother Father God..You are Spirit and I Am of You
lyrics:
Mother Father God..You are in me and I Am in You
 
Mother Father God You are My Source, You are My Light

title: Mother Love
title2: Mother, we are hungry, Mother, won’t You feed us?
lyrics:
Mother, we’re Your children, Mother, never leave us,
Mother, we are the poor ones, created by the loving hand of God,
Mother, Your love has saved us, and You will live forever in our hearts,
Mother love.
Mother, we are homeless, Mother, won’t You keep us from the rain,
Mother, we are dying, Mother, won’t You help to ease our pain,
Mother, we are the poor ones, created by the loving hand of God,
Mother, Your love has saved us, and You will live forever in our hearts,
Mother Love.

title: Mother Mary, Jesus Christ
title2: Mother Mary, Jesus Christ, we raise our hands in prayer
lyrics:
Mother Mary, Jesus Christ, we know that You care
 Jesus Christ, O Jesus Christ, the Lord sent You to see
 That His children on this earth live in harmony
 Jesus Christ, O Jesus Christ, O Lord with a gentle face
 With smiling eyes and words of Love, You showed the way to Grace

title: Mother Oh Mother Sai Ma
lyrics:
You Mean The Whole World To Me Sai Ma
Mother Oh Mother Sai Ma
You Are The Light Of My Life Sai Ma
Ma Sai Ma, Ma Sai Ma
In Times Of Trouble And Despair
I Call Your Name, You Are Always There
How Can We Thank You Oh Dear Sai Ma
For All Your Patience And Love Sai Ma [ Ma Sai Ma ... ]

title: Mruthyunjayaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Tryambakaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (4)
meaning: Humble salutations to Lord Sayeeshwara who is none other than Lord Shiva also known as, Mruthyunjaya (one who has conquered death), Tryambaka (one with three eyes) and Lingeshwara (one with a form that has no beginning or end).

title: Muchas gracias Senor
title2: Muchas gracias Senor, Por tu gran presencia humana
lyrics:
Te alabamos Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Alejanos Senor, De toda vida mundana
 Danos tu darshan Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
meaning:
Thank you so much Lord for Your grand human presence;
 We praise You Lord Sathya Sai Narayana.
 Keep us distant, Lord, from all worldly life,
 Give us Your Darshan Lord Sathya Sai Narayana.

title: Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo
title2: Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo Mujhey Charana Kamal Se Jodo ...
lyrics:
... Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Teri Mahima Likhi Na Jaye
Teri Mahima Kahin Na Jaye
Mujhey Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Terey Dwarey Jo Bhi Aye
O Khali Kabhi Na Jaye
Mujhey Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Sai Charan Kamal Se Jodo
Baba Charan Kamal Se Jodo
meaning: O Lord Sai, please let me merge with Your lotus feet. Your glory can neither be uttered nor written. Whoever comes to Your door, never returns empty.

title: Mujhey Sai Naam Jagat Se
title2: Mujhey Sai Naam Jagat Se Pyaara
lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ Mujhey Sai ... ]
Nanda Ananda Sai Ananda
Nanda Ananda Nanda Ananda
Tum Ho Bhakton Ke Pran
meaning: What I love most in this world is the name of Lord Sai. He is ever blissful. He is none other than Lord Krishna, son of Nanda. Lord Sai is the very life breath of His devotees.

title: Mukunda Madhava Karivarada Sri Sathya
title2: Mukunda Madhava Karivarada Sri Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Govinda Keshava Sri Hari Roopa Sathya Sai Ram
Mathsya Kurma Varaha Narahari Dashavatari Ram
Parthi Vasa Palaya Maam Prabho Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You were the Kari Varada (Lord Narayana, the saviour of the elephant from the clutches of crocodile), Mukunda, Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (various names of Lord Krishna), You are none other than the Ten Incarnations of Lord Vishnu such as, Matsya (Fish), Kurma (Tortoise), Varaha (Boar), Narahari (Narasimha). I pray to You O Lord Sathya Sai to protect me.

title: Mukunda Madhava Murali Manohara Govardhana
title2: Mukunda Madhava Murali Manohara Govardhana Giridhari
lyrics:
Gopi Poojita Manasa Chora Peetambara Dhari [ Mukunda Madhava ... ]
Geeta Bodhaka Sai Sundara
Vanditha Hrudaya Vihari (2)
meaning: Salutations to you Oh beautiful Lord Sai Krishna. you were worshipped by Gopikas, you stole their hearts wearing the yellow colored dress, you were called by many other names such as Mukunda, Madhava, Murali Manohara, Govardhan Giridhari (All names of Krishna), you were the preceptor for the Sacred Bhagawath Geeta and you reside in the hearts of the devotees who worship you.

title: Mukunda Murari Murari Gopal
lyrics:
Hey Gopala Sai Hey Sai Nandalal
Prashanthi Nivasi Nivasi Nandalal
Hey Antaratma Jyothi Hey Jyothi Nandalal
Sathyam Shivam Shivam Sundaram
Hey Sundara Roopa Hey Sai Nandalal
meaning: O Lord Krishna, darling son of Nanda, You are the slayer of demon Mura, You are the effulgent light of the Atma, You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty. You are the embodiment of beauty, You are none other than Lord Sai who resides in Prashanthi.

title: Multi-Faith Prayers
title2: Prayers from various faiths (including Gayathri chanting by Swami)
lyrics:
Buddhism
				
					
				
		
	

    					

		
			
				Namo Tassa Bhagavato Arahato Samma Sambuddhassa
				Buddham Sharanam Gatchami
				Dhammam Sharanam Gatchami
				Sangham Sharanam Gatchami
			
		

		
			I seek refuge in the Buddha I seek refuge in Dharma (Righteousness) I seek refuge in Sangha (Holy order/Community)
        

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    



	
		
				Christianity
				
					
				
		
	

    					

		
			
				Our Father who Art in Heaven hallowed be Thy name
				Thy kingdom come Thy will be done on Earth as it is in Heaven
				Give us this day our daily bread and forgive us our trespasses
				As we forgive those who trespass against us
				(And) Lead us not into temptation
				But deliver us from evil
				For Thine is the Kingdom and the Power and the Glory forever and ever
				Amen
			
		

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    



	
		
				Hinduism
				
					
				 
		
	

    					

		
			
				Aum Bhoor Bhuvah Suvah
				Tat Savithur Varenyam
				Bhargo Devasya Dheemahi
				Dhiyo Yonah Prachodayaat
			
		

		
			Oh Mother, who subsists in all the three Kaalas (Time: Past, Present and Future), in all the three lokas (Lokas: Heaven, Earth and Lower Regions) and in all the three gunas (Gunas – Attributes: Sathwa, Rajas and Thamas).
			I pray to Thee, to illumine my intellect and dispel my ignorance just as the splendorous sunlight dispels all darkness.
			I pray to Thee to make my intellect serene and bright and enlightened.
        

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    





	
		
				Islam
				
					
				
		
	

    					

		
			
				Bismillah Ar-Rahman Ar-Raheem (3)
				La Ilaha illallah Allah Allah (3)
			
		

		
			In the name of God, the Most Beneficent, the Most Merciful. God is One and the Only One.
        

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    




	
		
				Judaism
				
					
				
		
	

    					

		
			
				Sch’ma Yisrael, Adonai Eloheinu, Adonai Echad Adonai Echad (2)
			
		

		
			Hear, O Israel: The Lord our God is one Lord
        

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    





	
		
				Sai Gayathri
				
					
				 
		
	

    					

		
			
				Aum Saayeeshvaraaya Vidhmahe
				Sathya Devaaya Dheemahi
				Thannassarvah Prachodayaath
			
		

		
			I know through Gurus and Shastras (and by direct experience) that Sai is God Himself: He is Bhagawan and Iswara.
			I meditate on this form in my heart with all my mental faculties. He is the embodiment of truth, divinity, universal consciousness and one who pervades all the worlds.
			I pray to such a Sai to direct our intellects to engage in auspicious and righteous activities.
			I meditate on this great form.
        

		
			
				
			
		

    	 

    



	
		
				Zoroastrianism
				
					
				
		
	

    					

		
			
				Ashem Vohu Vahishtem Asti
				Ushta Asti Ushta Ahmai
				Hyat Ashai Vahishtai Ashem
			
		

		
			Righteousness is the best good (and it) is happiness. Happiness(is) to him, who is righteous, for the sake of the best righteousness.

title: Murali Bajao Madhava
lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Gopala [ Murali Bajao ... ]
Madhura Madhura Hari Naam Bajao
Mathura Natha Sai Natha
meaning: O Lord Madhava (Krishna), play the melodious flute. O Lord Gopala (Krishna), You are the one who held the Govardhana mountain high to protect the cows. Sing the sweet name of Hari (Lord Vishnu) and Krishna, the Lord of Mathura who is none other than our Lord Sai.

title: Murali Gaana Lola Krishna Madhava
lyrics:
Venu Gaana Lola Krishna Keshava
Mathuradhipathey Radha Lola
Madhura Madhura Hey Yadu Nandalala
Hey Nandalala Yadu Nandalala (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the player of soulful music on the flute who is also glorified as Keshava. Glory to the Lord of Mathura and the beloved of Radha. Glory to the sweet son of Nanda of Yadava dynasty.

title: Murali Gaana Lola Nanda Gopa
title2: Murali Gaana Lola Nanda Gopa Bala Raavo Raavo Radha Lola Radha Lola
lyrics:
Treta Yugamuna Sita Ramudai
Dwapara Yugamuna Radha Loludai
Geetanu Drapina Taraka Naamudai
Yuga Yuga Manduna Kaguroopa Dariyai
meaning: Welcome O Lord Krishna, Nanda's Son, the beloved of Radha. In the Age of Treta, You incarnated as Rama. In the Age of Dwapara, You enchanted Radha and taught the Sacred Hymn of Bhagavad Geetha. You are the liberator of humanity and in every Age You are the most beautiful one to look at.

title: Murali Gaana Vilola Merey Prana
title2: Murali Gaana Vilola Merey Prana Gopala
lyrics:
Murahara Madhava Maya Vesha
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Krishna who is fond of music on the flute, you are my life Oh Lord Gopala, you are the Lord of Meera.

title: Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana
title2: Murali Krishna Mukunda Krishna Mohana Krishna Krishna Krishna
lyrics:
Gopi Krishna Gopala Krishna Govardhanadhara Krishna Krishna
Radha Krishna Bala Krishna Raasa Vilola Krishna Krishna
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sri Sathya Sai Krishna Krishna
meaning: This song extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various names and attributes.

title: Murali Madhava Sri Hari
lyrics:
Mukunda Govinda Harey Giridhari [ Murali Madhava ... ]
Govardhanodhara Gopi Gopala
Radha Ke Pyaara Hey Yamuna Vihara [ Mukunda Govinda ... ]
meaning: This song extols Lord Krishna's beauty and glory by chanting His various names and attributes.

title: Murali Manohara Gopala
lyrics:
Murahara Shourie Yadava
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana who took the form of Narahari (Half man Half Lion- Lord Narasimha), He is none other than the enchanting Lord Krishna also known by names such as, Gopala, Murahara, Shauri and Yadava.

title: Murali Manohara Natavara Lala
lyrics:
Shyama Manohara Hey Nandalala [ Murali Manohara ... ]
Nanda Mukunda Goparipala
Jaya Jaya Govinda Gopala Bala
alt_lyrics:
Murali Manohara Natavara Lala
Shyama Manohara Hey Nandalala [ Murali Manohara ... ]
Nanda Kishora Goparipala
Jaya Jaya Govinda Gopala Bala
meaning: Victory to the enchanting Flutist, Lord Krishna, the dark-hued son of Nanda and the protector of the cowherd.

title: Murali Manohara Shyama Bhajo
lyrics:
Munijana Sevitha Sai Bhajo [ Murali Manohara ]
Shyama Bhajo Radhey Shyama Bhajo
Shyama Krishna Sai Krishna Bhajo
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna the one who conquers the mind with his divine music of the flute, the dark blue complexioned Lord. Sing about the one who was served by the pious sages. The dark blue Krishna is none other than my Sai Krishna.

title: Murali Manohara Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
Radha Lola Harey Giridhari
Gopala Sai Gopala (2)
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Gopala (Krishna) you are fond of the music on flute, you are the beloved of Radha.

title: Murali Murali Murali Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Mohana Murali Radhey (Sai) Shyam [ Murali Murali ... ]
Kanakambara Dhara Karuna Sagara
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Shyam
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna (Shyam) who plays enchanting music on the Flute (Murali). He is the beloved of Radha, He adorns the golden colored cloth, He is compassion personified, He is the Lord of His greatest devotee Meera, He saved the cowherds by deftly lifting the Govardhana Mountain. He is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

title: Murali Shyama Bhajo Madhava Govinda
title2: Murali Shyama Bhajo Madhava Govinda Bhajo
lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Bhajo Gopi Gopala Bhajo
Giridhara Bala Bhajo Sundara Gopala Bhajo
Shirdi Sai Bhajo Sathya Sai Baba Bhajo
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna such as Murali Shyama, Madhava, Govinda, Radhey Shyama, Gopi Gopala, Giridhara Bala, Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai.

title: Murali Vinodana Munijana Mohana
lyrics:
Natana Manohara Gopala
Nithya Niranjana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Deena Janavana Gopala [ Natana Manohara ... ]
meaning: Oh Krishna, You play the flute, You are charmer of the minds of sages, enchanting dancer, ever new and able to resurrect the heart and who is compassionate towards the afflicted.

title: Muralidhara Bada Chitha Chor
lyrics:
Giridhara Bala Nanda Kishore
Rhumka Jhumaka Jhuma Ghungaroo Bajey
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Payal Baajey
meaning: Glory to the beautiful Flutist Lord Krishna, the stealer of hearts, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain and the beloved son of Nanda. Dance, dear Lord, may the anklets that adorn Your Holy Feet play mellifluous music.

title: Muralidhara Gopala Madhura
lyrics:
Megha Roopa Hari Manasa Chora [ Muralidhara ... ]
Radha Madhava Kunja Vihara
Ananda Ghana Roopa Naama Madhura (3)
meaning: O sweet Lord Gopala (Krishna), with the flute in Your hands and with the complexion of dark clouds, You steal the hearts of devotees. You are the beloved of Radha. With beautiful and sweet name and form You stroll in Brindavan.

title: Muralidhara Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sai Shyama
Giridhari Parthi Vihari
Meera Ke Giridhari
Surdas Ke Krishna Murari
Ghana Shyama Megha Shyama Sai Shyama [ Giridhari ... ]
meaning: Salutations to You Lord Sai, resident of Parthi. You are none other than Lord Krishna, the Lord of Meera and Surdas. You held the Govardhan Mountain to save the cowherds. Your complexion is that of dark clouds.

title: Muralidhara Manamohana Madhusudhana Krishna
lyrics:
Natanagara Jaya Madhava Hey Keshava Krishna Krishna Krishna [ Muralidhara ...  ]
Bansidhara Dukha Bhanjana Yadu Nandana Krishna
Radhey Govinda Sai Mukunda Gopi Jana Priya Krishna
meaning: O Lord Sai Krishna, son of Yadu Dynasty, the one holding the Flute, You are also known as Madhusudhana, Keshava and adored by Your devotees, whose sorrows were driven away by You.

title: Muralidhara Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Murari
Maya Nataka Sutradhari (2)
Maya Manusha Veshadhari
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari
meaning: Oh Lord Krishna with the flute in one hand, you have lifted the Govardhana Mountain with the other, you have annihilated the demon Mura, you have assumed the illusory form of human being for directing and guiding humanity. You are none other than Sathya Sai.

title: Muralidhara Murahara Natavara
lyrics:
Gopi Jana Priya Giridhara
Brindavana Sanchara Jagadodhara
Yashoda Bala Nanda Kumara
meaning: Salutations to you Lord Krishna, son of Nanda and Yashoda, holding flute in hand, you are the supreme dancer whom the Gopis adore, you stroll in Brindavan and up lift the humanity from miseries.

title: Muruga Muruga
lyrics:
Muruga Muruga Shakthi Vela Muruga, You Are My Shining Star
Kartikeya Muruga Vadi Vela Muruga, Come To Me Lord Muruga
Muruga Muruga Muruga Muruga
When I Need You, Muruga, You Are There, Muruga, To Take All My Troubles Away
You're My Swami, Muruga, Give Me Life Muruga, Va Va Vadi Velava

title: Musical Krishna, Magical Krishna
title2: Musical Krishna, Magical Krishna, flute-playing Krishna, come play for me
lyrics:
Charming Krishna, Who lifted a mountain, guarding the cowmaids, come
 protect me
 Radha's Krishna, dancing Krishna, baby Krishna, come dance with me
 Krishna Who appeared in Shirdi, now lives as Sai in Puttaparthi

title: My Dedication
lyrics:
HERE I AM, LORD
Use me, guide me, fill me, take me
Lead me by Your Will
 
HERE I AM, LORD
Ready ... to follow, to serve You, to Love You
To be You in this world
 
THY WILL IS DONE THROUGH ME THIS DAY (4x)
 
LORD, YOU CALL
I answer, I’m open, I listen, I hear You
I feel You move in me
LORD, I COME closer, humbled, surrendered,
Lifted, Committed to Your Way
 
THY WILL IS DONE THROUGH ME THIS DAY (4x)

title: My eyes are forever seeing Your form
title2: My eyes are forever seeing Your form,
lyrics:
My ears are forever hearing Sai Ram
 My voice is forever singing Your glory, My Lord
 Sai Natha Sai Natha, Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Natha

 Sai Natha Sai Natha, Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Natha

title2: My heart is beating, Sai Ram, Sai Ram,
lyrics:
Keeps on repeating, Sai Ram, Sai Ram,
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai (2x)
With every breath of mine, soham Sai Ram
Thought, speech, and action, sarvam Sai Ram

My bliss eternal ananda Sai Ram
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai (2x)

title: Mythili Pathey Raghu Nandana
lyrics:
Rama Raghava Rajeeva Lochana [ Mythili Pathey ... ]
Deenavana Hey Karunamaya
Kamala Nayana Kausalya Tanaya
meaning: Glory to the descendant of the Raghu dynasty, Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita, the princess of Mithila. Glory to the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the protector of the poor, the one filled with compassion and the one who is the son of Queen Kausalya.

title: Naada Brahma Hari Sai Harey
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Sai Harey [ Naada Brahma ... ]
Natana Kaladhara Sai Harey
Nagabharana Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey (3)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, the one who exists in the form of divine music, the one who is verily Lord Narayana and Lord Shiva, the performer of the divine dance and the one who adorns the snake as a jewel. Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Naada Brahma Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shankara
Gowri Ramana Sadashiva
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Gangey Mahadeva (3)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of divine Music, the very embodiment of Lord Shiva, the one reveling in the cosmic dance, the Lord of Goddess Parvathi, the Eternal Lord holding the Holy river Ganga in His hair locks! Glory to the great Lord Sai Shiva.

title: Naada Brahmam Sayeeshwaram
lyrics:
Nithya Nirmala Sayeeshwaram [ Naada Brahmam … ]
Omkara Roopam Sayeeshwaram
Prema Pradatam Sayeeshwaram
Satchitanandam Sayeeshwaram
Sadguru Natham Sayeeshwaram
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of divine music, the one who is eternally pure, the embodiment of Om, the bestower of divine love, the embodiment of truth, consciousness and bliss. Salutations to the divine Preceptor, Lord Sai.

title: Naada Brahmamayi Dayamayi
lyrics:
Bhava Raga Laya Gaana Vinodini [ Naada Brahma ... ]
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Aashritha Phala Dayini Kalyani (2)
meaning: O Divine Mother who is the form of divine music, the embodiment of compassion, You are the one who enjoys the tune, the expression, the rhythm of music, the one who is delighted by the string instrument Veena, the flute and the percussion instrument Mrudanga, the one who grants boons to those who surrender to You.

title: Naada Brahmamayi Sayeeshwari
lyrics:
Bhagawathi Mata Krupa Sagari [ Naada ... ]
Varahi Vaishnavi Vageshwari
Matangi Mahamaye Mookambikey
Parameshwari Hari Sodari
Bhava Bhaya Haarini Sathya Sayeeshwari
meaning: O Mother Sai, the abode of divine music, You are the Ocean of compassion. You are adored by various names, Varahi (a form of Shakthi), Vaishnavi (the sister of Vishnu). You are the bestower of speech who is worshipped as Meenakshi, Mahamayi and Mookambike in various forms in temples. O Supreme Mother, the sister of Vishnu, You are the one who removes the fear of worldly existence. O Mother Sathya Sai, You are verily Mother Parvathi.

title: Naada Lola Sathya Sai Harey
lyrics:
Nagabharana Sai Harey [ Naada Lola ]
Nandi Vahana Sai Harey
Namo Namo Shiva (Sathya) Sai Harey
meaning: I bow to the lover of music, Sathya Sai One who adorns the snake as an ornament The one who rides on the bull - Nandi. I bow down to that Shiva, who is none other than Sathya Sai.

title: Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya [ Naada Swaroopa ]
Chandrakaladhara Shashi Shekaraya
Ganga Jatadhara Trilochanaya
Bhasma Vibhushitha Sanathanaya
Natana Manohara Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
meaning: Lord Shiva! I bow to Thee! You are the form of divine music! The One who adorns the snake as an ornament! One who has the moon's crescent on His head! One whose hair locks bear the flowing river Ganga! One Who is three-eyed! One Who has the holy ash smeared His body! One Who is Eternal! One Who enchants with His cosmic dance! I bow down to that Shiva!

title: Naam Bhajo Hari Naam Bhajo
lyrics:
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Naam Bhajo ... ]
Nanda Ananda Mukunda Harey (2)
Brindavana Sai Baba Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey (3)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Hari who incarnated as Lord Krishna, the adorable son of Nanda in Brindavan. Lord Sai Baba is none other than Lord Hari.

title: Naam Bina Prana Nahin
lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Sai [ Naam Bina ... ]
Gao Rey Guna Gao Rey
Ganga Yamuna Teera Chalo Rey
meaning: There is no life without chanting the name of adorable son of Nanda, of Lord Sai Mukunda. Sing His glory and His attributes, Go to the banks of the rivers Ganga and Yamuna.

title: Naama Smarana Anandam
lyrics:
Sai Naamam Paramanandam [ Naama Smarana ... ]
Sadguru Naamam Sadashiva Naamam
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Naamam
Rama Naamam Krishna Naamam
Allah Yeshu Nanak Naamam
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Naamam
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Naamam [ Sai Naamam ... ]
meaning: Chanting the various names of God gives bliss. The name of Lord Sai, the patron of all religions, provides supreme bliss.

title: Nabi Mohammad
meaning: May the peace and blessings of Allah be upon Prophet Mohammad.

title: Nachey Tribhanga Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Baajey Mrudanga Manjula Bheri [ Nachey ... ]
Karunanta Ranga Yuga Avatari
Sri Sai Ranga Bhava Bhaya Haari
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna who dances in the pose of tribhanga (three bends). Let the percussion instrument Mrudanga and the temple drums beat. O Lord of Compassion, the Avatar of this age, O Sai, salutations to Thee, who removes the fear of this worldly existence.

title: Nacho Ghana Shyam Nacho Nachorey
lyrics:
Nacho Giridhari Nachorey Bansidhari 
Nachorey Nacho Nacho Nachorey
meaning: Dance, Lord Krishna! You have the complexion of dark rainclouds. The music of Your flute enchants all.

title: Nacho Hey Nataraj Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Hara Bholey Nath Shiva Shambho
Shiva Shambho Shiva Shambho
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Bajey
Hara Bholey Nath (Sai Nath) Shiva Shambho
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Shiva who performs the Celestial dance while His drum "Damaru" beats.

title: Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj
lyrics:
Jagadeeshwara Partheeshwara Sayeeshwara [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Nataraj
Bhavani Shankara Hey Nataraj
Sai Manohara Hey Nataraj [ Jagadeeshwara ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Hey Nataraj
Jagadeeshwara Partheeshwara Sayeeshwara [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Nataraj
Bhavani Shankara Hey Shiva Raj
Sai Manohara Hey Nataraj [ Jagadeeshwara ... ]
meaning: O Lord Shiva, perform the cosmic dance. O Lord of the Universe, Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi, You are verily Lord Shiva who is beautifully smeared with the holy ash and the consort of Bhavani (Parvathi). O Sai Shiva, our salutations to You.

title: Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
lyrics:
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nacho Nacho ... ]
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nandalala ... ]
Rhuma Jhuma Payal Ghungaroo Bajey
Ghungaroo Bajey Sai Murali Bajey [ Nandalala ... ]
meaning: Oh Son of Nanda, Krishna, perform the divine dance. Oh Lord Sai Narayana who assumed the form of Lion-God Narasimha, let the anklets, the musical instrument Ghunguroo play, let the flute play the glory of Lord Sai Krishna.

title: Nacho Nataraja Shiva Raja Shambho
lyrics:
Nacho Nataraja Nacho Shiva Raja
Dama Dama Damaru Nachey Shankara
Nacho Hey Nataraja [ Nacho Nataraja ... ]

Nacho Nataraja Nacho Shiva Raja (3)
meaning: Dance, O Lord Shiva, You are the king of all. Your drum resounds as You dance.

title: Naga Bhooshani Sai Narayani
lyrics:
Sambhavi Shankari Parama Shivani [ Naga Bhooshani ... ]
Himagiri Nandini Durga Bhavani
Bhagawathi Bharati Brahma Sanathani
Tripura Sundari Ananda Roopini
meaning: O Mother Sai, You are verily Mother Parvathi who has the snake as an ornament. You are a form of Shakthi who has names such as Sambhavi, the consort of Shiva, Shankari and Shivan. You are the daughter of the king of Himalayas, You are Durga, You are Bhavani, You are the Divine Goddess called Bhagawathi, You are Saraswathi, the Goddess of learning, You are Eternal form of the Absolute, You are the embodiment of beauty and bliss.

title: Nagabharana Hey Nataraja
lyrics:
Naga Linga Sai Shambho Shankara [ Nagabharana ... ]
Nandi Vahana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namah Shivaya
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
meaning: Oh Lord Shiva adorning the snake as an ornament! Oh Sai Shiva in the form of a Linga beneath a snake. Oh Shiva! Who has the Nandi or the divine bull as your vehicle, Oh Shiva! Who is the form of Divine music. Oh Shiva! We worship you.

title: Nagare, Nagare te Yume wo
title2: Nagare, Nagare te Yume wo Mita
lyrics:
Maboroshi no Hibi
Mezameta no wa Kami no Ai
Kami no Michikara
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Om Sri Sathya Sai
Inochi no Hibiki Sathya Sai
meaning: I see a vision of You in my dreams every day as You awoke Your godly love within me with Your beautiful power. O Lord Sathya Sai, Your name echoes through my life.

title: Namah Om Namah Om Hari
title2: Namah Om Namah Om Hari Om Hara Om
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om [ Namah Om ]
Shirdipureesha Sai Shakthi Maheshwara
Parthipureesha Sai Omkareshwara
Bhava Bhava Bhavaya Bhavaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Haraya Haraya Namah Om
meaning: Bow to Lord Shiva, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, the remover of worldly fears, and the Lord of Om.

title: Namah Om Sathya Sai Krishnaya
title2: Namah Om Sathya Sai Krishnaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Gopi Jana Vallabhaya Govindaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Keshavaya Yadavaya Namah Om
Radha Ramana Madhusudhana Mohanaya Namah Om
Bansidhara Muralidhara Giridharaya Namah Om
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai who is verily Krishna, the beloved of the cowherd girls (Gopikas). Salutations to You, the sweet one, the descendant of the Yadu clan and the slayer of the demon Kesha! You are the Lord of Radha and the slayer of the demon Madhu. You are the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, we worship You, O divine Flutist.

title: Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara Hara
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankara Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva
Sadashiva Mahadeva
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva (3)
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
Mahadeva Sadashiva [ Sadashiva Mahadeva ]
meaning: Salutations to Hara or Shiva, who is the Lord of Parvathi. You are Shankara or doer of good, you are the greatest Lord (Mahadeva), You are the Eternal Lord (Sadashiva).

title: Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Namah Shivaya
Girija Shankara Namah Shivaya
Bhavani Shankara Namah Shivaya
Lingodhbhavakara Sai Manohara
Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya (2)
meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who is with Divine Mother Parvathi, Who is Eternal, Who is the Lord of Parvathi, Who as Sai creates the divine Linga, who conquers the mind.

title: Namah Shivaya Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Shekaraya Namah Om (Shashi)
Tandavaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Lingodhbhavakara
Sai Nathaya Namah Om (Sathya)
Vibhuti Sundara Jagadeka Esha
Esha Sayeesha Shirdeesha (2)
meaning: Prostrations to Shiva, One who has the moon on his crown of hair, One who is the great dancer of the Tandava (cosmic dance), who as Sathya Sai creates the divine Linga, Prostrations to that Sai Natha, Smeared in beautiful vibhuti, The one and only Lord, He is Sai of Shirdi.

title: Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu Namami
title2: Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu Namami Maheshwara
lyrics:
Smarami Brahma Smarami Vishnu
Smarami Sayeeshwara (2)
meaning: I salute Brahma, the God of Creation, prostrate to Lord Vishnu, the God of sustenance and worship Lord Shiva, the Lord of Destruction. I meditate on Brahma, contemplate on Vishnu and dwell upon Lord Sai.

title: Namami Nithyam Gananatham
title2: Namami Nithyam Gananatham Smarami Nithyam Gajavadanam
lyrics:
Namami Nithyam Gananatham 
Smarami Nithyam Gajavadanam
meaning: I worship Lord Ganesha every moment. He is the Lord of the Ganaas or the attendants of Lord Shiva. I meditate daily upon Lord Ganapathi, who has the face of an elephant.

title: Namami Sai Pada Pankajam
lyrics:
Smarami Sai Naamamrutham
Bhajami Sai Charanambhujam
Karomi Sai Sankeertanam
meaning: Let us worship the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai, meditate upon the nectar of His Name, sing the glory of His Divine Lotus Feet and perform the singing of His glory.

title: Namami Shankara Bhavani Shankara
lyrics:
Uma Maheshwara Tava Sharanam
Om Shiva Om Shiva Parathpara Shiva
Omkareshwara Tava Sharanam
Namo Namo Nataraja Namo
Hara Jata Jootadhara Hara Shambho
Namo Namo Shiva (Sai) Raja Namo
meaning: Salutations to Lord Shankara (Shiva), the consort of Mother Uma (Parvathi). Surrender to the Supreme Lord who is the very embodiment of "Om". Salutations to Lord Nataraja, the Cosmic Dancer and the one with matted hair. Salutations to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Namami Shankara Shambho Maheshwara
lyrics:
Namami Sadguru Mahadeva [ Namami Shankara ... ]
Namami Brahma Namami Vishnu
Namami Sadguru Sai Deva
meaning: I worship Lord Shiva, the bestower of good, the great Lord. I prostrate to Shiva who is the true preceptor. I bow down to Brahma, the Lord of creation, I salute Vishnu, the Lord of sustenance. I prostrate to the Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai.

title: Namami Shiva Lingam Smarami Shiva
title2: Namami Shiva Lingam Smarami Shiva Lingam
lyrics:
Namami Satatam Smarami Satatam Namami Shiva Lingam [ Namami Shiva ... ]
Nabhi Kamala Udbhava Lingam
Loka Vipraha Karana Lingam
Shivarathri Mahotsava Atmaka Lingam
Shashwata Ananda Dayaka Lingam
meaning: I worship the Linga, the oval symbol of Lord Shiva, I meditate upon the Linga. I worship constantly, I meditate constantly and salute  the Linga that emanates from the lotus of the navel, that is the cause for the grace/wisdom in the world, that emerges on the holy night of Shivarathri, that bestows everlasting bliss.

title: Naman Karoon Mein Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Sai Charanam Sadguru Charanam [ Naman Karoon ... ]
Sharanam Sharanam Tava Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Vishnu Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Shiva Charanam
meaning: I bow down to the feet of the Divine Preceptor Sai. O Lord Sai, the eternal Guru, I surrender to Thy feet. I surrender to the feet of Lord Vishnu and to the feet of Lord Shiva.

title: Naman Karoon Mein Guru Charanam
title2: Naman Karoon Mein Guru Charanam Guru Charanam Sadguru Charanam
lyrics:
Pranavananda Ananda Chandha
Sai Guru Mama Guru Satchidananda [ Naman Karoon ... ]
Shanthi Vidayaka Guru Govinda
Mangala Dayaka Sadguru Natha
Eshwaramba Priya Tanaya
meaning: I bow down to the feet of the eternal Guru, the embodiment of Om or the Pranava. The blissful Sai is my Guru and the form of Satchidananda - symbolizing Truth, Existence and Bliss. He is the One who bestows everlasting peace, He is Guru Govinda, the great Preceptor, He is the Real Teacher who blesses with auspiciousness. He is Sai, the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba.

title: Namasmarana Namasmarana
lyrics:
Singing out in loving adoration
 We are singing out in loving adoration
 Samba Shiva Sai Baba Shiva Shakthi Aathma Swaroopa
 To This Name and This Form we will be born,
 Shiva Shakthi Aathma Swaroopa
 We are singing out in loving adoration
 Shiva (Mrityunjaya) Mahadeva Maheshwara
 Mangala Aathma Swaroopa
 Singing out in loving adoration
 (Sai) We-re singing out in loving adoration

title: Namasthey Namasthey Guru Maharaj
lyrics:
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Maharaj
Sharanam Sharanam Sri Sayeesha
Sashtanga Sharanam Sarvesha
meaning: Oh King of Preceptors! I bow down to You. You are the Eternal Preceptor Sathya Sai. I surrender to You Oh Sai! I offer reverential prostration with all the eight limbs to You, Oh Lord of the Lords!

title: Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
lyrics:
Namo Bhagawathey Rama Roopaya
Namo Bhagawathey Shyama Roopaya [ Namo Bhagawathey ... ]
Rama Rahim Krishna Karim Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Devaya
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Roopaya
alt_lyrics:
Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
Namo Bhagawathey Rama Roopaya
Namo Bhagawathey Shyama Roopaya [ Namo Bhagawathey ... ]
Rama Rama Ram Raghukula Tilaka Raghupathi Raghava Ram
Shyama Shayama Shyam Yadukula Tilaka Patitha Pavana Shyam
Rama Rahim Krishna Karim Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Devaya
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Roopaya
meaning: I bow down to the Lord in the form of Krishna, son of Vasudeva, I worship the Lord in the form of Rama, I prostrate the Lord in the form of Krishna, the star of Yadu dynasty or the blue-colored Lord Rama, the star of Raghu dynasty. He is Rahim and Karim (names of Allah), the merciful and compassionate one, Jesus Christ, Buddha and Mahavir. I bow down to Lord Sai who is fond of all faiths.

title: Namo Deenanathaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Namo Devadi Devaya Namah Om
Namo Trishoola Dharaya Namah Om
Namo Trinetra Dharaya Namah Om
Namo Kailasa Vasaya Namah Om
Namo Shirdi Vasaya Namah Om
Namo Parthi Vasaya Namah Om [ Namo Devadi ... ]
meaning: Bow to Lord of Lords, Lord Shiva, the protector of the weak and forsaken who bears the trident and has three eyes (third eye wisdom). He resides in Kailasa, Shirdi, and Parthi.

title: Namo Gajendra Vadana
lyrics:
Namo Shiva Nandana Jaya Sura Pathi Jai
Siddhi Vinayaka Moksha Pradayaka
Jaya Shubha Mangala Partheeshwara Jai [ Namo Shiva Nandana ... ]
meaning: I worship Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one who is the son of Lord Shiva and the leader of the Suras (demi-gods). He is the bestower of success and liberation. Victory to the Lord who grants auspiciousness and who is verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Namo Mahadeva Samba Sadashiva Om
lyrics:
Jaya Bhuvaneshwara Jaya Partheeshwara
Jaya Shiva Shankara Om [ Namo Mahadeva ... ]
Bhavani Shankara Uma Maheshwara Girija Shankara Om
Hara Hara Shankara Gowri Manohara Sai Shiva Shankara Om [ Jaya Shiva ]
meaning: I salute the great Lord Shiva, the bestower of happiness, the eternal Lord. Victory to the Supreme Lord of all worlds, who is the Lord of Puttaparthi. Victory to Shiva, the bestower of good. He is the Lord of Goddess Parvathi also referred as Bhavani, Uma, Girija and Gowri. He is Shankara, the Lord of Gowri's heart. He is Sai Shiva.

title: Namo Naarasimha Asura Vinasha
lyrics:
Triloka Pala Trivikrama
Simha Mukha Dhari Hari Narayana
Prahalada Rakshaka Hari Narayana
Sri Parthi Vasaya Sathya Narayana
Bhakthoddharaka Sai Narayana
meaning: Salutations to Lord Narasimha, the destroyer of demons, the incarnation of Lord Vishnu. He sustains the three worlds, has the fierce face of a lion, and is the protector of Prahalada. He lives in Puttaparthi as our Lord Sathya Sai, the one who rescues all of His devotees.

title: Namo Namastheytu Namo Namaya
lyrics:
Namo Namastheytu Manonmanaya
Namo Namastheytu Niramayaya
Tubhyam Sada Bhakthi Krupa Karaya
meaning: I bow down to you, my Lord, One who is the Lord of the Mind, One who is blemishless. I constantly offer my devotion towards you, who shows me compassion.

title: Namo Namo Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureesha Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
meaning: I bow down to Lord Sai who is the incarnation of Lord Vishnu - the ultimate abode of all creation. He is the form of the lion-faced Lord Narasimha. He is the form of divine music. He is the Lord of Puttaparthi. He is the one who cleanses us of our sins.

title: Namo Namo Nataraja Namo
title2: Namo Namo Nataraja Namo Hara Jata Jootadhara Shambho
lyrics:
Namo Namo Nataraja
Pavana Gangadhari
Danava Mada Samhari
Parthipuri Vihari
Parama Dayaghana Shouri
Namo Namo Nataraja

Namo Namo Nataraja (2)
meaning: I bow down to Lord Shiva who is the Lord of the cosmic dance. He is the doer of good, Shambho, who has matted locks on His head, the pure one who bears the holy river Ganga on His hair. He is one who has killed the pride of the demons. He is one who resides in Puttaparthi as Sai. He is full of infinite compassion.

title: Namo Namo Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Swagatham Sai Narayana
Swagatham Swagatham
Swagatham Sai Narayana (2)
alt_lyrics:
Namo Namo Sai Narayana
Narayana Sathya Narayana [ Namo Namo ... ]
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana
Karuna Sagara Narayana
Swagatham Sai Narayana
Swagatham Swagatham
Swagatham Sai Narayana (2)
meaning: I bow to Lord Sai, the incarnation of Lord Narayana in this Kali Age. He is the ocean of compassion. I welcome Thee (to my heart), O Lord Sai Narayana.

title: Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Shankara Sadashiva [ Namo Namo ]
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara
Parvathi Priyakara Sri Vishweshwara
Kailasa Vasa Kanaka Sabesha
Namo Namo Shankara Samba Sadashiva
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who supports sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, the Lord of the Universe and the Consort of Goddess Parvathi, residing in Kailash. Salutations to Lord Shiva.

title: Namo Namo Sri Devi Namo
lyrics:
Shritha Jana Palini Sai Namo
Chinmaya Roopini Devi Namo
Sri Partheeshwari Sai Namo
meaning: Salutations to the Divine Mother Sai, the Goddess of Parthi, the embodiment of pure consciousness and the protector of all those to surrender to Her.

title: Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo
title2: Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Namo Sharada Mata
lyrics:
Hey Vidya Gnana Pradayini
Ma Veena Pusthaka Dharini
Bhava Bhanjani Manoranjani
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
Sathya Sayeeshwari Mata
meaning: I bow down to Mother Sharada (Saraswathi), the one who bestows education, knowledge, the one who holds the string instrument 'Veena' and the book in Her hands. She removes the fear of existence and enchants the mind. She is none other than Mother Sathya Sai.

title: Namo Tassa, Namo Tassa
lyrics:
Namo Tassa, Gautama Buddha (2X)
 Hail to the Enlightened One
 Praises to Our Blessed Lord, showing us the righteous way
 Joyously we sing to Thee, with hearts so full of love
 O what glorious Light shines forth from Lord Buddha's calm, gentle face
 Unfolding the Middle Path for man's enlightment
 Meditate upon His Dharma, cultivate the truth within
 Buddha's radiant Light shall lead us to the abode of Niravana's Bliss

title: Namostuthey Ganapathi Ganaraya
lyrics:
Namostuthey Namostuthey [ Namostuthey ... ]
Hey Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Bala (Sai) Gajanana Namostuthey [ Namostuthey Namostuthey ... ]
meaning: I bow down to You, Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha), the Lord of the Ganaas. Salutations to the son of Lord Shiva and the one who has the mouse as His vehicle. I repeatedly bow down to You, O Lord Sai, You are verily the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha.

title: Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
lyrics:
Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
Namu Amida Butsu (3x) Namu Amida
Namu Amida Butsu
Namu Amida Butsu Namu Amida
meaning: Salutations to Lord Amida Buddha in which I take refuge.

title: Namu Kanzeon Daibosatsu
lyrics:
Kannon kosa wa Kurushimi mo
Namidatsu Kokoro mo Seishi no Umi mo
Subete Torisari Sukui Ataeru
Kagirinaki Ai de Sukuri Ataeru

Namu Kanzeon Daibosatsu (3)
meaning: Salutations to the Kannon Bodhisattva (Avalokiteshvara). You eliminate our pain and the turmoil within our hearts with Your endless love and help.

title: Nanda Gopal Nanda Gopal
lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Shyama Gopal [ Nanda Gopal ... ]
Radha Madhava Radhey Gopal
Bhakta Uddhara Parthi Gopal
Sai Gopal (Sathya) Sai Gopal
meaning: Glory to the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, whose is dark-complexioned, the one who is the liberator and the Lord of Radha. He is none other than Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi who fosters His devotees.

title: Nanda Ke Dularey Bhaiyya Nacho
title2: Nanda Ke Dularey Bhaiyya Nacho Nacho Nacho
lyrics:
Murali Ghana Shyama Mora Mukuta Dhama
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Swagatham Krishna Krishna Sharanagatham Krishna
Aao Merey Nayanon Mey Aao Merey Bhajanon Mey
Sundara Sundara Gopala Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Antaryami Gopala Hrudaya Nivasi Gopala
meaning: Perform the Divine dance, O Lord Krishna, the darling son of Nanda. You play divine melody with the flute, You are the one as dark as the rain cloud, the one who adorns the peacock feathered crown. Perform the divine dance, O Lord. I welcome you, Lord Krishna. I surrender to You. Be ever in my vision, be ever in my devotional songs. O beautiful Lord of the Gopas, the dark-hued one, You are none other than our Sai,  the indweller of our heart.

title: Nanda Ke Dularey Yashoda Ke
title2: Nanda Ke Dularey Yashoda Ke Pyaarey
lyrics:
Govinda Murarey Deenon Ke Saharey [ Nanda Ke ... ]
Karuna Sagara Giridhara Naagara
Murali Manohara Shyama (Sai) Murarey
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the beloved child of Nanda and Yashoda, O the protector of cows, the supporter of the downtrodden, You are the ocean of compassion who lifted the mountain Govardhana, You are the one who enchants with the sweet music of the flute, the one with a dark complexion like the rain cloud and the one who killed the demon Mura.

title: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Bhajorey
title2: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Bhajorey Gopi Gopal Bhajo
lyrics:
Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajorey
Giridhari Lal Bhajo (Sai)
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Parthi Vihara Sai Gopala [ Giridhari Lal ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the darling of Nanda and the Lord of the cowherd. Sing of the dark-hued one with the enchanting flute. Sing of Nanda's child who lifted the Govardhana mountain and the stealer of butter (hearts of devotees). Sing of the one who dwells in Parthi, Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Murali
title2: Nanda Ke Lal Bhajo Murali Gopala
lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
Giridhari Shyam Bhajo Gopi Gopala
Meera Ke Natha Prabhu Hey Nandalala [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of the child of Nanda, Lord Krishna, the protector of cows, who plays the flute. We pray to You, the blue colored Lord of cowherd girl Radha; You lifted the mountain Govardhana. Sing the glory of the Lord of the cowherds, the Lord of the great devotee saint Meera and the beloved son of Nanda.

title: Nanda Ke Lal Murali Gopal
lyrics:
Giridhari Govinda Radhey Gopal
Nanda Mukunda Radhey Gopal
Radhey Jai Radhey Jai Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Radhey Gopal
Radhey Radhey Murali Gopal
Radhey Radhey Shyam Gopal
Radhey Radhey Sai Gopal
meaning: Oh son of Nanda! Oh Lord Krishna, the player of the flute and the cowherd boy! The One who lifted the Govardhan mountain, the protector of the cows and the Lord of Radha, the cowherd girl. The son of Nanda, who grants liberation and glory to you. You are the blue colored Lord of Radha, the flute playing Lord and the Lord Sai.

title: Nanda Kishora Jaya Gopal
lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Shyama Gopal
Meera Ke Nath Prabhu Giridhara Gopal
Raasa Vilola Radhey Gopal
meaning: Victory be to the beloved son of Nanda, the dark-hued Lord Krishna, the one who stole butter (analogy for a devotee's heart) and the one who lifted the Govardhana hill. He is the Lord of Meera and Radha and the one who performed the Raasa Leela dance with the Gopikas.

title: Nanda Kishora Mana Mohana
lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Madhusudhana
Devaki Nandana Yadu Nandana
Devadi Deva Jagat Palana
meaning: Glory to the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, the one who enchants the mind. Glory to the one who steals butter, the slayer of demon, Madhu. Glory to the son of Devaki, and the child of the Yadava clan. He is the Lord of the Lords and the protector of the universe.

title: Nanda Kishora Narayana
lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Narayana [ Nanda Kishora ... ]
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
meaning: You are the son of Nanda and are Lord Vishnu, who is the refuge for all beings, You are Krishna who stole butter, (symbolically, devotee's heart). You are the lion God Narasimha and you are the form of divine music.

title: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Madhava
Madhusudhana Muralidhara
Gopi Jana Chitha Chora
Brindavana Sai Kanhaiya [ Narayana Hari ... ]
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the one who stole butter, You are the Lord in whom all beings take refuge. O Lord Vishnu, You are the Lord of Goddess Lakshmi. You play soulful music on the flute. You annihilated the demon Madhu. O Lord, You stole the hearts of the Gopis, You are the child of Brindavan and the one who has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
lyrics:
Brindavana Sanchara
Hey Shesha Shayana Hey Garuda Gamana
Aravinda Nayana Gopalana
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, beloved son of Nanda and stealer of butter (devotees' hearts). Glory to the one who wandered about in Brindavana, who is verily Lord Vishnu resting on the celestial serpent Adi Shesha and who rides on Garuda. Glory to the lotus-eyed Lord Gopala.

title: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Sai
title2: Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Murari Hey Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala
Goparipala Gokula Bala Giridhara Gopala
Murali Lola Munijana Pala Hey Nandalala [ Nandalala ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the one who stole butter. Oh Lord of the cowherds, You are the one who lifted the mountain Govardhana, the one who killed the demon Mura; You revel in playing the flute. You are the one who protects the saintly. You are verily Sai.

title: Nanda Kumara Govinda Navaneetha Chora
title2: Nanda Kumara Govinda Navaneetha Chora Govinda
lyrics:
Srinivasa Hari Govinda Shritha Jana Pala Govinda [ Nanda Kumara ... ]
Sai Rama Harey Govinda Sai Krishna Harey Govinda
Deena Dayalu Govinda Prema Swaroopa Govinda
Govinda Hari Govinda (3)
meaning: I sing of the son of Nanda, the protector of cows; the One Who stole butter and who is the Lord of cows (all beings)! Oh Lord of Lakshmi! You are One that protects those that seek refuge in you. You are Sairam, you are Sai Krishna. You are the One that is compassionate towards the downtrodden and you are the form of Divine Love. You are the protector of cows (all beings), Lord Vishnu.

title: Nanda Kumara Jaya Gopal
lyrics:
Kanhaiya Lal Jaya Gopal
Yashoda Ke Bal Jaya Gopal
Radha Ke Nath Jaya Gopal
meaning: Victory to Gopal (Lord Krishna), son of Nanda and Yashoda and the Lord of Radha.

title: Nanda Kumaram Krishnam Bhajey
lyrics:
Navaneetha Chora Krishnam Bhajey [ Nanda Kumaram ]
Natavara Naagara Krishnam Bhajey
Narahara Sundara Krishnam Bhajey
Narayana Hari Krishnam Bhajey
meaning: Sing the glory of Krishna, the son of Nanda. The stealer of hearts, Lord Krishna. The divine dancer, Lord Krishna. The beautiful man-God Lord Krishna. He is the Lord Vishnu, Sing the glory of Krishna.

title: Nanda Mukunda Hari Gopala
lyrics:
Gopi Jana Priya Goparipala [ Nanda Mukunda ... ]
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Sai Gopala
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
meaning: Oh Krishna! You are the cowherd boy, the one who grants liberation. You are the favorite of the cowherds and the protector of cows (all noble souls). Oh Sai Krishna you are the one who protects His devotees. You are the one who gives happiness to Nanda too.

title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopal
lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Hari Shyama Gopal
Radha Manasa Krishna Gopal
Murali Manohara Mukunda Gopal
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
meaning: You are the son and joy of Nanda and the bestower of liberation. You are the cowherd boy Krishna. Oh blue colored Lord! You are the One Who resides in the heart of the cowherd girl Radha (symbolizes ardent devotee). You are the One Who plays the flute and conquers the mind. You are the One Who is the Lord of Puttaparthi and also known as Lord Sathya Sai Gopal.

title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala
lyrics:
Murali Mohana Shyama Gopala
Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyama Gopala [ Murali Mohana ... ]
Jai Jai Jai Jai Jai Nandalala
Jaya Nandalala Shyama Gopala [ Murali Mohana ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda. Glory to the cowherd boy Krishna who grants us liberation. O Lord, You are the one who enchants us by playing the flute. O blue-colored Lord resembling the dark color of the clouds, victory be to Thee, the child of Nanda.

title: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Hey Sri
title2: Nanda Nanda Mukunda Hey Sri Hari
lyrics:
Indiresha Yadu Nandana Hari
Manda Haasa Madhusudhana Hari
Sundarakara Sayeesha Sri Hari
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the son and joy of Nanda, You are the child of the Yadavas and the bestower of liberation. You are the Lord of Indra. You are the one with a pleasant smile and the one who killed the demon Madhu. You are the one who has taken the beautiful form of Lord Sai.

title: Nanda Nanda Nandana Chandana
title2: Nanda Nanda Nandana Chandana Anandana Chandra Vadana Dayala
lyrics:
Madhava Sanathana Shyamala Narayana Kaamjanaka Vanamala
Manda Haasa Vadana Ranganatha Ranjana Nanda Raja Nandalala
meaning: Chant the name of Krishna - the son of Nanda, bearing the blissful fragrance of sandalwood, with a face pleasing like the moon and dark-hued. Known by the names of Madhava and Narayana, those who look at Him, adorned in a garland of forest flowers, become desirous of Him. Bearing a gentle smile, the Lord known as Ranga entertains all.

title: Nanda Nandana Hari Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Ghana Shyama Mana Mohana (2)
Gopi Lola Gopala
Gokula Bala Gopala
Hey Nandalala Gopala [ Ghana Shyama ]
meaning: The son of Nanda, Oh Vishnu! You are the protector of cows. You are the blue colored Lord resembling the clouds and the One who enchants the mind. You are the favorite of the devout cowherd girls. The cowherd boy who is the beloved child of the cowherd abode Gokula and the loving child of Nanda.

title: Nanda Nandana Hey Bhaktha Chandana
lyrics:
Giridhari Govinda Radhika Jeevana [ Nanda Nandana ... ] 
Meera Ke Nath Prabhu Madana Mohana 
Bansidhara Dharanidhara Gopi Ranjana 
Shirdeesha Partheesha Gopalana Sai Gopalana
meaning: Chant the many names of the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna - Govinda, Gopala, and Giridhari. He is the very life of Radha and the Lord of Meera. He delights His devotees and Gopis with His flute playing. He is none other than Lord Sai, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora
lyrics:
Gokula Bala Venu Gopala [ Nanda Nandana ... ]
Mathura Natha Harey Krishna Gopala
Shyama Gopala Sai Gopala
Vanamali Giridhari Shyama Gopala [ Gokula Bala ]
meaning: The son of Nanda Who stole butter. The child of the cowherd land Gokula, the One playing the flute. The Lord of Mathura, Oh Lord Krishna, the protector of cows. The blue colored cowherd boy Krishna, wearing the garland (Vanamali) and the One who lifted the mountain Govardhana (Giridhari).

title: Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora Brindavana
title2: Nanda Nandana Navaneetha Chora Brindavana Vihari
lyrics:
Shyam Sundara Madana Mohana Brindavana Vihari
Karuna Sagara Kamala Nayana Brindavana Vihari [ Shyama Sundara ... ]
Padmanabha Parthi Vasa Brindavana Vihari [ Shyama Sundara ... ]
meaning: O Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda, You are the one who stole butter and who played in Brindavan. You are the blue colored beautiful Lord, with an enchanting form and the one who adorns Brindavan. You are the ocean of compassion and the lotus-eyed Lord who revels in Brindavan. The one with a lotus in the navel (Lord Vishnu) is the one who resides in Puttaparthi (Lord Sai) and also the one who adorns Brindavan (Lord Krishna).

title: Nandalal Nandalal Nandalal Yadu Nandalal
lyrics:
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora
Radha Pyaarey Nandalal
Maayi Meera Manasa Chora
Parthi Vihari Nandalal
alt_lyrics:
Nandalal Yadu Nandalal Nandalal Yadu Nandalal
Nandalala Navaneetha Chora
Radha Pyaarey Nandalal
Maayi Meera Manasa Chora
Parthi Vihari Nandalal
meaning: O Lord Krishna, child of Nanda, You are the child of Yadavas, the cowherd clan. You are the one who stole butter (devotees' hearts). You are the beloved of Radha. You stole the heart and mind of the great saint Princess Meera. You are none other than Lord Sai who dwells in Puttaparthi.

title: Nandalala Nandalala
lyrics:
Nanda Gopa Nandana Sri Nandalala
Nanda Kumara Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nanda Gopa ]
Yashoda Bala Nandalala
Yamuna Vihari Nandalala
Nandalala Nandalala [ Nanda Gopa ]
meaning: Oh child of Nanda, the cowherd chieftain! You are the One who stole butter (hearts)! You are the son of Yashoda You are the One who played on the banks of River Yamuna!

title: Nandalala Nandalala
lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Hari Nandalala
Murali Manohara Nandalala
Radha Manohara Nandalala
meaning: Oh son of Nanda, the cowherd chieftain, You are the son who grants liberation! You enchant with your music on the flute! You are the One who adorns the mind of Radha, the cowherd girl.

title: Nandalala Nandalala
lyrics:
Nacho Nacho Nacho Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Hey Bala Gopala
Gopi Manohara Gopala Bala
meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Rejoice in dance, dance and dance! You are the Lord of the cowherds who stole butter! You are the beautiful child Krishna! The one who enchanted the cowherd girls! The cowherd child!

title: Nandalala Nandalala Daya Karo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Bhava Sagar Se Paar Utharo
Daya ( Sai Krupa ) Karo Bhagawan
Tumharey Sharan Bin Anath Hai Hum
Daya ( Sai Krupa ) Karo Bhagawan
meaning: Oh child of Nanda! Oh Lord! Have compassion on me. Help me cross this Ocean of life. Have compassion on me. Have pity on me. Without (the shelter of) your feet, we are orphans Oh Lord! Have compassion towards me. Have pity on me Oh Lord Sai!

title: Nandalala Navaneetha Chora Natavara Lala
title2: Nandalala Navaneetha Chora Natavara Lala Gopala
lyrics:
Devaki Vasudeva Kumara
Deva Deva Gopala [ Nandalala ... ]
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola
Mohana Jaya (Sai) Gopala (Mana)
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, son of Nanda, the stealer of butter, the beautiful dancer, the protector of cows, the son of Devaki and Vasudeva, the Lord of the Lords who plays melodiously on the flute. Victory to the one with an enchanting form.

title: Nandalala Shyama Sundara Nandalala
lyrics:
Kaustubha Dhari Vanamala Dhara Shyamala Madana Gopala
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Shyam
Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
Mathura Natha Gopala
Parthi Nandana Hrudaya Sanjeevana
Shyamala Madana Gopala [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
meaning: This song praises Lord Sai Krishna as the one who is most charming, the one who wears the jewel Koustubha, one who is the beloved of Radha, the Lord of Mathura and the one who resides in the hearts of His devotees.

title: Nandalala Yadu Nandalala
lyrics:
Brindavana Govinda Lala
Radha Lola Nandalala
Radha Madhava Nandalala (Jai)
meaning: O Lord Krishna, child of Nanda, You are the darling of the Yadava (cowherd) chieftain. You are the child of Brindavan and the protector of cows. You are the favorite of Radha, the cowherd girl. Victory to You, O Krishna.

title: Nandana Yadu Nandana Anandana Chitha
title2: Nandana Yadu Nandana Anandana Chitha Chandana
lyrics:
Vandana Guru Vandana Sathya Sai Satchidanandana
Sundara Mukharavindana
Govindana Gopalana
Radha Madhava Mohana
Muralidhara Madhusudhana
meaning: O Lord Krishna, son of the cowherd chieftain Nanda, You are the source of joy. You are the sandal fragrance of the heart. Salutations to the Guru, the Preceptor Sai, who is the embodiment of Truth, Existence and Bliss. You are the one with a beautiful lotus-like face.
