You are verily the Protector of cows, the cowherd boy Krishna. You are the Lord of the cowherd girl Radha and are the enchanting one. You are the one who holds the flute and the one who killed the demon Madhu.

title: Nandeeshwara Hey Nataraja
lyrics:
Nandatmaja Hari Narayana
Narayana Hari ( Sai ) Narayana
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Naada Swaroopa Namo Namo [ Narayana Hari ( Sai ) ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord of Nandi, the divine bull, You are the Lord of cosmic dance, Shiva. You are also the son of Nanda, Lord Vishnu, the ultimate refuge of all beings. Oh Sai Narayana, You are Shiva, who is adorned with the snake! You are the one who embodies divine music!

title: Nandeeshwara Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Nataraja Om Namah Shivaya
Nagabharana Namah Shivaya
Nata Shiva Shankara Namah Shivaya [ Nataraja Om ... ]
Sai Raja Om Namah Shivaya (2)
meaning: Oh Lord of the divine bull Nandi! Lord Shiva! Prostrations to you Oh The Lord of cosmic dance! Lord Shiva! Salutations to you Oh Lord Shiva Who adorns a snake as an ornament! I worship you! Oh Shiva, Who dances and Who bestows good! Oh Sai Shiva! Obeisance to you!

title: Nandi Vahana Nataraja Harey
lyrics:
Indushekara Shiva Raja Harey [ Nandi Vahana ... ]
Bandha Vimochana Jaya Baba Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Shiva Sai Harey
Sai Harey Sri Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
Sai Harey Sri Sai Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
meaning: O Lord Shiva who rides the divine bull Nandi, You are the Lord of cosmic dance. You are the one who is adorned with the crescent moon on the head. O Lord Sai Baba, the Lord of Puttaparthi, You are the very incarnation of Lord Shiva. You free us of all bondage. Glory be to Thee.

title: Nandi Vahana Nataraja Namo
lyrics:
Phaala Lochana Shiva Raja Namo [ Nandi Vahana ... ]
Parama Esha Jagadeesha Namo
Shiva Shakthi Partheesha Namo
Bholey Baba Sayeesha Namo
meaning: Recite the name of Lord Shiva who rides on the celestial Bull Nandi, has the third eye on His forehead, who is the consort of Goddess Shakthi (Parvathi). Lord Sai of Parthi is the very embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.

title: Nanzen Nen mo Umare Kawatte,
title2: Nanzen Nen mo Umare Kawatte, Tabi wo Tsuzuketa Watashi
lyrics:
Ikudo to Naku Chigau Jinsei, Ayumi Tsuzuketa Keredo
Kono Tabi wo Motte Owari ni Shiyou
Kurushii Tabi mo Owari ni Shiyou
Kami no Keshin ga Kurareta kara
Ai no Kamisama Kurareta kara
meaning: No matter how many times I am reborn, I will continue my journey towards You, O Lord. No matter how many different lives I live, I will continue walking towards You. I will complete this difficult journey towards You. For the form of God has come to us. For the God of love has come to us.

title: Narahari Roopa Narayana
lyrics:
Naada Swaroopa Narayana
Parthi Pureesha Narayana
Paapa Vimochana Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (4)
meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! You are the abode of all beings; the form of Lion-faced Lord Narasimha! Oh Lord! You are the embodiment of divine music! Oh Lord of Puttaparthi! You are the Lord Who washes away our sins! Oh Lord Narayana, You are the ultimate refuge of all beings!

title: Narayan Narayan Bhaja Mana Narayan
lyrics:
Sri Hari Madhava Narayan Bhaja Mana Narayan
Murali Shyam Mohana Shyam Murali Mohana Shyam
Merey Ram Hey Ghana Shyam Sai Sadguru Naam
meaning: O mind, sing the glory of Lord Narayana, the abode of all being. He is the dark-hued Lord Krishna who is enchants us with His flute. He is my Lord Ram, who has the complexion of the rain cloud. Sing the name of Lord Sai, the Divine Preceptor who is verily Lord Narayana, Krishna and Rama.

title: Narayana Bhaja Narayan
title2: Narayana Bhaja Narayan Narayana Bhaja Narayan Narayan
lyrics:
Tan Man Ranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Asura Nikhandana Narayan [ Narayana Bhaja ... ]

Jab Jab Peeda Padey Bhaktha Par Baar Baar Avatar Kiya
Paap Mitakar Dheer Dikhakar Manav Ko Uddhar Kiya
Kunja Vihari Krishna Murari Hey Giridhari Narayan [ Narayana Bhaja ... ]

Matsya Kurma Varaha Narahari Vaman Ka Avatar Kiya
Parashuram Aur Rama Krishna Ban Dushton Ko Samhar Kiya
Hey Avatari Leela Dhari Kunja Vihari Narayan [ Narayana Bhaja ... ]

Bhajan Se Man Ko Sajan Banakar Bhakthi Marg Dikhladiya
Sai Bhajan Se Bhava Sagar Mey Taaran Bhi Sikhladiya
Patithodhari Parthi Vihari Hey Giridhari Narayan
Patithodhari Parthi Vihari Sai Murari Narayan [ Narayana Bhaja ... ]
meaning:
Sing the name of Lord Narayana, the one who adorns the body and mind, the one who destroys the fear of bondage and the annihilator of demons.
 
O Lord, whenever a devotee was in trouble, You incarnated to destroy the evil, provide strength and liberate man. You incarnated as Lord Krishna, the one who is the indweller of the hearts of devotees, the one with the Flute and the one who lifted the Govardhana hill.
 
You incarnated as Matsya (Fish), Kurma (Tortoise), Varaha (Boar), Narahari, Vamana, Parashurama, Rama and Krishna to destroy the wicked. You are the one who is takes different forms and performs divine miracles for the sake of Your devotees.
 
O Lord, You show the devotees the path of devotion through bhajan singing which cleanses the mind. You teach Sai bhajans which helps the devotee to swim across the ocean of bondage. O Lord Sai, the uplifter of the downtrodden and the resident of Parthi, You are verily Lord Narayana.

title: Narayana Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Narayana Gopala Harey [ Narayana Govinda ... ]
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
meaning: O Lord Narayana, the refuge of all beings, You are the protector of cows (meek). O Krishna, the cowherd Lord, You are the one who is the embodiment of peace, You are the one who reclines on the serpent Adi Sesha.

title: Narayana Hari Naam Bhajo
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Naam Bhajo
Govardhana Giridhara Brindavana Sanchara
Gopi Gokula Bala
Jaya Sai Parthi Vihara [ Narayana Hari Narayana Hari ... ]
meaning: Sing the glorious Name of Lord Narayana, also known as Hari, who is verily Lord Krishna, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain and the resident of Brindavan. He is the Lord of the cowherds and the son of Gokul who now lives in Puttaparthi as our Lord Sathya Sai. Victory to the Lord Sai Krishna.

title: Narayana Hari Naam Bhajorey (3)
lyrics:
Krishna Janardhana Jaya Panduranga
Radha Ramana Hari Narayana
Ayodhya Vasi Sri Raghu Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Janaki Rama
Parthi (Shirdi) Pureeshwara Sri Sai Rama
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana. Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, the protector, also hailed as the loving deity Panduranga. Honor Radha's great God, Hari Narayana. Acknowledge Sri Rama, the prince of Ayodhya from the Raghu clan. He is son of the great King Dasharatha, and the beloved of Mother Sita. Pray to Lord Sai, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Narayana Hari Naama Bhajorey Narayana
title2: Narayana Hari Naama Bhajorey Narayana Veda Parayana
lyrics:
Karuna Bharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Pavana Charana Patitha Janavana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Narayana and Hari, the ultimate shelter for all creatures. He is the Lord of the Vedas who is adorned with compassion. He removes the fear of the mundane world. His Feet are the most sacred that redeems the downtrodden. He has incarnated as Lord Sai.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Neeraja Nayana Neeradi Shayana
Narada Sannuta Namo Narayana
meaning: Glory to You O Lord Narayana, You are the final refuge of all beings, the lion-faced Narasimha. Salutations to Thee, O lotus-eyed one who reclines on the ocean and who is praised by Sage Narada.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana
Nanda Govinda Ananda Narayana (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the abode of all beings. O Lord, You are Lord Hari, and Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda and the Lord of the cowherds. You are the Lord of bliss.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Narayana
Vaikunta Vasa Namo Narayana
Vaidehi Mohana Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana (Sai Narayana)
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the ultimate destination of all creation, O Lord, You took the form of the lion-faced Lord Narasimha. O resident of Vaikunta, prostrations to You. You were the favorite of Mother Sita when You incarnated as Rama. Salutations to You, O Lord Sai, You are the incarnation of Lord Vishnu.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Sai Narayana [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Anantha Shayana Adi Narayana
Pankaja Nayana Parthi Narayana
Narayana Lakshmi Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: Oh Narayana, you are the resting place of all creation! Oh Hari you are the lion-faced Lord Narahari. Oh Lord! You are the one reclining on the serpent Adi Sesha. You are the primeval Lord Vishnu. You are The lotus eyed Lord! The Lord of Goddess Lakshmi and the Lord of Puttaparthi! You are the Lord Sai, Who is the incarnation of Narayana.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om
Narayana Hari Divya Swaroopa
Narayana Hari Jyothi Swaroopa
Sayeeshwara Hari Om [ Narayana Hari Om ]
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the resting place of all beings. O Lord Hari, You are the form of the primordial sound Om. You are the one with a divinely beautiful form. You are the form of divine light. You have now incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai. Salutations to You.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhaja Narayana
title2: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhaja Narayana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana Jaya Narayana Sai Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: Worship Lord Narayana, the refuge of all beings. Victory be to You, O Lord Hari. O Lord Sai, the incarnation of Lord Narayana, victory to You.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana
title2: Narayana Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana Namo Narayana (2)
lyrics: Om Om Om Om Om Om Om Om Namo Narayana (Hari)
meaning: Let us chant and worship Lord Narayana and Hari, The Primal Force.

title: Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana
title2: Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Veda Parayana
lyrics: Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Shambho Mahadeva Sadashiva
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the author of Vedas. Glory to Lord Shiva who is ever blissful and who bestows welfare.

title: Narayana Hari Om
lyrics:
Sri Jagannatha Jyothi Swaroopa [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Dharani Dhara Hey Damodara
Vande Sri Ananda Nanda Kumara
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the ultimate destination for all beings. O Lord Vishnu, You are the Lord of the Universe. You are the divine light who holds the earth. I bow down to You, O Lord of Bliss. You are Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda.

title: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
lyrics:
Duritha Nivarana Hari Om Hari Om [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Triloka Palana Hari Om Hari Om
Parama Dayalana Hari Om Hari Om
Garuda Vahana Hari Om Hari Om
Pundarikaaksha Hari Om Hari Om
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You rescue us once we call out Your name. O Lord Hari, You are the protector of the three worlds and the most compassionate one. You have Garuda, the mighty Divine Eagle as Your vehicle. Prostrations to Thee, Lord Hari, the lotus-eyed one.

title: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om
title2: Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
lyrics:
Sai Narayana Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om [ Narayana Hari ... ]
Shanthakara Bhujanga Shayana
Padmanabha Hari Om
Sai Narayana Hari Om
meaning: O Lord Narayana, You are the Lord Sai who is the incarnation of Hari. You are the embodiment of peace, You recline on the serpent Adi Sesha. You have a Lotus emerging from Your navel (symbolizes creation arising from the Lord). O Lord Sai! O Lord Narayana! Salutations to You.

title: Narayana Namo Narayana
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Govinda Narayana
Jaya Jaya Ananda Narayana
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Sri Ranganatha Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
meaning: Bow to Lord Vishnu and glory be to Him, the blissful Lord of Consort Lakshmi, Ranganatha.

title: Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda
title2: Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Gopala Harey
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Govinda Harey
Narayana Narayana Jai Jai Gopala Harey
meaning: Let us Praise Lord Narayana who is Govinda and Gopala.

title: Narayana Narayana Jaya Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Jaya Gopala Harey
Narayana Narayana Jaya Govinda Harey
Narayana Narayana Jaya Gopala Harey
meaning: Victory to Lord Narayana and Lord Krishna also known as Govinda and Gopala.

title: Narayana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana
Shantha Swaroopa Namo Narayana
Hey Hrishikesha Hrudaya Nivasa
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Narayana Namo Narayana
Narayana Veda Parayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (2)
meaning: Oh Narayana! The abode of all beings! Oh Lord Sai! You are the lion-faced Lord Narahari! Prostrations to you. The form of peace oh Hari! my Obeisance! Oh Hrishikesha (Lord of the senses, Vishnu)! You are the inhabitant of the devotee's heart! Oh the refuge of the poor! Oh Lord Hari! Salutations to you. Oh Lord You are the author of Vedas. Oh Lord Sai! You are the incarnation of Lord Narayana!

title: Narayana Sathya Sai
title2: Narayana Sathya Sai, Narayana Sathya Sai
lyrics:
We sing our songs at the Feet of Bhagawan
And we sing of Bhagawan, Sri Sathya Sai
Now our days will be brighter and our burdens will be lighter
Premaswarupa Sathya Sai, Premaswarupa Sathya Sai
We sing our Love at the Feet of Bhagawan
And we sing of Bhagawan, Sri Sathya Sai

title: Narayana Veda Parayana
lyrics:
Nava Nava Sundara Narayana [ Narayana Veda ... ]
Neeraja Shayana Narayana
Neeraja Lochana Narayana
Ghana Shyama Sundara Narayana
Kali Yuga Avatara Narayana (2)
meaning: Oh Lord Narayana! the author of Vedas! You are of ever renewing beauty Oh Narayana! You recline on the Lotus in the Ocean of milk You are lotus-eyed You have the beautiful form, with a blue color like the clouds, You are the Avatar or incarnation of this Kali age ( Sai ).

title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
lyrics:
Sathya Narayanam Shriman Narayanam
Pankaja Vilochanam Narayanam
Bhaktha Sankata Vimochanam Narayanam
Agnana Nashakam Narayanam
Sugnana Poshakam Narayanam
Karuna Payonidhi Narayanam
Bhaktha Sharanagatham Nithyam Narayanam
Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
meaning: Chant the name of the lotus-eyed Lord Sathya Narayana (Sai, Vishnu), who dispels devotees' grief and suffering. He destroys ignorance (darkness) and bestows intelligence (knowledge). Let us devotees always surrender to this treasure house of compassion, Lord Sai.

title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
lyrics:
Narayanam Sathya (Sai) Narayanam [ Narayanam Bhaja ... ]
Tava Paada Charanam Narayanam
Shesha Shayanam Narayanam (Adi)
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam
Narayanam Sathya Narayanam
Narayanam Sai Narayanam
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Narayana, the one who is the ultimate refuge and the one who recline on the celestial serpent Adi Sesha. We surrender to Your feet, Oh Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Narayana.

title: Narayanam Bhaja Narayanam
lyrics:
Narayanam Hari Narayanam
Narayanam Sriman Narayanam
Bhaja Mana Narayanam
Bhaja Mana Bhaja Mana Narayanam
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Narayana, O mind. Sing the Holy Name of Lord Narayana, the abode of all beings.

title: Narayani Namo Narayani Naada Svarupini
title2: Narayani Namo Narayani Naada Svarupini Narayani
lyrics:
Jagadodharini Narayani
Narayana Priya Manohari
Ambe Narayani Lakshmi Narayani
Sathya Narayani Sai Narayani
meaning: Pay obeisance to the Mother Goddess, embodiment of sound (vibration), sustainer of the Universe, beautiful and beloved consort of Vishnu. She has presently incarnated as Sai.

title: Narayani Veda Parayani
lyrics:
Karunanta Ranjani Narayani [ Narayani Veda ... ]
Kamakshi Sundari Katyayani
Vani Saraswathi Vijayambikey
Vageshwari Vaagdevi Janani (2)
Karunya Lavanya Guna Shalini
meaning: O Mother Parvathi, You are the sister of Narayana, You are the protector of all Vedas, You have other names like Kamakshi, the one with attractive eyes, Sundari, the beautiful one, Katyayani or the consort of Shiva. You are the Goddess of learning and art, Saraswathi, You are the Mother responsible for oratory skills, You are endowed with qualities of compassion and beauty.

title: Narthana Ganapathi Namo Namo
lyrics:
Naga Bhooshana Namo Namo
Yaksha Kinnara Gandharva Sevitha
Sowbhagya Dayaka Siddhi Vinayaka
Parthi Vinayaka Namo Namo
Paapa Vinashaka Namo Namo (Hey)
meaning: Bow to the dancing Lord Ganesha, adorned with a serpent. Worshipped by demi-Gods, He confers auspiciousness and removes sins. Lord Sai of Parthi is the embodiment of Lord Ganesha.

title: Nata Bhairavi Naada Swaroopini
lyrics:
Natajana Palini Narayani
Neeraja Nayani Nikhiladharini
Nigamagama Sancharini
Naada Brahmamayi Sai Narayani
alt_lyrics:
Nata Bhairavi Naada Swaroopini
Natajana Palini Narayani
Neeraja Nayani Nikhiladharini
Nigamagama Sancharini
Neelakanta Sai Hrudaya Nivasini [ Natajana Palini ... ]
meaning: Glory to Divine Mother Bhairavi (Parvathi), the protector of the weak, the embodiment of music (sound) and the lotus-eyed one who supports the Universe. Glory to the author of the Vedas, the one who is verily Lord Sai, the Supreme Soul.

title: Nata Nandana Ghana Sai Murari
lyrics:
Shyama Manohara Bansi Dhari [ Nata Nandana ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Hey Giridhari
Raasa Vilola Kunja Vihari
Savari Surath Par Javun Balihaari
meaning: Oh Lord Krishna! You are the divine dancing child! You destroyed the demon Mura, You are the blue-colored Lord of enchanting beauty, holding the flute. You are the Lord of Liberation, the consort of Lakshmi, You lifted the mountain Govardhan. You danced with the cowherd girls and played in Brindavan. I am enchanted by Your captivating dark-colored form.

title: Natana Kaladhara Natana Manohara
lyrics:
Narthana Sundara Nataraja
Shivakami Sundara Shiva Raja
Shiva Sai Shankara Shiva Raja
meaning: We pray to Shiva who is the source of all dance forms, heartthrob of Parvathi. His dance form enchants one and all. Beautiful Shiva is none other than Sai who also used to dance charmingly giving joy to his devotees.

title: Nataraja Hey Tripurari
lyrics:
Jaya Hey Jaya Hey Shambho [ Nataraja Hey ... ]
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
Phaala Lochana Parama Shiva
Pavana Charana Paahi Mahesha
meaning: Hail Shiva, the destroyer of demon King Tripura. Victory to Lord Shiva who is revered as the master of all dance forms, Nataraja. The celestial snakes adorn Him as garlands. He rides on Nandi, the great bull. We bow at His Lotus Feet seeking solace as He is the Supreme Form with the third eye who grants succor to the whole creation. We bow to Lord Shankara. Protect us O Lord Mahesha.

title: Nataraja Lord of the dance
title2: Nataraja Lord of the dance shining before us Lord divine
lyrics:
Shivaraja King eternally
O cosmic dancer, dance the joy of life
Song of creation Nataraja
Lord of the Lingam Shivaraja

title: Nataraja Namami Shankara
lyrics:
Shiva Raja Shiva Shiva Shankara [ Nataraja Namami ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara Shiva Shankara
Parthi Pureeshwara Parameshwara
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Lord Shankara (Shiva) who is the source of all dance forms. We pray to Shirdi Sai and Sathya Sai, incarnations of Shiva. We pray to Sai who resides in the hearts of the devoted.

title: Nataraja Nataraja Narthana Sundara Nataraja
lyrics:
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Shiva Tandava Priya Shiva Raja
Chidambaresha Nataraja
Parthi Pureesha Nataraja
meaning: Salutations of the Lord of dance form, Nataraja (Lord Shiva), who enacts the enchanting cosmic dance known as Tandava. He thrills the whole universe. Lord Shiva who appears in His cosmic dance form as Nataraja at Chidambaram in Southern India, has incarnated as our Lord of Parthi.

title: Nataraja Nataraja Natana Shekara Raja
lyrics:
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Natana Shekara Raja
Shiva Shiva Namo Hara Hara Namo
Shankara Shiva Nataraja [ Nataraja Nataraja ... ]
Namah Parvathi Pathayey Hara (Om)
Hara Hara Hara Hara Mahadeva
meaning: Glory to Shiva, the ultimate dancer, who mesmerizes one and all with his cosmic dance. Lord Shiva, who has no parallel to his dance and his dancing style. When his devotees sing his glory incessantly, he is enchanted. We bow to Shiva, the Lord of Parvathi, Hara Hara to bestow eternal bliss on his devotees.

title: Nataraja Nataraja Natana Sundara Nataraja
lyrics:
Shivaraja Shivaraja Shivakami Priya Shivaraja
Chidambaresha Nataraja (Shiva)
Parthi Purisha Shivaraja (Putta)
meaning: Supreme dancer Lord Shiva, loving Lord of Parvathi, dwells in Chidambaram and in Puttaparthi.

title: Nataraja Nataraja Om Namah Shivaya
title2: Nataraja Nataraja Om Namah Shivaya Nataraja
lyrics:
Shiva Raja Shiva Raja Om Namah Shivaya Shivaraja
Sai no Hikari o, Shiva no Chikara o, Ware no Kokoro ni Sazuketa Mae (2)
Inochi ni Yadoru, Shiva no Kodou wa Hari Om Hari Om Hari Hara Om (2)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Nataraja (Shiva), the Lord of Dance. O Lord, grant us the light of Lord Sai and the power of Lord Shiva to our hearts. May the sound of Shiva's drumbeat dwells in our lives.

title: Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
lyrics:
Gopala Shyama Sundara [ Natavara Giridhara ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Surdas Ke Sada Krupala
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopala
meaning: The dark-hued and beautiful Lord Krishna (Gopala), son of Nanda is the Lord of Meera and Surdas. Ever merciful, He likes to dance and play the flute.

title: Natavara Giridhara Nandalala
lyrics:
Gopala Gopala [ Natavara ... ]
Govinda Govinda Gopala Gopala
Govinda Govinda Gopala
Gopala Sai Gopala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala
meaning: The Lord of dance, the one who raised the mountain to protect his devotees, The darling son of Nanda, He is the protector of all beings, Gopala, also known as Govinda. Sing praises of the darling son of Nanda, who is none other than our beloved Sai.

title: Natavara Krishna Natavara Krishna Radhey
title2: Natavara Krishna Natavara Krishna Radhey Nandalala
lyrics:
Harey Harey Madhava Harey Gopika Lola
Krishna Ghana Ghana Neela Krishna Gokula Bala
Harey Harey Madhava Hara Gopika Lola
meaning: Pray to Krishna, the little prankster, who is the soul of Radha. Hey Madhava (Lord of Lakshmi)you are the enchanter of the Gopis of Brindavan. The hue of dark blue makes you the endearing child of Gokul. Hail Krishna who showered eternal bliss on the Gopis.

title: Natavara Lal Giridhara Gopal
lyrics:
Meera Prabhu Ghana Shyama Gopal [ Natavara Lal ... ]
Veda Saara Jeevan Ka Aadhaar
Murali (Gopi) Manohara Hrudaya Vihar
meaning: Sing the glory of the mischievous child Lord Krishna, the protector of Gokula, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain, the one who stole the pure hearts of Gopis. He is the Lord of Meera, whose heart was filled with pure love for the dark-hued Gopala. He is the the essence of all Vedas and the life force for us. We bow to Lord Gopala who enchants us with the flute and who always resides in the pure hearts of the cowherd, Gopis.

title: Natavara Naagara Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Radha Lola Raasa Vilola [ Natavara Naagara ... ]
Murali Lola Munijana Pala
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Sai Gopala
meaning: The darling son of Nanda, You are the one who enchants with Your mischief. O the soul of Radha, You are the one who enticed all Gopis with Your dance. You are the one who enthralls with Your flute, the saviour of the Sages. You are the Lord of Meera. You are the child who lifted the mountain. You are Sai Gopala.

title: Natavara Naagara Nanda Mukunda
lyrics:
Brindavana Ghana Shyama Govinda
Radha Madhava Ananda Chanda
Sai Murari Satchidananda
meaning: Krishna the embodiment of dance, is the darling son of Nanda, who grants liberation. The dark cloud hued protector of all beings, who lived in Brindavan. He shared the divine happiness with Radha. He is our Sai, bestowing truth, awareness and bliss and destroys any evil in us just as he annihilated Mura, the demon.

title: Natavara Natavara Nanda Kumara
lyrics:
Nanda Kumara Jaya Goparipala
Yaduvara Yaduvara Brinda Vihara
Brinda Vihara Jaya Parthi Vihara
meaning: Hail the son of Nanda, who appears mischievous. Hail the son of Nanda who lovingly cares for all the cows. The jewel of the dynasty of Yadu, who strolls in Brindavan. Hail, Sai of Parthi, who also strolls as he did in Brindavan.

title: Navaneetha Chora Bala Gopal
lyrics:
Yashoda Nandana Krishna Gopal
Sai Gopal Sathya Sai Gopal
Sai Gopal Bhajo Murali Gopal
meaning: Salutations to The Cowherd who stole butter and butter-like hearts of people of Gokul. Known as Krishna, a darling of mother Yashoda. Sing the glory of our Sai Krishna, who manifests everywhere through the music of HIS divine flute.

title: Nayana Sunayana Sundara Shyama
lyrics:
Madana Mohana Prabhu Hey Vraja Bala
Kamala Kantha Karuna Daata
Raja Gambhira Raja Gopala 
Manasa Ranjita Shyama [ Madana Mohana ... ]
meaning: The beautiful eyes of Lord Krishna have entranced us. This child of Brindavan has enraptured our hearts. He is soft like the lotus, showering compassion on all, yet He is the supreme King of Kings.

title: Nayanon Mey Prem Dhaar Vachanon
title2: Nayanon Mey Prem Dhaar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhaar
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevan Aadhaar
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhaar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhaar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevan Aadhaar (2)
alt_lyrics:
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhaar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhaar
Sadguru Sai Mera Jeevan Ka Aadhaar
Nayanon Mey Prem Dhaar Vachanon Mey Amrutha Dhaar [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
Jeevan Ka Aadhaar Mera Jeevan Ka Aadhaar [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the embodiment of eternal and divine love, who fills our hearts with the nectarine wisdom (Amrut), who showers compassionate love through merciful eyes and sweet and soothing words of wisdom. Guru of gurus Sai, You are the true support and the eternal guide of my life.

title: Neela Megha Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna He Giridhari
Sai Prabho He Nandalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandalala
meaning: Sai is the dark-hued Lord Krishna, the divine flute player, Lord of Radha and Meera, the darling son of Nanda, Lord of Sudras (a devotee), and the delight of Gopis.

title: Neela Megha Shyama Govardhana Giridhari
lyrics:
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Brija Gopi Priya Nandana Raasa Vihari
Vanamala Ghana Murali Bansidhari
Krishna Murari Natavara Naagara Shourie
Brindavana Sanchari Shyama (Sai) Murari
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna who is majestic like a dark blue cloud and who lifted Mount Govardhana. He annihilated demon Mura to protect the saintly people. In the land of Brij, He was dear to all cowherd people. He engaged the Gopis in Raasa leela (divine dance). Wearing a garland of Tulasi, playing the divine flute, indulging in playful mischief, He made Brindavan a heaven on earth. He is none other than our beloved Sai who resides in Parthi to uplift the mankind.

title: Neela Megha Shyama Krishna Gopala Krishna
title2: Neela Megha Shyama Krishna Gopala Krishna
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Sathya Narayana
Vata Patra Shayana Sai Narayana [ Neela Megha ... ]
Manusha Veshadhari Sathya Narayana
Parthipuri Nayaka Sai Narayana
meaning: Chant the name of the dark-hued Lord Krishna, protector of cows and the beloved of Radha. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Narayana who reclines on the Vata leaf and who incarnated in human form. He is none other than Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi.

title: Neela Megha Shyamala Ghana Shyama
title2: Neela Megha Shyamala Ghana Shyama Sundara
lyrics:
Muralidhara Mana Mohana Sathya Sai Sundara
Jagat Karana Paripoorana Hey Sai Sundara
Shirdeeshwara Partheeshwara Sai Prema Mandira
meaning: The beauty of the dark clouds reflects in immensely charming Krishna. The holder of the flute, the enchanter of the hearts, he is also our beautiful Sathya Sai. The cause and completeness of creation, is our beloved Sai. We offer our prayers to both Shirdi Sai and Parthi Sai to adorn our hearts.

title: Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Gopala
lyrics:
Nithyananda Swaroopa Sai Gopala
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Gopala [ Nithyananda Swaroopa ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Gopala (Krishna), the dark complexioned one. Glory to Lord Sai, the ever blissful one, the beloved son of Mother Eshwaramba. Lord Sai is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Sai
title2: Neela Megha Shyamala Roopa Sai Gaana Lola Gokula Bala
lyrics:
Geeta Quran Bible Mey Tera Rang Hai
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Tera Roop Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prem Sab Ko Diya
Hum Terey Charanon Mey Sharan Liya (Baba)
meaning: Lord Sai, who loves music, bestows the bliss as conferred upon Gopis by the dark-hued child of Gokula, Lord Krishna. All celestial books like Quran, Bible and Gita are filled with Your hue. Even the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and Maheshwara are Your manifestations. You shower Truth, Right Conduct, Peace and Love on us to emulate by taking refuge at Your lotus feet. O Baba, this surrender is our submission for redemption.

title: Neela Varna Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Murali Lola Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Shyama
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyama
Sai Krishna Hey Giridhari
Sai Prabho Hey Nandalala
Surdas Ke Giridhari
Gopi Mohana Nandalala
meaning: Krishna, who shines brilliantly in dark blue steals the hearts by the melodies from the divine flute, who is the dear Lord of Radha and Meera. The mighty one who lifted the Mount Govardhan has returned as Sai to redeem us as he did for the saints like Surdas and the devout Gopis. Let us pray for our redemption.

title: Neelachala Prabhu Neela Madhava
lyrics:
Jagannatha Swami Prabhuvara
Vasudeva Hari Mayura Mukutadhari
(Jaya) Radha Mohana Murari
Sai Krishna Murari Prabhuvara
meaning: Glory to Lord Jagannatha (Krishna), the blue-hued Lord of Puri, the city also known as the blue mountain. Glory to the bestower of boons, the one adorned with a peacock feather on His head and who is the divine enchanter of Radha. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura.

title: Neelagriva Kumara
lyrics:
Bala Ganeshwara Gajanana [ Neelagriva ... ]
Mooladhara Nivasa
Palaya Maam Prabho Partheeshwara
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, You are the son of Shiva who is hailed as Neelakanta (blue-throated one) and Mahadeva (Lord of the Lords). You command the army of Lord Shiva (Ganaas). You are the very basis of the universe (also the presiding deity of the Mooladhara Chakra). We offer our prayers to the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai, who is verily Ganesha, to protect us at all times.

title: Neelakanta Gangadhara Hara Uma Pathey
lyrics:
Pralayankara Abhayankara Kailasa Pathey [ Neelakanta ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Nataraja Manohara Tandava Nachey
Partheeshwara Parameshwara Jagadheesha Pathey
meaning: Hail Lord Shankara, the bestower of auspiciousness, the Lord of Uma and whose abode is Kailasa. The blue-throated Lord Shiva is the protector of one and all, who swallowed the poison that rose during the churning of the ocean. Praise the Lord who took all suffering on Himself for the welfare of all beings. He helped Bhagirath to bring river Ganges from heaven and in the process became Gangadhara. He grants bliss by playing the Damaru (drums) and performing the cosmic dance, Tandava. We bow to Lord Shiva, the Lord of the universe, who incarnated at Shirdi and at Parthi as our Sathya Sai. Prayers to Him to bless us all at all times.

title: Neelakanta Mahadeva Gowri Vandana
lyrics:
Chandra Chooda Daya Natha Nandi Vahana
Samba Shiva Shooladhari Naga Bhooshana
Phaala Netra Uma Kantha Parama Pavana
meaning: O God of Gods, Mahadeva (Shiva), the blue-throated one, You are worshipped by the Divine Mother Gowri. You are adorned with the moon on Your tresses, You bless the Nandi (the great bull) as Your vehicle. You are full of compassion. You carry the Trident and wear the snake as ornament. With Mother Uma as consort, You are adorned with the third eye and the purest of the Pure. Bless us all at all times.

title: Neelakanteshwara Sada Shivom
lyrics:
Sundara Shankara Parvathi Ramana [ Neelakanteshwara ... ]
Maheshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Kaileshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
Shaileshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
(Atma) Lingodbhavakara Sai Shiva [ Sundara Shankara ... ]
meaning: Glory to the blue-throated and beautiful Lord Shiva, the beloved of Goddess Parvati. He has incarnated as our Lord Sathya Sai, and is the greatest of the Lords, residing atop mount Kailash. Lord Shiva is the source of all the emerging and merging processes (Linga).

title: Neeraja Shayana Narayana
lyrics:
Neela Varna Hari Narayana
Shankha Chakra Hari Narayana
Padmadala Dhara Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: Offering prayers to Narayana, who reclines on the Lotus, He is Hari and Narayana with enchanting blue hue. He holds the Conch and Sudarshan (wheel of liberation) Disc to protect his devotees. Lotus garlands enhance his glory, resting on the snake Sesha. We bow to Sai, who is Narayana.

title: Niji Iro no Hikari no
title2: Niji Iro no Hikari no Naka ni Kagayaku Kami Sai Baba
lyrics:
Ai ni Iyasare Yuruyaka ni Kokoro no Tsubomi wa Hana Hiraku
Kiyorakana Akari wo Tomasu, Guru Sathya Sai Baba
Ai no Hikari wo Hanatsu Guru Sathya Sai Baba
meaning: Sai Baba, Your rainbow light shines within me. Love gently heals me and blooms within my heart from a bud into a flower. You shine like a pure light, Guru Sathya Sai Baba. You release Your light of love to us, Guru Sathya Sai Baba.

title: Nirakara Roopam Nirantam Ganesham
lyrics:
Sada Sath Swaroopam Smarami Ganesham
Parabrahma Roopam Paramatma Roopam
Bhajami Mahesham Namami Suresham
meaning: We offer prayers to the infinite, formless Lord Ganesha. We contemplate on Him as He represents the ultimate Truth. He is the Supreme Brahman and the Supreme Soul. We pray to the master of celestial entities and sing His glory at all times.

title: Niranjana Nara Roopa Dhara
lyrics:
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Esha Jagadeesha Paramesha Sayeesha [ Niranjana Nara ... ]
Nirguna Gunamaya Sayeesha
Natha Jagannatha Deena Natha Sai Natha
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the blemishless Lord in human form. O Lord Sai, You are beyond attributes, as well as the source of all attributes. You are the master of the entire universe and beyond the universe. You are the refuge of downtrodden and the entire creation. We bow to Thee O Lord Sai.

title: Niranjani Sai Bhavani
lyrics:
Jagat Janani Ananda Dayini [ Niranjani Sai ... ]
Durga Lakshmi Narayani
Sri Kamalasana Hamsa Vahini
meaning: Salutations to the blemishless Mother Sai, the creator and bestower of life. The universal mother is the source of bliss divine. She is the combination of Durga (power) and Lakshmi (wealth), Narayani (all-round welfare) and Hamsa vahini (Saraswathi - education), Kamalasana (seated on the Lotus bloom). We bow to the mother who is everything for us.

title: Nirupama Guna Sadana Charana Neeraja
title2: Nirupama Guna Sadana Charana Neeraja Dala Nayana
lyrics:
Kashayambara Vesha Dharana Kali Yuga Avatara
Nithya Ranjana Nirmala Charitha Nirupama Yogendra
Maha Teja Nataraja Viraja Asha Paasha Nasha Esha
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who has no parallel and who is the source of pure and auspicious traits. We take refuge at the lotus feet of the lotus-eyed Lord Sai. He represents sacrifice signified by the orange robe, which He adorns during this Kali age. He is the ever-charming one with blemishless character and is the incomparable Lord of the Yogis. He is verily Eshwara (Shiva), the majestic Lord of dance, who grants us freedom from every kind of worldly attachment and desire.

title: Nithyananda Ati Baibhava
lyrics:
Hari Hari Bhajo Ananda Swaroop
Bhajo Narayana Narayana Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nithyananda Ati ... ]
Advaitam Sutrupthi Swaroop
Chidananda Sathya Sai Abhiroop (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Narayana who has an eternally blissful form. His form gives us supreme contentment and helps us get to the state of Advaita (non-duality - where the Lord and the devotee are one). Lord Sathya Sai is the very embodiment of supreme consciousness and bliss.

title: Nithyanandam Satchidanandam
lyrics:
Hari Hari Hari Om Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Hari Hari ... ]
Prema Swaroopa Premananda (2) [ Hari Hari ... ]
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Hari Hari ... ]
meaning: Glory to the ever blissful Lord Narayana, the embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss. He is the embodiment of pure Love who grants Bliss.

title: No One But You
title2: No One But You Can Fill Up My Heart with Love and Bliss
lyrics:
With Love and Bliss, With Love and Bliss,
 O No One But You can Fill Up My Heart with Love and Bliss
 Sathya Sai Baba
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Come to Me
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Remember Me
 Dear Lord Sweet Lord, Please Do Set Me Free
 Dear Lord Please Come to Me

title: No one is beyond His grace
title2: No one is beyond His grace, His divine love
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 Where people cry out to Him there He will be
 Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 He is the inner splendor in every living being
 Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai
 We are all separate beads strung on one thread
 Of Sri Sathya Sai, Lord Sathya Sai

title: Now and Forever
lyrics:
I live within The Heart of God
And That Heart it lives in me
I live within The Heart of God
And That Heart it lives in me
 
Now and forever..now and forever
I live in The Heart of My Lord
Now and forever..now and forever
I live in The Heart of My Lord
 
My heart is the Sacred Home of The Lord
My heart is the Home of The Lord
My heart is the Sacred Home of The Lord
My heart is the Home of The Lord
 
My mind is a Peaceful Place for The Lord
My mind is a Peaceful Place
My mind is a Peaceful Place for The Lord
My mind is a Peaceful Place
 
My soul it is filled with The Light of the Lord
My soul it is filled with The Lord
My soul it is filled with The Light of the Lord
My soul it is filled with The Lord
 
My body is The Living Temple of The Living Lord
My body is The Temple of the Lord
My body is The Living Temple of The Living Lord
My body is The Temple of the Lord
 
My life is the Message of The Loving Lord
My life is the Message of The Lord
My life is the Message of the Loving Lord
My life is the Message of The Lord
 
My heart is the Sacred Home of The Lord
My heart is the Home of The Lord
My heart is the Sacred Home of The Lord
My heart is the Home of The Lord
 
Now and forever..now and forever
I live in The Heart of My Lord
Now and forever..now and forever
I live in The Heart of My Lord

title: O Baba Sai Baba
lyrics:
Deenon Ke Dukha Harthey Baba [ O Baba ... ]
Ram Hi Baba Krishna Hi Baba
Nara Dehi Narayan Baba (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, please remove the miseries of the meek. You are none other than Lord Rama, Krishna and Narayana who has incarnated as Lord Sai Baba.

title: O Baba Sai Baba Sathya
title2: O Baba Sai Baba Sathya Baba O Swami
lyrics:
Parthi ni Owasu Ai no Kami
Kokoro ni Owasu Ai no Kami
Jaya Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Ram
O Baba Jaya Rama Sai Rama
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Baba, You are the God of Love who resides in Parthi and within our hearts.

title: O Baba Sai Krishna
lyrics:
Saewataru Tsuki wa Anata no Manazashi
Soyogu Kaze no Oto wa Anata no Murali
O Kokoro wa Tada Anata wo Utau
O Baba Tada Anata wo Omou
Sai Baba Sai Krishna
meaning: O Lord Sai Krishna, the moon is like Your loving gaze, the rustling wind is like the sound of Your flute. My heart sings out only to You, and my thoughts are only of You.

title: O Beloved Lord Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Help Me Live In Love All My Life
In Every Single Thought, In Every Word I Speak, In Every ...
... Single Action Of My Life [ O Beloved ... ]
Let Your Love Fill My Heart And Shine On Through
Shining Brightly And True [ In Every ... ]

title: O Bhagawan Guru Bhagawan Sathya
title2: O Bhagawan Guru Bhagawan Sathya Sai Ram, Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Tae naki Kami no Ai ni Watashi wa Mitasareru [ O Bhagawan ... ]
Anata ni Michibikare, Watashi wa Kaerimasu
Anata ni Michibikare, Watashi ni Kaerimasu
Sai no Ai no Naka de Makoto no Watashi eto
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your endless love fills me. Please lead me to You so that I may return to You and You may be with me. Your love awakens my true self.

title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan
lyrics:
Kibishiki Chichi no Makoto no Ai wo
Kono Meshii wo Michibiki tame
Kami no Ai wo En to Omeodo
Kono Kokoro Chiji ni Mayoi
Kotoba de Ai to Katari Nagara
Waga Omoi Kooreru Gotoku
Douka Swami Michibiki tamae
Mabayuki Chichi no Ai to Hikari ni
meaning: O Lord Sai, You give us Your strict fatherly love in order to guide us through ignorance. This heart has lost its way but You guide it with Your words of love. My mind freezes when You guide us, for, Your love is like a dazzling light.

title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araj
title2: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Araj Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Parthipuri Ke Tum Ho Daata
Brindavan Ke Tum Ho Daata
Sab Bhakthon Ke Man Ko Bhata
Paar Utharo Naiya Mori
Sai Ghana Shyama Sai Ghana Shyama
meaning: O Lord Sai, hear my prayers, You are the boon bestowing Lord of Parthi and Brindavan. You are the beloved of all devotees, enchanting their minds and hearts. Please help us cross this boat safely across the river of life, O Sai. You are none other than Lord Krishna, the one with deep blue complexion.

title: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O
title2: O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Baba Bhagawan
lyrics:
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Rama Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Krishna Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Shiva Sai Bhagawan
O Bhagawan O Bhagawan O Bhagawan Sai Datta Bhagawan
Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Bhagawan Hara Hara Bhagawan
Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Tat Sat Bhagawan
Prema Bhagawan Jyothi Bhagawan Atma Bhagawan Paramatma Bhagawan
Nanda Bhagawan Ananda Bhagawan Nithyananda Bhagawan Brahmananda Bhagawan
Ayodhya Bhagawan Dwaraka Bhagawan Shirdi Bhagawan Sri Parthi Bhagawan
Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Rammu Bhagawan Itu Rammu Bhagawan
meaning: We bow to Lord Sathya Sai Baba who is the divine parent to all, who is the embodiment of truth, who grants love to one and all. We bow to Lord Sai Rama, who pleases everyone and the saviour to the devotees and Lord Sai Krishna who gives joy and protects all beings. We bow to Lord Datta (the form of the Trinity). O Lord Sai, You are the Lord Shiva, You are the eternal Truth. You are the ever effulgent Atma, the Supreme Soul. You are the ever blissful son of Nanda, the source of divine bliss. You are the Lord of Ayodhya and Dwaraka, having incarnated now at Parthi. Welcome to You, Bhagawan, hearty welcome to You, please come to me.

title: O Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
title2: O Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Ika ni Imasu
lyrics:
Zenchi Zennou no Ai no Kami
Kiesuru Kokoro ni
Yobikakeru Kokoro ni
Motomeru Kokoro ni
Aisuru Kokoro ni
Arawarete Kudasai
Kagayaite Kudusai [ Zenchi Zennou ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Baba, no matter what, I will reach You, our omnipotent God of Love. My heart is devoted to You. It calls out to You. It seeks You. It loves You. So please, appear before me and shine brightly.

title: O Bhagawan, Hear Our Prayer
title2: O Bhagawan, O Sai Divine, hear our Prayer O Lord, Sathya Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sai beloved Lord who was born in Puttaparthi
Come into the heart and mind of each devotee
Take us all across this Ocean of Illusion
Into Your glorious world of Illumination
(Sathya) Sai Krishna, Lord O Sai Christ Divine

title: O Bhagawan, hear, O Lord, my prayer
title2: O Bhagawan, O Bhagawan, hear, O Lord, my prayer, Sathya Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
O glorious Lord Who dwells at Putttaparthi
 And in the heart and mind of each devotee
 Take me across this sea of illusion
 (Sathya) Sai Bhagawan, O Sai Bhagawan

title: O Deva Deva Sri Sai
title2: O Deva Deva Sri Sai Baba
lyrics:
Karunintsu Mammu Kapada Vayya [ O Deva ... ]
Adharamaina Ni Pada Seva Kaligintsu Maaku O Deva Deva
Sathya Swaroopa Sri Sai Baba
Karunalavala Brovanga Rava
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, shower grace upon us and protect us. Give us opportunity to pray at your feet. Embodiment of Truth and Grace please come and take care of us.

title: O Holy Father Sai Baba
lyrics:
O Lord Divine Hallowed Be Thy Name
Make Us Your Childern Deserve Thy Grace
Lead Us To Thy Feet Baba O Lord [ O Holy ... ]
O Sweet Sai Gentle And So Loving
O Sweet Sai So Understanding
Lead Us Kindly Lead Us Gently
Lead Us To Thy Wonderland Of Love [ O Holy ... ]

title: O Holy Presence
title2: O Holy Presence of my soul
lyrics:
O Holy Presence of my soul
I behold You live in me
I kneel before Thee
O Holy Presence of my soul
 
Hail Holy Presence of my life
Hail Holy Presence of my life
I give thanks for the Living Truth
Of which You have given me proof
Of Your Holy Presence in my life
 
O Holy Presence of the world
O Holy Presence of the world
I look out and I can see
Your Face in every tree
O Holy Presence of the world
 
Hail Holy Presence of my soul
Hail Holy Presence of my soul
I behold You live in me
That’s why I am so free
 
Hail Holy Presence of my soul
I behold You’re living as Me
I bow down on humble knee
O Holy Presence of my soul
O Holy Presence of my soul

title: O Kiyorakana Sono Ai ni
title2: O Kiyorakana Sono Ai ni Tadori Tsukumade
lyrics:
Ah Anata he no Omoi wo Mitashi Hiromeru
Tada Tada Ai Dake ga
Watashi wo Michibiku Uta to Naru
O Baba Baba Sai Harey
Anata to Tomo ni Aru you ni
Kokoro Hitotsu ni Naru Ai e Ai e Ai e
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, we are guided to You by this pure love. Thoughts of You fill and spread through my whole body. You guide us with Your song of love. I wish to be together with You so that my heart may become one with love.

title: O Knowing Spirit within me
lyrics:
Teach me to see
 You are my own true Self for all eternity

title: O Lord Almighty, Who is beyond time
title2: O Lord Almighty, Who is beyond time
lyrics:
Supreme Teacher of all mankind
 You turn the world at Your command
 (Lord) You are the greatest Love of all
 O Lord, in my heart, Almighty Lord (5X)

title: O Lord Ganapathi, Show The Divine Light
title2: O Lord Ganapathi, show the divine light to me
lyrics:
O Formless Almighty, You're the one reality [ O Lord Ganapathi ... ]
Bless me with austerity and reveal the truth to me
Grant divine wisdom, end the cause of ignorance
Omnipresent Lord, Om is Your Form

Omnipresent Lord, Om is Your Form (5)
Omnipresent Lord, Love is Your Form (Sai)

title: O Lord Purify Me
title2: O Lord, Purify Me And Make My Heart Worth Stealing
lyrics:
Our Precious Possession That Is Full Of Loving Feeling
Take Every Good Thought And Take Every Action
Soaked In The Sweetness Of Love And Compassion

title: O Lord Take My Love
title2: O Lord, Take My Love, Let It Flow In Full Devotion To Thee
lyrics:
O Lord, Take My Hands, Let Them Work Unceasingly For Thee
O Lord, Take My Soul, Let It Merge In Perfect Oneness With Thee
O Lord, Take My Mind, Let My Thoughts Be In Tune With Thee
O Lord, Take My Everything, And Let Me Be An Instrument For Thee
alt_lyrics:
O Lord, Take My Love, Let It Flow In Full Devotion To Thee
O Lord, Take My Hands, Let Them Work Incessantly For Thee
O Lord, Take My Soul, Let It Merge In Perfect Oneness With Thee
O Lord, Take My Mind, Let My Thoughts Be In Tune With Thee
O Lord, Take My Everything, And Let Me Be An Instrument For Thee

title: O Lord, make the whole of my life
title2: O Lord, make the whole of my life
lyrics:
As pure as the flame before me
 Let it consume itself in the fire
 Scattering light and the warmth of love to all around me
 At the end of it all, let there be nothing left (2)
 To keep me from merging in You (2)
 O Lord, make the whole of my life
 As pure as the flame before me

title: O Loving Lord Of All
title2: O Loving Lord Of All The Worlds, Let Me Be Your Devotee
lyrics:
Your Divine Light Is All I Am, All I Can Ever Be
God Above Me, In And Of Me, All I Love Is Yours
Lord Above Me, In And Of Me, All I See Is Yours
Let Me Come Into Your Heart And Stay Forever More (Baba)

title: O Merey Swami Antaryami
lyrics:
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Tu Merey Pitha Tu Hai Meri Mata
Tu Merey Bandhu Tu Merey Daata
Tu Merey Malik Mein Tera Balak
Daya Karo Merey Sai Natha
alt_lyrics:
Tu Merey Swami Antaryami
Antar Jyothi Jalao Sai
Tu Merey Pitha Tu Hai Meri Mata
Tu Merey Bandhu Tu Merey Daata
Tu Merey Malik Mein Tera Balak
Daya Karo Prabhu Deena Natha 
Daya Karo Merey Sai Natha
meaning: Kindle the light of wisdom in my heart, O Lord Sai, the indweller of hearts. You are my father, mother, kith and kin, master and my sustainer. I am Thine, O Lord, please be compassionate towards me.

title: O My Beloved Bhagawan
title2: O My Beloved Bhagawan, O My Beloved Bhagawan
lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan Bhagawan, Sathya Sai, My Bhagawan
You Are The Sky Above My Head, You Are The Paths Where I'm Led
You Are The Beating Of My Heart, You Prevade My Every Part [ O My ... ]
You Are The Morning Sun I Greet, You Are The Food That I Eat
You Are The Water That I Drink, You Are The Holy Thoughts I Think
[ O My ... ]
You Are The Air That I Breathe, You Are My Sorrow When I Grieve
You Are The Joy That Lives Inside, You Are The Sacred Love That Hides [ O My ... ]
You Are My Ananda, You Are Prema Swaroopa
You Are The Light Within My Soul, Holy Lord You Are My All [ O My ... ]

title: O My Lord How I Look For Thee
title2: O My Lord, How I Look For Thee In Every Place
lyrics:
Compassion, Mercy And A Glance So Full Of Grace
Will You Grant These To Me, And Help Me Through The Life?
Help To Come To Thee, My Lord, Sathya Sai
O Sathya Sai
Speak To Me Words, O Lord, That Still My Monkey Mind
Beacon Of Righteousness And Love, My Sai, So Kind
Who Can I Turn To, Lord, When Life Is Such A Grind ?
Help Me To Come To Thee, My Lord, Sathya Sai
O Sathya Sai

title: O my Lord, You surely know
title2: O my Lord, You surely know I love You
lyrics:
O my Lord, You surely know I need You
 Guard and guide me, O my Lord
 Night and day, O my Lord
 I am just Your child, my Lord
 Hold me in Your arms, my Lord
 Life, my Lord, is like an ocean deep and blue
 Storms may blow, but I will always cling to You
 Pain and joy are but a passing phase
 Till we merge, my Lord, I yearn for Your Grace

title: O Nanda’s dear Child
title2: O Nanda's dear Child, give us Your blessing
lyrics:
Yashoda's sweet Son, give us Your blessing
 O Nanda's dear Child, give us Your blessing (1X)
 Divine Dancing child, give us Your blessing
 Dear Lord of our hearts, give us Your blessing

title: O Sai Baba Shirdi Sai
title2: O Sai Baba Shirdi Sai Baba
lyrics:
Parthi Sai Baba Baba Prema Sai Baba
Guru Sai Baba Guru Brahma Sai Baba
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Guru Mahadeva Baba
meaning: Lord Sai of Shirdi is also Shirdi Sai and Prema Sai. He is Universal teacher and creator, protector, and destroyer.

title: O Sai Baba Tava Suprabhatam
lyrics:
Mangala Maya Baba Prathah Smaranam [ O Sai ... ]
Sathya Sanathana Tum Ho Baba
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai, we greet You early at the break of dawn to remind ourselves of Your auspiciousness. You are the eternal truth, and You foster and love all religions and faiths.

title: O Sai Mera Sai
lyrics:
Mera Sai Pyaara Sai
Sai Baba Sai Baba
Sai Baba Tumhey Pranam
Tumhey Pranam Baba Tumhey Pranam (3)
Sai Baba Tumhey Pranam
meaning: Salutations to my beloved Sai. I offer obeisance to Thee.

title: O Sai O Sai O Sai Baba
title2: O Sai, O Sai, O Sai Baba (2)
lyrics:
Anata to Tomo ni Warai, Anata to Tomo ni Utau
Anata wa Watashi no Subete, Anata to Tomo ni Ikiru

O Sai, O Sai, O Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, You are my everything. I laugh with you, sing with you, and live with you.

title: O Sai, my Lord of Universe
title2: O Sai, my Lord of Universe (3)
lyrics:
Walk beside me everyday, Lord of Compassion guides me on my way
Satya Sai my Lord of Truth, Prema Sai my Lord of Love
O Sai my Lord of Truth, O Sai my Lord of Love, O Sai my Lord of Peace

title: O Swami, O Swami
title2: O Swami, O Swami, O Swami, Swami
lyrics:
Your form is Love, your form is Love,
 your form is Love, Love, Love (O Swami)
 Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema, Sathya Dharma Shaanthi Prema
 Your form is Love, your form is Love,
 Your form is Love, Love, Love (O Swami)

title: O Sweet Sathya Sai I love you
title2: O Sweet Sathya Sai I love you so
lyrics:
You teach me everything I need to know
 Sathya Sai The works begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman
 In my lower self my love flows true
 In my higher self I merge with You
 Sathya Sai the work's begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman
 I cross the ocean just to serve Your Name
 The hairs on my body all repeat Sai Ram
 Sathya Sai the work's begun
 Let me be Your Hanuman

title: O Uruwashiki Ai no Kami
lyrics:
Kono Sekai wo Hikari de Mitasu
Warera wo Mamori Michibiki tamou [ O Uruwashiki ... ]
Kokoro ni Orareru Itoshiki Sai Bhagawan (Kono)
Subete no Inori Anata no Moto he
Subete no Michi wa Anata he Tsuzuku
meaning: O beautiful God of Love, You fill this world with light. You reside in our hearts and protect and guide us dear Sai. We send all our prayers to You for all paths converge to You.

title: O, my Lord is fine and lovely
title2: O, my Lord is fine and lovely
lyrics:
With His dark and curly hair
 And the graceful way He walks about
 In the robe that He does wear
 And the gentle kindness of His face
 When you're seeing Him close by
 Has brought a tear of gratitude
 And joy to many an eye
 O, I love to sing His praises
 Yes, I love to say His name
 And to think about Him here on Earth
 And the reasons why He came
 Just to contemplate His powers grand
 His majesty and might
 And His vow to lead this world of ours
 From darkness into light
 O, the sense of sweet security
 To know He really cares
 That He watches over us ceaselessly
 And that He is everywhere
 And the gentle glow of blissful peace
 When you're feeling Him close by
 Will bring a tear of happiness
 For the love of Sathya Sai
 Will bring a tear of happiness
 For the love of Sathya Sai

title: Ocean Of Blissful Joy
title2: Ocean of Blissful Joy, overflows from Sai
lyrics:
My grateful heart radiates with Sathya Sai’s Pure Love [ Ocean of Blissful … ]
Nothing’s ever greater than this - O Blissful Joy
Ocean of Blissful Joy where Lord Sai shares with care

title: Ocean of Love
title2: Sai You are the Ocean of Love
lyrics:
Sai You are my Teacher and Guide
I want to stay in Your arms,
Learn the wonders of Life

Sai You are my Heart and my Soul
Sai You are the love that I own
I want to sail on a ship
Journey the oceans of Love

Teach me Your ways
I want to learn to do Your service always
I want to learn to see Your light in every sun
See the blossoms of Your messages unfold

I want to be Your messenger, Oh my Lord
I want to be Your devotee, my reward
Will be the blessings from Your Heart
I want to be a part of Your Ocean of Love

[ Sai You are the Ocean of Love ... ]
[ Sai You are my Heart and my Soul ... ]

My life is not as complete
Without Your loving Grace, that I need
My heart makes not a single sound
Without Your light  

My heart is longing to see
What it is to be free, Oh Sai
Of my worldly desires 
All I ask of You now

Give me Your darshan
Give me Your Presence
I want to serve You till I reach Your feet
 
Make me Your Hands
And make me Your Heart
Give me the strength to be a part
Of Your Ocean of Love
 
[ Sai You are the Ocean of Love ... ]
[ Sai You are my Heart and my Soul ... ]

title: Oh Baba Sai Baba
lyrics:
Free us from our sorrows Baba [ Oh Baba ... ]
You are Rama, You are Krishna
Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, You teach us all (2)

title: Oh Come all ye Faithful
title2: Oh Come all ye Faithful, Joyful and Triumphant
lyrics:
Oh Come Ye, Oh Come Ye to Bethlehem.
Come and behold Him,
Born the King of Angels.
Oh, come let us adore Him,
Oh, come let us adore Him,
Oh, come let us adore Him, Christ the Lord.
Sing choirs of Angels,
Sing in exultation.
Sing all ye citizens of Heaven Above.
Glory to God, In the Highest.
Oh come let us adore Him,
Oh come let us adore Him,
Oh come let us adore Him, Christ the Lord
(Slow) Oh, come let us adore Him... Christ the Lord.

title: Oh Dearest Swami
title2: Oh Dearest Swami, please help me see, the Almighty in everyone
lyrics:
Help me to spread, Your precious love to everyone, everyone, everyone
 
Oh Dearest Swami, You’re the best role model, that I’ve ever seen in this whole world
Wanna be like You, wanna be like You, please help me love and to serve just like You
 
Oh Dearest Swami, please help me see, that You and I are one
I know You’re God, That means I’m God, God I am, I am God

title: Oh God beautiful
title2: Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
lyrics:
At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 In the forest Thou art green.
 In the mountain Thou art high.
 In the river Thou art restless.
 In the ocean Thou art great.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
 At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 To the serviceful Thou art service.
 To the bhakta Thou art Love.
 To the sorrowful Thou art sympathy.
 To the yogi Thou art bliss.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful
 At Thy feet oh I do bow.
 Oh God beautiful, Oh God beautiful.
 To the Hindu Thou art Krishna.
 To the Buddhist Thou art Buddha.
 To the Christian Thou art Jesus.
 Now on the earth as Sai Baba.

title: Oh Lord take my life
lyrics:
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my love
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my actions
Take them all, take them all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Oh Lord take my heart
Take it all, take it all in Your hands
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om Sai Ram
Om

title: Oh Lord, May We Live In Peace
title2: Oh Lord, may we live in peace
lyrics:
Oh Lord, may we live in love
 
(chorus)
Lord, Lord, Your love flows through the universe
Lord, Lord, let us merge in You
 
Oh Lord, may we live in bliss
Oh Lord, may we live in harmony
(chorus)
 
Oh Lord, may we live in joy
Oh Lord, may we live in truth
(chorus)

title: Oh Lord, oh my Lord
lyrics:
CHORUS
Oh Lord, oh my Lord (4)

So many lifetimes I’ve been looking for You  (4)
(CHORUS)

We’ve walked a million miles, cried a billion tears  (4)
(CHORUS)

Take me home with You, Swami take me home with You  (4)
(CHORUS)

Oh Lord, can it be true, that I finally found You?  (4)
(CHORUS)

So many lifetimes, I’ve been looking for You

title: Oh Mother Divine
title2: Oh Mother Divine, please hold my trembling heart
lyrics:
Touch me and hold me, oh Mother please enfold me
Oh Mother Divine, please let the darkness part
Tender and holy, Oh how Your eyes console me
Tears of pleasure, tears of pain, and each tear's calling out Your name
Take me home to You Sai, take me home to You

title: Oh my Lord, I sing
title2: Oh my Lord, I sing Your name out loud; listen to my call
lyrics:
Oh my Lord, I sing Your name out soft; listen to my call
Oh my Lord, I stretch my arms to You; will You hold my hand?
Will You hold my hand, oh my Lord and walk me through this land?
Oh my Lord, I am your child, my Lord, I ask You for Your grace
Oh my Lord, I am your child, my Lord, see my pleading face
Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, my Lord (2)

title: Oh my Sai, oh my Sai
title2: Oh my Sai, oh my Sai
lyrics:
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

Hold onto me, never let me go
Hold onto me, never let me go
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

Oh my Sai, oh my Sai
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

Oh my Sai, sweet Sathya Sai
Oh my Sai, sweet Sathya Sai
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

Let me always be devoted to You
Let me always be devoted to You
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

Oh my Sai, sweet Sathya Sai
Oh my Sai, sweet Sathya Sai
Oh my Sai, oh my Sai, oh my Sai

title: Oh Senor Ganesha!
lyrics:
Oh Senor de fuerza
Ayudame a llegar al Atma
Ayudame a volar en Dharma
Oh Senor de Parthi!
Sosten del Universo
Convierte las cadenas de mi Karma, en suaves espirales de
Ananda
meaning: Oh the all-powerful Lord Ganesh, help me attain the Atma, help me fly in Dharma. Oh Lord of Parthi, sustainer of the Universe, transform the chains of my karma into soft spirals of Bliss.

title: Oh when the saints
title2: Oh when the saints, go marching in,
lyrics:
Oh when the saints go marching in
 Oh how I want to be in that number,
 when the saints go marching in
 Oh on that Hallelujah day, O on that Hallelujah day,
 Oh how I want to be in that number, on that Hallelujah day [Oh when the saints.]
 Oh when they crown Him King of Kings,
 Oh when they crown Him King of Kings
 Oh how I want to be in that number,
 when they crown Him King of Kings

title: Oh, Lord, sweet Lord
title2: Oh, Lord, sweet Lord who dwells in my heart
lyrics:
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ghana Shyam
You are the embodiment of love, Sai
You are the embodiment of peace, Sai
In my heart, in my heart, You are in my heart
My faith never fails in my heart
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ghana Shyam

title: Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan
title2: Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan, Sri Bhagavaan
lyrics:
Peace Bhagavaan, Love Bhagavaan, Truth Bhagavaan Om Bhagavaan
 Om Bhagavaan, Jai Bhagavaan, Sri Bhagavaan
 Love Bhagavaan, Compassion Bhagavaan, Forgiveness Bhagavaan Om Bhagavaan

title: Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Om
title2: Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Om Bhagawan Sai Ram Ram Ram (3)
lyrics:
Prashanthi Vasa Om Bhagawan Puttaparthi Natha Om Bhagawan
You are in this hall, Om Bhagawan
You are in my heart, Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai Ram, the Lord of Puttaparthi who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
title2: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (7)
meaning: Let us bow and chant the glory of Lord Sathya Sai Baba in all aspects. Chant the mantra - Om, which is the primordial sound, Bhagawan - the one who possesses the sixteen attributes in full splendor (only Lord Krishna in Dwapara Age was supposed to have had all sixteen), Shri, which represents prosperity, Sathya the embodiment of truth, Sai and Baba - divine Mother and Father.

title: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
title2: Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (3)
lyrics:
Tu Hai Sakala Jagat Ke Swami
Tu Hai Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Tu Hai Merey Sai Baba
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Namah (3)
alt_lyrics:
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om (3)
Tu Hai Sakala Jagat Ke Swami
Tu Hai Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Tu Hai Merey Sai Baba
Om Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Babaya Nama Om (3)
meaning: We bow down to Lord Sathya Sai Baba. O Lord Sai, You are the Lord of the entire Universe. You are my mother, father and brother, You are my Lord, my Sai Baba. My salutations to You.

title: Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya
title2: Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya, to Thee I surrender my soul
lyrics:
To Thee I surrender my soul
 There's no other way, illusion's the play
 To Thee I surrender my soul
 To Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender my soul
 The battle is done, my soul You have won, to Thee I surrender my soul
 To Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender, to Thee I surrender my soul
 Om Dattatreya Sai Dattatreya to Thee I surrender my soul

title: Om Ennum Pranava Roopa Nayaka
lyrics:
Umayavalin Balane Vinayaka
Devar Muvar Potrum Veda Nayaka
Devadi Devane Vinayaka
Valvinaigal Neekkum Parthi Nayaka
Vendum Varam Thandhidum Vinayaka
Mounathin Muzhu Porule Nayaka
Mukkannan Maindhane Vinayaka
meaning: Lord Vinayaka, You are the embodiment of Om. O son of Uma and Shiva, praised by the trinity of gods, You are the Lord of Lords and  the author of the Vedas. O Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai, You remove all our sins. O Lord Vinayaka, You grant all boons and You are the true meaning of all meditation.

title: Om Ganesha Vighnesha Namo Namo
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sayeesha Namo Namo (Om) [ Om Ganesha ... ]
Vidya Buddhi Aur Siddhi Pradatha
Shiva Shivani Sutha Kumara Bhrata
Partheesha Paramesha Namo Namo (Om) [ (Om) Sri Sathya ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, who removes all obstacles. We pray to Lord Sathya Sai who upholds human values to grants welfare to humanity. Lord Ganesha is the bestower of education, intelligence and success. He is the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi and is the brother of Lord Subrahmanya. Our salutations to the greatest Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Om Guru Natha Jai Guru
title2: Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha Sadguru Natha Om
lyrics:
Om Guru Natha Jai Guru Natha
Sadguru Natha Om
meaning: Salutations to the primordial sound, OM (Aum) which is our Guru, our Lord, who is the Guru of Gurus.

title: Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru
title2: Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha
lyrics:
Omkareshwara Shiva Guru Natha [ Om Guru ]
Sadguru Natha Sathya Sai Natha
Parthi Pureeshwara Harey Guru ( Sai ) Natha
meaning: Meditate on the primordial sound 'OM' (AUM) representing the Parabrahman (the Supreme force). Fortunate are those who have Sai as their preceptor. Let us pray to HIM to guide us to salvation.

title: Om Hara Hara Hara Hara
title2: Om Hara Hara Hara Hara Uma Maheshwara
lyrics:
Gowri Shankara Namah Om
Ksheerabhisheka Priya Shiva Shiva Shambho
Sayeeshwara Namah Om
Shiva Shaktheeshwaraya Namah Om
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (4)
meaning: I pray to the Lord Shiva, Lord of Uma (Parvathi). He is the bestower of auspiciousness and good, the Lord of Gowri. The Lord Shiva who loves to be bathed in milk (abhisheka), Who has now taken the form of Lord Sai, the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.

title: Om Hari Om Hari Om
title2: Om Hari Om Hari Om Bhajorey Sada Om Hari Om Hari Om
lyrics:
Sathya (Sai) Narayana Hari Om (2)
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Om (2)
Sathya (Sai) Narayana Hari Om
meaning: Chant incessantly the divine names of Lord Hari, Narayana and Sai. Lord Sathya Sai is verily Lord Narayana.

title: Om Hari Om Sai Shankara Om
title2: Om Hari Om Sai Shankara Om
lyrics:
Om Hari Om Shirdi Pureeshwara Om
Parthi Vihari Shivom Trinetra Dhari Shivom
Patitha Pavana Paahi Mahesha Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Om
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, the very embodiment of Om. O Sai, You are verily Lord Hari and the three-eyed Lord Shiva. O uplifter of the downtrodden, grant us Your protection.

title: Om Jaganmatey Matey Jaya Om
lyrics: Sai Mata Jaya Om
meaning: We bow down to the Universal Mother Sai, who is the Mother of the whole universe. We offer our salutations in humility to the Divine Mother, Sai.

title: Om Jagat Janani Sai Mata
lyrics:
Omkara Roopini Sai Mata [ Om Jaga ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Mata
Sai Mata Sathya Sai Mata [ Abhaya Pradayini ]
Anatha Rakshaki Sai Mata (2)
meaning: Oh Mother of the Universe, Sai. Your form is the Pranava, Mother Sai. You are the destroyer of fear and the protector of the forlorn. Mother of the Universe Sai, we offer our prayers to you who grants universal protection to the underprivileged, destitute and deprived.

title: Om Jagat Kaarini Janani
lyrics:
Sai Om Partheeshwari Janani [ Om Jagat Kaarini ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Jagat Janani
Tribhuvana Palini Jagat Janani
Sai Om Partheeshwari Janani
Sai Om Hrudayeshwari Janani
meaning: O Mother and Creator of the Universe, You are none other than Mother Sai of Puttaparthi. You are the protector of the forlorn and the ruler of the three worlds. O Mother Sai, You are the Goddess of our hearts.

title: Om Jai Jagadeesha Harey
lyrics:
Swami Sathya Sai Harey
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Bhaktha Jana Samrakshaka
Parthi Maheshwara
Om Jai Jagadeesha Harey

Sashi Vadana Srikara Sarva Prana Pathey
Swami Sarva Prana Pathey
Aashritha Kalpa Latheeka
Aashritha Kalpa Latheeka
Aapadh Bandhava
Om Jai Jagadeesha Harey

Mata Pitha Guru Dhaivamu Mari Anthayu Neevey
Swami Mari Anthayu Neevey
Naada Brahma Jagan Natha
Naada Brahma Jagan Natha
Nagendra Shayana
Om Jai Jagadeesha Harey

Omkaara Roopa Ojaswi Om Sai Mahadeva
Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Mangala Arathi Anduko
Mangala Arathi Anduko
Mandhara Giridhari
Om Jai Jagadeesha Harey

Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Om
Sathya Narayana Narayana Om
Om Jai Sadguru Deva
meaning:
1. Victory to Lord of Universe, Lord Sathya Sai, Who destroys grief, evil, and miseries of life and Who guards and protects devotees. Victory to Lord of Lords – Lord of Parthi.
 
2. O Graceful and Charming as a full moon! O Auspicious One! O Lord Sai! Thou art the Indweller and life-force of all Beings; the wish-fulfilling divine creeper to those who have surrendered to Thee; and kinsman, protector, and friend in times of distress and calamities. Victory to Lord of Universe.
 
3. O Lord Sai! Thou art Mother, Father, noble Teacher, Supreme Divinity, and everything to us. O Lord Universe! Thou art Primeval Sound and art reclined on coiled serpent.
 
4. O Splendorous One! O Lord of Lords — Lord Sai! Thy Form is Pranava. We pray Thee to accept the auspicious waving of flame of light (signifying the removal of ignorance). Victory to Thee, O Lord of Universe, Resident of Mandhar mountain – Lord Giridhari.
 
Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai Narayana, Whose Form is Pranava. Victory to Noble Teacher and Supreme Lord Sai, Sathya Sai.
songtags: arathi, karaoke, multi-lingual, prayers, sheet-music, lead-music

title: Om Jai Jai Guru Sai
title2: Om Jai Jai Guru Sai Mukunda
lyrics:
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda [ Om Jai ... ]
Satchidananda Ananda Chandha
Devaki Nanda Paramananda
meaning: Glory and victory to Divine Preceptor Sai the very embodiment of Mukunda, the bestower of liberation (Mukti) who is embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss. Prince Mukunda is the darling son of (mother) Devaki and (father) Nanda. He is the eternally blissful Sai Krishna.

title: Om Muruga Jaya Muruga
lyrics:
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
alt_lyrics:
Om Muruga Om Muruga
Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga
Shakthi Vadivela Sai Muruga
Sharavana Bhava Guha Sai Muruga
meaning: We offer our prayers to Karthikeya, son of Shiva and Parvathi who is also knows as Subrahmanya and Muruga. He is powerful as He is the Commander in chief of the army of Deities. He who holds the powerful spear of liberation (vadivela), is offered prayers to grant peace and protect us from mortal worries. We surrender to the worshipful Sai Muruga, who dwells in the cave (Guha) of our heart.

title: Om Muruga Jaya Om Muruga
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shanmukha Shiva Shakthi Bala [ Om Muruga ... ]
Om Sharavana Bhava Vela Muruga
Vela Muruga Vela Muruga [ Om Sharavana ... ]
Bhaktha Mandara Sathya Sai Muruga
meaning: Hail Lord Muruga, the six-faced Lord, son of Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi. We surrender to Him as He destroys the ill effects of our earthly activities and grants us welfare by His powerful weapon, Vel (spear). He has come as the bestower of Happiness, Lord Sathya Sai, for the sake of His devotees.

title: Om Muruga Va Muruga Shanmukha Natha
title2: Om Muruga Va Muruga Shanmukha Natha
lyrics:
Shiva Shakthi Ganapathaye Shanmukha Natha
Partheeshwara Parameshwara Shanmukha Natha
Sharanagatha Rakshakane Shanmukha Natha

Haro Hara Shanmukha, Haro Hara Shanmukha (4)
Shanmukha Shanmukha, Shiva Shakthi Shanmukha
Shiva Shakthi Ganapathaye, Sathya Sai Shanmukha
meaning: Come O Lord Muruga, Lord of six faces. We worship Thee and Lord Shiva, Mother Shakthi (Parvathi) and Lord Ganapathi. You are verily Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi. O Protector of those who take refuge in You, we pray to Thee to grant us salvation.

title: Om Namah Om Namah Om
title2: Om Namah Om Namah Om Madanaantaka Hey Namah Om
lyrics:
Om Namah Om Namah Om Karunakara Hey Namah Om
Om Namah Om Namah Om Gangadhara Hey Namah Om 
Om Namah Om Namah Om Jagadeeshwara Hey Namah Om 
Madanaantaka Hey Namah Om

Om Namah Om Namah Om (3)
Madanaantaka Hey Namah Om
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva, the one who is synonymous with the primordial and cosmically resonant sound of “Om.” Bearing the Ganges in His matted locks, He is the destroyer of desires, the embodiment of compassion, and the Lord of the entire Universe.

title: Om Namah Shivay Om Namah
title2: Om Namah Shivay Om Namah Shivay (3)
lyrics: Om Namah Shivay Hari Om Namah Shivay (2)
meaning: Praise be to Lord Shiva, the embodiment of the primordial sound Om.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Shaileshwaraya Namah Om
Gowri Varaya Namah Om
Neelakantaya Namah Om
Mruthyunjaya Namah Om
Lingeshwaraya Namah Om
Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om (Sathya)
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om (2)
meaning: Meditate on Shankara, the supreme deity. He is the Lord of Srisailam and Kailasa, whose consort is Mother Gowri. He saved the universe by swallowing the 'haalaa-hala' poison (which rested in his throat turning it blue), Who grants us the power to overcome the fear of death. He manifests in the Linga form. Oh Sai Shankara! Protect us and bless us.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Namo Narayana
meaning: Chant the sacred mantra, Om Nama Shivaya; Chant the sacred name Narayana and bow in reverence and humility.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah
title2: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namah Shivaya
lyrics:
Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om Namah Om
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Vara
Kailasa Nathaya Namah Om
Gangotri Vasa Sri Sai Natha [ Om Namah Shivaya Namah Om ... ]
meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' and bow to Lord Shiva who is the embodiment of auspiciousness, health and prosperity, the beloved of Gowri, and the one who holds the Ganga in His tresses. We bow down to Him, who is the Lord of Kailasa, who resides in Gangotri (origin of Ganga in Himalayas). He is verily our Lord Sainath.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo
title2: Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (4)
meaning: Chant the mantras 'Om Namah Shivaya' and 'Om Namo Narayanaya'

title: Om Namah Shivaya Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Gangadharaya Hara Shambho
Shambho Shiva Shiva ( Hara Hara ) Shambho
Shambho Hara Hara Shambho
Chidanandamaya Shambho (Satchidananda)
Nirakara Roopa Shiva Shambho
Hey Nirvana Daata Sai Shambho
Hey Shirdi Sai Shambho
Hey Parthi Baba Shambho [ Chidanandamaya ]
meaning: We offer our prayerful salutations to Lord Shiva. He is the embodiment of Supreme bliss, though supporting the turbulent Ganges in his matted hair. He is the ever-blissful, formless form, who bestows Nirvana (enlightenment), who is our Lord Sai Shambho.
raga: keeravani, shubha pantuvarali / miyan ki todi

title: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah
title2: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (2)
lyrics: Shivaya Namah Om Namah Shivaya (2)
meaning: Chant the mantra 'Om Namah Shivaya' - I bow down to Lord Shiva, the bestower of Liberation.

title: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah
title2: Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Haraya Namah Om Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shivaya Namah Om
Hara Hara Mahadeva Hara Hara Mahadeva [ Om Namah ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Mrudanga Baajey [ Hara Hara ... ]
meaning: Chant the mantra "Om Namah Shivaya". I bow down to Lord Shiva, who confers auspiciousness, who is also Hara, who destroys the evil. He is the Great God - Mahadeva, the destroyer of evil, who plays the hand-held drum, Damaru, while the percussion instrument, Mrudanga, keeps the beat, as He dances the cosmic dance.

title: Om Namah Shivaya, Shivaya Namah Om
title2: Om Namah Shivaya, Shivaya Namah Om (6x)
lyrics:
Om Sathya Sai, Sai Baba (6x)

Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna, Krishna, Krishna, Harey Harey
Harey Rama, Harey Rama, Rama Rama, Harey Harey ... (2x)

Om Namah Shivaya, Shivaya Namah Om (4x)
Om Sathya Sai, Sai Baba (4x)

Harey Krishna, Harey Krishna, Krishna, Krishna, Harey Harey
Harey Rama, Harey Rama, Rama Rama, Harey Harey ... (4x)

title: Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya
lyrics:
Hari Om Namo Bhagawathey Vasudevaya [ Om Namo ... ]
Om Namah Shivaya Om Namo Narayanaya (2) [ Hari Om Namo ... ]
meaning: I bow down to Thee, O Lord Krishna, son of Vasudeva. I bow down to Lord Shiva, to Lord Narayana. Adoration to Lord Vishnu and Lord Shiva, who abide and shine in all beings and is one with the primordial sound Om. Om symbolizes the creator and creation.

title: Om Namo Namah Om Namah
title2: Om Namo Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om
lyrics:
Achyuthaya Namah Om Ananthaya Namah Om
Sundaraya Namah Om Sura Vandithaya Namah Om [ Om Namo ... ]
Kaaranaya Namah Om Narayanaya Namah Om
Eshwaraya Namah Om Sayeeshwaraya Namah Om
alt_lyrics:
Om Namo Namah Om Namah Om Namah Om
Achyuthaya Namah Om Sri Ananthaya Namah Om
Sundaraya Namah Om Sura Vandithaya Namah Om
Madhavaya Namah Om Madhusudhanaya Namah Om
Kaaranaya Namah Om Narayanaya Namah Om
Ramaya Namah Om Krishnaya Namah Om (3)
meaning: Bow to Lord Narayana in reverence and humility, revere Him as He is the source of beauty, the undecaying, infinite one who is adored by the pious. He is the primal cause of creation and the indweller of all beings. Prayerful salutations to Lord Sai, the very incarnation of Lord Narayana.

title: Om Namo Narayana Namo Namo
title2: Om Namo Narayana Namo Namo Narayana
lyrics:
Namo Namo Narayana Namo Lakshmi Narayana
Namo Lakshmi Narayana Namo Sathya Narayana
Namo Sathya Narayana Namo Sai Narayana
meaning: That supreme is offered prayers as Lakshmi Narayana (Lord of Lakshmi) as well as Sathya Narayana (The Absolute Reality).

title: Om Namo Narayanaya Om Namo
title2: Om Namo Narayanaya Om Namo Namo (8)
meaning: I bow to the Lord who is the indweller of all beings.

title: Om Om Listen to the sound of Om
title2: Om Om Listen to the sound of Om
lyrics:
Ah, come to me Lord
 Ah, Lord, come to me
 Ooo where are You?
 Ooo where can You be?
 Mmm, Mmm, I have found You; Lord, right in side of me.

title: Om Sahasra Roopa Sayeesha
lyrics:
Veda Vedantha Guna Sheela
Sayeesha Sayeesha Sayeesha Sathya Sayeesha (2)
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the embodiment of the primordial sound Om, who Himself takes on a thousand different forms in this universe. As He is the origin of the Vedas (holy scriptures), Sai is imbued with the best of qualities and virtues. Glory to Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Om Sai Baba Jai
title2: Om Sai Baba Jai, Om Sai Baba Jai
lyrics:
You are endless, You are Boundless, You are everywhere
 You're living in my heart
 I'm living in Your Bliss
 So we live together, so we live together

title: Om Sai Gajanana Ai no
title2: Om Sai Gajanana Ai no Kami
lyrics:
Parthi no Sai Gajanana
Amaneku Sekai wo Terasu Kami [ Om Sai ... ]
Anata no Ai wa Shifuku no Nami to Nari
Kagayaku Sekai wo Hiraku Uta to Naru
Hibike Hibiki Watare yo Sai Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Sai of Parthi, You are verily the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha. You are our God of Love. You shine Your light far and wide across this world. Your love is like the beauty of the seas. Your song echoes far and wide shining light on the world.

title: Om Sai Om Narayana
title2: Om Sai Om Narayana Oh My Sweet Lord
lyrics:
Due To Some Good Karma Sai, I Have Come To Thee
Let The Vibhuti Of Love Flow Sai, Between You And Me [ Om Sai ... ]
We Try To Be What You Want Us To Be So Guide Us Merciful Lord
Work On Us, Be Kind To Us, Show Us The Right Path [ Om Sai ... ]

title: Om Sai Ram, as we waken to Thee
title2: Om Sai Ram, as we waken to Thee the sun will rise
lyrics:
O Love divine, sleeping within our hearts, the sun will shine
 (The gentle) turning of the season brings Your Voice upon the breeze
 (O love) the chanting of Your memory sings whispers through the leaves
 I hear Your Voice within me calling, with every leaf and raindrop falling
 I hear Your Voice within me calling, with every newborn baby crying
 O God of all, we seek You in everything and everywhere

title: Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
title2: Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram, divine God within
lyrics:
Listen to your heart, listen to your soul, listen to the God within
God’s in you, God’s in me, God is everywhere
 
Om Sai Ram
My sweet Lord, Sathya Sai Bhagawan
 
Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram, divine God within
Listen to Rama, listen to Rama, listen to the God within
Divine Christ, Divine Sai, divine love in me
 
Om Sai Ram
My sweet Lord, Sathya Sai Bhagawan

title: Om Sai Rama Om
lyrics:
Om Sai Krishna Om
 Om Sai Allah Om
