 Om Sai Buddha Om
 Om Sai Mazda Om
 Om Sai Jesus Om
 Om Sai Baba Om
 Om Sai Baba Om

title: Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
title2: Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
lyrics:
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
Gayathri Savitri Saraswathi Om
meaning: The Mother Goddess is personification of Shakti (power) which pervades the Creation. She is revered as power of the Sun (Savitri), the bestower of wisdom (Saraswathi) and Mother Gayathri, who is the personification of Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi.

title: Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
title2: Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Om
lyrics:
Brahma Shakthi Vishnu Shakthi Shiva Shakthi Om [ Om Shakthi ... ]
Ichcha Shakthi Kriya Shakthi Gnana Shakthi Om [ Om Shakthi ... ]
Adi Shakthi Para Shakthi Maha Shakthi Om [ Om Shakthi ... ]
Shirdi Shakthi Sai Shakthi Sathya Shakthi Om
alt_lyrics:
Om Shakti Om Shakti Om Shakti Om
Brahma Shakti Vishnu Shakti Shiva Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Ichcha Shakti Kriya Shakti Gnana Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Karta Shakti Akarta Shakti Vyom Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Adi Shakti Para Shakti Maha Shakti Om [ Om Shakti ... ]
Shirdi Shakti Sai Shakti Sathya Shakti Om
meaning: Shakti is the power behind the three worlds. It is creative, sustaining, and destructive power inherent in Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva. It is also the power of action and inaction, of divine will and of truth. All pervading, primeval and unlimited, it is the inherent power of Sai of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Om Shiva Om Shiva Parathpara
title2: Om Shiva Om Shiva Parathpara Shiva
lyrics:
Omkar Atmaka Tava Sharanam
Namami Shankara Bhavani Shankara
Uma Maheshwara Tava Sharanam
meaning: Bow to Lord Shiva and take refuge in Him. He is the primeval power and Lord of Uma (Parvathi).

title: Om Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa
lyrics:
Om Shiva Shankara Roopa
Om Sathya Sai Swaroopa
meaning: We offer our humble salutations to Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti (Father and mother forms of universal parenthood). Offer prayers with Omkara to Shankara and Shakti for self-realization.

title: Om Shiva Shambho Jaya Shiva
title2: Om Shiva Shambho Jaya Shiva Shambho
lyrics:
Bhava Bhaya Hari Hey Tripurari [ Om Shiva ... ]
Hey Girija Pathi Gangadhari
Hara Hara Shambho Hey Shiva Shambho
Samba Sadashiva Sai Maheshwara
meaning: Victory to Lord Shiva who is known by many names: Shambho, Tripurari (destroyer of three cities), Girija pathi (the Lord of Girija), Ganga Dhari (bearer of the holy Ganges), Samba Sada Shiva and Maheshwara (the supreme Lord). He is verily Lord Sai.

title: Om Shiva Shiva Hara Hara
title2: Om Shiva Shiva Hara Hara Shankara
lyrics:
Trishooladhara Trinetradhara [ Om Shiva ... ]
Shambho Shankara Samba Shiva
Kailasa Vasa Gangadhara
Sayeeshwara Sarveshwara He Jagadeeshwara
meaning: Lord Shiva, the embodiment of Om, carries a trident, and resides in Kailasa mountains. The Lord with the eye of wisdom bearing the Holy Ganges, is the Lord of the Universe. He is Sai of Parthi.

title: Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
lyrics: Shambho Shankara Om Shivaya (3)
meaning: Bow down to Lord Shiva who gives happiness and prosperity and who is the bestower of good. We offer humble prayers to Lord Shankara who grants auspiciousness and Lord Shiva who grants sustenance to be submerged in universal consciousness.

title: Om Shivaya Om Shivaya Om
title2: Om Shivaya Om Shivaya Om Shivaya
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Samba Sadashiva Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey
Hara Hara Shankara Jaya Hey [ Om Shivaya ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghana Ghanta Bajey
Jhanaka Jhanaka Jhan Payal Baajey Kailasa Vasa Uma Pathey
Trishoola Uma Pathey Trinetra Gowri Pathey (2)
meaning: Chant the mantra " Om Shivaya". Chant the name of the Lord of Uma, Resident of Kailasa (pure hearts), Holder of the Trishoola (Trident), the Three-Eyed One, Lord Shiva. Lord Shiva, who enjoys the cosmic dance along with the rhythm of the Damaru (small drum) and the sound of bells.

title: Om Sri Bhagawan Namo Namo
lyrics:
Deena Dayala Parama Krupala [ Om Sri ... ]
Namo Narayana Prashanthi Vasa
Mahaanubhava Devadi Deva
meaning: We offer prayerful salutations to Lord Sathya Sai, who is compassionate to the downtrodden and who showers His grace on us. He is greatest of great celestial beings, verily the Lord Narayana, who has come as the Lord of Parthi.

title: Om Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai
title2: Om Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
Kokoro no Naka de Deau Hi wo
Kokoro wo Komete Matte Imashita [ Om Sri Bhagawan ... ]
Hito eno Ai, Kami eno Ai
Kokoro no Tobira Hiraku Kagi
Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Watashi no
Kokoro no Sora wo Mitasu Ai
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Baba, You are the emerging daylight within my heart. My heart waited for Your light to shine. Your love is the key that has opened my heart and filled it to the brim with love.

title: Om Sri Ram Jai Ram
title2: Om Sri Ram Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram (4)
lyrics:
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Ram
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita and Shyam, the beloved of Radha. Chant the name of the Lord Sri Rama, Sita Ram and Radhey Shyam.

title: Om Sri Sathya Baba Toutoki
title2: Om Sri Sathya Baba Toutoki Kami Sai Baba
lyrics:
Anata ni Kiesuru Mono wo, Mamaorase Michibiki Tamou, Parthi no Sonshin
Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba

Yasashii Egao de Hohoemu Manazashi, Nayameru Kora no Chikara
Ikitoshi Ikeru Inochi no, Tadashiki Negai wo Mitasu, Shikou no Son Shin
Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba

Haha nari Chichi nari, Jiai no Buddha nari, Swami Jiai no Buddha nari
Uchuu wo Suberu Sai Baba, Om no Sonshin Sai Baba, Eichi no Hikari
Om Sri Sathya Sai Baba

Kiyoki no Hi wo Douzo Ouke Kudasai, Arathi no Seinaru Hi wo
Subete no Kami wa Ai nari, Jiai to Eichi ni Michita, Renge no Miashi ni
Kono Hi wo Sasagemasu

Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Narayana Om
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om, Sathya
Narayana Narayana Om
Om Jai Sadguru Deva
meaning: 1. Sri Sathya Sai Baba, You are our precious Lord from Parthi who protects and guides. We devote ourselves to You.   2. You look over all living things with oyur kind smile and loving gaze. You fulfill the wishes of the righteous with Your supreme power.   3. Swami, You are Mother, Father, and the love of Buddha. You rule over all the universe with Your wisdom and the eternal Om.   4. Please receive this pure, holy flame in Aarathi. You bless everything with Your love and wisdom. We bow down at Your beautiful lotus feet.   5. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai Narayana, Whose Form is Pranava. Victory to Noble Teacher and Supreme Lord Sai, Sathya Sai.

title: Om Tat Sat
title2: Om Tat Sat Sri Narayana Tu
lyrics:
Purushothama Guru Tu
Siddha Buddha Tu, Skanda Vinayaka
Savita Pavaka Tu, Savita Pavaka Tu

Brahma Mazda Tu, Yahva Shakthi Tu
Yeshu Pitha Prabhu Tu
Rudra Vishnu Tu, Rama Krishna Tu
Rahim Tao Tu, Rahim Tao Tu

Vasudeva Go Vishwa Roopa Tu
Chidananda Hari Tu
Advitiya Tu Akala Nirbhaya
Atma Linga Shiva Tu (Sai) (3)
meaning:
Om, Thou art that, You are Narayana, God in the form of man;
You are the embodiment of perfection and the perfect teacher.
You are the enlightened Buddha; You are Subrahmanya and Ganesha, the remover of obstacles;
You are the Sun-fire that destroys the darkness of ignorance.

You are Brahma, the Creator; Mazda, the Great One. You are Jehovah, and Divine Mother, the creative Energy.
You are Jesus, our Lord, Holy Father.
You are Rudra, the Transformer, and Vishnu, the Preserver; You are Rama and Krishna;
You are Rahim, all kindness, always giving and expanding; You are the Tao.

You are Vasudeva, the Sustenance of all, omnipotent and omnipresent;
You are Hari, destroyer of illusion, the blissful Spirit.
You are unparallelled and one without a second, beyond time and fearless of adversities;
You are Shiva, the atma lingam, symbol of the formless Absolute.

title: Om To The Inner Light
title2: Om to the Inner Light, to my God's divine Light I bow
lyrics:
Om to divine Eternal Light, to the Essence of my life I bow
Om to the Indwelling Lord, the true Guru Sathya Sai I bow

title: Omkara Naadamayi Sai Deva Sathya
title2: Omkara Naadamayi Sai Deva Sathya Sai Deva
lyrics:
Saakara Shiva Sai Devadi Deva [ Omkara Naadamayi ... ]
Tava Naama Smaranam Bhava Paapa Haranam
Tava Paada Sparshanam Sarva Paapa Nashanam
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai is the embodiment of the Omkara. Pranava, the primal sound, represents the Almighty. That very sound realized in Truth has taken the form of our dear Lord Sathya Sai. Continuous chanting of His name destroys ill effects of all sins committed by us. The touch of his Lotus Feet redeems us to lead a spiritual and purposeful life and become an example.

title: Omkara Priya Sai Ram Sai
title2: Omkara Priya Sai Ram Sai Rama
lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Ramethi Rama [ Omkara ... ]
Sri Raghu Nandana Sita Rama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Jaya Jaya Rama Jai Sai Rama (5)
meaning: Sai Ram, the embodiment of Omkara is, the same Rama who was the jewel of the lineage of Raghu. He is the compassionate Lord of Sita, who liberated the devotee Ahalya, The indweller who is always in Divine Bliss. Victory to that Ram, who is our Sai Ram.

title: Omkara Priya Sai Rama
lyrics:
Munijana Sevitha Sai Rama
Shanthakara Sai Rama
Sakshathkara Sai Rama
Bhaava Raga Priya Sai Rama
Bhaagavatha Priya Sai Rama
Naada Swaroopa Sai Rama
Natya Kalaapa Sai Rama
meaning: We pray to Sai Rama, who loves the Omkar (Primordial sound), who is always worshipped by pious souls, who is the embodiment of peace, who could grant self realization, the one who loves devotees who are immersed in the divine consciousness. He is the embodiment of divine music and dance.

title: Omkara Roopa Sri Sai Natha
lyrics:
Sadguru Sri Sathya Sai Harey
Allah Yesu Eshwar Tum Ho
Gautama Buddha Mahavir Ho
Zohrashtra Guru Grantha Nanak Tum Ho
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim
meaning: Pray to Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Omkara; who is the True Guru, the one who removes darkness and gives enlightenment; He is verily Allah, Yesu, Eshwar, Buddha, Mahavir, Zohrashtra, Guru Nanak, Ram, Rahim and Krishna.

title: Omkara Roopini Janani Ma
lyrics:
Mangala Kaarini Janani Ma [ Omkara Roopini ... ]
Gaana Vinodini Janani Ma
Ananda Dayini Janani Ma
Janani Ma Partheeshwari Ma (2)
meaning: O Mother Sai residing in Parthi, You are the personification of the Primordial Sound Om. You bestow auspiciousness and happiness to one and all and You are enchanted by music.

title: Omkareshwara He Shiva Nandana
lyrics:
Girija Sutha Gananatha Gajanana [ Omkareshwara He ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Mooshaka Vahana
Lambodhara He Sankata Mochana
meaning: Lord Ganesha, son of Lord Shiva and Mother Girija (Parvathi) is the Supreme Lord, who grants success, removes misfortunes and is the Lord of divine powers.

title: Omkareshwara Vinayaka
lyrics:
Jaya Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Vinayaka Vinayaka
Jaya Vighneshwara Vinayaka
Jaya Sayeeshwara Vinayaka
meaning: Glory be to the Lord of divine powers, Lord of Om, and remover of obstacles, Lord Ganesha, and Lord Sai.

title: Omnipresent Sai Embodiment Of Love
lyrics:
Goodness And Truth, Peace Within
Life Of The Soul In Everyone
Lord Of The World Filled With Sweetness
Om Sri Sathya Sai Maha Deva

title: On Paths Of Joy
title2: On paths of joy, Lord Sai leads us home,
lyrics:
On a lane so familiar, from so long ago.
Life was simple, sweet and kind,
Places I have known, from so long ago.

He takes me back, before I was young,
An age before memory had begun.
Mountains of truth, streams of peace,
Places I have known, from so long ago.

(Close)
Places I have known, from so long ago.

title: On This Guru Poornima Day
lyrics:
With Love We Offer Homage To Thy Feet
 Sai Baba Dear Gurudev (2)
 Lead Us From Darkness Into The Light
 Fill Us With Knowledge, Make Us Wise
 (Baba) Lead Us To Our Salvation
 Blessed Are We, Blessed Are We, Blessed Are We To Be With You

title: Once our hearts have tasted His love
title2: Once our hearts have tasted His love, nothing else will satisfy
lyrics:
Once He takes us for His own, He will never let us go
 We must worship our Him our dear Lord Sai, in everything we say and do.

title: One day in Puttaparthi
title2: One day in Puttaparthi, Sai was born
lyrics:
And with His coming, a new age has dawned
He lit the flames of Light and Love
He taught us God is in our hearts
Swami, You taught us to Love All and Serve All
So help us awake, arise, ascend
So let's awake, arise, ascend

title: One Guru, One Guru
title2: One guru, one guru, omnipresent God
lyrics:
Guru truth, guru peace, guru love in every heart
Rama guru, Krishna guru, Shiva guru naam
Guru Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai naam
 
One guru, one guru, omnipresent God
Jesus guru, Allah guru, Buddha guru naam 
Guru Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Jehovah naam

title: One Spirit
lyrics:
In this world with it’s sorrow and strife
There’s one source that we look to for light
In this world when we need to make a start
It’s one spirit, one heart
One spirit to make our journey whole
One spirit, one light, one heart, one soul
One spirit, one ancient holy dove
One spirit, one love
 
One people, one world that understands
One family, one woman, one child, one man
One spirit, to lead us out of night
One spirit, one light
One music that plays within our hearts
One truth says we’ve never been apart
One spirit, that guides us from above
One spirit, one love
One spirit, one love

title: Only believe, Only believe
lyrics:
All things are possible, if only we believe
 Only believe, only believe
 All things are possible, if we only believe

title: Only one life will soon be passed
title2: Only one life will soon be passed
lyrics:
Only what's done for Thee will last
 For me to live is Christ
 Jesu Pita, Jesu Pita, Jesu Pita, O Baba
 Open my heart, O Open my heart, Open my heart, receive me
 For me to love is Christ

title: Only One Love
title2: Only one love shines on millions of faces
lyrics:
Only one heart dwells in all sacred places
So many names for the one Lord we serve
We all are one when that one Lord is love
 
Om Shirdi Sai, Jai Sathya Sai, Om Prema Sai, Baba how I love You

title: Ooinaru Kami yo (Sai)
lyrics:
Puttaparthi ni Owasu Sai Baba Warera no Kami yo [ Ooinaru ... ]
Shin no Kiyosa to Bi ni Renge no Hitomi Kagayaku
Kokoro no Yami wo Harai Ai de Hikari Tomosu
meaning: Magnificent Sai who dwells in Puttaparthi, Your lotus eyes shine with truth and beauty. You clear away the darkness of our hearts with Your light of love.

title: Ooinaru Mezame no Shifuku no
title2: Ooinaru Mezame no Shifuku no Hana wo
lyrics:
Kie Suru Kokoro ni Sakase tamae
Haruka naru Satori no Tabi wo
Te wo Soete tomo ni Ayuman
O Buddha Sai Buddha Jiai no Hikari yo
meaning: O Magnificent Lord, You bloom the flowers of supreme bliss within my heart. You hold our hands and walk together with us on this long journey towards enlightenment. O Buddha, You are the light of Love.

title: Open To My Love
title2: Open, open, open to My love
lyrics:
Open, open, open to My love
Won’t you open, open, open to My love
Open, open, open to My love...
 
I hear your deepest prayer
And know your heart's desire
Reach out to take My hand
I'll set, (I’ll set) your soul on fire...
 
Open, open, open to My love (4x)
 
Come take one step towards
Me I'll take ten towards you
Your faith is all I ask
To know (to know) My love is true...
 
Open....
Open...
Won’t you open...
Open... Open to My love...
 
I hear your deepest prayer
And know your heart's desire
Reach out to take My hand
I'll set, (I’ll set) your soul on fire...
 
Open....
Open...
Won’t you open...
Open...
 
Come take one step towards Me
I'll take ten towards you
Your faith is all I ask
To know (to know) My love is true...
 
Open, open, open to My love
Open, open, open to My love
Won’t you open, open, open to My love
Open, open, open to My l---o---v---e...

title: Our Father said
title2: Our Father said, my loving son, listen to what must be done
lyrics:
All are truly only one so be alike to everyone
 That's why Jesus Christ he said to me love ye one another as I love thee
 God is Love and Peace and Bliss, let your heart remember this
 God is Love and Peace and Bliss, let the world remember this

title: Our Father Who Art In Heaven
title2: Our Father Who Art In Heaven, Hallowed Be Thy Name
lyrics:
Thy Kingdom Come, Thy Will Be Done, Hallowed Be Thy Name (2)
On Earth, As It Is In Heaven, Hallowed ...
Give Us This Day Our Daily Bread, Hallowed ... (2)
And Forgive Us Our Trespasses, Hallowed ...
As We Forgive Those Who Trespass Against Us, Hallowed ... (2)
Lead Us Not Into Temptation, Hallowed ...
But Deliver Us From All That Is Evil, Hallowed ... (2)
For Thine Is The Kingdom, The Power And The Glory, Hallowed ...
For Ever And Ever And Ever And Ever, Hallowed Be Thy Name ... (2)

title: Our Jesus Came
title2: Our Jesus Came And He Is Here Again
lyrics:
Sai Rama Sai Krishna Sai Is His Name
Sai Rama Sai Allah Sai Is His Name
Zohrashtra Mohammed Jehovah Is His Name
Jesus Christ From Bethlehem And Sai Is The Same
Hallelujah Hallelujah Glory To Thy Name
Sathya Baba Sai Baba Blessed Be Thy Name
Sathya Baba Prema Baba Blessed Be Thy Name

title: Our only god truly thou art
title2: Our only God truly thou art
lyrics:
Our only lord truly thou art 
You are Jesus Mahavira 
Our only god our only lord
Jehova or Allah 
Brahma Vishnu Shiva Sai
Zoroaster Guru Nanak 
Mazda Buddha Narayana 
Sathya Sai Baba master and guide 
Will bless us all in love divine
He'll make us one humanity 
Bound by His love a family

title: Paahi Gajanana Deenavana
lyrics:
Sindhura Vadana Shritha Jana Palana [ Paahi Gajanana ... ]
Ambika Tanaya Amaradheeshwara
Aganita Guna Gana Ananda Dayaka
meaning: We pray to Lord Ganesha to protect us - the unprotected. O Lord, with Your shining face You bestow welfare on those who surrender and the downtrodden. O the beloved child of Ambika, You are praised by the celestial beings and there is no one parallel to You in granting bliss.

title: Paahi Mahesha Hey Jagadeesha
lyrics:
Dehi Dehi Tava Pada Seva
Poorana Brahma Sanathana Swami
Jaya Hey Jaya Hey Antaryami
meaning: Hail the Great God, master of the universe, Lord Sai. We pray to that Supreme Lord in human form to protect us. He is holistic and omnipresent Victory to that force who always resides in us.

title: Paahi Paahi Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Chamara Karna Gajanana
Vilambita Sutra Gajanana
alt_lyrics:
Paahi Paahi Gajanana
Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
Chamara Karna Gajanana
Vilambita Sutra Gajanana
Vamana Roopa Gajanana
Maheshwara Putra Gajanana
Vighna Vinashaka Gajanana
Tava Paada Namasthey Gajanana
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, son of Parvathi, we seek refuge in You, please protect us. You ride on the mouse, holding sweet (modaka) in Your Hand, You have large fan-like ears, You wear a chain around Your waist and are of short stature. Dear son of Lord Shiva, You help us overcome our obstacles. O Ganesha, we prostrate at Your Feet.

title: Paahi Paahi Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Pashupathi Tanaya Gajanana
Buddhi Pradatha Gajanana
Siddhi Vinayaka Shubhanana
Lambodhara Jaya Gajanana
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
meaning: Worship the auspicious Lord Ganesha, the pot-bellied son of Mother Parvathi and Lord Shiva, bestower of intelligence and fulfilment, and  the remover of obstacles.

title: Paahi Paahi Hey Mahesha
lyrics:
Maya Rahita Gowri Kantha
Shiva Shiva Shankara Shambho Shankara
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Manohara
Shooladhara Vibhuti Sundara
Haalaahala Dhara Natana Manohara
Aashritha Rakshaka Hey Tripurari
meaning: Protect us, O Lord Shiva, the greatest Lord and the consort of Mother Gowri (Parvathi). You hold the holy river Ganges in Thy matted locks. You are besmeared with Vibhuthi - the Holy Ash. You wield the Trident. You are the one who is devoid of Maya (Illusion). You swallowed the Haalaahala poison for the sake of Your devotees. You are the enchanting Dancer who destroyed Tripura and is the Protector of Your devotees.

title: Paahi Paahi Kailasa Nivasi
lyrics:
Jata Jootadhara Parthi Nivasi [ Paahi Paahi ... ]
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Manohara
Haalaahala Dhara Natana Manohara
Chinmaya (Vismaya) Roopa Sai Mahesha
meaning: We pray to Lord Shiva, the Lord of Kailasa, the magnificent haired Lord who has taken birth in Parthi as Lord Sathya Sai. He holds the holy Ganga in His hair, the beloved of Gowri. He is the one who drank the poison, haalaa-hala, to protect the worlds. He enchants our minds with His Cosmic Dance and Illusive Form. Glory to Lord Sai Shiva.

title: Paahi Paahi Parameshwara
lyrics:
Jaya Gowri Vara Sundara [ Paahi Paahi ... ]
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaruka Natha
Dhimithaka Dhimithaka Natana Manohara
Tandava Priya Shankara
meaning: Oh Lord Shiva, the Supreme one, we pray to You to protect us. You are the enchanting partner of the divine mother, Gowri. You love the celestial dance - Shiva Tandava - and confer bliss, with the enchanting subtle movements enhanced by the beats of your hand-held drum, Damaru.

title: Paaliya Hum Ne Sadguru Charanam
lyrics:
Sadguru Charanam Bhava Bhaya Haranam [ Paaliya Hum ... ]
Sri Sai Charanam Sab Dukha Haranam [ Sadguru Charanam ]
meaning: We have attained the Lotus Feet of our Sadguru Sainatha, The feet, which remove the darkness of ignorance, the fear of this worldly existence. We take refuge at Your feet, which wipe away our miseries and gives enlightenment.

title: Paar Karo Uddhar Karo Prabhu
title2: Paar Karo Uddhar Karo Prabhu Parthi Puri Bhagawan
lyrics:
Harey Ram Ram Ram Ghana Shyam Shyam Shyam Hey Sai Natha Bhagawan
Deena Dayakara Karuna Murthy Kali Yuga Avatar Sai Bhagawan
Allah Sai Buddha Zohrashtra Yesu Christhu Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi, please save us and liberate us from the cycle of birth and death. O the most compassionate and merciful Lord, You are the Incarnation of this Kali Age. Chant the name of the Lord Ram, Ghana Shyam (deep blue hued Lord Krishna), Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Jesus Christ.

title: Paavana Purusha Sayeesha
lyrics:
Sharanara Kaava Sarvesha
Sowmya Roopa Sathya Baba
Kavudai Kai Mugive [ Paavana ... ]
Chithravathi Nadhi Teera Nivasa
Shishta Janavana Muni Sharana
Isha Jagatraya Moola Vikasa
Sathya Sayeesha Shritha Bharana (Jai)
Bhaktha Paalana Shritha Bharana
Parthivasa Aashritha Bharana [ Sathya Sayeesha ... ]
meaning: Salutations to the Supreme Lord, Sai, who protects all those who surrender to Him. Salutations to the gentle and pleasing Lord whose abode is Puttaparthi, on the banks of river Chitravathi. The sages and the noblest of men surrender to You, O Sai, You are the source and sustenance for all the three worlds. Victory unto Thee, O Lord Sathya Sai, the protector and sustainer of all devotees and the one who bears the burden of all those who take refuge in You.

title: Padmanabha Hrishikesha Padma Netra Paahi
lyrics:
Janardhana Damodara Jala Janabha Paahi [ Padmanabha Hrishikesha ... ]
Vishwa Roopa Veda Vidya Vimala Charitha Paahi
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Parama Purusha Paahi
meaning: We pray to Lord Narayana from whose navel springs the Lotus of creation (Padmanabha), who is the Overlord of the sensory world, the lotus-eyed one who removes ignorance of devotees and helps them escape the cycle of birth and death. We pray to Lord Damodara (Krishna), the one who was tied by the waist, by His mother, Yashoda. O Lord, You are the all pervasive Universal Form, the preceptor of the Vedic knowledge and the one with blemishless character.  We pray to that primordial Lord born as Sai in Parthi.

title: Padmanabha Narayana
lyrics:
Parthi Vasa Narayana (2)
Narayana Namo (Sai) Narayana (3)
alt_lyrics:
Padmanabha Narayana
Badri Vasa Narayana
Parthi Vasa Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana (3)
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of all beings, Lord Narayana, from whose navel springs the Lotus of Creation. He is none other than Lord Sai who resides at Puttaparthi.

title: Palaya Pashupala Bala
lyrics:
Shishupaladi Kaala Gunasheela [ Palaya Pashupala ... ]
Neeraja Samaneela Nirupama Guna Sheela
Varija Bhaava Lola Bala Gopala Bala
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna) - the Protector of all animals, the slayer of Sisupala and others, the one who has the color of the Blue Lotus, the one who has good qualities beyond comparison - please protect us.

title: Palinsta Vayya Partheeshwara
lyrics:
Karunimpave Swami Karunamaya [ Palintsa Vayya ... ]
Talliyu Nive Tandriyu Nive
Dikkuleni Variki Daivamu Nive
Ni Padamu Nammiti Nanubrova Vayya
Kanupincha Vayya Na Sai Natha
meaning: Shower grace, O Lord of Parthi. You are our mother, father and refuge for the homeless. Let me have Your darshan.

title: Pambanai Mel Pallikondai Ranga
lyrics:
Parthi Puriyil Avadaritta Ranga Ranga [ Pambanai Mel ... ]
Muvadiyal Ulagalanda Ranga Ranga
Adi Mudal Ana Sai Ranga Ranga
Maragada Vanna (Sai) Madhusudhana
Achyutha Anantha Mukunda Govinda (2)
meaning: Lord Ranga, reclining on the bed of snake has now incarnated at Parthi as Lord Sai. He is the same as the one who scaled the Universe in three steps (during the incarnation as Lord Vamana), and the dark-hued Krishna. Glory to the one who is the source of everything.

title: Pancha Bhoothamayi Parthi Nivasini
lyrics:
Panchaksharamayi Pavani Janani [ Pancha Bhootha ... ]
Sanchitha Karma Vinashini Janani
Satchidanandamayi Sai Janani
Omkara Roopini Tejonmaya Mayi
Om Shakthi Om Shakthi Shiva Shakthi Roopini
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (3)
meaning: Bow to Mother Sai, who pervades the five elements, who is the source of the five-syllabled mantra (Om Namah Shivaya), the one who destroys the stored karma of an individual, the one who is Truth, Consciousness and Bliss. Oh Mother Sai, You are the embodiment of the primordial sound Aum, the effulgence that pervades and sustains the illusory power, the incarnation of Shiva and Shakti.

title: Pandari Nivasa Hey Panduranga
lyrics:
Hey Parthi Vasa Sri Sai Deva [ Pandari Nivasa ... ]
Deena Rakshaka Anatha Rakshaka ( Sai )
Bhaktha Vatsala Hey Sayeeshwara (2)
meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord of Pandharpur, Panduranga. He is the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, who is the protector of the weak, the orphaned and the under privileged. He is the Lord who always takes care of His devotees.

title: Pandari Nivasa Ranga Vittala Harey
lyrics:
Panduranga Deena Natha Vittala Harey [ Pandari Nivasa ... ]
Hrudayanta Ranga Sai Vittala Harey
Govinda Gopal Sai Vittala Harey
Puttaparthi Ranga Sai Vittala Harey
Vittala Harey Sai Vittala Harey
meaning: O Lord Panduranga (Krishna), residing at Pandharpur, You are the one who protects the weak. Hey Sai, the Director of the play of life, You are the one who resides in the devotee's heart. Hey Sai of Parthi, You are the one who protects us. You are verily Vittala and Krishna.

title: Panduranga Jaya Vittala Pandari Ranga
title2: Panduranga Jaya Vittala Pandari Ranga Hari Vittala
lyrics:
Bhaktha Rakshaka Mukthi Pradayaka Nithya Niranjana Hari ...
... Vittala [ Panduranga Jaya ... ]
Anatha Natha Deena Dayalo Gaana Vilola Hari Vittala
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga (Lord Vittala) of Pandharpur! The ever pure Lord protects and gives liberation to the destitute and friendless.

title: Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Vittala
lyrics:
Pandari Natha Pandari Natha Pandari Natha Vittala [ Panduranga ... ]
Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Vittala
Bhaja Narayana Bhaja Narayana Bhaja Narayana Vittala
Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Hari Vittala [ Hari Narayana ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. The Lord of Pandharpur is none other than Lord Narayana. Sing His glory, for your liberation.

title: Panduranga Panduranga Vittala Paahey
lyrics:
Deena Natha Karuna Natha
Sai Natha Harey
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Vittala Paahey
meaning: Protect us, O Lord Panduranga. O Lord Vittala, You are the protector of the meek and helpless. You are the merciful Lord. O Sai Natha, You are verily the Lord of Pandharpur. Please protect us.

title: Panduranga Sai Bhaktha Vatsalaya
lyrics:
Parabrahma Lingam, Bhajey Sai Rangam
 (Sathya) Sai Panduranga
 Lotus-eyed Sai, loves me as my Mother
 Beloved Messiah, I run to as my Father
 Sathya Sai, Lord of Compassion

title: Panduranga Vittala Jai Pandari Natha
title2: Panduranga Vittala Jai Pandari Natha Vittala
lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Jai Pundarikaaksha Vittala [ Panduranga ... ]
Vittala Jai Vittala Purandara Vittala (2)
Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Rakumayi Vittala
meaning: Victory to the Lord of Pandari, Lord Vittala, who waited patiently for His devotee Pundalika. Victory to that Pundarikaksha. Recite the name of Lord Panduranga and Vittala. Victory to Vittala (Vishnu), the Lord of Rakumayi (Rukmini).

title: Panduranga Vittala Jaya Panduranga Vittala
lyrics:
Kasturi Ranga Vittala Kamaneeya Ranga Vittala [ Panduranga ... ]
Govinda Ranga Vittala Gopala Ranga Vittala
Kalyana Ranga Vittala Karunanta Ranga Vittala
Partheesha Ranga Vittala Jaya Sai Ranga Vittala
meaning: Victory to the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the shining one who attracts like the fragrance of musk. He is the protector of all beings who is full of mercy. He is the Lord of Parthi, Sai, the director of the play of life.

title: Panduranga Vittala Murari Murari (3)
lyrics: Vittala Murari Ranga Vittala Murari (2)
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Panduranga Vittala, who is none other than Lord Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura.

title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Panduranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana
Ranga Ranga Mohana Ranga
Jaya Hari Vittala Jaya Sai Vittala
meaning: Oh Lord Panduranga, the dweller of Pandharpur, thou art Lord Hari. Oh Lord of Pandharpur, Oh Sathya Narayana, the enchanting director of the drama of life, victory to You, Oh Sai Vittala.

title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Sri Ranga Vittaley Hari Narayana
Jaya Narayana Jaya Narayana [ Panduranga Vittaley ... ]
Sai Ranga Vittaley Namo Narayana
Parthi Ranga Vittaley Sathya Narayana (2)
meaning: I bow to Lord Panduranga Vittala, who is verily Lord Narayana, the director of the drama of life. Victory to Narayana, I bow to Thee, who is none other than our Lord Sathya Narayana of Parthi.

title: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana Hari
title2: Panduranga Vittaley Hari Narayana Hari Narayana Govinda (3)
lyrics: Bhajo ( Sai ) Narayana Govinda (2)
meaning: Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala, the incarnation of Lord Narayana, the protector and indweller of all beings.

title: Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
lyrics:
Pandareesha Panduranga Sri Ranga Vittaley
Antaranga Vittaley Ananda Ranga Vittaley
Pundarika Varada Hey Purandara Vittaley
Panduranga Vittaley Panduranga Vittaley
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is also the Lord Ranga. He is the indweller, the bestower of Bliss. He is the liberator of Pundarika, the devotee.

title: Pannaga Shayana Kali Avatara
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om
Parama Niranjana Neeraja Nayana
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om
Buddhi Pradayaka Paapa Vinashaka
Sathya Sanathana Tum Ho
Deena Natha Hey Prabhu Parameshwara
Karuna Sagara Tum Ho
meaning: Salutations to Lord Narayana who rests on the multi-headed cobra. O Lord Sai, You are the incarnation of the Kali Age. You are the supremely pure, lotus-eyed one. You are the granter of liberating wisdom, the destroyer of sins. You are the eternal reality and the savior of the dejected and destitute. You are the ocean of mercy.

title: Pannaga Shayana Pankaja Nayana
lyrics:
Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
Pandari Natha Pundarikaaksha
Veda Parayana Narayana
Shankhu Chakra Dhara Peetambara Dhara
Vaikunta Vasa Narayana
Sankata Harana Sarva Dayalana
Parthi Nivasa Narayana (2)
meaning: Lord Narayana, resting on cobra, the Lotus-eyed One, worshipped and adored by the devotees. You are the Lord of Pandharpur. You are the preceptor of the Vedas, Narayana. Dressed in yellow garments, holding the conch and the Disc, You are the dweller of Vaikunta, abode of Narayana. Ocean of mercy, deliverer from pitfalls of materialistic life. You are none other than the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai.

title: Parama Dayakara Sri Ramachandra
lyrics:
Paramananda Sri Sai Rama
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (2) [ Parama Dayakara ... ]
Jagadabhi Ram Nayanabhi Ram
Jagadodhara Nayanabhi Ram [ Sri Ram ... ]
meaning: Victory to the supremely merciful Lord Rama who is verily Lord Sai, the eternally blissful one. He is the protector of the Universe who has pleasing eyes.

title: Parama Dayalu Sai Ram (Hey)
lyrics:
Bhagawan Bhagawan [ (Hey) Parama Dayalu ... ]
Treta Yug Mey Dasharatha Nandana
Dwapara Yug Mey Murali Mohana
Kali Yuga Mey Sai Narayana
Ek Prabhu Anek Naam
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the most merciful Lord who incarnated as Rama, son of King Dasharatha in the Treta Age. In the age of Dwapara, You incarnated as the charming and enchanting Flutist, Krishna and in this present age of Kali, as Lord Sai Narayana. You are the One Lord assuming many names and forms.

title: Paramananda Govinda Gopal Jai
lyrics:
Sai Nanda Mukunda Gopal Jai
Sai Krishna Harey Sai Rama Harey
Sai Keshava Madhava Mohana Harey [ Paramananda Govinda ... ]
Mukharavinda Gopal Jai
Satchidananda Govinda Gopal Jai [ Sai Nanda ... ]
meaning: Glory to the supremely blissful Lord Govinda, Gopala, Mukunda, Keshava, Madhava, Krishna and Rama. Glory to the lotus-faced Gopala (protector of all beings) who is the very embodiment of Truth, Awareness and Bliss and who is verily Lord Sai.

title: Parkadalil Pallikonda Parandhama
lyrics:
Parthipuriyil Avadaritha Sai Rama
Darmam Kaatha Raman Niye Sai Rama
Neela Vanna Kannan Niye Sai Shyama
Kaliyugathu Deivam Niye Parandama
Katharulvai Karunakara Sai Rama (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Vishnu reclining on the ocean of milk (consciousness), who has incarnated as Lord Sai in Puttaparthi. Lord Rama, the protector of righteousness, and Lord Krishna of blue complexion are none other than Lord Sai of the Kali Age. Bless us and protect us, O compassionate Lord Sai Rama.

title: Partheeshwara Parameshwara
lyrics:
Pavana Naama Sayeeshwara
Jagadeeshwara Hrudayeshwara
Jagadodhara Jatadhara [ Pavana Naama ... ]
meaning: Sing the glorious name of Lord Sai, the incarnation of Parameshwara (Shiva). Sing the beautiful name of He who is the Lord of the Universe and the one who resides in our hearts, the Sustainer of Creation, the long-tressed Lord with the glorious name.

title: Partheeshwara Sai Baba Aao Aao
title2: Partheeshwara Sai Baba Aao Aao Sai Nandalala
lyrics:
Jagadeesha Daya Sagara
Paramesha Krupa Sagara
Jai Jai Sai Ram, Bolo Jai Jai Sai Ram
meaning: O Sai Nandalala of Puttaparthi, come into our hearts. You are the Lord of the Universe, the ocean of compassion and mercy. All praise be unto Thee, O Lord Sai Ram.

title: Partheeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Daya Karo Hari Narayana
Sri Sai Narayana ( Sai )
Bhava Sagaroddhara Bhuvanavana
Sharanagatha Thrana Narayana [ Daya Karo ... ]
Sri Sai Narayana ( Sai )
meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, Lord of Puttaparthi, Oh Lord Sai Narayana, have compassion. You are the One who can help us cross the ocean of wordly existence. Hey Sai Narayana, we surrender to Thee. Please have compassion, Sai Narayana.

title: Partheeshwara Sri Sai Prabho
lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sai Prabho [ Partheeshwara Sri ]
Eshwar Allah Sri Sai Rama Naam
Buddha Zohrashtra Sai Krishna Naam
Madhava Mohana Sai Narayana
Prema Avatara Prabhu Sai Rama
meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord of Parthi, Sri Sai The darling son of Mother Eshwaramba He is the unifier of all religious denominations. He is the personification of Eshwar, Allah, Krishna, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Madhava. He is the incarnation of Divine Love.

title: Partheeshwari Jagat Janani
lyrics:
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Janani [ Partheeshwari Jagat ... ]
Veda Kalamayi Devi Bhavani
Naada Vidyamayi Narayani
Karuna Sadani Karunamayi Ma
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Ma [ Jaya Jaya ]
meaning: Divine Mother of Parthi, Sai Ma, the One who sustains the Universe, victory to you! You are the knowledge of the Vedas, You are the Goddess of Music and the Arts, You are full of Grace, verily the embodiment of Grace. We surrender at Your feet, Mother Sai.

title: Parthi Mera Pandarpur
lyrics:
Partheeshwara Sai Ranga
Shiva Hari Roopa Panduranga
Shiva Shakthi Roopa Sai Ranga
Pundarika Varada Panduranga
Bhaktha Janashraya Sai Ranga
Panduranga Pandari Natha Sai Natha Vittala (Hey) (2)
meaning: Puttaparthi is my Pandarpur and Lord Sai is verily Lord Panduranga from whom the devotees seek solace. He is the embodiment of Lord Shiva and Shakthi (Parvathi) as well as Lord Hari, the one who blessed His devotee Pundarika. Lord Sai is the same as Lord Vitthala, the Lord of Pandarpur.

title: Parthi Nandana Radhey Shyama
lyrics:
Aao Aao Sai Ghana Shyama [ Parthi Nandana ... ]
Brindavan Ghana Shyama Govinda
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda
Hey Giridhari Sai Murari [ Aao Aao ... ]
meaning: Come O beautiful and charming Lord Krishna, the dark-hued one who has incarnated as Lord Sai of Parthi. You are the same Lord Krishna of Brindavan, the sweet, enchanting, lotus-faced Lord, who lifted the mountain and conquered the demonic force Mura. Chant the many names of the Lord Govinda and Lord Sai.

title: Parthi Pureesha Panduranga
lyrics:
Pandari Natha Hari Hari
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi, who is none other than Panduranga, the Lord of Pandarpur. He is Lord Vishnu (Narayana), who incarnated as Krishna, the stealer of the hearts and the divine child of Nanda.

title: Parthi Pureesha Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sthira Chara Vishwa Vidhata Natha
Deena Dayala Anatha Natha
Bhagawantha Hey Dhrata (2) [ Sthira Chara ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the eternal protector of the movable and immovable world and the entire Universe. He is the savior of the forsaken and fallen.

title: Parthi Pureeshwara Sai
title2: Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Allah Maulah Sai
lyrics:
Gurudware Mey Nanak Sai
Girjaghar Mey Yesu Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Sai
Sarva Dharma Priya Sri Sathya Sai
meaning: O Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi, You are verily Allah. You reside in Gurudwaras as Nanak and in churches as Lord Jesus Christ. You are none other than Buddha, Zohrashtra and Mahavira. Glory to Thee, O Lord Sathya Sai who fosters all religions.

title: Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Natha
lyrics:
Parama Dayal Bhagawan
Sita Ram Jaya Ram
Deenodharana Bhava Bhaya Harana
Janaki Jeevana Ram
Alakh Niranjan Asura Nikhandana
Sundara Nayanabhi Ram [ Sita Ram... ]
meaning: Oh Lord of Parthi! You are extremely merciful. Victory to Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita. You are the saviour of the meek, the destroyer of the fear, bondage of the birth and death. You are the very life of Janaki (Sita). Victory to the Lord who is unknowable and blemishless, who destroyed the demonic hordes and the one with the beautiful eyes.

title: Parthi Pureeshwaram Parama Dayalam
lyrics:
Sadguru Devam Pranamamyaham
(Pra) Shanthi Nivasam Jaya Sai Natham
Namami Nithyam Sathya Sai Natham
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwaram Pranamamyaham
meaning: We bow to the Guru of Gurus, Lord Sai of Parthi, the supremely compassionate resident of Prashanthi Nilayam. Victory to our Sai. We incessantly chant the name of Sathya Sai. He is the Lord of Parthi and Shirdi, we bow to Him.

title: Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Jaya Sai
title2: Parthi Pureeshwari Ma Jaya Sai Maheshwari Ma
lyrics:
Dukha Nivarani Bhava Bhaya Harini
Abhaya Pradayini Ma ( Sai )
Jaya Ma Sai Ma (3)
Omkara Roopini Ma (2)
meaning: Victory to the mother of Parthi, who is the incarnation of Mother Eshwari. She removes the afflictions of worldly sorrow and fear; And grants us fearlessness. Victory to that Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of Omkara.

title: Parthi Puri Mata Sri Sathya
title2: Parthi Puri Mata Sri Sathya Sai Mata
lyrics:
Daya Karo Mata Mujhey Krupa Karo Mata
Merey Janam Janam Saathi Merey Jeevan Ke Aadhaar
Terey Charanon Ke Pyaasi Mujhey Darshan Do Mata
meaning: O Mother Sathya Sai of Puttaparthi, please have mercy and show compassion on me. You are the Eternal Companion and the very basis of my life. I thirst for the vision of Thy Lotus Feet, please grant me Your Divine Darshan, O Mother Sai.

title: Parthi Puri Mey Janam Liya
title2: Parthi Puri Mey Janam Liya Jo Sai Baba Naam Hai
lyrics:
Mayura Mukutadhara Murali Manohara Sai Shyama Naam Hai
Hey Shiva Shankara Uma Maheshwara Sai Shambho Naam Hai
Hey Parameshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Tu Hi Mera Pran Hai
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You are the one who is adorned with the crown of peacock feathers. You are the enchanter with the flute! You have incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Baba. Oh Lord Shambho, Oh Lord Shankara Oh the Lord of Uma, Lord Maheshwara! You have incarnated in Parthi as Sai. Oh Supreme Lord of Parthi, You are my very life.

title: Parthi Puri Nayaki Paripalinchu Kamakshi
lyrics:
Nithya Buddhi Dayaki Neerajakshi Sundari
Bhaktha Loka Palaki Kamitaartha Dayaki
meaning: O Sai, Goddess of Parthi, rule over our desires. O the bestower of boons, grant us the eternal wisdom. O the beautiful lotus-eyed one, the queen of the devotee's worldly lives, You bestow desired affluence on Your devotees.

title: Parthi Puri Sai Gopala Bala
lyrics:
Shirdi Puri Sai Gopala Bala [ Parthi Puri Sai ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Gopala
Saama (Bhajana) Gaana Priya Sai Gopala
meaning: Sing the glory of the protector of all beings, Lord Sai of Parthi, who is also Sai of Shirdi and Krishna, the Lord of Meera. Glory to the one who loves songs and Saama Veda.

title: Parthi Puri Vasa Sai Rama
lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilaya Sai Rama
Padmadala Netra Sai Rama
Pavana Naama Sai Rama
meaning: Chant the name of Sai Rama who resides in Parthi. Sing of Sai Rama of Prashanthi Nilayam. The Sai Rama - with eyes like Lotus petals. Chant the blessed name - Sai Rama.

title: Parthi Purisham Sai Ganesham
lyrics:
Pranavakaram Sai Ganesham
Vighna Vinasham Sai Ganesham
Vishwadharam Sai Ganesham
Mooshika  Vahana Sai Ganesham
Vamana Roopam Sai Ganesham
Vishwa Swaroopam Sai Ganesham
Sai Ganesham Sai Ganesham (4)
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is verily Lord Ganesha, whose vehicle is the mouse. He is the source of the primeval sound of creation, removes all obstacles, supports the entire world and His form is both diminutive and as gigantic as the universe.

title: Parthi Vihara Paapa Vidhura
lyrics:
Pavana Charana Sai Narayana 
Allah Tum Ho Yeshu Tum Ho
Sab Ka Malik Sai Tum Ho
Buddha Zohrashtra Nanak Tum Ho
Tum Ho Baba Antaryami 
Sab Bhakton Ke Palanhaarey 
Kaliyuga Avatara Sai Narayana
meaning: O Lord Sai who resides at Parthi, the very surrender to Thy Feet destroys our sins. You are verily Narayana, Allah, Jesus, Buddha, Zoharashtra and Guru Nanak. You are the omnicient Lord who incarnated in this Kali age to protect all devotees.

title: Parthi Vihara Sai Hamara
lyrics:
Apna Banaloon Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Mata Naasti Pitha Naasti Naasti Bandhu Sakha 
Apna Banaloon Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai of Puttaparthi, please be ours! Relationships like mother, father, and friends are illusory; only the relationship with God is real. Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram.

title: Parthipuri Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
lyrics:
Prashanti Nilaya Prashanthi Niketana
Prema Sai Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
Parabrahma Gurudev Parama Jyothi Gurudev
Shirdi Pureesha Parthi Pureesha
Sathya Sai Gurudev Puttaparthipuri Gurudev
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi and Shirdi residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, is the loving teacher (Guru) and the supreme creator with divine effulgence.

title: Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Mukthi Gajanana
Sura Muni Sevitha Shakthi Gajanana
Bala Gajanana Paahi Gajanana
Mukthi Gajanana Shakthi Gajanana
Sura Muni Sevitha Sai Gajanana
meaning: Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvathi, is the personification of the life-force. He uses a mouse as conveyance, is worshipped by the sages and divine beings. He protects, and grants liberation.

title: Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
lyrics:
Pashupathi Nandana Niranjana [ Parvathi Nandana ... ]
Paahi Prabho Maam Paahi Prasanna
Girija Nandana Shubhanana
meaning: O the elephenat-faced Lord Ganesha, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi, O the pleasant-faced Lord of all beings, kindly shower Your grace and protect us. You are the beloved son of Mother Girija who confers auspiciousness.

title: Parvathi Shankari Girija Shankari
lyrics:
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (2)
Hey Jagadeeshwari Parthi Pureeshwari
Sai Shankari Namostuthey (Sathya) (3)
meaning: Prostrations to Mother Parvathi, daughter of the King of mountains, Himavan, and the consort of Lord Shankara (Shiva). I bow down to Thee, O Mother Sai, You are the Mother of the World, residing in Puttaparthi.

title: Parvathi Shankari Uma Maheshwari
lyrics:
Puttapartheeshwari Sai Maheshwari [ Parvathi Shankari ... ]
Sai Shiva Shankari Shiva Kameshwari
Shaileshwari Amba Paahi Maam
Akhilandeshwari Raksha Maam
meaning: O Mother Parvathi, consort of Lord Shiva, and Goddess of the mountains, please protect and guard me. You are none other than Lord Sai of Parthi and the Mother of the Universe.

title: Parvathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Surya Koti Sama Prabha
Jaya Shubha Dayaka Vishwa Vidhata
Parameshwara Sutha (Parthi Pureeshwara) Palaya Maam
meaning: Chant the name of darling son of Parvathi - Lord Gajanana, whose face shines with the effulgence of a million suns. Victory to the bestower of auspiciousness, who grants boons to all the world's denizens. The darling son of the Supreme Lord who is verily Lord Sai, protect me and grant me spiritual knowledge.

title: Parvathi Tanaya Gajanana
lyrics:
Siddhi Vinayaka Gajavadana [ Parvathi Tanaya ... ]
Mooshika Vahana Gajavadana
Suramuni Sevitha Tava Charana
meaning: Glory to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi. He is the bestower of all powers and has the mouse Mooshika as His vehicle. He is worshipped and served by the pious and the righteous. We bow at Thy lotus feet, O Lord Ganesha.

title: Parvathi Tanaya Siddhi Vinayaka
lyrics:
Mangala Dayaka Deva
Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh Jai Ganesh
Sindhura Vadana Prathama Vandana
Alaka Niranjana Mooshika Vahana
Pashankusha Dhara Shambho Nandana [ Mangala Dayaka ... ]
meaning: Victory to the auspicious conferring Lord Ganesha, the son of Mother Parvathi. He is the elephant-faced one to whom the foremost prayers are offered. He is the attributeless and blemishless one who has the Mouse (represents the darkness of ignorance) as His vehicle. He holds the noose and the hook and is the son of Lord Shiva.

title: Pashupathi Natha Nageshwara
lyrics:
Hara Hara Bham Bham Shiva Shankara
Parvathi Pathey Maheshwara
Lingodhbhavakara Lingeshwara
Partheeshwara Sai Parameshwara
meaning: Chant the names of Lord of all beings, Lord Shiva, the one who drapes the cobra around his neck. Glory to Lord Shankara, bestower of auspiciousness, who is the Supreme Lord of Parvathi. He is the Supreme Lord Sai of Parthi, the one who brings out the Linga.

title: Pashupathi Tanaya Bala Gajanana
lyrics:
Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Bala Gajanana
Vidya Buddhi Pradatha
Mangala Kara Hey Mangala Kara Hey
Sundara Sai Ganesha Ganesha
meaning: Chant the name of the darling son of Lord Shiva (Pashupathi), the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the destroyer of obstacles. O Son of Lord Shiva, You are the bestower of wisdom (spiritual and intellectual). Chant the name of the charming Lord Sai Ganesha, who grants auspiciousness.

title: Pathri ni Umareta Shirdi Sai
lyrics:
Shiva no Keshin Shirdi Sai [ Pathri ... ]
Shiva to Parvathi ga Darshan Atae
Devagiri Amma ga Haha to Natta

Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai Sai Baba (2)
Sai Baba (2)
meaning: Glory to Thee Lord Shirdi Sai born in Pathri. You are the reincarnation of Lord Shiva. Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi, please bestow us with Your Divine Vision as you did with Devagiri Amma.

title: Patitha Pavana Ram
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Pavana Naam Taraka Naam Paapa Vimochana Ram [ Patitha Pavana ... ]
Danava Bhanjana Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram [ Pavana Naam ... ]
meaning: Chant the pure and sacred name of Lord Sai Ram of Parthi, the sacred name that is the Saviour of the fallen, remover of all sins. Oh Lord Rama! Oh Prince of King Dasharatha! You are the destroyer of demonic qualities.

title: Pavana Pavana Sai Naam
lyrics:
Bhajo Nirantara Sai Ram
Bhakthi Bhaava Se Bhajana Sunao
Guru (Sai) Charanon Mey Dhyana Lagao
meaning: Always worship the pure and sacred name of Lord Sai. Chant the glory of the Lord with full devotion. Meditate on the Lotus feet of the divine master and guide, Lord Sai.

title: Pavana Rama Patitha Pavana Rama
lyrics:
Pavana Rama Janaki Jeevana Rama
Mohana Krishna Garuda Vahana Krishna
Mohana Krishna Sri Jagan Mohana Krishna
meaning: The holy and sanctified name of Lord Ram, Lord of Janaki, protects the fallen. Lord Krishna, whose conveyance is the eagle, enchants the whole universe.

title: Pavana Sutha Hanuman Ki Jai
lyrics:
Sita Pathi (Siyavar) Ramachandra Ki Jai [ Pavana Sutha ... ]
Parakrama Anjaneya Ki Jai (2)
Parthi Puri Sai Nath Ki Jai (2)
meaning: Victory to Hanuman, the son of the wind God, victory to the chosen Lord of Sita, Lord Ram, victory to the mighty son of Anjana Devi, victory to the Lord of Parthi, Sai Nath.

title: Pavana Sutha Hanumantha
lyrics:
Pavana Charitha Bhagawantha
Rama Rama Ram Sada Japantha
Rama Rama Rama Rama Sada Japantha
Ati Balavanta Hey Gunavanta
meaning: We pray to Hanumantha, the son of Pavana (God of Wind). The Divine one who has a Sacred History. He is one with Extraordinary strength, virtuous and given to chanting the name of Rama incessantly.

title: Pazhani Muruga Vel Muruga
lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Vel Muruga
Ganapathi Sodara Vel Muruga
Karthikeya Vel Muruga
Subrahmanya Vel Muruga
Sri Sai Natha Vel Muruga

Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Haro Hara Haro Hara Hara Haro Hara
meaning: We surrender to You Lord Muruga, the Lord of Pazhani Hills, the one who holds the 'Vel' (spear), the brother of Lord Ganesha and the one born to the Krithika mothers. You are verily Lord Sai. Destroy all our difficulties and afflictions, O Lord.

title: Peace be still
lyrics:
Thy Will is done in me this day
Peace be still, Peace be still

Thy Will is done in me this day
Peace be still, Peace be still

Peace be still, and let your life be mine
Peace be still, stop wasting time
Peace be still, trust I am in you
Peace be still, to one I am the Truth [ Thy Will ... ]

Peace be still, and know that I am God
Peace be still, wait for my nod
Peace be still, my child right now you’re free
Peace be still, be glad there’s only me [ Thy Will ... ]

Peace be still, it’s time for us to merge 
Peace be still, to follow that inner urge
Peace be still, give the rest to me
Peace be still, for you will finally see [ Thy Will ... ]

Peace be still I am letting go (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I’m surrendering (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am emptying (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am listening (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am trusting (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I’m obeying (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am being blessed (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am pouring forth (3x) Om Peace Om
Peace be still I am fulfilled (3x) Om Peace Om

title: Peace I leave with you
lyrics:
My Peace I give unto you
Not as the world giveth do I give unto you
My Peace I leave with you
 
Peace I leave with you
My Peace I give unto you
Not as the world giveth do I give unto you
My Peace I leave with you
 
Let not your heart be troubled
Never be afraid
Follow Me alone hear what I’ve to say
Let not your heart be troubled
Know that I AM near
You are One with Me
In Truth I AM here
 
Peace I leave with you
My Peace I give unto you
Not as the world giveth do I give unto you
My Peace I leave with you
 
Let your hearts be free look to Me alone
You are My Dearest you are My Very Own
Be not afraid know You are My Child
Come unto My Peace..Rest in Me for just awhile
 
Peace I leave with you
My Peace I give unto you
Not as the world giveth do I give unto you
My Peace I leave with you

title: Peace Shanthi Peace On Earth
lyrics:
Shanthi, Shanthi, Peace On Earth
Shiva, Shiva Find Our Hearts
Shiva Shiva Light The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba Find Our Hearts
Sai Baba Light The Spark Of Love
Shiva, Shiva Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba, Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Shiva, Shiva Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love
Sai Baba, Light The Spark, The Spark Of Love

title: Peace, Peace, Peace
lyrics:
Peace in me
Brings Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in my family
Then Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in our community
Brings Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace in our country
Then Peace, Peace, Peace
Peace on Earth
Peace, Peace, Peace
For all the universe

title: Permiteme poner a tus Pies
lyrics:
Mi amor, mi amor y devocion, Swami
Tu sabes que eres Todo para mi
Y mi existir te lo debo solo a Ti
Oh Swami!
Sosten mi barca al sucumbir
en el mar de la Ilusion
Quiero ver en todo solo a Ti
y amar sin distinguir
Oh Swami!
meaning: Allow me to surrender my love and devotion at Your Feet. You know that You are everything for me and I owe my whole existence only to You. Oh Swami! Hold my boat so it doesn't sink in the Sea of Illusion. I want to see only You in everything and love all without distinction. Oh Swami!

title: Pibare Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare
title2: Pibare Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare Rama Rasam
lyrics:
Janana Marana Bhaya Shoka Viduram
Sakala Shastra Nigamagama Saram(2)
Bhajarey Rama Rasam Rasane Pibare Rama Rasam
meaning: Drinking in the nectar of Lord Rama's name by chanting His name helps us escape from the sorrowful cycle of birth and death. His name is the essence of all religious texts.

title: Please and Thank you
title2: Please and Thank you are two words,

title: Poojinthamu Mana Sai Nee Jaya
title2: Poojinthamu Mana Sai Nee Jaya Sai Nee Sarveshunee Jagadeeshunee
lyrics:
Chithravathi Teeramu Parama Pavanamu
Veda Vedanthudaina Sai Mahaatmuni
Nammina Bhakthula Baadala Maapaga
Velasiyunde Parthi Sayeeshuni Maheshwaru Nee Parathparu Nee Krupakaru Nee [ Poojinthamu … Jagadeeshunee ]

Maruvamalya Roja Haaramulane Vesi
Dhoopa Deepamulane Veleginche Swami Ki
Pancha Bhakshana Naivedyamulane Chesi
Palinchi Broche Sai Nathu Nee Shirdi Vasu Nee Partheeshu Nee Sathya Swami Nee [ Poojinthamu … Jagadeeshunee ]

Bhaktha Vatsalanee Paadame Gatiyani
Bhajanalu Chesi Bhakthi Shraddhalato
Vandanamulu Chesi Varamulane Vedi
Mangalamulu Padi Jaya Harathi Mangala Harathi Mutyaala Harathi Karpoora Harathi [ Poojinthamu … Jagadeeshunee ]
alt_lyrics:
Poojintumu Mana Sai Nee Jaya Sai Nee Sarveshunee Jagadeeshunee

Chithravathi Teeramu Parama Pavanamu
Veda Vedanthudaina Sai Mahaatmuni
Nammina Bhakthula Baadalu Maapaga
Velasiyunde Parthi Sayeeshuni Maheshwaru Nee Parathparu Nee Krupakaru Nee [ Poojintumu … Jagadeeshunee ]

Maruvamalli Roja Haaramulane Chesi
Dhoopa Deepamulane Veleginche Swami Ki
Pancha Bhakshana Naivedyamulane Chesi
Palinchi Broche Sai Nathu Nee Shirdi Vasu Nee Partheeshu Nee Sathya Sai Nee [ Poojintumu … Jagadeeshunee ]

Bhaktha Vatsalanee Paadame Gatiyani
Bhajanalu Chesi Bhakthi Shraddhalato
Vandanamulu Chesi Varamulane Vedi
Mangalamulu Padi Jaya Aarathi Mangala Harathi Mutyaala Harathi Karpoora Harathi [ Poojintumu … Jagadeeshunee ]
meaning:
We offer our prayers to our Lord Sai, the Lord of all, the Lord of the Universe.

1. The supremely sacred banks of river Chitravathi were sanctified by the great Supreme Soul Sai, who is the source of Vedas and Vedic Philosphy (Vedanta); He removes the afflictions of all those who believe in Him. He is the most compassionate Supreme Being who incarnated in Puttaparti as Sai and as Maheshwara, the greatest of the Lords.

2. By making the garlands with Maruva (fragrant green leaf), Jasmine and Rose, by lighting the lamps and incense sticks, by offering the Panch-Bhakshan (5 types of sacred food), we pray to the One, who protects us - Lord Sai, the dweller of Shirdi and Parti.

3. The devotees consider Your divine lotus feet as refuge. By singing devotional songs with devotion and concentration, by offering salutations and praying for boons (blessings), we sing the Arathi which is most auspicious, victorious, pearly and perform the ritual with camphor.

title: Poorana Paramananda Swaroopa
lyrics:
Deena Natha Dayala Swaroopa [ Poorana Paramananda ... ]
Sai Natha Krupala Swaroopa
Bholey Natha Vishala Swaroopa
meaning: Lord Sai is the personification of complete and eternal bliss. Chant the name of the all-merciful and omnipresent Lord of the destitute, Lord Shiva. Lord Sai is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Poorna Brahma Avatara Sai
lyrics:
Sakala Jagat Aadhara Sai [ Poorna Brahma ]
Allah Yesu Rama Sai
Buddha Mahavir Nanak Sai
Hum Bhakthon Ke Baba Sai
Sarva Dharma Avatara Sai
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, the incarnation of the Supreme Lord. He is the sustainer of all the worlds. Sai is one with Allah, Jesus, Rama, Buddha, Mahavira and Guru Nanak. He is the beloved of us devotees. Lord Sai has incarnated to preach the oneness of all religions.

title: Poornavatara Sai Guru Deva
lyrics:
Sathya Sayeesha Paramananda
Prema Sai Bhagawan
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Parama Purusha Prabhu Sri Sai Natha
Purushottama Hey Parthi Pureesha
Prema Sai Bhagawan [ Sathya Sai ... ]
meaning: Pray to the Divine Preceptor, the complete Avatar, Sai. He bestows divine bliss on His devotees. He is the very embodiment of Divine Love. Lord Sathya Sai is none other than the Supreme Lord, who took the form as the perfect human. He will incarnate again as Lord Prema Sai.

title: Power of the Universe
title2: Power of the universe bring my soul to light
lyrics:
Awaken my heart, teach me who I am
I am God (3x)
 
Lord living in my heart let me know the truth
Let illusion disappear, reveal the true reality
I am God (3x)
 
Lord I wait for You to place this knowledge in my hands
I will awaken from this dream and know who I am
I am God (4x)

title: Prabho Vega Rava Prema Swaroopa
lyrics:
Sharananidhe Swami Karunimpa Vemi [ Prabhu Vega ... ]
Narayana Hari Govinda Gopala
Murali Madhava Manusha Bandhava
meaning: O Lord, the embodiment of Love, please come soon. We surrender to you, O Narayana, Hari and Govinda. You are the protector. Please come and save us.

title: Prabhu Leela Prabhu Mahima
lyrics:
Kali Avatara Sai Narayana
Prabhu Dhama Parama Dhama
Japorey Japo Mana Sai Naama
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Rama
alt_lyrics:
Prabhu Leela Prabhu Mahima
Kali Avatara Hari Narayana
Prabhu Dhama Parama Dhama
Chalore Chal Mana Parthi Dhama
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Sai Rama
meaning: Lord Sai Narayana, the incarnation of Kali age is the compassionate Lord who works His miracles as part of the divine play. Lord Sai's abode is Supremely sacred. O Mind, chant the name of Lord Sai. Victory to Thee, O Lord Sai Rama.

title: Prabhu Ramachandra Ke Dootha Hanumantha
title2: Prabhu Ramachandra Ke Dootha Hanumantha Anjaneya
lyrics:
Hanumantha Hanumantha Hanumantha Anjaneya
Hey Pavan Putra Hanumantha Balabheema Anjaneya
Balabheema Balabheema Balabheema Anjaneya
meaning: Lord Hanumantha Oh! Anjaneya, Son of Anjana Devi and Pavana (Wind God); The messenger of Lord Ramachandra and one of Mighty Strength.

title: Prabhu Tum Antaryami Sai
lyrics:
Daya Karo Daya Karo Hey Swami [ Prabhu Tum ... ]
Deena Dayala Hey Sayeeshwara
Parama Krupala Jaya Partheeshwara [ Daya Karo ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, the inner motivator of all, please show mercy on us. You are Protector of the meek. Victory to the very compassionate Lord of Parthi. Shower Your Grace on us, O Lord.

title: Prabhu Vara Sai Vishwanatha
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Hey Jagannatha [ Prabhu Vara ... ]
Tum Ho Mata Tum Ho Pitha
Tum Ho Sarva Sambuddha Vidhata
Tava Pada Sharanam Anatha Natha
Daasa Tumharo Deena Natha
meaning: Have mercy, O Lord Sai, the Lord of the Universe, our mother, father and bestower of knowledge. We take refuge at Your feet, which protect the helpless and the forsaken.

title: Praise Be To Baba
title2: Praise be to (Baba), He taught me how to pray,
lyrics:
He taught my heart to love and a song to sing along the way.
Praise be to (Baba), now we have just begun,
For He's blessed us with the light that there is only one.
(substitute Jesus...Allah....Buddha...Krishna)

title: Praise be to Thee O Lord
title2: Praise be to Thee O Lord
lyrics:
From whom all blessings flow
 
All blessings are flowing from God alone (3x)
Praise be to Thee O Lord
 
Praise be to Thee O Lord
From whom all blessings flow
 
All blessings are flowing from God alone (3x)
PRAISE BE TO THE LORD
 
Thank You My Lord My God
Thank You My All My Everything
Thank You My Lord My God
My Lord Thank You My God
 
Thank You My Lord My God
Thank You My All My Everything
Thank You My Lord My God
My Lord Thank You My God
My Lord Thank You My God
PRAISE BE TO THE LORD

title: Praise God, on all He showers grace
title2: Praise God, on all He showers grace
lyrics:
We are His children, every race
 He comes to any name we call
 He is the love within us all
 Praise Jesus, Buddha, any name
 Allah, Sai - they're all the same
 He lives in You, He lives in me
 Praise one and all, God's family
 Praise the Lord in song, all the world over
 Make a joyful noise, come to Him with glad hearts singing
 He is Love, Love without end
 Praise the Lord in song, all the world over
 Thank the Lord within your heart, bless His holy name
 He is so good, His mercy everlasting
 God is Truth, Truth without end
 God is Love, Love without end

title: Praise Him
lyrics:
Praise Him, praise the Lord
He’s come again to live among men
He’s come again to uplift them
So praise Him, praise the Lord
Praise Him, praise the Lord
 
He won’t fail to lead us to the light
He’ll lead us all through this dark night
So praise Him, praise the Lord
Praise Him, praise the Lord
 
He came before as Rama avatar
Returned once more as Krishna avatar
So praise Him, praise the Lord
Praise Him, praise the Lord
 
Sathya Sai avatar of love
Sai Baba embodiment of love
Yes, praise Him, praise the Lord
Praise Him, praise the Lord (4x)

title: Praise my teacher divine
title2: Praise my teacher divine, the blessed and holy Sai
lyrics:
Sing His praises on high, the blessed and holy Lord Sai
 Praise my teacher divine, the blessed and holy Sai
 Creator, Protector, Destroyer of darkness,
 the blessed and holy Lord Sai
 Mother and father and teacher divine,
 the blessed and holy Lord Sai

title: Praise Sai Ram
title2: Praise Sai Ram, praise Sai Ram
lyrics:
Praise to You, Lord Sai Ram
 Sing out: praise to You, Lord Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Refuge for those in need
 In time of trouble, our prayers You heed
 You are the Form of Love Divine
 You are the Savior of all mankind
 Praise to Sathya Sai, glory to His name
 Glory to Sai Baba, Lord of all
 Glory to Sai Baba, Lord of all
 He is the hope of the hopeless heart
 Help for the helpless, Lord of Love
 His is the Name, the Name Divine
 Sathya Sai Baba, Lord sublime

title: Praise the Lord, Sathya Sai
title2: Praise the Lord, Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
lyrics:
Grant us peace, perfect peace, courage in every endeavor
 Look in your heart and see His face, and His Grace forever
 Praise the Lord Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
 God of Love, God of Love, bless and keep us forever
 Grant us peace, perfect peace, courage in every endeavor
 Look in your heart and see His face, and His Grace forever
 Praise the Lord Sathya Sai, bless and keep us forever
 God of Love, God of Love fill my heart with Your pleasure
 Let me share, let me care, let me love without measure
 Father of Light, let me be like You, kind and true forever
 God of Love, God of Love, love me now and forever
 God of Light, God of Light, hold my life in Your keeping
 Let me find peace of mind, guard me waking and sleeping
 Father of Light, guide me every day, all the way forever
 God of Light, God of Light, lead me onward forever

title: Praise To The Guru
title2: Praise to the Guru a channel of love
lyrics:
Dispeller of darkness embodiment of
God's ever present outstretched hands
 
Praise to the Guru, Jai Guru Jai
Praise to the Guru, Jai Guru Jai

title: Pranam Sweekar Karo Sai Mahadeva
lyrics:
Sai Mahadeva Sai Mahadeva [ Pranam Sweekar ... ]
Allah Eshwar Yesu Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai
Natana Sutradhari Jagannatha Sai [ Sai Mahadeva ... ]
meaning: Accept our salutations O Sai, the Lord of Gods, You are verily the Supreme One, be it Allah, Eshwar, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira. You are the supreme Director and Lord of the world.

title: Pranamami Sri Durge Sai Narayani
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Devi Bhavani [ Pranamami Sri ... ]
Jaya Mahishasura Samhaarini
Mahamaya Dukha Haarini
meaning: We offer our obeisance to You, Mother Durga (Sister of Vishnu), Jagad Ambe (the Mother of the Universe) and Devi Bhavani, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death, the destroyer of the demon Mahishasura (ego) and the remover of miseries and the vast illusion or Maya (ignorance).

title: Pranamamyaham Gananayakam
lyrics:
Pranamamyaham Gowri Sutham
Pranamamyaham Shiva Nandanam
Pranamamyaham Sri Prathama Gurum
Pranamamyaham Karunakaram
meaning: We offer ourselves at the Lotus Feet of Lord Ganesha. Ganesha is the son of Mother Gowri (Parvathi) and Lord Shiva. We first worship Lord Ganesha, as He is the embodiment of compassion.

title: Pranams to the Mystic Sai
title2: Pranams to the Mystic Sai Baba
lyrics:
Pranams to Shirdi Sai
A fakir and a sufi
His life became the way
Reveals Himself as a God
He showed that all forms are one
Pranams to the Mystic Sai Baba
Pranams to Shirdi Sai
 
I am Rama, I am Krishna, I am Vittala
I am Datta, I am Lakshmi, Narayana
All names and forms are one 
All names and forms are one
All name and forms are one
Said the sage of Shirdi Sai Baba
 
I Muslim, I am Hindu, I am all faiths
I am Allah, I am Sathya Narayana
All names and forms are one 
All names and forms are one
All names and forms are one
Said the sage of Shirdi Sai Baba

title: Pranava Swaroopa Hari Om Sai
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Om
Sayeeshwaraya Hari Om (Sathya)
Yadavaya Madhavaya Govindaya Namah Om
Paramatma Roopaya Hari Om
Hari Om Hari Om [ Sayeeshwaraya ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the very embodiment of the Primordial sound 'Om'. You are Lord Narayana, the indweller of all beings. You are Lord Krishna of the Yadava clan. You are the protector of all beings, Govinda. You are the embodiment of the Supreme soul. We pay our obeisance to You, O Lord Sai.

title: Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana Vighna
title2: Pranava Swaroopa Paahi Gajanana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
lyrics:
Eka Dantha Hey Gunavanta Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Shritha Jana Palana Sindhura Vadana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
Mahadeva Shiva Gowri Nandana Vighna Nasha Vinayaka
meaning: Glory to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, who is the embodiment of the primordial sound 'Om', destroyer of impediments in the path of seekers, one without any leader, the single tusked one who is the storehouse of sacred qualities, the protector of those who seek His refuge, the son of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri.

title: Pranavakaara Parabrahma
lyrics:
Parishuddhatma Yesu Prabhu
Sarva Shakthimaya Bismillah
Sarvaadhara Ahura Mazda
Sarvamaya Sathya Sayeesha
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
meaning: I surrender myself to the Cosmic Lord, the source of primordial sound, Jesus, the pure and sacred soul, Bismillah, the all powerful one, Ahura Mazda, the basis for everything in this world, the omnipresent Lord Sathya Sai and Lord Buddha.

title: Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Prasanna
title2: Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Prasanna Ho Sathya Sai Ram
lyrics:
Krupa Karo Prabhu Krupa Karo Prabhu Krupa Karo Sathya Sai Ram
Daya Karo Prabhu Daya Karo Prabhu Daya Karo Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Rama! Be pleased with us and shower Your grace and mercy on us.

title: Prasanna Ho Sathya Sai Ganesha
lyrics:
Prathama Poojita Vighna Vinasha [ Prasanna Ho ... ]
Pashankusha Dhara Parama Pavitra
Mooshika  Vahana Gajanana [ Prasanna Ho ... Vighna Vinasha ]
Lambodhara He Shambhu Kumara
Ambika Tanaya Gajanana
meaning: At the outset, worship Lord Ganesha to remove all obstacles. The supremely sacred Lord uses a mouse as conveyance and carries the symbolic rope and weapon in His hands. He is the pot-bellied son of Mother Ambika (Parvathi). Lord Sathya Sai is none other than Lord Ganesha.

title: Prashanthi Nilaya Ram Hey Parthi
title2: Prashanthi Nilaya Ram Hey Parthi Puri Bhagawan
lyrics:
Ahalyodharaka Ram Daasharathey Raghu Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Ram Ram Jaya Ram
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Rama of Puttaparthi, the Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam. Glory to the beloved Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama, the saviour of Ahalya. Victory to Thee, O Lord Sai Rama of Prashanthi, salutations to You.

title: Prashanthi Nilaya Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Rama Rama Ram
Krishna Narayana Rama Rama Ram
Sri Ranga Panduranga Rama Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Rama incessantly. He is the same as Lord Narayana who incarnated as Krishna and Panduranga. He is none other than Lord Sai residing in Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Prashanthi Nilayam Paramanin Alayam
lyrics:
Daiva Swaroopanin Devalayam
Kali Yuga Devanin Karunalayam
Manavar Mohikkum Mantralayam
Paapa Vimochanin Charanalayam (Janma)
meaning: Prashanthi Nilayam is the abode of Parabrahman (Supreme Lord). It is the temple of the one with the Divine Form, of the avatar of the Kali age, who showers compassion on all. It is the enchanting divine abode for all humans, the temple of Love, where the sins of His devotees are washed away at the Lotus Feet.

title: Prashanthi Sai Prashanthi Baba
lyrics:
Shivaya Shivaya Namah Shivaya (2)
Shirdi Sai Krishna Kanhayi
Namo Namo Sai Bhajo Bhajo Sai
Sai Namo Namo Sai Namo Namo
Sai Namo Namo Sainatha
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam at Parthi. He is the very embodiment of Lord Shiva and Lord Krishna. Worship and sing the Holy name of Sai who is also the Lord of Shirdi.

title: Prathah Smaranam Sri Guru Charanam
lyrics:
Sayeesha Charanam Sri Guru Charanam [ Prathah Smaranam ... ]
Brahmananda Pradayaka Charanam
Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha Charanam
meaning: Meditate on the Lotus Feet of the Guru (Lord Sai) in the early hours of dawn. Meditate on the holy feet of the Sadguru Sayeesha, the dispeller of ignorance. Surrender to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai, who confers infinite happiness and heavenly bliss. We take refuge at your Lotus Feet, Oh Sainatha.

title: Prathah Smaranam Sri Ramam
lyrics:
Munijana Sevitha Sri Ramam [ Prathah Smaranam ... ]
Ananda Dayaka Sri Ramam
Moksha Pradayaka Sri Ramam
Bhaja Mana Sai Ramam Ramam
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama in the dawn, the Lord who is worshipped by the sages and noble souls, who bestows happiness and liberation. Chant the name of Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Prathah Smaranam Surya Charanam
lyrics:
Bhanu Kiranam Sada Smaranam
Malinya Haranam Jyothi Bharanam
Aditya Madhuram Shanthi Sadanam
meaning: In the early morning, remember and worship the feet of Surya, the Sun God, who shines upon us His brilliant rays. He swiftly removes the blanket of darkness and sweetly provides light that illuminates our world, creating an abode of Divine Peace.

title: Prathama Bhajoon Mein Ganapathi Sai
lyrics:
Jai Jai Jai Jai Sai
Buddhi Pradayaka Hey Gana Nayaka
Ganapathi Sai Hey Sukha Dayi [ Jai Jai ... ]
meaning: Let us offer our primary worship to Lord Ganesha, the Lord of the demi-gods, the bestower of intellect and goodness. Salutations to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Ganesha.

title: Prathama Ganapathi Pranamamyaham
lyrics:
Parvathi Priya Sutha Bhajamyaham
Ashvatha Moola Vasa Devadi Deva
Parthi Vinayaka Paahi Gajanana
Bhaktha Priyam Bhava Bhaya Nashanam
Vande Aham Gana Nayakam
alt_lyrics:
Prathama Ganapathim Pranamamyaham
Parvathi Priya Sutha Bhajamyaham
Ashvatha Moola Vasa Devadi Deva
Parthi Vinayaka Paahi Gajanana
Bhaktha Priyam Bhava Bhaya Nashanam
Vande Aham Gana Nayakam
meaning: Let us offer our primary worship and sing the praises of Lord Ganesha, the beloved son of Mother Parvathi. He is the source of all and the Lord of Lords. He is verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi who protects His devotees. He protects and removes their worldly fears and obstacles. Salutations to the Lord of the Ganas.

title: Prathama Namana Gana Nayaka
lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka
Parthi Ganesha Shubha Dayaka [ Prathama Namana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Hey Gananayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Vinayaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Prashanthi Dayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Gananayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Vinayaka
Sharana Namostuthey Shubha Dayaka
meaning: At the break of dawn, first and foremost, remember to worship Lord Ganesha. He destroys obstacles, bestows good luck, and who is none other than Sai who resides in Parthi. Worship and take refuge in Lord Ganesh, who imparts intelligence, eternal peace and good fortune.

title: Prathama Poojya Deva Gajanana
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gajanana [ Prathama Poojya ... ]
Parvathi Nandana Bala Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Sai Gajanana
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika Vahana
Mangala Kara Hey Sai Gajanana
meaning: Offer worship primarily to Lord Ganesha, the elephant-faced one. He is verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi. Glory to Lord Ganesha, the son of Mother Parvathi, the embodiment of the Pranava (Om). He destroys illusion and bestows good fortune.

title: Prathama Sharana Gananayaka
lyrics:
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka
Parthi Pureeshwara Shubha Dayaka [ Prathama Sharana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Hey Gananayaka
Buddhi Pradayaka Vinayaka
Mangala Kara Hey Prashanthi Dayaka
Parvathi Tanaya Vinayak
Prathah Smaranam Vinayaka [ Parthi Pureeshwara ... ]
meaning: We offer first obeisance and surrender to the Lord of ganaas (demigods), Lord Ganesha. He is the bestower of auspiciousness, and none other than the Lord of Parthi. He confers knowledge and intelligence, the auspicious Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Parvathi.

title: Prathama Sharana Gananayaka Om
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Siddhi Vinayaka [ Prathama Sharana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Mooshika Vahana Sai Gajanana
meaning: Let us pay our foremost obeisance and surrender to the Lord of the divine forces, Lord Vinayaka. He destroys obstacles and assures success. He who rides a mouse as a vehicle, grants knowledge and pure intellect, Lord Sai is His embodiment.

title: Prathama Vandana Gananatha
lyrics:
Gajavadana Jaya Gananatha [ Prathama Vandana ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
meaning: Our first prayers to the Lord of the ganaas, the elephant-faced Lord Ganesh who confers knowledge and intelligence, the remover of obstacles in the spiritual path, the One who is praised and adored by the wise and saintly.

title: Prathama Vandana Gowri Nandana
lyrics:
Hey Shiva Nandana Paahi Gajanana [ Prathama Vandana ... ]
Eka Dantha Gunavanta Vinayaka
Vighna Harana Shubha Mangala Charana
Pranava Swaroopa Paahi ( Sai ) Gajanana
meaning: Foremost obeisance to Lord Ganesh, the beloved Prince of Lord Shiva and Mother Gowri. Oh Lord Sai Gajanana, the single-tusked One of noble character, You are the remover of obstacles, the bestower of auspiciousness. We bow to You, the embodiment of Pranava (Omkar).

title: Prathama Vandanam Ganapathi Devam
lyrics:
Nithyam Bhajarey Vinayakam (2)
Pranavakaram Parvathi Sutham
Sri Sai Natham Gananatham [ Nithyam Bhajarey ... ]
meaning: Offer your first prayer (obeisance) to Lord Ganapathi (Ganesha), chant incessantly the name of Vinayaka. He is the embodiment of Omkara (Pranava, the primordial sound) and the beloved son of Mother Parvathi. He is none other than our Lord Sainatha.

title: Precious Lord, precious Lord
lyrics:
You fill my heart with happiness (1X)
 You fill my soul with joy and bliss (1X)
 Peace and love, joy and bliss (1X)
 You fill my heart with happiness (1X)

title: Precious Sai
lyrics:
My Sai
Precious Sai

title: Prem Bhakthi Jagao Man Mey
lyrics:
Aao Merey Hruday Mey Baba
Tum Ho Deena Janon Ke Baba
Tum Ho Bhaktha Janon Ke Sai [ Aao Merey ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Baba! Welcome to my heart and please awake within me the love and devotion for Thee. You are the support of those who are meek. You are the dear Sai of the devoted.

title: Prem Eshwar Hai Eshwar Prem
title2: Prem Eshwar Hai Eshwar Prem Hai
lyrics:
Har Dhadkan Mey Sai Sama Hai Eshwar Prem Hai [ Prem Eshwar ... ]
Ram Rahim Krishna Karim
Zohrashtra Yesu Nanak
Koi Bhi Naam Japorey Manuva Eshwar Prem Hai (Manuva)
meaning: God is Love; Love is God. Lord Sai is the indweller of the heart and is the sustainer of each heart beat, which repeats that God is Love. Oh Mind! worship any name of the Lord - Rama or Krishna, Rahim, Zohrashtra, Jesus or Nanak, as all names and forms are love and only love.

title: Prem Se Aao Prabhuji
lyrics:
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Sada Raho [ Prem Se ... ]
Nayana Mey Aao Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Nayana Mey ... ]
Nachath Nachath Nandalala [ Prem Se ... ]
Shravan Mey Aao Shirdeeshwara
Shirdeeshwara Puttapartheeshwara [ Shravana Mey ... ]
Saath Raho Sathya Sayeeshwara
meaning: O Lord, please come and decorate our heart with Your presence with Love. O Lord Narayana, let our eyes be filled with Your enchanting form as the dancing Nandalala (Krishna). O Sai, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, let our ears listen to absorbing stories of Your plays. May we ever remain absorbed in Your presence.

title: Prem Se Bolo Ek Baar
title2: Prem Se Bolo Ek Baar Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bolo Ram Sai Ram [ Prem Se ... ]
Madhura Manohara Ram
Hey Mohan Moorat Ram
Hey Karuna Sindhu Ram
Hey Raghupathi Raghava Ram
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram [ Bolo Ram ... ]
meaning: Chant the Holy name of Lord Sai Ram with love. Chant the name of Lord Rama, of the Raghu dynasty who is charming and pleasing, the ocean of mercy and the saviour of the miserable and fallen.

title: Prem Se Gao Mangala Naam
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Bolo Hari Naam
Prem Ke Sindho Deena Ke Bandho
Karunamaya Sai Nayanabhi Ram [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Prem Se Gao Mangala Naam
Govinda Gopala Bolo Radhey Shyam
Prem Ke Sindho Deena Ke Bandho
Karunamaya Sai Nayanabhi Ram [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: With love and devotion chant the auspicious name of the merciful and loving Lord Sai, who is an ocean of love and companion of the meek. Chant the names Govinda, Gopala and Hari. Chant the name of the most compassionate Lord Sai. Hail to Krishna, Ram and Sai Ram.

title: Prem Se Gao Pavana Naam
lyrics:
Rama Rama Raghu Nandana Rama [ Prem Se ... ]
Jaya Jaya Rama Jaya Raghu Rama
Jaya Sai Rama Jaya Sathya Naama
meaning: With love and devotion, sing the purifying and uplifting name of Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Victory to Lord Rama. Victory to Lord Sathya Sai Baba.

title: Prema Avatara Sai
lyrics:
Mahima Avatara Sai
Kali Yuga Avatara Sai
meaning: Pray to Sai, the incarnation of Love, Pray to Sai, the miraculous One Pray to Sai, the incarnation of the present Kali age.

title: Prema Muditha Man Se Kaho
title2: Prema Muditha Man Se Kaho (Rama Rama Ram) x3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Paapa Katey Dukha Mitey Lekey Rama Naam
Bhava Samudra Sukhada Naava Ek Rama Naam
Parama Shanthi Sukha Nidhana Divya Rama Naam
Niraadhaara Ko Aadhara Ek Rama Naam
Parama Gopya Parama Divya Mantra Rama Naam
Sant Hrudaya Sada Basath Ek Rama Naam
Mata Pitha Bandhu Sakha Sab Hi Rama Naam
Bhaktha Janara Jeevana Dhana Ek Rama Naam
(Rama Rama Ram) x3 Sri Rama Rama Ram
meaning: With the heart and mind full of love and devotion, recite the name of Lord Rama. Reciting the name of Lord Rama cuts down sins and miseries. It is the safe boat that helps to cross the ocean of life and death. So potent is Lord Rama's name that it brings eternal peace and bliss.
