It is the only support of those who have no support (destitute). So loving and so divine is Lord Rama's name that sages and saints always have only Lord Rama's name in their hearts. O Lord Rama, You are my Mother, Father, Relative, Friend, everything else. The only life-long treasure of the devotee is Your name. Chant the mantra 'Rama Rama Rama'.

title: Prema Sai Parthi Sai
lyrics:
Pavana Sai Parama Guru Sai [ Prema Sai ... ]
Mangala Kara Karuna Sai
Karuna Sai Karuna Sai [ Mangala Kara ... ]
Madhura Madhura Hrudaya Nivasi
Murali Gaana Vilola Sai
meaning: Sing the name of Sai who is the embodiment of Love, the inner purifier who is the Supreme Guru, who bestows auspiciousness and full of Grace. Sai is the sweetest indweller of our hearts. He is none other than Lord Krishna, the enchanter with the flute.

title: Prema Sudha Rasa Deejo Sai
lyrics:
Paramananda Sada Sukha Dayi [ Prema Sudha ... ]
Prashanthi Nilaya Dwarakamayi
Pavana Purusha Sadguru Sai
Deena Dayaghana Sri Raghurayi
meaning: O Lord Sai, give us the nectar of divine Love and bliss of the highest order. You are the most blissful one who confers endless joy. You are the Divine Preceptor of Dwarakamayi in Shirdi and Prashanthi Nilayam at Parthi. You are verily Lord Rama of the Raghu lineage who has unending compassion for the meek.

title: Prema Swaroopa I am Divine Love
title2: Prema Swaroopa I am Divine Love
lyrics:
Prema Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Prema Prema Prema Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om
 Sathya Swaroopa I am Divine Truth
 Sathya Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Sathya Sathya Sathya Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om
 Shanthi Swaroopa I am Divine Peace
 Shanthi Swaroopa Sai Ram
 Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om
 Prema Prema Prema Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om
 Sathya Sathya Sathya Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om
Shanthi Shanthi Shanthi Om
 Sat Chit Ananda Om

title: Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand
title2: Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagawan
lyrics:
Your will is my will, Your will is mine
 Your will is my will, Your will's divine
 My will is Your will, my will is Yours
 My will is Your will, our wills entwine
 Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagawan
 There's no place to go, there's nothing left to do,
 There's nothing left to see, there's no one left to be
 For Your will is my will, Your will is mine
 Your will is my will, Your will's divine
 Prema Swaroopa Prema Anand Prema Swaroopa Prema Bhagawan

title: Prema Swaroopini Janani Ma
lyrics:
Charana Namostuthey Sai Ma [ Prema Swaroopini ... ]
Jagadambe Krupakari Sai Ma
Karunamayi Janani Sai Ma
Tribhuvana Palini Sai Ma [ Charana Namostuthey ... ]
meaning: You are embodiment of Divine Love, O Sai, Mother of the Universe. Humble salutations at Your Holy Feet. Please have compassion for me, O Divine Mother of the three worlds.

title: Premamaya Bhagawan Sai Ram
lyrics:
Karunamaya Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
Hey Dukha Bhanjana Palanhaarey
Hey Leelamaya Apad Saharey
Sharan Mey Lelo Sai Rama Rama Rama Ram
meaning: Lord Sai Rama, You are the personification of Love and compassion, who destroys our miseries, who takes care of our troubles, Oh Lord, take us in Your fold. We surrender at Your Feet.

title: Premamayi Sai
lyrics:
Parabrahmamayi Sai
Anandamayi Sai
Paratatvamayi Sai
Niramayi Sai
Characharamayi Sai
Mayamayi Sai (Ati)
meaning: Lord Sai, Love personified, Sai, the Cosmic consciousness, Sai, who endows one with bliss, Sai, who preaches the ultimate and the highest Truth, Sai, who is blemishless, Sai, Present in moving and non - moving objects and creator of illusion (Maya) of this world.

title: Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai
title2: Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Ma Moksha Pradayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
alt_lyrics:
Premamayi Sai Ma Gnanamayi Sai Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Ma Sadananda Roopini Sai Ma
Parabrahma Roopini Sai Ma Tum Hi Moksha Pradayini Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the one who is suffused with love, wisdom and bliss. You are the very embodiment of Lord Shiva and Shakthi in one and ever remaining in a state of bliss. You are supreme consciousness incarnate and You grant Liberation.

title: Premamrutha Barsao Baba
lyrics:
Daya Karo Bhagawan
Krupa Karo Bhagawan
Tumhari Daya Bin Kaisa Jeevan
Rom Rom Mey Basneywaale Ram
Janana Marana Se Paar Utharo
Daya Karo Bhagawan [ Krupa Karo ... ]
meaning: Shower Your nectarine Love, Baba, have compassion on me. Shower Your Grace; this life is meaningless without Your compassion. You are the indweller, life force of my every nerve. Oh Compassionate One, please liberate me from this cycle of life and death.

title: Punya Naam Pavitra Naam Rama
title2: Punya Naam Pavitra Naam Rama Naam Sai Ram
lyrics:
Harey Krishna Harey Ram Madhura (Amrutha) Naam Sai Ram [ Punya Naam ... ]
Karuna Sindhu Sita Ram Deena Bandhu Radhey Shyam [ Harey Krishna ... ]
meaning: Recite the pure and holy name of Lord Sai Rama. Glory to the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna and Sai Ram that are sweet and nectarine. Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the protector of the dejected and miserable. Chant the name of Lord Rama, the ocean of mercy. The names confer auspiciousness.

title: Purandara Ranga Harey Vittala
lyrics:
Pandari Ranga Harey Vittala [ Purandara Ranga ... ]
Narahari Ranga Harey Vittala
Murahara Ranga Harey Vittala
meaning: Chant the name of Purandara Ranga, the Indweller. Glory to Lord Vittala, the Lord of Pandharpur, Murahara Ranga, the glorious one who slayed the demon Mura. Chant the name of Lord Hari, who has taken human form.

title: Puttaparthi no Kamisama
title2: Puttaparthi no Kamisama Watashi wa Kimashita
lyrics:
Sakura Saku Kuni Kara
Sai Ram Tonaete
Misugata Ukabete
Darshan no Retsu no Naka de Anata wo Machimasu
Ai no Kamisama
Sai Ram Tonaete
Misugata Ukabete
meaning: My Lord of Puttaparthi, I have come to You from the country where Sakura trees (Cherry Blossom Trees) bloom. I call out the name Sai Ram to Your beautiful form as You stand before me. You wait for us in Darshan, O God of Love.

title: Pyaarey Nanda Lal Darshan Deejo
lyrics:
Yashoda Ke Bal Darshan Deejo [ Pyaarey Nandalal ... ]
Natavara Lal Darshan Deejo
Giridhara Bal Darshan Deejo
meaning: O loving Lord Krishna, kindly present Thyself. O the beloved Prince of Nanda and Mother Yashoda, give me Your Darshan, You are the divinely mischievous child and the one who lifted the Govardhan mountain. O Lord, please grant me Your Darshan!

title: Que todos los seres de
title2: Que todos los seres de todos los mundos
lyrics:
Tengan paz y felicidad
Samastha loka sukhino bhavanthu

Por eso viniste Tú, Mi divino Sathya Sai
Porque los sabios y santos oraron
Samastha loka sukhino bhavanthu
meaning: May all beings in all worlds have peace and happiness. ‘Samastha loka sukhino bhavanthu’. That’s why You came, my divine Sathya Sai. Because the sages and saints prayed ‘Samastha loka sukhino bhavanthu’.

title: Raasa Vilola Nandalala
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Nandalala [ Raasa Vilola ... ]
Nanda Kishora Nandalala
Navaneetha Chora Nandalala
Nandalala Sai Nandalala (2)
meaning: Chant the name of the son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, who is fond of the Raasa leela (divine folk dance with Gopis). The Lord of Radha, is the one who steals the hearts of devotees.

title: Raavo Raavo Ranga Sai
lyrics:
Radha Lola Ramaneeya Roopa [ Raavo Raavo ... ]
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedodharana Vara Sai Rama
meaning: Come and give us your Darshan Oh Ranga Sai (Krishna - Sai). One who has a lovely form, dear to Radha. One who revels in playing on the Flute, the victorious protector of all beings, You are none other than Sai Rama, who has taken the vow to redeem the Vedas (spiritual way of life).

title: Raavo Raavo Sri Raghu Ram
lyrics:
Kaavo Ee Mammu Kodanda Rama [ Raavo Raavo ... ]
Bhava Nashaka Bhadrachala Rama (x2)
Pavana Naama Sri Sai Rama
meaning: Oh Sri Rama! Won't you come to us and protect us? O Rama of the Bhadrachala temple, the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death, help us. Protect me, Oh Rama, who bears the Bow and Arrow (Kodanda). Oh Lord Sri Sai Rama - the one with the holy name.

title: Radha Jeevana Raasa Vilola
lyrics:
Rakumayi Vittala Vittala Bala
Gopi Vallabha Gokula Bala (2)
Kali Yuga Sai Krishna Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the very life of Radha and the one who performed the celestial dance with the cowherds. Glory to the consort of Rakhumayi, Lord Vittala. Glory to the beloved cowherd boy of Gokula. Glory to Lord Sai who has incarnated in the present Kali age and who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Radha Ke Natavara Lal Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Gokula Bala Goparipala [ Radha Ke ... ]
Nanda Kumara Raasa Vilola
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Lal Kanhaiya
meaning: Lord Krishna (Kanhaiya), the Lord of Radha and Meera (devotees), the child of Gokula (city), is the sustainer of all beings. The darling son of Nanda, Lord Krishna, is fond of the Raasa (divine dance depicting the ecstasy of the union of the individual souls with the Supreme One).

title: Radha Krishna Karuna Lola Radhey
title2: Radha Krishna Karuna Lola Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
Radhey Radhey Govinda Murali Govinda
meaning: Chant the name of the merciful Lord, Radha Krishna. He is Radhey Govinda and Murali Govinda, who plays the enchanting flute.

title: Radha Krishna Panduranga Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Panduranga Murali Govinda [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Narayana Hari Govinda
Narayana Hari Govinda Narayana Govinda [ Nanda Kumara ... ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga Parthi Pureesha Govinda
meaning: Glory be to Lord Krishna, also known as Govinda, the consort of Radha and the son of Nanda. He is the one who steals butter (hearts of devotees). Chant the name of Lord Narayana, who installed Himself as Vittala Lord of Pandharpur. He has incarnated as Lord Sai at Parthi.

title: Radha Lola Ramya Suchela
lyrics:
Rajitha Vanamala Gopala
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala
Vedagama Moola Gopala
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the delightful, elegant and the beautiful one who adored by Radha, You are embellished with a garland of flowers from the vines of the forest. You are the beautiful player of the flute, the victorious Gopala and You are the origin of the Vedas.

title: Radha Madhava Gopala
lyrics:
Raasa Manohara Nandalala
Gopi Jana Mana Mohana Hey Krishna
Govardhana Dhara Nandalala
Parthi Vihara Nandalala (2)
meaning: Bow Down to the Lord of Lakshmi, who has taken birth as Krishna, who captivates our hearts and minds by His celestial dance with Radha (signifies the coming together of the individual and Cosmic soul). He is the son of Nanda and the one who held aloft the Govardhan mountain. Now strolls around delighting the devotees in Parthi.

title: Radha Madhava Gopalana
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Narayana
Narayana Hari Narayana (2)
Narayana Veda Parayana
meaning: Chant the many names of the Lord Krishna - Madhava, Gopala and Govinda, the protector and sustainer of all beings and the Lord of Radha. Chant the name of Hari and Narayana, the preacher of the Vedas.

title: Radha Madhava Madana Gopala
lyrics:
Nanda Mukunda Natavara Lala [ Radha Madhava ... ]
Mathura Natha Deena Dayala
Sai Govinda Giridhara Bala
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna - Madhava, Gopala, Govinda, beloved of Radha. He is the beloved son of Nanda who liberates us with His divine dance. He is the Lord of Mathura, so full of compassion for the meek. Sai is none other than the boy who held up the mountain to save his devotees.

title: Radha Madhava Mana Mohana
lyrics:
Shyama Mukunda Madhusudhana [ Radha Madhava ... ]
Krishna Murari Yadu Nandana
Mandara Giridhari Gopalana
Madhuvana Sanchari Janardhana
meaning: Sing the praises of Lord Madhava (Krishna) who regales the mind of devotees, the dark complexioned Lord of the Yadu clan, the slayer of demons Mura and Madhu. He is the protector who held aloft the Mandara mountain and moves about in the forests of Madhu (Madhuvan - Brindavan).

title: Radha Pyaarey Jaya Gopal
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Jaya Gopal
Brindavan Ke Jaya Gopal
Murali Manohara Jaya Gopal
Jaya Gopal Jaya Gopal (4)
meaning: Victory to Lord Krishna, the universal Protector and the beloved of Radha. Victory to Lord Gopal of Brindavan, the one who enchants with the Divine Flute.

title: Radha Radha Gokula Bala
lyrics:
Nanda Nanda Mukunda Gopala 
Navaneetha Chora Shyama Gopala 
Radha Madhava Raasa Vilola
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna, also known as Gopala, the beloved son of Nanda. Glory to the dark-hued child who grew up in Gokula, who loved to steal butter. He is one who danced the 'Raasa Leela' with the Gopikas and who is the beloved of Radha.

title: Radha Radha Radha Krishna Radha
lyrics: Radha Krishna Radha (Jai) [ Radha Radha ... ]
meaning: Chant the Holy name of Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha, incessantly.

title: Radha Rasikavara Raasa Vihara
lyrics:
Radha Krishna Radha Krishna Radha Krishna Radha Krishna
Raasa Vilola Ramya Susheela [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Jaya Ghana Shyama [ Radha Krishna ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Radha Rasikavara Raasa Vihara
Radha Krishna Radha Krishna Radha Krishna Radha Krishna
Raasa Vilola Ramya Suchela [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Mohana Murali Gaana Vilola [ Radha Krishna ... ]
Mukunda Madhava Jaya Ghana Shyama [ Radha Krishna ... ]
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna and His Divine Consort, Radha, who are engrossed in the Raasa Dance. Glory to the one who is the embodiment of virtuous character and the one who plays enchanting music on His flute. Victory to Lord Madhava and Lord Mukunda who grants liberation.

title: Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda [ Radhey Govinda ]
Radha Ramana Hari Radhey Govinda
Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey (4) Radhey Govinda
meaning: Sing in praise of Radha and her beloved Govinda incessantly. Sing of Govinda who enthralls the heart of Radha. He is but the Lord Hari, the protector of all beings. Chant the holy name of Radhey, Radhey.

title: Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh
title2: Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
lyrics:
Bol Tu Sai Ram (2)
Jai Bolo Sai Ram
Pal Pal Jeevan Beetho Jaaye
Bol Hari Ka Naam [ Jai Bolo ... ]
Radhey Govinda Bol Tu Mukh Se
Bol Tu Sai Ram
Rom Rom Mey Sai Basaaye
Shwas Shwas Mey Ram [ Jai Bolo ... ]
meaning: Repeat the names of Lord Govinda and Sai Ram with your tongue. Our life span ebbs away with every passing second. Hence, chant the name of Hari and Sai before it is too late. Let every hair on our body vibrate with the name of Sai and our breath with the name of Ram.

title: Radhey Govinda Bolo Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
Brindavana Chandha Radhey Govinda
Prabhu Paramananda Krishna Mukunda
Sai Satchidananda Sri Mukharavinda [ Krishna Mukunda ... ]
Krishna Mukunda Bolo Krishna Mukunda
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Krishna - Govinda and Mukunda. He is the crown jewel of Brindavan. While Lord Krishna endows one with Supreme Bliss, the lotus-faced Lord Sai is the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss.

title: Radhey Govinda Gopala
lyrics:
Mana Mohana Hey Nanda Mukunda [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Gopi Lola Gokula Bala
Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Mukunda
Sai Mukunda Sai Mukunda
meaning: Chant the divine names of Radhey Govinda and Gopala. He is the one who attracts the mind and is the darling of Nanda. He is the one who is attractive to all the cowherd girls and is the darling of Gokula. Chant his name who has come down as Sai Mukunda to all his devotees, to help them cross the ocean of life and death.

title: Radhey Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda
title2: Radhey Govinda Gopala Jaya Govinda Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Gopala (2) [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Krishna Madhusudhana Madhusudhana Krishna
Govinda Govinda Gopala (Sai)
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Gopala (Krishna), the one who tends to cows, Lord of Radha (devotee). Repeat the names incessantly of Lord Krishna, who slayed the demon Madhu.

title: Radhey Govinda Harey Murarey
lyrics:
Shyama Mukunda Harey Murarey [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Krishna Govinda Harey Murarey
Sai Mukunda Harey Murarey
meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna, the one who destroys the miseries of life, the protector of cows, the dark complexioned liberator, the Lord of Radha and the slayer of demon Mura.

title: Radhey Govinda Harey Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Krishna Mukunda Harey Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha Radhey Govinda
Prabhu Paramananda Radhey Govinda
Sai Satchidananda Sri Mukharavinda [ Krishna Mukunda ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of Krishna, Radha's Lord and resident of Brindavan. Chant the name of the blissful Lord Sai who is truth, knowledge and bliss.

title: Radhey Govinda Jai Jai Radhey
title2: Radhey Govinda Jai Jai Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Deena Natha Govinda Anatha Natha Gopala [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Radha Lola Govinda Raasa Vilola Gopala
Govinda Jaya Govinda Gopala Sai Gopala
meaning: Victory to Lord Gopala, the Lord of Radha. You are the Lord of the meek and those who have no support. Oh Lord of Radha! You revel in the cosmic dance with the Gopis. Victory to Lord Govinda. Victory to Lord Gopala, the protector and sustainer of all beings and who is one other than Lord Sai.

title: Radhey Govinda Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Jaya (Sathya) Sai Mukunda Murari [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Nanda Ananda Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Sai Govinda 
Sathya Sai Mukunda Murari
alt_lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Krishna Murari
Jaya (Sathya) Sai Mukunda Murari [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Nanda Ananda Radhey Govinda
Radhey Govinda Sai Mukunda 
Sathya Sai Mukunda Murari
meaning: O blue-complexioned Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha, You are the destroyer of the demon Mura. Victory to You Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Krishna, the one who bestows liberation. Victory to the blissful son of Nanda, Lord Govinda, the protector of all beings.

title: Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala Sai
title2: Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala Sai Ram
lyrics:
Bansidhara Bansidhara Hey Chitha Chora
Hey Natavara Hey Natavara Nanda Kishora
Ghana Shyama Sundara Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha and the protector of all. O holder of the Flute, You are the stealer (Chitta Chora) of our awareness, mind and heart. Sing the names of Govinda and Gopala. O the handsome and mischievous son of Nanda, You have the complexion of thick black clouds, thou art verily Lord Sai.

title: Radhey Govinda Shyama Gopala
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Natavaralala [ Radhey Govinda ... ]
Brindavana Ghana Venu Vilola
Devaki Nandana Krishna Kanhaiya
Radhey Govinda Natavaralala
meaning: Lord Krishna is known by many names: Govinda, the divine dancer, the dark-complexioned Gopala, son of Devaki, Radha's Lord and the flute-playing resident of Brindavan.

title: Radhey Krishna Govinda Bol Manuva
lyrics:
Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Bol [ Radhey Krishna ... ]
Nanda Ananda Shyama Govinda
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajorey
meaning: O Mind, chant the names of Krishna, the blissful, dark-hued son of Nanda. Chant the names of Govinda, Madhava and Hari, the Lord of Lakshmi and the name of Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.

title: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Bhajorey
title2: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Bhajorey Bhajo
lyrics:
Giridhara Naagara Bhajorey Bhajo [ Radhey Krishna ... ]
Murali Manohara Bhajorey Bhajo
(Putta) Parthipuri Sai Bhajorey Bhajo
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha, who plays the enchanting flute and who resides in Puttaparthi  as Lord Sai.

title: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai
title2: Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey (2)
lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey
Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Shirdi Krishna Parthi Krishna Sai Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Krishna Jai Sri Krishna Radhey Radhey
Radhey Krishna Radhey Radhey [ Jai Sri ... ]
meaning: Repeat the names of Radhey Krishna, of Shirdi Krishna and Parthi Krishna. Victory be to Sai Krishna.

title: Radhey Mukunda Murari Govinda
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Ananda (3) [ Radhey Mukunda ... ]
Giridhari Giridhari Ananda (3)
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha, Mukunda - bestower of liberation, Murari, who slayed the demon Mura, Govinda, the protector of the innocent and Giridhari, who held aloft the mountain. Sing repeatedly the names of Radhey Mukunda, Govinda, Giridhari, the real source of Bliss.

title: Radhey Radhey Brindavana Radhey
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Nachey Radhey
Radhey Radhey Madhura Murali Baajey
Nanda Kishore Ki Payal Baajey
Rhuma Jhuma Rhuma Jhuma Payal Baajey
meaning: O Radha of Brindavana, dance in the name of Gopala and Govinda - the names of Lord Krishna, the son of Nanda, the one who plays the Flute sweetly. May the anklets of His and all those who dance in His name ring melodiously.

title: Radhey Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala
Radhey Mukunda Harey
Radhey Mukunda Harey (3)
meaning: Chant the Names of the Radha's Lord Govinda and Gopala, Radhey Gopala and Radhey Mukunda over and over again.

title: Radhey Radhey Govinda Gopala Radhey
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna - Govinda and Gopala, the one who is the protector of cows and the Lord of Radha.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Hey Radhey Gopala
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopala (2) [ Radhey Radhey ... ]
Murali Manohara Govinda Hey Madhava Murahara Govinda (2)
meaning: Let us sing in praise of Lord Krishna and Radha. Praise be to Lord Krishna who is the protector and sustainer, whose music from the flute enchants us. He is Madhava, the Lord of Lakshmi.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Nanda Mukunda
Giridhara Vraja Dhara Radhey Gopal
Murali Manohara Radhey Gopal
Shankha Chakra Dhara Radhey Gopal
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord of Radha, Lord Govinda, the one who is the son of Nanda, Lord Mukunda, who liberates the soul, Giridhara the holder of the mountain and Lord Gopala, the enchanter with the flute. He is the bearer of the conch, disc and mace (Lord Vishnu). Sing the praise of Radhey Gopal.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey
title2: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Govinda
lyrics:
Brindavana Chandha
Anatha Natha Deena Bandho Radhey Govinda
Nanda Kumara Navaneetha Chora Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha [ Anatha Natha ... ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Bhaagavatha Priya Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha [ Anatha Natha ... ]
Venu Vilola Vijaya Gopala Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha [ Anatha Natha ... ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha [ Anatha Natha ... ]
Pundarikaaksha Purana Purusha Radhey Govinda
Brindavana Chandha [ Anatha Natha ... ]
meaning: Chant continuously the name of Krishna - 'Radhey Govinda' signifying Radha (the individual soul) and Govinda (signifying the Universal soul), the beautiful shining star of Brindavana, who is the refuge of the forlorn. He is the son of Nanda. He is the one who stole butter (steals devotees' hearts), who is dear to His devotees and who takes care of them. He is the victorious one who likes to play scintillating music on His Flute. He is Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is the one who waited at the doorstep of devotee Pundarika to grant him liberation. He is the ancient and the Supreme One.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Venu
title2: Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey Venu Gopala
lyrics:
Venu Gopala Sai Gopala [ Radhey Radhey ... ]
Radhika Manohara Raja Gopala
Gopika Manohara Gopi Gopala
Neela Megha Shyama Sundara Sai Gopala
Madhava Keshava Sai Jai Jai Gopala
meaning: Chant the various names of Lord Krishna, the ever blissful and enchanting Flutist - Govinda, Gopala. Pray to Lord Krishna, the beautiful cowherd boy with dark-blue complexion like a cloud, the one with beautiful hair and who enchants the Gopikas. He is the Lord of Lakshmi. Victory to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Krishna.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Krishna ( Sai ) Murari Radhey Shyam
Kunja Vihari Radhey Shyam
Muralidhari Radhey Shyam [ Krishna Murari ... ]
meaning: Let us chant the Name of Radhey Shyam, He is Krishna, the one who killed demon Mura. He moves around the thick bushes of (Kunj) Brindavan, Who holds the flute in his hands.

title: Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Rakumayi
title2: Radhey Radhey Radhey Shyam Rakumayi Vittala
lyrics:
Jaya Hari Sri Hari Sai Hari Vittala [ Radhey Radhey ... ]
Panduranga Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Purandara Vittala Pundarikaaksha Vittala
meaning: Sing the name of Vittala, beloved of Radha and Rukmini. Victory to Lord Hari, Lord Sai, Lord Panduranga Vittala of Pandharpur. He is the Lord of Saint Purandara Dasa and the liberator of devotee Pundarika.

title: Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittaley Rakhumayi
lyrics:
Panduranga Purandara Vittaley Rakhumayi
Radhey Shyam Panduranga Vittaley Rakhumayi (2) [ Panduranga ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga Vittala, who is none other than Lord Krishna. Chant the name of Panduranga Vittala, the indweller of hearts, and His consort Rakhumayi.

title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Radhey Shyam
Adi Narayana Radhey Shyam
Anadi Purusha Megha Shyam
Anatha Rakshaka Radhey Shyam
Puttapartheeshwara Sai Shyam
meaning: Oh dark blue complexioned Krishna! Beloved of Radha! You are the Lord of Lakshmi, You are the primordial soul. The ageless one. Oh Lord Govinda! You are the Protector and friend of the meek and humble. Victory you come as Lord Sai, who is the one residing in Puttaparthi.

title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Megha Shyam
Yashoda Bala Radhey Shyam
Murali Krishna Megha Shyam
Karna Kundala Kasturi Tilaka
Kaustubha Abharana Radhey Shyam [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
Sundara Vadana Radhey Shyam
Nanda Gokula Megha Shyam
Sridhara Madhava Yadava Nandana
Gokula Krishna Radhey Shyam
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the dark hued Lord of Radha. He is the son of Mother Yashoda and an enchanter with the flute. With ornaments on His ears and vermillion mark of the musk on His forehead, He is adorned with the jewel, Koustubha. Glory to the handsome, cloud complexioned son of the Gokula chief, Nanda. Glory to Lord Krishna of Gokula, the Lord of wealth and the darling of Yadavas.

title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey
title2: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam (2)
lyrics: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Chant the name of Radhey Shyam, the dark hued Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha.

title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey
title2: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Mukunda Radha Ramana Sri Ranga
Jaya Yadu Nandana Parama Niranjana
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Mukunda
Radha Ramana Sri Ranga Mukunda Radha Ramana Sri Ranga

Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai Govinda Jai Jai (3)
meaning: Chant the name of dark-hued Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha. Victory to the Supreme Lord and Leader of the Yadu Dynasty, Lord Govinda. Victory to the Son of Yadava sect, pure and sublime. Glory to the Lord Govinda, Mukunda - the one who grants liberation.

title: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Gopala
title2: Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Murali Gaana Lola [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
Pandari Natha Parama Dayala
Parthi Pureesha Sai Deva [ Jaya Madhava ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shyam (Krishna), the dark-complexioned one who is the beloved of Radha. Victory to Thee who is worshipped as Madhava and Keshava, the one who enjoys sweet music from His flute. O Lord, You are verily Lord Vittala, the Lord of Pandari, the most compassionate one and the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai.

title: Radhey Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyam
title2: Radhey Shyama Gopal Ghana Shyam Gopal
lyrics:
Ghana Shyam Gopal Giridhari Gopal [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Brindavana Prabhu Krishna Gopal
Meera Ke Prabhu Nanda Gopal (Mayi)
Hum Bhakthon Ke Sathya Sai Gopal
meaning: Praises be to Lord Gopal, beloved of Radha, Of the color of dark blue clouds, To the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna Gopal, To the Lord of Meera, son of Nanda and To our dear Sathya Sai Gopal.

title: Radhey Shyama Gopala Radhika Jeevana
title2: Radhey Shyama Gopala Radhika Jeevana Sri Ranga
lyrics:
Megha Shyama Gopala Mana Mohana Sundara Sri Ranga [ Radhey ... ]
Pandari Natha Gopala Panduranga Sri Ranga
Parthi Pureesha Gopala Sai Ranga Sri Ranga
meaning: Pray to Lord Krishna (Ranga) , the beautiful cowherd boy with dark blue complexion like a cloud, who enchants our minds and who is the beloved of Radha. Pray to the Lord of Pandharpur, Panduranga (Vittala) who resides in Puttaparthi as Sai.

title: Radhey Shyama Govinda Gopal
lyrics:
Muralidhara Mana Mohana Sai Natavara Nandalal
Radhey Shyama, Radhey Shyama, Radhey Shyama Govinda Gopal
Muralidhara Nandalal Mana Mohana Vraja Bal
Muralidhara Mana Mohana Hey Madhava Nandalal
meaning: Praise be to Lord Krishna and Radha. O Lord Krishna, Your flute enchants all. You reside in Vraja (Brindavana).

title: Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Hey Megha Shyama
Megha Shyama Megha Shyama [ Jaya Jaya ... ]
Jaya Jaya Jaya Brindavana Dhama
meaning: Chant the name of the dark hued Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha. Glory to the Lord of Lakshmi, the abode of auspiciousness. Victory to the cloud complexioned Lord. Victory to the Lord of Brindavan, Krishna.

title: Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Nanda Nandana Govinda
Navaneetha Chora Govinda
Narada Priya Govinda
Natajana Pala Govinda
Narayana Govinda (Hari)
Govinda Gokula Nandana Govinda
alt_lyrics:
Radhey Shyama Hey Ghana Shyama
Radha Madhava Mangala Dhama [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Nanda Nandana Govinda
Navaneetha Chora Govinda
Narada Priya Govinda
Natajana Pala Govinda
Narayana Govinda (Hari)
Govinda Gokula Nandana Govinda [ Radhey Shyama ... ]
Bhaktha Vatsala Govinda
Bhaagavatha Priya Govinda
Pakshi Vahana Govinda
Paapa Vinasha Govinda
Narayana Govinda (Hari) [ Govinda Gokula ... ]
meaning: Glory to the beloved of Radha, Lord Krishna who has the complexion of dark clouds. He is the source of all auspiciousness, the darling son of Nanda and the one who stole butter from the neighboring houses (hearts of devotees). He is dear to Saint Narada. He takes complete care of those who have surrendered to Him.  He is the star of the people of Gokula and is Lord Narayana Himself. Lord Govinda is very dear to His devotees and Saints. He has Garuda (Eagle) as His vehicle and He is the destroyer of sins. He is Lord Narayana Himself.

title: Radhey Shyama Murari Jai Govinda
title2: Radhey Shyama Murari Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
lyrics:
Madhu Murali Kunjana Krishna Go Gopi Vandana Krishna
Jai Raasa Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal
Tana Mana Ranjana Krishna Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal (Jai)
Jai Jai Govinda Gopal Jai Govinda Gopal
meaning: Victory to Lord Shyam, to Govinda and Gopal, (nanmes of Lord Krishna), the one who slayed demon Mura, the one who moved about the forests playing on His enchanting Flute, the one who is adored by the residents and all the beings of Gokula. Victory to the one who performed the celestial dance, the one who captivates the body and mind of His devotees Victory to that Govinda Gopal.

title: Radhika Jeevana
lyrics:
Krishna Janardhana
Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala
Devaki Nandana [ Radhika ... ]
Nanda Nandana Hey Gopika Ranjana
Murali Mohana
Sri Madhusudhana (Krishna Krishna)
meaning: Sing the praises of Lord Krishna, the very soul of His devotee Radha. Lord Krishna is the one adored by all, the darling son of Devaki and fostered by Nanda. He is the enchanter of the Gopikas. He has a beautiful form playing the flute. He is the slayer of the demon Madhu.

title: Radhika Jeevana Krishna Murari
lyrics:
Govardhana Dhari Hrudaya Vihari [ Radhika Jeevana ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Hey Giridhari
Parthi Vihari Sai Murari
Hey Mana Mohana Sharana Tihari
meaning: O Lord Sai residing in Parthi, You are Lord Krishna, the life of Radha, You are the resident in all hearts of devotees, You are the Lord of Meera, You are the one who lifted the hillock Govardhana aloft to save the cowherd community. We surrender to You, the most enchanting Lord.

title: Radhika Manohara Madana Gopala
lyrics:
Deena Vatsala Hey Raja Gopala
Bhaktha Jana Mandara Venu Gopala
Muralidhara Hey Gaana Vilola
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Krishna (Gopala), who attracts Radha's mind. We bow to Him, the protector of the meek, the Royal Lord. He who enchants the devotees with his divine flute music and songs, our salutations to Thee!

title: Raga Vinodini Kadambari
lyrics:
Mata Mata Kalavathi
Veena Vadini Brahma Sanathani
Veda Vilasini Shastra Vikasini
Saraswathi Devi Sai Avatarini
Mata Kalavathi
meaning: Salutations to the Mother of all arts, Saraswathi, the consort of Lord Brahma. The goddess Saraswathi who plays the veena (string instrument) is the shining exponent of all vedas and scriptures. She has incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Ragamayi Anuragamayi
lyrics:
Premamayi Ma Pranamayi [ Ragamayi ... ]
Karunamayi Anandamayi
Bhagyamayi Ma Bhavamayi
Gnanamayi Ma Gaanamayi
meaning: Salutations to the Divine Mother, full of compassion and bliss. She is Love personified, the life force of all beings, the one who confers fortunes and relishes the good feeling in our actions. She is wisdom personified and embodiment of good music.

title: Raghava Raghu Nandana
lyrics:
Madhava Madhusudhana [ Raghava Raghu ... ]
Rajeeva Dala Lochana Shyama Bansi Mohana
Donon Hi Naam Hai Anand Dham (2)
meaning: Sing the glory of Raghava, the scion of Raghu dynasty, Lord Rama. He is also the sweet Lord Krishna who slayed demonic force Madhu. He is the lotus-eyed and dark-hued one, who enchants us with His flute. Both the names, Ram and Shyam grant liberation and bliss.

title: Raghava Raghuvara Rama Bhajo
lyrics:
Mandara Giridhara Shyama Bhajo [ Raghava Raghuvara ... ]
Tulasidas Prabho Rama Bhajo
Meera Mohana Shyam Bhajo
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Bhajo Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajo
Nanda Nandana Shyama Bhajo Dasharatha Nandana Rama Bhajo 
Sai Sundara Naama Bhajo
alt_lyrics:
Raghava Raghuvara Rama Bhajo
Mandara Giridhara Shyama Bhajo [ Raghava Raghuvara ... ]
Tulasidas Prabho Rama Bhajo
Meera Ke Prabhu Shyam Bhajo
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Bhajo Murali Mohana Shyama Bhajo
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Bhajo Nanda Nandana Shyama Bhajo
Sai Sundara Naama Bhajo
meaning: Sing the praises of Lord Rama (Raghava) of Raghu lineage, the Lord of Saint Tulasidas, the son of Dasharatha and of Shyama (Lord Krishna), who lifted the Mandara mountain, the Lord of Meera, the one who delights everyone with lilting music of His Flute, the son of Nanda. Praise our beautiful (Sundara) Lord Sai.

title: Raghava Rama Raghuveera
lyrics:
Sridhara Madhava Govinda [ Raghava ... ]
Keshava Madhava Madhusudhana
Achyutha Anantha Narayana
Gopiya Lola Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, also known as Raghava, who is the champion of the Raghu lineage. Chant the various names of Krishna, Sridhara (the one who bears Mother Lakshmi in His heart), Madhava, Govinda, Keshava (the one with long hair), Madhusudhana (the one who vanquished the demon Madhu), Achyutha (un-decaying), Anantha (infinite), Narayana (indweller) and Gopala (sustainer), who is dear to the Gopis.

title: Raghava Sundara Rama Raghuvara
lyrics:
Parama Pavana Hey Jaga Vandana [ Raghava Sundara ... ]
Patithodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Ravana Mardhana Vighna Bhanjana
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Narayana
meaning: The beautiful Lord Rama is Supreme among the Raghu dynasty. He is worshipped by the entire creation. Liberator of the chaste, venerated by the devotees, He destroys obstacles and annihilated the demon-king Ravana. Worship Lord Narayana, who has incarnated in Parthi as Lord Sai Ram.

title: Raghothama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Ramakantha Rama Ram
Chidananda Rama Ram
Sarojaksha Rama Ram
Sai Rama Rama Ram (4)
meaning: Sing the praises of Rama who belongs to the Highest order of the Raghu lineage. One who charms Sita (Mother Lakshmi), One who bestows supreme bliss, the Lotus eyed Ram. He is none other than Sai Rama.

title: Raghu Kula Tilaka Sri Ram
title2: Raghu Kula Tilaka Sri Ram Sri Rama (3)
lyrics:
Kausalyesha Jaya Jaya Rama
Ravana Mardhana Sita Rama [ Raghu Kula ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Rama
Patitha Pavana Sita Rama
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the jewel of Raghu dynasty and son of mother Kausalya. The Lord of Sita, who destroyed Ravana is the savior of the destitute.

title: Raghu Nandana Hey Raghu Nandana
lyrics:
Pyaarey Merey Nandana Raghu Nandana [ Raghu Nandana ... ]
Rajeeva Lochana Raghu Nandana
Dasharatha Tanaya Raghu Nandana
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Raghu Nandana
Janaki Jeevana Raghu Nandana [ Raghu Nandana ... ]
meaning: I bow to the lotus-eyed Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty who is beloved to me. He is the beloved Prince of King Dasharatha and is the destroyer of the ten-headed Ravana. Salutations to the one who is the very life of Mother Janaki (Sita).

title: Raghu Nandana Raghava Ram Harey
lyrics:
Hey Janaki Jeevana Ram Harey
Hey Rajeeva Lochana Ram Harey
Sri Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (5)
meaning: Worship Lord Rama of Raghu Dynasty. Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, who is the very life-breath of Mother Sita. Sai Rama who is verily Lord Rama, we sing Your praises.

title: Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Nayana
lyrics:
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Sai Rama
Janaki Vallabha Lavanya Rama
Nirupama Sundara Sugunabhi Rama
Prashanthi Nilaya Pavana Naama
Jaya Jaya Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
meaning: Glory to the jewel of the Raghu dynasty, the lotus-eyed Lord Rama. He is none other than the darling son of Mother Eshwaramba, Lord Sathya Sai. The beloved of Janaki (Sita), the exquisitely handsome Lord Rama, is beautifully-complexioned and the most virtuous. Victory to Lord Rama, who is verily our Lord Sai Rama, of the Holy abode, Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Raghupathey Raghava Raja Rama
lyrics:
O Raja (Sai) Rama [ Raghupathey ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama Kausalyatmaja Sundara Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Rama Raghava Mohana Megha Shyama
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Rama Rama Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Pathey Rama
alt_lyrics:
Raghupathey Raghava Raja Rama
O Raja (Sai) Rama [ Raghupathey ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Raja Rama Kausalyatmaja Sundara Rama
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Rama Shyamala Komala Megha Shyama
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Rama Rama Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Pathey Rama
meaning: Pray and chant the name of Lord Rama, the handsome Prince of King Dasharatha and Mother Kausalya. Victory to Lord Rama, the Saviour of the downtrodden and the Lord of Sita. Victory be to You, O Raghava, the Lord of Raghu dynasty, the one with a captivating form and of dark complexion.

title: Raghupathey Sita Rama
lyrics:
Janaki Jeevana Kodanda Rama [ Raghupathey ... ]
Rajeeva Lochana Ravikula Soma
Ravana Mardhana Jaya Jaya Rama
meaning: Victory to the Lord Rama, the Lord of the Raghu dynasty, who is the life-breath of Mother Sita. Victory to the lotus-eyed one who is the nectarine essence of the Solar dynasty, the one who wields the Kodanda bow and the one who destroyed the demon Ravana.

title: Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra
lyrics:
Raghava Raghava [ Raghupathey ]
Ravikula Soma Sarvabhowma
Ramya Susheela Rama Rama
meaning: We bow to Rama, Lord of the Raghu Dynasty, Who is still and shining as the moon. He is Raghava, Lord of Raghu dynasty. Raghava, who is the doyen of the Solar lineage, respected by everyone and has a charming personality.

title: Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra Raghava
title2: Raghupathey Sri Rama Chandra Raghava Daya Nidhey (2)
lyrics:
Pashupathey Sri Parvatheesha Shankara Sadashiva (2)
Madhava Sri Radhikesha Govinda Harey Krishna (2)
meaning: O Rama, Lord of the Raghus, who is still and shining as the moon, You are the Ocean of Mercy. O Lord Shiva, the beloved of Mother Parvathi, You are ever unchanging and the Source of Goodness. Oh Krishna, the Splendorous Lord of Radha, You are the protector of our souls and the remover of sorrows. Oh Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama, Lord Shiva and Lord Krishna.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
lyrics:
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja ( Sai ) Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram
Rama Rama Jaya Sai Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. O Lord, You are the salvation of the fallen and repentful. Chant the name of the princely Rama of Ayodhya. Chant the name of Sai Ram whose name purifies us.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha
title2: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
lyrics:
Eshwar Allah Tero Naam Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan [ Raghupathi ... ]
Nanak Yesu Gautam Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord and King Sri Ram of Raghu lineage, the redeemer of the downtrodden, Lord of Mother Sita. Oh Lord! Bless us with wisdom. You are the very same God known by different names as Eshwar, Allah, Nanak, Yesu and Gautam. Victory to the personification of all forms, Sathya Sai Ram.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha
title2: Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
lyrics:
Sita Ram Jaya Sita Ram Bhaja Pyaarey Tu Sita Ram
Eshwara Allah Terey Naam Sab Ko Sanmati Dey Bhagawan
(Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan Sab Ko Sanmati Dey Bhagawan)
(Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram Sita Ram Jaya Sita Ram)
meaning: Victory to You, Lord Rama, king of the Raghu dynasty, and the Lord of Sita, the protector of the poor and helpless. Sing praises to our beloved Lord Sita Ram, known also as Ishwara and Allah. O Lord, please endow us with intelligence.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Ram Kaho
lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Ram Kaho
Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
Ram Ram Sai Ram Kaho
meaning: Worship the Lotus - Eyed Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. Chant the name of Lord Sai Rama. Chant, 'Ram Ram Sai Ram'.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Ram Ram
lyrics:
Ram Ram Rama Ram Ram
Ram Ram Rama Ram [ Raghupathi Raghava ... ]
Janaki Jeevana Ram Ram
Jagadodharana Sai Ram
meaning: Sing the Glory of the Lord of Raghu dynasty, Lord Rama, the very life of  Mother Janaki (Sita) and who is none other than Lord Sai, the redeemer of the world.

title: Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
lyrics:
Shyama Sundara Sai Rama Harey
Paramatma Rama Parandhama Rama
Purushottama Sai Rama Harey
Asha Paasha Vinashaka Rama
Sai Rama Rama Harey
meaning: Pray to Lord Rama who is the doyen of Raghu lineage who has a dark-hued lovely form. He is the cosmic consciousness, the ultimate abode, the most exalted of humans. The destroyer of desires and attachment has come down as Lord Sai Rama.

title: Raghupathi Ram Jaya Jaya Ram
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghu Ram [ Raghupathi Ram ... ]
Sita Mohana Janaki Ram
Pavana Naam Mangala Dham
Jaya Jagavandana Prashanthi Ram
meaning: Glory and victory to Prince of King Dasharatha, Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. He is dearest to Sita (Janaki). Reciting His name is purifying and helps one to attain the auspicious abode. He has incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, the Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam who is adored by the entire world.

title: Raghuveera Ranadheera Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Rakumayi Vittala Shyama Shyama Shyam [ Raghuveera ... ]
Sukumara Sundara Rama Rama Ram
Shirdeesha Partheesha (Sayeesha) Rama Rama Ram
meaning: Let us sing the glories of Lord Rama, the champion of Raghu dynasty, the one who is mighty and valorous. Chant the name of Lord Vittala, the dark hued one and His consort Rakumayi. Victory to the good, young and handsome Rama, who is verily Sai, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Rahiman Rahiman Ram Rahim
lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram Krishna Karim
Buddha Zohrashtra Nanak Sai
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Tum Ho
Bhajorey Manuva Ram Rahim
Ram Rahim Sai Krishna Karim
meaning: Oh Mind! Chant the various names of the same Lord Ram, Rahim the gracious One, Krishna, Karim (the compassionate), Sai Ram. Oh Lord Sai! You are Buddha, Zohrashtra, Nanak and You are the one who sent Jesus You are the embodiment of all that has come as One.

title: Rahimana Ram Rahimana Ram
lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Ek Hi Naam
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Naam
Bhajorey Manuva Hari Ka Naam ( Sai Ram )
Ek Omkara Bolo Jai Sathya Naam
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Nanak Naam
Prem Hi Eshwar Prem Hi Ram [ Bhajorey Manuva ... ]
meaning: O mind, chant the various names of the Lords Ram and Rahim, the gracious One. Allah and Eshwar are one and the same. Chant the names of Panduranga Vittala and Hari, O mind; Omkara is the one true reality as preached by the great Guru Nanak. Love is God. O mind, chant the name of Hari and Sai Ram.

title: Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara
lyrics:
Deena Lola Gokula Ke Bala
Nanda Kishora Navaneetha Chora (2)
Pannaga Shayana Parama Dayala
Raja Gopala Radhika Manohara (2) [ Deena Lola ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Gopala (Krishna), the King of Mathura and the beloved of Radha. He is the dear child of Gokula, ever ready to shower His Grace on the forlorn. He is the child of Nanda who stole the hearts of one and all,  the one reclining on the great serpent Adi Sesha and the supreme benefactor of the needy.

title: Raja Rajeshwari Jaganmohini (Amba)
lyrics:
Jagadambe Mangala Kaarini [ (Amba) Raja Rajeshwari ... ]
Jagadodharini Vighna Vinashini
Sthira Sukha Dayini Sai Janani
meaning: Effulgent and beautiful Goddess Amba enchants the world and bestows auspiciousness. She destroys obstacles and saves the world. Mother Sai grants ever-lasting happiness.

title: Raja Rajeshwari Rajya Pradayini
lyrics:
Raakshasa Nashini Palaya Maam
Sri Bhuvaneshwari Tripura Sundari
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Palaya Maam
meaning: Save us, O Mother, the Goddess of emperors, donor of kingdoms, destroyer of the demon race, the Goddess of the entire world, the most beautiful of all the three worlds. Protect us, the one who is the embodiment of Shiva, the male aspect and the Shakthi, the female aspect of God.

title: Rajadhi Raja Hey Sai Maharaja
lyrics:
Deenon Ke Nath Bhagawan
Devadi Deva Hey Sai Mahadeva
Parthi Nivasi Sai Ram
Harey Rama Rama Rama Rama
Harey Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna
meaning: Chant the name of the King of Kings, the Supreme King, Lord Sai, the protector of the miserable and dejected. O the Lord of Lords, the resident of Parthi, Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama and Lord Krishna.

title: Rajadhi Raja Raja Gambhira
lyrics:
Raja Marthaanda Raja Kumara
Raavo Raavo Gaana Manohara
Pankaja Lochana Parthi Vihara
meaning: O Lord Sai, the King of Kings, with the prestige and dignity of a King, please come. O Lover of music, the lotus-eyed one who lives in Parthi, we lovingly beckon You to come.

title: Rajadhi Raja Rama Rajeeva Netra
title2: Rajadhi Raja Rama Rajeeva Netra Rama
lyrics:
Ramaneeya Vesha Jaya Rama
Jaya Rama Sai Rama
Raghukula Bhooshana Rajeeva Lochana
Raja Ramachandra
Sita Pathey Hey Sundara Rama
Sajjana Sadhu Samrakshaka Rama [ Jaya Rama ... ]
meaning: Victory to Rama, the King of Kings, the lotus-eyed one with charming looks. Sri Rama is the crown jewel of Raghu lineage, the consort of Sita and the protector of the pious and the sages. Victory to You oh Sai Rama.

title: Rajeeva Lochana Jaya Jaya Rama
lyrics:
Raghukula Bhooshana Jaya Raghu Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Lavanya Rama
Abhaya Pradayaka Ananda Rama
Janaki Vallabha Sugunabhi Rama
Jagadodhara Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the lotus-eyed one, the crown jewel of Raghu dynasty, the beloved son of Dasharatha and the consort of Sita. Victory to the virtuous one who protects His devotees and the one who is ever blissful. He is none other than Lord Sai who is the liberator of the entire Universe.

title: Rajeeva Lochana Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Narahari Roopa Namo Narayana [ Rajeeva Lochana ... ]
Parama Dayaghana Patitha Pavana
Nithya Niranjana Sai Narayana [ Narahari Roopa ... ]
meaning: Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Narayana, who has incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, the saviour of devotees and towards whom He is extremely merciful and who is the embodiment of purity.

title: Rajeeva Lochani Raja Rajeshwari
lyrics:
Mangala Karini Mata Maheshwari [ Rajeeva Lochani ... ]
Sankata Harini Sai Narayani
Prashanthi Vasini Paapa Vinashini
Prema Swaroopini Sai Bhavani
meaning: The Goddess of the Emperors, the Lotus eyed, Bestower of auspiciousness, Mother Sai Narayani, the sovereign ruler of this entire creation. She is the remover of sorrows, Destroyer of sins, who lives in Prashanthi Nilayam, The very embodiment of Love, Sai Bhavani.

title: Rajeshwari Sri Bhuvaneshwari
lyrics:
Parameshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
Partheeshwari Annapoorneshwari
Sarveshwari Sathya Sayeeshwari
meaning: Sing the glory of the Divine Mother Sathya Sai, the ruler of the worlds. O Mother, You are the Supreme One, the Goddess of Parthi, who confers sustenance to one and all. You are the the Goddess of all.

title: Raksha Karo Bhagawan Sathya Sai
title2: Raksha Karo Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Paahi Dayalo Dehi Krupalo [ Raksha Karo ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradatha
Nithya Nirmala Jeevana Daata
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram

Raksha Karo Bhagawan (3)
meaning: Protect us, O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the compassionate and merciful Lord of the helpless, the bestower of truth, righteousness, peace and love, the ever - cheerful Lord who sustains all life, the embodiment of Brahma (Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheshwara (Destroyer of evil). You are Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty.

title: Raksha Raksha Jagadeeshwara
lyrics:
Parthi Puri Parameshwara
Paahi Paahi Parameshwara
Dehi Dehi Tava Pada Seva
meaning: Protect us, O Lord of the Universe, Lord Sai. Protect us, O Lord of Parthi and bless us, O Supreme Lord. We pray to Thee to grant us the opportunity to serve at Thy Lotus Feet.

title: Raksha Raksha Prabhu Hey Jagadeesha
lyrics:
Pavana Naama Shiva Sayeesha
Mangala Daata Shiva Sayeesha
Bhaktha Janashraya Purana Purusha
meaning: O Lord of Universe, O granter of auspiciousness and mercy, O Lord Sai, protect us. Your name Shiva and Sayeesha are holy and bestows auspiciousness on those who chant it. Grant us Your assurance of protection, O the Master of the Universe. O Lord, You are the most ancient and loved by all devotees.

title: Ram Bhagawan Ram Bhagawan
title2: Ram Bhagawan Ram Bhagawan Ram Bhagawan Sita Ram Bhagawan
lyrics:
Krishna Bhagawan Krishna Bhagawan Krishna Bhagawan Radhey Krishna Bhagawan
Prema Bhagawan Prema Bhagawan Prema Bhagawan Sai Prema Bhagawan
Hari Bhagawan Hari Bhagawan Hari Bhagawan Hari Hara Bhagawan
Atma Roopa Bhagawan Paramatma Roopa Bhagawan
Shirdi Swaroopa Sathya Swaroopa Prema Roopa Bhagawan
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi who is Love incarnate and is verily Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari and Hara (Shiva). He is the very embodiment of the Supreme Atma and of Truth and Love. He is verily Lord Sai who incarnated at Shirdi.

title: Ram Dhun Laagi Mohey Shyam
title2: Ram Dhun Laagi Mohey Shyam Dhun Laagi
lyrics:
Laagirey Laagi Mohey Ram Dhun Laagi [ Ram Dhun ... ]
Harey Ram Harey Ram Bolo Harey Ram
Bharey Premanand Se Bolo Sai Harey Ram
Harey Ram Harey Ram Bolo Harey Ram (2)
Ram Ram Ram Radhey Shyam Dhun Laagi
meaning: The repetition of the names of Lord Ram and Krishna has captured my heart. Sing the name of Lord Sai Ram suffused with Love and Bliss.

title: Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai
title2: Ram Jai Jai Ram Jai Jai Ram
lyrics:
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Sai Raghu Nandana Ram [ Ram Jai ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Sri Raghu Nandana
Raghukula Bhooshana Ram [ Ram Jai ... ]
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram [ Sai Raghu (2) ]
meaning: Let Victory be on Your side Oh Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. Rama, the son of Raghu Dynasty, the redeemer of the curse on Ahalya, you are the crest jewel of the Raghu lineage. Chant the mantra Sita Ram, Sita Ram.

title: Ram Jinka Naam Hai Ayodhya
title2: Ram Jinka Naam Hai Ayodhya Jinka Dham Hai
lyrics:
Hamarey Raghunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Krishna Jinka Naam Hai Gokul Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Yadunath Ji Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
Sai Jinka Naam Hai Parthi Jinka Dhaam Hai
Hamarey Pran Nath Ko Hamarey Lakh Pranam Hai
meaning: We offer a lakh (hundred thousand) obeisance to our Lord of Raghu lineage, whose Name is Ram and Ayodhya His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisance to Lord of Yadu lineage, whose Name is Krishna and Gokul being His abode. We offer a Lakh obeisance to the Lord of our Life, whose Name is Sai and Parthi His abode.

title: Ram Jis Ka Naam Hai
title2: Ram Jis Ka Naam Hai Shanthi Sthapana Kaam Hai
lyrics:
Aise Raghukula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Keshava Jis Ka Naam Hai Dharma Sthapana Kaam Hai
Aise Yadu Kula Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
Sai Jis Ka Naam Hai Jagadodharana Kaam Hai
Aise Parthi Nandana Ko Hamara Pranam Hai
meaning: We bow down to the scion of Raghu lineage, whose name is Ram and whose work is to establish Peace. We bow down to the scion of Yadu lineage, whose name is Keshava (Krishna) and whose work is to establish righteousness on Earth. We bow down to the scion of Parthi, whose name is Sai and whose work is to redeem the world.

title: Ram Kaho Krishna Kaho Eshwara
title2: Ram Kaho Krishna Kaho Eshwara Allah Sai Kaho
lyrics:
Buddha Kaho Guru Nanak Kaho Zohrashtra Mahavir Yesu Kaho [ Ram Kaho ... ]
Yug Avatara Tum Ho Vishwa Shakthi Tum Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Mahesha
Parabrahma Tum Ho (Sai)
meaning: Chant the name of all the Gods - Rama, Krishna, Eshwara (Shiva) or Allah. Chant the name of Buddha, Guru Nanak or Zohrashtra. Chant either Mahavir or Jesus. O Sai, You are the incarnation of this age. You are the power behind the Universe, the one who loves all religion equally. You are the embodiment of the Supreme One.

title: Ram Kaho Sai Ram Kaho
lyrics:
Shyam Kaho Ghana Shyam Kaho
Yesu Kaho Zohrashtra Kaho
Jag Ka Vidhata Sai Kaho
Mandir Mey Kabhi Masjid Mey
Apna Hrudaya Mey Sai Bhagawan
meaning: Call Him by any name be it Rama, Sai Ram, Shyam, Yesu, Zohrashtra, sometimes He is in a temple or mosque, but the Creator of this Universe, Lord Sai, lives in our Heart.

title: Ram Naam Bolo Sai Naam
title2: Ram Naam Bolo Sai Naam Bolo Sai Shyam Ghana Shyam Jai Bolo
lyrics:
Ram Naam Bolo Sai Naam Bolo
Sai Shyam Ghana Shyam
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Lord Krishna and Lord Sai.

title: Ram Rahim Ho Sai Krishna
title2: Ram Rahim Ho Sai Krishna Buddha Sai
lyrics:
Zohrashtra Yeshu Sai Mahavir Bhi Ho Sai [ Ram Rahim … ]
Sarva Dharma Palaka Hey Prema Roopa Sai
Sarva Jana Rakshaka Sai Ram Ek Ram
Ram Rahim Sai Ram Rahim Sai Ram Rahim Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Lord Rama, Rahim, Krishna, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Jesus Christ and Mahavira. You foster all religions and is the very embodiment of Love. You are the protector of all and You preach the oneness of all faiths. Glory to Thee, the most merciful Lord Sai.

title: Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale
title2: Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale Terey Poojari Baba
lyrics:
Tera Naam Ek Sahara (3)
Tum Hi Ho Geeta Tum Hi Ramayan
Tum Hi Ho Veda Quran [ Tera Naam ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Ram Rahim Ko Bhajanewaale Terey Poojari Baba
Tera Naam Ek Sahara (3)
Tum Hi Ho Geeta Tum Hi Ramayan
Tum Hi Ho Veda Puran [ Tera Naam ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai Baba, for the devotees of Lord Rama (Hindus) and of Rahim (Islam), Your name is the only refuge. You are the very Form of the teachings of Holy scriptures, Bhagawad Gita, Ramayana, the four Vedas and the Quran.

title: Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Harey
title2: Ram Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey
lyrics:
Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Harey Harey [ Ram Ram ... ]
Raghupathi Raja Rama Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: O mind, worship Lord Rama of the Raghu Dynasty. The Lord of Sita, Lord Rama, destroys sins and evil, uplifts and liberates the penitent. Chant the name of Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Ram Ram Brahma Ram
title2: Ram Ram Brahma Ram - Brahma Ram Ram
lyrics:
Hear my inner rhythm pound
 Hear my heart song
 Ram Ram Brahma Ram - Brahma Ram Ram
 In Puttaparthi there You dwell
 The light of mankind
 Om Jai Sai Ram - Sathya Sai Baba Naam
 The Light of Mankind

title: Ram Ram Ram Parama Sumangala
title2: Ram Ram Ram Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
lyrics:
Janani Janaki Jeevana Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram Jayatu Jayatu Rama
Parama Sumangala Ram Ram Ram
meaning: The name of Ram is highly auspicious. Lord Rama is the life of the universal Mother Janaki (Sita). Victory to Lord Ram and Lord Sai, whose names are highly auspicious.

title: Rama Anarada Marokka Sari Rama
title2: Rama Anarada Marokka Sari Rama Anarada
lyrics:
Rama Ante Ragamu Tolagunu 
Krishna Anarada Marokka Sari Krishna Anarada 
Krishna Ante Kashtamu Tolagunu 
Sai Anarada Marokka Sari Sai Anarada 
Sai Ante Soukyamu Kalugunu 
Baba Anarada Marokka Sari Baba Anarada 
Baba Ante Badhalu Theeranu
meaning: Chanting the name of Rama removes all diseases. Chanting the name of Krishna removes all pains. Chanting the name of Sai grants bliss to all. Chanting the name of Baba removes all difficulties.

title: Rama Bhajo Raghu Rama Bhajo
lyrics:
Sita Manohara Rama Bhajo
Shyama Bhajo Ghana Shyama Bhajo
Radha Manohara Shyama Bhajo
Shambho Bhajo Shiva Shambho Bhajo
Gowri Manohara Shambho Bhajo
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, consort of Sita, of blue complexioned Lord Krishna, beloved of Radha, and of Lord Shiva, the consort of Gowri.

title: Rama Bhaktha Hanumantha
lyrics:
Rama Daasa Hanumantha
Anjana Sutha Abhaya Pradayaka
Vayu Putra Vara Pradayaka
Sri Rama Daasa (Dootha) Namo Namo (2)
meaning: Hanumantha, the dear devotee and servant of Lord Rama. He whose Mother is Anjana and grants freedom from fear to His devotees. He is the son of the Wind god, bestower of boons. Let us offer our obeisance to the servant and messenger of Sri Rama.

title: Rama Bolo Rahim Bolo
lyrics:
Krishna Bolo Karim Bolo [ Rama Bolo ... ]
Gautam Yeshu Nanak Bolo
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavir Bolo
Sathya Dharma Aur Shanthi Prem Se
Sab Dharmon Ki Jai Jai Bolo
meaning: Chant the names of Ram, Gautam (Buddha), Jesus, Nanak, Zoroaster, Mahavir, all of whom represent Truth, Right Action, Peace, and Love, the tenets of all religions.

title: Rama Bolo Sita Rama
title2: Rama Bolo Sita Rama, Shyam Bolo Radhey Sham
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shankar Shiva Shiva Bol,
Gowri Natha Maheshwara Bol
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Bol, Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Allah Bol Eshwar Bol Buddha Bol Nanak Bol
Zohrashtra Mahavir Yesu Bol, Sarva Dharma Ke Jai Jai Bol
(Bol) Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sai Nath Ke Jai Jai Bol
Sai Nath Ke Jai Jai Bol, Sathya Sai Ke Jai Jai Bol
meaning: Let us chant the name of Lord Rama, the consort of Sita, of Shyam (Krishna), the savior of Radha. Chant the name of Shankar (Shiva), consort of Mother Gowri. The one Lord loves and fosters all faiths and religions. He is verily Sathya Sai, victory be to Him. Chant the name of Allah, Buddha, Guru Nanak, Zorashtra, Mahavir, and Jesus (Yesu). May victory be to all religions and faiths. May victory be to Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Rama Came Krishna Came
title2: Rama Came, Krishna Came, Our Lord Has Come, His Name Is Sai
lyrics:
Give Us Peace And Grant Us Release
Baba,Baba, Sai Baba Baba,Baba,Sai Baba
One Of Mercy, Wisdom And Truth, Give Us Your Blessing, Lord Of Light
You Are Mother,Father And Friend [ Baba,Baba ... ]

title: Rama Charan Sukha Dayi Bhajorey
lyrics:
Ram Naam Ke Do Akshara Mey
Sab Sukh Shanthi Samayirey
Sai Nath Ke Charnon Mey Aakar
Jeevan Saphal Banaorey
meaning: Worshipping the Lotus Feet of Lord Ram endows one with happiness. Reciting only the two letters Ra and Ma, confers everlasting peace and happiness. Finish the mission of human birth by surrendering to the Lotus Feet of Lord Sai (by merging in Lord Sai) who is none other than Lord Rama.

title: Rama Dhyana Nirata Anjaneya
lyrics:
Rama Seva Vratha Hanumantha
Swami Mukhya Prana Pavamana
Daithya Kulaantaka Mahavira
Anjanadri Vasa Gunavanta
Daasanudaasa (Sri Rama Daasa) Hanumantha [ Rama Dhyana … Hanumantha ]
Maayaavi Bhanjana Balabheema
Maaravi Daya Ghana Rama Dootha
Muni Guna Kapivara Vatatmaja [ Daasanudaasa ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Anjaneya, who is always immersed in meditation on Lord Rama, who has taken a vow to be at service to Lord Rama and who has won the confidence of Lord Rama. Hanuman is the champion uprooter of the demon race, the storehouse of good qualities, who lives in the Anjanaadri Hills. He is the one who serves those who serve the Lord, the true servant of Lord Rama.

title: Rama Govinda Harey
lyrics:
Bhajorey Rama Govinda Harey [ Rama Govinda ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Harey
Gokula Nandana Shyama Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
meaning: Sing in praise of Lord Rama and Lord Govinda (Krishna). Rama, the darling son of Dasharatha, is the the one who annihilated the ten-headed Ravana. Shyama (Krishna) is the dear son of Gokula. Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi is none other than Rama and Krishna.

title: Rama Govinda Harey Krishna Gopal
title2: Rama Govinda Harey Krishna Gopal Harey
lyrics:
Sri Madhusudhana Harey Harey Harey
Sri Madhusudhana Harey
Devaki Nandana Goparipalana
Yadava Nanda Nandana Harey Harey
Yadava Nanda Nandana
Hey Jagat Palana Deena Janavana
Mathura Puri Madhava Harey Harey
Mathura Puri Madhava
Patithodharana Patitha Pavana
Parthi Vihari Krishnana Harey Harey
Parthi Vihari Krishnana
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama and Lord Govinda (sustainer of all beings - Lord Krishna). He is the slayer of demon Madhu. He is the darling son of Devaki and beloved Yadava child, the ruler of all beings. He is the ruler of all worlds, benefactor of the meek. Glory to that Lord of Mathura, the Lord of Lakshmi. Glory to the Liberator of the chaste. Glory to Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi, who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Rama Harey Hari Naam Bolo
lyrics:
Hari Naam Bolo Sai Naam Bolo [ Rama Harey ... ]
Sai Rama Parama Dayala
Parama Dayala (2)
Man Mandir Mey Diya Ujaala
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
Yesu Sai Bolo Buddha Sai Bolo
Nanak Sai Bolo Govinda Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
meaning: Sing the many names of the Lord Rama, Hari, Govinda. Chant the name of Guru Nanak, Allah, Maulah and the all-pervasive Lord who is extremely compassionate and whose presence has kindled the light in the temple of our hearts. Chant the Name of Rama and of Hari. Light the lamp of Love in our Hearts, O Sai, the most merciful One.

title: Rama Harey Raghu Rama Harey
lyrics:
Shyama Harey Ghana Shyama Harey
Janaki Jeevana Rama Harey
Radha Madhava Shyama Harey
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Rama of Raghu clan, the very life of Mother Janaki and the glory of Lord Shyama (Krishna), the dark complexioned one who is dear to Radha.

title: Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
title2: Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
lyrics:
Allah Eshwar Sai Harey
Guru Nanak Yesu Buddha Harey
Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey (Baba)
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (4)
meaning: Glory to Rama, glory to Krishna, glory to Lord Sai, who loves all religions equally. Glory to the name of the Lord of all faiths; Who is known by different names as Rama, Krishna, Allah, Eshwar, Guru Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira. Sai responds to any of these names.

title: Rama Harey Sita Ram
lyrics:
Shyam Harey Radhey Shyam
Sita Vallabha Sundara Ram
Murali Manohara Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, the Lord of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the Lord of Radha. Chant the name of Rama, the handsome consort of Sita, Radhey Shyam, the enchanting Flute Player. They are none other than our Lord of Parthi, Sai Ram.

title: Rama Jai Jai Rama Sai
title2: Rama Jai Jai Rama Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Raghava Sundara Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sai Rama Jai Jai Ram
Sathya Swaroopa Shanthi Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Amrutha Bhaashi Abhaya Pradayaka Rama Jai Jai Ram
Anatha Natha Deena Natha Rama Jai Jai Ram [ Sai Rama ]
meaning: Glory be to Rama, the lotus eyed One, the handsome King, Glory be to Sai Rama. Rama is the personification of Truth; grants Peace and freedom from fear. Glory to the One of nectarine words. Rama, the refuge of the forlorn, Lord Sai Rama.

title: Rama Jayam Hari Rama Jayam
lyrics:
Raghava Dhyanamey Premamayam [ Rama Jayam ... ]
Rama Sita Pathi Raghava Mantram
Prema Niguna Gana Seva Niranthram
Rama Dayapara Parama Pavitram
Raghukula Dasharatha Suthamutha Mitram
alt_lyrics:
Rama Jayam Hari Rama Jayam
Raghava Dhyanamey Lokamayam [ Rama Jayam ... ]
Rama Sita Pathi Raghava Mantram
Ramya Suguna Gana Seva Niranthram
Rama Dayapara Sujana Pavitram
Ravikula Dasharatha Suthamura Hari Jaya
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama of Raghu lineage. The entire world meditates on Rama, the dear son of Dasharatha of the Solar Dynasty. Chant the name of Raghava, the Lord of Sita, and immerse ourselves ever in extolling His Divine qualities and in His service. Glory be to Rama who shows immense compassion towards the pure and the good ones.

title: Rama Kodanda Rama Rama Pattabhi
title2: Rama Kodanda Rama Rama Pattabhi Rama Rama Kalyana Rama Raghava
lyrics:
Rama Sita Pathi Rama Neevey Gathi
Rama Neeku Mrokkiti Rama Nee Chey Jikkiti [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Neekokka Mata Rama Nakokka Moota
Rama Nee Paatey Paata Rama Nee Baatey Baata [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Neekevaru Todu Rama Kreeganta Choodu
Rama Nenu Neevadu Rama Natho Mathadu [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
Rama Naamamey Melu Rama (Swami) Chintaney Chaalu
Nee Naamamey Melu Nee Chintaney Chaalu
Naamamey Melu Chintaney Chaalu
Rama Neevu Nannelu Rama Raayadey Chaalu [ Rama Kodanda ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama who bears the bow and arrow, the crowned King of Ayodhya, who incarnated for the welfare of entire humanity. There is no refuge other than You, O Lord Rama, consort of Sita. I pleaded with You, O Lord, I got the support of your benevolent hand. Your one word is enough to contemplate and that is equivalent to a sack full (moota). O Lord, there is no song other than the song about You, there is no path other than the way to You. O Rama, who is there for Your company, why don't you look at me? I am Yours O Lord, please converse with me. Chanting the name of Rama is better, contemplating on Rama is enough. Please protect me, O Lord Rama, Your name alone is enough.

title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Hari Narayana [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Sri Lakshmi Ramana Narayana
Om Anantha Narayana (Hari) (3)
meaning: Worship Lord Rama, Krishna, Govinda and Narayana, the Lord of the Goddess of Prosperity (goddess Lakshmi). He is the infinite, supreme Lord Hari.

title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana
lyrics:
Rajeeva Nayana Narayana
Ranga Vittala Hari Narayana
Narayana Narayana [ Ranga Vittala ]
Ramaneeya Roopa Narayana (2)
meaning: Sing of Lord Narayana the Lotus eyed and the charming One, who has incarnated as Rama, Krishna, Govinda and Panduranga Vittala.

title: Rama Krishna Govinda Narayana Keshava
lyrics:
Radhika Ramana Madhava Jaya Ranga Deva
Harey Rama Harey Krishna Sita Rama Raghava [ Radhika Ramana ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana, Keshava and Madhava (names of Krishna), the one adored by Radhika (Radha). Victory to You, the Lord of the stage (world). Glory to Lord Rama and Lord Krishna.

title: Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Panduranga Panduranga Panduranga Hari
Makara Kundala Dhari Bhaktha Bandhu Shourie
Mukthi Daata Shakthi Daata Vittala Narahari [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Tulasi Dhara Kandhara Bhaktha Hrudaya Mandira
Mandaradri Dhara Mukunda Indiresha Sri Hari
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari, Mukunda, Murari. He is also Lord Panduranga of Pandharpur, who wears fish shaped earrings. He is the near and dear of the forlorn devotee. He is Vittala, who bestows liberation and power. Decorated by a garland of Tulasi leaves, He resides in the temple of the heart. He is the one who supported Mount Mandara, He is the one who liberates, Lord of Indra and is the Supreme Lord, Sri Hari.

title: Rama Krishna Hari Mukunda Murari
title2: Rama Krishna Hari Hari Mukunda Murari
lyrics:
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari Hari
Deva Deva Deva Mahadeva Deva
Adi Deva Deva Brahma Vishnu Deva
Brahma Vishnu Deva Sathya Sai Deva [ Panduranga Hari ... ]
Panduranga Hari Jai Jai Panduranga Hari Hari (4)
Panduranga Hari Hari (2)
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Hari, Mukunda, the one who liberates and Murari, the one who slayed the demon, Mura. He is Lord Panduranga, the Lord of Lords. He is the great God, Mahadeva (Shiva), He is the primordial Lord, the trinity of Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva. He has taken form as Lord Sathya Sai. Victory to Lord Panduranga.

title: Rama Krishna Hari Narayana
lyrics:
Deena Janavana Hari Narayana
Deena Sharanya Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Harana Sai Narayana
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Krishna, Narayana and Hari. Lord Narayana, who is the protector and the one in whom the downtrodden takes refuge. He is none other than Lord Sai, who protects and liberates us from the bondage of life and death.

title: Rama Krishna Hari Sathya Sai
title2: Rama Krishna Hari Sathya Sai Murari
lyrics:
Sai Murari Sathya Sai Murari [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Allah Eshwar Yesu Bhi Tum Ho
Tum Ho Ram Aur Shyama Murari
Buddha Bhi Tum Ho Brahma Bhi Tum Ho [ Sai Murari ... ]
meaning: Oh Sai Baba, You are none other than Rama, Krishna and Hari. Victory to You! You are Jesus Christ, You are Allah. You are Eshwar, Buddha and Lord Brahma.

title: Rama Krishna Jaya Bolo (Bhaja Mana)
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Jaya Sai Krishna Jaya [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Raghukula Bhooshana Rama Rama Ram
Radha Madhava Shyama Shyama Shyam
Harey Ram Harey Ram Harey Krishna Harey Ram
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Lord Rama and Krishna. Victory to Lord Rama, the Jewel of the Raghu dynasty. Victory to the dark-hued Lord Krishna, Lord of Radha. Chant the Mantra, 'Harey Ram Harey Krishna'.

title: Rama Krishna Precious Lords
title2: Rama Krishna precious Lords, spreading joy to the worlds
lyrics:
Sai Krishna gracious Lord, giving us glimpses of Your grace
Jesus's Father Primal Lord, hey rejoice, hey rejoice
Allah Eshwar Lords, host of Angels are here cheer for all
Shirdi Sai Lord of Peace, with thanks we are singing Sai Ram
Sathya Sai Lord of Truth, shining Love for all beings in the worlds

title: Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Rama
title2: Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Rama Krishna Bhajorey
lyrics:
Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Keshava [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Nanda Nanda Shyama Govinda
Pandari Natha Panduranga Bhajorey
meaning: Sing the Glory of Rama, Krishna, Hari, Madhava, Govinda and Keshava. Sing the Glory of Shyama, the son of Nanda and Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur.

title: Rama Krishna Sai Ram Ai
title2: Rama Krishna Sai Ram Ai no Melody
lyrics:
Sai Prema, Sai Ram Kokoro no Kotoba wa Inori
Iesu, Sai Buddha, Omoi Todoke
Idai Naru Kami yo, Sathya Sai Baba
Towa ni Kagayaku, Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: Magnificent Sai, You are Rama, Krishna, Jesus, and Buddha. You shine with Your eternal form. The words of my heart are prayers for the melody of love.

title: Rama Krishna Tum Ho
title2: Rama Krishna Tum Ho Jaya Ram Jaya Ram
lyrics:
Sai Krishna Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
Yesu Pitha Tum Ho Hey Ram Hey Ram
Allah Eshwar Ho Allah Ho Akbar
Shirdi Sai Tum Ho Sai Ram Sai Ram
alt_lyrics:
Rama Krishna Prabhu Tu Hey Ram Hey Ram
Sai Krishna Prabhu Tu Sai Ram Sai Ram
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Tu Hey Ram Hey Ram
Allah Eshwar Tu Allah Ho Akbar
Shirdi Sai Prabhu Tu Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: O Lord Sai You are everybody - Rama, Krishna, Jesus, Allah, Eshwar (Shiva) and Shirdi Sai.

title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narahari Vittala
lyrics:
Harey Rama Vittala Harey Krishna Vittala
Panduranga Purandara Pandari Vittala
Shirdi Sai Vittala Parthi Sai Vittala [ Panduranga ... ]
Sathya Sai Vittala Parthi (Prema) Sai Vittala
Sathya Dharma Vittala Shanthi Prema Vittala
Sai Vittala Sarvam Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari who have incarnated in human form. Glory to Lord Vittala, who is Rama and Krishna. Lord Panduranga, the indweller of the heart, is verily Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. He who preaches Truth, Righteousness, Peace is Sai, who encompasses all. Sing the glory of Panduranga Vittala.

title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narayana Hari
title2: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
lyrics:
Vishwa Roopa Vasudeva Narayana Hari Hari
Narayana Hari Hari Om Narayana Hari Hari [ Vishwa Roopa ... ]
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, Hari, Narayana, the all-pervading cosmic form of the Lord of Lords, Lord Hari, who is verily Lord Sai.

title: Rama Krishna Vasudeva Sai Nandalal
lyrics:
Harey Rama Rama Krishna Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Sai Nandalal
Sai Nandalal Sai Nandalal
Shirdi Vasa Srinivasa Sai Nandalal [ Sai Nandalal ]
meaning: Pray to Sai, who is Rama, Krishna, Vasudeva, son of Nanda. Glory to Rama, Krishna and Sai. Sai is the son of Nanda, born again. Refuge of the meek and the forlorn. He is Sai of Shirdi, Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati (Vishnu).

title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki
title2: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
lyrics:
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Jaya Hanuman Gnana Guna Saagar
Jaya Kapees Tihu Lok Ujaagar
Rama Doot Atulita Baladhama
Anjani Putra Pavan Suta Naama
O Ram Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Sai Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
(Fast)
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Shankar Suvan Kesari Nandan
Tej Prataap Maha Jag Vandan
Prabhu Charitra Sunibe Ko Rasiya
Ram Lakhan Sita Man Basiya
O Ram Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Sai Naam Ke Baan Ki Jaya Bolo Hanuman Ki
Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki

title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo
title2: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki (4)
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, Lakshmana, Sita. Victory to Hanuman (monkey devotee of Lord Rama) and Lord Sai Rama.

title: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo
title2: Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki
lyrics:
Anjani Putra Balabheema Anjaneya Balabheema
Balabheem (6) Balabheema
Vayu Kumara Balabheema Vanara Veera Balabheema [ Balabheem ... ]
Parthi Pureesha Sai Rama Pavana Purusha Sai Rama
Sai Ram (6) Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, Lakshmana, Sita and Hanuman. Victory to the mighty son of Anjana and Vayu (God of wind). Victory to the valorous one of the monkey clan. Bow to the Lord of Parthi, Lord Sai Rama, the pure and blemishless one.

title: Rama Mama Bandho Sai Rama
title2: Rama Mama Bandho Sai Rama Daya Sindho
lyrics:
Rama Raghuveera Mama Bandho
Rama Ranadheera Daya Sindho
Rama Mama Bandho Sai (Sayeesha)
Rama Daya Sindho
 
Jai Jai Ram Sai Ram (4)
Rama Mama Bandho Sai Rama Daya Sindho
meaning: Lord Rama is our very own relative and is the ocean of mercy and compassion. He is the hero of the Raghu dynasty and is a fearless warrior. Victory to Rama, who is verily our Lord Sai.

title: Rama Naam Smaranam Samastha Paapa
title2: Rama Naam Smaranam Samastha Paapa Haranam
lyrics:
Kaama Krodha Haranam Raghuveera Naama Smaranam
Deena Janodharanam Bhavaabdhi Dukha Haranam
meaning: Contemplating on the Name of Rama destroys all sins. Remembering the Name of the Hero of Raghu Dynasty (Rama) destroys desire and anger. Serving the hapless and the forlorn destroys the sorrows of the cycle of birth and death.

title: Rama Naama Smaranam Sada Mokshanandakaram
lyrics:
Sri Krishna Naama Smaranam Sada Hrudaya Kutuhalam
Sri Govinda Naama Smaranam Sada Lakshmi Krupakaram
Sri Anjaneya Smaranam Sada Dhairyanandakaram
Sri Sai Naama Smaranam Sada Sarva Anandakaram
meaning: Chanting Rama's name continuously confers liberation. Chanting Krishna's name repeatedly confers enthusiasm in the Heart. Chanting Govinda's name repeatedly confers prosperity. Chanting the Name of Anjaneya (Hanuman) continuously confers courage or fearlessness. Chanting the Name of Sai always confers bliss for all.

title: Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
lyrics:
Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Japo Rey [ Rama Naama ... ]
Sai Darshanam Paapa Nashanam
Sai Sparshanam Moksha Dayakam
meaning: Always worship Lord Rama who helps to liberate oneself. Incessantly chant the liberating name of Rama. The darshan (sight) of Sai liberates one from all sins. The touch of Sai bestows enlightenment.

title: Rama Naama Tarakam Sada Bhajorey
lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Sada Japo Rey [ Rama Naama ... ]
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
meaning: Incessantly worship Lord Rama who helps attain liberation. Victory to Lord Rama, who wields the 'Kodanda' bow. Victory to Lord Rama, the crowned King. Victory to Lord Rama, the bestower of auspiciousness.

title: Rama Namo Rama Namo
title2: Rama Namo Rama Namo Rama Namo Sai Rama Namo
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Namo
Vasudeva Nandana Krishna Namo [ Rama Namo … ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara Baba Namo
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Namo
Sai Namo Sai Namo Sai Namo Sathya Sai Namo
meaning: Salutations to Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha and to Lord Krishna, son of Vasudeva. Salutations to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who is verily Lord Rama and Krishna.

title: Rama Raghava
lyrics:
Ranjita Roopa Hey Rajeeva Lochana [ Rama Raghava ... ]
Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
Ravikula Soma Ravikula Soma [ Rama Rama Ravikula ... ]
Ravana Samhara Ranadheera
meaning: Rama, otherwise known as Raghava, attracts all with His Form, the lotus eyed One. The doyen of Ravi lineage, the indomitable warrior who annihilated the demon Ravana.

title: Rama Raghava ( Sai )
lyrics:
Raghu Nandana Ravikula Soma [ Rama ... ]
Ravana Mardhana Ramabhi Rama
Ramethi Rama Raghu ( Sai ) Rama
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, Lord Sai Rama and Lord Raghava. Rama, also known as Raghava, is the Scion of Raghu dynasty, of Solar lineage. Rama who vanquished the demon Ravana, has now incarnated as Sai Rama.

title: Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama
title2: (Jaya) Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Rama Raghava Paahi Maam (2)
lyrics: (Jaya) Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Krishna Keshava Raksha Maam (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, and to Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty. Please protect and save us.

title: Rama Raghuvara Ram Sita Ram
title2: Rama Raghuvara Ram Sita Ram Rama Ram (2)
lyrics:
Rama Dasharatha Nandana Kamaneeya Komala Ram
Rama Danava Bhanjana Kodanda Raja Ram
Deena Bandhu Karuna Sindhu Rama Sai Ram
Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Bhaja Mana Rama Pavana Naam
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Sita and the son of King Dasharatha. Lord Rama, the tender, handsome one is the annihilator of the demon clan. He is the one who wields the Kodanda bow, the ocean of compassion and who is dear to the forlorn. Sing, O mind, the purifying name of Lord Rama.

title: Rama Raghuvara Rama Sita Rama
title2: Rama Raghuvara Rama Sita Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Sri Rama Rama Ram Sai Rama Rama Ram [ Rama Raghuvara ... ]
Hey Patitha Pavana Ram Hey Shyamala Komala Ram
Hey Vaidehi Priya Ram Sai Ram Rama Jaya Ram [ Sri Rama ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty whose consort is Mother Sita; He is the handsome and tender Lord who liberates the penitent. He is the beloved of Vaidehi (Sita), victory to Lord Ram.

title: Rama Rama Jaya Jaya Rama
lyrics:
Raghuveeram Ranadheeram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Atma Ramam Akhanda Ramam
Ananda Sada Adbhuta Ramam
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty, the illustrious warrior. He is the indwelling Atma, the unique one. He is the wonderful Rama who bestows eternal bliss.

title: Rama Rama Jaya Raghukula Tilaka
lyrics:
Rajeeva Lochana Ram
Eshwaramba Sutha Jaya Jaga Vandana
Ratnakara Kula Deepa (3)
