meaning: Worship the lotus-eyed Lord Rama, who is the auspicious symbol of the Raghu dynasty. He is verily Lord Sathya Sai, the son of Mother Eshwaramba and is the glory of the Ratnakara dynasty.

title: Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram
title2: Rama Rama Jaya Raja Ram Rama Rama Jaya Sita Ram (4)
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Sita.

title: Rama Rama Raghu Ram Shyam
title2: Rama Rama Raghu Ram Shyam Shyam Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Koi Kahey Ram Koi Kahey Rahim Koi Kahey Ghana Shyam
Nanak Yesu Buddha Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
meaning: Sing of Lord Rama, the dark-hued Krishna, Some call Him Ram, some Rahim, some say the dark blue hued one. Some bow to Nanak, Jesus, Buddha, Mahavir. Lord Sai is one with all of them.

title: Rama Rama Ram Raghu Nandana
title2: Rama Rama Ram Raghu Nandana Atma Ram (Sri)
lyrics:
Rama Rama Ram Dasharatha Nandana Ram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Kausalyatmaja Vaidehi Priya Ayodhya Vasi Ram
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Maruti Sevitha Veera Kodanda Ram
Eshwaramba Priya Sutha Hey Avatari Sai Ram
Jai Jai Ram Janaki Ram
Jai Jai Ram Sita (Sai) Ram
meaning: Salutations to Lord Rama of Raghu clan, the indweller of hearts. He was the son of Dasharatha and Kausalya to whom He was the very life. Lord Rama, the consort of Sita was the resident of Ayodhya. Glory to Lord Rama who destroyed Ravana with His famous bow, Kodanda. He is served by Hanuman (Maruti). Sing the name of the son of Eshwaramba, the Lord of Puttaparthi, Lord Sai who is the incarnation of Lord Rama. Victory to Lord Rama and Lord Sai.

title: Rama Rama Rama
title2: Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Patheetha Pavana Ram, Deena Rakshaka Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Dasharatha Nandana Ram Dashamukha Mardhana Ram
Lakshmana Sevitha Ram Lakshmi Manohara Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram (Sri)
meaning: Salutaions to You, Lord Rama, the refuge of the downtrodden and the protector of the destitute. You are the slayer of the ten headed Ravana. You are worshipped and attended by Brother Lakshmana and You are the enchanter of Goddess Lakshmi.

title: Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda
title2: Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kodanda Ram
lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Kalyana Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Vaidehi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Pattabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Jaya Atmabhi Rama
Rama Rama Rama Prabhu Sai Rama
meaning: Victory to Lord Rama, the one with the famous bow, Kodanda. Victory to Him, the bestower of auspiciousness. Victory to Him, the beloved of Vaidehi (Mother Sita). Victory to Lord Rama, the crown Prince, the one with the sweet form and who resides in our hearts, Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Rama.

title: Rama Rama Rama Ram Sai
title2: Rama Rama Rama Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Karunya Rama Sri Sai Rama [ Rama Rama ... ]
Vaidehi Ram Sai Ram (Rama)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (Sathya)
meaning: Sing of Rama, who has come as Sai Ram. The compassionate Rama, Lord Rama The consort of Vaidehi (Sita), Lord Rama. Sing of Sai Rama, Sathya Sai Rama.

title: Rama Rama Rama Rama
title2: Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Naama Tarakam
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Vasudeva Bhakthi Mukthi Dayakam [ Rama Rama ... ]
Janaki Manoharam Sakala Loka Nayakam
Shankaradi Sevyamana Divya Naama Keertanam
meaning: Chant the sacred name of Lord Rama which liberates one from the cycle of birth and death. Chant the name of Lord Krishna who bestows devotion and liberation. Chant the name of Lord Rama, the Lord of all the worlds and the one who pleases Mother Janaki (Sita). Sing the beautiful name of Lord Rama whose name is chanted even by Lord Shankara (Shiva).

title: Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
lyrics:
Rama Rama Ramachandra
 Lord of Beauty, Lord of Bliss, Lord who made all this
 Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai, embodiment of Bliss
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramachandra
 As I look into Your eyes, seeing infinity
 I know that You surely will set my soul free
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramachandra
 In my heart You softly say, Love is all that's True
 Loving You, sweet Sathya Sai, is all that I can do
alt_lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramachandra
 Lord of Beauty, Lord of Bliss, Lord who made all this
 Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai, Thy Lotus Feet I kiss
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramachandra
 As I look into Your eyes, seeing infinity
 I know that You surely will set my soul free
 Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram
 Rama Rama Ramachandra
 In my heart You softly say, Love is all that's True
 Loving You, sweet Sathya Sai, is all that I can do

title: Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama
lyrics:
Tomo ni Kanadeyou
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna
Anata eno Ai
Sai Rama Rama Rama Rama
Sai Krishna Sai Krishna
meaning: Let us dance together with the love of Lord Rama and Lord Krishna. Lord Sai is verily Rama and Krishna.

title: Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama
title2: Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama Namo
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Yesu Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Buddha Buddha Sai Buddha Namo [ Rama Rama ... ]
Allah Allah Allah Sai Allah Namo
Zohrashtra Zohrashtra Sai Namo
Mahavira Mahavira Sai Namo
Guru Nanak Guru Nanak Nanak Namo
alt_lyrics:
Rama Rama Rama Sai Rama Namo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Yesu Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Buddha Buddha Sai Buddha Namo 
Rama Sai Rama Namo Krishna Sai Krishna Namo
Yesu Sai Yesu Namo
Buddha Namo
Zohrashtra Zohrashtra Sai Namo
Mahavira Mahavira Sai Namo
Guru Nanak Guru Nanak Nanak Namo
meaning: I bow to Lord Rama, Krishna, Jesus Christ, Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavir and Guru Nanak. All are but emanations of our Lord Sai.

title: Rama Rama Rama Sita
lyrics:
Srimad Ravikulamandu Janinchi 
Sita Devini Preethi Varinchi 
Premanahalya Sapamu Deerchi 
Priya Bhakthula Rakshinchina Sri Raghu [ Rama, Rama ... ] 

Munduga Hanumanthuni Deevinchi
Mudamalaraga Ravisuthu Palinchi 
Chendina Kinukatho Vaalini Drunchi 
Cherina Vanara Veerula Brochina [ Rama, Rama ... ]

Karadooshanamukha Danujula Drunchi 
Karuna Jatayuvu Gathi Savarinchi 
Sarabhangadi Muneendrula Brochi
Sabhari Phalamulu Prema Bhujinchina [ Rama, Rama ... ] 

Ravanadisura Vairula Drunchi 
Ramanithoda Sadhula Palinchi 
Aavana Rasini Neetu Bandinchi 
Aadaramuga Vibheeshanu Brochina [ Rama, Rama ... ]

title: Rama Rama Rama Sita
title2: Rama Rama Rama Sita Ramachandra Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Govinda Harey Paahi Maam
Krishna Krishna Gopala Vasudeva Paahi Maam [ Rama Krishna ... ]
Hara Hara Gangadhara Neelakanta Paahi Maam [ Rama Krishna ... ]
meaning: Protect me O Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. Protect me O Lord Krishna, the son of Vasudeva and the protector of cows. Protect me O Lord Shiva, the blue-throated one who holds the river Ganges on His head. Protect me O Lord Rama, Krishna and Govinda.

title: Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama
title2: Rama Rama Rama Sita Rama Raghu Rama (4)
meaning: Chant incessantly the name of Rama, the consort of Sita, the Scion of Raghu dynasty.

title: Rama Rama Ravikula Soma
lyrics:
Kodanda Rama Pattabhi Rama
Sai Rama Saketha Rama
Jaya Jaya Rama Janaki Rama
meaning: O lotus-eyed Lord Rama, the Crown Prince of Solar dynasty, the resident of the heart of devotees and holder of the 'Kodanda' bow, You are merciful and beautiful to look at. Victory to Lord Rama consort of Mother Sita. You are none other than Lord Sai.

title: Rama Rama Sai Ram Sita
title2: Rama Rama Sai Ram Sita Ram Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Ram Shyama Shyama Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram (2) [ Rama Rama ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Sita Ram Vasudeva Nandana Radhey Shyam
Eshwaramba Nandana [ Parthi Pureeshwara ... ]
meaning: Glory be to Lord Rama, son of Dasharatha and the consort of Mother Sita. Glory to Lord Krishna, the dark-hued son of Vasudeva and the beloved of Radha. Glory to the very embodiment of Rama and Krishna, Lord Sai of Puttaparthi, son of Mother Eshwaramba.

title: Rama Rama Sai Rama
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Madhura Manohara Sundara Naam
Shyamala Komala Nayanabhi Ram
Ravikula Mandana Rajana Ram
Parama Pavana Mangala Dham
alt_lyrics:
Rama Rama Sai Rama
Parthi Pureesha Sai Ram [ Rama Rama ... ]
Madhura Manohara Sundara Naam
Shyamala Komala Nayanabhi Ram
Ravikula Mandana Rajalalaam
Parama Pavana Mangala Dham
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama and Lord Sai of Puttaparthi. O Lord Rama, nectarine is Thy name. You are exceedingly beautiful and charming with a graceful look. You are the jewel of the Ravi Kula (descendant of the Solar dynasty) and You are the greatest among all kings. Reciting Your name confers auspiciousness.

title: Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama
title2: Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Ram (2)
lyrics:
Kausalya Nandana Dasharatha Ram
Janaki Vallabha Jaya Jaya Ram
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Ram
Ravana Mardhana Ranadheera Ram
Ayodhya Vasi Raja Ram
Anjana Priya Sutha Atmabhi Ram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama, who has incarnated in this Kali Age as Lord Sai Ram. O Lord Rama, the darling son of Kausalya and Dasharatha, victory to Thee, the beloved of Sita. Glory to the gentle Lord who was served by brother Lakshmana. Glory to the illustrious warrior who destroyed the demon Ravana. Glory to the resident King of Ayodhya, who is the indwelling Lord of Hanuman, the dear son of Anjana.

title: Rama Sharana Bhajo Rama Harey
lyrics:
Ahalyodharaka Rama Harey
Alakh Niranjan Rama Harey
Dasharatha Nandana Rama Harey
Sai Jagavandana Rama Harey
Rama Harey Sai Rama Harey (2)
meaning: Sing of glorious surrender to Lord Ram, the one who liberated the chaste devotee - Ahalya. He is the one who is beyond attributes, the spotlessly pure Rama. Glory to the son of Dasharatha. He is none other than Sai, adored by the whole world. Glory to Sai Rama.

title: Rama Sita Krishna Radha
title2: Rama Sita Krishna Radha Vitthala Rakhumayi Jai Jai Vittala Rakhumayi (2)
lyrics:
Surdas Prabhu Karuna Sagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara Vittala Rakhumayi
Sai Natha Prabhu Gaana Manohara Vittala Rakhumayi Jai Jai Vittala Rakhumayi
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Jai (3)
Vittala Jai Jai Panduranga Jai Jai
Vittala Vittala Vittala Jai Jai
meaning: Victory to Lords Rama, Krishna and Vitthala whose praises were sung by Surdas and Meera. Victory to Lord Sai who is pleased with music and who is none other than Vitthala.

title: Rama Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jaya
title2: Rama Sri Ramachandra Jaya Jaya Rama
lyrics:
Karunabhi Rama Kamaneeya Rama [ Rama Sri ... ]
Kodanda Rama Kalyana Rama
Sharanagatha Paripalana Sri Charana Rama
Rama Sri Rama Sai Rama
Samara Vijaya Rama Saketa Rama
meaning: Pray to Lord Rama, who shines like the full moon, the compassionate, the attractive and the auspicious one who wields the bow, Kodanda . He is the one who protects those who surrender at His Lotus Feet. Pray to Lord Rama, the victorious heavenly warrior.

title: Rama Sumira Man Rama Sumira
title2: Rama Sumira Man Rama Sumira Man
lyrics:
Rama Sumira Man Ram
Janaki Vallabha Dasharatha Nandana
Ramachandra Sri Ram
Bhaja Mana Sita Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sita Ram
Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam Shyam Bhaja Mana Radhey Shyam
Bhaja Mana Sai Ram Ram Bhaja Mana Sai Ram
meaning: O mind, chant the name of Lord Rama, the beloved of Sita and the son of King Dasharatha. Worship, O mind, Lord Rama, Lord Krishna and Lord Sai.

title: Rama, Krishna, Baba Avatar
lyrics:
Rama, Krishna, Baba Gurudeva
Hold me close to Your form, never let me go
Rama, Krishna, Baba Avatar
Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, all have come as one, as Sathya Sai Baba
Rama, Krishna, Baba Avatar (2x)

title: Rama, Rama, Rama
lyrics:
Krishna, Krishna, Krishna
Sathya Sai Baba

Inochi ga Utau
Kokoro ga Warau
Tamashi ga Hikaru
Kami no Ai

Seigi ni Mukau
Seigi ni Ikiru
Seigi wo Mederu
Kami no Ai

Rama, Rama, Rama
Krishna, Krishna, Krishna
Sathya Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord, You are Rama, Krishna, and Sathya Sai Baba. When I see You, my life sings, my heart laughs, and my soul shines bright for You are the God of Love. We must live with and cherish righteousness, for You are the God of Love.

title: Rama, Sai Baba, Sita Ram
lyrics:
Lord of righteousness, again You've come.
Sathya Sai Baba, Sita Ram,
Ram is Sai, God is only one.
Rama, Sai, Ramachandra, Sita Ram,
He is brighter than a thousand suns.
Shining through the hearts of everyone,
Sathya Sayeeshwaraya, Sita Ram.

(Close)
Rama, Sai Baba, Sita Ram,
Lord of righteousness, again You've come.

title: Ramachandra Prabhu Raghu Vamsha Rama
lyrics:
Sita Pathey Jaya Janaki Rama [ Ramachandra ... ]
Ahalyodharaka Sugunabhi Rama
Ravana Samhara Kodanda Rama
Ayodhya Rama Pattabhi Rama
Nava Nava Komala Sri Sai Rama [ Sita Pathey ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord Rama! In the Raghu Dynasty You have incarnated as Lord Ramachandra, the husband of Sita, the Lord of Janaki (Sita). Oh Most virtuous Lord Rama! You liberated Ahalya (devotee), destroyed the demon Ravana, as you wielded the Kodanda bow. Oh Lord of Ayodhya (city in the North of India), the crowned King, Lord Ram! You have incarnated as Lord Sai Ram, the ever new and tender embodiment of Love!

title: Ramachandra Raghuveera Ramachandra Ranadheera
lyrics:
Ramachandra Raghunatha Ramachandra Jagannatha
Ramachandra Mama Bandho Ramachandra Daya Sindho
Raghuveera Ranadheera
Raghunatha Jagannatha
Raghurama Parandhama
Mama Bandho Daya Sindho (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Rama, the hero of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to Ramachandra, the illustrious warrior prince. He is verily the heavenly abode, the goal of our life. He is the Lord of Raghu dynasty, the Lord of all worlds. He is our very own relative, the sea of mercy and compassion. Sing the glory of Lord Rama.

title: Ramachandra Sri Ram
lyrics:
Sai Rama Jaya Rama [ Ramachandra ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Dayabhi Rama
Dasha Mukha Mardhana Rama Rama
Tapasa Ranjana Taraka Naama
Ahalyodharaka Rama Rama
meaning: Victory to the merciful Lord Ramachandra, the darling son of Dasharatha. Glory to Thee, the slayer of the ten-headed demon - Ravana. We bow to You, O Lord with the liberating name that enthralls the saintly and the one who liberated Ahalya, the chaste devotee.

title: Ramam Bhajo Raghu Ramam Bhajo
lyrics:
Raghukula Tilakam Ramam Bhajo [ Ramam Bhajo ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Ramam Bhajo
Dashamukha Mardhana Ramam Bhajo
alt_lyrics:
Ramam Bhajo Raghu Ramam Bhajo
Raghukula Tilakam Ramam Bhajo [ Ramam Bhajo ... ]
Dasharatha Nandana Ramam Bhajo
Dashamukha Mardhana Ramam Bhajo
Vaidehi Priya Ramam Bhajo
Vaikunta Vasa Ramam Bhajo
meaning: Sing the name of Rama, who is the star of the Raghu clan, who is beloved son of Dasharatha and who slayed the ten-headed demon, Ravana.

title: Ranga Panduranga Jai Jai Vitthala
lyrics:
Pandhari Natha (Panduranga) 
Radhey Shyama (Panduranga) 
Parthi Pureesha (Panduranga) 
Vitthala Vitthala (Panduranga) 
Ranga Panduranga Jai Jai Vitthala
meaning: Victory to Lord Vitthala, known as Panduranga. He is the beloved of Radha, and has incarnated as Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi.

title: Ranga Ranga Panduranga Ranga Vittala
lyrics:
Vittala Krishna Vittala
Vittala Sai Vittala [ Ranga Ranga ... ]
Rukmini Sametha Pandari Natha
Parthi Ranga Vittala Deena Bandhu Vittala
Vittala Krishna Vittala [ Vittala Sai ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Panduranga, Vittala and Sai. He is Lord Krishna, installed along with Rukmini as the Lord of Pandharpur. He is our Sai Vittala of Parthi, the saviour of the meek.

title: Ranga Sri Ranga Jai Jai
title2: Ranga Sri Ranga Jai Jai Panduranga
lyrics:
Vittala Jai Vittala Jai Vittala Sri Ranga [ Ranga Sri ... ]
Radhey Govinda Giridhara Gopal
Natavara Naagara Murali Manohara
Parthi Pureeshwara Sri Sai Ranga
Jai Jai Panduranga (3)
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittal, the Lord of Pandharpur. He is Lord Krishna of Radha. He is Giridhar, the one who lifted the mountain. He who revels in mischief and is the stealer of hearts is none other than the Lord of Parthi, Sai Ranga.

title: Rangimarie, Rangimarie
title2: Rangimarie, Rangimarie, Rangimarie, Nau Mai Rangimarie
lyrics:
Aroha, Aroha, Aroha, Aroha, Aroha, Aroha, Aroha piki mai Aroha
Te Matua, Te Matua, Te Matua, Te Matua, Te Matua, Te Matua, kake mai kite atua e
Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue, Aue
meaning: Peace flow down; Love draw nigh; Oh God, come abreast; Emotion beyond words

title: Ratnakara Kula Bhooshana
lyrics:
Rajeeva Nayana Sai Narayana [ Ratnakara ... ]
Eshwaramba Nandana (Hey)
Tribhuvana Palana (Vanditha) Mrudu Charana
meaning: Oh Lotus-Eyed Lord Sai Narayana! You are the jewel of the Ratnakara dynasty. Oh Darling son of Mother Eshwaramba and the sustainer of all creation. Your soft, Lotus Feet are worshipped and adored by the entire universe.

title: Ravikula Mandana Rajeeva Lochana Raghava
lyrics:
Vasudeva Nandana Bandha Vimochana Keshava [ Ravikula Mandana ... ]
Karuna Niketana Krishna Janardhana Yadava
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Mohana Madhava
alt_lyrics:
Ravikula Mandana Rajeeva Lochana Raghava
Vasudeva Nandana Bandha Vimochana Vasudeva [ Ravikula Mandana ... ]
Karuna Niketana Krishna Janardhana Keshava
Sri Madhusudhana Murali Mohana Madhava
meaning: Lord Sai took the form of Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty. In Dwapara age, He was the son of Vasudeva, as Krishna, who liberates us from bondage. He is the abode of compassion, the protector of all, the one who conquered the demon Madhu and the one who enchants all with the melody from His flute.

title: Receive Me
title2: Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
lyrics:
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
I Am closer than your breath…I Am Eternal Life..never death
I live within you..I have not left
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
Surrender to Me..I Am your all
Surrender to Me..I won’t let you fall
Surrender to Me..use My Name to call
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
Let Me help you to climb the stairs
I Am the Only One that truly cares
I come to you for My Life to share
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
Let Me be The One who is strong
Drop all those concepts of right and wrong
Turn to Me and sing My Song…of Love/of Love
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
I Am giving MySelf to you through everyone
I Am the One Light..My Will Is Done
I Am in the midst of you and havin’ fun
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
It pleases Me when you do not fear
When you know that My Love is ever near
As you trust in Me…My Voice you hear
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now
 
Empty your heart of everything
Be willing to live for Me and simply sing
Let your life Be Mine that I might bring
My Love…My Love…
 
Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive Me…Receive My Love
Receive Me…Receive My Love...Receive Me...Receive My Love….Right Now

title: Recuerdame Sai (3) Quien Soy
lyrics:
Soy El Om, Soy El Om, Eterno Om
A Través De Esta Vida Llena de Ilusiones Recuerdame Sai Quien Soy Yo
Soy Verdad, Soy La Paz y Eternidad
Bienaaventuranza y Amor Puro Recuerdame Sai Quien Soy Yo
Soy Amor, Soy Amor, Divino Amor
meaning: Remind me my Lord who I am; I am Om, the eternal Om; Through this life of distraction and illusion, remind me my Lord who I am; I am Truth, Peace and Divine Bliss; O Lord, You are the embodiment of Bliss and Love, remind me who I am; I am Love, pure Love.

title: Rejoice In The Lord Sai
title2: Rejoice In The Lord Sai Baba And Again I Say Rejoice
lyrics:
Rejoice,Rejoice And Again I Say Replace
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Rama And Again I Say Rejoice
Rejoice,Rejoice And Again I Say Rejoice
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Krishna..
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Buddha ...
Rejoice In The Lord Sai Jesus ...

title: Remind Me My Lord
title2: Remind Me My Lord (3) Who I Am
lyrics:
I Am Om, I Am Om, Eternal Om
Through This Life Of Distraction And Of Illusion, Remind Me ...
... My Lord, Who I Am
I Am Truth, I Am Peace, Divine Bliss
Ananda Swaroopa, Hey Prema Swaroopa, Remind Me My Lord Who I Am
I Am Love, I Am Love, Pure Love

title: Remove the obstacles we face
title2: Oh Lord, set us free, raise us up to be with Thee
lyrics:
Fill our hearts with love divine, grant us joy and peace like Thine
Lead us, guide us every day, let us tread Your blissful way
Oh Lord, we ask Your grace, remove the obstacles we face
Show us the path straight to Thee, that always with You we will be
Hold our lives in Your kind hand, lead us to Your blissful land

title: Remover of obstacles
lyrics:
God of wisdom, Creator of the universe,
Remove the obstacles from our path, oh Lord.
Lead us to the temple of divine truth,
That in surrender we find our freedom.
Lord Sathya Sai, merciful protector,
You are the God of the great and the small.
With the lamp of love You light the way,
You reveal the secret of Your blessed divinity,
Lord Sathya Sai, merciful protector.

title: Renge no Miashi ni Sasage
title2: Renge no Miashi ni Sasage yo Ai no Kokoro Sai Ram
lyrics:
Inochi no Hikari Mamorita mou Ai no Inori Sai Ram
Ai wa Kami, Kami wa Ai, Shinri Tsutaeta mou
Sai Isu, Sai Buddha, Sai Baba, Sai Ram
Sai Rama, Hari Sai Krishna, Hari Sai Baba, Sai Ram
meaning: Bow at the divine lotus feet of Sai Ram who dwells in our heart with love. Sai Ram, You are my divine protector, the light of my life, and the love of my prayers. God is Love, Love is God, this is the divine truth You convey to us. Sai, You are Jesus, Buddha, and Baba. Sai, You are Rama, Krishna, and Baba.

title: Renge no Miashi no Shikou
title2: Renge no Miashi no Shikou no Kami yo
lyrics:
Sadguru Sathya Sai Baba
Rinne no Kusari wo Tokihanachi Tamou
Ooinaru Avatar (Sai) [ Sadguru ... ]
meaning: Let us bow to the beautiful lotus feet of our Supreme Lord and Magnificent Avatar (Incarnation), Sathya Sai Baba, who breaks the chains of our rebirth.

title: Repeat His Name Sai Ram
title2: Repeat His Name, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
lyrics:
Say It With Love, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
Picture His Form, Sai Ram, Sai Ram
He Is Everywhere, Feel Him Shining Within You
Rama Rama Ram Ram, Sai Rama Ram Ram

title: Reveal Yourself
title2: Lord, I’ve sought You life after life,
lyrics:
Sometimes as a husband, Lord, sometimes as a wife,
As a child, I held Your hand and learned to walk,
As mother and as father, Lord, I taught You how to talk,
Lord, I’ve been a traveler following a star,
A soldier and a pilgrim, Lord, I’ve sought You near and far,
Oh Lord, my name is Everyman, my face is every face,
And in this sacred silence, Lord, I ask You for Your grace.
Reveal Yourself, reveal Yourself to me,
Reveal Yourself as the one reality,
Show me Your divinity in everything I see,
And show me You’re the light inside of me.
And now I stand before You, Lord, at last,
Letting go my future, Lord, and letting go my past,
And in the end I know that from the start,
The one that I’ve been searching for is right inside my heart,
Lord, I’ve been a traveler following a star,
A soldier and a pilgrim, Lord, I’ve sought You near and far,
Oh, Lord, my name is Everyman, my face is every face,
And in this sacred silence, Lord, I ask You for Your grace.
Reveal Yourself, reveal Yourself to me,
Reveal Yourself as the one reality,
Show me Your divinity in everything I see,
And show me You’re the light inside of me.

title: Rhum Jhum Nacho Nanda Dular
lyrics:
Madhava Murahara Madana Gopal [ Rhum Jhum ... ]
Radha Manohara Natavara Lal
Govinda Giridhara Murali Gopal
meaning: Chant the many names of Lord Krishna - Madhava, Natavara, Gopala and Govinda. Pray to the Divine Dancer, the beloved child of Nanda. Glory to the Lord of Radha, the destroyer of demon, Mura and the mischievous enchanter with the flute who protected His devotees by lifting the mountain.

title: Ribbons of Light
title2: Ribbons of light streaming through all beings
lyrics:
God glistening everywhere
Lord, You shine through every soul
Radiating love to all
 
Sounds of God throughout creation
Creating a whole in diversity
Lord, You fill the world with light
A constant reminder that we are one
 
Shining through the blackest night
Showing love where to return
Lord, You guide me ever closer
Through this dream of human life

title: Rise and dance for all to see
title2: Rise and dance for all to see, Nataraja Shiva
lyrics:
Play your drums and raise the beat, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance and dance for me, Nataraja Shiva
 Only you can end this dream, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance, we yearn for Thee, Nataraja Shiva
 For your dance will set us free, Nataraja Shiva
 Dance your dance and make us see, Nataraja Shiva
 All are one and all are Thee, Nataraja Shiva

title: Riversong
title2: The river is fast, the river is slow,
lyrics:
The river is rain and the river is snow,
The river is high and the river is low,
It’ll take you to the sea. (4x)

Oh, riversong, singing to me, telling me, “you are of the sea”,
Oh, riversong, singing to me, telling me, “you will make it to the sea”.
You will make it to the sea. (4x)

From the mountain up high to the valley below,
The rain will come and the rain will go,
The river is high, and the river is low,
It’ll take you to the sea.
It’ll take you to the sea. (4x)

Oh, oh, oh, listen to the riversong, oh oh, oh, calling to me,
Oh, oh, oh, can’t you hear the riversong, oh singing of the sea.

The sun is shining on the mountaintop,
The snow is melting, and it’s drop by drop,
It’s starting to trickle, and it’s starting to flow,
And other are coming, and it’s starting to grow,
And it’s tumbling through the forest and beginning its song,
It sings out louder and it’s rushing along,
It sings about heaven, and it sings about rain,
It sings about pleasure, and it sings about pain,
It sings about the mountain, and it sings about the sun,
How many come together, and they’re flowing as one,
It sings about you, and it sings about me,
And it’s rushing to the sea.

Come, come, come, come and sing the riversong,
Come, come, come, come along with me,
Come, come, come, come and sing the riversong,
Oh, sailing to the sea.
Riversong, take me to the sea, (2x)
Oooh, take me to the sea.

title: Round and round, up and down
title2: Round and round, up and down, don't you hear the heavenly sound?
lyrics:
Over and over and over again
 Om Sri Sai Ram
 Over and over and over again
 It will never, ever end - Om
 Round and round, up and down, don't you hear the heavenly sound - Om

title: Rudolph The Red Nosed Reindeer
lyrics:
Had a very shiny nose, (LIKE A LIGHTBULB)
And if you ever saw it, (SAW IT)
You would even say it glows (LIKE A FLASHLIGHT).
All of the other reindeer (REINDEER)
Used to laugh and call him names, (LIKE PINOCCHIO)
They never let poor Rudolph (RUDOLPH)
Join in any reindeer games (LIKE MONOPOLY).
Then one foggy Christmas eve,
Santa came to say, (HO HO HO)
"Rudolph with your nose so bright,
Won't you guide my sleigh tonight?”
Then how the reindeer loved him (LOVED HIM)
As they shouted out with glee, (YIPEE)
"Rudolph, the red-nosed reindeer, (REINDEER)
You'll go down in history!” (LIKE GEORGE WASHINGTON)

title: Rudra Swaroopa Omkara Natha
lyrics:
Neelakantha Sai Deena Natha
Tandava Priyakara Girija Ramana
Vibhuti Sundara Kailasa Rana
Lingodhbhava Kara Shiva Yogeshwara
meaning: Lord Shiva, with the blue throat, is the protector of the meek. He is the cosmic dancer, the delight of Mother Parvathi and the embodiment of Om. Lord of Kailasa, with the eye of wisdom and adorned with holy ash is the source of creative energy. He is Lord Sai.

title: Saa Ai no Hi wo
title2: Saa Ai no Hi wo Tomosou, Megami Sama no Hi wo
lyrics: Watashi wo Michibiku Yasashii Manazashi (2)
meaning: Come let us light the fire of love from our loving Goddess who guides us with Her kind and loving gaze.

title: Saa Funade no Toki wa
title2: Saa Funade no Toki wa Kitari
lyrics:
Ai no Kaze wo Ho ni Uke Susumou
Kono Fune wa Sri Sathya Sai (2)
Heian no Umi he Izanau yo
meaning: The time to set sail has arrived! With the winds of love pushing the sails, we advance forward. Sri Sathya Sai, You are the very ship we sail on. You carry us through the oceans of peace and tranquility.

title: Saa Utaou Ai wo Utaou
lyrics:
Ai wo Wakachiau Yorokobi wo
Kami to Tomo ni Utaouyo
Let's sing a song for Love, Saiai no Tomo yo
Let's love all serve all Ai ni Ikiyou
meaning: Let us sing out with love and share this joy with everyone. Let us sing out to be together with Swami. Let us sing a song for Love to our beloved friend. Let's live with love and serve everyone.

title: Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai
title2: Sab Ka Malik Ek Hai Sai Tum Ho Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram
Manava Seva Madhava Sab Ko Seva Karo
Bhajan Bina Sukh Shanthi Nahin Sai Bhajan Karo
Prem Se Sab Ko Seva Karo Sai Bhajan Karo
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the Lord of all. You foster all religions, O Lord of Puttaparthi. Service to mankind is service to God, so serve everyone. There is no happiness or peace without singing the glory of God. Serve all with love and sing the glory of Lord Sai.

title: Sabari Giri Vasa Parama Dayala
lyrics:
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa [ Sabari Giri ... ]
Hari Hara Suthaney Sri Manikanta
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa (2)
meaning: Take refuge in Lord Ayyappa adorned with a necklace of precious gems. He resides in the Sabari mountains and is the all-merciful son of Vishnu (in His Mohini form) and Shiva.

title: Sabari Girisha Engal Nayaga
title2: Sabari Girisha Engal Nayaga, Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa
lyrics:
Mohana Roopa Mohini Bala
Sharanam Sharanam Bhagawane Sharanam Ayyappa
Parthi Pureesha Sadguru Deva, Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa
Jyothi Swaroopa Paapa Vinasha [ Sharanam Sharanam ... ]
Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa Swami Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
meaning: We surrender to Ayyappa, the Lord of Mount Sabari. He is the son of Mohini, a captivating form of Vishnu. He is the none other than Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi, the very embodiment of divine light who destroys our sins.

title: Sada Bhajami Ganeshwaram
lyrics:
Nithya Smarami Sarveshwaram [ Sada Bhajami ... ]
Dheeram Daya Sagaram
Bhava Dooram Guha Sodaram
Karunya Jaladharam
Bhaktha Kanshepa Pradakaram
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesha always and constantly remember the Lord of all, the one of valor and the ocean of compassion who removes the fear of birth and death. Glory to the brother of Lord Guha (Lord Subrahmanya), who is an ocean of compassion to His devotees.

title: Sada Bhajore Sada Bhajo
lyrics:
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Sada Bhajo
Kausalya Rama Sada Bhajo
Parthipuri Sai Sada Bhajo [ Sada Bhajore ... Ram Sada Bhajo ]
Sri Ram Jaya Ram Jaya Jaya Ram (4)
meaning: Sing constantly the glory of Lord Rama, son of Kausalya, and resident of Parthi.

title: Sada Bhajorey Hari Naama Bhajo
lyrics:
Madhura Sudha Rasa Hari Naama Bhajo [ Sada Bhajo ... ]
Sri Raghu Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
Gowri Shankara Naama Bhajo Bhajo
meaning: Constantly sing the name of Hari, the name that confers the sweet nectar of immortality. Chant the names of Rama and Krishna. Chant the names of Parvathi and Shankara (Shiva).

title: Sada Bhajorey Shankara Naam (2)
lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Sai Naam
Samba Sadashiva Sai Maheshwara
Sundara Roopa Hara Gangadhara
Sada Bhajorey Sai Naam
alt_lyrics:
Sada Bhajorey Shankara Naam (2)
Sada Japorey Sai Naam
Samba Sadashiva Sai Sarveshwara (Maheshwara)
Sundara Roopa Hara Gangadhara
meaning: Always sing and chant the name of Lord Shankara (Shiva) who holds the Holy Ganges in His matted locks. May the beautiful form of the Lord Sai, who is embodiment of happiness and prosperity, be ever in our hearts.

title: Sada Nirantara Hari Guna Gao
lyrics:
Prema Bhakthi Se Bhajan Sunao [ Sada Nirantara ... ]
Sai Nath Ke Charanon Mey Aao
Man Mandir Mey Deep Jalao
Jeevan Naiya Paar Lagao
meaning: Always sing the glory of our Lord; Let them resound with love and devotion; Come to the lotus feet of our Lord Sai; In your heart's temple, light the lamp of love; He will take you across the ocean of life.

title: Sada Shiva Sadguru Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Sai Deva
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Guru Baba Sai Guru Deva [ Sada Shiva ... ]
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Mahadeva
Narayana Parabrahma Guru Deva
Zohrashtra Buddha Allah Guru Deva
Guru Nanak Yeshu Natha Guru Deva
Sathya Sai Sadguru Sai Deva
Satchidananda Guru Sai Deva
meaning: Take refuge at the feet of the true Guru, Sathya Sai, who is none other than Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Zoroaster, Buddha, Allah, Jesus, Guru Nanak and the embodiment of truth, awareness and bliss.

title: Sadashiva Ranjani Sai Janani
lyrics:
Sambhavi Shankari Durga Bhavani [ Sadashiva Ranjani ... ]
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Mata Maheshwari Narayani
meaning: Sing the glory of Mother Durga, the eternal joy of Lord Shiva, the giver of life, the Mother of all worlds, the queen of queens. She is Mother Parvathi, the sister of Lord Vishnu. She is none other than Mother Sai.

title: Sadguru Brahma Eien no Kami
title2: Sadguru Brahma Eien no Kami yo
lyrics:
Jiai no Hikari de Kiyomeru Kami yo
Subete no Kokoro wo Toki Hanachi
Shinri no Michi wo Shimesu Kami
Sai Krishna Warera no Kami yo (Sathya)
Michibiki Kudasai Anata no Moto e
meaning: O Divine Preceptor Sai, the Supreme Soul (Brahman), You are the eternal God who purifies our hearts with Your shining light. Sathya Sai Krishna, please guide us along the path towards You.

title: Sadguru Brahma Sanathana Hey
lyrics:
Parama Dayaghana Pavana Hey
Janmaja Dukha Vinashana Hey
Jagadodharana Karana Hey
Sai Krishna Janardhana Hey
Janardhana Hey Janardhana Hey [ Sai Krishna ...  ]
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Taarana Hey
meaning: Worship the most merciful Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai, who is the Supreme Soul (Brahman). He is the saviour of the world and is verily Lord Krishna. O Lord, You are the one who helps overcome sorrows and the fear of crossing the ocean of life and death.

title: Sadguru Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Sadashiva Shankara
Amrutha Amrutha Daana Karey Sai
Aap Haalaahala Paan Karey
Bhava Bhaya Jaladhi Paar Karey Sai
Jagadodhara Jaya Abhayankara (Shiva Shankara) [ Sri Sathya ... ]
meaning: O Divine Teacher, You represent the Trinity (Creator, Preserver & Destroyer). You are the one who gave the boon of immortality. You drank the poison arising from the churning of the ocean. Help me cross the ocean of fear and sorrow. Grant me fearlessness, O ever blissful Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Sadguru Charanam Sada Smarami
lyrics:
Sai Charanam Sada Smarami [ Sadguru Charanam ]
Shankara Charanam Sada Smarami
Pankaja Charanam Pranamamyaham
meaning: Meditate upon the Lotus Feet of Divine Master. I offer obeisance by prostrating at the auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sai. Oh Shankara, I constantly meditate on Your Lotus Feet and offer my obeisance.

title: Sadguru Charanam Sankata Haranam
lyrics:
Sathya Sanathana Sarathi Charanam [ Sadguru Charanam ... ]
Sada Bhajorey Sada Japo Rey
Sai Naama Smaranam Madhuram
Sai Charanam Shanthi Sadanam
meaning: Meditate on the Holy Feet of the Universal Preceptor, Lord Sai, they will protect you from harm. They are the Feet of the True eternal charioteer. Always chant and sing of them. Sweet is the remembrance of Thy name - Sai. Thy Lotus Feet are the abode of peace.

title: Sadguru Dev Raaha Dikhao
lyrics:
Raaha Dikhao Sai Deva [ Sadguru ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Prana Daata
Tum Ho Merey Bhagya Daata
alt_lyrics:
Sathya Guru Dev Raaha Dikhao Prabhu
Raaha Dikhao Sai Deva [ Sathya Guru ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Prana Daata
Tum Ho Merey Bhagya Daata
meaning: O Lord Sai, our Divine Preceptor, show us the path to liberation, You are our life giver as well as the one who bestows all prosperity.

title: Sadguru Deva Namo Sai
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Paapa Vinasha 
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Parama Dayala 
Brahma Vishnu Maheshwara Roopa 
Jagadoddhara Deena Dayala (2)
meaning: Chant the name of the divine preceptor, Lord Sai. Residing in Puttaparthi, He removes sin, fear, and ignorance from this world. Lord Sai is the supremely compassionate one who liberates the world and uplifts the downtrodden. He is verily the embodiment of the Divine Trinity of Brahma, Vishnu, and Shiva (Maheshwara).

title: Sadguru Naamam Madhura Mayam
lyrics:
Sundara Roopam Jyothir Mayam (Ati)
Shyamala Vadanam Shanthi Mayam
Prema Pradayaka Pavana Naamam
Paapa Vinashaka Prabhu Naamam
Sada Bhajeham Sai Naamam
meaning: Let us ever chant the name of the true Guru, Lord Sai, suffused with sweetness, beauty, divine effulgence, and peace. His sanctified name grants love and dispels sins.

title: Sadguru Nadane Va Va Va
lyrics:
Satchidanandane Va Va Va
Sarva dayalane Va Va Va
Sathya Sayi Nadane Va Va Va
Shirdipuri Vasane Va Va Va
Parthipuri Vasane Va Va Va
Shiva Shakthi Roopane Va Va Va [ Sathya Sayi ... ]
meaning: O come, our Divine Preceptor Lord Sathya Sai, the embodiment of true bliss, merciful incarnation of Shiva and Shakthi, and Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Sadguru Nathudey Maa Baba
lyrics:
Satchidanandudey Maa Baba
Sarva Dayaludey Maa Baba
Sathya Sai Nathudey Maa Baba
meaning: Baba is our sacred preceptor, the very personification of Truth, Awareness and Bliss. He is compassionate towards all and who is known as Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Sadguru Om Sadguru Om
lyrics:
Shiva Shiva Sai Sadguru Om
Shirdi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Sri Sai Deva Sadguru Om
Parthi Pureeshwara Sadguru Om
Parama Dayalo Sadguru Om
Hara Shiva Murthy Sadguru Om
Bhavani Shankara Sadguru Om
meaning: Chant the name of the Universal Guru, Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of 'Om'. He is the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, the most compassionate one who is verily Lord Shiva and Mother Parvathi.

title: Sadguru Sai Ram Jai Bolo
title2: Sadguru Sai Ram Jai Bolo Sadguru Sai Ram
lyrics:
Mata Pitha Prabhu Ram Sai Bandhu Sakha Bhagawan [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
Allah Sai Ram Nanak Yesu Sai Ram
Zohrashtra Sai Ram Sai Ram Gautama Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Sai Ram Jai Jai Sai Ram
Jai Bolo Sai Ram Ram Jai Sathya Sai Ram
Jai Sathya Sai Ram
meaning: Chant Victory to our Divine Preceptor Sai Ram who is our mother, father, lord, relative and friend. O Lord Sathya Sai, You are verily Allah, Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Zohrashtra and Gautama Buddha. Victory to Thee, O Lord.

title: Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
lyrics:
Brahma Deva Sati Bharati
Mangala Manjula Vaagvilasini
Veena Vadini Kalavathi
Hamsa Vahini Vidya Daayini
Veda Mata Sri Sai Bhagawathi
meaning: Worship the Supreme Teacher, Lord Sai who is verily Goddess Saraswathi, the consort of Lord Brahma (the Creator). Mother Saraswathi is the auspicious one, the embodiment of all learning and wisdom,  the one who is adept in the art of producing sweet melodies on the Veena (string instrument) and the bestower of all knowledge and who has the celestial swan as Her vehicle.

title: Sadguru Sai Saraswathi
lyrics:
Sangeeta Priya Shanthimati [ Sadguru Sai ... ]
Vina Vadini Naadamayi
Veda Vidyavati Gnanamayi
Parthi Pureeshwara Premamayi
Sri Sayeeshwari Shwetambari
meaning: Worship the supreme teacher, Sai, the embodiment of Saraswathi with all knowledge and wisdom. A lover of music, She is also full of peace. She plays beautiful melodies on the Veena and She is the embodiment of eternal sound of creation. As Sai of Parthi, wearing a white robe, She personifies love.

title: Sahara Do Bhagawan
lyrics:
Mujhey Daya Karo Mujhey Krupa Karo
Sanmati Do Bhagawan [ Sahara Do ... ]
Sada Saath Raho Hey Bhagawan
Sada Raksha Karo Hey Bhagawan
Shanthi Bhakthi Prem Do Bhagawan
meaning: Oh Lord! Be my companion in this life. Have mercy and shower Your grace on me. Bless me with wisdom. Please be with me always and always protect me. I pray to Thee to grant me peace, devotion and love.

title: Sai (Baba) Sathya Palana
lyrics:
Shirdipuri Vasa Sai Sarvesha
Hey Parthipuri Vasa Hey Shirdipuri Vasa Sarvesha Sathya Palana [ Sai Sathya ... ]
Akhila Nivasa Jaya Hrishikesha
Mangalakara Hey Pavana Purusha
Shirdipuri Vasa Sai Sarvesha [ Hey Parthipuri Vasa ... ]
meaning: Glory to You Lord Sai Baba, the Embodiment of Truth. Glory to You, Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, the embodiment and protector of Truth. Glory to the Supreme Lord who is Omnipresent and who bestows auspiciousness and Grace.

title: Sai Aao Merey Bhagawan
lyrics:
Mujhey Darshan Do Bhagawan
Bhava Paar Karo Bhagawan
Merey Aawaz Suno Sai Ram [ Sai Aao ... ]
Asathoma Sadgamaya
Thamasoma Jyothirgamaya
Mruthyorma Amruthamgamaya [ Bhava Paar ... ]
meaning: Beloved Lord Sai, please come and give Your Darshan. Help me cross this ocean of life's miseries. Hear my plea, O Sai Ram. Lead me from untruth to truth, from darkness to light, from death to immortality. Help me overcome this cycle of life and death.

title: Sai Anata wa Hikari, Watashi
title2: Sai Anata wa Hikari, Watashi no Uchinaru Hikari
lyrics:
Yasashii Hohoemi Gopala
Aisuru Watashi no Sai Krishna [ Sai Anata ... ]
Subete wo Tsutsumi, Subete wo Mimamoru
Shifuku no Keshin yo Sai Krishna
Subete no Inochi Sai Krishna
meaning: O Lord Sai Krishna, You are the light within me. With Your kind smile, You protect us. You are the incarnation of supreme bliss who lives within everything.

title: Sai As Rama Came To Teach
title2: Sai as Rama came to teach us
lyrics:
Sai as Krishna came with joy
Sai as Jesus came to save us
Sathya Sai, Om Sathya Sai, Om Sri Sathya Sai
Hari Om, Sri Sathya Sai
 
Sai as Jesus came to save us
Now He comes again as love
Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema
Sathya Sai, Om Sathya Sai, Om Sri Sathya Sai
Hari Om, Sri Sathya Sai

title: Sai Avatara Yuga Avatara
lyrics:
Deena Dayala Sankata Haara [ Sai Avatara ... ]
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Maheshwara [ Sai Avatara ... ]
Sathya Sai Prema Sai
Sab Dharmon Ke Baba Sai
Sai Parameshwara
meaning: O Supreme Lord Sai, O Incarnation of this Kali Age, You are the protector of the meek, the remover of danger. You are Brahma (Creator), Vishnu (Sustainer) and Maheshwara (Destroyer of evil) and the beloved Sai of devotees. Chant the name of the Lord of Lords, Lord Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, who loves all true religions.

title: Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara
title2: Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara
lyrics:
When dharma declines
You take on a form to save all mankind

Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara
The saints have prayed, so You have come
To lift the burden from the earth

Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara
Truth is declining, love is waning
Peace is losing ground

Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara, Sai Avatara
So You have come to dry our tears
To show us how to love

title: Sai Baba Bolo Sathya Sai
title2: Sai Baba Bolo Sathya Sai Baba Bolo
lyrics:
Shirdi Sai Bolo Sathya Sai Baba Bolo
Ram Tu Hi Rehman Tu Hi Sai Baba Bolo
Allah Tu Hi Maulah Tu Hi Sai Baba Bolo
Sai Rama Bolo Sathya Sai Shyama Bolo [ Shirdi Sai … ]
meaning: Chant the Holy Names of Lord Sri Sathya Sai Baba and Shirdi Sai Baba. Lord Sai is verily Lord Rama and Allah (also glorified as Rehman and Maulah).

title: Sai Baba eno Omoi wo Kokoro ni
title2: Sai Baba eno Omoi wo Kokoro ni
lyrics:
Watashi wa Tadoru Ai no Michi [ Sai Baba eno ... ]
 Yasuragi no Niwa ni Hana Saku
 Kibou no Hikari Towa no Ai
meaning: Thoughts of Sai Baba rest in my heart. I am guided to Him by the path of love. In this tranquil garden, the flowers of hope and love eternally blossom.

title: Sai Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram
title2: Sai Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam (3)
lyrics: Shirdi (Parthi) Baba Geeta Sudha Madhuram Madhuram Anandam
meaning: The nectarine words of wisdom and the melodies that flow from Lord Sai Baba confer infinite supreme bliss. Sai Baba is the song, which is sweet and gives bliss. Lord of Parthi is the song, which is sweet and gives bliss. Lord of Shirdi is the song, which is sweet and gives bliss.

title: Sai Baba Is Coming To Fill Up Your Hearts
title2: (Sathya) Sai Baba's coming to fill up our hearts (2)
lyrics:
Fill up our hearts from His ocean of love
Sai Baba's coming to fill up our hearts
Fill up our hearts and quench the thirst for love
Share it with others it's the miracle of love (2)
Fill up our hearts, fill up our hearts, fill up our hearts from His ocean of love
Baba fill up my heart, fill up my heart, fill up my heart from Your ocean of love

title: Sai Baba is our Savior
title2: Sai Baba Sai Baba is our Savior
lyrics:
Sai Baba Sai Baba is His Name
 When the mind turns to anger, cry out Sai Baba
 When the mind turns to anger, cry out His Name
 Sai Baba Sai Baba is our Savior

title: Sai Baba Light Of My Life
title2: Sai Baba Light Of My Life
lyrics:
Lead,Kindly Light, I Pray
Lost In The World Of Illusion An Play
Salvation Is The Only Way
Ocean Of Mercy, Love And Compassion
Bless Me, O Lord, This Day
Lead, Kindly Light, I Pray
Sai, Lead Kindly Light, I Pray

title: Sai Baba Pranam
lyrics:
Shirdi Baba Pranam
O Merey Atma Ram
Lelo Merey Pranam
Eshwar Allah Ram
Sab Ke Ghar Sai Ram
Pooran Karo Merey Kaam
Hey Parama Shanthi Priya Ram
alt_lyrics:
Sai Baba Pranam
Shirdi Baba Pranam
O Merey Atma Ram
Lelo Merey Pranam
Eshwar Allah Ram
Sab Ke Prabhu Sai Ram
Pooran Karo Merey Kaam
Hey Parama Shanthi Priya Ram
meaning: Kindly accept my offering of salutations, O indweller of my heart, Lord Sai Baba of Shirdi and Parthi. Chant the name of Eshwar, Allah and Ram. Sai belongs to all. O Lord who loves eternal peace, please bless me for successful completion of all my works.

title: Sai Baba Sadguru Pranaam Pranaam
lyrics:
Dispeller Of Darkness, Salaam Salaam
Sai Baba Sadguru Pranaam Pranaam
Salaam Salaam Saashtaanga Pranaam
Lord Of The Universe, Salaam Salaam [ Sai Baba ... ]
Guide Us All Dear Lord Through The Journey Of Life
Lead Us From Darkness, Unto Your Light
(You Are) Lord Of The Universe Salaam Salaam

title: Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya
title2: Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
Anata no Yasashii Hohoemi wa
Nayami Kanashimi wo Tokashimasu
Anata no Yasashii Hohoemi wa
Nani yori mo Watashi wo Iyashimasu
meaning: Lord Sai Baba, Your kind smile melts away all my troubles and worries and cures me of all suffering.

title: Sai Baba Sakala Bhuvana ke
title2: Sai Baba Sakala Bhuvana Ke Daata (3)
lyrics:
Roopa Manohara Kamala Kantha
Yuga Avatar Sai Baba Daya Karo Parthi Baba
Shirdi Parthi Hrudaya Nivasi
Prashanthi Sundara Sai
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Baba, who is the Protector of the universe. Glory to Lord Sai, whose Form is bewitchingly beautiful and soft like that of a Lotus. Glory to you, Avatar of this Age, shower Your Mercy, who is the Avatar of Shirdi and we pray to you to enshrine Yourself in Our Hearts, Oh Lord Prashanthi Sai.

title: Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar
title2: Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar of the Lord
lyrics:
Rama Krishna Jesus Mohammad Buddha Zorastra Sai Ram
Every Name Is Your Holy Name Sai Every Form Is Your Form Divine
Sai Baba Sai Baba Sathya Sai Avatar of the Lord
Let Me Reach You Dear Sai Let Me Reach You Let Me Reach You Inside of My Heart
Let Me Please You Dear Lord With My Service Let Me Serve You Dear Lord With My Love
I Surrender to You, I Surrender to You, Lord Sri Sai Ram (2)

title: Sai Baba says embodiments of truth
title2: Sai Baba says embodiments of truth and love are we
lyrics:
Full of peace and inner beauty, if we just could see
 Sai Baba says the inner Self is the reality
 We are really only One, so know this and be free
 Baba, let us know You, let us find the One
 Baba, let us flow through into only One
 Sai Baba says the world is just illusion and not real
 Disappointment, anger, fear are only things we feel
 The truth that God is really us, will help our hearts to heal
 And Overflow with precious love, for love is all that's real
 Baba, let us know You, let us find the One
 Baba, let us flow through into only One

title: Sai Baba Tera Naam Sathya
title2: Sai Baba Tera Naam Sathya Sai Baba Tera Naam
lyrics:
Tum Ho Brahma Tum Ho Vishnu
Tum Ho Nanak Tum Ho Yesu
Tum Ho Buddha Tum Zohrashtra
Tum Ho Allah Tum Mahavir
Sab Hai Sai Bhagawan (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Baba Tera Naam
Allah Sai Tera Naam Maulah Sai Tera Naam
Yesu Sai Tera Naam Buddha Sai Tera Naam
Sai Baba Tera Naam Sai Rama Tera Naam
meaning: You are called Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba! You are Brahma (Creator) and Vishnu (Sustainer). You are Guru Nanak, Jesus Christ, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Allah and Mahavir. All are Sai Bhagawan. Your name is Sai Baba; Your Name is Allah Sai & Maulah Sai; Your name is Jesus Sai & Buddha Sai; Your name is Sai Baba and Sai Rama.

title: Sai Baba we sing to You
title2: Sai Baba we sing to You in unison today
lyrics:
We join our hands together and united we pray
In the language of the heart we ask that You guide us all the way
Take our love and let it flow to You make us lamps of love today

title: Sai Baba will never let you go
title2: Sai Baba will never let you go
lyrics:
You are safe in the arms of His Love
 And He keeps you so close in His Heart
 that He knows every need of your soul.
 (Chorus)
 Why fear? I am always here
 Sai Baba knows all your cares
 Why fear? I am always here
 The Lord can hear all your prayers.
 Sai Baba will never let you fall
 He will lead you away from all harm.
 He will carry you over the storm
 to the heavenly peace you desire.
 (Chorus)
 Why fear? I am always here
 Sai Baba knows all your cares
 Why fear? .....

title: Sai Baba Youre Lord Krishna
lyrics:
Leela Love Dancer Stealing The Heart
Form And Name Sai, You Walk Here Among Us
Sai Baba You Are Omnipresent
Sai Baba, Youre Lord Krishna
Let Us Be Murali, Play Your Song Through Us
O Enchanter Sathya Sai Baba

title: Sai Baba, come to me
title2: Sai Baba, come to me, never let me be
lyrics:
Sai Baba, make us free, all are one in Thee
 Sai Baba, God of Love, help us to be free
 In this world of loss and grief, we need only Thee
 Sai Baba, friend in need, show the way to me
 Sai Baba, Guru indeed, kindle our love for Thee
 Sai Baba, God of Love, teach us how to feel
 So at the end of life we feel, only love for Thee
 Sai Baba, O Delight, shower Your Grace on me
 Sai Baba, God of Light, light the way for me
 Sai Baba, God of Love, never forsake me
 I am lost without You, I want only Thee

title: Sai Baba, mother of creation
title2: Sai Baba, mother, mother, mother of creation
lyrics:
Sai Baba, father, father, father of all the nations
 He's omnipresent in all the sounds
 you can see Him in the sky, you can feel Him on the ground.

title: Sai Baba, O Lord
title2: Sai Baba, O Lord, You have taken birth to lead
lyrics:
All of mankind along the path of Prema indeed
 You have come and declared You were Rama in the past
 Rama O Rama, You have come back forth at last
 Let's rejoice that Ram Sri Ram has come to us at last
 Sai Baba Sri Sai, may we always see Thy Face,
 As we roam about in search for Thee and Thy fulfilling Grace

title: Sai Baba, You’re Child Krishna
lyrics:
Leela Love Dancer stealing the heart
 Form and Name Sai, You walk here among us
 Sai Baba You are Omnipresent (Sai Baba, You're ...)
 Let us be Murali - play Your song through us
 O Enchanter Sathya Sai Baba

title: Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
lyrics:
May I worship at Your Feet Bhagavaan
 In the temple of my heart, Bhagavaan
 There's an altar all prepared, Bhagavaan
 Where I wait for You, and long for You
 To worship at your Feet, Bhagavaan
 Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 In the stillness of my soul, Bhagavaan
 Where Your Truth begins unfolding, Bhagavaan
 There's path to You I'm clinging to,
 Clinging to your Feet, Bhagavaan
 Sai Bhagavaan, Sathya Sai Bhagavaan
 In the fullness of I am, Bhagavaan
 Parabrahma, Ahambrahma
 I worship at my Feet, Bhagavaan

title: Sai Bhajana Vaibhavamu
lyrics:
Sai Smarana Cheyyudamu
Sai Charana Daasulamu
Sai Sharana Pondedamu
meaning: Let us experience the grandeur of Sai Bhajans by singing His name. Let us constantly remember Him and His teachings. Let us serve Sai's Lotus Feet and surrender to Him.

title: Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Sai
title2: Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma (2)
lyrics:
Shubhankari Jai Abhayankari Jai Sai Bhavani Ma
Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi Jai Bhavani Sai Bhavani Ma
Gayathri Shiva Gowri Manohari Sai Bhavani Ma
meaning: Victory and salutations to the auspiciousness Mother Sai, who is the destroyer of the bondage of life and death and the remover of fear. Victory to the Mother as Durga, Lakshmi, Saraswathi and Gayathri. Glory to Mother Sai Bhavani, who bestows goodness and who protects us. Glory to goddess Gayathri and Gowri (Parvathi), who is the consort of Lord Shiva.

title: Sai Charan Sukh Dayi Man
lyrics:
Sai Bina Jeena Kya Hai (2) [ Sai Charan ... ]
Mata Bhi Tum Pitha Bhi Tum
Aao Bhagawan Deejo Darshan
Basjao Sai Man Mandir Mey [ Sai Bina ... ]
meaning: Know O Mind, there is no greater peace and bliss than when you surrender at the Feet of Sai. What is life without You, O Sai? Sai, You are our Mother and our Father. Please show us Your darshan and install Yourself in our hearts, for what is life without You?

title: Sai Darbar Mey Aao Gao
lyrics:
Keertana Karoon Mein Sai Ke (San)
Peetambara Dhara Nayana Manohara
Sai Sab Ke Prana Sakha
Charan Kamal Par Sharan Padoon Main [ Keertana Karoon ... ]
meaning: Welcome to the assembly of devotees and sing His name, in the Divine presence of Lord Sai. The thirst of the gathered devotees is quenched by the singing of devotional songs in praise of the Lord. He is enthralling to our eyes, wearing a yellow costume. We fall at Your feet and take refuge at the Lotus Feet of our Sai, who is the dearest of all friends.

title: Sai Dayalu Sai Dayalu
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Sai Dayalu
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Parama Dayalu
Palita Dwarakamayi Dayalu
Murali Gaana Vilola Dayalu
Maya Manusha Vesha Dayalu
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the compassionate one who is the Lord of Parthi. He is the protector of devotees and who is also the Lord of Dwarakamayi at Shirdi. He is the most compassionate one who plays sweet music on the flute (Murali) in His incarnation as Lord Krishna. He has incarnated on this earth in this deluding Human Form.

title: Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
title2: Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
lyrics:
(Sai) in the name of Truth You are come
 Sathya Sai Messiah has come
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 In this world of Darkness, pain and fear
 There's warm reassurance, You are here
 Sai Dev, Sai Dev, Sri Sai Parameshwara Dev
 (Sai) rising up with me like a dove
 Comes a yearning to dissolve in Your Love

title: Sai Deva Sathya Swaroopa Tum
title2: Sai Deva Sathya Swaroopa Tum Ho Merey Baba
lyrics:
O Merey Sai Baba
Sab Dharmon Ke Daata
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Sharanam Sharanam Deva (Hey)
Eshwar Hi Tum Allah Ho Tum Mahavir Nanak Tum Ho
Sab Hi Tum Ho Deva Merey Sai Baba [ O Merey ] | Parthi Vasa |
meaning: You are my Baba, O God, the embodiment of Truth. You are the Origin of all religions. I surrender to You, Sai Deva, the Lord of Parthi. You are Eshwar, Allah, Nanak and Mahavir. You are in all, All are in You, my dear Sai Baba.

title: Sai Deva Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Vande Vighna Vinasha
Parvathi Nandana Parthi Pureesha
Hey Shiva Nandana Jaya Sayeesha (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai who is verily Lord Ganesha, the one who removes all obstacles from our path, the beloved child of Goddess Parvathi and Lord Shiva, our prayerful salutations to You. Victory to You, Lord Sai.

title: Sai Durga Lakshmi Saraswathi
lyrics:
Hey Mahimatmayi Tejomayi [ Sai Durga ... ]
Manda Hasita Mayi Prana Vahini
Atma Jyothi Anandamayi (2)
meaning: Mother Sai, the life-force in all, is Durga, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. She is the indwelling soul, with a gentle smile, engulfed in divine effulgence and full of bliss.

title: Sai Gajanana Tataeyou
lyrics:
Kokoro wo Terasu Shinri no Hikari [ Sai Gajanana ... ]
Warera wo Michibiku Eichi no Hikari
Shifuku wo Sazukeru Jiai no Hikari
meaning: Praise be to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha. O Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Ganesha, You shine the light of truth on our hearts. You guide us with the light of Your wisdom. You grant us supreme bliss with the light of Your divine love.

title: Sai Gananatha Jaya Gananatha
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanti Prema Sai
Shikou no Eichi to Yuuki no Kami [ Sai Gananatha ... ]
Gananatha Sai Gananatha
Hitosuji no Hikari Gananatha
meaning: Victory to Thee, O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganas (Shiva's army). You are the embodiment of Truth, Righteousness, Peace, and Love. You are the God of supreme wisdom and courage. Your resolute light guides us.

title: Sai Ganapathi Jai please help us find our way
title2: Sai Ganapathi Jai, please help us find our way
lyrics:
With Your guiding light, please lead us through the night [ Sai Ganapathi ... ]
Bless us with Your grace this hour, with Your wisdom and Your power
Guide us every day, Om Sai Ganapathi Jai
Guide us all the way, Om Sai Ganapathi Jai

title: Sai Gayathri
lyrics:
Sathya Devaya Dheemahi
Thannah Sarvah Prachodayaat
meaning:
We know this Sai as supreme divinity incarnate
We meditate on this God of Truth
May this Almighty Personality Lead us on the path of liberation.

title: Sai Ghana Shyam Sai Ghana Shyam
title2: Sai Ghana Shyam Sai Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Radhey Govinda Bhajo Radhey Gopal Bhajo
Murali Gopal Bhajo Sai Ghana Shyam
Sai Ghana Shyam (Shyam) Sai Ghana Shyam
meaning: Sing the praises of Lord Krishna who is also known as Govinda and Gopala, who is of deep blue complexion, holding the Flute in His hands. He is none other than our beloved Sai.

title: Sai Giridhari Gopala
lyrics:
Krishna Murari Gopala [ Sai Giridhari ... ]
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Gopala
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Gopala
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Gopala the One who lifted the mountain to protect His devotees. He is Krishna, the slayer of demon Mura. The One who is the protector of His devotees. Our salutations, Oh Lord of Parthi.

title: Sai Govinda Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera [ Sai Govinda ... ]
Lelo Mujhey Sai Sharan Tumharey
Deejo Merey Sai Darsha Tumharey
Aao Merey Sai Man Mandir Mey (2)
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Govinda! Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Without Thee, there is no one to lead us to the light (of wisdom) and to remove the darkness (of ignorance). Oh Lord Sai Govinda! I pray to Thee to kindly accept me at Your Lotus feet. Oh Lord Sai Gopala! Kindly install Thyself in the temple of my mind and heart.

title: Sai Guna Gao Sai Naam
title2: Sai Guna Gao Sai Naam Gao
lyrics:
Ananda Ananda Sai Naam Hey [ Sai Guna ]
Naman Japan Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Shravan Smaran Karoon Sai Naam Ke
Sai Om Sai Om Bhajorey Sada
meaning: Oh Man, Sing the Name of the Lord and His Virtues. The name of Sai confers infinite bliss. Chant and contemplate on this name. Hear and meditate on the Sai name. Sing about the name of Sai.

title: Sai Guru Deva Janardhana
lyrics:
Anantha Shayana Narayana
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Madhusudhana
Mangala Pavana Sai Guru Charana [ Anantha Shayana ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Divine Preceptor, who is none other than Lord Krishna (Janardhana), who is reclining on the serpent Adi Sesha as Lord Narayana. O slayer of the demon Madhu, You are the destroyer of the cycle of birth and death. Praise be to Lord Sai who is our Guru, we bow at His Feet.

title: Sai Guru Sai Prema Guru
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Baba Guru [ Sai Guru ... ]
Parabrahma Roopa Sanathana Sai 
Paramatma Guru (Sai) Antaryami
Parabrahma Roopa Sanathana Sai 
Paramananda Prema (Sayeesha) Guru
meaning: Meditate on the Divine Preceptor, Lord Sai. He eternally takes the form of the highest consciousness, Brahman. Within the deepest recesses of our soul, He is the indweller. His love alone imparts supreme, universal Bliss.

title: Sai Hai Jeevan Jeevan Sathya
title2: Sai Hai Jeevan Jeevan Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Sai Mera Jeevan Sahara [ Sai Hai ... ]
Terey Bina Sai Sab Hai Andhera
Paar Karo Merey Jeevan Naiya
Charan Lagalo Mujhey Sai Kanhaiya
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are my life. You are the constant companion and the support in my life. Without Thee there is darkness (ignorance) in my life. Kindly help me to cross the ocean of life and death. O Lord Sai Krishna, accept me at Your Lotus Feet.

title: Sai Hamara Hum Sai Ke
title2: Sai Hamara Hum Sai Ke Aisa Prem Hamara
lyrics:
Sai Ram Hamara Sai Ram Hamara
Sathya Sai Hai Naam Tumhara Shirdi Sai Avatara [ Sai Ram ... ]
Hindu Muslim Sikh Isai Sab Ka Palanhaara [ Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, we belong to You and You are verily ours; this is the loving relationship that we share; Glory to You, O Lord Sai Ram, You are ours. Praise be to Lord Sathya Sai who is the Avatar of Shirdi Sai and who is the nourisher and protector of Hindus, Muslims, Sikhs and Christians.

title: Sai Harey Bhajo Baba Harey
lyrics:
Allah Yesu Sai Harey [ Sai Harey ... ]
Nanak Sai Baba Harey
Buddha Mahavira Sai Harey
Zohrashtra Bhajo Sai Baba Harey
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Baba Sing the Glory of Lord Allah, Yesu and Guru Nanak Sing the Glory of Lord Buddha, Mahavira and Zohrashtra Praise be to Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of all religions.

title: Sai Harey Sai Baba Hare
title2: Sai Harey Sai Baba Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Harey
lyrics:
Allah Eshwara Sai Harey Nanak Yeshu Buddha Harey [ Sai Harey ... ]
Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai Harey
Sai Harey Parthi Baba Harey Sarva Dharma Priya Baba Harey
meaning: Lord Sai, the destroyer of sins who upholds all faiths and religions, is worshipped as Allah, Guru Nanak, Yeshu, Rama, Krishna, Zohrashtra and Mahavir. He resides in Puttaparthi.

title: Sai Harey Sai Harey
lyrics:
Sai Harey Sathya Sai Harey
Baba Harey Baba Harey
Baba Harey Sai Baba Harey
meaning: Praise be to the Lord Sai and Baba who is verily our dear Sathya Sai.

title: Sai ichi naru Kami
title2: (Sathya) Sai ichi naru Kami Oh uchuu no Kami yo
lyrics:
Shin zen bi ni mi wo tsutsumu subete no Kami yo [ Sai ichi naru... ]
Buddha no eichi wo yobi samashi
Dharma no inochi ni ai wo kome
Seinaru sekai ni shiawase wo
Sathya Sai ataeru ai no Kami
meaning: Sai, You are the one God of the Universe. You embody Truth, Goodness, and Beauty. Awaken within me the Wisdom of Buddha. Through Dharma, envelope me with love. Take me into the Holy community. O Sai, God of Love, grant Your blessings upon this sacred world.

title: Sai is awakening
lyrics:
My Swami is now home in the temple of my heart (2x)
And the more that I pray, Lord please stay
Sai is awakening in me              …(3x)

Sai is awakening (2x)
Sai is awakening in me              …(2x)
alt_lyrics:
My Lord is now home in the temple of my heart (2x)
And the more that I pray, Lord please stay
God is awakening in me              …(3x)

God is awakening (2x)
God is awakening in me              ...(2x)

title: Sai Is My Lord
title2: Sai is my Lord, Sai is my everything
lyrics:
Sai is so kind and pleasant, the power of Sai makes me sing

Sai loves and blesses, Sai is so generous
Sai makes my heart grow, Sai has the power of kindness
We are Sai's devotees, You will see Him in your dreams

title: Sai Is So Beautiful
title2: Sai is so beautiful, You are truly amazing
lyrics:
Captivating smile like moon shining in sky [ Sri Sai is so ... ]
Lord Sai is so unique, fascinating indeed
Sai is Shiva, the Majesty King of Glory
Om Sathya Om Om Sathya Om Om Sathya Om Om Sathya Om (2)

title: Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
title2: Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
lyrics:
He Is The Mountain Of Truth
Love Every One, Serve Everyone
Sai Is The Fountain Of Love
We Are All Made Of Love
Truth Is Our Nature Itself
Help Everyone, Hurt No One
(Lets) Be As Fountains Of Love

title: Sai Jaganmohini Veshadhari
lyrics:
Sai Jagannataka Sutradhari
Jagadodharaka Sai ( Sai )
Jaya Jaya Sai Murari ( Sai )
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai Jaganmohini (enchanter of the worlds), with a delusive form, the one who controls us like the puppets in her hand, the one who is the liberator of all the worlds, Victory to You Oh Sai Murari.

title: Sai Jayanti Prashanthi Niketana
lyrics:
Hrudaya Sarathi Sathya Sanatana  [ Sai Jayanti ... ] 
Sumadhura Gambhira Naama Sankeertana 
Bhaktha Vrinda Karey Ananda Narthana
meaning: Victory to Lord Sathya Sai whose abode is Prashanthi Nilayam at Puttaparthi. Glory to the one who is the eternal charioteer of our hearts and who is the very embodiment of Truth. O Lord, dance blissfully in the Vrindavana of the devotee's heart while the supremely sweet melody of Your name is being sung.

title: Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Natavara Naagara Krishna Kanhaiya [ Sai Kanhaiya ]
Giridhara Naagara Gopi Kanhaiya
Yuga Avatara Sai Kanhaiya
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna)Glory to the merry mischief maker Lord Krishna Kanhaiya Glory to Lord Kanhaiya who lifted the mountain Govardhana to protect his Gopis and Gopikas (cowherds) Glory to Lord Sai who is the very incarnation of Lord Krishna.

title: Sai Kanhaiya Sai Kanhaiya
lyrics:
Paar Karo Merey Jeevan Naiya
Tum Ho Merey Ma Baap Bhaiyya
Hrudaya Nivasi Krishna Kanhaiya
Hrudaya Nivasi Sai Kanhaiya [ Paar Karo ... ]
meaning: Glory to You, O Lord Sai Kanhaiya (Krishna), ferry us across the ocean of Life. You are our mother, father and brother. You are our Sai Kanhaiya who resides in our Inner Conscience.

title: Sai Ke Darbar Mey Aao
lyrics:
Madhura Madhura Sangeeta Sunao [ Sai Ke... ]
Veena Venu Mrudanga Bajao
Raga Sudha Ras Sabko Pilavo [ Madhura Madhura... ]
meaning: Let us all gather in the Divine presence of Lord Sai, glorify Him by singing sweet music and playing the instruments Veena, Flute and Mrudanga and may everyone drink the sweet nectar of devotion.

title: Sai Krishna Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Muralidhara Govardhana Dhari [ Sai Krishna ... ]
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Dhari
Karuna Sagara Krishna Murari
Krishna Murari Keshava Murari
Madhava Murari Madhusudhana Murari
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Krishna, the beloved of Radha, who walked the gardens (Brindavan). He is described here as the one who plays the flute, wears saffron robes, an ocean of mercy, who held the mountain (Govardhan) aloft to protect His devotees, who carries a Conch and a Discus and who slayed the demons Madhu and Mura.

title: Sai Krishna Murali Krishna
title2: Sai Krishna, Murali Krishna, Oh Lord You have Stolen My Heart
lyrics:
Sai Krishna, Gopi Krishna, Oh Sweet Cowherd Divine [ Sai Krishna ... ]
Make Me An Instrument Of Your Love ( Sai )
So I May Live A Life Of Pure Love
Let It Grow, Let It Flow, Love Is Your Music Divine

title: Sai Krishna Sai Gopala
title2: Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Seguire tu Luz me hundire en el Ti.
Reunire las fuerzas para poderte seguir. 
Guia mi camino. Alumbra mi vivir. 
No permitas nunca que me aleje de ti. 
Conduceme Senor Sai hacia Ti. 
Sai Krishna Sai Krishna Sai Gopala.
meaning: O Sai Krishna, Sai Gopala, I will follow Your light; I will meditate on You; I will gather all my strength to follow You.  Guide my path and enlighten my life. Don't let me be far from You. O Lord, guide me towards You.

title: Sai Lingam Smarami Satatam
lyrics:
Nama Roopa Prapanchatitam
Agama Sara Atma Lingam
Partisha Svayam Prakasha Lingam
meaning: Let me always meditate on Sai Lingam. His name and form transcend the phenomenal Universe. The self-effulgent Lingam is the essence of creation and life.

title: Sai Lokah Samasta
lyrics:
May all the beings in all Sai’s worlds be happy (4)
Sai Lokah Samasta, Sukhino Bhavantu (4)
May all the beings in all Sai’s worlds be happy (3)
Sai Lokah Samasta, Sukhino Bhavantu

title: Sai Ma Sai Ma Sai
title2: Sai Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma (2)
lyrics:
Parama Pavani Parthi Nivasini
Prema Pradayini Ma
Prana Dayini Durga Bhavani
Jaya Ma Jaya Ma Jaya Ma
Sai Ma Sai Ma Sai Ma
meaning: Praise be to Mother Sai, the supremely sacred one who resides in Puttaparthi. She grants love to all. She is Mother Durga, the bestower of vital force. Victory to Mother Sai.

title: Sai Ma Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Ambika Chandi Ma
Vidyamayi Sai Devi (Mata) [ Sai Ma Saraswati Ma ... ]
Mahakara Omkara Roopini Ma 
Janani Ma Saudamini Ma
Brahmamayi Sai Devi (Mata)
meaning: Glory to Mother Saraswathi, the bestower of Divine knowledge, who is none other than our Mother Sai. The counterpart of Goddesses Parvathi and Durga, Mother Saraswathi's form is the supreme manifestation of the primordial sound Om. She is bright and effulgent as lightning. Mother Sai is verily the Supreme Spirit.

title: Sai Ma, Sai Ma
title2: Sai Ma, Sai Ma, Sai Ma
lyrics:
Divine Mother Of Compassion That You Are
Bestow On Us Your Infinite Grace
That We May Adore You And Find Inner Peace
Divine Mother Of Compassion That You Are
Sai Ma, Sai Ma, Sai Ma (2)

title: Sai Madre compasiva
title2: Sai Madre compasiva, Madre universal, Madre mia
lyrics:
Ven guilla mi manana, muestra (m)el camino que debo seguir
 Se que eres divina, se que eres amor
 O Sai mia, da me tu vision
meaning: Sai, compassionate Mother, universal Mother, O Mother of mine! Come, guide my future and show me the path that I should follow. I know You are Divine, and You are Love Incarnate. O my Sai, grant me Your vision.

title: Sai Mahadeva (Sathya)
lyrics:
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey [ Sai Mahadeva ]
Nirupama Guna Sadana Sai Neeraja Dala Nayana
Vibhuti Sundara Hey Sai Baba Maheshwara Hey
meaning: Praise be to our Lord Sathya Sai, who is the very embodiment of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva). Praise be to our Lord Sai Baba - the Lord of Parthi, who is the embodiment of Lord Maheshwara (Shiva). He, who is of pristine virtues, adorned with Vibhuti and whose eyes are like the tender petals of the Lotus.

title: Sai Mahadeva Sathya Sai Mahadeva
lyrics:
Alakh Niranjan Abhaya Karambhuja Sai Mahadeva [ Sai Mahadeva ... ]
Nithya Niranjana Vibhuti Sundara Sai Mahadeva (2)
Hara Hara Shankara Shiva Shiva Shankara (2)
meaning: Glory to You, Oh Lord Sai Mahadeva To the One who is spotless in His virtues and who is the protector of all beings To the One who is beautifully adorned with the Vibhuti (Sacred Ash) We offer our prayers to you O Lord Sai Mahadeva.

title: Sai Mahalakshmi Narayani
lyrics:
Ananda Roopini Abhaya Pradayini [ Sai Mahalakshmi ... ]
Mangala Roopini Sowbhagya Dayini
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Narayani Sai Narayani
meaning: Salutations to the auspicious Mother Sai, who is the embodiment of bliss, who dispels darkness and fear, the one who is the very embodiment of auspiciousness and who bestows prosperity. Mother Sai is verily the embodiment of Shiva and Shakthi.

title: Sai Mata Partheeshwari
lyrics:
Karunamayi Sayeeshwari [ Sai Mata ... ] 
Jaya Jaya Sai Durge Ambey Bhavani 
Janani Devi Jagadeeshwari 
Sai Lakshmi Saraswati Mata 
Hrudayeshwari Jagat Janani
meaning: Victory to Mother Sai, the Goddess of Puttaparthi, the most compassionate one. Glory to Mother Parvathi, who is known by many names - Durga, Amba, Bhavani and Janani, the Mother of the entire universe. Mother Sai is verily goddesses Parvathi, Lakshmi and Saraswathi. Glory to Mother Sai, goddess of the world and of our hearts.

title: Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu
title2: Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha
lyrics:
Terey Charanon Mey Sai Mera Koti Pranam
Sai Mata Pitha Deena Bandhu Sakha [ Terey Charanon ... ]
Mujhey Shakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Bhakthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
Mujhey Mukthi Do Merey Sai Shiva
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the mother, father, kith, kin and friend of the forlorn. A million prostrations at Your Lotus Feet. O Lord Sai Shiva, grant me strength, devotion and liberation.

title: Sai Mera Jeevan Dhaara
title2: Sai Mera Jeevan Dhaara Mujhe Daya Karo Bhagawan
lyrics:
Peetambara Dhara Sai Kanhaiya
Murali Manohara Megha Shyama
Paramananda Hey Jagannatha
Paar Karo Prabhu Parthi Nivasa
(Mujhe) Daya Karo Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the very source of my life, please bestow Your compassion on me. You are verily Lord Krishna clad in yellow silk, the one who charms with Divine music from the flute, the one with the complexion of a rain cloud. You are the eternally blissful one, O Lord of the world. O resident of Parthi, please ferry us across this ocean of birth and death.

title: Sai Mera Tum Ho Sahara
lyrics:
Shirdi Avatara Sai Parthi Puri Bhagawan
Deenon Ke Tum Prana Sakha Prabhu
Merey Sai Ram
Merey Sai Ram Baba Parthipuri Bhagawan
meaning: My Sai is the support and sustenance of my life; Glory to You, O Lord of Parthi, the re-incarnation of Shirdi Sai. Glory to You O Sai, who is the life-mate of the poor and the downtrodden. You are our very own O dearest Sai, the Lord of Parthi.

title: Sai Mukunda Mukharavinda
lyrics:
Madhura Manohara Mukharavinda [ Sai Mukunda ... ]
Taambula Ranjita Mukharavinda
Manda Smitha Haasa Mukharavinda
Nithya Manohara Mukharavinda
Paramananda Mukharavinda
Satchidananda Mukharavinda
meaning: Chant the sweet name of Lord Sai, whose countenance is described as soft as that of a Lotus, the one whose lips are painted bright red from chewing the betel leaves, the one with the ever smiling visage, the one whose countenance is filled with Bliss Divine, the one whose countenance embodies Truth, Auspiciousness and Bliss.

title: Sai Murari Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Brindavan Ke Bansiwala Radha Manohara Sai Shyama [ Sai Murari ... ]
Hey Chitha Chora Nanda Kishora
Sundara Shyama Sai Gopala
Brindavan Ke Krishna (Radha)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is the same as Lord Krishna, the one who slayed the demon Mura and the one who is bewitchingly dark as the rain cloud. Glory to Lord Sai, who is none other than Gopala who played in Brindavan and who dwells in the mind of Radha.

title: Sai Naam Bolo Govinda Naam
title2: Sai Naam Bolo Govinda Naam Bolo
lyrics:
Mahadeva Bolo Jai Panduranga Bolo [ Sai Naam ... ]
Rama Krishna Bolo Jai Buddha Sai Bolo
Zohrashtra Mahavira Yesu Sai Bolo
Allah Sai Bolo Maulah Sai Bolo
Prema Sai Shanthi Dayi Sathya Sai Bolo
Govinda Bolo Gopala Bolo (3)
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Sai who is verily Lord Govinda (Krishna). Chant the name of Lord Mahadeva (Shiva) and Panduranga. Chant the name of Lord Rama, Krishna and Buddha. Chant the name of Lord Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Jesus Christ and Allah. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of Love and Peace.

title: Sai Naam Bolo Sathya Sai
title2: Sai Naam Bolo Sathya Sai Naam Bolo
lyrics:
Sai Madhava Sai Keshava Sri Hari Naam Bolo [ Sai Naam ... ]
Allah Eshwar Eesa Masiha
Buddha Mahavira Naam [ Sai Madhava ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of our dear Lord Sathya Sai. Chant the divine names Madhava, Keshava and Hari (names of Lord Vishnu). Chant the name of Allah, Eshwar, Yesu, Buddha and Mahavir.

title: Sai Naama Keertana Kali Yuga
title2: Sai Naama Keertana Kali Yuga Sadhana
lyrics:
Jagadodharana Krishna Janardhana [ Sai Naama ... ]
Sai Murari Sri Madhusudhana
Mayura Mukutadhara Madhava Mohana
Neela Varna Ghana Natajana Palana [ Jagadodharana Krishna ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Hari Guna Keertana Kaliyuga Sadhana
Jagadodharana Krishna Janardhana [ Hari Guna ... ]
Sai Murari Sri Madhusudhana
Mayura Mukutadhara Madhava Mohana
Neela Varna Ghana Natajana Palana 
Natavara Naagara Nanda Sunandana
meaning: Singing the glory of Lord Sai is the penance for Kali Yuga. He is verily Lord Krishna, the redeemer of the universe. He is the one who slayed the demons Mura and Madhu. He is the enchanter with the peacock feather onHis crown. He is the dark blue-hued one who is the savior of all and who is the mischievous darling son of Nanda.

title: Sai Naamamey Brahmanandamu Sai Charanamey
title2: Sai Naamamey Brahmanandamu Sai Charanamey Divyanandamu
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Roopamey Nayananandamu
Leela Vinodamey Sai Sankalpamu
Premanandamey Sai Sowmya Roopamu (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai - The chanting of that name confers on all of us supreme Joy, the Lotus Feet confer divine bliss, the vision of the very form of Sri Sathya Sai is blissful to the eyes that see Him He is determined to provide us joy with his miraculous love His subtle and graceful form bestows on us eternal Love and Joy.

title: Sai Narayana Narayana
lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Narayana [ Sai Narayana ... ]
Gaana Lola Prabhu Narayana
Deena Pala Jaya Narayana
meaning: Chant the name of the merciful and omniscient Lord Sai Narayana, who rejoices when the divine glory is sung. Victory to Lord Narayana who is the protector of the meek.

title: Sai Narayana Narayana Mangala
lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Narayana Mangala Naam [ Sai Narayana ... ]
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Parameshwara Omkara
Sai Paramananda Mukunda
(Sathya) Sayeesha Mangala Naam
alt_lyrics:
Narayana Narayana Mangala Dham
Sai Brahma Sai Vishnu
Sai Parameshwara Omkara
Sai Muralidhara Vara Govinda
Sayeesha Mangala Dhaam (Sathya)
meaning: The divine names of Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana are most auspicious. Lord Sai is verily Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, the supremely blissful Krishna and the divine sound Om. Chant the name of Lord Sai that bestows auspiciousness.

title: Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Vanditha Deva
Deena Natha Harey Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Natha Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath Sai Natha Harey
alt_lyrics:
Sai Narayana Veda Parayana
Tribhuvana Vanditha Deva
Deena Natha Harey Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Natha Harey Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath Sai Nath Sai Natha Harey
Deena Nath (Om) Sai Nath (2)
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai Narayana, the three worlds pay obeisance to Thee. You are the upholder of Vedas. O Lord Sai, the destroyer of sins and miseries, You are the Lord and Savior of the dejected and miserable. Chant the name of Lord Sai Narayana, Sathya Narayana who is worshipped by all the Gods across the three worlds. Glory to Lord Sai who is the Lord and the protector of the poor and the downtrodden.

title: Sai Narayana Uchinaru Kami Hari
title2: Sai Narayana Uchinaru Kami Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om
lyrics:
Afureru Ai no Hikari
Subete no Sekai wo Terasu [ Sai Narayana... ]
Kokoro no Naka no Ai no Sai
Om Namo Narayanaya (4)
meaning: O Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana and who lives within our hearts, You fill us with Your loving light and shine it upon the whole world.

title: Sai Narayana, Luz Del Universo
lyrics:
Narayana, Sai Narayana, Solo Quiero Amarte
 Solo Quiero Estar A Tus Pies, Solo Quiero Amarte
 Narayana, Sai Narayana, Solo Queiero Amarte
meaning: Sai Narayana, Light of the Universe, I only want to love You. I only want to be at Your feet.

title: Sai Natha Anatha Natha
lyrics:
Shambho Shankara Parthi Natha [ Sai Natha ... ]
Chandrashekara Shambho Natha
Nandi Vahana Bhola Natha
Shambho Natha (2)
Parthi Natha (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi, who is the Lord and Protector of the destitute. He is verily Lord Shankara(Shiva) who is adorned with the crescent Moon on His head, who rides the Nandi (Divine Bull) and who is Lord of the meek and innocent.

title: Sai Natha Bhagawan Sai Natha
title2: Sai Natha Bhagawan Sai Natha Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Sai Natha Bhagawan [ Sai Natha ... ]
Buddham Sharanam Gachchami
Dhammam Sharanam Gachchami
Sangham Sharanam Gachchami
Sayeesha Sharanam Gachchami (Sathya)
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty. I take refuge in Buddha (the enlightened one); I take refuge in Dhamma (the ultimate Truth); I take refuge in Sangham (the holy community). To Lord God Sai, I surrender all.

title: Sai Natha Deena Natha
title2: Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
lyrics:
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba (2x)
Tere Charanon Mein Hame Lelo Sai Baba
Hamko Mukti Do Sai Baba (2x)
We pray for strength, we pray for faith, we pray for happiness,
We pray for peace, we pray for liberation, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
Shakthi Do Bhakthi Do Ananda Do Shanthi Do Janma Ko Mukti Do Baba (2x)
Sathya Dharma Shanti Prema Ahimsa Priya Deva, Sarvantaryami Sai Baba, Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We pray for strength, we pray for faith, we pray for happiness,
We pray for peace, we pray for liberation, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
(Speed up)
Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Rupa Deva
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
