We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet, Sai Baba
Sarvantaryami Sai Baba
We gather and surrender at Your feet
meaning: O Sai who is the Lord of the destitute, the very form of Brahman, the supreme Lord, who is all knowing, please accept us at Thy Holy Feet and grant us liberation. O Lord Sai, You are pleased by truth, right conduct, peace, love and non-violence. Give us strength, devotion, bliss, peace and liberation from birth.

title: Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma
title2: Sai Natha Deena Natha Brahma Roopa Sadguru
lyrics:
Nirakara Hey Akara Sathya Sai Sadguru [ Sai Natha ... ]
Omkara Sadguru Nirvikara Sadguru
Nirvikara Sadguru Omkara Sadguru [ Sai Natha ... ]
Mata Pitha Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru Sakala Tum Hi Sadguru
meaning: Salutations to You, O Lord Sai, the Supreme Guru, who is the protector of the weak and the downtrodden, who is the very embodiment of Brahman. You are the Formless One that has taken the Form of Lord Sai. Glory to You O Lord, the unperturbed one, who is present in the primordial sound "Om". Glory to You, O Divine Preceptor Sai, You are our mother, father and our everything.

title: Sai Natha Guru Brahma Nath
title2: Sai Natha Guru Brahma Nath Guru Sathya Sai Deva
lyrics:
Guru Deva Guru Deva
Pankaja Charanam Sharanam Sharanam
Sathya Sai Deva (2)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Natha who is the divine Preceptor. Let us all surrender at His Lotus feet.

title: Sai Natha Guru Govinda Sathya
title2: Sai Natha Guru Govinda Sathya Sai Jaya Paramananda (3)
lyrics: Om Guru Natha Jaya Guru Natha Sai Guru Natha (6)
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Sai, You are the Divine Preceptor who gives us eternal bliss.

title: Sai Natha Sharanam (Sathya)
lyrics:
Shiva Sai Nath Sharanam
Sharavana Bhava Guha Shanmukha Natha
Shiva Guru Raja Prashanthi Vasa
PranavaKaara Gnana Prakasha
meaning: Surrender to Lord Sathya Sai who resides in Prashanthi, who is also the Lord Shanmukha (Son of Shiva).

title: Sai no Ai ni Tsutsumarete
title2: Sai no Ai ni Tsutsumarete Iru
lyrics:
Nani mo Osorezu ni Ikiteyukeru
Sai no Ai wa Chikara ni Kawari
Watashi no Subete wo Seinaru Mono ni
Sathya Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Kokoro wo Tsutau
Sathya Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Watashi no Hikari
meaning: Sai's love covers everything. No matter what we fear, You are always with us. The power of Sai's love can change anything. Your holiness is my entire life. Sathya Sai Baba, You walk alongside my heart. Sathya Sai Baba, You are my light.

title: Sai no Ai wa Haha
title2: Sai no Ai wa Haha no Ai, Sai no Ai wa Chichi no Ai
lyrics: Sono Jiai no Manazashi wa, Ame noyou ni Furisosogu
meaning: Sai's love is like the love of a Mother and Father. It always watches over us like a constant downpour of rain.

title: Sai no Ai wa Kagiri
title2: Sai no Ai wa Kagiri Naku
lyrics:
Fukaku Hiroku Atatakai
Kokoro ni Tomoru Tomoshi Hi wa, Warera wo Mamori Terasu
Ai no Mama ni, Ai no Mama ni
Anata ga Terasu Kono Michi wo
Arunde Yukemasu you ni
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sathya Sai Bhagawan, Warera wo Mamori Terasu
meaning: Sai's love is deep, wide, and forever warm, and it shines without limits. This flame shines within our hearts and always protects us. Wherever you are, this love shines brightly to guide us as we walk forward.

title: Sai no Mina wo Yobu
lyrics:
Kokoro ni Owasu Kamisama
Uchinaru Hikari yo Sai Ram [ Sai no ... ]
Ai ni Ikiru Yuuki Ware ni Sazuke Tamou
Kokoro ni Owasu Sai Ram
Subete ni Yadoru Sai Ram
Anata to Hitotsu Sai Ram
Kami no Ai ni Naru (Ima)
meaning: We call out the beautiful name of Lord Sathya Sai who is the light of our hearts. We live with the love and courage that You blessed us with. We live with Your love so that we may become one with You.

title: Sai of Love
title2: Sai of Love ... Sai of Light
lyrics:
Sai of Peace ... Sai of Might
Sai so close ... ever free
Thank you Sai for being Me
 
You have shown us that WE ARE ONE
That all that exists is Thy Will Being Done
As we turn within to The Light in our heart
We finally see that we’re not apart
 
Sai of Love ... Sai of Light
Sai of Peace ... Sai of Might
Sai so close ... ever free
Thank you Sai for being Me

title: Sai Of My Heart Take
title2: Sai Of My Heart Take My Soul And Merge It With Thee
lyrics:
Sai Of My Heart Lord Your Love encompasses Me
You're The Heart Of My Life My Lord From Thyself Your Love You Have Poured
From My Soul I Give Unto Thee Blossoms Of Love Offered Unto Thee

title: Sai Om Sai Om Sai
title2: Sai Om Sai Om Sai Om
lyrics:
Tan Man Pran Mey Sai Om [ Sai Om ... ]
Shayan Sapan Mey Sai Om
Gagan Pavan Mey Sai Om [ Shayan ... ]
Nayan Nayan Mey Sai Om
Janam Maran Mey Sai Om
meaning: The entire Universe is permeated with the sound of 'Sai Om' the primordial sound. 'Sai Om' is everywhere, it is in the body, in the conscience, in sleep, in dream, in the sky, ether and wind. Whatever and wherever, the eyes perceive, it is nothing but 'Sai Om'. It is from emergence to dissolution.

title: Sai Paada Pooja Karo Hey
title2: Sai Paada Pooja Karo Hey Manuva
lyrics:
Sakala Paapa Bhava Bhaya Haranam [ Sai Paada ... ]
Nataraja Paadam Sai Paadam
Brahma Sevitha Punya Paadam
Shyamala Komala Sai Paadam
meaning: O Mind - Chant the Holy Name of Sai and offer it at His Lotus Feet. By chanting thus, redeem all your sins and fears across all births. His feet are those of Nataraja (Lord Shiva), they are the holy feet, which were worshipped by Lord Brahma the creator and they are the feet, which are soft and delicate.

title: Sai Pancharatna Kritis - Charana Sevanam
lyrics:
Madhuram Madhuram Sai Roopa Naamam
 (Pallavi)

Arishadvarga Haranam Harishadvarga Varadam
Apaarajana Parivarthana Daksham
(Anupallavi)

Kaarunya Laavanya Kamaneeya Gaathram
(Charanam)

1. Akhanda Vibhuthi Vaibhava Sundaram

2. Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Maanavathaa Moolya Sambharitam

3. Vinaya Bhaasura Mrudhu Subhaashana Sahana Sheela Thyaagamaya Roopa 

4. Pancha Bhoothaadhaara Sarvajeevanaadhaara
Sarvavyaapaka, Sarva Shakthi Maya, Sarvajna

5. Vaathsalyaadhi Gunojwala Sai Sadayaa
Aadhyaathmika Soothrathraya Bodhanaa Chathura 
Bhakthasakhaa Chitthaakaasha Jnaana Bhaaskara

6. Maatha Pitha Gurudaivamu Mari Sakhudavu Neevainaavu 
Puraajanma Paramparaagatha Mokshadaayaka Punyaphalam 
Bhakthaaliki Paramanidhaanam Amulya Mooladhanam

7. Animishula Keesu Janimpaga Anthevaasula Darishana Vela
Pari Pari Natanala Joopuchu
Kushalamuladuguchu, Lekhala Chekonuchu
Abhaya Mosaguchoo, Naa Hakku Meeranuchoo, Mee Vaada Nenanuchu
Sathkeerthinondaga Santhasinthunatanchu Sarvamuthaaneyai
Brathukubaatanu Poodotaga Chesina Hrudaya Brundaavana Vanamaali

Maa Tanuvu Needi Maa Talapu Needi
Maa Hrudhi Velugu Roopu Needi 
Prema Sougandhikaabharithamou Maa Jeevana Kalhaarame
Needhu Charana Yugaliki Nivaali

--------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 3 ---------
alt_lyrics: Charana Sevanam Parama Paavanam Madhuram Madhuram Sai Roopa Naamam (Pallavi) Arishadvarga Haranam Harishadvarga Varadam Apaarajana Parivarthana Daksham (Anupallavi) Kaarunya Laavanya Kamaneeya Gaathram (Charanam) 1. Akhanda Vibhuthi Vaibhava Sundaram 2. Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Maanavathaa Moolya Sambharitam 3. Vinaya Bhaasura Mrudhu Subhaashana Sahana Sheela Thyaagamaya Roopa 4. Pancha Bhoothaadhaara Sarvajeevanaadhaara Sarvavyaapaka, Sarva Shakthi Maya, Sarvajna 5. Vaathsalyaadhi Gunojwala Sai Sadayaa Aananda Daayaka Mrudula Hrudayaa Bhakthasakhaa Chitthaakaasha Jnaana Bhaaskara 6. Maatha Pitha Gurudaivamu Mari Sakhudavu Neevainaavu Puraajanma Paramparaagatha Mokshadaayaka Punyaphalam Bhakthaaliki Paramanidhaanam Amulya Mooladhanam 7. Animishula Keesu Janimpaga Anthevaasula Darishana Vela Pari Pari Natanala Joopuchu Kushalamuladuguchu, Lekhala Chekonuchu Abhaya Mosaguchoo, Naa Hakku Meeranuchoo, Mee Vaada Nenanuchu Sathkeerthinondaga Santhasinthunatanchu Sarvamuthaaneyai Brathukubaatanu Poodotaga Chesina Hrudaya Brundaavana Vanamaali Maa Tanuvu Needi Maa Talapu Needi Maa Hrudhi Velugu Roopu Needi Prema Sougandhikaabharithamou Maa Jeevana Kalhaarame Needhu Charana Yugaliki Nivaali --------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 3 ---------
meaning:
Serving the lotus feet is the most auspicious. Sai's name and form are most nectarous and sweet.
 
Vanquisher of the six vices, bestower of the six divine qualities (Sathya, Dharma, Shanthi, Prema, Ahimsa and Thyaaga) and the One who has the ability to transform multitudes of people.
 
The One whose enchanting voice is full of compassion and charm.
 
1. The beautiful One of endless glory and grandeur.
 
2. The One who is embodiment of Truth, Auspiciousness and Beauty and repository of human values.
 
3. The One who is radiant with humility, sweet in speech and forbearing by nature has sacrifice as His form.
 
4. The One who is omnipresent, omnipotent and omniscient, and is the basis of all five elements and all lives.
 
5. Sai's compassion glows with motherly love. He teaches the trilogy of the spiritual principles. He is the dearest friend of His devotees and who is the effulgent knowledge in their minds.
 
6. You have become our mother, father, preceptor, friend and God. You are that good fortune that can liberate us from all our past actions and lineage. You are the supreme spiritual home and the invaluable treasure for devotees.
 
7. Even the gods are jealous of the Anthevaasis (those who have Swami's proximity) when You grant them darshan and bless them through various divine acts, enquiring about their welfare, accepting their letters and bestowing fearlessness, declaring, "You are Mine. I am yours and I will be happy when you get a good name for yourselves", You have become everything for us. You are the gardener of our hearts who has transformed our path of life into a flowery garden. Our body is Yours; Our thoughts are Yours; The form which is shining in our hearts is Yours! We reverentially offer our lives as a garland fragrant with the nectar of love at Your Lotus Feet.

title: Sai Pancharatna Kritis - Kaliyuga Avathaari
title2: Kaliyuga Avathaari Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai
lyrics:
(Pallavi)

Paalithajana Mangalakaari Paavana Chitraa Thata Vihaari
(Anupallavi)

Prema Sudhaapooram Sevaa Soundarya Bhaasitham 
(Charanam)

1. Darahaasa Vilasitha Vadana Sarojam
Kutilakunthala Viraajamaanam

2. Nee Mrudhulaadhara Nirgalitha Vaaksudhalu Groli
Mari Mari Thalachi Thalachi Pulakinchi
Mukthamathulayye Suptha Chitthamulu

3. Kalayo Vaishnavamaayayo
Sathya Sankalpa Paramaardhamo
Parulu Parule Kaadhu Paramaathmaroopulana
Bruhath Sevaa Pradaayakaa

4. Ganga Jatadhara Kataaksha Veekshanamuna Upponge Sai Ganga 
Sujala Pathakamanaga Daahaarthula Aarthi Deerpanga

5. Divya Bhishagvarudu Adbhutha Bhavaroga Nivaarana Samardhudu
Pedala Aatmabandhuvai Velayinche Ghana Aarogya Dhaamam

6. hyaaga Yogamule Punaadhi, Sathseelame Paramaavadhi
Padhaardha, Paraardha Yekeekrutha Ihaparajnaana Vaaradhi
Nihshulka Bodhanaankitha Vishishta Vidyaalayamidhi

7. Sai Divya Darshanam Ghanapaapanaashanam
Divyapaada Sparshanam Karmamochanam
Sathya Sai Sankeerthanam Aathmaanu Sandhaanam

--------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 4 ---------
meaning:
Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai - the Divine Incarnation of the Kali Age.
 
You take care of people by bestowing auspiciousness; You dwell on the banks of sacred river Chithravathi.
 
You are full of nectarous love and You shine with the beauty of service.
 
1. Your flower like face shines with a bright smile. You are adorned with curly hair.
 
2. Soaking in the nectarous words emanating from Your tender lips and contemplating on them over and over again, filled with ecstasy, the minds which were in slumber are awakened to the reality.
 
3. You have taught us that others are not truly others but very embodiments of Divinity and given us the opportunity to participate in gigantic service projects which reflects the power of Thy divine will and make us wonder if all these are a dream or a divine mystery.
 
4. The compassionate glance of Sai Shiva has given birth to the Sai Ganga Drinking Water Project. That project has slaked the thirst of the drought-struck millions.
 
5. You are the wonderful Divine doctor; capable of curing even the disease of worldliness. As the dearest friend of the poor, You have established a temple of healing.
 
6. Sacrifice and yoga as the foundation, character-building as the ultimate goal, combining the study of the material and the spiritual, the knowledge of here and beyond, this special University is dedicated to imparting the ‘Highest’ learning, totally free.
 
7. The divine Darshan of Sai relieves one of the darkest sins. The touch of the Divine feet relieves one from bondage of actions. Singing the name of Sathya Sai brings about the union with the Atmic principle.

title: Sai Pancharatna Kritis - Pranamaami Saayeesha
title2: Pranamaami Saayeesha Sakala Bhuvana Shubhakara Ghanacharitha
lyrics:
Srushti Sthithi Kaaraka Sugunaakara Ratnaakara Vamshaabdhi Sudhaakara
(Pallavi)

Pranathaarthihara Shivashakti Roopa Bhaaradhvaaja Gothrodbhava
Nee Padamu Soki Bhuvi Dhanyamaaye Nee Karunakilanu Evaru Saati
(Anupallavi)

1. Nee Divya-avataaramu Kalilo Prema Ithihaasamu
Tava Charanam Mama Sharanam Bhakthi Mukti Pradaayakam
(Charanam)

2. Saadhu Maunijana Praarthana Phalitham Easwaraamba Sutha Nee Jananam
Dharmoddharanaku Saaradhyam Vishva Maanavathaku Bhavya Bhavithavyam

3. Surya Chandraagni Trinetra Shobhitha Roopa Jitha Bhaktha Hrudaya
Paamara Jana Thaapatraya Kshayakara Soothrathraya Bodhaka

4. Chandra Bimbamuna Surya Golamuna Velige Thejo Roopam
Anthalona Druggocharamaiye Dashaavataara Vaibhavam

5. Sangeetha Sarvajna Naigama Paaramya Bhaashyaartha Vachonipuna
Nee Leelaa Mahimalu Vinodamulu Chithra Vichithramulu
Divyamu Bhavyamu Navyamu Rasaramyamu Nee Padame Parama Padamu

6. Korina Phalamulanella Nosage Chintha Drumam
Chelimikaandra Muchchata Deerche Kalpabhoojam
Thalachinanthane Srushti Jarugu Sathya Sankalpam
Premaroopa Sai Karathalame Kalpakam

7. Aadi Anthyamu Leni Adbhutha Leelaa Vinodam
Saayi Prema Kadhale Kerataala Laasyam
Bhakthaaliki Oka Kshanamuna Divyaanubhoothula Paaravashyam
Marukshanamuna Sathya Premaakarshana Maanava Sahaja Naijam
Pasithanambunane Paramaathmagaa Nerigina
Alanatibhakthula Bhaagyame Bhaagyam 

--------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 1 ---------
meaning:
I bow before You Lord Sai, the bestower of auspiciousness to the entire Universe; the one whose story is the most glorious; the preserver of all creation, the source of all virtues and the crest jewel of the entire Ratnakara clan.
 
O dispeller of the devotees’ distress, You are the embodiment of Shiva and Shakti; the One born in sage Bharadwaja’s lineage. (When) the earth itself has been sanctified by the touch of Your feet; (then) who can equal You in compassion?
 
1. Your divine incarnation is a saga of Love in this kali age; Your feet is my refuge, it confers upon me devotion and liberation.
 
2. Your birth as the son of Easwaramba is the fruition of the prayers of sages and saints, It upholds Dharma and ushers in a glorious future for the entire mankind.
 
3. Your form is adorned with the Sun, Moon, Fire and the third eye; it is capturing the hearts of the devout. You dispel the worry of the ignorant folk by teaching them Your three fold message - Daiva preethi, papa bheethi, sanga neethi (Love for God, Fear of sin, Morality in Society).
 
4. Your radiant form was seen in the moonshine and in the solar orb; The very next moment You granted the glorious vision of Dasaavathara (Ten Incarnations of Lord Vishnu).
 
5. Knower of all music; Expert in explaining the essence of all esoteric knowledge, Your playful pranks and miracles are exhilarating, fascinating, divine, grand, unique and nectarous. Your feet are our ultimate goal.
 
6. The tamarind tree was transformed into the wish fulfilling tree, it gave everything Your childhood friends desired; You possess the Sathya Sankalpa (Resolve of Truth) that make things happen the moment You will it. O embodiment of love, Sai, Your palm itself is verily the wish-fulfilling tree.
 
7. Sai's delightful and fascinating play is without a beginning or an end; the stories of Sai’s love are like the gently dancing waves. For the devotees, at one moment it is an overwhelming Divine experience (with You) but the very next instant, it is a powerful attraction to Your (human side) true love. To have recognised Your divinity even when You were young, is indeed a grand fortune of the devotees of yore.

title: Sai Pancharatna Kritis - Sadaa Bhaavayaami
lyrics:
Sai Paripoornaavataaram
(Pallavi)

Sadaa Naadopaasita Modam
Maayaamaanusha Vesha Dhaaram
(Anupallavi)

Prema Thanumanisham Karunaa Hrudayam
(Charanam)

1. Veda Purusha Veda Poshakam
Veda Saara Roopa Veda Gaanalolam

2. Lingodbhava Bhasmaabhisheka Leelaa Vilaasa Parthi Shivam

3. Nenundaga Bhayamelananuchu Abhayamosage Anugraha Vrushti

4. Bhakthaapa Mruthyu Haranam Gathajeeva Prana Pradaayakam

5. Poovu Puttagane Parimalinchu Reethi Baala
Praayambuna Tyaaga Sheelatha nerpe

6. Nee Avathaara Paramaarthamunu Sunthaina Theliyudure
Nirvyaaja Premaathishayamutho Ninnu Neeveruka Parachani Naadu

7. Purushulalona Purushudavu Pasivaarilona Baaludavu
Mahilala Madhya Mahilavu Manaserigi Manoradhamuleederchu
Prana Vibhudavu Neevu Eakaanthambuna Vishwavibhudaveevu

8. Yuvathaku Anusaraneeyam Sathyam Samaya Paalanam
Hitha Mitha Mrudu Bhaashanam Samuchitha Veshadhaaranam
Prathi Panilo Nindaina Samskaaram Seva Paraayanathvam
Sathyam Nithya Vratham Saayi Jeevithame Jagathiki Sandesham

9. Deena Jana Sevaye Saayiki Santhushti
Sarva Jeeva Raasulapaina Kaarunya Drushti
Janabhaagadheya Easwaraamba Thanayaa
Mee Kanusannala Saagu Ee Sarva Srushti

--------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 2 ---------
meaning:
I always meditate on Sri Sathya Sai, the complete and absolute incarnation of God.
 
One who always delighted in music, adorning an illusionary human form.
 
The embodiment of love with a compassionate heart.
 
1. One who is extolled in the Vedas, the sustainer of the Vedas; His form is the very essence of the Vedas; One who enjoys the recitation of the Vedas.
 
2. He is Parthi Shiva who brings forth the holy Linga, performs the miraculous Vibhuti abhisheka (the ritual of pouring Vibhuti on the idol of Shirdi Sai Baba).
 
3. He is the one who showers abundant grace by declaring, “Why fear when I am here?”
 
4. Who wards off the fear of death through devotion, Who brings back to life even the dead.
 
5. Just like a flower spreads fragrance even as it blossoms, (Sathya Sai) taught the virtue of sacrifice in childhood itself.
 
6. Who can ever comprehend even a fraction of the glory of Your incarnation! With boundless love You have revealed Yourself to all.
 
7. You are a man among the men, child among the children, a woman among women; thus You become the beloved knowing each one’s heart and fulfilling their desires. When alone, You are the emperor of the Universe.
 
8. You set an ideal for youth, by adhering to Truth and punctuality, through speaking that is good, limited and soft, through appropriate mannerisms. Every act is suffused with refinement and the feeling of service. Truth is Your eternal vow, Sai’s life is His message to the world.
 
9. Serving the destitute alone satisfies Sai, His compassionate gaze is on all living beings. O Son of Easwaramma, the giver of all wealth, The entire creation functions by Your mere glance.

title: Sai Pancharatna Kritis - Sathya Sai Avathaara Vaibhavam
title2: Sathya Sai Avathaara Vaibhavam, Nithya Noothanam Sathya Sanaathanam
lyrics:
(Pallavi)

Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema
Prathihrudhi Nilipina Vishwaprema Prasthaanam
(Anupallavi)

Prema Ekaika Matham Sai Bodhaamrutha Saaram
(Charanam)

1. Udaattha Maanaveeya Sevaye Aadhyaathmika Saadhana Tholi Sopaanam

2. Graama Sevamari, Deena Jana Sevaye Karma Yogam Chakkani Raaja Maargam

3. Naada Brahma Sai Sankeerthaname Kalilo Mukthi Maargam

4. Bhaava Raaga Thaala Melana, Bhajanaanandame Bhakthi Maargam

5. Soham, Soham, Soham Yerukaye Jnaanam              
Anuvanuvuna Ninnu Kanugonute Jnaana Maargam

6. Kalushitha Kali Maanava Medhaahamkruthi Doorikaranam
Kula Matha Deshaatheeta Vishwajaneena,
Sathyapathanirdheshanam Saayi Mahitodhyamam

7. Premaakarshana Shakthiyutha Sayee    
Janaganamanamula Divyathwa Jaagruthiki Velasina Vishwa Viraat Roopaa
Nithya, Shuddha, Buddha, Chaitanya Deepthaa Apuroopa Leelaavathaara

8. Sai Siddhaanthamulu Vannemeera Saakaaramaaye
Bhuvi Dharmakshetram, Jagathi Vasudaika Kutumbam
Digdhigantha Dheedhithula Thejarille
Sathya Sai Vibhavam Apoorvam Akhandam Anantham

--------- Sai Pancharatna Kritis - 5 ---------
meaning:
The grandeur of the Sathya Sai incarnation is ever new, true and eternal.
 
You are the source of Universal Love that established Sathya (Truth), Dharma (Right-conduct), Shanthi (Peace) and Prema (Love) in every heart.
 
‘Love is the only religion’ is the essence of Sai's ambrosial message.
 
1. One who is extolled in the Vedas, the sustainer of the Vedas; Noble service to mankind is the first step in the practice of spirituality.
 
2. Serving the villages and the downtrodden is true karma yoga (path of action) and verily the royal path.
 
3. Singing the name of the Lord Sai, who is Nada Brahma (the Primordial Sound), is the pathway to liberation in the Kali age.
 
4. Experiencing bhajan bliss through the harmony of the feeling (Bhaava), tune (Raaga) and rhythm (Taala) is the path of Devotion (Bhakti Marga).
 
5. Realising ‘I am That’ with every breath is the True Knowledge (Jnana). The path of Knowledge (Jnana Marga) therefore lies in finding You in every atom.
 
6. Warding away the intellectual arrogance of the impure minds of humanity in Kali age; Bringing universality by transcending the caste, religion and nation; Guiding everyone on the path of Truth This is the grand mission of Sai.
 
7. Sai is endowed with the magnetic power of Love. Sai is the Cosmic Being whose advent is for awakening the Divinity latent in all. Sai is a rare incarnation of divine playfulness; the effulgent Consciousness which is eternal, pure and enlightened.
 
8. Sai's principles have taken shape in a grand manner turning the Earth into a land of righteousness, and the entire world into one family by spreading its effulgence in all directions. The grandeur of Sathya Sai is unique, ceaseless and infinite.

title: Sai Pitha Aur Mata Sai
lyrics:
Deena Dayala Daata Sai [ Sai Pitha ... ]
Sai Guru Sai Sakha Sahodara
Sai Sathya Shiva Sai Sundara
Veda Upanishada Geeta Sai [ Deena Dayala ... ]
meaning: Chant the Holy name of Sai who is our father and mother and who is the protector of the weak and downtrodden. He is the preceptor, friend and sibling. He is verily Truth, Goodness and Beauty. He is the embodiment of Vedas, the Upanishads and the Bhagawad Geeta.

title: Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey
title2: Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Ananda Dey Baba Prem Dey
lyrics:
Tum Ho Baba Daya Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandira Nata Naagar
Adi Anantha Hey Sathya Sanathana
Alakh Niranjana Sai Janardhana
Satchidananda Prabho Krupa Karo
Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Anand Dey Baba Prem Dey (Sai)
alt_lyrics:
Sai Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Ananda Dey Sai Prem Dey
Tum Ho Baba Daya Ke Sagar
Tum Ho Guna Mandira Nata Naagar
Adi Anantha Hey Sathya Sanathana
Alakh Niranjana Sai Janardhana
Satchidananda Prabho Krupa Karo
Prem Dey Shanthi Dey Anand Dey Sai Prem Dey (Sai)
meaning: O Lord Sai, please grant us peace, bliss and love. O Lord, You are an ocean of compassion who possesses all good and pure qualities. Your form is infinite, eternal truth, with no beginning or end. You are beyond the perception of senses, always supremely pure. O Sai, uplifter of humanity, You are Satchidananda - Existence, Consciousness and Divine bliss. Please shower Your Grace on us.

title: Sai Prema Sai (Shiva)
lyrics:
O Lord Divine, Its into You we're dying
 Sai Prema Sai (Shiva)
 You're here within us all, shining as our heart
 Let's not miss the chance to merge in Sai
 Feel the flowing power as we open up in God
 Radiance of Bliss exploding in the fire of Love
 O ecstacy divine - to melt in Sai
 You're here within us all, shining as our heart
 There's no time to lose, lets merge in Sai
 We love You Sai (3X)
 Premavathaara Bhagavaan Sathya Sai (4X)

title: Sai Raghurama
lyrics:
Sai Sundara Sai Manohara Sai Komala Ram [ Sai ... ]
Ek Tum Hi Ho Sab Ke Eshwara
Patitha Pavana Patithodharana
Jaya Shirdeesha Jaya Partheesha
Man Mandir Mey Aao Sai Ram (3)
meaning: Salutations to you Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, the enchanting and delicate one. You are the Lord for one and all and the uplifter of sinners. Victory to you Oh Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, come into the temple of my heart.

title: Sai Raghuvara Merey Ram
lyrics:
Sai Giridhara Merey Shyam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Jagadeesha Srinivasa Partheesha Hrudaya Vasa
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Victory to You O Lord Sai, You are my Rama (Raghuvara), Krishna (Giridhara), Lord Shiva and Lord Srinivasa (Narayana). You are the Lord of Parthi and the indweller of my heart.

title: Sai Ram Bhagavaan
lyrics:
O compassionate loving God 
O Stream of Mercy Divine 
Hear the cry of Humanity, O Great One 
Save us from darkness, Sai Ram 
Protector, Sustainer of Life 
In You we take refuge from strife 
O Stream of Mercy Divine

title: Sai Ram Bhagawan
lyrics:
You Are The Lord Of My Heart And My Soul
Lord Of My Life It's Beyond My Control
Open My Heart To Your Love ( Sai )
Once I Have Seen You, Lord, Heard You And Touched You
How Can I Live In This World Without You?
Open My Eyes To Your Light ( Sai )
Sai Ram, Let Me See You
Everywhere, Let Me Hear You
In Everyone, Let Me Serve You
Sai Ram Bhagawan

title: Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai
title2: Sai Ram Bhajo Mana Sai Ram Bhajore
lyrics:
Radhey Krishna Bhajo Mana Radhey Krishna Bhajore [ Sai Ram ... ]
Sita Ram Bhajo Mana Sita Ram Bhajore
Vittala Bhajo Mana Vittala Bhajore
meaning: Chant the names of Lord Sai Ra, of Krishna (Lord of Radha), of Rama (Lord of Sita), of Vittala (Vishnu)

title: Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagawan
title2: Sai Ram Ghana Shyam Bhagawan Tumhara Naam
lyrics:
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Rakhwaley
Tum Bina Koi Nahin Apad Saharey
Tum Bina Prema Koi Nahin Denewaale
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram Baba
Bhagawan ( Sai Ram ) Tumhara Naam
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Rama and Krishna. We do not have any one other than You to protect us, to save us from all adversities and to give us unconditional love. O Lord Sai, You are the in-dweller of our hearts.

title: Sai Ram hear my call to You
title2: Sai Ram hear my call to You, Sai Ram hear my call
lyrics:
Sai Ram I know You must hear my call [ Sai Ram hear ... ]
In my heart is a burning, yearning for You
I am waiting, I am praying, I am calling to (for) You

title: Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram
title2: Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram Shirdi Pureeshwara Ram
lyrics:
Sai Ram Jaya Sai Ram Parthi Pureeshwara Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
Allah Naam Hai Tera O Sai Baba
Sab Ka Malik Tum Ho O Sai Baba
Yesu Nanak Buddha Mahavir Sab Hai Sai Ram
Sab Hai Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to You O Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi. You are the Lord of the entire humanity, You are Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Buddha and Mahavira.

title: Sai Ram Radhey Shyam
title2: Sai Ram Radhey Shyam Jai Jai Sai Ram (3)
lyrics:
Ram Tu Hi Rehman Tu Hi Sab Ka Hai Bhagawan
Sai Ram Radhey Shyam Jai Jai Sai Ram
meaning: Victory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shyam (Krishna). O Lord, You are Lord Rama and Lord Rehman, the most compassionate one. You are the Lord of all, O Sai, victory to Thee.

title: Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Sai Ram Jai Sai Ram
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram
Patitha Pavana Sita Ram
Eshwara Allah Terey Naam
Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai Ram who resides in Parthi. He is Lord Rama, the consort of Mother Sita. He is the noblest of the Raghu dynasty who uplifts the sinners. He is none other than Lord Shiva and Allah. Oh Lord, bless us with wisdom.

title: Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Gaayen Geet Sada Subah Aur Shyam
Har Ek Pal Mey Har Ek Kshan Mey
Bhajey Hum Sada Tero Naam [ Gaayen Geet ... ]
Koi Kahey Tujhe Janaki Rama
Koi Pukarey Radhey Shyama
Hamarey Liye Tum Sai Bhagawan [ Gaayen Geet ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai Ram, we sing forever Your glory from dawn to dusk. We sing Your glory with every breath, every second and forever. O Sai, some call You Rama, some others prefer to call You Shyama (Krishna), but You will remain as Sai Bhagawan for us.

title: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai
title2: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo
lyrics:
Sadguru Sai Ram Naam Bhajo
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Bhajo [ Sai Ram ... ]
Allah Malik Sai Ram Bhajo
Buddha Mahavir Sai Ram Bhajo
Yesu Pitha Prabhu Sai Ram Bhajo [ Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Sai Ram, the divine preceptor. He is none other than Allah, Buddha, Mahavir and Jesus.

title: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sathya
title2: Sai Ram Sai Ram Sathya Sai Avatara
lyrics:
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sathya Sai Sathya Sai
Merey Baba, Merey Sai, Merey Baba, O Merey Sai (O)
Sathya Sai Sathya Sai Sathya Sai Avatara

title: Sai Ram Sai Shyam Merey
title2: Sai Ram Sai Shyam Merey Sai Ram
lyrics:
Merey Sai Merey Baba Merey Prana Natha Ram [ Sai Ram ... ]
Terey Dwar Pey Mein Avoon Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Mujhey Shanthi Do Bhagawan
Merey Jeevana Mey Saath Raho Sai Natha Hey
meaning: Oh Lord Sai Rama, Sai Shyama, my dear Baba, I am standing at Your door step, bestow me with peace Oh Lord, be with me all through my life, Oh Lord Sai.

title: Sai Ram, Your Name
title2: Sai Ram, Your name is love, Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
lyrics:
In a blissful compassion, a heaven on earth 
In this heaven, salvation from death and from birth
Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram

Sai Ram, Your name is peace, Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
In this raucous pollution, a silence resounds 
In this restless illusion, a stillness is found
Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram

Sai Ram, Your name is mine, Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
In unbounded devotion, I hear my Self 
In surrender and union, I am my Self
Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram

title: Sai Rama As Charioteer
title2: Sai Rama as Charioteer, Sai Rama as Charioteer, Sai Rama as Charioteer for us (2)
lyrics:
When we are weary, heaven just seems too far
Let Sai Lord be our Charioteer (2)
Have God in driver's seat, same as Sai is in control
Steering us to God's heavenly place
Sathya Sai, O Lord lead us Your way

title: Sai Rama Bolo Sai Rama
title2: Sai Rama Bolo Sai Rama Bolo
lyrics:
Sita Vallabha Tulasi Rama Lakshmana Sevitha Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Atmabhi Rama Ananda Rama
Ahalyodharaka Karunya Rama
Maruti Sevitha Hrudayanta Rama
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Rama who is the beloved of Sita and is served by Lakshmana and Hanuman. Lord Sai is verily Rama, who is the indweller of all and the most compassionate one who liberated Ahalya from a curse.

title: Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna
title2: Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey (3)
lyrics:
Raghupathi Raghava Rama Harey
Rajeeva Lochana Rama Harey
Sai Rama Harey Sai Krishna Harey
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Harey
meaning: Salutations to You, Lord Sai, residing in Parthi. You are verily Lord Rama, the one with beautiful Lotus shaped eyes and the noblest of the Raghu Dynasty. You are verily Lord Krishna.

title: Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Dasharatha Nandana Sri Raghu Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Pavana Naama
Pavana Naama Pavana Naama [ Parthi Pureeshwara ... ]
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Rama, the son of King Dasharatha and the scion of the Raghu dynasty. Glory to You O Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi whose name is the most sacred one. We surrender ourselves to You O Sai Rama.

title: Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Parama Dayaghana Atma Rama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Shantha Saguna Hari Hara Paramatma
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Dayabhi Rama
Patitha Pavana Sathya Sai Rama
Sharanam Sharanam Hey Sai Rama
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai Rama, You are the most compassionate, the virtuous one who safeguards the devotees and the one who uplifts the downtrodden. O Lord, we seek Your protection.

title: Sai Rama Jagadeeshwara
lyrics:
Sarva Bhauma Sarveshwara [ Sai Rama ... ]
Aganita Guna Gana Akhileshwara
Sakala Jana Priya Sarveshwara
Shambho Mahadeva Shiva Shankara
meaning: O Lord Sai Rama, You are the greatest of the Emperors and the Lord of the Universe, full of virtues, adored by the entire humanity. O Lord You are none other than the Lord Shankara (Shiva).

title: Sai Rama Namo Namo
lyrics:
Sai Krishna Namo Namo
Shirdi Nivasa Namo Namo
Parthi Nivasa Namo Namo
Jagadodhara Namo Namo
Pranavakara Namo Namo
Shanthakara Namo Namo
Sakshathkara Namo Namo (2)
meaning: Chant the names of Sai Rama, Sai Krishna, the one residing in Shirdi and in Parthi, the one who is the upholder of this Universe, the one who is the personification of the Primordial sound "OM", the one who is always at Peace and who can appear before the devotee at will.

title: Sai Rama Om Sai Krishna
title2: Sai Rama Om Sai Krishna Sai Shiva Buddha Sai Baba Om
lyrics:
Hari Om Hari Om Hari Hari Om Hari Om Hari Om Hari Hari Om
Rama Rama Krishna Krishna Shiva Shiva Buddha (Om) (2)

Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama, Krishna Krishna Krishna, Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva, Shiva Buddha Shiva Sai Buddha
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama, Krishna Krishna, Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva, Shiva Buddha Shiva Sai Buddha
meaning: Chant the Holy names of Lord Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Buddha, Hari and Sai Baba who is the very embodiment of all.

title: Sai Rama Raghurama
lyrics:
Raja Rama Ghana Shyama [ Sai Rama ... ]
Rama Rama Pavana Dhama
Karuna Sindhu Sathya Sai Rama
meaning: Oh Lord Rama of Raghu dynasty, Your name is the most sacred one, You are the most compassionate one, Oh Sathya Sai Rama.

title: Sai Rama Sai Krishna, Sai
title2: Sai Rama Sai Krishna, Sai Baba
lyrics:
Warera no Subete wo Sasagemasu [ Sai Rama... ]
Kurayami Terasu Hikari Sai
Minna de Utaou Ai no Uta
Sai Rama Sai Krishna, Sai Baba
meaning: Sai Rama, Krishna, Baba, You are the light that shines in the darkness. We offer You everything and sing to You this song of love.

title: Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai
title2: Sai Rama Sai Rama Sai Rama Bhajo
lyrics:
Sita Ram Sita Ram Sita Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Ram Ram Ram Sai Rama Bhajo
Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyam Radhey Shyama Bhajo
meaning: Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Sita Rama. Sing the Glory of Lord Sai Rama and Radhey Shyam.

title: Sai Rama Your Eyes
title2: Sai Rama Your Eyes I Am Caught In Your Eyes Sai Rama
lyrics:
My Wants And Desires They Have Met Their Demise I Am Lost In Your Eyes Sai Rama
Sai Rama Your Gaze I Am Dancing Away Sai Rama
In A World Of Disguise And Maya I Am Soaring The Skies In Your Ananda
Gently Falling Back In Your Arms I'm Entranced By Your Eyes Sai Rama
I Am Lost In Your Eyes Sai Rama

title: Sai Ramanin Naamam Solvom
lyrics:
Pinigalum Vinaigalum Neengidume [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Sathya Dharmamum Shanthi Premaiyum
Nittamum Manadil Nilai Pera Vendum
Siddiyum Perave Arul Purivaye
Shirdi Parthi Baba Sai
Sai Ram Sathya Sai Ram (3)
meaning: Let us chant the name of Sai Ram, so all our ills and troubles will pass. May truth, righteousness, peace, and love prevail in our minds forever. Grace us with Your blessings, O Lord of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Sai Sai Naama (Sathya)
lyrics:
Rama Sai, Krishna Sai, Shiva Sai, Ranga Sai
 Sai Sai Naama (Sathya)
 Rama Naama, make me pure
 Krishna Naama Sweet and sure
 Sai Sai Naama (Sathya)
 Shiva Naam is ego's pyre
 Panduranga lights the fire
 Sai Sai Naama (Sathya)
 What to say of Sai encompasses them all
 Father - Mother Sai at Your Lotus Feet I fall

title: Sai Sai Sai Sings My Heart
title2: Sai Sai Sai Sings My Heart Everyday
lyrics:
Let Us Never Forget Thee, Let Us Never Forget Thee
[Sai Sai Sai ....]
Baba You Are Able To Touch My Life
You Have Made It Worthwhile, You Have Made It Worthwhile
[Sai Sai Sai ....]
We See Your Amazing Grace Everywhere
You Are My Guiding Light, Baba You Are Guiding Light

title: Sai Sai Sai, Sai on Earth
title2: Sai Sai Sai, Sai on Earth, Sai Sai Sai, for all the universe
lyrics:
Peace Peace Peace, Peace on Earth, for all the universe
 Love Love Love, Love on Earth....

title: Sai Sai Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Itoshiki Guru Baba [ Sai Sai ... ]
Kami no Ai de Michibiku
Subete ni Yadoru
Shinri no Hikari yo
Warera wo Mamoru Ai no Kami
Kagayaku Hikari Guru Baba
meaning: Beloved Sai Baba, You are the God of Love who dwells in everything. You guide us to the light of truth and protect us always. You are the shining light Baba, our Divine Preceptor.

title: Sai Sai Sathya Sai Humney
title2: Sai Sai Sathya Sai Humney Pukara
lyrics:
Tum Bina Nahin Mujhey Koi Sahara [ Sai Sai ... ]
Dukhiyon Ke Tum Dil Ka Pyaara
Garibon Ke Tum Aankhon Ke Taara
Merey Liye Tum Ek Sahara
meaning: Oh Lord Sai, I called you Sathya Sai, You are the support for the needy, downtrodden and helpless and you are my only support Sai.

title: Sai Sai Sayanarey Sarvam Brahmam
title2: Sai Sai Sayanarey Sarvam Brahmam Mayamanarey
lyrics:
Baba Baba Babanarey Bhakthito Bhajana Lo Palgonarey [ Sai Sai .. ]
Rama Rama Ramanarey Raakshasa Gunamulu Pommanarey
Krishna Krishna Krishnanarey Kashtamulanu Poguttunurey [ Sai Sai .. ]
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Anarey Atma Ramuni Madigonarey
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Anarey Shiva Keshavulanu Samamanarey
meaning: Chant the name of Sai and realize that the universe is Brahman (the ultimate and unchanging reality); Chant the name of Baba and participate in group singing with devotion; Chant the name of Rama and drive away the demonic qualities within you. Chant the name of Krishna and it will eliminate your troubles; Chant the name of Hari and find the indweller in you; Chant the name of Shiva and realize that Shiva and Keshava (Krishna) are one and the same.

title: Sai Sai Smarana Karo
lyrics:
Guru Charana Kamala Dhyana Karo [ Sai Sai ... ]
Keshava Madhava Bhajana Karo
Sadguru Sai Seva Karo (Sri)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sai, meditate upon His Lotus Feet, sing the glory of Keshava, Madhava (names of Lord Krishna), serve the Divine Preceptor Sai.

title: Sai Saraswathi Kalavathi (Sathya)
lyrics:
Sakala Shastra Vikasini [ Sai Saraswathi ... ]
Bhaava Raga Laya Tala Vinodini (3)
Parthi Nivasini Bharati Brahmani
meaning: Lord Sai who is residing in Parthi is none other than Goddess Saraswathi, the one who is personification of all types of Arts and the one who enjoys the Art of Music.

title: Sai Saraswathi Namo Namo
lyrics:
Devi Bhagawathi Namo Namo
Veena Vani Vishwa Kalyani
Veda Kalamayi Gnana Swaroopini [ Sai Saraswathi ... ]
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Pradayini
Saama Gaana Priya Prashanthi Nilayey
meaning: Salutations to Sai Saraswathi (also known as Devi Bhagawathi) residing in Prashanthi Nilayam, the one who holds Veena and looks after the welfare of the Universe, who is mother of Vedas and music, the one who bestows Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love and the one who is delighted to sing Saama Veda (One of the four Vedas).

title: Sai Satchidananda Guru
lyrics:
Ananda Ananda Ananda Guru [ Sai Satchidananda ... ] 
Guru Paramesha Sai Bhagawan 
Guru Mahadeva Sai Bhagawan
Satchidananda Sri Sai Bhagawan
Ananda Ananda Ananda Guru (2)
meaning: Sing the praises of our divine Preceptor, Sai Baba, who is verily truth, consciousness, and bliss. He is great and is the Lord of Lords.

title: Sai Sathya Sai Sai Guru
title2: Sai Sathya Sai Sai Guru Deva
lyrics:
Darshana Deejo Baba Tribhuvana Pala
Darshana Deejo Baba Sai Nandalala
Krupa Karo Sai Deva
meaning: Our Lord and Preceptor, Sai, the protector of the three worlds, please be kind and let us have Your darshan (vision of a divine being).

title: Sai Shankara
lyrics:
Narayana Bhagawan
Tum Ho Merey Pran (Baba) (2)
Deejo Merey Prabhu Shanthi Mukthi
Sikhao Prabhu Mujhey Prem Aur Bhakthi
Shirdi Roopa Baba (Parthi Pureeshwara) Hey Bhagawan [ Tum Ho ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai of Parthi and Shirdi, You are Lord Shankara and Lord Narayana, You are my life. O Lord, bestow me with Peace and Liberation and teach me Love and Devotion.

title: Sai Shankara Bholey Shankara
lyrics:
Sathya Narayana Narayanam
Damaru Boley Dama Dama Dam
Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Dhimi Boley Mrudangam
Veena Boley Narayanam [ Sathya Narayana ... ]
meaning: Lord Sai Shankara, Sathya Narayana, You are none other than Lord Shiva whose Damaru (miniature hand-held drum) emanates the "Dama Dama" sound, the Mrudangam (a percussion instrument) makes the "Dhimi Dhimi" sound and the Veena chants the name of Narayana.

title: Sai Shankara Parthi Pureeshwara
lyrics:
Ganga Jatadhara Shashidhara Phani Dhara [ Sai Shankara ... ]
Phaala Netradhara Kalakoota Hara
Bhasmodbhavakara Bhavani Shankara
Sayeeshwara Hara Parthi Maheshwara
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is none other than Lord Shiva whose attributes are described as, the one supporting the sacred river Ganges in His matted hair, adorning the Crescent moon on His head, adorning the serpent as a necklace, having a third eye in the forehead and smeared with ash all over the body.

title: Sai Shankara Shambho Shankara
lyrics:
Natana Manohara Jaya Abhayankara
Chandrakaladhara Gowri Shankara
Parama Dayaghana Sai Shankara
Eshwaramba Nandana Parthi Shankara
Paramananda Prabhu Parameshwara
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai of Parthi, the Son of Eshwaramba. O Lord Sai, You are none other than Lord Shankara (Shiva) who is fond of dance, who bestows victory, who wears the crescent-shaped moon on the head and the consort of Gowri (Parvathi). You are the most compassionate one who is always in bliss.

title: Sai Shiva Is So Sublime
title2: Sai Shiva is so sublime like phases of the moon
lyrics:
And the full moon phase means much to me [ Sai Shiva is ... ]
Shining moon reflects Lord Shiva Sai as sunlight
Crushing darkness that may be hiding inside my heart [ And the full moon ... ]

title: Sai Shyam Sai Shyam Sai
title2: Sai Shyam Sai Shyam Sai Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Madhava Jaya Keshava Jaya Murali Gaana Lola [ Sai Shyam ... ]
Pandari Natha Panduranga
Parthi Nivasa Sai Deva [ Jaya Madhava ... ]
meaning: This song is in praise of Lord Sai Krishna whose abode is Parthi, who is also known as Shyam, Gopala, Madhava, Keshava and Panduranga.

title: Sai Sri Sai Sath Chitha
title2: Sai Sri Sai Sath Chitha Sai
lyrics:
Sath Chitha Sai Bhujagendra Sai
Bhujagendra Sai Vata Patra Sai
Vata Patra Sai Sri Ranga Sai
Sri Ranga Sai Namata Namami
meaning: This song praises the attributes of Lord Sri Ranganatha (Lord Vishnu) who is reclining on the Celestial Snake Adi Sesha, who is none other than Lord Krishna resting on Ficus leaf. (The child Krishna floating on ficus leaf in Hinduism is a symbolic representation of the first form of life on earth).

title: Sai Sundara Sundara
lyrics:
Vyagrambaradhara Harey Hari Hara [ Sai Sundara ... ]
Anantha Guna Mandira Sundara
Natana Sundara Bhuvana Sundara
meaning: This song praises Lord Sai as the most beautiful in the world, the one who is none other than Lord Shiva adorning tiger skin, who is highest in virtues and who is the most charming Cosmic dancer.

title: Sai Terey Charanon Mey
title2: Sai Terey Charanon Mey Koti Pranam
lyrics:
Daya Karo Merey Atma Rama
Sai Ram Hey Ghana Shyama
Jagadodhara Sri Sai Rama [ Daya Karo ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, I offer million salutations at Thy Lotus feet. Please show mercy O my Lord Rama, the indweller of hearts. O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Krishna and the redeemer of the world.

title: Sai Terey Charanon Mey Koti
title2: Sai Terey Charanon Mey Koti Pranam
lyrics:
Sharan Mey Lelo Sai Prabho [ Sai Terey ... ]
Tum Ho Merey Mata Pitha Sai
Tum Ho Merey Bandhu Sakha
Tum Ho Merey Sab Kuch Sai
Deejo Hum Ko Charana Tumharey
meaning: O Lord Sai, I offer a million salutations at Thy Lotus feet, please take me in Your fold. You are my mother, father, kith and kin. You are my every thing O Sai, I offer myself at Your feet.

title: Sai Tero Naam Tero Naam
lyrics:
Janam Janam Mein Gaoon (2)
Charan Tumharey Sadguru Sai
Apne Hrudaya Basaoon
Shirdi Sai Parthi Sai
Prema Sai Guna Gaoon [ Janam ... ]
meaning: (Aalap: We have been blessed with the ever pure Sai Ram just like how Surdas was blessed by Lord Krishna or Shabari by Lord Rama.) O Lord Sai, I will sing Your name in all my several lives, I will install Your feet in my heart and continue to sing the glory of Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai and Prema Sai.

title: Sai wa Ai, Shinri wa
title2: Sai wa Ai, Shinri wa Ibuki, Shifuku wa Ikiru Kate
lyrics:
Sono Iki Kata ga Tsutaeru Ai
Riyuu wa Naku, Toki ni Yorazu, Kawaranu Shin no Ai
Ai to Shinri no Shifuku wa, Dharma ga Shizukani Motarasu
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai Subete
Tatae yo Shifuku he Michibiku Keshin
meaning: Sai is Love, Truth is Your breath, Bliss is the food that keeps us alive. This is the way of living to convey true love. Your love is not bound by reason or by time, and it is a constant truth. You gently bring out our Dharma, Love, and Truth which brings us bliss. Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai, You are everything. We praise Your heavenly incarnation who guides us to supreme bliss.

title: Sai wa Buddha Buddha wa
title2: Sai wa Buddha Buddha wa Sai
lyrics:
Sai wa Gautama Gautama Sai
Sai no Ai wa Buddha no Ai
Sai wa Amida Amida wa Sai
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are Buddha, Gautama, and Amitabha (Amida). Your love is the love of Buddha.
raga: major and minor (~ shivaranjani), hamsanandi / sohini

title: Sai You are in my heart
title2: Sai You are in my heart as I am in Your heart forever
lyrics:
We're one heart called Soham called Love
 Sai Hrudaya Vihari You're Dharma and Shanthi,
 You're Sathya, You're Prema Omnipresent One Soham
 You are the ocean Lord, I am your wave
 You are the mountain Sai, I am your cave
 You are the blue sky I am your star
 Sai Divine Mother One we always are (Sai You are ...)
 You are the Love tree, I am your clinging vine
 You're the Divine Poet, my life is Your rhyme
 You are the Father, I'm Your loving son
 We are Omnipresence from where all has come
 (Sai You are ...)

title: Sai You Are More Precious
title2: Sai You Are More Precious Than Silver
lyrics:
Sai You Are More Valued Than Gold
Sai You Are More Beautiful Than Diamonds
Nothing In This World Compares With You
Sai You Are Rama And Krishna
Sai You Are The Sun And The Moon
Sai You Are The Cause Of All Created
All The Universe Depends On You
Sai You Are More Precious Than Silver
Sai You Are More Valued Than Gold
Sai You Are More Beautiful Than Diamonds
Nothing In This World Compares With You
Nothing I Desire Compares With You
Nothing In My Life Compares With You
alt_lyrics:
Sai You Are More Precious Than Silver
Sai You Are More Valued Than Gold
Sai You Are More Beautiful Than Diamonds
Nothing I Desire Compares With You

title: Sai You Are My Heart
title2: Sai, You are my heart and soul
lyrics:
You are my path and my goal
You make my life more than complete, You give Your love to me
Sai, You are my heart and soul
Born in this world in the name of Sai, hold on to Him if you can
He is in one, He is in all, you can see Him in everything

title: Sai, Embodiment of Love
lyrics:
Turning us all into God
 Sai is turning us all into God
 We open up to find You in our heart
 You show us that we've never been apart
 Sai Baba, wake us from the dream
 Take us to Your blissful Love Supreme
 O melt us in Your blissful Love Supreme
 (Sathya) Sai Baba my Lord (2X) /
 Sai Love Supreme (3X)

title: Sai, Oh Sai
title2: Sai, Oh Sai, Oh Sai, Oh Sai, Oh Sai  (3x)
lyrics:
Baba, Oh Baba, Oh Baba, Oh Baba, Oh Baba  (3x)
Swami, Oh Swami, Oh Swami, Oh Swami, Oh Swami  (3x)
Sathya, Oh Sathya, Oh Sathya, Oh Sathya, Oh Sathya  (3x)
Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba  (3x)
Sathya, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai  (3x)
Sai, Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba, Sai Baba  (3x)
Sathya, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Baba  (2x)
Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Baba

title: Sai’s Love is so wonderful
title2: Sai's Love is so wonderful, so wonderful, so wonderful
lyrics:
Sai's Love is so wonderful, Sai's wonderful love.
 It's so high you can't climb over it
 It's so low you can't go under it
 It's so wide you can't go around it, Sai's wonderful love.

title: Sai’s Universe
title2: We are a part of Sai’s universe
lyrics:
Here in the heart of Sai’s universe
We send our love to all beings
Throughout the heavens they’ll hear us sing

title: Sakala Bhuvana Ke Prabhu Parameshwara
lyrics:
Hrudaya Nivasi Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan
Hrudaya Vihari Antaryami
Hum Bhakton Ke Jeevan Swami
Prana Sakha Tum Hey Praneshwara
Prema Swaroopa Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, You are the Lord of the entire universe. You are the resident of all hearts. You are the life of all devotees. You are nearer to us than our very own life breath. You are the very embodiment of Love.

title: Sakshath Parabrahma Sai Guru Vandana
title2: Sakshath Parabrahma Sai Guru Vandana Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Guru Pada Ranjana Guru Paramesha
Guru Brahma Guru Vishnu Mahesha
Sadguru Sai Parthi Pureesha
Charana Namostuthey Sai Mahesha
meaning: Our salutations at Your divine Lotus feet, Oh Lord Sai. You are our divine preceptor, the Supreme God, and the unified form of the Trinity (Brahma, Vishnu and Shiva).

title: Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam
title2: Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam Valekum Salaam
lyrics:
Allah Ho Allah Ho Allah Ho Akbar [ Salaam Valekum ... ]
Buddha Zohrashtra Yesu Mahavir
Nanak (Sai Nath) Ji Ki Jai Jaikar Ho
meaning: God is great, peace be upon you. Victory to Allah, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Yesu, Mahavir and Nanak.

title: Salute To Lord Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Salute to Lord Shirdi Sai
To our Indwelling Lord
We salute to God, Sai Ram
To Universal Lord Allah
To Eshwara and Rama
Golden Age is here and is spreading
Happiness and Peace to the worlds

title: Samba Sadashiva Sai Prabho
lyrics:
Shambho Mahadeva Dehi Vibho
Jaya Ganga Jatadhari Gowri Pathey
Sathya Sai Mahadeva Parthi Pathey
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai of Parthi, You are Lord Shiva, who supports the sacred river Ganga in Your matted hair. O Lord, we seek Your protection.

title: Samba Sadashiva Samba Sadashiva
lyrics:
Samba Sadashiva Sai Shiva
Parthi Pureesha Hey Paramesha
Patitha Janavana Pavana Charitha
Parvathi Ramana Parama Dayala
Parvatha Raja Kumari Ramana
meaning: Salutations to you Lord Samba Sadashiva, who is also the Lord of Parthi, the protector of the weak and downtrodden, the consort of Goddess Parvathi and the most merciful one.

title: Samba Sadashiva Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Gangadhara Hara Gowri Shiva [ Samba ... ]
Narthana Sundara Natana Manohara
Natya Priyakara Nataneshwara (2)
meaning: Oh Lord Sayeeshwara you are none other than Lord Shiva also called by other names like Gangadhara, Gowri Shiva and Nataneshwara who performs the beautiful Cosmic dance.

title: Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari
lyrics:
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Daya Sagari Parama Krupakari
alt_lyrics:
Akhilandeshwari Raja Rajeshwari
Daya Sagari Parama Krupakari
Samba Vinodini Shiva Sai Shankari (2)
Mangala Gowri Mata Maheshwari
meaning: Salutations to Mother Parvathi, the Goddess of the whole Universe and the consort of Lord Shiva. She is the supremely compassionate Mother who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Sambhava Shiva Shambho Shambho
lyrics:
Narthana Nataraja Nataraja [ Sambhava Shiva ... ]
Mruthyunjaya Mahesha Mahesha
Parthi Pureeshwara Sai Paramesha
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Shiva who is the Cosmic dancer Nataraja, also known as Mruthyunjaya (Conqueror of death). He is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

title: Sambhavi Shankari Linga Bhairavi
lyrics:
Shoola Dharini Ma
Trishoola Dharini Ma [ Sambhavi Shankari ... ]
Mangala Kaarini Manjula Bhaashini
Tribhuvana Palini Kali Kapalini 
Sambhavi Shankari Linga Bhairavi (3)
meaning: Praise the Divine Mother, embodied as the sacred Lingam. Bearing the trident, she is the bestower of auspiciousness, and speaks charmingly. She sustains all three worlds.

title: Sambhavi Shankari Namo Namo
lyrics:
Shantha Swaroopini Namo Namo
Sai Maheshwari Namo Namo (Sathya)
Namo Namo Namo Namo (2)
meaning: Salutations to Mother Sambhavi Shankari (Goddess Parvathi), who is embodiment of peace, who is none other than mother Sai.

title: Sanathana Sarathey Sayeesha
lyrics:
Sarvottama Guna Nidhey Paramesha
Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Ram
Suramuni Vanditha Sadhu Jana Poshita
Sarva Janashraya Sayeesha
Sadguru Deva Satchidananda
Sashtanga Sharanam Mama Guru (Sai) Deva [ Ram Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: Salutations at Your divine lotus feet Oh Lord Sai, You are the upholder of the "Eternal Laws" (Sanathana Dharma), the one who is the embodiment of all virtues, the one who is worshipped by sages and noble ones and the one whom the entire humanity worships.

title: Sangeeta Rasike Sharadey (Amba)
lyrics:
Sadananda Roopini Saraswathi [ Sangeeta Rasike ... ]
Bhaava Raga Laya Gaana Viloley
Bhaktha Kalpalatikey Vidya Pathey
meaning: Salutations to You, Oh Mother Saraswathi, You are passionate about music, You are eternally in bliss, You are the indomitable support for all Your devotees and You bestow knowledge to all.

title: Sankata Harana Govinda
lyrics:
Venkata Ramana Govinda [ Sankata ... ]
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Parthi Pureeshwara Govinda (2)
Paahi Prabho Maam Govinda
meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Govinda who has now incarnated as the Lord of Parthi, the remover of all obstacles, we offer ourselves at your tender lotus feet.

title: Sankata Harana Govinda
lyrics:
Pankaja Charana Govinda
Sathya Sai Deva Govinda
Saptagiri Vasa Govinda
Govinda Hari (Sai) Govinda
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda (Narayana) who resides in the seven hills and has now incarnated as Lord Sathya Sai, who is the remover of all obstacles. O Lord, we offer ourselves at Your tender lotus feet.

title: Sankata Harana Mangala Charana
lyrics:
Shirdeeshwara Sai Deva Deva
Partheeshwara Sai Deva
Bhava Priya Sai Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Yuga Avatara Jaya Jaga Vandana
Mohana Roopa Manasa Ranjana
Shirdeeshwara Sai Deva Deva
Partheeshwara Sai Deva Deva
meaning: The holy feet of Sai destroys woes. Incarnations of this age and worshipped by all, both Parthi Sai and Shirdi Sai who are fond of their devotees' reverential feelings, remove their fears of existence. Both the avatars are delightful and beautiful to behold.

title: Sankata Harana Sri Sai Ramana
lyrics:
Pankaja Charana Namo Namo
Vedodharana Venkata Ramana
Lakshmi (Sai) Narayana Namo Namo
Namo Namo Namo Namo [ Pankaja Charana ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai (who is also the Lord Srinivasa of Tirupati), the one with feet soft like Lotus, the one who is the upholder of Vedas and who is the Consort of Lakshmi.

title: Santa Claus Is Coming To Town
title2: Santa Claus Is Coming To Town
lyrics:
So, you better watch out, you better not cry,
Better not pout, I'm telling you why:
Santa Claus is coming to town.
He's making a list and checking it twice,
Gonna find out who’s naughty and nice,
Santa Claus is coming to town.
He sees you when you're sleeping,
He knows when you're awake,
He knows if you've been bad or good,
So be good for goodness sake.
So, you better watch out, you better not cry,
Better not pout, I'm telling you why:
Santa Claus is coming to town
So…, you better watch out, you better not cry,
Better not pout, I'm telling you why:
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town
Santa Claus is coming to town (END HIGH)

title: Sanze no Toki wo Koete Michibiku
title2: Sanze no Toki wo Koete Michibiku Yuga no Kami Sai Baba
lyrics:
Uchuu ni Amaneku Mugen no Hikari wa
(Sathya) Sai Shiva no Miwaza
Om Namah Shivaya Shivaya Namah Om (5)
meaning: You transcend the time of our three lives to guide us, the Lord of the Yuga, Sai Baba. The infinite light that pervades the cosmos is Your grace, Sai Shiva. Salutations to Lord Shiva who is none other than Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Sapney Mey Aao Shyama Murari
lyrics:
Savari Surath Muralidhari [ Sapney Mey ... ]
Sab Ke Saajan Prabhu Giridhari
Sadguru Sai Parthi Vihari
meaning: Oh dark complexioned Lord Krishna, I invite You to come in my dreams. Oh Lord Sai who strolls in Parthi, You are the beloved companion of all.

title: Saraswathi Devi Saraswathi
lyrics:
Vani Veena Saraswathi
Brahma Sanathani Brahmamayi
Veda Swaroopini Vedamayi
Vaagdevi Vageshwari
Vaagvilasini Saraswathi
meaning: Our humble Salutations to Mother Saraswathi who is the embodiment of Sound, Speech and Music, who is the eternal one, who is the embodiment of all Vedas.

title: Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Deva
Allah Yesu Buddha Aur Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tum Ho
Rama Bhi Tum Ho Krishna Bhi Tum Ho
Vishwa Roopa Tum Ho (2)
alt_lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Deva
Sathya Sai Deva
Allah Yesu Buddha Aur Nanak
Zohrashtra Mahavira Tum Ho
Rama Hi Tum Ho Krishna Hi Tum Ho
Vishwa Roopa Tum Ho (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai who fosters all faiths and religions. He is verily the embodiment of Allah, Christ, Buddha, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Ram and Krishna.

title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sai Deva Deva Deva [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
Allah Yesu Guru Grantha Govinda
Maulah Sai Mahavira Madhava
Zohrashtra Buddha Sai Shankara [ Sai Deva ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is the embodiment of all religions and faiths. He is none other than Allah, Jesus, Nanak, Mahavir, Krishna, Buddha and Zohrashtra.

title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
lyrics:
Sarvotunga Sanathana [ Sarva Dharma ... ]
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Deva
Yesu Mohammad Buddha Mahavira
Nanak Sai Zohrashtra Shankara
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Dayi
meaning: Glory to you Oh Lord Sai who protects and nourishes all faiths and religions. Glory to the Eternal one who is the embodiment of Christ, Mohammad, Buddha and Mahavira Nanak, Zohrashtra and Shankara. Glory to you Oh Lord Sai who bestows and sustains Truth, Peace and Love.

title: Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Shankara
lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Sevitha Shankara
Sarva Jana Poojita Shankara
Sarva Loka Nayaka Shankara
Sarva Paapa Kshayakara Shankara
Sadananda Dayaka Shankara
Shankara Sai Shankara (2)
Shankara Parthi Shankara (2)
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva (Shankara), the one who encompasses all religions, the one who is worshipped by all, the one who is the Lord of the Universe, the one who destroys all sins and the one who is always in bliss. Bow to Lord Sai of Parthi who is the very embodiment of Lord Shankara.

title: Sarva Dharma Roopa Parama Gatheesha
lyrics:
Maha Shakthi Hey Mahaan Teja
Vishwadhara Poorana Brahma Sathya Sayeesha
Prema Roopa Dhara Kali Avatara Sai Mahesha
Shirdi Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Mahesha
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Sai who is the embodiment of all religions, who is extolled as the most effulgent, powerful, personification of Love and the incarnation of this Kali age.

title: Sarva Dharma Swaroopa Sai
lyrics:
Shirdi Ke (Parthi Ke) Avatara
Merey Baba Merey Sai
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
Hindu Muslim Isai Aatey Hai Terey Dwarey
Milte Hai Terey Dwarey [ Sai Ram Sai Ram ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi who is the embodiment of all religions and faiths and who draws all to His presence.

title: Sarva Mangala Sai Janani
lyrics:
Parthi Nivasini Parama Shivani [ Sarva Mangala ... ]
Mata Maheshwari Durga Bhavani
Adi Parashakthi Sai Narayani
Jagadodharini Bhava Bhaya Harini
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai, the most auspicious one residing in Parthi, who is verily Mother Parvathi, the consort of Lord Shiva. She is worshipped by names like Shivani, Durga, Maheshwari, and Parashakthi. She bestows liberation and destroys the fear of birth and death.

title: Sarva Naama Swaroopam Sai Baba
lyrics:
Sarva Hrudaya Nivasam Sai Baba [ Sarva Naama ... ]
Sarva Daivatva Swaroopam Sai Baba
Sarva Dharma Virajam Sai Baba
Om Brahma Sanathana Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the personification of all Names (of Gods), You live in everyone's hearts, You are the reflection of all pervading divinity, You are pure and You symbolize all faiths. O Lord Sai, You are the eternal Supreme Conscience.

title: Sarvatra Govinda Naama Sankeertana Govinda
title2: Sarvatra Govinda Naama Sankeertana Govinda Hari Govinda
lyrics:
Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda Hari Govinda
Purana Purusha Govinda Hari Punya Shloka Govinda
Bhaktha Vatsala Govinda Hari Bhaagavatha Priya Govinda
Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Rama Krishna Govinda
Sai Rama Govinda Hari Sai Krishna Govinda
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Govinda, the Supreme Lord who is extolled in the Vedas, the one who is dear to His devotees and to whom He is affectionate. Chant the names of Lord Rama and Krishna who are the same as Lord Sai.

title: Sat Naam, Vahe Guru
lyrics:
Sat Naam, Vahey Guru (3x)
Sat Naam, Vahey Guru (3x)
Sat Naam, Vahey Guru (3x)
Rab Da Gun Gao Ram Da Naam Japo (2x)
Sat Naam Sat Naam Bol Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol (2x)
meaning: Hail the Supreme Guru whose very name Truth. Sing the glory of God and chant the name of the Lord.

title: Satchidananda Paramananda
lyrics:
Devaki Nanda Mukunda Radhey Govinda (Vasu)
Anatha Natha Deena Natha
Prashanthi Vasa Shanthi Pradatha
Sai Ananda Mukunda Radhey Govinda
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai, the very embodiment of Truth, Consiousness and Bliss, who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam. He is none other than Lord Krishna, the son of Devaki and the beloved of Radha. Glory to Lord Sai, the saviour of needy and downtrodden and the bestower of peace.

title: Sathya Deivame Puttaparthi Nadane
lyrics:
Engal Vazhvil Undan Anbai Tandarulvaye
Sayi Unnai Ninaindu Nenjil Dyanam Seidome
Unnai Nadi Vandome Emmai Kattarulvaye
(Sathya) Sayi Undan Pugazhai Padi Sharanadaindome [ Engal ... ]
meaning: Lord of Truth, Lord of Parthi, bless our lives with Your love; we meditate on You in our hearts, and humbly approach You, singing Your glory. Protect us O Lord, we surrender unto You.

title: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sab
title2: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sab Ko Deejo
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Aap Hai
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Jeevan Ka Marm Hai
Guru Dev Guru Dev (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai, our Divine Preceptor, You are the personification of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love, which are the foundations of this human life.

title: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa
title2: Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Nilaya Deva
lyrics:
Rama Ho Krishna Ho Sai Ram Deva
Shiva Shakthi Swaroopa Baba Hey Deena Palana Baba
Hey Prashanthi Nilaya Deva Hey Poornavatara Baba
Allah Ho Maulah Ho Sai Ram Deva
meaning: Salutations to the Lord of Prashanthi, Lord Sai, who is the embodiment of Truth, Peace, Love and Harmony, O Lord Sai, You are none other than Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Shakthi, Allah and Maulah all of whom offer solace to the weak and the downtrodden.

title: Sathya Dharmamu Shanthi Premalato
lyrics:
Ni Nithya Jeevana Yatra Saginchu (Jeeva)
Manasu Madakada Gunamule Yaddul
Vivekamanu Chala Kolanun Tisi
Vishalamagu Mee Hrudayamu Dunnudo [ Sathya Dharmamu ... ]
Hrudaya Bhumini Sagu Cheyyandi
meaning: Truth, Righteousness, Peace, and Love are the guiding tools of the journey of life. With mind as the tiller, character as the pulling bulls and intellect as the reins, we must cultivate broadmindedness and love for everybody.

title: Sathya Manohari Sai Maheshwari
lyrics:
Brindavana Sanchari (Amba)
Characharamayi Sarva Shubhakari
Yuga Yuga Avatari (Amba)
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai who is ever enchanting and the embodiment of Truth and Wisdom, the one who is eternal and confers Her grace and auspiciousness upon one and all. She is the one who is present across all times and ages.

title: Sathya Narayana Govinda Madhava Sai
title2: Sathya Narayana Govinda Madhava Sai Narayana Govinda Keshava (3)
lyrics:
Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Rama Harey Harey
Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Krishna Harey Harey
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sathya Narayana, also known as Govinda, Madhava, Narayana, Keshava, Rama and Krishna.

title: Sathya Narayana Guru Deva
lyrics:
Bhaktha Parayana Prabhu Deva
Guru Deva Prabhu Deva
Sathya Deva Sai Deva [ Sathya Narayana ... ]
Parthi Natha Sathya Sai Deva
Mukthi Daata Sathya Sai Deva [ Guru Deva ... Sai Deva ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Narayana, the Lord and Divine teacher who is praised by His devotees. He is verily Lord Sai of Puttaparthi who grants liberation.

title: Sathya Narayani Shantha Swaroopini
lyrics:
Mangala Vadani Malini
Maya Vilasini Maha Kamini
Mahishasura Mardhini Harini
meaning: Glory to you Oh mother Sathya Narayani who is the embodiment of eternal bliss and peace whose countenance is so enchanting and soft like a creeper and emanates radiance and auspiciousness.

title: Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
Krishna, Oh Krishna  (3x)
Oh Krishna
Shirdi Sai Baba  (4x)
Rama, Oh Rama  (3x)
Oh (Sai) Rama
Jesus, Oh Jesus  (3x)
Oh (Sai) Jesus
Buddha, Oh Buddha  (3x)
Oh (Sai) Buddha
Swami, Oh Swami  (3x)
Oh Swami

Sathya Sai Baba  (8x)

title: Sathya Sai Baba Anata no
title2: Sathya Sai Baba Anata no Hohoemi wa
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Baba Subete no Inochi Terasu
Masshirona Masshirona Kokoro ni Utsusou
Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo
Subete no Kokoro ni, Subete no Kotoba ni
Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo, Ai wo
Subete no Inori ni, Subete no Inochi ni
meaning: O Lord Sai, Your smile shines brightly on all our lives. Let us reflect this pure light in our hearts. Love within all hearts, love within all words. Love within all prayers, Love within all lives.

title: Sathya Sai Baba Mujhey Charanon
title2: Sathya Sai Baba Mujhey Charanon Mey Lo
lyrics:
Charanon Mey Lo Baba Charanome Lo [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Parthi Ke Tum Ho Swami
Antaryami Antaryami
Karuna Karo Baba Deena Janon Ki
Jariba Kari Baba Bhakthon Ko [ Sathya Sai ... ]
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, the indweller and the Lord of Parthi, please receive me at Your lotus feet and kindly show me mercy.

title: Sathya Sai Baba, my Lord
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, my Lord
lyrics:
You taught me how to pray, O my Lord, in a way
 That makes me one with the world when I pray
 God is only one, He is there for everyone
 Whatever Name we call when we pray
 Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Lord, Buddha, Nanak, Christ the Lord
 Allah is great, so pray
 God is great and He is One, He is God for everyone
 Let us sing the song that God is One

title: Sathya Sai Baba, O Avatar
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, O Avatar, Lord I want You and need You
lyrics:
Lord be with me, constantly lead me into Your infinite Love
Open my inner eyes dear Lord, so I can see God in all
Always guide my head and hands, Sai please transform my heart
Fill my life with songs divine, brightly shine with love and with peaceful sound of Om

title: Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba, Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
lyrics:
Truth Sai Baba, Love Sai Baba, Peace Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Truth in my mind, Love in my heart, Peace in my Soul, Om Sai Baba
 Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba, Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Truth in all things, Love for all Creation, Peace on our Earth, Om Sai Baba
 Sathya Sai Baba, Prema Sai Baba,
 Shaanthi Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba
 Om Sai Baba, Om Sai Baba, Light of the
 Universe, Om Sai Baba

title: Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba
lyrics:
Sathya, Sathya, Sathya Sai
 Baba, Baba, Om (count to 8)
 In Thy Hands I surrender my heart

title: Sathya Sai Baba, the sound of Your name
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, the sound of Your name
lyrics:
Fire's my heart's love to a more potent flame
 All life is enriched by the blessings You bring
 Sweet Lord, Your love nourishes everything.
 Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Baba
 Bhagawan, Lord of all, World Avatar
 You've come to transform manking into light
 And planet earth to a sacred star.

title: Sathya Sai Baba, Tú eres amor
title2: Sathya Sai Baba, Tú eres amor
lyrics:
Tú eres Prema Swaroopa, Tú eres Prema Swaroopa, Tú eres Prema Swaroopa, Encarnación del amor
Sathya Sai Baba, Tú eres amor
Y como no tienes fronteras, como no estás limitado, Tú amor es grande y hermoso, como el amor del sol
meaning: Sathya Sai Baba, You are love; You are Prema Swaroopa, Incarnation of love; Sathya Sai Baba, You are love; You have no borders, You are unlimited, Your love is great and beautiful, like the love of the sun.

title: Sathya Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sarva jana priya Deva
Whatever the name, whatever the form, we know You’ve come to save us
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, let us feel Your Love and Grace
Sai Ram, Bhagawan, let us see You in every face
 
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Sarva dharma priya Deva
We know that You’ve come to teach us how to love
You’ve come to teach us seva
Sai Ram, Sai Ram, when we practice what You teach
It is then that we know that we’re on the right path
We’ll all meet at Your feet

title: Sathya Sai es un ser
title2: Sathya Sai Es Un Ser De Luz
lyrics:
Su Amor Inspira Al Cosmos
Con Su Aliento Nos Protege, Con Su Gracia Nos Libera
Cantemos Victoria A Nuestro Guru (2)
meaning: Sathya Sai is the embodiment of light. His love inspires the cosmos. He protects us with His breath, frees us with His grace. Let's sing victory to our Guru.

title: Sathya Sai Naamam Pavana Naamam
lyrics:
Munijana Sevitha Mohana Naamam [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Parama Punitham Mangala Naamam
Sundara Naamam Sumadhura Naamam
Tana Mana Ranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Dayaka Naamam
meaning: The name of Lord Sathya Sai is Holy, the beautiful name which the sages worshipped, the most auspicious and nectarine name, the name that exhilarates the body and mind, the name which destroys the fears of the materialistic world and the name which bestows Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love.

title: Sathya Sai no Ai to
title2: Sathya Sai no Ai to Ikiru Yorokobi wo tomo ni
lyrics:
Kokoro no Tobira Akereba Soko ni Fuku Kaze wa Sai no Ai [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Sathya Sai no Mina no Hibiki Taenaru Ten no Melody
Sathya Sai no Kaze ga Hakonde Kuru, Ai ni Ikiru Yorokobi
meaning: Living with Sai's love is joyous! If you open the doors of your heart, Sai's love will come rushing in like the wind. The sound of Sai's beautiful name reverberates through the heavens in an exquisite melody.

title: Sathya Sai Padambujam Bhajorey Manasa
title2: Sathya Sai Padambujam Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam
lyrics:
Parama Pavitram Pavana Charanam
Kalimala Dahanam Sri Guru Charanam
Bhava Bhaya Nashana Duritha Nivarana
Parthi Pureeshwara Pankaja Charanam
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam
Bhajorey Manasa Nirantharam (2)
meaning: Meditate incessantly upon the most holy and auspicious Lotus Feet of Lord Sathya Sai, the Feet of the Divine Preceptor, which will eradicate the sins of this Kali age, the Feet, which will destroy all the fears of this materialistic world and remove the obstacles.

title: Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana
title2: Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
lyrics:
Prema Sudha Baraso Shanthi Sudha Baraso [ Sathya Sai ... ]
Kali Yuga Mey Tum Yuga Avatari
Sathya Sai Rama Hey Ghana Shyama
meaning: O Lord Sathya Sai, the most venerable one, shower on us Your immense love and bestow peace upon us, O Lord of this Kali age.

title: Sathya Sai Rama Shiva Shakthi
title2: Sathya Sai Rama Shiva Shakthi Roopa
lyrics:
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Poorna Teja
Eshwaramba Nandana Sathya Narayana
Yuga Avatara Devadi Deva
Jaya Paramesha Parthi Pureesha
Hrudayeshwara Sayeeshwara
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai residing in Parthi. O Lord Sai, You are the personification of Lord Shiva and Goddess Shakthi. You are the one endowed with the luster of Truth, Righteousness, Peace and Love. You are the son of Eshwaramba and is verily Lord Sathya Narayana. You are the incarnation of the Kali Age, O Lord of Lords. Victory to Thee, O Lord Sai, the indweller of hearts.

title: Sathya Sai Shiva Shambho Shankara
lyrics:
Neelakanta Sai Tejonmaya Roopa
Sadguru Satchidananda
Gowri Vara Hara Mruthyunjaya Shiva
Sathya Sanathana Mangala Dayaka
Sadguru Satchidananda
meaning: Oh Lord Sathya Sai, You are Lord Shiva (also called, Shambho, Shankara, Neelakanta) and the personification of radiant effulgence. You bestow auspiciousness.

title: Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam Parthi
title2: Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam Parthi Sai Smaranam
lyrics:
Tribhuvana Palaka Sai Mahesha Sathya Sai Smaranam
Sri Guru Charanam Bhava Dukha Haranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam Smaranam
Sathya Sai Smaranam
meaning: Constantly remember the name of Sathya Sai - the Lord of Parthi, the one who sustains all three worlds, chant the name of Sai Mahesha the one who removes all fears and sorrows of this materialistic world.

title: Sathya Sai Thy Name so sweet
title2: Sathya Sai Thy Name so sweet, Name so sweet
lyrics:
Keep us always at Thy feet, at Thy feet
 Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram

title: Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai
title2: Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai Rama Charan
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Tumhara Charan Hai Rama Charan Hai Krishna Charan
[ Sathya Sai ... ]
Jo Hi Roop Me Brahma Vishnu Vo Hi Roop Me Sai
Jo Hi Roop Me Rama Krishna Vo Hi Roop Me Sai
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, Your holy feet are the same as Lord Rama's and Lord Krishna's. You are the personification of Brahma, Vishnu, Rama, and Krishna.

title: Sathya Sai we pray
title2: Sathya Sai we pray we will win Your grace today
lyrics:
Sathya Sai we pray we will live in love every way 
Baba, teach us how to live together 
Baba, teach us how to love forever 
Let us open our hearts to Thee 
Help us become what You want us to be (Sathya Sai... )
Let us give you our pure devotion 
Take us over the blissful ocean 
Grant us wisdom, and give us compassion 
Love is the answer, now what was the question? (Sathya Sai... )
Fill us with Your radiant light
Guide us to know what is right
Let us see the world through Your eyes
Make a temple of our lives (Sathya Sai... )

title: Sathya Sai, hear our prayer
title2: Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, hear our prayer, Sathya Sai
lyrics:
O Lord of Parthi we call out to You
 Sweet Lord of mercy, we call out You
 O Lord of Parthi, Enchanter of our minds,
 Sweet Lord of mercy, let our souls be Thine

title: Sathya Sai, hear us calling
title2: Sathya Sai, hear us, hear us calling
lyrics:
May we receive Your Grace and always feel You
 Passionate consuming Fire burn away all our cares
 We feel Your Presence as we surrender
 Joyfully, joyfully bowing down to Thee
 Losing ourselves we touch Your fiery Heart

title: Sathya Sai, I Sing
title2: Sathya Sai, I sing, sing, Sathya Sai, I sing, sing,
lyrics:
And the beating of my heart is Your love, is Your love,
And the beating of my heart is Your love,
And the breathing in and out is Your grace, is Your grace,
And the breathing in and out is Your grace.
Sathya Sai, I sing, sing, Sathya Sai, I sing, sing,
In the silence of my mind is Your voice, is Your voice,
In the silence of my mind is Your voice,
And the yearning of my soul is Your name, is Your name,
And the yearning of my soul is Your name.

title: Sathya Sai, You are my master
title2: Sathya Sai, You are my master
lyrics:
You are my reason, You are my Love
 Will You keep me ever after, help me, help me, rise above
 Whether in Prashanthi Nilayam or in my home away from You
 Help me, help me feel Your presence in my heart, in all I do

title: Sathya Sai, You are the Heart
title2: Sathya Sai, You are the Heart of the universe,
lyrics:
You shine before our very eyes
 Lord Sai, You've come to grace our lives
 Sathya Sai, You are the Voice of the universe,
 You sing creation's song
 Lord Sai, You teach us to sing along
 Sathya Sai, You are the Eyes of the universe,
 You live within our souls
 Lord Sai, our freedom is Your goal
 Sathya Sai, You are the life of the universe, You
 teach us how to live
 Lord Sai, You teach us to forgive
 Sathya Sai, You are the Love of the universe,
 You fill the world with light
 Lord Sai, You've come to end our night
 Sathya Sai, You are the Soul of the universe,
 You've come to set us free
 Lord Sai, let us merge into Thee
 Let us merge into Thee (2X)

title: Sathya Sanathana Nithya Niranjana Bhaktha
title2: Sathya Sanathana Nithya Niranjana Bhaktha Parayana Narayana
lyrics:
Govinda Govinda Narayana (2)
Narayana Sai Narayana
Parthi Purandara Narayana [ Govinda Govinda ... ]
meaning: Glory to You, O Lord Sai of Parthi, You are verily Lord Narayana. You are the indweller of Your devotees who chant Your name at all times. You are the personification of Truth and Purity.

title: Sathya Sanathani Sai Ma
lyrics:
Shashwata Ananda Dayini Ma [ Sathya Sanathani ... ]
Abhaya Pradayini Sai Ma
Aashritha Palini Sai Ma
Sai Ma Sathya Sai Ma [ Shashwata Ananda ... ]
meaning: Mother Sai is the eternal truth. She grants perpetual bliss and freedom from fear, and protects the virtuous.

title: Sathya Sayeeshwara Parama Dayaghana
lyrics:
Sharanagatha Priya Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana [ Sathya Sayeeshwara ... ]
Alakha Niranjana Asura Nikhandana
Jagadodharana Bhaktha Parayana
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Jaga Vandana Hey Jaga Vandana
meaning: Supremely compassionate Lord Sai dispels the fear of rebirth. He loves those who surrender to Him. He is pure and destroys our bad qualities. He is the protector of the Universe and is adored by all.

title: Sathya Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Dharma Bodhaka Sai Bhagawan
Shanthi Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan [ Sathya Swaroopa ... ]
Prema Swaroopa Sai Bhagawan
Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan
Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan Hey Bhagawan Sathya Sai Bhagawan

title: Sathya Swaroopa Sai Rama
lyrics:
Sri Rama Jaya Rama Jaya Sai Rama [ Sathya Swaroopa ... ]
Parthi Pureeshwara Hey Parabrahma
Adi Narayana Param Dhama
meaning: Lord Sai of Parthi is the embodiment of truth. He is Lord Rama, Vishnu and the eternal Brahman.

title: Sathya Swaroopa Sri Sai Rama
lyrics:
Dharma Swaroopa Dayabhirama
Shantha Swaroopa Sugunabhirama
Prema Swaroopa Prashanthi Rama
Karuna Swaroopa Karunya Rama
Sathya Dharma Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Rama (2)
meaning: Lord Sai Rama is the personification of truth, righteousness, eternal peace, love and compassion. He is all-merciful.

title: Sathya Swaroopini Ma Sai Prema
title2: Sathya Swaroopini Ma Sai Prema Swaroopini Ma
lyrics:
Ananda Dayini Hrudaya Viharini Parthi Nivasini Ma (Param)
Vighna Vinashini Bhava Bhaya Harini Kaali Kapalini Ma
Hey Tribhuvana Palini Mangala Karini Moksha Pradayini Ma [ Ananda ... ]
meaning: Sing the Glory of Mother Sai - the embodiment of truth and bliss, the one who showers joy, the one who is present in everyone's heart, the one who removes all obstacles, fear and sorrow, the one who protects and sustains all the three worlds and is the embodiment of auspiciousness and the one who leads us to the path of liberation.

title: Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema
title2: Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Tell the truth, never lie, says Sathya Sai
 Do what's right, never wrong, says Dharma Sai
 Peace within and without says Shanti Sai
 Love all men as God, says Prema Sai
 Sathyam Dharmam Shanthi Prema Sathya Sai Sathya Sai
 Fill your heart with Love and You will see
 Service to the needy holds the key
 The key to the Love of the Lord
 The key to the grace of the Lord
 Service to the needy holds the key

title: Sathyam Gnanam Anantham Brahma
lyrics:
Sathyam Brahma
Gnanam Brahma
Anantham Brahma
meaning: Glory to You, O Lord Sai, who is verily the Supreme Being, the embodiment of Eternal Truth, Wisdom and who is Infinite.
songtags: golden voice, karaoke, multi-lingual, lead-music, instrumental, sheet-music, tutorial

title: Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
title2: Sathyam Shivam Sundaram Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
lyrics:
Hey Paramesha Paapa Vinasha Sathyam Shivam Sundaram
Trinethra Dhari Jaya Shiva Om Trishoola Dhari Jaya Shiva Om
Bhava Bhaya Haari Bhakthoddhari Raksha Karo Shiva Om
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the embodiment of Truth, Goodness and Beauty, the Supreme Lord who removes our sins. Victory to the three-eyed one who wields the Trident, the one who destroys the fear of birth and death and uplifts His devotees. Protect us, O Lord.

title: Say the name of Sathya Sai
title2: Say the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Chant the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
 Praise the name of Sathya Sai, Sadguru Sathya Sai
