2. Awake, Awake, O Lord of Parthi! O Lord of the entire Universe and Mankind! Awake, O Compassionate Lord! So that the world attain auspiciousness, happiness, prosperity, welfare and blessings.
 
3. In the vast Mansion, full of bliss and tranquility, (Prashanthi Nilayam) on the banks of the river Chitravathi, those anxious to serve Thee are waiting for Thy Darshan. The radiance of the Sun is illumining the World. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
4. Devotees engrossed in singing Thy Glory are happy and blissful, when they taste the nectar of devotion. Kindly shower Thy Grace by granting them Thy Darshan. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
5. Bringing holy flowers with captivating colors and fragrance, for worshipping Thy Lotus Feet, in the form as prescribed by the scriptures, Thy devotees are coming in, with great yearning and enthusiasm. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
6. Wise persons from distant countries, moved by yearning to have Thy Darshan, have come and they are having great delight in reciting constantly mantras of the Vedas. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
7. Hearing Thy marvellous tales and fame that has reached the farthest horizons, earnest seekers of Reality have come to this place and are waiting. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
8. Women devotees, whose (petals of) heart are unattached to the world like Lotus petals (which are unattached to the water in which they grow, even though they cannot survive without water) and are similar to Mother Seetha in virtues and piousness are singing Thy Glory - the Glory of Lord Shiva adorned with Serpent around His neck - through holy hymns holding excellent flower garlands in their hands. O Lord Sathya Sai! Blessed by Thy wakefulness, we pray for an auspicious day.
 
9. Whoever daily recites this morning awakening Hymn will attain the Highest Abode resplendent with the Supreme intelligence as well as Supreme wisdom.
 
10. May the divine Guru be auspicious to us; May the Bestower of wisdom be auspicious to us; May the Lord, Who manifested in Parthi be auspicious to us; May Bhagawan Sathya Sai Baba be auspicious to us.

title: Suprabhatham in English
lyrics:
It’s the start of a bright new day
Time to rise, time to shine, Lord Divine
Time to lead us along life’s way

Awake, Lord of Puttaparthi
Awake, O Lord of all mankind
Awake, O Lord of compassion
That the world good fortune may find

On Chithravathi's peaceful shore stands our hearts’ own mansion
We yearn to serve You and are longing for Your darshan
Morning’s begun and o’er the world spreads the radiant sun
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

We love to sing Your sweet name with blissful emotion
We taste the sweet nectar that comes of true devotion
Come shower drops of blessings on us, we pray Gracious One
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

We’ve brought to You colorful flowers with fragrance so sweet
Our dear Guru, our object now is to worship Your feet
Your devotees are gathered into the place where we meet
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Among the seekers of the world knowledge that You're here grew
From far and near people are coming who long to see You
They are reciting Vedic mantras knowing their value
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Throughout the Earth people of worth are learning of Your fame
They know Your glory and the sweet story of why You came
Seekers of Truth from every land now are singing Your name
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Women demure as Mother Sita now sing in rapture
Like lotus blooms drawn to the light their hearts are soft and pure
With garlands of sweet flowers they will adorn Your picture
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Whoever sings this waking chant
Sings it faithfully every day
Great peace to you the Lord will grant
And the wisdom for which we pray

Oh Auspicious Divine Teacher
Oh Auspicious All Seeing Eye
Oh Auspicious Lord of Parthi
Oh Auspicious Sri Sathya Sai
alt_lyrics:
Eshwaramba’s Resplendent Son
It’s the start of a bright new day
Time to rise, time to shine, Lord Divine
Time to lead us along life’s way

Awake, Lord of Puttaparthi
Awake, O Lord over all mankind
Awake, O Lord of compassion
That the world good fortune may find

On Chithravathi's peaceful shore stands our hearts’ own mansion
We yearn to serve You and we long for Your holy darshan
Morning’s begun and o’er the world spreads the radiant sun
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

We love to sing Your holy name with that sweet emotion
And taste the pure nectar which comes from our true devotion
Come shower drops of blessings on us, we pray Gracious One
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

We’ve brought to You colorful flowers with fragrance so sweet
Our dear Guru, our object now is to worship Your feet
Your devotees are gathered into the place where we meet
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Among the seekers of the world knowledge that You're here grew
From far and near people are coming who long to see You
They are reciting Vedic mantras knowing their value
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Throughout the Earth people of worth are now singing Your name
They know Your glory and the sweet story of why You came
Seekers of Truth from every land are now singing Your name
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Women demure as Mother Sita now sing in rapture
Like lotus blooms drawn to the light their hearts are soft and pure
With garlands of sweet flowers they will adorn Your picture
Sri Sathya Sai Bhagawan, may Your glory now dawn

Whoever sings this waking chant
Sings it faithfully every day
Great peace to you the Lord will grant
And the wisdom for which we pray

Oh Auspicious Divine Teacher
Oh Auspicious All Seeing Eye
Oh Auspicious Lord of Parthi
Oh Auspicious Sri Sathya Sai
meaning: ‘Su’ means good, auspicious and ‘Prabhath’ means morning. ‘Suprabhatam’ refers to the morning prayers that are chanted in praise of the Lord to awaken the divinity present within each individual. It is the act of dedicating oneself to the Lord and praying for His blessings right at the start of a new day.

title: Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
lyrics:
Ananda Dayaka Vinayaka
Hey Shiva Nandana Shubhanana
Sai Ganesha Vinayaka
Sai Ganesha Sai Ganesha Sai Ganesha Vinayaka (2)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Sai who is none other than Lord Vinayaka (Ganesha), son of Lord Shiva. O Lord, You are worshipped by all gods and sages and You bestow happiness to all.

title: Surely Goodness And Mercy Shall Follow Me
title2: Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life
lyrics:
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life
For I dwell in the House of The Lord now and forevermore…
 
Be certain of My Love for you
Be certain that My Love is True
Look to no man..place your life in My Hand
Look to Me only
 
Surely Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life
Surely goodness and mercy shall follow me all the days of my life
For I dwell in the House of The Lord now and forevermore…
 I will dwell in the House of The Lord now and forevermore…

title: Surrender to Sai
lyrics:
Surrender to Sai
Give Him your troubles
Surrender to Sai
 
Sharanam (5x)
Sathya Sai
 
There’s no need to fear
There’s no need to cry
It’s all an illusion
To live or to die
 
Sharanam (5x)
Sathya Sai
 
You need not control
Don’t hold on so tight
Your mind will be peaceful
As you walk to the light
 
Sharanam (5x)
Sathya Sai
 
Have faith in the Lord
He knows the design
Your heart will be lighter
And your being divine
 
Sharanam (5x)
Sathya Sai
 
Surrender to Sai
Surrender to Sai
Give Him your troubles
Surrender to Sai

title: Surrender To The Feet Of The Lord
title2: Surrender To The Feet Of The Lord Sai Baba Surrender ...
lyrics:
... To The Feet Of The Lord
Surrender To The One We Adore Sai Baba Surrender ...
... To The One We Adore
And With Devotion We Can Cross This Ocean With Baba ...
... Beside Us To Guide Us [ Surrender To The One ... ]

title: Surrender to the Lord
title2: Surrender to the Lord, to the Lord, surrender
lyrics:
Take my love in fullness of devotion to Thee, O Lord
 Take my hands, let them work incessantly for Thee, O Lord
 Take my soul and let it be merged in one with Thee, O Lord
 Surrender to the Lord, to the Lord, surrender
 Take my mind, let it be in tune with Thee, O Lord
 O take my everything, let me be your instrument
 Take my soul and let it be merged in one with Thee, O Lord

title: Susume Eichi no Hikari e,
title2: Susume Eichi no Hikari e, Shiva no Miko ni Tsuzuke
lyrics:
Utae Shinga no Hikari e Parvathi no Miko to Tomo ni
Susume Susume Ai no Hikari e
Utae Utae Kami no Mina wo
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Jai Jai, Warera ni Yadoru Kami
Jai Jai Jai Jai Ganapathi Jai Jai, Parthi Ganapathi Jai
meaning: March towards the light of wisdom following Lord Ganesha, the son of Lord Shiva. Sing towards the light of the True Self together with the song of Mother Parvathi. Victory to Lord Ganapathi who dwells in our hearts.

title: Swagatham Swagatham Sri Sathya Sai
title2: Swagatham Swagatham Sri Sathya Sai Suswagatham
lyrics:
Prashanthi Nilayam Paramatma Roopam
Parthi Pureesham Suswagatham [ Swagatham Swagatham ... ]
Sathya Swaroopam Sadguru Natham
Dharma Swaroopam Suswagatham
meaning: Welcome, O Lord Sathya Sai, Lord of Prashanthi Nilayam, You are the very embodiment of the Supreme Consciousness. Welcome, O Divine Preceptor, You are the personification of Truth and Righteousness. Glory to Thee, O Lord.

title: Swami Breathe Through Us
title2: Swami, O Swami, Breathe Through Us Your Sacred Breath
lyrics:
Sing Through Us Your Sacred Song
Love Is All
Swami, O Swami, Let Us Tell You How We Feel
You Have Filled Us With Your Riches
We Love You So

title: Swami I love You
lyrics:
Walking in the mountains, just with You
I love to walk amid the birds and trees with You
Oh, just with You
I love walking in the mountains
walking in the mountains with You

CHORUS
Swami, You know I love You so
Oh, Swami don’t You know that
I love You so, I love You so
I love You so, Swami don’t You know

I looked into the sky
I saw an eagle fly
Don’t You know that eagle, he flies so high
Across that big, blue sky
I’ve got to be like that eagle and fly high

(CHORUS)

Looking at You, looking at me
I love to look at You, now looking at me
Oh, looking at me
I don’t know what to do
When You look at me that way
I’m at 40 thousand feet and I’m flying to You
It’s going to be so good, so good to see You
So good to see You
I’m at 40 thousand feet, I’m coming to see You

(CHORUS)

title: Swami O Swami
lyrics:
Breathe through us, Thy sacred breath
Sing through us, Thy sacred song
Love is all

title: Swami Sharanam Ayyan Sharanam Ayyappa
title2: Swami Sharanam Ayyan Sharanam Ayyappa Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
lyrics:
Sabari Girisha Sadguru Natha Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Mohini Suthaney Mohana Roopa Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Parthi Pureesha Prashanti Nilaya Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
meaning: Surrender to Lord Ayyappa, the son of Mohini (a form of Lord Vishnu) and Lord Shiva. Surrender to the Lord of mountain Sabari, to the true teacher, to Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparti who dwells in Prashanti Nilayam, the one who is verily Lord Ayyappa.

title: Swami Take My Hand
title2: Swami Take My Hand, Jesus Take My Hand,
lyrics:
Dear Lord Take My Hand, Take My Hand And Lead The Way
I'll Never Forget You, You'll Always Be With Me,   [ Dear Lord  ... ]
You Are Guide And Protector, Mother And Father,  [ Dear Lord  ... ]
Teach Me Loving Service, Peace And Contentment
[ Dear Lord ... ]

title: Swami we adore You
lyrics:
Lay our lives before You
 How we love You

title: Swami You Live in My Heart
title2: Swami You live within my heart (3x)
lyrics:
We’ll be one forever
Always together
Now and forever

title: Swami, oh Swami, come to me
title2: Swami, oh Swami, come to me, oh my Swami (2x)
lyrics:
Just to see Your face, to look at Your hair
To kiss Your feet, oh I wish I were there [ Swami, oh Swami ... ]

I’m sitting here, thousands of miles away
My heart is crying to be with You today [ Swami, oh Swami ... ]

I’m looking at the clock, it’s half past three
You’re giving Darshan now, I wish You were walking by me [ Swami, oh Swami ... ]

Just to see Your face, to look at Your hair
To kiss Your feet, oh I wish I were there

title: Swamimalai Natha
lyrics:
Swamimalai Natha (3) Swaminatha
Swaminatha
Swamimalai Natha Swaminatha
Sai Natha Sathya (3) Sai Natha
Sai Natha Sathya (3) Sai Natha
Sai Natha 
Sai Natha Sathya Sai Natha
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord of Swami Malai - Lord Muruga, worshipped as Swaminatha. Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai who is verily Lord Muruga.

title: Swaminatha Sai Karuna Sindhu Paahi
lyrics:
Pazhani Giri Vasa Parvathi Nandana 
Pranavakaara Shiva Subrahmanya 
Skanda Kumara Valli Nayaka 
Deena Janavana Parthi Nayaka 

Vel Vel Muruga Vetrivel Muruga 
Vel Vel Muruga Vadivel Muruga 
Vel Vel Muruga Vetrivel Muruga
meaning: Praise be to Lord Subrahmanya, the ocean of compassion. Residing on the hill of Pazhani, He is the son of Mother Parvati and Lord Shiva. He is the embodiment of the primordial sound of Om. He is the beloved of Valli. He is verily Lord Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi who uplifts the downtrodden. Victory to Lord Muruga, one who wields the Vel (spear).

title: Swamiye Charanam Sharanam Ponnaiappa
lyrics:
Swami Illadoru Sharanam Illaiappa
Mohini Sudane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Mohana Roopa Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Sadguru Nadane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Sabari Girishane Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Akhilandeshwara Sharanam Ponnaiappa
Ananda Roopa Sharanam Ponnaiappa
meaning: Our only refuge are the holy feet of blissful Lord Ayyappa, the true Guru, resident of Sabari mountain, the Lord of the Universe and the beautiful son of Mohini.

title: Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
lyrics:
Sayeesha Sharanam Sharanam Sayeesha (2) [ Swamiyey Sharanam ... ]
Sabari Giri Vasa Dharma Shastha
Parthi Puri Vasa Dharma Rakshaka
Mohini Bala Pampa Vasa
Eshwari Bala Chithravathi Vasa
Bhaktha Samrakshaka Kali Avatara (2)
Swamiyey Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (3)
Sharanam Sharanam Ayyappa (2)
meaning: I surrender myself to thee O Lord Ayyappa, son of Mohini, who has incarnated to establish righteousness on Earth residing on the hills of Sabari near the river Pampa. I surrender myself to Lord Sai, son of Mother Eshwaramba residing on the banks of river Chitravathi, the incarnated in this Kali age to protect His devotees.

title: Sweep Me Away
title2: You sweep me away with Your love for me (2x)
lyrics:
You sweep me away (2x)
You sweep me away with Your love

title: Sweet Ganesha
title2: Sweet Ganesha, sweet Ganesha, dancing in my heart
lyrics:
Sweet Ganesha, sweet Ganesha, dancing in the light of love
 
Your compassion guides me through the night
Ganesha, You guide me through the troubles of life
 
Sweet Lord Krishna, Sweet Lord Krishna, dancing in my heart
Sweet Lord Krishna, Sweet Lord Krishna, dancing in the light of love
 
Divine Flute echoes in my heart
Krishna, sweet Krishna, come to me
 
Sweet Sathya Sai, Sweet Sathya Sai, singing in my heart
Sweet Sathya Sai, Sweet Sathya Sai, singing in the light of love
 
Your love is all I need
Sathya Sai, You embrace my truth
 
Sweet Ganesha, sweet Ganesha, dancing in my heart

title: Sweet Lord of all
title2: Sweet Lord of all, You have come to take us Home
lyrics:
Joining all our hearts together in the sound of Om
 Let us look into each other's eyes and see we're one
 Let us always serve each other knowing where we're from
 Sai Baba, You've come to take us Home
 We call You Yahweh, Allah, Abba and Lord
 Adi - Buddha, Maheshwara - you're the One adored
 Sai Baba, Help us Find the Way
 May we find the Light of God
 May we shine the Light You are
 For this we humbly pray
 O Sai Ram Ram Ram Aanandha Prabhu Sai
 O Sai Ram Rama Ram Aanandha Prabhu Sai
 Sai Baba, You've come to take us Home

title: Sweeter Than Music
title2: Sweeter than music is the Love He has,
lyrics:
Brighter than sunshine is the One who really cares,
Softer than starlight is the gentleness He shares,
Glows like the moon, but there's no gloominess here   
and He knows because He's always.... sweeter than music
He knows because He's always....brighter than sunshine
He knows because He's always...softer than starlight

(Bridge)
Well He knows 'cuz He's the only one, who can change your life and make you feel this way, He knows cuz He's the only one, that can make your life seem brand new every day

My Lord knows the secrets, of life eternal and true, He's willing to share them, with everybody, with me and with you

(Chorus)
So come on get to know Him.....sweeter than music
Well come on and get to see Him...brighter than sunshine
Come on and get to touch Him....softer than starlight

Now come on 'cuz He's the only one, who can change your life and make you feel this way, He knows cuz He's the only one, that can make your life seem brand new every day

title: Swing the cradle
title2: Swing the cradle of the child of Brij
lyrics:
The beloved Son of Nanda is swinging in the cradle
 The cradle of gold has a string of silk
 Sing the Arathi to Nandalala
 Who swings happily in His cradle

title: Ta Parole est lumiere, Halleluja!
lyrics:
Ta Parole est sagesse, Halleluja!
 Ta Parole est tendresse, Halleluja!
 Ta parole est vivante, Halleluja!
 Chantez au Seigneur un chant nouveau!
 Benissez son nom et rendez Grace!
 Au son de la trompette et du cor,
 Eclatez en cris de joie!
 Refrain
 Tu etends la main et tu me sauves.
 Seigneur, eternel est Ton Amour!
 Ne cesse pas l`oeuvre de tes mains
 Ta parole est Verite !
 Refrain
 Tu as fait connaitre Ton salut !
 Tu as fait connaitre Tes Merveilles!
 Chantez au Seigneur un chant nouveau.
 Maintenant et a jamais!
meaning:
Your word is light!
 Your word is wisdom!
 Your word is tenderness!
 Sing to the Lord a new song
 Bless His name and give Thanks
 To the sound of the trumpet and the horn!
 Raise shouts of joy!
 You stretch out Your hand and You save me !
 Lord, Eternal is Your Love!
 Do not cease the work of Your hands
 Your word is Truth!
 You made known Your salvation!
 You made known Your wonders!
 Sing [for] the Lord a new song!
 Now until forever.

title: Tada Anata wo Omou Kokoro
title2: Tada Anata wo Omou Kokoro Desu
lyrics:
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai Road [ Tada Anata ... ]
Itsu no Tokika Wasureteta Honto no Ai wo Shiru tame ni
Itsu no Manika Nakushiteta Honto no Watashi wo Shiru tame ni
meaning: My heart only thinks of You. Sai, You are our path (road). At all times You remind us to know of true love and our true selves.

title: Tada hitasura Kami no ai
title2: Tada hitasura Kami no ai wo omoi ikiru
lyrics:
Ah Anata ga subete Oh Kami no ai ni ikiru
Ah Anata wa Watashi no subete Oh Kami no ai ni ikiru
meaning: Always think about the God of Love with all your heart. Oh God of Love Sai, You are everything in this world, and You are everything to me.

title: Take a lesson from the sun
title2: Take a lesson from the sun that shines its light on everyone,
lyrics:
Or the rain that falls on every single shore.
No distinction of our race or the colour of our face,
Nature's gifts are there for all men rich or poor.

CHORUS:
Love all, serve all,
Understand that love and peace is what we need,
Love all, serve all,
In every single thought, word and deed.

Bear all and do nothing, hear all and say nothing,
Give all and take nothing in return.
Love is giving and forgiving, self is getting and forgetting,
Serve all in the spirit of pure love.

(chorus)

title: Take me away, won’t You carry me
title2: Take me away, won’t You carry me
lyrics:
Let me rest in Your arms for a while
Take me away, won't You carry me
Let me bathe in the sweetness of Your smile

O Baba (O Swami), take me away
Sai Baba (O Swami) take me away

title: Take me home
title2: Take me home, my dear mother Sai
lyrics:
Take me home, my dear mother Sai
Take me home into Your majesty
Take me home into Your glory
Take me home into Your mightiness
Take me home into eternity

title: Take my Hand O Sai
title2: Take my Hand O Sai Sathya Sai
lyrics:
Take my Hand and walk me through this land
 Take my hand O Sai Sathya Sai (second variation)
 Take my Hand and walk me through this land
 Take my heart O Sai Sathya sai
 Take my heart and fill it with your love
 Your Love will be the Love Divine
 Walk with me dear Sai your Hand in Mine

title: Take one step towards Me
title2: Take one step towards Me, one step towards Me,
lyrics:
I'll take a hundred towards you
 Lord of Creation, Lord of Truth
 Lord of Love
 Shed only one tear, only one tear, I'll wipe a hundred away
 Lord of Compassion, Lord of Peace
 Lord of Love

title: Take our hands and guide us
title2: Take our hands and guide us, Lord
lyrics:
Take our hands we pray
 Take our hands and guide us, Lord
 And help us find the way
 Through the darkest night
 Through the hardest day
 Take our hands and guide us, Lord
 And we will find the way

title: Take us to the Kalpataru
title2: Take us to the Kalpataru, grant our wishes, fill our needs
lyrics:
Let us climb into its branches, rest in the Tree of Life
 Baba planted the Kalpataru, Baba gave us life to live
 We're all part of the Kalpataru, limbs on the Tree of Life

title: Talk with Him, glory Divine
lyrics:
Walk with Him, Love of mine
 Move with Him in the spirit of holiness
 Work, there's work to be done
 Meditate on Him glory Divine
 Concentrate on Him, Love of mine
 Do your part with hands and heart
 Work, There's work to be done

title: Tandava Priyakara Sai Parameshwara
lyrics:
Nachey Sai Shankara Nataraja
Dama Dama Dama Dama Damaru Baajey
Ghana Ghana Baajey Payaliya
Nachey Gangadhara Nachey Bimbadhara [ Nachey Sai ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Sai, the Lord of Lords who is verily Lord Shiva adorned with the sacred Ganges on His hair and who wears the crescent moon. He delights in His cosmic dance to the beat of the drums while the sound of His anklets reverberates in tune.

title: Tandava Priyakara Uma Pathey
title2: Tandava Priyakara Uma Pathey Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru Bajey
lyrics:
Hara Bham Hara Bham Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Shiva Tandava [ Dum Dum ... ]
Chidambaresha Sai Nataraja
Vibhuti Sundara Shiva Shankara [ Dum Dum ... ]
alt_lyrics:
Tandava Priyakara Sabha Pathey Dum Dum Dum Dum Damaru Bajey
Hara Bham Hara Bham Bhola Maheshwara
Dama Dama Damaru Shiva Tandava [ Dum Dum ... ]
Chidambaresha Sai Nataraja
Vibhuti Sundara Tryambakesha [ Dum Dum ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of the Lords who is fond of the Tandava (Cosmic dance), who is the master of the stage that is the Universe and the one who is the consort of Mother Uma (Parvathi). May divine rhythms emanate from the Damaru while the Lord of dance dances the Tandava. Lord Sathya Sai is verily Lord Nataraja, the Lord of Chidambaram. He is the most beautiful Lord adorned with Vibhuti (Holy Ash) who bestows auspiciousness.

title: Taraka Naamam Bhajarey
title2: Taraka Naamam Bhajarey Manasa Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
lyrics:
Dharma Uddharaka Taraka Naamam
Sarva Manohara Sai Naamam
Sayeeshwara Paramatma Naamam
Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram Sai Ram
meaning: O Mind, chant the Holy Name of Lord Sai Rama that liberates one from the cycle of birth and death, the Name that uplifts and fosters righteousness and the Name of the Supreme Lord Sai that is beautiful in all aspects.

title: Tat Pranamami Shiva Lingam
lyrics:
Namami Sai Shiva Lingam 
Smarami Sai Shiva Lingam
Haalahala Dhara Shiva Lingam
Vibhuti Sundara Shiva Lingam
Namami Sai Shiva Lingam
Smarami Sai Shiva Lingam
meaning: We offer prostrations to the Shiva Lingam (a sacred elliptical stone - a form of Lord Shiva). We lovingly worship the Shiva Lingam. We contemplate and meditate on the Shiva Lingam. Lord Shiva saved the world by Himself absorbing the poison. Glory to the beautiful Shiva Lingam that is adorned with Vibhuti.

title: Tataeyo Tataeyo Sai Baba wo
lyrics:
Ai ni Michita Kami wo (Sai)
 Jiai no Umi no Kami wo (Sai)
 Chikara Naki Mono Mamoru Kami
 Kurushii Toki ni Yorisou Kami
 Ai no Keshin yo Sai Baba
 Seinaru Ai no Kami Sai Baba
meaning: Praise our beloved Sai, the incarnation of love, who is filled with an ocean of love. You protect us with Your divine power, and You shelter us in times of suffering.

title: Tateyou Gananatha Warera no Uchi
title2: Tateyou Gananatha Warera no Uchi ni Hikaru Kami
lyrics:
Iainaru Kami Shiva no Itoshigo
Eichi o Sazukeru Vinayaka
Parvathi no Miko ni Eikou Are
Warera ni Michi o Shimesu Ganesha yo
meaning: Praise the Lord Gananatha, the God that shines within us. Glory to the beloved son of Parvathi and Shiva. Let Your wisdom show us the way.

title: Te Damos Gracias Senor
title2: Te Damos Gracias Senor, Por Tu Gran Presencia Humana
lyrics:
Te Alabamos Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Apartanos Senor, De Toda Vida Mundana
 Danos Tu Darshan Senor, Sathya Sai Narayana
meaning:
We thank You, O Lord, for Your great human presence; We worship You, O Lord, Sathya Sai Narayana
 Keep us away, O Lord, from all the mundane in this world, and grant us Your darshan (vision).

title: Teach Me the Way
title2: Teach me the way to live Lord Buddha
lyrics:
Help me to reach nirvana, Buddha
Show me the way to serenity
Let me live in bliss, and harmony
 
Let me see the end to pain and suffering
Let me rise above the sorrows of the world
Lead me to equanimity
Where I’ll stay forevermore
 
Grant me compassion Lord Buddha
So I may know the truth oh Buddha
Release me from the wheel of life
Lead me to eternal freedom (3x)

title: Teacher Of Teachers
title2: Teacher of teachers, Guru of gurus,
lyrics:
Lord of all lords, Guru of gurus,
All of the power flows from Your fingers,
Light of the sunrise flows from Your fingers,
Light of Your love, as vast as the ocean,
Guru of gurus, source of devotion,
Teacher of teachers, Guru of gurus,
Lord of all lords.

title: Teertha Vittala Kshetra Vittala
lyrics:
Deva Vittala Pooja Vittala [ Teertha Vittala ... ]
Sai Vittala Baba Vittala
Bandhu Vittala Guravey Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sri Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Pandari Natha Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Hari Vittala
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord Panduranga Vittala, the Lord who resides in all holy places. He is the Supreme Lord, preceptor, kith and kin. He is none other than Lord Sai of Parthi.

title: Tell us a story
title2: Tell us a story so we understand
lyrics:
Jesus, teacher and friend
 Show us heaven that children know
 Let our love for the Father grow
 Ever gentle and humble
 Jesus, my teacher and friend

title: Temple bells are ringing
title2: Temple bells are ringing now in Parthi
lyrics:
Calling us to come and see our Lord
Let's rejoice and sing His divine glory
Blessed are we to have His love and grace (2x)
Krishna, Buddha, Jesus, Allah, Sai
All are but the soul that shines within
Let's rejoice and sing His divine glory
Blessed are we to have His love and grace (2x)

title: Ten Pazhani Nadanukku Hara Haro
title2: Then Pazhani Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara
lyrics:
Eru Mayil Velanukku Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Shanmuga Hara Haro Hara
Swamimalai Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara
Thiruchendur Velanukku Hara Haro Hara
Parthipuri Nadanukku Hara Haro Hara 
Shakthi Vadivelanukku Hara Haro Hara 
Hara Haro Hara Muruga Hara Haro Hara
Hara Haro Hara Shanmuga Hara Haro Hara
meaning: Glory be to the Lord of Pazhani (Lord Subrahmanya), the one who rides on the peacock, the Lord of holy places Swamimalai and Thiruchendur, and to Lord Sai of Parthi who is none other than Lord Subrahmanya.

title: Tens a Pele Azul
title2: Tens a pele azul, olhos de lótus, dança de serpente
lyrics:
Shiva, Senhor do Universo, destrói o mal em minha mente
Tu que reges a vida e tens o poder da tranformoção
Shiva, transforma o meu karma, conserva o meu dharma em meu coração
meaning: O Lord Shiva, You have blue skin, lotus eyes and a  snake dances around Your neck. You are the Lord of the Universe, destroy the evil in my mind. You rule over all life and You have the power of transformation. O Lord Shiva, transform my karma (past actions), and keep my dharma (righteousness) in my heart.

title: Terey Darshana Ko Mera Mana
title2: Terey Darshana Ko Mera Mana Tarasey
lyrics:
Gopala Darshana Do Nandalala
Neeraja Lochana Hey Guna Dhama
Peetambara Dhara Hey Ghana Shyama
Darshana Do Darshana Do Nandalala [ Gopala Darshana ... ]
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the virtuous one with lotus eyes, the one wearing the yellow clothes, please give Your divnie Vision. My heart is pining for You.

title: Terey Janam Din Me Sai
title2: Terey Janam Din Me Sai Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge
lyrics:
Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge Tujhe Koti Pranam Karenge [ Terey Janam ... ]
Teri Janma Bhumi Me Sai Aye Bichchade Behan Aur Bhai
Teri Pooja Karne Baba Teri Prashanthi Me Ayenge [ Terey Janam ... ]
Dhanya Ho Eshwaramba Merey Sai Ko Tumne Janma
Teyis November Ko Baba Sai Bhajan Aur Gaan Karenge
Happy Birthday To You Sai Rama Happy Birthday To You Sai Baba
meaning: O Lord Sai, we bow to You a million times on Your Birthday. We, brothers and sisters, will congregate in Prashanthi, Your birth place, to worship You. Blessed Mother Eshwaramba gave birth to my Sai on November 23rd, so that I may sing His praises.

title: Terey Siwa Prabhu Koi Nahin
title2: Terey Siwa Prabhu Koi Nahin Hai Tujko Mera Pranam
lyrics:
Tujko Mera Pranam O Sai Baba Tujko Mera Pranam
Murali Manohara Asha Na Todo
Dukh Bhanjana Mera Saath Na Chodo
Dwar Khada Hoon Mein Dukhiyara
Sun Ley Meri Pukar O Sai Baba Sun Ley Meri Pukar
meaning: O Lord Sai, I have none other than You, please accept my salutations. O beautiful Lord Krishna, do not disappoint me. O the destroyer of sorrows, do not leave me. I am standing at Your door with sorrowful mind. Please listen to my cries, O Lord Sai Baba.

title: Thaandava Keli Salpene
lyrics:
Parameshwarudu sri samba sivudu [ Thaandava keLi ... ]

Thandava keLi salpe kundaleendra kankanudu
Saalugadakki chepati jhana jhana jhana jhana taku yanuchu [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Sashikala mastakamuna bhasitamuga vibuthi poosi
Vishamu galamunandu misa misa misa misa misa merya [ Thaandava keLi ... ]

Sikhamulo munneti kanya mukhamulo moodova kannu
Sogasuga spatikaaksha maalalu niga niga niga niga niga meraya [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Saraswati veena meetaga purandharudu venuvooda 
Hari mrudangamu vaayinchaga Dhimi dhimi dhimi dhimthaka yanuchu [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Ramadevi geethamu padaga kamalaajudu thaalamu veyaga
Umadevi koluvuna harudu pari pari pari pari vidamuluga [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Devaadi devendra munulu devatha gandharva sthrilu
Bhavamuna velayimbuchunu bali bali bali bali thaka yanuchu [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Naradudu tambura meetaga jatajootamulu siramuna merayaga
Trishulambutho tripputhu harudu thathim thathim thathim thathimthaka yanuchu (2) [ Thaandava keLi ... ]
 
Gowridevi jagamula yelaga gangadevi nadulai paaraga

title: Thank you
title2: Thank you Baba for loving me
lyrics:
Thank you Baba for protecting me
Thank you Baba for guiding me
Thank you Baba for loving me
 
When I’m depressed You will come and comfort me

Baba, Oh Baba I will learn from Thee
 
I know one day Baba You will set me free

I know one day Baba You will set me free

title: Thank You Sai Thank You Sai
title2: Thank you Sai, thank you Sai, for being so good to us
lyrics:
Thank you Sai, thank you Sai, You bless us with Your love
 
When we are thirsty You fill our cup
When we are lonely You give us love
When we are drowning You part the sea
When we get angry You give us peace [ Thank you Sai ... ]

You're counseling the masses filling them with bliss
You're all we'll ever need till the horizon skies
Swami give us the future You want with Your eyes [ Thank you Sai ... ]

title: The Color Of Love
title2: Every morning when the sun comes out to play,
lyrics:
It wears the same bright orange dress.
Our Swami wears today.
It's the color of Sathya Sai, the color of Love.
He is Love, He Is Love,
He is everything, everywhere
We are Love, 
and that is what creation is made up of
Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai, Sathya Sai Babaji (2x)
Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai, Prema Sai Babaji
Sathya Sai, You and I, Sathya Sai Babaji

In its same bright orange dress
I feel the touch of Sathya Sai,
His love, His tenderness
As He enters the temple of my loving heart 

[ He is Love ... You and I, Sathya Sai Babaji ]

title: The devotee should always remember the Master
title2: The devotee should always remember the Master by name

title: The Face Of Love
title2: I see the face of love, in His loving eyes,
lyrics:
My heart opens up and my face floods with tears.
With love, peace, freedom and joy, filling up my life,
I thank the Lord above that God shows me His love.

I see the face of peace, as He walks across the sand.
He waves His hand and the air is charged with grace.
With love, peace, freedom and joy, filling up my life,
I thank the Lord above that God shows me His love.
And I see the face of love, residing in my heart,

(Repeat)
I won't block the way for God's love to show through.
And you'll see the face of love, shining bright in everyone
When you love the world the way God loves you.
When you serve the world the way Sai serves you.

(Close)
When you serve the world the way Sai serves you.

title: The Grace Of The Lord
lyrics:
Felt a love so strong, a truth so real,
I awoke to be reborn, my purpose revealed,
Time stood still, the day I turned toward,
The sweet love of God and, beheld the Grace of the Lord.
 
The Grace of the Lord, (Grace of the Lord)
The Grace of the Lord, (Grace of the Lord)
I cry when I feel the Grace of the Lord,
The Grace of the Lord, (Grace of the Lord)
The Grace of the Lord, (Grace of the Lord)
I'm a child in the Grace, the Grace of the Lord.
 
And the lighting cracked, the thunder rolled,
Angels wept tears of joy, the day Jesus rose,
And perfect peace, that sacred reward,
Filled my soul with the Grace, the Grace of the Lord.
(chorus)
Blessed from birth, are those who see,
The Light of God, shining in all Divinity,
I was healed, my vision restored,
Now I live for the Grace, The Grace of the Lord.
(chorus)

title: The Heart's Melody
lyrics:
On the strings of my heart, Lord,
Play Your melody of love,
May I dance to Your music, oh Lord?
With each step I'Il bow to Your grace,
Ever circling in radiant light,
Divinity holds me in God's sweet embrace.
As in gentle silence, You smile,
You show me the bliss of divine Mother Sai, Father Sai.

title: The Honey Bee
title2: Oh, Lord, let me fly to Thee,
lyrics:
I’m drawn to Your sweetness,
Like a honey bee.
Lord, how can I stay away?
You draw me back,
With each new day.
Your light, Your Love and Your grace,
I see them all reflected in Your face.
Now nevermore will I depart,
For I’ve found You, In my heart.
And always we shall be as one,
You in me and I in Thee,
The flower and the honey bee.

title: The Power Of The Love Of God
title2: The Power of the Love of God
lyrics:
When you’re down and you’re feelin’ lonely
And nothin’s goin’ right

Seein’ any Light

‘Cuz the nights are way too long
 
Wake up to the Power that you have in ya’ right there inside
It’ll give you everything you need if you just step aside
Open up your mind and your heart my friends and you will see
That the Power of the Love of God will set you free
 
And you’re feeling all torn apart ‘cuz you just lost someone you love
And the tears keep a’comin’ til you think they will never stop
And you can’t remember ever feelin’ so much alone
You sit you worry and you wonder just how you’re gonna make it on your own
 
Wake up to the Power that you have in ya’ right there inside
It’ll give you everything you need if you just step aside
Open up your mind and your heart my friends and you will see
That the Power of the Love of God will set you free
 
And you feel a lot of fear that things just might not go your way
And you wonder if the people out there really think you’re okay
And you’re nippin’ and a’sippin’ on something that’s gonna ease your pain
It works for awhile but it soon wears off ... You get to have those same old feelings anyway
 
Wake up to the Power that you have in ya’ right there inside
It’ll give you everything you need if you just step aside
Open up your mind and your heart my friends and you will see
That the Power of the Love of God will set you free
 
So if you wonder what this life is really all about
And your head is a whirlin’ and a twirlin’ and you just can’t work it out
What you need to do is relax, my friend, and just let go
Put your life in The Hands of Your Father ‘cuz
He loves you more than you will ever know …
 
Wake up to the Power that you have in ya’ right there inside
It’ll give you everything you need if you just step aside
Open up your mind and your heart my friends and you will see
That the Power of the Love of God will set you free
