lyrics:
Mao mao mao te ua whiti mai te ra (2)

E rere te kotare ki runga puwharawhara
Ruru parirau kei mate i te ua (2)
[ Tihore mai te rangi . . . ]

E rere e noke mai i te pokorua
Kai ki i te wai kai mate i te ua (2)
[ Tihore mai te rangi ... whiti mai te ra ]

e . . . i . . . e . . . whiti mai te ra (2)
meaning: Clear up Sky clear up; stop stop stop Rain come out Sun; Fly Kingfisher up onto the clump of astelia. Ruffle the rain-drops from your wings in case you catch a chill. Escape Earthworm out of your burrow in case it fills with water and you drown. Let the Sun shine.

title: Time waste is life waste
title2: Time waste is life waste for me and for you
lyrics:
This lesson from Sai we all know is true
 So use your time wisely and watch yourself grow
 closer to God as each day does go
 Time waste is life waste for me and for you
 This lesson from Sai we all know is true

title: Tirumala Vasa Tirupati Esha
lyrics:
Devadi Deva Govinda
Pushkarini Thata Vasa Srinivasa
Punya Murthy Sathya Sai Govinda
Govinda Govinda Tirupati Vasa (Parthi Nivasa) Govinda
meaning: Salutations to you Oh Lord Govinda, Lord of Virtues, who has Tirumala Hills at Tirupati as your abode on the banks of sacred Pushkarini.

title: Tirumalai Vaasam Parthipuri Natham
title2: Tirumalai Vaasam Parthipuri Natham Ananda Roopam Bhajey Prema Swaroopam Bhajey
lyrics:
Saptagiri Vaasam Shankha Chakra Dharam
Gada Padma Charanam Shubham
Parthipuri Natham Bhajey
Narayana Sai Harey

Govinda Govinda Venkata Ramana Govinda
Govinda Govinda Narayana Hari Govinda (2)
Govinda Govinda Parthi Pureesha Govinda
meaning: Chant the name of the Lord of seven hills, Narayana, who is bliss incarnate. He holds the conch (symbolic of the sound Om which signifies creation), Sudarshana Chakra (wheel of time bringing about transformation), and mace (signifies mental and physical strength). He is called by several names, including Venkata (destroyer of sins) and Sai Narayana.

title: Tirumalesha Prabhu Govinda
lyrics:
Venkata Ramana Govinda [ (Hey) Tirumalesha Prabhu ... ]
Sankata Harana Parthi Vihara
Govinda Sai Govinda (Hey)

Govinda Hari (Sai) Govinda (2)
meaning: O Lord Govinda, You are the beloved Lord of the mountains of Tirumala. O beloved Lord Venkata, You remove all our distress. You are verily Lord Sathya Sai residing in Puttaparthi.

title: Tirumalesha Ramana Govinda
lyrics:
Parthi Puri Ramana Sayeesha [ Tirumalesha Ramana ... ]
Gangadhara Hara Pannaga Bhooshana
Sri Nilaya Hari Kaustubha Dhari
Hari Hara Roopa Sri Venkatesha
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Parthi. O Sai, You are verily Lord Govinda, the beloved Lord of Tirumala and Lord Shankara (Shiva) holding river Ganges on the head and adorning serpent as an ornament. You are the one who wears the Kaustubha jewel and You are Lord Venkatesha who is the embodiment of Hari (Vishnu) and Hara (Shiva).

title: Tirupati Malaimel Iruppavane
lyrics:
Tirada Vinayellam Tirppavane
Srinivasa Govinda Sri Venkatesha Govinda
Ulamam Kovilil Iruppavane Ulagorai Vazhvikka Vandavane
Sankatam Tavirthidum Govinda Venkata Ramana Govinda
Ezhu Malaimel Iruppavane Ella Vinaigalaiyum Tirppavane
Shirdi Sai Govinda Sri Sathya Sai Govinda
meaning: Glory to Lord Govinda who resides on Mount Tirupati and who is the remover of all sins. He dwells in the temple of the heart and incarnates to save the world. Residing on the seven hills, He removes all the afflictions of the devotees. He is none other than Lord Shirdi Sai and Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Tis a gift to be simple
title2: Tis a gift to be simple, 'tis a gift to be free
lyrics:
'Tis a gift to know one's own divinity
 And when our hearts are filled by the bright shining sun
 We will see God's light within everyone
 When true simplicity is gained
 To bow and to bend we won't be ashamed
 By serving each other, we serve the Lord
 And are tied to the Truth with a golden cord.

title: To care, to share
lyrics:
Forgiving and giving.
Is how we should be,
To make life worth living.

title: To The One
lyrics:
Baba my Lord, when I feel there's one to love me
I see Your eyes full of compassion and love looking at me
When I feel all alone and there’s no one to help me
I find Your hands everywhere ready to hold and uplift me
When I feel lonely and dejected my Lord, Your eyes show You're the one who cares for me
Just a cry from my heart, a prayer upon my soul, dearest Lord never ever leave me

title: Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy
title2: Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
lyrics:
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me Lo Diste a Mi
Todo Mi Amor Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me Lo Diste a Mi
Todo Mi Trabajo Te Lo Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me La Diste a Mi
Toda Mi Mente Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti Baba
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti (iiiiiii)
Te Lo Doy a Ti Como Tu Me La Diste a Mi
Toda Mi Vida Te La Doy a Ti Baba
meaning: I Give All My Love To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My efforts To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My Thoughts To You Baba. I Give All My Life To You Baba; I Give To You What You have Given To Me. I Give All My Life To You Baba. I dedicate myself and all that I do to You. I give my life, my work, and my mind to You. I am love because You loved me first. So I give everything to You for You have given everything to me.

title: Toki wo Watari Michibiku Sai
title2: Toki wo Watari Michibiku Sai Rama Sai Krishna Sai Baba
lyrics:
Baba Sai Baba, Baba Sai Baba [ Toki wo ... ]
Sai no Ai wa Warera no Chikara
Sai no Ai Shirube ni Susumou
Jai Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram Yuuki wo Motte
Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram Kami to Tomo ni
meaning: Lord Sai Baba who is verily Lord Rama and Krishna, You cross through time itself to guide us. Sai's love gives us power, so let us proceed towards Him. Victory to Thee, Lord Sai Ram, You give us courage so that we may undertake the journey to be with You.

title: Towa ni Hibiku no wa
title2: Towa ni Hibiku no wa Kami wo Tataeru Uta
lyrics:
Subete wa Kami no Ai no Yorokobi no Mama ni
O Harey Ram Harey Ram Sai Ram
Harey Ram Harey Ram Sai Ram
Anata to Hitotsu ni Aru, Baba Watashi wa Towa no Ai
meaning: O Lord, our song of praise upon You resounds eternally. Everything is made of Your love and joy. O Lord Sai Ram, I exist as one with You. Baba, I am Your eternal love.

title: Treta Yug Mey Ram Dwapara
title2: Treta Yug Mey Ram Dwapara Yug Mey Shyam
lyrics:
Kaliyug Ke Sai Ram Parthipuri Sai Shyam
Sri Ram Ghana Shyam Sai Ram Sai Shyam [ Treta Yug ... ]
Ayodhya Vasi Ram Mathura Vasi Shyam
Prashanthi Vasi Ram Parthipuri Sai Shyam [ Sri Ram ... ]
meaning: Sai is the incarnation of this Kali age residing in Parthi. In the Treta age He was Rama, resident of Ayodhya and in the Dwapara age, He incarnated as Krishna in Mathura.

title: Tribhuvana Pala Shirdi Pureesha
lyrics:
Araj Suno Merey Baba
Deena Janon Ke Tum Rakhwaley
Shyama Manohara Muraliwale
In Aankhon Ke Pyaas Bujhadey
Darshana Do Parthi Baba [ Araj Suno ... ]
meaning: Oh Lord of Shirdi, who sustains the three worlds, guardian of the helpless, You are verily Lord Krishna with the enchanting form with the flute in His hand. Oh Lord, pay heed to our prayers and satiate our hunger for Your vision, Oh Lord of Parthi.

title: Trilochana Hey Tripurari
lyrics:
Ganga Jatadhara Gowri Shankara [ Trilochana ... ]
Paahi Murari Jaya Partheesha
Nandi Vahana Nagabharana
meaning: O Lord Sai, Lord of Parthi, protect us, You are none other than Lord Shankara who is the Consort of Mother Gowri and the Lord of the three worlds. You are the three-eyed Lord Shankara who adorns the snake as an ornament and who rides on a Bull (Nandi).

title: Triloka Palaka Trishoola Dharaka
lyrics:
Trilochana Harey Bala Shiva
Shibey Jata Joota Kantey Kalakoota
Chidambaresha Natana Shiva
meaning: Lord Shiva sustains the three worlds, three eyed and holds Trident, as the weapon, is young, having matted hair, is the presiding Lord of dance at the temple town Chidambaram.

title: Triloka Palini Jagadeeshwari
lyrics:
Sadananda Roopini Sayeeshwari [ Triloka Palini ... ]
Karunya Lavanya Kadambari
Partheeshwari Amba Shiva Shankari
meaning: Oh Mother Sayeeshwari, the protector of the three worlds, one who is always blissful, compassionate and beautiful, the Mother of Parthi, the consort of Shiva, our salutations to Thee.

title: Trilokeshwara Mahadeva
lyrics:
Nagabharana Shiva Hara Om Hara Hara [ Trilokeshwara ... ]
Parvathi Ramana Ati Bhayankara
Tripureshwara Sai Deva Maheshwara 
Dhrimiki Dhrimiki Thata Thai Thai Hara Hara [ Nagabharana Shiva ... ]
meaning: I pray to Lord Shiva, who is the Lord of the three worlds. He is adorned with snakes and is the consort of Goddess Parvathi. He is the Lord of the Lords who as incarnated as Lord Sai. He dances to the rhythm of the drum. Glory to Lord Shiva.

title: Tripura Sundari Ma Amba Daya
title2: Tripura Sundari Ma Amba Daya Sagari Ma
lyrics:
Sundara Vadani Ma Amba Suguna Manohari Ma
Jaya Jagat Janani Ma Amba Jagadodharini Ma
Parthi Nivasini Ma Amba Paapa Vimochani Ma
meaning: O Mother of Parthi, You are the most beautiful in all the three worlds, You are the ocean of compassion, full of virtues, You are the Mother who liberates the world and frees us from our sins.

title: Tripurari Shiva Shankara
lyrics:
Naga Bhooshana Naga Bharana [ Tripurari Shiva ... ]
Omkareshwara Namah Shivaya
Mahakaleshwara Namah Shivaya
alt_lyrics:
Tripurari Shiva Shankara
Nandi Vahana Naga Bharana [ Tripurari Shiva ... ]
Omkareshwara Namah Shivaya
Mahakaleshwara Namah Shivaya
meaning: Oh Lord Shiva (also called Shankara), the slayer of the demons of Tripura, the one who wears the serpent as ornament, the personification of the primordial sound "Om", the Lord Mahakaleshwar (Shiva's another name), I offer my salutations to Thee.

title: Truth is the doorway
title2: Truth is the doorway, Peace is the key.
lyrics:
Step through in goodness - Such love you'll see.
 The Lord is watching, He'll show you the way
 To bliss and freedom, with every new day.
 Through all our sorrows, He shines His grace,
 Comforts and guides us, with His smiling face.
 At last you'll see Him, He'll take you home.
 Sai, Mother, Father, Jai Sai Ram Om

title: Truth Knowing Boundless God
lyrics:
Truth God
Knowing God
Boundless God
alt_lyrics:
True, Knowing, Boundless God (3)
True God
Knowing God
Boundless God

title: Tu eres el Amor
title2: Tu eres el Amor de este corazon
lyrics:
Y eres esa Luz que brilla en mi interior
Tu eres la dulzura que embriaga el alma
Y eres la ternura que me da calma
Tu eres la sonrisa en labios infantiles
Y eres el suspiro en los an'os seniles
T eres la esperanza en la juventud
Y eres la Conciencia en la Plenitud
Tu eres Esto y eres Aquello
Y eres Todo a mi alrededor
Tu eres el Padre y eres la Madre
Y eres el duen'o de mi corazon
meaning: You Are the Love of this heart and You are the bright light that is inside me. You are the sweetness that engrosses the soul and You are the tenderness that calms me. You are the smile in the infant's lips and You are the sigh of relief to the old. You are the hope for the young and You are the Consciousness for the Plentiful (liberated soul). You are This, You are That and You are everything around me. You are the Father and You are the Mother and You are the Owner of my heart.

title: Tu eres Ram Tu eres
title2: Tu Eres Ram, Tu Eres Shyam, To Lo Eres Todo, Oh Mi Señor
lyrics:
Yo Te Ilamo Baba, Yo Te Ilamo Sai, Solo Te Pido Yo Tu Bendicion [ Tu Eres ... ]
Omkaram, Om Sai Ram, Oh Mi Señor, Om
Yo Te Ofrezco Mi Oracion, So Te Alabo Y Lloro Tu Nombre
Ayudame Oh Sai, Cuidame Oh Sai, Solo Te Pido Tu Bendicion
meaning: You are Ram, You are Shyam (Krishna), You are everything, Lord. I call Baba, I call Sai, I only ask for Your blessing. I offer my prayer only to praise You and call Your name. Help me O Sai, take care of me. I only ask for Your blessing.

title: Tu Hai Allah
title2: Tu Hai Allah, Tu Hai Maulah, Tu Yehovah, Mahavira
lyrics:
Tu Ahura, Tu Hai Buddha, Nanak Krishna, Narayana (Narayana) [ Tu Hai Allah ... ] 
Jab Bhi Pukaara, Tu Chala Aaya, Jo Naam Chaha, Vaisa Hi Paaya
Har Ek Dil Ne, Tumko Hi Gaaya
(Narayana Narayana Narayana)
meaning: O Lord, You are verily Allah, Maulah, Jehovah, Mahavira, Ahura Mazda, Buddha, Guru Nanak, Krishna, and Narayana. You came whenever I called, and whatever name I call, You come to me! Your glory is sung in every heart.

title: Tu Hai Anatha Bandhu
lyrics:
Karuna Sindho Sri Sai Bhagawan [ Tu Hai ... ]
Dukh Aur Dard Ko Door Karo
Sukh Ke Karana Dukh Ke Nivaran
Main Kya Janoon Teri Leela (Mahima)
Mamata Maya Mey Sab Hai Andhera (2)
meaning: Lord Sai is the friend of the forlorn and HE is full of compassion. How can we ever know your grandeur, Oh Sai ? You are the cause of happiness and remover of sorrow when we are stooped in the darkness of ignorance ?

title: Tu que eres la lluvia
lyrics:
Tu que eres el sol
 Haz que mi mente sea limpia
 Y puro mi corazon, oh! Senor
 Tu que vaz por la vida.
 Cosechando amor
 Toma mi mano y perdona.
 Mis faltas oh! Sen`or
 Toma mi mano y camina.
 Dentro de mi corazon, dame amor
meaning: O Lord, You are the rain and the sun, please cleanse my mind. Make my heart pure, my Lord. You sow the seed of love all through my life. Take my hand and forgive all my faults. O my Lord, take my hand and walk. Within my heart, let me develop love.

title: Tulasi Mala Dhari Krishna
lyrics:
Tunga Teera Vihari Krishna [ Tulasi Mala Dhari ... ]
Gopi Manasa Gopala Krishna
Gopala Krishna Gopala Krishna [ Gopi Manasa ... ]
Govinda Govinda Sai Krishna
meaning: Chant the names of the Lord Gopala Krishna, Govinda Krishna, the one who wears the Tulasi garland and has installed Himself on the banks of River Tunga and has captured the minds of the Gopikas.

title: Tum Bin Pran Nahin O
title2: Tum Bin Pran Nahin O Sai Merey
lyrics:
Sab Bhakthon Ka Tum Ho Sahara
Rahim Kaho Raghu Rama Kaho [ Tum Bin ... ]
Nanak Yesu Mahavira Shiva Shankara Premavatara Sai Ram
Tum Ho Merey Pran O Sai Merey
Tum Ho Sai Bhagawan
meaning: O compassionate Lord Sai, You are none other than Lord Shankara(Shiva), Guru Nanak, Yesu and Mahavira. Lord Sai, we adore You as the very personification of Love, the basis of all faiths. Chant the names of Ram, Rahim, Nanak, Yesu, Mahavir. O Sai, there is no life without You.

title: Tum Hi Ho Hamari
title2: Tum Hi Ho Hamari Hey Devatha Sri Hari
lyrics:
Sai Ho Hamari Hey Devatha Sri Hari
Merey Dil Mey Aao Natha Mein Pukari
Sai Dil Mey Aao Natha Mein Pukari [ Tum Hi Ho ... ]
Jeevan Aangan Mey Jo Jyothi Jalavey
Tumhari Woh Karuna Sai Prem Tumhari
Merey Dil Mey Aao Natha Mein Pukari
Sai Dil Mey Aao Natha Mein Pukari [ Tum Hi Ho ... ]
meaning: O Sai, You are my Deity Lord Hari. I pray ardently that You come to my heart. In life’s courtyard the light that is ignited, is in fact the light of Your Grace and Love. I pray, O Lord, that I always feel Your presence in my heart.

title: Tum Ho Allah Tum Ho
title2: Tum Ho Allah Tum Ho Maulah
lyrics:
Sarva Dharma Priya Gurudeva
Tum Ho Yeshu Tum Ho Nanak
Sarva Dharma Priya Gurudev
Tum Ho Buddha Tum Ho Bhagawan
Sarva Dharma Priya Gurudev
Gurudev Gurudev
Sai Ram Megha Shyam
meaning: Lord Sai, You uphold all religions and support the unity of all faiths. You are Allah, Nanak, Buddha, Jesus, and the Eternal Teacher.

title: Tum Ho Anatha Nath Bhagawan
lyrics:
O Sai Merey Prana Sakha Bhagawan
Mata Pitha Guru Bandhu Tum Ho
Bhaktha (Deena) Sakha Bhagawan
Bhagawan Bhagawan (2)
Prana Sakha Bhagawan (O Sai Merey)
meaning: Oh Sai Bhagawan, You are the Lord of the forlorn, closest friend for your devotees. You are everything, the Mother, Father, preceptor and even the kith and kin.

title: Tum ho Daata Sai Shankara
lyrics:
Hum Ko Deejo Ananda Baba [ Tum Ho Daata ... ]
Aao Shankara Anatha Natha
Deejo Darshana Deena Natha
meaning: O Lord Sai who is verily Lord Shiva, You are the one who bestows everything. We pray that You give us the eternal bliss. Please come and give Your Darshan. You are the Lord and savior of the helpless and the downtrodden.

title: Tum Ho Hamarey Sai Rakhawale
lyrics:
Darshan Do Bhagawan Darshan Do Bhagawan (Mujhe)
Tumhi Ho Mata Pitha Tumhi Ho
Tum Ho Deena Dayal (Baba) [ Darshan Do ... ]
Dukhi Jano Ke Bhaktha Jano Ke
Tum Ho Karuna Nidhan (Baba) [ Darshan Do ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, please grant us the vision of Your Divine Form. O merciful Lord Baba, You are our Protector, Father, and Mother. You are the treasure house of compassion for the afflicted devotees.

title: Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan (Baba)
lyrics:
Parthi Pureesha Sri Sai Natha
Shirdi Pureesha Hey Jagannatha [ Tum Ho ... ]
Prashanthi Vasa Sri Sai Natha
Purana Purusha Hey Jagannatha
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai, the Lord of Shirdi and Parthi, is also Lord of the world and the Lord who was mentioned in great Epics (Puranas) like Mahabharata, Ramayana etc. O Sai, You are my Lord.

title: Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan O
title2: Tum Ho Merey Bhagawan O Sai
lyrics:
Tum Ho Merey Atma Ram [ Tum Ho ]
Allah Tum Ho Eshwar Tum Ho
Nanak Sai Yesu Tum Ho
Sab Dharmon Ke Sai Tum Ho
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
Jai Sai Ram Bolo Jai Sai Ram (2)
meaning: Salutations to Sai Ram who is the Rama residing in our Atma (Higher Conscience or Higher Self). He is Allah, Eshwar, Nanak, Yesu and belongs to all faiths.

title: Tum Ho Prabhu Ghana Shyam
title2: Tum Ho Prabhu Ghana Shyam O Sai
lyrics:
Parthi Vihari Shyama Murari [ Tum Ho ... ]
Meera Ke Prabhu Giridhara Naagara
Natavara Sundara Shyama Murari
Charana Kamala Balihaari Murari
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are verily Lord Krishna, the one with the dark complexion of a rain cloud, who slayed the demon Mura. You reside at Puttaparthi. You are the supreme actor, the most beautiful Lord who lifted the Govardhana hill. You are the Lord of Meera. We surrender at Thy Lotus feet, O Lord.

title: Tum Ho Ram Tum Ho
title2: Tum Ho Ram Tum Ho Shyam
lyrics:
Bhakthon Ke Pran Bhagawan Sai Ram
Sita Ram Radhey Shyam
Ek Prabhu Bhagawan Sai Ram [ Bhakthon Ke ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the very life of Your devotees, all forms blended in one, though known as Rama, the consort of Sita and Shyama (Krishna, the Lord of Radha).

title: Tum Ho Shyam Ram Rahim
lyrics:
Ram Rahim Shyama Rahim [ Tum Ho ... ]
Allah Yesu Buddha Mahavira
Nanak Sai Zohrashtra Bhi Ho
Sarva Dharma Priya Sai Narayana (Shankara)
meaning: You are the Lord of every religion, O Sai. Devotees adore You as Ram, Rahim, Allah, Yesu, Buddha, Mahavira, Nanak, Zohrashtra, Narayana and Shankara.

title: Tum Ho Vighna Vinasha Ganesha
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Paahi Gajanana
Pranava Swaroopa Parthi Pureesha
Paahi Ganesha Vighna Vinasha
meaning: Protect me Oh Lord Ganesha, the destroyer of all obstacles, the son of Parvathi, the embodiment of primordial sound "OM" and the Lord of Parthi.

title: Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba Tumhey
title2: Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba Tumhey Namaskar Sai Baba
lyrics:
Pranam Mera Sweekaro Bhagawan Parthi Puri Sai Deva [ Tumhey Namaskar ... ]
Hey Shiva Linga Dhari Baba Hey Ananda Dayi Baba [ Pranam Mera ... ]
Hey Vibhuti Sundara Baba Tum Ati Sundara Sai Baba (2)
Prem Dakshina Sweekaro Bhagawan Parthi Puri Sai Deva
meaning: Accept our prayerful obeisance O Lord Sai Baba, the Lord of Parthi. You are the one who bears the Shiva Linga and the bestower of supreme bliss. You smear Yourself with Vibhuti (Holy Ash) and You are the most beautiful Sai. O Lord, please accept our offering of love.

title: Tus cabellos de luna
title2: Tus cabellos de luna, manantial de agua pura,
lyrics:
Se convierten en Ganges, bañando tu figura
Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Sathya Sai
Voy limpiando mi mente, respiro lentamente,
Y contemplo en mi frente tu sin par hermosura.
Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Sathya Sai
Déjame adorarte, déjame venerarte
Sólo quiero extasiarme en tu fresca ternura.
Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Shiva, Sathya Sai
meaning: O Lord Shiva, the spring of pure water on Your moon-decorated hair became Ganges by bathing Your figure. Glory to Thee, O Lord Shiva and Lord Sathya Sai. My mind is cleansed and my breath slows down when admiring Your unmatched beauty face-to-face. O Lord Sathya Sai who is verily Lord Shiva, let me worship You, let me venerate You. I just want to thrill in Your fresh tenderness.

title: Uchi Naru Heian
lyrics:
Prashanthi wa Amaneku Heian [ Uchi Naru ... ]
Inori to Kansha to Ai no Hibi
Ajiwai Yorokobi Miroku no Yo
Hikari Kagayaki Hitotsu ni Naru
Anata wa Subete Ai no Hikari
meaning: Lord Sai, You are the peace and tranquility within us and everywhere in this world. Every day we pray, love, and express our gratitude for You are the joyous and delightful Maitreya (the Buddha who is believed to incarnate in the future and who will enlighten everyone with His teachings). You shine Your light of love around the world so that everything can be one.

title: Uchinaru Hikari yo, Inochi no
title2: Uchinaru Hikari yo, Inochi no Hikari yo
lyrics:
Eien no Hikari yo, Ai no Hikari yo
Ware wa Kaeru Kami no Hikari ni
meaning: We will all return to the Light of God. The Light within us, the Light of our lives. The Light of eternity, the Light of love.

title: Uchinaru Kami no Mina wo
title2: Uchinaru Kami no Mina wo Yobeba
lyrics:
Amaku Yasashii Ai ga Afureru
Yorokobi mo Kanashimi mo Sai no Mina he
Inori wo Kono Mune ni Sai no Mina ni
Sai Ram Sai Ram Rama Krishna Sai Ram
Sai Ram Sai Ram Shirdi Sai Sathya Sai Prema Sai Ram
meaning: If you call out the beautiful name of God who resides within us, He will touch with His kind, sweet love. Whether you are happy or sad, you can pray to the beautiful name of Sai who resides in your heart. Chant the names of Rama, Krishna, Shirdi Sai, Sathya Sai and Prema Sai.

title: Uma Maheshwara Kumara Ganapathi
lyrics:
Namami Gajamukha Daya Nidhey
Bhaktha Jana Priya Sai Ganesha (2)
Bala Gajanana Krupa Nidhey (2)
meaning: I bow to the elephant-faced Lord Ganesha and His entire family, parents Uma (Mother Parvathi) and Maheshwara (Lord Shiva) and brother Kumara (Lord Muruga). The Lord of ganaas (attendants of Lord Shiva) is dear to His devotees and is the repository of benevolence.

title: Uma Nandana Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Ganesha Ganesha Ganesha
Buddhi Pradatha Sai Ganesha
Paahi Prabho Maam Sai Ganesha
Prema Pradatha Vighna Vinasha
Ananda Dayaka Sai Ganesha
Atmabhi Bodhaka Jai Sri Ganesha
meaning: Victory to Lord Ganesha, son of Mother Uma (Parvathi) who bestows intellect, love, bliss, and self-realization. Glory to Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles and protector of His devotees.

title: Umarekite Sai wo Shiru Nagaki
title2: Umarekite Sai wo Shiru Nagaki Tankyuu no Hibi wa
lyrics:
Tada Haato wo Hiraku Shinri no tame ni
Motomeru beki wa Sai no Onchou no Izumi
Negau beki wa Sai to Hitotsu ni Naru Koto
Umare Kawari no Owari mo Tsukiru Kotonai Yorokobi mo
Ai to Heian to Jiyuu mo Ima Koko ni Aru
meaning: The journey towards Sai is a long one that continues every day for the purpose of opening my heart to the truth. I wish for the grace of Sai. I wish that I may become one with Him. I wish for the end of my rebirth cycle and for endless joy. Lord Sai, You have brought to me love, peace, and freedom.

title: Umayavale Arul Purivaiyamma
lyrics:
Omkara Roopini Akhilanda Nayaki
Adiyargal Vinai Tirkkum Adi Parasakti [ Umayavale Arul ... ]
Nan Seida Pizhaigalellam Poruppai Amma
Jagadambige Shivaranjani
meaning: Grace us O Goddess Uma! Ruler of the Universe! You are the personification of Aum; You are the divine energy, and the destroyer of sins. Forgive us, all our past errors, O Mother of the Universe, consort of Shiva.

title: Umi yori Fukai Ai no
title2: Umi yori Fukai Ai no Kamisama
lyrics:
Ai no Kamisama, Ai no Kamisama [ Umi yori ... ]
Watashi wa Anata to Funatabishimasu
Kirameku Unabara Hazumi ni Notte
Hare no Hi, Ame no Hi, Ooarashi no Hi
Genki Ippai Osoba ni Imasu
Ai no Kamisama (3)
meaning: God of Love, Your love is deeper than the ocean. I travel with You across this vast, shining ocean of love. Whether the weather is nice, rainy, or stormy, I will travel with You my dear God of Love.

title: Un Solo Dios
title2: Un Solo Dios Eres Tu, Eres Tu Mi Senor
lyrics:
Jesucristo, Mahavira, Un Solo Dios Y Nada Mas
Jehova O Allah, Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Sai
Zoroastro, Guru Nanak, Mazda, Buddha,
Narayana
Sathya Sai Baba Nos Unira, En Una Sola
Humanidad
Un Solo Dios Reinara, Un Solo Dios Nos Amara
meaning: You are the One God, my Lord. You are Jesus Christ, Mahavira, Jehovah, Allah, Brahma, Vishnu, Shiva, Sai, Zoroaster, Guru Nanak, Ahura Mazda, Buddha and Narayana. Lord Sathya Sai Baba will unite us into one humanity. One God will reign, one God will love us.

title: Utaou Ai wo Utaou Bhajan
title2: Utaou Ai wo Utaou Bhajan Ai wo Motte Sasageyo
lyrics:
Sai Baba he no Inori Shiawase Motarasu yo
Kokoro ni Hi wo Tomosu Anata he no Omoi
Kokoro ni wo Tomosu Anata he no Sanka
meaning: Lord Sai, we offer You this bhajan in prayer for You always bring us happiness. You light the candles in our hearts.

title: Utsukushii Megami yo
lyrics:
Jiai ni Afureru Uruwashiki Megami yo
Kirameku Nami no Hikari noyou ni
Shizukana Ai de Tsutsumu Megami
O Saraswati Uchuu no Hana yo
O Saraswati Inochi no Izumi
meaning: Mother Saraswati, You are our beautiful Goddess who floods us with love like the shining light of the ocean. You cover us with Your gentle love. You are the flower of the universe and the fountain of our lives.

title: Utsukushiki Hana no Kokoro ni
lyrics:
Naruzo Yoki Hikari Urara no
Sakura no Hana ni Naruzo Yoki [ Utsukushiki ... ]

Naruzo Yoki Nigori ni Somanu
Hachisu no Hana ni Naruzo Yoki [ Utsukushiki ... ]

Naruzo Yoki Kaori mo Takaki
Kiku no Hana ni Naruzo Yoki [ Utsukushiki ... ]

Naruzo Yoki Sugata mo Yukashi
Ume no Hana ni Naruzo Yoki [ Utsukushiki ... ]
meaning:
There is a beautiful flower within our hearts.
 
1. Let us become good so that the light may clear the way. Let us become good like a Sakura (cherry blossom) flower.
 
2. Let us become good so that impurity does not taint us. Let us become good like a Lotus flower.
 
3. Let us become good so that the quality of our very essence is elevated. Let us become good like a Chrysanthemum flower.
 
4. Let us become good so that our soul becomes refined. Let us become good like a Plum blossom flower.

title: Utsukushiki Kokoro ni
lyrics:
Sumita mo Yasashiki Kami Itooshii Krishna
Sekai Chuu no Hito ni
Ai wo Ataeta mo
Sai Krishna Anata no Fue no Ne ni Nosete
meaning: O Lord Krishna, You dwell in our hearts with Your kindness and beauty. We sing along with the sound of Your beautiful flute. Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Krishna.

title: Utsuroi Yuku Toki no Nagare
title2: Utsuroi Yuku Toki no Nagare ni, Mi wo Oki Kami to Ikiru
lyrics:
Swami Anata wa Shizukana Ai Desu ne
Om Sai Ram, Sri Sathya Sai Baba
Om Sai Om
Anata no Ai to Ikiru
meaning: Time is constantly flowing, but I am always living with Your gentle love in my heart. Glory to Thee, Lord Sathya Sai Baba.

title: Utter The Name
title2: Utter the name, Tuka says, Rama, Krishna, Hari
lyrics:
Rama, Krishna, Hari, Rama, Krishna, Hari
Use as a mantra, Tuka says, Rama, Krishna, Hari
Over and over fervently, Rama, Krishna, Hari
Rama, Krishna, Hari, Rama, Krishna, Hari
 
Tuka says that God will run to where His name is sung
If you follow faithfully, Rama, Krishna, Hari
God will grant the golden key to His secret treasury

title: Va Va Murugaiyya Vadivel Azhaga
lyrics:
Ka Va Va Kumara Thiru Karthikeya [ Va Va ... ]
Singara Vela Shiva Shakthi Bala
Sangeeta Lola Sathya Sayeesha
Va Va Muruga Vadivel Azhaga (6)
meaning: Come O beautiful Lord Muruga, protect us, Lord Karthikeya, the youthful son of Shiva and Shakthi, and the bearer of the divine spear. You are verily Lord Sathya Sai, who enjoys divine music.

title: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru
title2: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Bol
lyrics:
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Bol [ Vahey Guru ... ]
Govinda Bol Hari Gopala Bol
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Bol
Shirdi (Parthi) Pureeshwara Sri Sai Bol
meaning: Chant the names of Vahey Guru, Sathya Sai, Govinda, Gopala (names of Krishna) and the name of Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi.

title: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey
title2: Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Ji Bolo
lyrics:
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Terey Naam Ji Bolo [ Sathya Naam ... ]
Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Rama Naam Ji Bolo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Krishna Naam Ji Bolo
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
Govinda Jai Jai Gopala Jai Jai
Radha Ramana Hari Govinda Jai Jai
alt_lyrics:
Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Vahey Guru Ji Bolo
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Terey Naam Ji Bolo [ Sathya Naam ... ]
Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ram(a) Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Rama Naam Ji Bolo
Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Krishna Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiyey Krishna Naam Ji Bolo
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Naam Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiye Sathya Naam Ji Bolo
Hara Hara Hara Hara Hara Hara Ji Bolo
Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Hari Ji Bolo
Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Sathya Naam Ji Bolo
Datta Datta Datta Datta Dattratreya Ji Bolo
Datt Datt Datt Datt Dattratreya Ji Bolo
Nithya Nithya Japiye Datta Naam Ji Bolo
meaning: Always chant the names of the Divine Preceptor Vahey Guru, Lords Rama, Krishna, Shiva, Dattatreya and Govinda who is the beloved of Radha. Victory to Lord Govinda  and Gopala (names of Lord Krishna).

title: Vaidehi Priya Vaikunta Rama
lyrics:
Ahalyodharaka Rama
Raghu Vara Janani Janaki Rama
Lakshmana Sevitha Lavanya Rama
Dasharatha Nandana Rama [ Raghu Vara ... ]
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Rama of Vaikunta, beloved of Vaidehi / Janaki (other names of mother Sita). You are the liberator of Ahalya, You are worshipped by Lakshmana, son of Dasharatha and a blessing for the Raghu dynasty.

title: Vaijayanti Dhara Vanamala Dhara
lyrics:
Shankha Chakra Dhara Peetambara Dhara [ Vaijayanti Dhara ... ]
Sri Kara Purandara Giridhara Naagara
Muralidhara Ghana Shyama Manohara
meaning: Glory to the dark-hued Lord Krishna who wears a garland of flowers and plays the enchanting flute. Wearing the golden robe, He is Lord Vishnu who holds the Discus (time) and the Conch (the sound Om). He is the Indweller who confers auspiciousness.

title: Vaikunta Natha Ananda Daata
lyrics:
Alakha Niranjana Sai 
Sathya Swaroopa Sai Mahesha
Dharma Swaroopa Sai Mahesha
Shanthi Swaroopa Sai Mahesha
Prema Swaroopa Sai Mahesha
Alakha Niranjana Sai
meaning: Lord Sai, residing in Vaikunta, is the bestower of bliss. He is unstained from the world and attribute-less. Lord Sai is the supreme embodiment of the human values: Truth, Right Action, Peace, and Love.

title: Vaikuntapathey Narayana
lyrics:
Varija Nayana Narayana [ Vaikuntapathey ... ]
Vakshasthala Kaustubha Mani Bhooshita
Shankha Chakra Peetambara Shobhita
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
meaning: Glory to Lord Narayana, the one who resides in Vaikunta who has eyes the shape of a lotus, the one with the Kaustubha jewel on His chest and who is adorned with Shanka (Conch), Chakra (Disc) and who dons the auspicious yellow silk.

title: Vaikuntapathey Sai Harey
lyrics:
Vaijayanti Mala Dhari [ Vaikuntapathey Sai ... ]
Hari Govinda Hari Gopala (3)
Vara Godavari (Chithravathi) Teera Vihari
meaning: Glory to Lord Sai who is verily Lord Narayana of Vaikunta, who wears the Vaijayanti garland (a necklace worn by Lord Narayana as a sign of victory). He is Lord Hari and Govinda who resides on the banks of river Godavari and on the banks of the river Chithravathi as Lord Sai.

title: Vaishnavi Ma Varahi Ma
lyrics:
Vishweshwari Ma Vani Ma [ Vaishnavi Ma ... ]
Shakthi Swaroopini Sai Ma
Shanthi Pradayini Santoshi Ma (Pra)
meaning: Salutations to the Mother Vaishnavi also known as Santoshi, the mother of the world, the personification of Shakthi and the giver of peace.

title: Vakratunda Bhajey Eka Dantha Bhajey
title2: Vakratunda Bhajey Eka Dantha Bhajey Phaalachandra Bhajey Gananatha
lyrics:
Gananatha Gananatha Maam Paahi Prabho Gananatha 
Gowri Priya Sutha Gananatha 
Bimbadhara Sutha Gananatha 
Sai Vinayaka Gananatha
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Ganesha, the one with a curved trunk, a single tusk and who is adorned with the moon on His head. O the Lord of Shiva's army, please protect us. O Lord Ganesha, the beloved son of Mother Gowri and Lord Shiva who dons the crescent moon, You are none other than our Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Vakratunda Dhara Vighna Vinashaka Sri
title2: Vakratunda Dhara Vighna Vinashaka Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha
lyrics:
Siddhi Vinayaka Sumukha Gajanana Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha
Linga Supoojita Lambodara Prabhu Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha
Bhavani Nandana Bhaagawatha Priya Sri Ganesha Sri Ganesha
meaning: Salutations to Lord Ganesha, who bears a curved tusk, and is the remover of all obstacles. He grants intellect and humility. His smile enchants all devotees. He worships the Shiva Linga (representation of the universal divinity). His large stomach symbolizes the repository of all knowledge. He is the dear son of Mother Parvathi. He wrote the holy scriptures, as dictated by sage Vyaasa, using one of His own tusks as a pencil.

title: Vakratunda Mahakaya Sri Ganesha Paahi
title2: Vakratunda Mahakaya Sri Ganesha Paahi Maam
lyrics:
Vighna Raja Vighna Nasha Vighneshwara Paahi Maam [ Vakratunda Mahakaya ... ]
Paahi Maam Karunakara Paahi Maam Jagadeeshwara [ Vighna Raja ]
meaning: Protect us Oh compassionate Lord Ganesha, Lord of the world, with your contorted body you destroy the obstacles in life.

title: Vamana Roopa Ganadhipa
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Paahi Gajanana [ Vamana Roopa ... ]
Eka Dantha Gunavanta Vinayaka
Maya Vinashaka Mooshika Vahana
Vidya Buddhi Siddhi Pradayaka
Pranavakaara Hey Shiva Nandana
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Ganesha, the short-statured Lord of the Ganaas (Lord Shiva's army). Protect us, O elephant-faced son of Mother Parvathi. You are the single tusked one, the epitome of good qualities, the destroyer of Maya (illusion) and the one who rides the mouse Mooshika. You are the bestower of superior knowledge, intelligence and powers. O son of Lord Shiva, You are verily the form of Om (Pranava).

title: Vanamala Shritha Jana Pala
lyrics:
Darshanam Ivvayya Gopala (Sai)
Goparipala Gopi Lola
Radha Manasa Giridhara Bala
Giridhara Bala Raasa Vilola (Radha Lola) (2)
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), the protector of the good and the pious, the one who adorns the garland of forest flowers, grant us Your vision. You are the protector of the cows. You occupy the thoughts of Radha, You are the one who protected the devotees by lifting the Govardhana mountain and the one who performed the celestial dance.

title: Vanamali Brinda Vanamali Krishna (2)
lyrics:
Vanamali Brinda Vanamali
Kalinga Narthana Kamsadi Mardhana
Radha Hrudaya Nivasa Harey Krishna
meaning: Oh Krishna, the one who adorns the garland of forest flowers grown in Brindavan. You are the one who put an end to the poisonous snake Kalinga, annihilated wicked Kamsa and you dwell in the heart of Radha.

title: Vanamali Radha Ramana Giridhari Govinda
lyrics:
Neela Megha Sundara Narayana Govinda [ Vanamali Radha ... ]
Bhaktha Hrudaya Mandara Bhanu Koti Sundara
Nanda Nanda Gopa Vrinda Narayana Govinda
Narayana Govinda (6)
Narayana Narayana Narayana Govinda
Narayana Govinda (3)
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Govinda (Krishna) who wears a garland of forest flowers, who lifted the Govardhana hill and the beloved of Radha. He is beautiful with dark-blue complexion and is none other than Lord Narayana. He is like the Mandara flower in the hearts of His devotees, effulgent like a million Suns, the son of Nanda and one among the cowherds of Brindavan.

title: Vanamali Vasudeva Jaganmohana Radha Ramana
lyrics:
Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (2)
Shashi Vadana Sarasija Nayana Jaganmohana Radha Ramana (3)
Radha Ramana Radha Ramana (4)
meaning: Oh Lord Krishna, adorning the garland made of forest flowers, You attract all minds and the whole world. Your charming bright face which is like a shining moon and Your lotus eyes are admired by Radha.

title: Vanamali Vedodhara
lyrics:
Vaikuntapathey Narayana
Giridhari Gaana Manohara
Garuda Vahana Narayana (4) [ Vaikuntapathey Narayana ]
meaning: O Lord Narayana, the one who adorns the garland made of forest flowers, the one who protects and nourishes the Vedas, You are the Lord of Vaikunta, the one who lifted the Govardhana mountain to protect Your devotees and the one who relishes the sweetness of divine music.

title: Vande Sai Sadguru Charanam
lyrics:
Pavana Charanam Pankaja Charanam [ Vande Sai ... ]
Brahmananda Swaroopa Manoharam
Paramananda Swaroopa Smaranam
Jagadodharana Shanthi Sadanam
Sai Charanam Paapa Haranam [ Pavana Charanam ... ]
meaning: Let us offer our obeisance at the sacred Lotus Feet of the benevolent Guru, Sai, the very embodiment of supreme and highest bliss and uplifter of the downtrodden.

title: Vande Uma Nandanam Gajananam
lyrics:
Suramuni Sevitha Sumukha Gajananam [ Vande Uma ... ]
Vidya Dayaka Buddhi Pradayaka
Siddhi Vinayaka Paahi Gajananam
meaning: Salutations to Lord Gajanana, the son of Uma and the one who is worshipped by sages, who is the giver of knowledge, intellect and boons.

title: Varuvai Niye Sai Nada
lyrics:
Padidum Podu Niye Varuvai [ Varuvai Niye ... ]
Annaiyum Niye Tandaiyum Niye
Guruvai Niye Varuvaye
Anbum Niye Arulum Niye
Ellam Alittidum Param Porul Niye
meaning: O Lord Sai, please come as we sing Your Name. You are our mother, father and preceptor. You are verily Love and Grace, You are the Supreme Soul who bestows everything on us.

title: Varuvai Varuvai Varuvai Amma
lyrics:
Thiruve Uruvai Varuvai Amma
Irulai Neekkida Varuvai Amma
Undan Arulai Pozhindhidu Sai Amma [ Varuvai Varuvai ... ]
Kalyani Karumari Kamakshi Niye
Mahalakshmi Matangi Meenakshi Niye
Varalakshmi Varahi Visalakshi Niye
Ulagalum Maye Prashanthi Thaye
Amma Amma Amma Amma
meaning: O Mother Sai, please come in the form of grace to remove darkness. You are the various goddesses, and the Mother of the Universe who resides in Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Vata Patra Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Vanditha Charana Narayana
Dwarakamayi Narayana
Vasudeva Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana (3)
meaning: Bow at the feet of Lord Sai Narayana reclining on a Banyan leaf. He is also Lord Krishna and Lord Shirdi Sai who resided in Dwarakamayi.

title: Vayu Kumara Vanara Veera
lyrics:
Ati Balavanta Hanumantha
Kesari Nandana Anjani Putra
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
Jaya Ho Jaya Ho Pavana Kumara (2)
meaning: O Lord Hanuman, the son of Kesari and Anjana, You are the most powerful. Victory to You, O blessed son of the Wind God (born to Kesari and Anjana out of boon from the Lord of Wind).

title: Veda Kalamayi Naada Swaroopini
lyrics:
Kaadamba Priyey Karuna Sagari
Veena Venu Mrudanga Vinodini
Nanabharana Bhooshani Ranjani
meaning: Salutations to the repository of Vedas (Goddess Saraswathi), who is personification of melody, the one who has decorated herself with various jewels and flowers, loves music, plays Veena, Flute and Mrudangam (Indian percussion instrument).

title: Veda Mata Gayathri
lyrics:
Hamsa Vahini Jagat Janani [ Veda Mata ... ]
Amba Lakshmi Durga Kaali
Jaya Ho Janani Sai Mata [ Hamsa Vahini ... ]
meaning: Glory to the Divine Mother, worshipped as the forms of Gayathri, Lakshmi, Durga, and Kaali. She is the foremost exponent of the Vedas (holy scriptures), and rides the swan. She is none other than our Mother Sai.

title: Veena Gaana Priyey Sharadey
lyrics:
Vedakala Nilayey Saraswathi [ Veena Gaana Priyey ... ]
Vidya Sahitey Vimaley Kamaley
Bhavalankruta Gaana Viloley
Mukthi Pradayini Hey Jagat Janani
Parthi Pureeshwari Hey Bhavani
meaning: Salutations to Goddess Sharada (Saraswathi), who is fond of the music of Veena, in whom all the knowledge and arts of the Vedas are enshrined, the Mother of the world who gives liberation, who is verily Mother Sai Bhavani of Parthi.

title: Veena Vadini Saraswathi Ma
lyrics:
Jaya Jagadambe Janani Ma [ Veena Vadini ... ]
Ambe Bhavani Sai Ma
Jaya Jagadeeshwari Rakshaya Ma
meaning: Please protect me Oh Universal Mother Sai, you are none other than Goddess Saraswathi playing celestial music with her Veena.

title: Veera Dheera Shoora Hanuman Ki
title2: Veera Dheera Shoora Hanuman Ki Jai
lyrics:
Pavana Putra Anjaneya Hanuman Ki Jai [ Veera Dheera ... ]
Sada Rama Naama Japata Hanuman Ki Jai
Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Rama Ram [ Sada Rama ... ]
Sita Shoka Nasha Kaarana Hanuman Ki Jai
meaning: Victory to Lord Hanuman, the one of valor, courage, strength, son of Pavan (the wind god) and Anjana Devi. Victory to the one who chants Lord Rama's name incessantly and who is responsible for the removal of Mother Sita's sorrow.

title: Veera Hanumana Ati Balawana Ram
title2: Veera Hanumana Ati Balawana Ram Naam Rasiyarey
lyrics:
Hey Prabhu Mana (Ho Tapovana) Basiyarey [ Veera Hanumana ... ]

Rama Lakshmana Janaki Jai Bolo Hanuman Ki (2)  [ Veera Hanumana ... ]
Sita Ram Jai Sita Ram Radhey Shyam Jai Radhey Shyam (2) [ Veera Hanumana ... ]
Raghupathi Raghava Raja Ram Patitha Pavana Sita Ram (2) [ Veera Hanumana ... ]
meaning: Glory to the valorous Hanuman, the one endowed with supreme strength, the one who incessantly chants the Holy name of Lord Rama and who has installed himself in the heart of the Lord. Victory to Lord Rama, His consort Sita and to His brother Lakshmana. Victory to Hanuman. Victory to Lord Krishna, the Lord of Radha. Glory to the King of Raghu clan, Lord Rama, the redeemer of the downtrodden.

title: Veera Hanumathey Namo Namo
lyrics:
Vayu Kumara Namo Namo [ Veera Hanumathey ... ]
Raghava Priyakara Namo Namo
Sri Rama Dootha Namo Namo
meaning: Salutations to Hanuman the personification of courage, who is son of wind god, messenger and dearest to Lord Rama.

title: Veera Maruti Gambhira Maruti
lyrics:
Dheera Maruti Ati Dheera Maruti
Geeta Maruti Sangeeta Maruti
Dootha Maruti Rama Dootha Maruti
Bhaktha Maruti Parama Bhaktha Maruti
meaning: Maruti, the son of Wind God, is one of supreme valor, courage and is highly talented in Music. He is the messenger and devotee of the highest order of Lord Rama.

title: Velava Velava Vel Muruga Va
title2: Velava Velava Vel Muruga Va Va
lyrics:
Vel Muruga Va Va (Va) Vel Muruga Va Va (Va) [ Velava Velava ... ] 
Sooradhi Soora Subrahmanya Deva
Shanmukha Sharavana Muruga Muruga
Vadi Velava Sharavana Muruga Muruga
Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha
Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha Shanmukha [ Shanmukha Sharavana ... ]
meaning: We worship Lord Subrahmanya, who bears the golden spear (Vel). He leads the army of good against evil. We sing the praises of the Lord with six faces.

title: Ven Mi Sai Rama
lyrics:
Haz De Mi Mente Un Jardin, Dionde Florezca Dharma Shanthi Prema
Ven Shiva Sathya Sai, Y Baila
Baila En Mi Corazon (4)
Baila En Mi Corazon Tu Cosmica Danza
meaning: Come my Sai Rama, make my mind a garden where Dharma, Shanthi, and Prema bloom. Come Shiva Sathya Sai and dance. Perform Your cosmic dance in my heart.

title: Venkuzhal Udi Varum Kanna Kanna
lyrics:
Maya Leelai Seibavane Madhusudhana [ Venkuzhal Oodhi ... ]
Gajarajan Thuyar Theertha Adi Mulame
Kaliyugatthai Katthunirkkum Sai Deivame
Yuga Yugamai Thondri Nirkkum Avatarame
Kamalakkanna Karmega Vanna
Azhi Mazhai Kanna Maale Manivanna
meaning: O Sai, You are Lord Krishna playing the flute. Your divine play happens through Your Maya. You are the primal source who ended the suffering of the helpless elephant Gajendra. Lord Sai, You are the protector of Kali age and You incarnate in every age. You are Krishna with dark complexion and lotus eyes.

title: Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath
lyrics:
Sai Nath Sai Nath Sathya Sai Nath
Gangadhara Hara Samba Sadashiva 
Sai Nath Sathya Sai Nath [ Sai Nath ... ]
meaning: Chant the name of Lord Sathya Sai who is none other than Lord Shiva who is covered in sacred ash and whose head is adorned with the pious river Ganga.

title: Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath Hara
title2: Vibhuti Sundara Sai Nath Hara Hara Mahadeva
lyrics:
Bilva Dala Priya Chandrakaladhara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Vyagrambaradhara Sai Sundara
Hara Hara Mahadeva
Shiva Shiva Sadashiva
meaning: Glory to Lord Shiva, the Lord of Lords, the eternally blissful one who is besmeared with sacred ash. Glory to the one who is worshipped with the Bilva leaf (Leaf of wood apple tree or Bel tree) which He likes. Glory to Lord Shiva who bears the Crescent moon on His head and who wears the Tiger skin.

title: Vibhuti – Sacred Ash Prayer
lyrics:
Paramam Pavithram Baba Vibhuthim
Paramam Vichithram Leela Vibhuthim
Paramartha Ishtartha Moksha Pradanam
Baba Vibhuthim Idham Ashrayami (Sai)
 
* The Vibhuti Mantra was originally sung as a bhajan (devotional song). The 3rd line was composed as 'Paramartha Ishtartha Moksha Pradatham'. Please see video for details.


English version 1
Sacred, Holy and Supreme is Baba’s Vibhuthi
Pouring forth in endless stream His play of Vibhuthi
So auspicious is its might it grants Liberation
Baba’s Vibhuthi its power protects me (Sai)
 






Sacred_Holy_and_Supreme.mp3




English version 2
Sacred Ash, Miraculous, Baba's Creation
Flowing From His Blessed Hand, Holy Creation
Granting Us The Greatest Wealth, God's Divine Protection
Beloved Baba, Grant Us Liberation
 





Sacred_Ash_Miraculous.mp3




Spanish
La Verdad Y El Amor Brotan De Tu Palma
Como el Brillo Del SolIlumina El Alba
Siempre Dando A La Vida, Nuevas Esperanzas
Brindanos Tu Gracia, Dulce Sai Baba


 
This prayer is usually repeated thrice, or until the entire congregation receives the sacred ash.
meaning:
Vibhuti, or Sacred Ash, is distributed at the end of a devotional meeting session. Baba says Vibhuti is a constant reminder of the evanescence of the body, and all material objects, which, ultimately, reduce to ashes. The scriptures say Vibhuti is so named as it endows one with prosperity; Bhasma - "ashes" because it burns away all sins; Bhasitam - "brightened" because it increases one's spiritual splendor; Ksharam - "destruction" since it removes danger; and Raksha - "protector" for it is an armor against the machinations of evil spirits.
- Sathyam Shivam Sundaram, Vol 1, Chapter 9, The Wave of the Hand

title: Vidya Dayini Bhagavathi
lyrics:
Namo Namo Namo Sai Narayani [ Vidya Dayini ... ]
Chinmaya Roopini Naada Swaroopini [ Namo Namo ... ]
meaning: Obeisance to the Goddess who bestows Knowledge and who plays musical instruments (Goddess Saraswathi), the embodiment of sound, energy and Cosmic consciousness.

title: Vidya Dayini Saraswathi
lyrics:
Veda Mata Bhagawathi
Vaagvilasini Veena Vaadini
Vidya Dhari Bhagawathi 
Moukta Haari Bhagawathi
meaning: Salutations to the Goddess Saraswathi, the Mother of the Vedas. She is the Goddess of speech who plays the Veena. Glory to Mother Saraswathi, the source of wisdom, who wears a necklace of pearls.

title: Viene con el Sol en la voz
title2: Viene con el Sol en la voz
lyrics:
Cantando la luz, cantando la luz
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
En el corazon del viento esta
cantando el Amor(2)
Sri Bhagawan Sai Babaji
Sri Bhagawan Sathya Sai Babaji
meaning: Glory to Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba, who came with the Sun in His Voice singing the Light, who is singing Love in the heart of the wind.

title: Vighna Harana Prabhu Paahi Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Parama Dayaghana
Nithya Niranjana Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana
Pashupathi Tanaya Hey Jagavandana
Lambodhara Hey Mooshika Vahana [ Parvathi Nandana ... ]
meaning: Protect us, O elephant-faced Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles, the most compassionate and the ever pure son of Mother Parvathi. O the son of Shiva, who is worshipped by the whole world, the one with a large stomach and the one who has the mouse as the vehicle, we pray to You to remove our fear of worldly existence.

title: Vighna Vinashaka Deva
lyrics:
Suramuni Vanditha Deva
Tribhuvana Palaka Deva Deva [ Vighna Vinashaka ]
Triloka Vanditha Jaya Gana Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva Deva
Pranava Swaroopa Deva
meaning: Salutations to the Lord Ganesha who destroys the obstacles in life and is worshipped by sages and pious. He rules all the three worlds and is worshipped in the three worlds. He is the personification of the primordial sound "OM".

title: Vighna Vinashaka Devadi Deva
lyrics:
Adi Sanathana Deva
Prathama Poojya Gananatha
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Nithya Niranjana
Siddhi Vinayaka Deva
Mangala Dayaka Shambho Manohara [ Prathama Poojya ... ]
meaning: O Lord Ganesha, Lord of the Ganaas (the attendants of Lord Shiva), You are always offered the first prayers in any worship. O Lord of Lords, one who is eternal, ancient and destroyer of obstacles, You annihilate the fear of birth and death. You are the Lord of powers acquired through austerities, blemishless, who bestows auspiciousness and the dear son of Lord Shiva.

title: Vighna Vinashaka Gananatha
lyrics:
Gajanana Hey Gajavadana
Gananatha Gananatha
Pranava Swaroopa Gananatha
Parthi Pureeshwara Gananatha [ Gajanana Hey ... ]
meaning: The elephant faced Lord Ganesha is the leader of ganaas (the attendants of Lord Shiva) and the destroyer of all obstacles. He is the embodiment of primordial sound "Om". He is verily Lord Sai who resides in Parthi.

title: Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka (3)
lyrics:
Amba Bhavani Shiva Shambhu Kumara
Karunya Lavanya Akhilandeshwara
meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles in life, who is the son of Lord Shiva and Parvathi (Amba Bhavani), who is compassionate and beautiful and who is the Lord of the Universe.

title: Vighneshwara Gananatha Gajanana
lyrics:
Parvathi Nandana Shubhanana
Mangala Murthy Sri Ganaraya
Jaya Ganaraya Sri Ganaraya (2)
Ashta (Siddhi) Vinayaka Shubhanana
meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) the son of Parvathi,, having a pleasant and auspicious face, who bestows eight types of blessings. He is also known as Siddhi Vinayaka, the one who fulfills our prayers.

title: Vighneshwara Maha Devadi Deva
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Deva
Pranavakaara Jyothi Swaroopa
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva
Jaya Mangala Kara Deva (3)
meaning: Victory to Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), the Lord of Lords, the destroyer of obstacles in life, the personification of the primordial sound "Om" and the very embodiment of divine light.

title: Vighneshwara Vinayaka
lyrics:
Vishwadhara Namostuthey
Namostuthey Namostuthey [ Vishwadhara ... ]
Suramuni Vanditha Vinayaka
Bhava Bhaya Nasha Vinayaka
Sharanam Sharanam Vinayaka (2)
meaning: Salutations and surrender to Lord Vighneshwara (Ganesha) who sustains the Universe, who is worshipped by pious sages and the one who destroys the fear of this world.

title: Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sadguru Natham
title2: Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram Sadguru Natham Gowri Sutham
lyrics:
Jaya Shiva Nandana Vighneshwaram Pranavanandam Devi Sutham
Siddhi Vinayaka Vighneshwaram Vidya Dayaka Gowri Sutham
Vighneshwaram Bhaja Vighneshwaram
Sharanam Sharanam Devi Sutham
meaning: Sing the praises of the master of obstacles, Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha), son of Shiva and Gowri, the embodiment of "Om" (the primordial sound), one who bestows knowledge and spiritual boons. Let us surrender to the son of Devi.

title: Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram
title2: Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey (2)
lyrics: (Bhajorey) Vighneshwaram Bhajorey Manasa Vighna Haram Bhajorey
meaning: Oh Mind! Sing the praises of Lord Vighneshwara (Lord Ganesha) who removes all obstacles and destroys them.

title: Vina Pusthaka Mala Dharini
lyrics:
Sai Saraswathi Shwetambari
Sayeeshwari Patitha Pavani
Partheeshwari Parameshwari
Vishnu Mohini Lakshmi Narayani
Shiva Shakthi Roopini Sai Narayani [ Sai Saraswathi ... ]
meaning: Glory to Mother Saraswathi, the Goddess of learning and music who is adorned in white (represents purity) and a garland of flowers. She holds the Veena and the books. Lord Sai embodies the Mothers Saraswathi, Lakshmi and Shakthi and is the protector of the meek.

title: Vinati Karoon Main Baar Baar
title2: Vinati Karoon Main Baar Baar Sai
lyrics:
Darshana Do Mujhey Ek Baar Sai [ Vinati Karoon ... ]
Hrudaya Mandir Mey Aao Sai
Lelo Hum Ko Charano Mey Sai
Deejo Hum Ko Charan Tumharey
meaning: O Lord Sai, I plead with You time and again, to give me Darshan at least once and enshrine Yourself in my heart. I prostrate at Your Feet. Please accept me into Your fold.

title: Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
lyrics:
Merey Mana Ki Vinati Suno [ Vinati Suno ... ]
Sab Kuch Aap Ho Sai Ma
Mana Ko Shanthi Do Sai Ma
Terey Bina Aur Koi Nahin Hai
Sharan Mey Lekar Raaha Dikhao Sai
Meri Asha Pooran Karo (Sai) (2) [ Merey Mana ... ]
meaning: Mother Sai, please listen to my heartfelt request. You are my everything; grant me peace of mind. I have none but You; take me in Your refuge; show me the way and fulfill my wishes.

title: Vinati Suno Merey Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Daya Karo Merey Sai Bhagawan
Bhaktha Janon Ke Tum Ho Pran
Deena Dayala Karuna Nidhan
Tribhuvana Pala Sadhu Paritra
meaning: Please listen to my pleadings Oh my Lord Sai, have compassion on me, you are the very life of your devotees, you are the treasure house of compassion showing mercy on the downtrodden, you are the one who sustains the three worlds and the protector of Saints.

title: Vinati Suno Vinati Suno
lyrics:
Vinati Suno Ma Vinati Suno
Ma Vinati Suno
Sankata Harini Santoshi Ma
Sadhu Jana Priya Sai Ma
Sada Ananda Dayini Ma
Sadashiva Priya Sai Ma
Sathya Sai Ma
meaning: O Mother Parvathi, You are very dear to Lord Shiva, You bestow happiness to all, You are very dear to all the Saints. O Mother Santoshi, You are the annihilator of all sufferings. O Mother Sai, who is none other than Mother Parvathi, please listen to my pleadings.

title: Vinayaka Shiva Bala
lyrics:
Sura Muni Vanditha Guna Sheela
Vakratunda Dhara Pranavakara
Lambodhara Gananatha
meaning: Lord Ganesha, son of Lord Shiva, is worshipped by sages and saints. The pot-belled Ganesha with the curved trunk is full of noble qualities, and is the source of all life.

title: Vinayaka Vighna Nashaka
lyrics:
Anatha Rakshaka Ananda Dayaka
Uma Maheshwara Hey Shiva Nandana
meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka, the destroyer of obstacles, protector of the downtrodden, who bestows happiness and who is the son of Goddess Uma (Parvathi's another name) and Lord Shiva.

title: Vinayaka Vinayaka
lyrics:
Yuku Te wo Kiyomeru Vinayaka
Eichi no Hikari Parthi Gajanana
Shinri he Michibiku Gajanana
Seigi wo Mamoru Gajanana
Om no Keshin Gajanana
meaning: Lord Vinayaka, please cleanse these hands. You are the light of our wisdom. Guide us to the truth. Protect the just and righteous. You are the personification of "Om".

title: Vinayaka Vinayaka
lyrics:
Vishwadhara Vinayaka (Hey) [ Vinayaka Vinayaka ... ]
Siddhi Vinayaka Bhava Bhaya Nasha
Suramuni Vanditha Sri Ganesha [ Vishwadhara Vinayaka ... ]
meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha) who gives sustenance to the Universe, who fulfills the wishes of everyone, the one who destroys fear and the one who is worshipped by all sages and noble souls.

title: Vinayaka Vinayaka
lyrics:
Vighna Vinashaka Vinayaka
Gowri Nandana Hey Shiva Nandana
Parvathi Nandana Gajanana
Mooshika Vahana Gajanana
Modaka Hasta Gajanana
meaning: Salutations to Lord Vinayaka (Lord Ganesha), the destroyer of obstacles, the elephant-faced son of Parvathi and Shiva, the one who rides on the mouse and the one who has Modaka (a type of sweet) in His hand.

title: Vishnu Mohini Sai Narayani
lyrics:
Ksheerabdhi Tanaye Sai Narayani [ Vishnu Mohini ... ]
Lakshmi Manorama Kanchanabharini
Kamala Kamini Sai Narayani
Sukha Sampada Sowbhagya Pradayini
meaning: Mother Narayani (Goddess Lakshmi) is the enchanter of Lord Vishnu, born out of the ocean of milk, having a splendorous face, one who loves the Lotus flower, who bestows comfort and prosperity for everyone.

title: Vishnu Satchidananda Venu Gopala Bala
lyrics: Krishna Rama Govinda Hari Hari (3)
meaning: Chant the various names of the Lord Vishnu, namely Rama, Govinda, Hari and the sweet child Krishna holding the flute in His hand, who are all the embodiments of Being (Sath), Awareness (Chith) and Bliss (Ananda).

title: Vishwadhari Shiva Avatari
lyrics:
Sai Shankara Namo Namo [ Vishwadhari Shiva ... ]
Mathura Natha Narayana Hari
Sai Shankara Namo Namo (Sathya) (2)
meaning: Salutations to You O Lord Sai, You are the very incarnation of Lord Shiva and Lord Narayana of Mathura (Krishna).

title: Vishwamayi Shiva Shakthimayi
lyrics:
Parama Dayamayi Premamayi [ Vishwamayi Shiva ... ]
Vedamayi Hey Brahmamayi
Premamayi Hey Gnanamayi
Jyothi Swaroopini Jaganmayi
meaning: Glory to Mother Sai, the one who is full of compassion, love and goodness and the embodiment of Veda, Speech and Sound (Brahma) and the effulgence pervading the whole world.

title: Vishwanathashtakam
lyrics:
Gauree Nirantara Vibhushita Vaamabhaagam
Naaraayana Priyamananga MaDhaapahaaram
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

2. Vaachaama Gochara Maneka Guna Swaroopam
Vaageesha Vishnu Surasevita Paada Peetham
Vaamena Vigraha Varena Kalatra Vantam
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

3. Bhootaadhipam Bhujaga Bhooshana Bhooshitaangam
Vyaaghraa Jinaam Bharadharam Jatilam Trinetram
Paashaan Kushaabhaya Varaprada Shoolapaanim
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

4. Sheetaam Sushobhita KireeTa Viraaja Maanam
Phaaleshanaa Nala Vishoshita Panchabhaanam
Naagaadhipaa Rachita Bhaasura Karna Pooram
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

5. Panchaananam Durita Matta Madanga Jaanaam
Naagaantakam Danuja Pungava Pannagaanaam
Daavaanalam Marana Shoka JaraaTa Veenaam
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

6. Tejomayam Saguna Nirgunam Adviteeyam
Aananda Kandam-aparaajitam Aprameyam
Naagaatmagam Sakala Nishkalam-aatmaroopam
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

7. Aashaam Vihaaya Parihrutya Parasya Nindaam
Paaperatim Cha Sunivaarya Manah Samaadhau
Aadaaya Hrudkamala Madhyagatam Paresham
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

8. Raagaadi Dosha Rahitam Svajanaanu Raagam
Vairaagya Shaanti Nilayam Girijaa Sahaayam
Maadhurya Dhairya Subhagam Garalaa Bhiraamam
Vaaraanasee Purapatim Bhaja Vishwanaatham

9. Vaaraanasee Purapateh Sthavanam Shivasya
Vyaakhyaatam AshTagamidam PaTathe Manushya
Vidyaam Shriyam Vipula Soukhyam-anantha Keertim
Sampraapya Dehavilaye Labhate Cha Moksham

10. Vishwanaathaashtakam Idam Punyam 
Yah PaThet Shiva Sannidhau 
Shiva Loka Mavaapnoti Shivena Saha Modathe
meaning:
1. Adore Shiva, Lord of the city of Varanasi, Lord of the world whose tress-locks are held together by the beautiful waves of Ganga Whose left side is adorned continuously by the presence of Gauri, who is dear to Narayana and, who absolves the pride of Kamadeva (Ananga).

2. Shiva is beyond the scope of the words, has uncountable qualitative forms and manifestations, whose lotus-feet is revered by Brahma Vishnu and the demi-gods, and who has His consort on the left side of His own form Ardhanarisvara.

3. Shiva is the Lord of the ghosts, has snakes as ornaments on various parts of the body, has a skin of the tiger as a cloth, has tress for locks, has three eyes, holds a trident and, provides respite from the fear of the rope and the whip (of Yama).

4. Shiva has a diamond adorned by dewdrops on His forehead, has destroyed the five arrows of Kamadeva by emanating fire from His forehead, and has earrings are made by the king of snakes (Naga).

5. Shiva has five faces, is like a lion for the intoxicated and proud persons, is like the destroyer of snake (mighty demons).

6. Shiva is filled with resplendence, is both formed and formless, is unprecedented, is the source of all happiness, is undefeated and immeasurable, is surrounded by snakes, is indivisible (Brahma) and is matched only by Himself.

7. Leaving behind desires, destroying the fretful complains about others and the indulgence in sins, restraining the mind in meditation, bringing Paresh (Shiva) to the middle of lotus-like mind, adore Him Who is the Lord of the city of Varanasi and Who is the Lord of the world.

8. Shiva is beyond qualities, is the happiness of those belonging to Him, is the abode of dispassion and peace, is the companion of Girija, is enticing sweet and patient, and has consumed poison to protect creation.

9. Devotees who study this popular eight-canto eulogy on Shiva the ruler of Varanasi attain liberation, knowledge, wealth, friends, and immeasurable glory.

10. Those who study this eight-canto eulogy on Vishwanatha in the proximity of Shiva (in Varanasi) achieve the world of Shiva and then they rejoice with Him.

title: Vittala Bhajo Sai Vittala Bhajo
lyrics:
Pandari Natha Panduranga Vittala Bhajo
Parthi Vasa Sai Deva Vittala Bhajo
meaning: Sing the glory of the Lord Vittala, also known as Panduranga, the Lord of Pandharpur and who is none other than Lord Sai residing in Parthi.

title: Vittala Hari Vittala
lyrics:
Panduranga (Purandara) Vittaley Hari Narayana
Hari Narayana Bhajo Narayana
Sai Narayana Sathya Narayana
meaning: Sing the glory of Hari Vittala, also known as Panduranga Vittala, Purandara Vittala, Sai Narayana and Sathya Narayana.

title: Vittala Narayana
lyrics:
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Vittala ... ]
Madhusudhana Narayana
Hey Shesha Shayana Narayana
Narayana (Hari) Sai Narayana (2)

Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala (2)
Vittala Vittala Parthi Ranga Vittala
Vittala Vittala Sai Ranga Vittala
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Vittala who is verily Lord Narayana reclining on Adi Sesha (the celestial Snake). He is also Madhusudhana (Krishna) and Lord Sai who resides in Parthi.

title: Vittala Rakumayi Vittobha Rakumayi
lyrics:
Shirdi Maajhey Pandarpura Sai Maajhey Rakumayi
Pundalika Varada Panduranga Hari Vittala
meaning: Sing the praises of Mother Rakumayi and Her consort Lord Vittala, of Shirdi and Pandharpur, the one who conferred boons on His devotee Pundalika.

title: Vittala Vittala Hari Vittala
lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Panduranga Vittala Vittala Vittala Naam
Vittala Vittala Naama Bhajo Hari Vittala
Vittala Vittala Hari (Sai) Vittala
meaning: Chant the name and sing the glory of Lord Panduranga Vittala and Lord Sai who is verily Lord Vittala.

title: Vittala Vittala Narayana
lyrics:
Panduranga Vittala Narayana
Sri Ranganatha Narayana [ Vittala Vittala ... ]
Paramesha Narayana
Paramatma Narayana
Jaya Parthi Vasa Narayana
Narayana Hari (Sai) Narayana
meaning: Victory to Lord Panduranga Vittala who is verily Lord Narayana. He is the Supreme Lord and the highest Soul. He is the one who resides at Parthi as Lord Sai.

title: Vittala Vittala Panduranga Vittala
lyrics:
Govinda Gopala Hari Narayana ( Sai )
Narayana Hari Narayana
Narayana Sai Narayana [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
Parthi Pureesha Prashanthi Vasa Panduranga Vittala (2) [ Govinda Gopala ... ]
meaning: Chant the different names of the Lord Narayana - Panduranga Vittala, Govinda, Gopala and Hari. He is none other than Lord Sai whose abode is at Prashanthi Nilayam in Parthi.

title: Vittala Vittala Sai Vittala
lyrics:
Vittala Vittala Utaou Kami no Mina
Panduranga Vittaley Vittala Vittala Sai
Vittala Vittala Utaou Kami no Mina
Vittala Vittala Sai Vittala
meaning: Sing the beautiful name of Lord Vittala.

title: Vitthala Vitthala Ranga Hey Ranga
lyrics:
Vitthala Hey Rakumayi Prabhuji Vithoba Hey Balihaari
Vitthala Hey Sathya Sai [ Vitthala Vitthala Ranga ... ]
Vitthala Hey Vanamali Prabhuji Vithoba Hey Giridhari 
Vitthala Sai Murari 
Vitthala Hey Sathya Sai 

Vitthala Vitthala Ranga Hey Ranga
meaning: Worship Lord Vitthala who is also praised as Vithoba and Ranga. The lord of Rakumayi (Rukmini), He invests divine energy in maintaining the garden of our hearts. As the slayer of demons (like Mura), He lovingly bestows His protection on us. He is verily our Lord Sathya Sai.

title: Vitthala Vitthala Vitthala Sai Narayana
lyrics:
Hey Panduranga Parthi Vasa Vitthala Sai Narayana [ Vitthala Vitthala ... ]
Ghana Shyama Nanda Gopala
Muralidhara Braj Bala
Mana Mohana Nandalala
Vitthala Sai Narayana

Vitthala Vitthala Narayana (3)
Vitthala Sai Narayana
meaning: Praise be to Lord Vitthala, who is none other than our Sai Narayana. The Lord who resides in Pandharpur, has come to us as Sai, the Lord of Puttaparthi. He frolics among the cowherds, enchanting all with the melody of His flute.

title: Vittobha Vittala Panduranga
lyrics:
Panduranga Hari Panduranga [ Vittobha Vittala ... ]
Narahari Ranga Ranga Panduranga
Purandara Ranga Panduranga [ Panduranga Hari ... ]
meaning: Sing the glory of Lord Panduranga, also known as Vittobha and Vittala, Narahari Ranga, Purandara Ranga and several other names.

title: Vol overgave
title2: Vol overgave kniel ik aan uw voeten neer
lyrics:
In mijn levensboot ben ik dan veilig Heer
Ere zij U God, koning van mijn hart
(Sathya) Sai Baba, alle glorie in aan U
Om ik buig voor Shiva, Om ik buig voor Shiva, Om ik buig voor Shivaya Shiva ik buig voor U
U doet mijn hart verwarmen, U doet mijn hart verwarmen, U doet mijn hart verwarmen, Heer Shiva dit komt door U
Baba ik zing uw Naam, Baba ik zing uw Naam, Baba ik zing uw Naam, ik zing uw Naam en buig voor U
meaning: Full of surrender I bow to Your Feet; In my lifeboat, there I am, save my Lord; Praise be to Thee, king of my heart; (Sathya) Sai Baba, all glory be to Thee; Om I bow to Shiva, Shiva I bow to Thee; You warm my heart, Lord Shiva, You are making that happen; Baba I sing Your name, I sing Your name, I bow to You.

title: Wahamba Nathi
lyrics:
Wahamba nathi, oh wahamba nathi 
Oh wahamba nathi, siyabonga
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga ngonyama yezulu
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga
Wahamba nathi, oh wahamba nathi 
Oh wahamba nathi, siyabonga 
NDEBELE
Siyathokoza Jesu, Siyathokoza kakaramba 
Siyathokoza Jesu, Siyathokoza 
SOTHO
Wa tsamaya le rona, oh wa tsamaya le rona 
Oh wa tsamaya le rona, re a boka 
Re a boka jesu, re a boka tlatlamathjolo
Re a boka jesu, re ya boka
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga ngonyama yezulu 
Siyabonga Jesu, Siyabonga
meaning: You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, mighty Go, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. You walked with us, oh You walked with us, oh You walked with us, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You. We thank You Jesus, Lion of heaven, we thank You Jesus, we thank You.

title: Wake Up Now My Children
title2: Wake Up Now My Children Wherever You Are
lyrics:
Wake Up Now My Children And See Who You Are
It Is Time To Wake Up And You Have Slept For So Long
It Is Time To Wake Up Now And Sing Me A/Your Song (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram
It Is Time To Wake Up Now And Sing Me A Song
A New Day Is Dawning, A New Day Is Here
Give Up All Your Worries, Give Up All Your Fears
That Is Why I Have Awakened You The reason I came
Surrender Your Troubles And Sing Out My Name (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Surrender Your Troubles And Sing Out My Name
Open Your Eyes Now And See The Light
Open Your Eyes Now The End Is In Sight
Come Now My Children And Set Yourselves Free
Come Now My Children And Merge Into Me (2)
Sai Ram Sai Ram
Come Now My Children And Merge In To Me

title: Walk with me
lyrics:
And Hold my hand (2x)
As we unite
And make a stand (2x)
We’ll rise (3x)
Together we will rise
We will make a stand for humanity
I’m in charge
You’re in charge
We are all in charge of change
It's time to make a stand
Convert the pain with love
Fellow brothers
Fellow sisters
Share the love
Let peace prevail
We are strong (3x)
Together we are strong
Let us make, love our power
Look around the world
Preserve its beauty
Do not be blinded
By selfish wants
Preserve the kindness (2x)
The kindness of Mother Nature
Don’t stop, Don’t wait
It takes only one
You can be that one
To start the chain reaction
To be good, see good, do good
Be the change (2x)

title: Walk With The Lord
title2: Walk with the Lord, Open your heart, breathe in the light,
lyrics:
and let go of the darkness,
And peace will fill the world,
when love has filled our hearts,
Our song will reach the sky,
When we walk hand in hand, and let go of the darkness.

title: Warera no Sai Bhagawan
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Bhagawan
Shikou no Ai no Kami (Sai) [ Warera no ... ]
Shinri no Keshin Sai Rama
Puttaparthi ni Owasu Sai Bhagawan
Jai Sai Ram, Jai Sai Ram
Puttaparthi ni Owasu Sai Bhagawan
Shikou no Ai no Kami (Sai)
meaning: Salutations to our Lord Sai who resides in Puttaparthi and embodies truth and exudes supreme love.

title: Warera no Yuku Te wo
title2: Warera no Yuku Te wo Terasu
lyrics:
Yuuki to Kibou no Hikari
Parthi Gajanana
Kanki wo Sazukeru
(Putta) Parthi Gajanana
Michibiki Tamae
Sathya Sai Gajanana
meaning: Lord Gajanana (Ganesha), You guide our path with Your shining light of courage and hope, and You bring us great joy.

title: Warera wo Michibiku Guru Sai
title2: Warera wo Michibiku Guru Sai Baba, Tataeyou Sai Ram
lyrics:
Hara Hara Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva, Tataeyou Sai Ram
Shiva Shiva Shiva Shiva Sadashiva Tateyou Sai Ram
meaning: Sing praise to Lord Shiva who guides us. Sing the praise of Divine Teacher Sai who is verily Lord Shiva.

title: Watashi tachi no Chikyuu Kurayami
title2: Watashi tachi no Chikyuu Kurayami ni Ukabu
lyrics:
Aoku Kagayaku Hoshi Towa ni Ukabu
Umi to Riku, Kawa wa Nagare
Tatta Hitotsu no Hahanaru Hoshi
Inori De Tsutsu mou
Yasashiku Tsutsu mou
meaning: Our planet Earth is suspended in the darkness, shining eternally blue. The water of the sea and the rivers continue to flow as one within Mother Earth. Our prayers and kindness envelope and protect this beautiful planet.

title: Watashi wo Mamori Michibiku Kami
title2: Watashi wo Mamori Michibiku Kami yo Sai Baba yo
lyrics:
Tomadoi Mayou Watashi no Kokoro no Sasae
Anata ni Meguri Aeta Yorokobi wo
Ookina Ai ni Kaeta Sasagemasu
Arigatou Sai Baba, Arigatou Kokoro kara
Subete no Ai wa Hitotsu, Anata to Hitotsu
meaning: Lord Sai Baba, You protect and guide us. When we have lost our way, You support our hearts. When I meet You, it brings me supreme joy. I devote myself to the grand love You have given us. Thank You Sai Baba from the bottom of my heart. All love is one, and everything is one with You.

title: Watashi wo Michibiku Guru Sai
title2: Watashi wo Michibiku Guru Sai, Idaina Kami Sai Baba
lyrics:
Uchuu no Subete no Chikara no Kami yo
Anata to Tomo ni Arita mou
meaning: Magnificent Sai Baba, You are the lord who guides us. Everything in the universe is the power of God. I exist to be together with You.

title: Watashi wo Michibiku Shinri no
title2: Watashi wo Michibiku Shinri no Hikari
lyrics:
Watashi wo Michibiku Eichi no Hikari
Watashi wo Michibiku Towa no Hikari
Sore wa Ai
Sore wa Kami
Sore wa Sai
meaning: That which guides me is the light of truth, the light of wisdom, and the light of eternity. This is the path to God and Love.

title: Watashi wo Toraete Hanasanaide Kudasai
lyrics:
Anata ga Watashi ni Katarikakeru Toki
Itsumo Sono Koe ga Kikoeru youni
Sai Anata dake wo Mitsumete Itai
Sai Baba Sai Ram Watashi no Kami
Sai Baba Sai Ram Subete no Kami
meaning: Lord Sai, please grab hold of me and don't let go. You speak to me so that I may always hear that beautiful voice. Sai, I want to only be looking at You, my loving Lord of all.

title: We Are Blessed

Hail To All These Divine Teachers

We are the love that lives inside

We are the love that lives inside

From the Peace, the Joy and the Love

Sathya Sai

Sathya Sai

title2: We saw the love in Your eyes

Although no words were spoken
We knew our love would be forever

Sri Sathya Sai (4x)

title: We sing Your song Sathya Sai
title2: We sing Your song Sathya Sai
lyrics:

 Give me protection Give me devotion

title: We Three Kings
title2: We Three Kings Of Orient Are
lyrics:
Bearing Gifts We Traverse Afar.
Field And Fountain, Moor And Mountain,
Following Yonder Star.

O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.

Born A King On Bethlehem's Plain,
Gold I Bring To Crown Him Again,
King Forever, Ceasing Never
Over Us All To Reign.

Frankincense to offer have I;
Incense owns a Deity nigh;
Prayer and praising, all men raising,
Worship Him God Most High.

Myrrh Is Mine: It's Bitter Perfume
Breaths A Life Of Gathering Gloom.
Sorrowing, Sighing, Bleeding Dying,
Sealed In The Stone-cold Tomb.

O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.

Glorious Now Behold Him Arise,
King And God And Sacrifice.
Alleluia, Alleluia!

Sounds Through The Earth And Skies.
O Star Of Wonder, Star Of Night,
Star With Royal Beauty Bright,
Westward Leading, Still Proceeding,
Guide Us To Thy Perfect Light.

title2: When my heart was full of fear and sorrow

The path is long, so cold and lonesome

My Sai My precious Sai
My Sai O Sathya Sai
My Sai My precious Sai

We will always belong to You dearest Sai [ My Sai ... ]

title2: Where are You, oh my Krishna
lyrics:
Whither have You gone, oh my Krishna
Have You no pity, Krishna, my Krishna

Where are You, oh my Krishna
Whither have You gone, oh my Krishna
Have You no pity, Krishna, Sai Krishna

If You were a tree growing upwards
I would cling to You like a creeper
If You were a blossoming flower
I would hover over You like a bee [ Where are You ... Sai Krishna ] 

If You were the boundless sky
I would sit in You like a star

I would merge in You like a wave [ Where are you ... my Krishna ]
[ Where are you ... Sai Krishna ]

Krishna, Sai Krishna

title: Wherever There Is Baba

(Refrain, unison)
I'll keep Him in my heart,
I'll keep Him in my soul.

Wherever there is Baba, there is a white light,
Wherever there is Baba, things will be alright.

(Refrain, unison)
I'll keep Him in my heart,
I'll keep Him in my soul.
I'll keep Him in my heart,
I'll keep Him in my soul.

title: Whispering Softly

lyrics:
What is it that I do hear, Om Sai Ram my Lord
Traveling deep within my soul,  Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
I discover my true goal, Om Sai Ram my Lord
God residing in my heart, Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram
Never shall we be apart, Om Sai Ram my Lord
 
 Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram,  Om Sai Ram, Om Sai Ram (4x)

title: Whispering wind
title2: Whispering wind, whispering wind…talk to me
lyrics:
Tell me of my Father and His love for me
Whispering wind, whispering wind…talk to me
Tell me of Sai Baba and His love for me

I picked up a seashell by the ocean, put it to my ear
It said, “love, love, love, love, love everyone”
Swami said, “love, love, love, love, love everyone”

Once I was a drop out of the ocean, all alone
I closed my eyes and fell back in, again at home
Love, love, love, love, love, love everyone (2x)

Walking in the city in a crowd, who am I?
The light broke into my mind, God am I!
Love, love, love, love, love, love everyone (2x)
[ Whispering wind ... Sai Baba and His love for me ]

Love, love, love, love, love, love everyone
Swami said, “love, love, love, love, love, love everyone”
Love, love, love, love, love, Love everyone (2x)

title: Who am I?
title2: Who am I? Who's behind these eyes?
lyrics:
If I am not this body, who am I?
 Who am I? Who's the one inside?
 If I am not my mind, then who am I?
 The message is: to look within ourselves, for
 truth to be revealed. We ask, we search, we pray
 Who am I? Who's the I inside? If I am not my feelings, who am I?
 Behind each thought, there always is the I;
 if I am not my thoughts, than who am I?
 The message is: to look within ourselves, for truth to be revealed.
 We ask, Where does this 'I' come from? (3X)
 Who am I? Who's behind my mind? If I am not my ego, who am I?
 Beyond this 'I', who projects the I?
 The answer comes by asking, Who am 'I'?
 We seek the source from which the mind springs.
 We ask, we search, we pray. (2X)
 But then it's not by doing, but only by being, that
 the final discovery is made.
 I Am God, I am pure Light inside.
 And I am Sathya Sai and He is I.
 I am you, truly you are I.
 And you and I and Sai are one inside.

title2: Who can still the stirring of a soul
lyrics:
That longs for something more
 Only You my gentle Baba
 Only You my Lord
 Who replies to the voice I hear inside
 That cries out 'who am I'
 Only You all knowing Baba
 Only You Sathya Sai
 All my life I've spent in searching
 Reaching for a star
 My journey ends where I began it
 Here within my heart
 Who can turn illusion into truth
 Desire to devotion
 Only You my loving Baba
 You're the only one
 Only You my loving Baba
 You and I are one
