 Sai Baba says God is Everything
 Sai Baba says God is Om
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Righteousness
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Eternal Om
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Truth and Love
 Who is Sai Baba? He is Everything
 (Repeat Chorus)

title: Who Is the Lord Of The Universe
title2: Who Is The Lord Of The Universe
lyrics:
He Is The Lord Of The Self
Open Your Eyes And Realize The Lord Is Residing Within You
Dive Deeper And Deeper Inside
Fill Your Heart With His Love's Pure Light (2x, to Dive...)
Master Your Senses, Give Up Pretenses
Know That Forever The Lord And You Are One
Know That Forever The Lord And I Are One

title: Who is the man all clothed in red
title2: Who is the man all clothed in red
lyrics:
With a dome of hair upon His head?
His love extends as far as can be seen
Who is that man loving me?

Whoa, my Lord, Whoa, my Lord

Who is the man feeding the poor
Teaching us there’s something more?
He says, “service to people in need
will open our hearts to ecstasy”

Whoa, my Lord, Whoa, my Lord

Who is the man who dries our tears
And takes away all our fear?
Who is the man who always gives
Teaching us by how He lives?

Whoa, Sathya Sai, Whoa, Sathya Sai

Who is He who raises His hand
And showers blessings on all of man?
He says, “the new world has come
And there’s only one religion, the religion of love”

Whoa, Sathya Sai, Whoa, Sathya Sai

Who is He who raises His hand
And showers blessings on all of man?
He says, “the new world has come
There’s only one religion, the religion of love”

Whoa, Sathya Sai, Whoa, Sathya Sai
Whoa, sweet, sweet Sathya Sai

title: Why Fear When I am Here
title2: Why Fear When I Am Here?
lyrics:
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]

All I Want Is Your Love My Child, All I Want Is Your Faith
All I Want Is Your Love In God, No Matter What Your Faith
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]

Krishna, Buddha, Jesus, Mohammed All Came To This Land
All Of Them Brought The Message Of Love, Love Your Fellow Man
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord [ Why Fear ... ]

The Light You See In The Dark Of Night Is That Of God In Man
Find The Light That Is In Your Heart And Reach The Promised Land
So Says Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, Sathya Sai Baba, My Lord

title: Wisdom's Delight
lyrics:
Flower of wisdom's delight,
Free me from peril and fear,
Let my desires melt at Your feet.
What say You, oh Lord?
Can it be the time to seek,
The truth and blessings You endow?
The soul is yearning to fly (2x)
Into Your Divine heart,
Om, Lord, Sri Sathya Sai.

title: With a heart that’s full of love
title2: With a heart that's full of love, repeat the name of Ram,
lyrics:
Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Sai Rama Rama Ram
 Great is the power of the Name, burning our sin and sorrow
 Helping us live without the fear of what may happen tomorrow
 Saying the Name will bring eternal peace and happiness
 Comforting when we need support, it helps in times of distress
 Saying the Name will give protection; worries and doubts will cease
 When we call, wherever we are, the Name will give us peace
 Rama's Name is Father and Mother, it is our dearest friend
 We have no need of any other, on Ram we can depend
 Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Rama Rama Ram, Sai Rama Rama Ram

title: With Your flute You enchant
title2: With Your flute You enchant all who hear You
lyrics:
Ever after they long to be near You
Dance, O dance on, O sweet little Krishna
Little Krishna, dearest Krishna
Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna
You captured the hearts of the Gopas and Gopis
You're here once again charming all Your devotees
Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna
Sai Krishna, Sai Krishna
Dance, O dance on, O sweet Sai Krishna

title: Without Singing To The Lord
title2: Without Singing To The Lord There's No Peace Or Happiness
lyrics:
Without Praising His Name There's No Feeling Of Bliss
Without Love And Devotion We Never Will Be Free
Without Service To Him No Salvation Can There Be [ Without Singing ... ]
We Find Union With Him When Our Minds Are At Rest
The Best Wisdom Is Seeing The Lord Everywhere
The Most Righteous Of Deeds Shows Compassion And Care
There Is No One As Near And As Dear As The Lord
He Is Present In All And In All Can Be Adored
alt_lyrics:
Without Singing To The Lord There's No Peace Or Happiness
Without Chanting His Name There's No Feeling Of Bliss
Without Love And Devotion We Never Will Be Free
Without Serving Mankind No Salvation Can There Be [ Without Singing ... ]
We Find Union With Him When Our Minds Are At Rest
The Best Wisdom Is Seeing The Lord Everywhere
The Most Righteous Of Deeds Shows Compassion And Care
There Is No One As Near And As Dear As The Lord
He Is Present In All And In All Can Be Adored

title: Without Thee, Sai, there is no one
title2: Without Thee, Sai, there is no one,
lyrics:
Come, O Lord of my heart, Sai
 Come, O Lord of my heart, O Sai Ram, come, O Lord of my heart
 O beautiful Sai, don't disappoint me
 Beloved Sai, don't ever leave me
 Outside Your door I'm standing and waiting (2X)
 Hear the cry of my soul, O Sai Ram, hear the cry of my soul

title: Work Together
title2: If we can work together, in peace and harmony,

title: Worship In Your Mind The Feet Of The Guru
title2: Worship in your mind the Feet of the Guru
lyrics:
For crossing the ocean of life is hard to do
Remover of all darkness, praise to Thee
Shiva Sai, Lord of Light, Shiva Sai
Praise to You, Shiva, Praise to You, Shiva,
Praise to You, Shiva
You light the pathway Home
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
Lord of the Mountain, Shiva,
You light the pathway Home
You are Om, Baba, You are Om, Baba,
You are Om, Baba, You are the Form of Om

title: Worship the feet of Sai Baba
title2: Worship the feet of Sai Baba, Worship the feet of the Lord
lyrics:
Reach for the love everlasting, Rise to the Love of Lord Sai
 Worship the feet of Sai Baba, Worship the feet of the Lord
 Look at the face of Lord God in the form of Avataar
 He is here to save our souls, pray to the Lord Sai Ram

title: Worshipping In Your Mind At The Guru’s Feet
title2: Worshipping in your mind at the Guru's Feet
lyrics:
Gives you the blessing to make your life complete
Banisher of darkness, praise to You
Sathya Sai, our Lord ever true
Praise to Shiva, Praise to Shiva, Praise to Shiva
Sai Shiva, praise to You
Lord of Protection, Lord of Protection, Lord of
Protection, Lord Sai, praise to You
You are Om, Baba, You are Om, Baba, You are
Om, Baba, You are the Form of Om

title: Wouldn’t it be nice
lyrics:
Doing only good
To practice what we preach
Each and every day
Sathya, Dharma, Prema
Shanthi and Ahimsa
With the Lord's Divine Love
To help us on our way
Hindu, Buddhist, Sikh and Jain
Christian, Jew or Muslim
You'll get there just the same
Wouldn't it be nice
Doing what is right
To Love our fellow man
And help in any way
Yellow, black or white
We're all equal in His sight
With our Lord's Divine Love
To help us on our way
Prophets and sages
From beginning of time
Have come down to teach us
That we are all entwined
How blessed this human race
To be showered with His Grace
Because our Divine Lord
Is here on Earth today
How blessed this human race
To be showered with His Grace
Because our Divine Lord is
With us all the way!

title: Yadava Kula Deepa Hey Nandalala
lyrics:
Hey Nandalala Sai Gopala [ Yadava Kula ... ]
Trayee Brindavana Shyama (Sai) Gopala
Sri Madhusudhana Sai Gopala
Jaya Muralidhara Hey Vraja Bala
meaning: O Lord Gopala (Krishna), You are the light of Yadu Dynasty, You are the one who annihilated the demon Madhu. With the Flute, You played about in Brindavana. You are verily Lord Sai of Trayee Brindavan. Victory to Thee, O Lord.

title: Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari
title2: Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
lyrics:
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Krishna
alt_lyrics:
Yadu Kula Nandana Sri Hari Madhava Govinda Gopala Krishna Krishna
Madhava Murali Sri Madhusudhana Mohana Radhey Krishna Krishna
Krishna Krishna Radha Krishna
Krishna Krishna Sai Krishna Krishna
meaning: O Lord Krishna of the Yadava clan, You are also known by different names as Madhava, Govinda, Gopala, Madhusudhana and Mohana. You are adored by Radha.

title: Yadu Nanda Ananda Nanda Gopala
lyrics:
Radhey Radhey Govinda Radhey Gopala
Hari Anandamaya Sai Gopala (2)
Radha Lola Ananda Nanda Gopala [ Radhey Radhey ... ]

Radhey Radhey Radhey Radhey (2) [ Radha Lola ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Krishna, the blissful child of the Yadu dynasty, the beloved of Radha. Glory to Lord Sai who is the embodiment of bliss and is verily Krishna, the incarnation of Hari (Vishnu).

title: Yadu Nandana Gopala
lyrics:
Jaya Brindavana Lola
Jaya Murali Gaana Vilola
Gopala Gopala Sai Gopala
meaning: Chant the name of Sai Gopala, the son of Yadu dynasty, who moved around in Brindavan and who is enchanted by the sound of Flute He plays.

title: Yadu Nandana Hey Ghana Shyam
lyrics:
Brindavana Sanchari Shyam [ Yadu Nandana ... ]
Mora Mukuta Peetambara Dhari
Bansi Mohana Shyam
Maakhan Chora Yashoda Ke Natkat
Devaki Nandana Shyam (2)
meaning: Salutations to Lord Krishna, the dark-hued son of Yadu dynasty who strolls in Brindavan, wearing peacock feathers in His crown, dressed in yellow silk, who is fond of playing the Flute, who steals butter from the house of Gopikas and the darling son of mother Yashoda and Devaki.

title: Yadu Nandana Shyama Murari
title2: Yadu Nandana Shyama Murari Hey Radha Kunja Vihari
lyrics:
Madhusudhana Mana Mohana
Vande Keshavam (Madhavam) [ Yadu Nandana ... ]
Jaya Murali Gaana Vilola 
Jaya Radhey Shyama Gopala
Nanda Nandana Shyamala Vadana [ Vande Keshavam ... ]
Kamala Nayana Peetamabara Dhari
Chakra Sudharshana Bhava Bhaya Haari
Mana Mohana Govardhana Dhari [ Vande Keshavam ... ]

title: Yadu Nandana Yashoda Bala
lyrics:
Madhava Keshava [ Yadu Nandana ... ]
Mathura Natha Mama Sai Natha
Mandara Giridhara Madhusudhana Hey
meaning: Glory be to You, Oh Lord Krishna, the son of Yadu dynasty, the son of Yashoda, You are the Lord Madhava and Keshava, the one who held aloft the hillock Mandara, You are the destroyer of the demon Madhu.

title: Yamuna Teera Vihari Brindavana Sanchari
lyrics:
Govardhana Giridhari Gopala Krishna Murari
Chithravathi Teera Vihari Chinni Krishna Murari [ Govardhana Giridhari ... ]
Prema Hrudaya Sanchari Parthi Puri Sri Sai [ Govardhana Giridhari ... ]
meaning: Lord Krishna moves about in Brindavan and in the hearts of devotees filled with divine love and also on the banks of river Yamuna. The cute little Krishna who lifted the hillock Govardhana with his little finger, is the Sai of Parthi on the banks of the river Chitravathi.

title: Yashoda Bala Nanda Gopala
lyrics:
Gokula Bala Gopala Bala [ Yashoda Bala ... ]
Yaduvara Giridhara Krishna Gopala
Jaya Jaya Meera Prabhu Nandalala
meaning: Oh son of Nanda born of Yadu clan who held aloft the hillock Govardhana, who moves about in Gokula, Victory to you Oh Lord of devotee Meera.

title: Yasni svet garit v’dushe,
lyrics:
eto thi prishol ka mne,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
Mir sagrel svayim teplom,
nam atkril duhovne dom,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
Y pafsyudu na puti
del blagyh tvayih slidi,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
Eto hramov kupola,
eto nebo y zimlya,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
Thi prihodish k’nam va snah
y Iisus nash y Alah,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
Darish vsyem lyubov’ svayu,
dlya tebya syertsa payut,
gaspoyt’ Sai Baba
meaning:
The bright light burns in my soul, it's You who has come to me, Lord Sai Baba. You warmed up the world
with Your Love and opened to us the house of spirituality, Lord Sai Baba.
And everywhere along Your path there are footprints of Your noble deeds, Lord Sai Baba. It’s the cupolas
of the Temples, it’s the sky and the Earth, The Lord Sai Baba.
You come to us in our dreams, You are our Jesus and Allah, The Lord Sai Baba. You give Your Love to
everyone, the hearts are singing for You, The Lord Sai Baba.

title: Yesu Masiha Sarva Loka Nayaka
lyrics:
Allah Ho Akbar Ilahi Sathya Sai Mahadeva
Sai Shirdi Sai Sathya Sai Jagannatha
Zohrashtra Buddha Mahavir Sathya Sai Mahadeva
meaning: Lord Sathya Sai, the master of the entire world and of all faiths, responds to all names such as Yesu Masiha, Allah, Zohrashtra, Buddha and Mahavir.

title: YO QUIERO CANTAR A SHIRDI
title2: Yo Quiero Cantar A Shirdi Sai Baba
lyrics:
Yo Quiero Cantar A Sathya Sai Baba
Yo Quiero Cantar A Prema Sai Baba
Te Amo Señor Te Amo Señor
Porque Eres Amor Que Ha Llegado A Mi Vida
Porque Eres La Paz Que Colma Mi Alma
Porque Eres Bondad Que llena Mis Días
Te Amo Señor Te Amo Señor
meaning: I want to sing Shirdi Sai Baba; I want to sing Sathya Sai Baba; I want to sing Prema Sai Baba; I love You Lord because You are the Love that has come to my life; You are the Peace that colors my soul; You are the goodness that fills my days; I Love You Lord!

title: Yoake wo Iwau Parthi no
title2: Yoake wo Iwau Parthi no Chi ni
lyrics:
Furi Sosogareru Darshan no Ai
Kokoro no Uchi ni Ai no Mau
Fushigi Naru Yorokobi yo
Oh Baba Ai Naru Kami
Subete ni Yadoru Shin Naru Chikara
Oh Baba Ai Naru Sai
Mezame Ataeru Onchou yo
meaning: At dawn, we celebrate at Parthi. The love of Darshan (divine vision) rains down incessantly. The love within my heart flutters about. The joy is delightful. Oh Baba, You are the God of Love. You dwell in everything with Your true power. Oh Sai Baba, You are love itself. You bless us with Your divine grace.

title: Yogeshwara Sathya Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Parthipurisha Pavana
Patitodhara Sai Ram
Amrutha Roopa Ananda Daata
Eshwari Nandana Sai Ram
Jagadodhara Sai Ram
Sri Sathya Sai Swagatham
meaning: Welcome Lord Sai, master of the Saints, holy Lord of the Parthi and son of the Mother Eswaramma. You are the uplifter of the weak, personification of the Eternal who grants bliss and protects the Universe.

title: You Are Alive In Our Hearts
title2: You Are Alive In Our Hearts
lyrics:
Sri Sathya Sai Baba
You are alive in our hearts
You are there to give us comfort
When we come to You in prayer
 
Make us worthy of Your guidance
Your grace, Your blessings, and Your truth
You will always be our refuge
When we give our all to You
 
Sri Sathya Sai Baba
We sing Your name up high
Sri Sathya Sai Baba
You live always in our hearts

title: You are Everything
title2: You are the rhythm in the holy rain
lyrics:
You are the song in the rolling sea
You are the whisper in the holy cave
You are everything to me Lord (2x)

It's gentle music inside my heart
Sai I can feel you there
And the celebration fills the air
You are everything to me (2x)

Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram, Sai Ram (3x)

Sai you are everything in my heart

title: You are Lord of the Universe
title2: You are Lord of the Universe, Lord of the Universe, ...
lyrics:
... Reside in our hearts Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, reside in our hearts Sai Baba
Cause of all creation, preserver and destroyer ...
... Satchidananda Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, Satchidananda Sai Baba
(You are) Mother of the Universe, Father of the Universe, ...
... The light of Mankind Sai Baba
Sai Baba Sai Baba, the light of mankind Sai Baba

title: You are mine
title2: You are mine mine mine, You are mine
lyrics:
My beloved Divine, You are mine!
No one can ever take You from me, 
Nor surpass You in Your beauty.
For I possess You and You possess me.
You are mine mine mine, You are mine
My beloved Divine, You are mine!
Every conscious being worships and adores You
Oh love Divine, Oh love Divine
But still You bless me with this special feeling that You're mine and only mine!

title: You are my everything
title2: You are my everything dear Swami
lyrics:
You are my loving Lord of all
I see You, I see You, I see You in one and all
Thank You for granting us Your darshan
Thank You for blessing us all
I see You, I see You, I see You in one and all
Sai I surrender at Your feet
You take my troubles all away
You give me hope, You give me light
I love You Lord with all my might
I see You, I see You, I see You in one and all

title: You Are My Mother
title2: You are my mother, You are my father, You are my nearest, dearest friend
lyrics:
You are the beginning, You are the middle, and You are beyond the end
I love You so, You help me see
See You in everyone, see You in me
For I’m in You and You’re in me

title: You Are My Mother, You Are My Father
title2: You Are My Mother, You Are My Father
lyrics:
You Are My Closest Kin, You Are My Dearest Friend
You Are My Wisdom, You Are My Treasure
You Are My Everything My Lord, My Loving Lord
alt_lyrics:
You Are My Mother, You Are My Father 
You Are My Nearest Kin, You Are My Dearest Friend
You Are My Wisdom, You Are My Treasure
You Are My Everything, You Are My Lord, My Loving Lord

title: You are my safest place
lyrics:
I’m always in your sacred hands, 
You protect me Lord whenever fear comes near I believe in You
Yes I believe in You, and I know that I am strong in the Love of my Lord

title: You Are Our God
lyrics:
You are our Light
You light up our lives
Every day and every night

title: You are our Rama
lyrics:
You are our Krishna
 You are our Budha
 You are our Jesus
 You are our Father
 You are our Mother
 You are our Teacher
 The Lord of the universe
 Bless me Bless Me Bless Me
 Bless me Bless Me Bless Me
 Come my Lord and Bless me

title: You are the center of my life
title2: You are the center of my life, my Lord, You are the pillar of my faith
lyrics:
I open up my heart to You, and pray for Your Grace
 I feel the pull of Your call, my Lord, but my senses are the gate
 Help me open up the door, my Lord, to reach Your blissful state
 I will love one and all, my Lord, I will help my fellow man
 I'll lead a life of Truth, my Lord, I know that I can

title: You are the Lord of all religions
title2: You are the Lord of all religions
lyrics:
My Lord, My Sri Sathya Sai
 With love You come, give us Your blessings
 Om Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Lord of all creation
 My Lord, my Sri Sathya Sai
 With peace You come, give us Your comfort
 Om Sai Ram (2X)
 You are the Lord of the universe
 My Lord, my Sri Sathya Sai
 With truth You come, give us Your wisdom
 Om Sai Ram (3X)

title: You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
title2: You are the Lord of my heart and my soul
lyrics:
Lord of my life it's beyond my control
(Sai) Open my heart to Your Love (2X)
Once I have seen You, Lord heard You and touched You
How can I live in this world without You
(Sai) Open my eyes to Your Light (2X)
Sai Ram, let me see You
Everywhere let me hear You
In everyone let me serve You
Sai Ram Bhagawan

title: You Are The Only One
title2: You are the only one, You are in everyone,
lyrics:
You are the guiding star, clearly seen wherever we are.
You are the heart's delight, You are the inner light,
You are the charioteer, You are the near and the dear.
But we so oft forget, we have not learned as yet,
To place our trust in You, and let You carry us through.
Be it good or bad, whether we're feeling happy or sad,
You are not far away, but with us every day.
Praise to our highest Self, which is our only wealth,
We feel You're perfect love, flowing to us from above.

title: You are the only one, my Lord
title2: You are the only one, my Lord, my God, my all
lyrics:
You are the only one, my Lord, my God, my all
 God alone, God alone, God alone

title: You Burn Brightly Within Me
lyrics:
Illuminate My Way Home
O Sai Baba
You Burn Brightly Within Me
Illuminate My Way Home
O Sweet Jesus
You Burn Brightly Within Me
Illuminate My Way Home

title: You Call To My Soul
title2: You Call To My Soul Through The Mists Of Maya, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
lyrics:
To Gather The Lost To The Light Of Your Star And I Wake ...
... From My Dream Sai Ram

Chorus: 
Sai Ram, I Have Seen Your Light, Light Of My Soul, Sai Baba
Sai Baba, I Have Heard Your Voice, Aum Without End, Sai Ram

You Call To My Heart Through The Dark Of Desire, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
To Lead With The Zeal Of Celestial Fire And I Love Only You, Sai Ram [ Chorus ]

You Call To My Life That Its Breath Is Your Own, Sai Baba, Sai Baba
To Silence My Mind With Sound Of Aum And My ...
... Thoughts Are Of You, Sai Ram [ Chorus ]

I Leave At Your Feet All The World That Was Mine, Sai Baba,Sai Baba
To Sing In The Void Of An Anguish Divine And I Die In ...
Your Love, Sai Ram [ Chorus ]

title: You Made The Planets And Stars
title2: You Made The Planets And Stars'n Heavens
lyrics:
Mountains And Valleys, Rivers And Ravines
Beautiful Flowers And Butterflies
You Are The Lord Of The Wondrous Skies
This Is Your Kingdom O Sathya Sai
Shower Your Blessings On Me And Mine
Lead Me To Knowledge And Truth And Light
Sai, Be My Beacon, Serene And Bright

title: You make my heart sing
title2: You make my heart sing, and set each worldly
lyrics:
fear winging, Lord of Light, Lord of Light
Pure and bright, beyond sound and sight, Lord of
Light, Sai, Lord of Light

title: You Mean Everything to Me Lord
title2: You mean everything to me Lord, You are everything I see
lyrics:
You are the sun, You are the moon
You are the love in my heart
 
You mean everything to me Lord, You are everything I see
You are the Earth, You are the sea
You are the truth in my heart
 
You mean everything to me Lord, You are everything I see
You are the fruit, You are the tree
You are the God in my heart

title: You Remove The Fear Of Birth And Death
title2: You Remove The Fear Of Birth And Death When We Worship At Your Feet
lyrics:
Victory To Krishna Victory (Krishna)
At Your Auspicious Feet You Burn Our Impurities
You Are Lord Krishna Lord Sai [ Victory to Krishna... ]

title: You take all the obstacles away
title2: You take all the obstacles away, O Lord Gananatha
lyrics:
You give us happiness, You give us auspiciousness
You take all the sorrows away, O Lord Gananatha
There is no emptiness, there is no loneliness
When we start off the day with Your name, O Lord Gananatha
alt_lyrics:
You take all the obstacles away, my Lord Gananatha
You give me happiness, You give me auspiciousness
When I call out Your name O my Lord, my Lord Gananatha
Om Sri Gananatha (4)

You take all the obstacles away, my Lord Gananatha
You give me happiness, You give me auspiciousness
When I call out Your name O my Lord, my Lord Gananatha
There is no emptiness, there is no loneliness
When we start off the day with Your name, O Lord Gananatha
Om Sri Gananatha (4)

title: You walked into my life
title2: You walked into my life, O I thought that I was dreaming
lyrics:
With the love of the ages, You woke me from my sleep
 You say that life is full of joy that we never have seen
 O help us to rise and awake from our dreams
 Help us to set aside all the fear we have of growing
 Let us be a reflection Your pure, unceasing Love
 And help our minds to be free of the suffering and pain
 Let us spread Your Love like the gently falling rain
 May we find joy and laughter
 May we see the light
 May we know ever after
 Love in our sight
 May our hearts fly to meet You
 May our eyes see
 May our love break its bondage
 And make us free

title: Your divine hand rests lightly on me
title2: Your divine hand rests lightly on me
lyrics:
I feel it with such joy
 My heart yearns for Your smile
 Eyes for a glimpse of the flame that is You my Lord
 Quench my thirst in the sea of Your Truth
 Lift me free of desires to follow Your way Lord, day by day
 Sri Sathya Sai, Sri Sathya Sai, Sri Sathya Sai Avatar

title: Your Hands Are Upon Me
lyrics:
You placed Your Hands upon me
You healed my broken heart
You’ve opened up The Way to see
We’ve never been apart
 
You’ve called me by my truest name
Ten billion times before
But I simply could not hear Your Voice
’Til You opened up Life’s Door
 
The Presence of Your Sacred Light
It drives away all fear
You’ve always been The One with me
Throughout these many years
 
Now I’m imbued with Your Divine Flame
It lightens up the night
It put an end to all guilt and shame
In me You’re shining bright
 
I rely upon You and You alone
Your Love can never change
You stand by me no matter what
Appearance and or pain
 
I never need to walk alone
Your Heart is always there
O Blessed One I Am Your Son
Your Kingdom is mine to share
 
You carried me above the clouds
Beyond the stream of time
O Precious Lord You’ve saved my soul
A jewel so pure and sublime
 
You’ve called to me “Come by My Side
And spread your wings on high”
To serve You Lord in the midst of all
It lifts my soul to fly
 
I rely upon You and You alone
Your Love can never change
You stand by me no matter what
Appearance and or pain
 
I never need to walk alone
Your Heart is always there
O Blessed One I Am Your Son
Your Kingdom is mine to share
 
You’ve shown me Truth of just what’s Real
You’ve cancelled out the false
No longer fooled by the flesh’s gold
Now I step back and pause
 
I wait in silence for Your Touch
Content to be with You
O Father dear I no longer fear
Your Light in me is The Truth
 
That I might rely upon You and You alone
Your Love can never change
You stand by me no matter what
Appearance and or pain
 
I never need to walk alone
Your Heart is always there
O Blessed One I Am Your Son
Your Kingdom is mine to share
 
I never need to walk alone
Your Heart is always there
O Blessed One I Am Your Son
Your Kingdom is mine to share

title: Your Healing Love
lyrics:
Heart to heart, Hand to hand
Through Your touch, I understand
How God's light fills my soul
By Your love I am made whole.
 
Cause Your healing love (healing love) carries me 
And Your healing love (healing love) helps me see
Now I know (now I know) how it feels to be
Cause Your healing love sets me free...
Sets me free... (3x)

title: Your Heart Sings To Me
lyrics:
Here am I. We are one. I love you. (2)
Soham, Om Sai Ram, (2)
Sathyam, Shivam, Sundaram. (2)
Allah Ho Akbar, (2)
Atmam Brahman, Om Sai Ram. (2)

title: Your Name So Sweet
lyrics:
Sathya Sai Your name so sweet (3x)
You are our beloved God
 
Keep us always at Your feet
Breathe through us Your sacred breath
Sing through us Thy sacred song
Love, love, love is all
 
Sathya Sai Om Sathya Sai (3x)
You are love, love, love (2x)

title: Your Sweet, Sweet Love
lyrics:
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is blessing me
Your love, (Your sweet love, Lord) is all I see
Your love, (Your love, Lord) has made me free
Your love, Your sweet, sweet love.
 
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is everything
Your love, (Your sweet love, Lord) is all You bring
Your love, (Your love) is the reason I sing
Your love, Your sweet, sweet love.
 
You're there right beside me You're there when I call
You're there to guide me You're there if I fall
You gently remind me "There's nothing to fear,"
Sweet Lord, You're always near.
 
Your love, (Your love) is my only desire
Your love, (Your sweet love) sets my heart on fire
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is lifting me higher
Your love, Your sweet, sweet love.
 
You guard and protect me I'm never alone
Your kindness and mercy are all I have known
The joy that I feel Is Your song in my soul
Sweet, Lord, You make me whole.
 
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is all I need
Your love, (Your sweet love, Lord) is sacred indeed
Your love, (Your love) is the truth that you freed
Your love, Your sweet, sweet love.
 
You whisper so softly "I'm always with you."
Your words give such comfort to help see me through
Your Grace is a shower of nectar Divine
Sweet Lord, You are mine.
 
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is precious to me
Your love, (Your sweet love, Lord) is pure as can be
Your love, (Your love, Lord) is ecstacy
Your love, Your sweet, sweet love (3x)

title: You’re the One, Bhagawan
title2: I want to hold Your feet as tight as I can
lyrics:
I want to chant Your name whereever I am
You’re the One, Bhagawan (2)

No other master, teacher, guru or saint
Can lift my spirits up when I’m feeling faint
You’re the One, Bhagawan (2)
 
You’re everywhere, You’re all that I see
Imbuing worlds with Divine Energy
And flowing from my head to my feet
You’re the rhythm of life, such a powerful beat
 
You’ll never leave my side, of that I am sure
I know Your Divine Grace and Love will endure
You’re the One, Bhagawan (2)

title: Yug Yug Ke Avatar Tum
title2: Yug Yug Ke Avatar Tum Hi Ho
lyrics:
Merey Ram Merey Shyam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram
Jag Ke Palanhaar Tum Hi Ho
Allah Eshwara Terey Naam
Sab Ko Sanmati Do Bhagawan
Allah Eshwar Terey Naam Shirdi Sai Parthi Ram [ Jag Ke ... ]
meaning: O Lord Sai of Shirdi and Parthi, You have incarnated from age to age, You are my Lord Rama and my Lord Krishna. You are the protector of this Universe. You are hailed by many names such as Allah and Eshwar (Shiva). O Lord Sai Rama of Shirdi and Parthi, bless us all with wisdom.

title: Yuga Avatara Paapa Samhara
lyrics:
Kaivalya Dayaka Ram O Sai [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Karuna Sagara Prem Ke Sindho
Deena Bandhu Deena Natha Krupala
Anupama Sundara Prashanthi Vasa Hrudayeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: Lord Sai, the incarnation of this age, is the destroyer of sins, the ocean of compassion and love. The beautiful Sai uplifts the unfortunate ones, and resides in Your heart.

title: Yuga Avatara Palanhaara
lyrics:
Kaivalya Dayaka Ram O Sai [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Karuna Sagara Prem Ke Sindhu
Deena Bandhu Deena Nath Bhagawan
Alakh Niranjana Prashanthi Vasa Hrudayeshwara Sai Ram
meaning: Oh Baba! You have incarnated in this age, you are the one who grants liberation, you are the ocean of love and compassion, friend and Lord of the oppressed, ever pure and resident of Prashanthi Nilayam.

title: Yuga Avatara Parthi Vihara Hari
title2: Yuga Avatara Parthi Vihara Hari Narayana Om
lyrics:
Paramananda Satchidananda Sri Sai Shankara Om
Parama Dayakara Paapa Samhara Vibhuti Sundara Om
[ Paramananda Satchidananda ... ]
Shirdi Pureeshwara Parthi Pureeshwara Prema Sayeeshwara Om
[ Paramananda Satchidananda ... ]
meaning: Glory to Lord Sathya Sai, the incarnation of Lord Vishnu in this Kali age who resides at Puttaparthi. He is Supreme Bliss, all merciful and the destroyer of sins. Shirdi Sai, Parthi Sai and Prema Sai are incarnations of Lord Shiva.

title: Yuga Avatara Radhey Shyam
lyrics:
Radhey Shyam Bol Radhey Shyam
Bhava Bhaya Bhanjana Radhey Shyam
Paapa Vimochana Radhey Shyam
Parthi Pureeshwara Radhey Shyam [ Radhey Shyam ... ]
meaning: Sing the name of Lord Sai of Parthi who is verily Lord Krishna (Shyam). Lord Sai is the incarnation of this Kali age, who destroys the fear of worldly afflictions and liberates us from all our sins.

title: Yuga Avatara Sai Rama
lyrics:
Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
Rama Rama Ram Sita Pathey Sri Ram (2) [ Yuga Avatara ... ]
Parama Niranjana Prashanthi Rama
Sri Raghu Rama Sai Rama
Rama Rama Ram (Sai)
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the incarnation of this Kali age. You are verily Lord Rama, the consort of Sita. O Lord of Prashanthi, You are eternally pure. Glory to Lord Rama of the Raghu dynasty who is none other than Lord Sai.

title: Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Yadava Yadu Kula Nandana
Sundara Shubha Kara Sridhara
Madhava Keshava
Mangala Sai Gopala
meaning: You are the incarnation of this Kali age Oh Lord Sai, You bestow auspiciousness, You are verily Krishna, the beautiful and sweet son of Yadu clan and  Lord Vishnu the consort of Goddess Lakshmi.

title: Yuga Avatara Sayeeshwara
lyrics:
Yadava Yadu Nandana
Hrudaya Vihari Hey Deena Bandho
Hari Hari Hari Om Jagadeka Bandho
Hey Deena Bandho Karuna Sindho
meaning: O Lord Sai, You are the incarnation of this Kali age. You are verily Lord Krishna of Yadava dynasty. You are the kin of the downtrodden and also the whole world, You wander in people's hearts and You are the ocean of compassion.

title: Yuga Yuga Ke Avatara Sai
title2: Yuga Yuga Ke Avatara Sai Rama Sai Krishna Sai Baba
lyrics:
Baba Sai Baba Baba Sai Baba [ Yuga Yuga ... ]
Allah Yesu Nanak Sai
Buddha Zohrashtra Mahavira Sai
Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram Rahim Jai Ram (2)
meaning: O Lord Sai, You incarnate through different ages as Rama, Krishna and as Sai Baba. The devotees worship You by different names as Allah, Eshwara (Shiva), Nanak, Buddha, Zohrashtra, Mahavira, Ram and Rahim.

title: Yuga Yuga Vanditha Sai Baba
lyrics:
Sharanam Sharanam Shata Koti Sharanam
Treta Yuga Mey Tum Ho Ram Baba
Dwapara Yug Mey Tum Ho Krishna Baba
Kali Yug Mey Tum Ho Sathya Sai Baba [ Sharanam Sharanam ]
Sai Ram Sai Ram (3)
meaning: Oh Baba, Millions surrendered at your feet during the past several eons. In the age of TRETA you were Rama, In the age of DWAPARA you were Krishna and in this age of KALI you are Sathya Sai Baba Oh my Sai Ram.

title: Yume ni Made Mita Puttaparthi
title2: Yume ni Made Mita Puttaparthi ni Kimashita
lyrics:
Ai no Kami, Sai Baba ga Orareru Tokoro
Rinne no Kusari wo Tachi Kiru Tame ni
Osazuke Kudasai Anata no Ai wo, Jiai no Chikara wo
meaning: I first saw You in a dream as You came down to Puttaparthi. Sai Baba, God of Love, I wish to be with You. You came to us in order to break our chain of rebirth so that we may join You. Please grant us the power of Your divine love.

title: Yuuki wo sazukeru Vinayaka
lyrics:
Kono kokoro wo kiyomeru Vinayaka
Eichi no Akari wo tomosu Gajanana
Warare wo michibiku Sai Gajanana
Shinri to seigi no Parthi Gajanana
Jai Jai Ganesha Jai Sai Ganesha (4)
meaning: Grant me courage and braveness, O Lord Vinayaka. Please cleanse this heart of mine, Lord. Illuminate our minds with intelligence, O Lord Gajanana, and guide us all towards truth and justice.
